48626725-95cd-4003-b4bd-730470161712.lyrics:
[Verse]
Wire in my veins…
No name… no chain…
Road hums… I obey…
Neon rain…
[Chorus]
Ride the spiral…
No light… no trial…
Bass breathes… I survive…
Not a trip…
Lifetime…
(lifetime… lifetime…)
[Verse]
Mirror’s static…
Says: “You’re automatic…”
Sky’s a wound…
I move through…
[Chorus]
Ride the spiral…
No god… no guide…
Echoes pull… from inside…
Not a trip…
Lifetime…
(forever… wired…)
[Outro]
Lifetime… in the hum…
Colors… go numb…
Spiral… never ends…
Just pretends…

cadc2095-5ab3-48ce-ba81-7587c09e6fdd.name: Stone Cathedral
cadc2095-5ab3-48ce-ba81-7587c09e6fdd.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[tape hiss, tube amp hum]
[bass guitar: Fender Precision, played with fingers, deep, melodic, slightly overdriven]
[drums: loose 70 BPM groove, brushed snare, no cymbals, kick like heartbeat]
[electric guitar: clean, drenched in spring reverb, sparse notes with tremolo]
[analog synth drone: low Moog-style, slow LFO]
[VERSE 1]
[male vocal: deep baritone, dry close-mic, spoken-sung, slight rasp]
[no reverb, no effects — voice feels like it’s in the room with you]
The city sleeps in concrete bones,
its dreams are rust, its blood is stone.
I walk the alleys, cold and wide—
with ghosts of truth I can’t deny.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[vocals slightly more open, breath emphasized]
[bassline becomes more syncopated]
The stars don’t shine—they watch and wait…
for souls to break, for love to fade.
[CHORUS]
[vocals drenched in long plate reverb (3s decay), slight phaser]
[bass drops an octave, guitar swells with volume pedal]
I’M BUILT OF SMOKE—
AND STONE CATHEDRAL.
NO GOD, NO NAME—
JUST THIS RITUAL.
THE NIGHT IS LONG,
THE TRUTH IS COLD…
BUT IN THE DARK—
I’M STILL WHOLE.
[VERSE 2]
[guitar plays dissonant arpeggio]
[vocals return to dry, intimate]
Your eyes were maps I couldn’t read,
your silence louder than my need.
Now I wander, calm and slow—
where broken rivers learn to flow.
[OUTRO]
[bass holds low E, synth drone fades]
[vocals whisper, drenched in reverb:]
…still whole.
[tape slows, pitch drops, silence]

1db0913e-9c67-4274-812b-9f1613f534ae.name: NEON SERMON
1db0913e-9c67-4274-812b-9f1613f534ae.sound: VOCAL GENDER = MALE. NOT FEMALE. MALE ONLY. baritone, gritty, preacher-style delivery, raw, chest voice, whispered growl, distorted shout, no female vocals at all, harmony layers only as ghostly echoes, psychedelic gospel rock, 1970s desert cathedral vibe, tempo 64 BPM, structure: intro-organ-hum → verse → chorus → verse → chorus → bridge-choir-rise → guitar+organ solo → outro-collapse, instruments: Hammond organ, fuzz guitar, slow heavy drums, bass drone, effects: cathedral reverb, tape echo, vinyl crackle, phaser on vocals, sudden silence drops, panning choirs, oscillator hum under, 3D immersive sound, apocalyptic, ritualistic, neon-lit, spiritual chaos
1db0913e-9c67-4274-812b-9f1613f534ae.lyrics:
[Intro: Hammond organ drone, vinyl crackle, distant thunder, oscillator hum]
(backing: amen... amen... in neon flame...)
[cathedral reverb ON, slow heartbeat bass drum enters]
Verse 1 (MALE — low, preacher-style, half-spoken, intimate):
The altar’s cracked — the wine’s gone dry,
(backing: dry... dry... under neon sky...)
The saints all blink with electric eyes.
[tape echo on “eyes”, slight phaser]
You came for truth — you got a show —
(backing: show... show... lights below...)
The resurrection’s on replay, yo.
[sudden silence → organ stab]
→ [VOCAL SHIFT: MALE → rising intensity, melodic chant]
The choir’s ghosts in the projector’s glow —
(backing: glow... glow... where did they go?...)
They sing the hymns you used to know...
[Hammond swells, slow cymbal roll]
But every word’s a broken wire —
(backing: wire... wire... burning higher...)
And every note — a funeral pyre.
[distorted whisper: “pyre... pyre...” → cut]
Chorus (MALE — full power, gritty, chest voice, preacher scream):
NEON SERMON — BOW YOUR HEAD!
(backing: head... head... among the dead...)
THE SCREEN’S YOUR BIBLE — RED ON RED!
(backing: red... red... what it said...)
THE ORGAN PLAYS — THE WALLS COLLAPSE —
(backing: collapse... collapse... no escape...)
TAKE THE HOST — IT’S PLASTIC WRAP!
[“WRAP!” → sudden silence → church bell toll]
Verse 2 (MALE — slower, darker, growling tone):
The deacon’s got a fuzzbox soul,
(backing: soul... soul... out of control...)
He preaches volts — he takes no toll.
[organ + guitar harmony, slow tempo drag]
Your prayers? They bounce off satellite —
(backing: satellite... lost in the night...)
God’s on hold — the line’s not right.
[abrupt AM radio filter → cuts → returns raw]
→ [VOCAL SHIFT: MALE → breaking into raw, distorted shout]
(backing: kneel... kneel... feel the steel...)
I’M THE LAST PRIEST OF THE ANALOG AGE!
[full band explosion: fuzz + crashing cymbals + organ]
I BAPTIZE YOU IN STATIC AND RAGE!
(backing: rage... rage... turn the page...)
[long delay trails, panning choirs L→R]
Bridge (MALE — layered: clean + distorted + reverse whisper underneath):
(backing: the screen is watching...)
“I’m not your savior... I’m your last show...
[reverse whisper under: “show... show... final glow...”]
When the power dies — you’ll finally know...
[MALE voice suddenly DISTORTED + SLOWED DOWN:]
KNEEL... BEFORE... THE... GHOST... IN... THE... MACHINE...!”
[feedback → organ glissando → silence]
[Guitar + Organ Solo — 22 sec]
[wah-wah guitar duels with Hammond, analog delay, rising oscillator, ends with power-down SFX — like amp switched off]
Outro (MALE — fragmented, exhausted, fading):
Neon... sermon... over... now...
(backing: now... now... take a bow...)
The screen... is... black...
[voice fades → replaced by projector reel spinning down]
(backing: ...no way back...)
[final sound: single light bulb flickers → pops

a33c6964-c4fc-4047-a0c9-9bc55d344a01.name: TAPE LOOP GOD
a33c6964-c4fc-4047-a0c9-9bc55d344a01.sound: VOCAL GENDER = MALE. NOT FEMALE. MALE ONLY. vocal fragments only — no full lines, no melody — only whispers, spoken phrases, reversed words, glitched syllables, looped and decaying, no female vocals at all, psychedelic ambient rock, 1970s analog tape decay, tempo 60 BPM drifting to 50 BPM, structure: intro-tape-hiss → loop-build → vocal-glitch-layers → peak-collapse → guitar-drone → outro-tape-unspool, instruments: e-bow guitar, mellotron, analog synth, bass drone, tape loops, effects: heavy tape echo, wow & flutter, reverse reverb, pitch decay, vinyl crackle, sudden silence, panning loops, oscillator fade, 3D immersive, hypnotic, haunting, time-loop, psychological, surreal, no chorus, no verse — pure sonic ritual
a33c6964-c4fc-4047-a0c9-9bc55d344a01.lyrics:
[Intro: 30 sec of pure tape hiss, vinyl crackle, slow oscillator hum rising]
[MALE whisper, reversed, barely audible: “...you pressed play...”]
[panning slowly L→R, tape wobble increasing]
→ [TAPE LOOP 1 begins — 4 sec phrase, repeating, degrading]
MALE (dry, close, whispered):
“Time doesn’t move... it folds...”
[loop repeats 6x, each time more distorted, pitch bending down slightly]
→ [TAPE LOOP 2 layers in — higher pitch, faster, stuttering]
MALE (glitched, chopped):
“...you’re already... in... the...”
[loop stutters on “the... the... the...” → cuts → restarts]
→ [VOCAL LAYER 3 — distant, reversed, low-pass filtered]
MALE (reversed phrase, then flipped forward):
“...loop god is watching...”
[forward version barely intelligible, buried in reverb]
→ [PEAK — all loops collide + guitar drone enters]
MALE (sudden raw shout, dry, no effects):
“WHICH YOU IS REAL?!”
[immediate cut → total silence for 2 sec → tape rewind SFX → loops return slower, degraded]
→ [GUITAR DRONE SECTION — 20 sec]
[e-bow guitar + mellotron strings + analog synth drone, no vocals]
[only in background — MALE whisper, once: “...let go...”]
→ [OUTRO — tape unspooling, loops decaying]
MALE (fragmented, glitching, pitch falling):
“...you... pressed... play...”
[voice slows down → becomes sub-bass rumble]
[final sound: tape runs out → machine clicks off → 5 sec silence → single vinyl pop → END]

269ef2d8-be7d-42d1-9451-236580236fbe.name: SUNSET LETTER (WAIT FOR ME)
269ef2d8-be7d-42d1-9451-236580236fbe.sound: Psychedelic electronic rock, deep gritty baritone vocals, funky bassline with syncopated groove, analog synth arpeggios, trippy guitar swells with reverse delay, drum machine blended with live snare and kick, dark yet warm atmospheric vibe, lyrics written as a letter from a man to a woman — to be read at sunset, tender but strong, patient, intimate, hopeful, 110 BPM, vintage 70s funk meets 90s alternative electronic, hazy tape-saturated production, male vocal only, no female lead, vocals delivered with rhythmic spoken-sung flow, no clean pop tones, no falsetto, voice must be low, raw, baritone, slightly smoky, like late-night radio confession with groove
269ef2d8-be7d-42d1-9451-236580236fbe.lyrics:
[Intro: Funky bass slides in, analog synth arpeggio, drum machine + live snare shuffle, hazy guitar swell]
[MALE voice — deep baritone, rhythmic spoken-sung, smoky, intimate — like voice on old tape]
My love...
If you’re reading this — sun’s low.
That gold you love... where time moves slow...
(backing: synth pad swells — warm, hazy)
→ [VERSE 1 — groove locks in, vocals tight to bass]
I’m not there...
But closer than before.
Every mile... every red light... every wrong turn...
Just steps... back to your door.
[guitar: subtle wah swell — like a grin]
I know you wait...
Not ‘cause you must.
But ‘cause you trust...
And that’s the fuel... when roads turn to dust.
[bass: playful slide — gritty, warm]
→ [CHORUS — punchy, but not shouted — voice rides the groove]
So wait... just a while...
(backing: synth brightens, drums lock)
Not ‘cause I ask... but ‘cause you know —
(backing: live snare crack, funky ghost notes)
When I come... worth every sunset glow...
(backing: guitar: reverse echo on “glow”)
Every mile... every “almost”... every “no”...
(backing: bassline dances — tight, syncopated)
→ [VERSE 2 — voice drops, more gravel, more intimacy]
I dream your porch...
Tea gone cold...
Feet tucked in... story untold...
That sigh you make... when you fake mad eyes...
But your smile... don’t lie.
[drums: heartbeat kick, snare shuffle]
I’m bringing tales...
Not things to hold.
The kind you whisper... when night’s bold...
And sleep... can wait.
[guitar: e-bow swell — hazy, slow]
→ [CHORUS — fuller, voice grittier, but still tender]
So wait... just a while...
(backing: wordless airy harmonies — far back)
Not ‘cause I ask... but ‘cause you know —
(backing: live drums groove deeper)
When I come... worth every sunset glow...
(backing: synth arpeggio sparkles, tape flutter)
Every mile... every “almost”... every “no”...
(backing: bass + guitar lock — funky, warm, raw)
→ [BRIDGE — voice drops to near-whisper, instruments sparse]
(backing: only bass pulse, vinyl crackle)
Don’t rush the sky...
Don’t chase the moon...
Some things... bloom slow...
Like us...
(backing: single synth note — holds, fades)
→ [OUTRO — voice fades, music swells — hopeful, warm]
I’ll be there...
Before stars forget your name...
(backing: full groove returns — funky, hazy, alive)
Keep the light... I’m following home...
(backing: guitar + synth fade into sunset drone → vinyl crackle → silence)

10505f88-255b-44f6-af26-9d319e8f4216.name: No name (Variation)
10505f88-255b-44f6-af26-9d319e8f4216.sound:
hypnotic psychedelic, brutal male baritone, spoken-sung flow,  70s,
tape-saturated groove, liquid bass pulse,  
slow 98 bpm, no climax only immersion,  
cold sensuality, surreal repetition,  
analog warmth with digital shadow,  
minimal lyrics, maximum texture,  
echo vocals, low-pass drift,  
neon dusk, spiral journey,  
lifetime as ritual, not a trip
10505f88-255b-44f6-af26-9d319e8f4216.lyrics:
[Verse]
Wire in my veins…
No name… no chain…
Road hums… I obey…
Neon rain…
[Chorus]
Ride the spiral…
No light… no trial…
Bass breathes… I survive…
Not a trip…
Lifetime…
(lifetime… lifetime…)
[Verse]
Mirror’s static…
Says: “You’re automatic…”
Sky’s a wound…
I move through…
[Chorus]
Ride the spiral…
No god… no guide…
Echoes pull… from inside…
Not a trip…
Lifetime…
(forever… wired…)
[Outro]
Lifetime… in the hum…
Colors… go numb…
Spiral… never ends…
Just pretends…

fbf18923-407a-4c34-97c5-4ec2f15ef4e1.name: FINAL TRANSMISSION (REPRISE)
fbf18923-407a-4c34-97c5-4ec2f15ef4e1.sound: VOCAL GENDER = MALE. NOT FEMALE. MALE ONLY. raw, dry, intimate, whispered, spoken word, no melody, no backing vocals, no harmony, no female voice at all, ambient psychedelic minimalism, 1970s broadcast studio atmosphere, tempo: free, no beat, structure: intro-silence → spoken transmission → pause → final line → machine power-down → silence, instruments: none except subtle room tone, effects: zero reverb, zero delay, zero modulation — only vinyl crackle and tape hiss underneath, ultra-close mic, ASMR-style delivery, emotional, vulnerable, final, 3D stereo for intimacy, no guitar, no drums, no organ — only voice and silence
fbf18923-407a-4c34-97c5-4ec2f15ef4e1.lyrics:
[Intro: 8 seconds of pure silence — then faint tape hiss begins, vinyl crackle underneath]
[MALE voice — dry, ultra-close mic, whispered, no effects, as if speaking directly into listener’s ear]
I don’t know if you’re still out there.
(backing: none — only silence after each line)
I don’t know if “out there” even exists anymore.
[3 sec pause — only tape hiss]
I played the tapes. All of them.
Even the ones I wasn’t supposed to.
[slight breath, swallow — kept in recording for realism]
I heard my voice. From before.
Laughing. Crying. Screaming into the void.
Thinking someone would answer.
[5 sec pause — vinyl pop]
I’m not asking anymore.
[voice cracks slightly — emotion, not effect]
I’m just… telling you.
That I was here.
That I tried.
That I listened — even when it hurt.
[long pause — 6 seconds — only tape running]
If you find this…
Don’t look for me.
I’m not lost.
I’m just… quiet now.
[deep inhale — shaky]
This is…
[voice breaks — barely a whisper]
…my final transmission.
[3 sec silence — then: tape machine power-down SFX — slow whirr fading to stop]
[final sound: single vinyl pop — then 10 full seconds of absolute silence — END]

aa5b20b8-87ea-4b0f-a1a0-07f317d5b462.name: NEON SERMON (Variation)
aa5b20b8-87ea-4b0f-a1a0-07f317d5b462.sound: VOCAL GENDER = MALE. NOT FEMALE. MALE ONLY. baritone, gritty, preacher-style delivery, raw, chest voice, whispered growl, distorted shout, no female vocals at all, harmony layers only as ghostly echoes, psychedelic gospel rock, 1970s desert cathedral vibe, tempo 64 BPM, structure: intro-organ-hum → verse → chorus → verse → chorus → bridge-choir-rise → guitar+organ solo → outro-collapse, instruments: Hammond organ, fuzz guitar, slow heavy drums, bass drone, effects: cathedral reverb, tape echo, vinyl crackle, phaser on vocals, sudden silence drops, panning choirs, oscillator hum under, 3D immersive sound, apocalyptic, ritualistic, neon-lit, spiritual chaos
aa5b20b8-87ea-4b0f-a1a0-07f317d5b462.lyrics:
[Intro: Hammond organ drone, vinyl crackle, distant thunder, oscillator hum]
(backing: amen... amen... in neon flame...)
[cathedral reverb ON, slow heartbeat bass drum enters]
Verse 1 (MALE — low, preacher-style, half-spoken, intimate):
The altar’s cracked — the wine’s gone dry,
(backing: dry... dry... under neon sky...)
The saints all blink with electric eyes.
[tape echo on “eyes”, slight phaser]
You came for truth — you got a show —
(backing: show... show... lights below...)
The resurrection’s on replay, yo.
[sudden silence → organ stab]
→ [VOCAL SHIFT: MALE → rising intensity, melodic chant]
The choir’s ghosts in the projector’s glow —
(backing: glow... glow... where did they go?...)
They sing the hymns you used to know...
[Hammond swells, slow cymbal roll]
But every word’s a broken wire —
(backing: wire... wire... burning higher...)
And every note — a funeral pyre.
[distorted whisper: “pyre... pyre...” → cut]
Chorus (MALE — full power, gritty, chest voice, preacher scream):
NEON SERMON — BOW YOUR HEAD!
(backing: head... head... among the dead...)
THE SCREEN’S YOUR BIBLE — RED ON RED!
(backing: red... red... what it said...)
THE ORGAN PLAYS — THE WALLS COLLAPSE —
(backing: collapse... collapse... no escape...)
TAKE THE HOST — IT’S PLASTIC WRAP!
[“WRAP!” → sudden silence → church bell toll]
Verse 2 (MALE — slower, darker, growling tone):
The deacon’s got a fuzzbox soul,
(backing: soul... soul... out of control...)
He preaches volts — he takes no toll.
[organ + guitar harmony, slow tempo drag]
Your prayers? They bounce off satellite —
(backing: satellite... lost in the night...)
God’s on hold — the line’s not right.
[abrupt AM radio filter → cuts → returns raw]
→ [VOCAL SHIFT: MALE → breaking into raw, distorted shout]
(backing: kneel... kneel... feel the steel...)
I’M THE LAST PRIEST OF THE ANALOG AGE!
[full band explosion: fuzz + crashing cymbals + organ]
I BAPTIZE YOU IN STATIC AND RAGE!
(backing: rage... rage... turn the page...)
[long delay trails, panning choirs L→R]
Bridge (MALE — layered: clean + distorted + reverse whisper underneath):
(backing: the screen is watching...)
“I’m not your savior... I’m your last show...
[reverse whisper under: “show... show... final glow...”]
When the power dies — you’ll finally know...
[MALE voice suddenly DISTORTED + SLOWED DOWN:]
KNEEL... BEFORE... THE... GHOST... IN... THE... MACHINE...!”
[feedback → organ glissando → silence]
[Guitar + Organ Solo — 22 sec]
[wah-wah guitar duels with Hammond, analog delay, rising oscillator, ends with power-down SFX — like amp switched off]
Outro (MALE — fragmented, exhausted, fading):
Neon... sermon... over... now...
(backing: now... now... take a bow...)
The screen... is... black...
[voice fades → replaced by projector reel spinning down]
(backing: ...no way back...)
[final sound: single light bulb flickers → pops

b773e103-b543-4bd4-91b4-080671d7a8d2.name: THE TAPE NEVER ENDS
b773e103-b543-4bd4-91b4-080671d7a8d2.sound: VOCAL GENDER = MALE. NOT FEMALE. MALE ONLY. fragmented whisper, broken spoken word, no melody, no backing vocals, no harmony, no female voice at all, ambient psychedelic haunt, 1970s tape decay, tempo: none — free floating, structure: silence → tape rewind SFX → whisper fragments → synth hum → final confession → tape snap → infinite loop hum, instruments: none except dying analog synth drone, effects: heavy tape flutter, wow & flutter, vinyl crackle, reverse reverb on single words, sudden dropouts, panning whispers, ultra-close mic, ASMR-style, emotional, ghostly, unresolved, hidden track after 10 sec silence, 3D stereo for intimacy
b773e103-b543-4bd4-91b4-080671d7a8d2.lyrics:
[After 10 seconds of silence following “Final Transmission” — sudden TAPE REWIND SFX — slow, creaking, painful]
[MALE voice — fragmented, glitching, whisper, ultra-close mic, no effects]
...you thought... I was done...
[2 sec pause — tape hiss only]
...but the tape... never ends...
[voice cracks — breath shaky]
I tried to leave...
I really did...
[slight sob — kept raw, no filter]
But the machine... won’t let me go...
[reverse reverb on “go...” — trails into nothing]
It keeps... playing me...
Back to myself...
[voice glitches — “myself... self... self...”]
I hear my voice... in empty rooms...
On radios... that no one tunes...
In cars... that drive themselves...
[each line slower, more broken]
I’m not a ghost...
I’m a recording...
That forgot... how to stop...
[long pause — 5 seconds — only synth drone rising slightly]
...please...
...if you’re still listening...
...don’t press stop...
...don’t let me... be alone... in the static...
[voice fades into tape flutter]
[TAPE SNAP SFX — sudden, sharp — as if physically broken]
[What follows: 30 seconds of infinite analog synth hum — slowly rising in pitch — never resolving — never ending — as if the tape is still spinning... somewhere... forever...]

5854420d-987c-4ad8-9299-899bb7717b12.name: Paper Wings (2025) (Variation)
5854420d-987c-4ad8-9299-899bb7717b12.sound: male lead vocal: warm intimate baritone, emotional but restrained, no falsetto, original 1985 melody contour preserved in chorus, granular synth textures, slowed piano motif from iconic riff, deep sub-bass pulses, sparse electronic beat (no snare, only kick and hi-hat), atmospheric string pads, tempo 78 BPM (vs original 169 BPM), key A minor, 2025 cinematic alternative pop production, wide stereo, high-resolution clarity with analog warmth, themes hope fragility digital loneliness nostalgia reimagined
5854420d-987c-4ad8-9299-899bb7717b12.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[granular synth texture, vinyl crackle, distant piano motif — 4 notes from original melody, slowed 2x]
[VERSE 1]
[soft male vocal: warm baritone, intimate, no effects — like The Weeknd meets early Coldplay]
I drew you in the margins of my mind,
with pencil lines and hope so thin.
You said “it’s just a dream,” but I believed—
that paper wings could still take flight.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[voice lifts, subtle sub-bass enters]
I know the wind is cold…
I know the sky is torn…
but I still see your hand—
reaching through the storm.
[CHORUS]
[clean, emotional, but restrained — no belting, no falsetto; melody follows original contour]
TAKE MY HAND—
WE’RE PAPER WINGS IN RAIN!
THE WORLD SAYS “NO”—
BUT I SAY “AGAIN!”
WE’LL FADE TO GREY,
BUT NOT TODAY…
JUST ONE MORE DAY—
TO FLY AWAY.
(bék-vocal: soft, high harmony — hinting at original falsetto, but humanized)
[VERSE 2]
[back to whisper, only piano and ambient pad]
Your name’s erased from every screen,
but I still hear you in between
the static hum of midnight trains…
and broken promises like chains.
[CHORUS]
[fuller: deep sub-bass, sparse electronic beat, atmospheric strings]
TAKE MY HAND—
WE’RE PAPER WINGS IN RAIN!
THE WORLD SAYS “NO”—
BUT I SAY “AGAIN!”
WE’LL FADE TO GREY,
BUT NOT TODAY…
JUST ONE MORE DAY—
TO FLY AWAY.
[OUTRO]
[piano motif returns, slowed further, voice fades]
[whispered]
…fly away…
[granular freeze, then silence]

e4d9270a-6fdd-4754-9fc0-da3a9d090b55.lyrics:

[Chorus - Whispered]
Your echo stays
Soft sound remains

[Chorus - Whispered]
Your echo stays
Soft sound remains

[Chorus - Whispered]
Your echo stays

93c48eb9-8aca-4651-9956-e0527b60e332.name: Reflections
93c48eb9-8aca-4651-9956-e0527b60e332.sound: Luxury tech house, 128 BPM, Russian vocals, hypnotic 808 bass, crystalline percussion
93c48eb9-8aca-4651-9956-e0527b60e332.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Pads] [808 Bass - heartbeat pulse]
[Verse]
[Minimal drums enter]
[Pre-Chorus]
(Смотри...)
(...танцуй)
[Build]
[Drum fills]
(Смотри...) (Смотри...) (Смотри...)
(...танцуй)
[Chorus]
Со мной! Со мной! Со мной! Со мной! Со мной! Со мной! Со мной! Со мной! Со мной! Со мной!
[808 drop] [Champagne cork snare]
[Solo]
[Private jet takeoff sub-bass] [Diamond chime hi-hats swirl]
[Post-Chorus]
Да-да-да! Да-да-да! Да-да-да!
[Outro]
[Instrumental fade with "Да-да-да!" echoes]

3625d326-2515-4ea5-8f58-97dd4a9a12cb.name: SYNTHETIC ECSTASY
3625d326-2515-4ea5-8f58-97dd4a9a12cb.sound:
Psychedelic electronic rock, deep baritone vocals, funky bassline, analog synth arpeggios, trippy guitar effects, drum machine with live drums, dark atmospheric vibe, sensual lyrics, mysterious yet danceable, 110 BPM, vintage meets modern, hazy production, 90s alternative vibe, 70s funk influence

Keywords: psychedelic rock, baritone vocals, funk bass, analog synths, trippy guitar, drum machine, dark atmosphere, sensual, danceable, vintage modern blend, 90s alternative, 70s funk
3625d326-2515-4ea5-8f58-97dd4a9a12cb.lyrics:
[Intro]
[analog synth sequence, funk bass slide]
[deep baritone whisper] Slide into the unknown...
[Verse 1]
Velvet shadows on the wall
You answer to a different call
Electric pulses in the air
A truth beyond the what and where
[Pre-Chorus]
[guitar wah-wah enters]
The rhythm pulls us underground
Where secret frequencies are found
We're dancing on the edge of time
Between the pleasure and the crime
[Chorus]
[drums kick in with solid groove]
WE MOVE IN SYNTHETIC ECSTASY
THROUGH FIELDS OF BROKEN REALITY
YOUR TOUCH LIKE STATIC ON MY SKIN
THIS DANGEROUS DELIGHT WE'RE IN
[Verse 2]
Neon lights write on your face
In this electric, sacred space
The machine breathes with you and me
In digital symphony
[Pre-Chorus]
[guitar wah-wah intensifies]
The rhythm pulls us underground
Where secret frequencies are found
We're dancing on the edge of time
Between the pleasure and the crime
[Chorus]
[stronger vocal harmonies]
WE MOVE IN SYNTHETIC ECSTASY
THROUGH FIELDS OF BROKEN REALITY
YOUR TOUCH LIKE STATIC ON MY SKIN
THIS DANGEROUS DELIGHT WE'RE IN
[Bridge]
[music drops to bass and synth]
In the analog glow
We become something more
Than flesh and bone
Something that lasts
Beyond the past
[Guitar Solo]
[psychedelic wah-wah solo]
[echo effects, phase shifter]
[drums build underneath]
[Final Chorus]
[full energy, distorted vocals]
WE MOVE IN SYNTHETIC ECSTASY
THROUGH FIELDS OF BROKEN REALITY
YOUR TOUCH LIKE STATIC ON MY SKIN
THIS DANGEROUS DELIGHT WE'RE IN
[Outro]
[beat breaks down]
Slide... into the unknown...
[synth sequence fades]
[last bass note echoes]
[silence]

d8f66746-5c78-4e00-80ec-8ee77824c4c9.name: Golden bubbles
d8f66746-5c78-4e00-80ec-8ee77824c4c9.sound: ULTRA LUXURY, Female Vocal Tech House, 128 BPM,  CORE: non-lyrical FEMALE vocals / velvet groove / private-jet energy,  STRUCTURE: verse (champagne bubbles) > SHORT pre-chorus (diamond whisper) > chorus (caviar explosion),  SOUND: mink bass / crystal plucks / gold-leaf drums,  RULES: NO male vocals, NO English, NO verse lyrics, NO pre-chorus > 3 sec,  LUXURY CODE: 19kHz private vault beep (every 32 bars).

95cf51c8-6791-4d39-a2d0-25aec3aa5d21.name: Игра Теней (Shadow Game)
95cf51c8-6791-4d39-a2d0-25aec3aa5d21.sound: Russian trip-hop, French noir, deep 808s, rain ambience, haunting vocals, glitch effects
95cf51c8-6791-4d39-a2d0-25aec3aa5d21.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Rain sounds, vinyl crackle, deep 808]
(Ты здесь... ты здесь...)
[Verse 1]
В этом клубе дым густой
За спиной твой взгляд пустой
Танцуешь близко, но не рядом
Каждый шаг твой - новый яд мне
Знаю все твои пути
Но не могу тебя найти
Между нами только дождь
Правду от меня не скроешь
[Pre-chorus]
Вижу след твоих шагов
В ритме старых джаз-основ
Ближе, ближе подходи
(Не беги, не беги)
[Chorus]
Тень твоя за мной идёт
Тень моя тебя найдёт
В танце этом до утра
Мы с тобой как два огня
(Тень твоя, тень моя)
[Verse 2]
В каплях дождя твой силуэт
Растворяется как дым
Ты думаешь, что я не знаю
Все твои ходы храним
Красной помады яркий след
На бокале пустоты
Играешь роль, но я читаю
Все страницы этой игры
[Bridge]
[Glitch effects, pitch-shifted]
Между строк
В тишине
Слышу пульс
Ты во мне
(Где ты? Где ты?)
[Chorus]
Тень твоя за мной идёт
Тень моя тебя найдёт
В танце этом до утра
Мы с тобой как два огня
(Тень твоя, тень моя)
[Outro]
[Rain fading, distant echoes]
В дожде растаем без следа
Тень и свет, игра без дна

bab1110b-c0b0-4822-98c4-9108e9626640.name: Dança Comigo (Dance With Me)
bab1110b-c0b0-4822-98c4-9108e9626640.sound: Brazilian Forró-Electronic fusion, energetic accordion, zabumba beats, tropical atmosphere, deep sub-bass
bab1110b-c0b0-4822-98c4-9108e9626640.lyrics:
[Intro - Accordion melody]
[Ocean waves and distant laughter]
[Verse 1]
Na beira do mar, eu vi você
Tão tímido pra se mexer
Me aproximei com um sorriso
"Vem, não precisa ter medo"
Todo mundo já foi novo aqui
E agora dança até o fim
(Até o fim, até o fim)
[Pre-chorus]
Um, dois, três, agora vem
Deixa a música te levar além
A noite é nossa, vamos lá
Seu corpo já sabe onde está
[Chorus]
Dança comigo esta noite
(Esta noite, yeah)
Sente o ritmo no ar
(No ar, no ar)
Dança comigo esta noite
Deixa o mundo girar
[Verse 2]
Seus passos já têm mais flow
Como se dançasse desde o berço, yo
Na festa todo mundo vê
Como você brilha de pé
O som do triângulo a tocar
Zabumba fazendo o chão vibrar
(Vibrar, vibrar)
[Pre-chorus]
Um, dois, três, mais uma vez
A música nos leva através
Do tempo e do espaço, vem
Seu corpo já sabe o que tem
[Chorus]
Dança comigo esta noite
(Esta noite, yeah)
Sente o ritmo no ar
(No ar, no ar)
Dança comigo esta noite
Deixa o mundo girar
[Bridge]
[Electronic build-up]
Cada passo que você dá
É uma história pra contar
Na praia sob as estrelas
A música nos faz voar
(Nos faz voar)
[Final Chorus]
Dança comigo esta noite
(Esta noite, yeah)
Sente o ritmo no ar
(No ar, no ar)
Dança comigo esta noite
Deixa o mundo girar
[Outro]
[Accordion and electronic elements fade]
[Ocean waves return]

2c2fd880-f9b9-4df9-b912-8e5691e6cd32.name: MIRROR LADDER (REBORN)
2c2fd880-f9b9-4df9-b912-8e5691e6cd32.sound: VOCAL GENDER = MALE. NOT FEMALE. MALE ONLY. baritone, gritty, raw, chest voice, distorted scream, whispered spoken word, no female vocals at all, heavy psychedelic rock, 1970s analog, driving rhythm section, punchy drums, fuzz guitar, Hammond organ, tempo 74 BPM, structure: intro → verse → chorus → verse → chorus → bridge → guitar solo → final chorus → outro, vocal transitions: whisper → chant → sung → scream → reversed → glitched, effects: tape delay, phaser, flanger, reverse vocals, pitch bends, ASMR dry whispers, vinyl crackle, heavy reverb on chorus, dry vocal on verses, chaotic panning, immersive 3D stereo, surreal, hallucinatory, ritualistic, no acoustic instruments, fully electric, dense layered production, drum emphasis: snare crack, kick punch, ride cymbal shimmer
2c2fd880-f9b9-4df9-b912-8e5691e6cd32.lyrics:
[Intro: Drum fill → heavy kick/snare groove enters, fuzz guitar swell, vinyl crackle]
(backing: la la la... falling up...) [panning L→R, tape flutter, DRUMS LOCK IN]
Verse 1 (MALE — whispered, dry, ASMR-close, over tight drum groove):
The mirror’s cracked but the ladder’s whole —
(backing: whole... whole... whole...) [snare ghost notes, hi-hat shuffle]
Climb with your fingers, not your soul.
[slight phaser, low-pass filter, BASS DRONE ENTERS]
Each rung’s a tongue that whispers names —
(backing: names... names... in flames...) [kick drum accents “flames”]
Some you remember... some eat your frame.
[distorted whisper layer: “frame... frame...” → cuts with SNARE HIT]
→ [VOCAL TRANSITION: whisper → half-sung, strained tone — DRUMS BUILD]
I saw my shadow wearing my crown —
(backing: crown of thorns...) [sudden reverb burst + CRASH CYMBAL]
It laughed in colors I can’t drown.
[flanger on “drown”, pitch bend down, TOM FILL]
Chorus (MALE — full chest voice, gritty, slightly off-pitch, DRUMS POUNDING):
Mirror ladder — climb it wrong!
(backing: wrong! wrong! wrong!) [Hammond + fuzz guitar hit + SNARE/KICK LOCK]
Heaven’s basement, hell’s front lawn!
(backing: lawn... lawn... neon dawn...) [RIDE CYMBAL SHIMMER]
Your eyes are clocks with melting hands —
(backing: tick-tock... backwards...) [TOM ROLL → pause]
You’ll understand when you unstand.
[“unstand” → reversed vocal → loops 3x, decaying — DRUMS DROP OUT]
Verse 2 (MALE — spoken rhythmically, like incantation, DRUMS: HALF-TIME GROOVE):
Step on the glass — it sings in B-flat,
(backing: B-flat... shatter that...) [KICK ON 1, SNARE ON 3]
The ceiling’s breathing — don’t ask what.
[organ drone rises, TEMPO SLOWS SLIGHTLY]
Your mother’s face in the chrome machine —
(backing: machine... gasoline...) [HI-HAT ACCELERATES]
She smiles in static, clean and mean.
[abrupt tape stop → silence → restart with GLITCH + SNARE EXPLOSION]
→ [VOCAL TRANSITION: spoken → melodic → breaking scream — DRUMS: DOUBLE-TIME]
(backing: climb... climb... climb...)
I CLIMB THE GLASS WITH TEETH AND NAILS —
[full band explosion: fuzz + crashing cymbals + Hammond swell]
THE MIRROR SCREAMS BUT NEVER FAILS!
(backing: never fails... echo trails...)
[long delay repeats, panning wildly, DRUMS: FILL → LOCK]
Bridge (MALE — layered: clean + distorted + reverse layer underneath — DRUMS: SUSPENDED ROLL):
(backing: the ladder breathes... the ladder lies...)
“I am the rung... I am the fall...
[reverse whisper under: “fall... fall... fall...”]
I am the voice behind the wall...
[main vocal clean → suddenly DISTORTED SCREAM:]
WHICH ME IS REAL? WHICH ME IS GONE?!”
[feedback squeal → tape loop “gone... gone...” spinning faster — DRUMS: CHAOTIC FILL → STOP]
[Guitar Solo — 20 sec — DRUMS: HALF-TIME GROOVE WITH TOM ACCENTS]
[wah-wah + ring modulator + analog delay, panning chaotic, ends with tape rewind SFX + KICK DRUM THUD]
Outro (MA

f0114045-4fa3-4690-b43e-508966ec50bf.name: Heaven’s Door (Rain Waltz)
f0114045-4fa3-4690-b43e-508966ec50bf.sound: male baritone raw spoken-word English, waltz rhythm 96 BPM (3/4), found sounds only (rain car engine footsteps breath thunder tape static), analog tape effects (saturation wow/flutter vinyl crackle tape echo), no melody no instruments no reverb no synths, theme: final-day freedom brotherhood rain ritual road solitude, cold sensual cinematic atmosphere, structure: intro-verse-prechorus-chorus-outro
f0114045-4fa3-4690-b43e-508966ec50bf.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[found sounds: car engine idling in rain, wet asphalt hiss, distant radio static playing faint guitar (muffled, no melody), slow 3/4 heartbeat]
[tape saturation warm but worn, light wow/flutter like a dying battery]
[VERSE]
We didn’t run toward heaven—
we just stopped running.
The rain washed the blood off our hands,
and for once…
the sky didn’t feel like a ceiling.
[found sounds: car door opens, footsteps in puddles, wet leather jacket creak, slow breath]
[tape echo on “ceiling”, vinyl crackle like old dashboard radio]
[PRE-CHORUS]
You said: “Dance like the world’s already gone.”
So I did—
one step, two steps,
three steps into the flood.
[found sounds: rhythmic foot splashes in 3/4, rain intensifies, match struck then dropped]
[flutter swells on “flood”, saturation thickens]
[CHORUS]
Knockin’? No.
We just stood there—
soaked, smiling,
letting the clouds remember our names
before the earth forgot.
[found sounds: rain peaks, then softens; distant thunder; heartbeat syncopated; slow spin of wet tire]
[tape echo loops “names… mes…”, vinyl pops like raindrops on metal]
[OUTRO]
[found sounds: engine turns off, door slams softly, footsteps fade, final drop hits empty gas can]
[tape slows with deep flutter, cuts to silence — as if film reel ends]

e3a8065d-4624-4770-ba75-c953b848fce4.name: Midnight
e3a8065d-4624-4770-ba75-c953b848fce4.sound: house, luxury club, 128 BPM, French vocals, minimal Russian textures
e3a8065d-4624-4770-ba75-c953b848fce4.lyrics:
[Intro - Atmospheric Build]
*"Питер не спит"* (whispered through vocoder)
[F# sub-bass growl, Parisian café ambiance filtered]
[Verse 1 - Instrumental]
[Filtered disco bass, sidechain to kick]
[Piano "Lobby" preset enters]
*"WELL мечты"* (reversed in cymbal decay)
[Pre-Chorus - French Build]
Danse avec moi
C'est parfait
[Elevator ding, silk rustle SFX]
[Chorus - French Anthem]
Minuit, tout est belle
Dans ce palace de rêve
Oui, c'est la vie
Que je vis chaque soir
*"в Питере пить"* (whispered at low volume)
[Verse 2 - Personal Reflection]
Je me perds dans cette foule
Mais je me trouve aussi
Les lumières tournent autour
De mon cœur qui bat fort
Chaque pas sur ce plancher
Me rappelle qui je suis
Pas besoin de prétendre
Juste danser jusqu'au matin
[Rap - Internal Monologue]
Started from the bottom of this scene, now I'm here
French words flowing but my thoughts are crystal clear
Every night I question if I really belong
In these velvet rooms where champagne flows along
But when the bass drops and I feel that rhythm
Something deep inside tells me I'm not just living
I'm existing in a space between two worlds
Russian whispers, French verses, story unfurls
No fake flex, just expressing what I feel
Dancing through my doubts, making everything real
Elite status isn't bout the clothes you wear
It's bout the freedom when you simply do not care
[Pre-Chorus - French Build]
Danse avec moi
C'est parfait
[Build intensity]
[Final Chorus - French Climax]
Minuit, tout est belle
Dans ce palace de rêve
Oui, c'est la vie
Que je vis chaque soir
La nuit... enfin
Je suis libre ici
*"Питер... WELL"* (buried under vinyl crackle)
[Outro - Fade with whispers]
[Russian elements fade to -15dB]
[French vocals echo with reverb]

37663c04-62de-4163-bb3f-f7452326e408.name: Letter in the Rain (Variation)
37663c04-62de-4163-bb3f-f7452326e408.sound: Male baritone whispered vocals only, raw and intimate, close-mic breath sounds audible. Sole background: steady rain ambiance. No instruments, no reverb, no effects—only natural tape saturation and subtle vinyl crackle. Tempo: 68 BPM. Mood: haunting, private, ritualistic. Style: 1970s Los Angeles underground spoken-word poetry, late-night confessional.
37663c04-62de-4163-bb3f-f7452326e408.lyrics:
[whispered, close-mic, breathy]
I found your letter tucked inside a hollow book—
pages damp, ink bleeding like a bruise.
You wrote: *“Meet me where the streetlights drown”*…
but the streetlights drowned years ago.
[rain intensifies softly]
I read it again tonight,
not with my eyes—
with the ache behind my ribs.
Your handwriting still smells like static
and the backseat of a ’78 Cutlass.
[whisper grows even quieter, almost inhaled]
Do you remember how we used to count the cracks
in the ceiling like they were stars?
Now I count the seconds between raindrops
pretending they’re your footsteps.
[pause, rain only for 3 beats]
You never came back.
But I keep reading.
Over.
And over.
Like the rain.
[final whisper, fading]
…still waiting.

700e8f1f-4e9a-4426-9db4-3e4529975819.name: Echoes
700e8f1f-4e9a-4426-9db4-3e4529975819.sound: solo cello in lowest register, whispered ethereal vocals

55ec3297-8137-4bde-a3e8-0bc6878cef91.name: WEEKEND MODE
55ec3297-8137-4bde-a3e8-0bc6878cef91.sound: male lead vocal breathy intimate baritone with falsetto inflections, original lyrics inspired by themes of silence truth and emotional restraint from 1980s synth-pop and 2020s alternative R&B, atmospheric sub-bass drone, reharmonized piano motif in F# minor replacing analog synths, sparse trap-influenced beat with muted 808 kick no snare, tempo 68 BPM, vinyl crackle tape hiss granular textures, 2025 cinematic production, wide stereo, high-resolution with analog warmth, structure verse-verse-chorus-verse-outro
55ec3297-8137-4bde-a3e8-0bc6878cef91.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[sub-bass hum, vinyl crackle, distant piano playing a 4-note motif in F# minor]
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, breathy, close-mic, voice slightly frayed]
You speak in neon, I hear in grey,
your promises dissolve by day.
I don’t need your truth—just your skin,
and the quiet where we both give in.
[VERSE 2]
[soft baritone, intimate, rain in background]
All I asked for was the night,
not your future, not your light.
Words just ruin what we knew—
so let the silence pull us through.
[CHORUS]
[voice opens, restrained ache, falsetto harmony swells]
Vows are ghosts in morning air,
love’s a wound we both repair.
Feel the hush that shakes the room—
it’s louder than your “stay” or “go.”
Hold the quiet…
(bék-vocal: ethereal falsetto — “quiet…”, right channel)
[VERSE 3]
[back to whisper, piano only, heartbeat-like pulse]
Pain’s the price of holding close,
stillness is the only ghost
that stays when you walk away—
and doesn’t ask you to remain.
Hold the quiet…
(bék-vocal: whispered — “remain…”, left channel)
[OUTRO]
[vocals fragment, granular processing, piano decays]
Weekend mode…
[whispered]
…just don’t speak…
[tape stop, silence]

c40b0ef8-fa77-4edf-8363-ce4d89facd85.name: Сквозь дождь (Variation)
c40b0ef8-fa77-4edf-8363-ce4d89facd85.sound: Create a cinematic Russian hip-hop track with a French chic twist, blending deep 808 basslines and live rhythm elements for a noir-inspired soundscape. Use crisp hi-hats, sharp snares, and hard-hitting kicks to create a driving beat. Add dark atmospheric synths with a soft enchanting glow, evoking the luxurious ambiance of a Parisian night. Include haunting female vocals exclusively in Russian , with lyrics strictly in Russian only (no other languages or phrases allowed). The lyrics should convey themes of 'Heavy Luxe,' seduction, and mystery, with dynamic delivery soaked in reverb. Incorporate subtle rain sounds, vinyl crackle, and distant echoes to enhance the noir vibe. Add glitch effects, pitch-shifting, and vocal chops for a modern touch. Ensure the melody flows like silk, elegant and languid, echoing the feeling of a lavish boudoir under the sound of rain. Follow this structure:Intro : Soft rain sounds, vinyl crackle, and deep 808 bass rumbles with whispered vocals.Verse 1 : Female vocals enter with crisp hi-hats and snare rolls; add reverb-heavy synths.Pre-Chorus : Build-up with rising synth arpeggios and layered vocal harmonies.Chorus : Powerful drop with hard-hitting kicks, 808 bass, and shimmering synths; vocals soar dynamically.Bridge : Breakdown with glitch effects, pitch-shifted vocals, and rain sounds; create an intimate moment.Final Chorus : Repeat the chorus with added intensity; include vocal chops and distorted bass wobbles.Outro : Fade out with soft rain, distant echoes, and lingering synths.Tempo: 85–100 BPM, with a steady yet hypnotic groove.
c40b0ef8-fa77-4edf-8363-ce4d89facd85.lyrics:
[Intro: Rain, vinyl crackle, whispered close-mic, echo fade]
Да, да... Не спишь...
(Смотрю, смотрю...)
[Verse 1: Soft piano, ambient rain]
В кафэ я каждый вечер тут
Бокал вина, мой верный друг
Смотрю на улицы сквозь дождь,
Он стучит, я слышу, слышу
Люди бегут, спешат домой
А я слежу за их игрой
Ты думаешь, что я не вижу?
Но правду знаю, вижу, слышу
[Pre-chorus: Synth swell, heartbeat bass, dreamy delivery, layered whisper on “одна”]
В отражении витрин
Светит свет, бегут огни
Мысли отключают взгляд
Ждут меня, но я одна
[Chorus: Deep 808, strings, commanding vocals, whispered ad-libs panned on “Тайны...”]
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
Сквозь дождь, все мысли не случайны
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
(Тайны, тайны, все случайны)
[Verse 2: Darker piano, city hum, mysterious tone]
Напротив свет, в одном окне,
И я одна — кто знает о тебе,
Мерцают чьи-то тени в нём,
Горят, как сны, прочтённые огнём.
В этом городе теней
Прячешь правду от людей
Ты думаешь, что я не слышу?
Но правду знаю, слышу, вижу.
[Bridge: Glitch, pitch-shift, intimate whisper, sharp cutoff on last word]
Капли бьют по мостовой
Время замерло со мной
В этот час когда не спишь
Маски сброшены — молчишь...
[Chorus: Full strings, emotional peak, layered harmonies, swirling whispers]
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
Сквозь дождь, все мысли не случайны
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
(Тайны, тайны, все случайны)
[Outro: Rain fades, tired soft voice, echo fade, rain fadeout]
В кафэ я буду ждать,
опять...
(Смотрю, смотрю...)

220c99b0-6e5b-4284-8887-3fd24ec2ac44.name: TAPE LOOP GOD (Variation)
220c99b0-6e5b-4284-8887-3fd24ec2ac44.sound: VOCAL GENDER = MALE. NOT FEMALE. MALE ONLY. vocal fragments only — no full lines, no melody — only whispers, spoken phrases, reversed words, glitched syllables, looped and decaying, no female vocals at all, psychedelic ambient rock, 1970s analog tape decay, tempo 60 BPM drifting to 50 BPM, structure: intro-tape-hiss → loop-build → vocal-glitch-layers → peak-collapse → guitar-drone → outro-tape-unspool, instruments: e-bow guitar, mellotron, analog synth, bass drone, tape loops, effects: heavy tape echo, wow & flutter, reverse reverb, pitch decay, vinyl crackle, sudden silence, panning loops, oscillator fade, 3D immersive, hypnotic, haunting, time-loop, psychological, surreal, no chorus, no verse — pure sonic ritual
220c99b0-6e5b-4284-8887-3fd24ec2ac44.lyrics:
[Intro: 30 sec of pure tape hiss, vinyl crackle, slow oscillator hum rising]
[MALE whisper, reversed, barely audible: “...you pressed play...”]
[panning slowly L→R, tape wobble increasing]
→ [TAPE LOOP 1 begins — 4 sec phrase, repeating, degrading]
MALE (dry, close, whispered):
“Time doesn’t move... it folds...”
[loop repeats 6x, each time more distorted, pitch bending down slightly]
→ [TAPE LOOP 2 layers in — higher pitch, faster, stuttering]
MALE (glitched, chopped):
“...you’re already... in... the...”
[loop stutters on “the... the... the...” → cuts → restarts]
→ [VOCAL LAYER 3 — distant, reversed, low-pass filtered]
MALE (reversed phrase, then flipped forward):
“...loop god is watching...”
[forward version barely intelligible, buried in reverb]
→ [PEAK — all loops collide + guitar drone enters]
MALE (sudden raw shout, dry, no effects):
“WHICH YOU IS REAL?!”
[immediate cut → total silence for 2 sec → tape rewind SFX → loops return slower, degraded]
→ [GUITAR DRONE SECTION — 20 sec]
[e-bow guitar + mellotron strings + analog synth drone, no vocals]
[only in background — MALE whisper, once: “...let go...”]
→ [OUTRO — tape unspooling, loops decaying]
MALE (fragmented, glitching, pitch falling):
“...you... pressed... play...”
[voice slows down → becomes sub-bass rumble]
[final sound: tape runs out → machine clicks off → 5 sec silence → single vinyl pop → END]

95435403-0f8c-4514-a519-d2a92731ee6b.lyrics:
[Intro]
[analog synth sequence, funk bass slide]

[Verse 1]
Velvet shadows on the wall

A truth beyond the what and where
[Pre-Chorus]

The rhythm pulls us underground
Where secret frequencies are found
We're dancing on the edge of time
Between the pleasure and the crime
[Chorus]
[drums kick in with solid groove]
WE MOVE IN SYNTHETIC ECSTASY
THROUGH FIELDS OF BROKEN REALITY
YOUR TOUCH LIKE STATIC ON MY SKIN
THIS DANGEROUS DELIGHT WE'RE IN
[Verse 2]
Neon lights write on your face
In this electric, sacred space
The machine breathes with you and me
In digital symphony
[Pre-Chorus]
[guitar wah-wah intensifies]
The rhythm pulls us underground
Where secret frequencies are found
We're dancing on the edge of time
Between the pleasure and the crime
[Chorus]
[stronger vocal harmonies]
WE MOVE IN SYNTHETIC ECSTASY
THROUGH FIELDS OF BROKEN REALITY
YOUR TOUCH LIKE STATIC ON MY SKIN
THIS DANGEROUS DELIGHT WE'RE IN
[Bridge]
[music drops to bass and synth]
In the analog glow
We become something more
Than flesh and bone
Something that lasts
Beyond the past

[psychedelic wah-wah solo]

WE MOVE IN SYNTHETIC ECSTASY

953fb25b-e581-49da-9159-4702a7d8ee2e.name: Last message
953fb25b-e581-49da-9159-4702a7d8ee2e.sound: Minimalist ambient rock demo, 1997, 70 BPM, recorded on 4-track cassette in a basement, heavy tape hiss and wow/flutter, single clean electric guitar with infinite reverb, distant piano, no drums. Male vocal: fragile, exhausted, whispered falsetto, slightly off-pitch for emotional rawness, one-take feel, no harmonies, only analog delay echoes. Vibe: last message before the power goes out, love letter to a machine that stopped listening, final breath before silence. No explicit content. Feels like a forgotten cassette found in a shoebox under a bed.
953fb25b-e581-49da-9159-4702a7d8ee2e.lyrics:
[Intro]
(tape hiss, single guitar note sustains)
[Verse]
...if you find this...
...I’m already gone...
...not dead — just... deleted...
...like a file... you didn’t save...
I left my voice... in the wires...
You left your silence... in my chest...
We spoke in codes... we kissed in noise...
Now even static... won’t confess...
[Chorus]
...this is the last... message...
...no reply... expected...
...you were my signal... my only light...
...now I’m just... noise... in the night...
[Bridge]
...do you remember... my name?...
...or did you... overwrite... the frame?...
...I’m still here... in the hum...
...a ghost... in the machine... you’ve become...
[Outro]
...goodbye...
...not forever...
...just... until...
...the power...
...comes...
...back...
(tape runs out — abrupt stop)

3aae00ac-0c68-4219-bcca-a0b0616e328e.name: See bam
3aae00ac-0c68-4219-bcca-a0b0616e328e.sound: LUXURY female vocal tech house 128bpm, elite brands & night club vibe, hypnotic vocals (female only), trancey memorable hook, velvet texture, marble fx, VIP FX: hidden 18.5kHz layer + 19kHz pulse (every 8 bars). RULES: NO male vocals, NO English, ONLY short vocal phrases in French/Italian/Spanish, NO verse lyrics, NO pre-chorus > 3 sec, DJ friendly: 16-bar intro and outro with clean groove for mixing, vocals used as rhythmic samples, chorus (hook) is catchy and extremely danceable, luxury positive club energy.

4e214a41-dfdb-4390-82ed-dc1c01a73d79.name: Empty Streets
4e214a41-dfdb-4390-82ed-dc1c01a73d79.sound: Alternative R&B, nocturnal saxophone, ambient 808s, rain textures
4e214a41-dfdb-4390-82ed-dc1c01a73d79.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Empty streets stretch ahead of me tonight
Looking for answers in the rainfall
Every step echoes what's on my mind
Walking alone, but I don't mind at all
These thoughts keep spinning round and round
Till I can barely tell what's real
The rain falls steady on the ground
Matching the way these thoughts reveal
[Chorus]
Walking through the night, talking to myself again
These quiet streets are listening, my only faithful friend
[Saxophone Solo]
[Rain ambience builds]
[Verse 2]

[Saxophone Bridge]
[Distant sirens fade in and out]
[Verse 3]

I'm learning slowly to be strong
Taking these moments to realign
The night air clears my clouded mind
Each breath brings something new to see
Leaving old worries far behind
Finally starting to feel free
[Chorus]
Walking through the night, talking to myself again
These quiet streets are listening, my only faithful friend
[Outro]
[Saxophone melody fades]
[Rain continues]
The morning's coming, I can feel it now
These streets have taught me what I need to know

b7786289-92ea-4be5-9ca9-5e49279c54a0.name: Sometimes I wonder...
b7786289-92ea-4be5-9ca9-5e49279c54a0.sound: conscious rap, emotional hip-hop, introspective lyrics, piano-driven beats, vulnerable vocal delivery, storytelling rap, mature hip-hop, emotional depth, reflective rap style, piano-based hip-hop, sincere rap vocals, thoughtful lyrics, emotional male vocals, introspective rap delivery, vulnerable rap singing, conscious hip-hop style, emotional rap production, storytelling hip-hop, mature rap vocals, reflective hip-hop style, piano melody hip-hop, vulnerable male vocals, emotional rap singing, conscious rap vocals, introspective hip-hop vocals, sincere rap delivery, thoughtful rap style, rapid-fire rap technique, multisyllabic rhymes, internal rhyme schemes, conversational rap flow, emotional vocal range, vulnerable yet confident delivery, storytelling vocal style, conscious rap vocal technique, introspective male rap vocals, sincere hip-hop delivery, thoughtful rap vocal approach, emotional rap vocal expression, mature male hip-hop vocals, vulnerable rap vocal style, conscious hip-hop vocal delivery
b7786289-92ea-4be5-9ca9-5e49279c54a0.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Soft piano melody, vinyl crackle]
[Whispered vocals with reverb]
Sometimes I wonder...
[Verse 1]
[Piano with subtle strings, gentle beat]
Walking through these empty halls
Listening to my footsteps fall
Every mirror shows a stranger
Lost inside this dangerous game, sir
[Muffled sounds, distant traffic]
[Pre-Chorus]
[Building emotional tension]
They said I'd never make it through
All the pain I put them through
Now I'm standing here alone
In this house that's not a home
[Chorus]
[Emotional clean vocals, orchestral elements]
I'm more than what they see
More than my mistakes used to be
Every scar tells a story
Of a man who's learning to be free
[String section swells, gentle drums]
[Verse 2]
[Spoken word style, minimal beat]
Dear mom, I know you're watching
All the bridges that I'm crossing
Every word that I'm not saying
Every tear that I'm not playing
[Piano arpeggios, subtle ambiance]
[Bridge]
[Vocal breakdown, ambient sounds]
In the silence, I can hear
All the voices disappear
And for once, I'm not afraid
Of the price that I have paid
[Soft rain sounds, distant thunder]
[Chorus]
[Full emotional arrangement]
I'm more than what they see
More than my mistakes used to be
Every scar tells a story
Of a man who's learning to be free
[Verse 3]
[Rap delivery with emotional intensity, full beat]
Yeah, I've been down that road before
Seen the pain behind each door
But I'm rising from the ashes
Breaking free from all the crashes
[Orchestral build, powerful drums]
[Outro]
[Piano fades, vinyl crackle]
[Whispered]
More than... what they see...
[Echoing final notes]

b4a199d7-4e4d-484b-b9a7-5463fb27a578.name: Quietude
b4a199d7-4e4d-484b-b9a7-5463fb27a578.sound: soundtrack, silk minimalist, French piano, bass vibrations, whispers, subtle ambient textures
b4a199d7-4e4d-484b-b9a7-5463fb27a578.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Rooms breathe quiet, curtains drawn tight
I hear a footstep fall in velvet-light
Hands in my pockets, tracing the line
Something still lingers, maybe it’s mine
WELL... l’heure bleue (soft whisper)
[Chorus]
Are you here, WELL, or am I alone?
Do you listen when I call home?
Are you here, WELL, just behind the door?
Why does silence keep echoing more?
Are you here, WELL, anywhere I go?
Are you here, WELL, anywhere I go?
(oh, la la la, la la)
[Verse 2]
Piano sighs—F# to C#, so slow
Time slides backward, secrets below
In one soft moment, nothing to prove
Am I waiting for something to move?
WELL... l’heure bleue (delicate echo)
[Chorus]
Are you here, WELL, or am I alone?
Do you listen when I call home?
Are you here, WELL, just behind the door?
Why does silence keep echoing more?
Are you here, WELL, anywhere I go?
Are you here, WELL, anywhere I go?
(la la la, la la la la)
[Bridge]
Russian hints in bass, swirling glass ("В Питере жить... WELL")
It drifts and turns, will the answer pass?
("В Питере пить... WELL"—in the turning glass)
[Pre-Chorus]
If I stay, will I hear you at all?
If I leave, will you answer the call?
Why do I circle the quiet, the swell?
Are you here, are you here—WELL?
[Chorus]
Are you here, WELL, or am I alone?
Do you listen when I call home?
Are you here, WELL, just behind the door?
Why does silence keep echoing more?
Are you here, WELL, anywhere I go?
Are you here, WELL, anywhere I go?
(oh, la la la, la la)
[Outro]
("Питер не спит... WELL..."—lifted, slowed echo)
(safe door closes softly, barely heard)
Are you here, WELL?
Are you here, WELL?
Are you here, WELL?

5f454120-d65f-4268-90e8-4f9b285136cd.name: Ashes in the Receiver
5f454120-d65f-4268-90e8-4f9b285136cd.sound: male vocal alternating whispered verses and raw broken choruses, female whisper backing vocal -16dB panned left/right, single distorted guitar drone, deep sub-bass pulse, trip-hop drum loop with heavy vinyl crackle and tape hiss, tempo 86 BPM, key E minor, sparse arrangement, 1991 grunge meets 1991 trip-hop, no reverb on vocals, dry intimate production, themes loneliness unanswered calls urban decay memory as static, structure intro verse verse chorus outro
5f454120-d65f-4268-90e8-4f9b285136cd.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[vinyl crackle, distant rain, single distorted guitar note sustains, sub-bass pulse begins]
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, dry, close-mic, voice slightly hoarse]
You left your voice on my machine—
three seconds of static, then silence clean.
I play it back when the night gets long…
pretending you’re still holding on.
(female whisper, -16 dB, left channel)
…holding on…
[VERSE 2]
[voice cracks slightly, bass intensifies]
Your photo’s faded, the frame’s gone grey,
but I keep talking anyway.
The walls don’t answer, the phone’s gone dead—
but I swear I heard you in my head.
(female whisper, -16 dB, right channel)
…in your head…
[CHORUS]
[raw, strained shout — not loud, but broken, over sudden guitar swell]
ASHES IN THE RECEIVER!
DUST WHERE YOUR VOICE USED TO BE!
I SCREAM INTO THE STATIC—
BUT THE STATIC SCREAMS FOR ME!
(female vocal: wordless high harmony, ethereal, like a radio ghost)
[OUTRO]
[guitar feedback decays, beat drops out, only rain and vinyl remain]
[whispered, fragmented]
…are you… there…?
[long silence, then one final tape stop click]

8697660f-dca5-48c5-8857-16efc92e9e2b.lyrics:
[Intro]
[LinnDrum groove with tight gated snare and crisp hi-hats]
[Warm Wurlitzer electric piano chord]
(Falsetto ad-lib: Ahhh... yeah...)
[Verse 1]
Crimson sky through the venetian blind
A silent movie plays in my mind
The clock on the wall has forgotten its hands
We're making new rules on these shifting sands
(Whispered response: New rules...)
[Chorus]
[Punchy drum fill into full beat]
(Echoes in the haze) Got me lost in a sunlit maze
(Echoes in the haze) Burning through these endless days
Every color bleeds, a beautiful sound
When your heart is the only ground
(Echoes in the haze)
[Verse 2]
The vinyl spins a forgotten refrain
A gentle static like summer rain
Your eyes see right through the fabric of things
Where the broken melody finally sings
(Harmony: Finally sings...)
[Chorus]
[Punchy drum fill into full beat]
(Echoes in the haze) Got me lost in a sunlit maze
(Echoes in the haze) Burning through these endless days
Every color bleeds, a beautiful sound
When your heart is the only ground
(Echoes in the haze)
[Bridge]
[Music strips back to deep kick and phased guitar]
[Hammond organ with slow Leslie swells underneath]
(Spoken word, intimate) They said we'd fade out... like a weak signal on a summer night... but baby, we found our frequency.
[Instrumental Break]
[Soaring Mellotron string melody]
[Analog sequencer bassline becomes more prominent]
[LinnDrum groove builds with energy]
[Final Chorus]
[Full arrangement with layered harmonies]
(ECHOES IN THE HAZE!) Got me lost in a sunlit maze!
(ECHOES IN THE HAZE!) Burning through these endless days!
Every color bleeds, a beautiful sound!
When your heart is the only ground!
(Echoes...)

4ecb988b-cef9-4660-8d6c-0594a43efb1a.name: HORIZON WHISPERS (Variation)
4ecb988b-cef9-4660-8d6c-0594a43efb1a.sound:
MALE VOCAL + FEMALE VOCAL — START.  
STYLE: PSYCHEDELIC HYPNOTIC GROOVE. 1970s analog sunset atmosphere.  
VOCALS:  
- MALE: LOW BARITONE WHISPER. BRUTAL BUT BEAUTIFUL. GRAVEL. NO MELODY. NO FALSETTO. SPOKEN PROSE. DRY. CLOSE-MIC. CENTERED.  
- FEMALE: AIRY WHISPER. HARMONIC. BREATHY. NO MELODY. NO BELTING. WORDLESS OR FRAGMENTED PHRASES. LIGHT REVERB. PANNED SLIGHTLY WIDE.  
INTERWEAVE: MALE AND FEMALE WHISPERS INTERTWINED — NOT IN UNISON, NOT IN HARMONY — LIKE TWO BREATHS IN THE SAME WIND. NEVER COMPETING. NEVER DOMINATING. EQUAL BUT DIFFERENT TEXTURES.  
INSTRUMENTS:  
- BASS: warm, slow, pulsing — like horizon line.  
- DRUMS: ride cymbal shimmer, soft kick, no snare — like distant tide.  
- GUITAR: e-bow swells, no attack, no riffs — like light fading.  
TEMPO: 65 BPM — slow, meditative, expansive.  
EFFECTS:  
- VOCALS: light tape echo, low-pass filter on male, high-pass on female.  
- VINYL CRACKLE throughout — like memory of the day.  
- SUBTLE OSCILLATOR HUM — like earth’s frequency at dusk.  
MOOD: sensual, cinematic, melancholic, peaceful, ritualistic.  
STRUCTURE: intro → verse → chorus → verse → chorus → bridge → outro.  
NO DISTRACTIONS. NO GUITAR SOLOS. NO DRUM FILLS. ONLY WHISPERS AND GROOVE.  
MALE + FEMALE VOCALS — END.
4ecb988b-cef9-4660-8d6c-0594a43efb1a.lyrics:
[Intro: 10 sec — warm bass pulse, e-bow guitar swell, ride cymbal shimmer, vinyl crackle, oscillator hum]
[MALE whisper — dry, low, centered]
...the sun... doesn’t fall...
[FEMALE whisper — airy, breathy, panned slightly right]
...it melts... into us...
→ [VERSE 1 — whispers intertwine, no rhythm lock]
MALE: I feel it... in my bones...
FEMALE: ...in my skin... the light... thins...
MALE: Not gone... just... changing shape...
FEMALE: ...like smoke... from a slow escape...
[MALE: slight growl on “escape...” / FEMALE: light inhale after]
→ [CHORUS — whispers layer, not harmonize — like two winds meeting]
MALE: Horizon... doesn’t end...
FEMALE: ...it breathes... and bends...
MALE: We’re not watching... we’re... inside...
FEMALE: ...the color... where day... and night... collide...
[MALE: dry, gritty / FEMALE: soft, decaying echo]
→ [VERSE 2 — slower, more intimate]
MALE: Your voice... is the last gold...
FEMALE: ...your silence... the first cold...
MALE: I don’t hold you... I let you... flow...
FEMALE: ...through my fingers... soft... and slow...
[MALE: slight pause before “flow...” / FEMALE: exhale after “slow...”]
→ [CHORUS — whispers more entangled, almost inseparable]
MALE: Horizon... doesn’t end...
FEMALE: ...it breathes... and bends...
MALE: We’re not watching... we’re... inside...
FEMALE: ...the color... where day... and night... collide...
[MALE: voice fades slightly / FEMALE: lingers with reverb]
→ [BRIDGE — both whispers drop to subvocal, almost inaudible — 6 sec]
MALE: ...stay...
FEMALE: ...fade...
MALE: ...with me...
FEMALE: ...in me...
[only bass pulse and vinyl crackle — then single oscillator swell]
→ [OUTRO — whispers fragment, dissolve into horizon]
MALE: ...not gone...
FEMALE: ...just... gone... gold...
MALE: ...whisper...
FEMALE: ...horizon...
[MALE: final “...whisper...” — dry, cut abruptly]
[FEMALE: final “...horizon...” — stretched tape echo → dissolves into oscillator hum → vinyl run-out → silence]

25e4522e-185b-4f4f-9c9d-42972e58d091.lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]

EFFECTS:

MOOD: UNCANNY, RITUALISTIC, OTHERWORLDLY, LIKE A MESSAGE FROM THE TAPE ITSELF.  
NO FEMALE. NO FALSETTO. NO MELODY.  
MALE VOCAL ONLY — END.

3dd3bdbf-cff9-41ff-861b-c99556906aaa.name: The Rain Dial (Solo Transmission)
3dd3bdbf-cff9-41ff-861b-c99556906aaa.sound: Male baritone only — whispered verses, raw full-voice choruses with natural rasp and emotional cracks. Rhythm driven entirely by organic rain sounds: drops on metal roof (main pulse), puddle splashes (backbeat), gutter drips (offbeats), tin can pings (syncopation) — all locked to 96 BPM. Background: steady analog telephone dial tone (350+440 Hz), slightly warm, with natural tube fluctuations. No female voice, no instruments, no reverb, no digital effects. Only analog tape saturation, light wow/flutter, and vinyl surface noise. Mood: ritualistic, hypnotic, urban solitude. Style: 1974 Los Angeles midnight field recording — a man, a dead phone line, and the rain as his only witness. The rhythm is the ritual.
3dd3bdbf-cff9-41ff-861b-c99556906aaa.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[rain begins — rhythmic pattern on metal roof: *drop… drop-drop… drop…* (96 BPM)]
[telephone dial tone — 350+440 Hz, steady]
[MAN — whispered, in time with rain]
…again…
[VERSE 1]
[voice tight to rain rhythm, whispered but clear]
I call the dead number
every night at 3:17—
not to reach you.
To hear the rain
in the wires.
It sounds like your breath
through a wall.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[rain intensifies — adds puddle splash on beat 3]
The line’s been cut
since ’73.
But I still dial.
Still listen.
[CHORUS]
[full baritone — raw, chesty, slightly strained, still in rhythm]
This dial tone’s my lullaby.
This rain’s my choir.
I speak to silence—
and silence speaks back
in drops.
In static.
In time.
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, rain adds metallic ping on offbeats]
I left your letters
on the porch last week—
watched the ink run
like blood in gutter.
Now the street knows your name.
The clouds hum it.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[dial tone wavers slightly — tube fluctuation]
No answer.
Never was.
But the ritual holds.
[CHORUS]
[full baritone, more intense]
This dial tone’s my lullaby.
This rain’s my choir.
I speak to silence—
and silence speaks back
in drops.
In static.
In time.
[BRIDGE – RAIN SOLO]
[voice stops. rain takes over: complex polyrhythm — roof, puddle, gutter, tin can]
[dial tone pulses like a heartbeat]
[after 8 bars, voice returns — half-spoken, half-chanted]
…drop…
…static…
…name…
…gone…
[FINAL CHORUS]
[full voice, almost shouting but controlled, rain and dial tone swell]
This dial tone’s my lullaby.
This rain’s my choir.
I speak to silence—
and silence speaks back
in drops.
In static.
In time.
And time…
is just rain
with a memory.
[OUTRO]
[receiver lifted — then slowly placed back: *clunk*]
[dial tone cuts off]
[rain continues alone — same rhythm — for 10 seconds]
[tape stops with soft click]
[one final drop — *plink* — in total silence]

3801a19b-6488-4893-9bb5-33bf47f79ae3.name: Русская Душа
3801a19b-6488-4893-9bb5-33bf47f79ae3.sound: Retro vibe, female vocals, Russians folk, Melodic undertones, Orchestral strings, Futuristic beat, Bright vibes, Rhythmic patterns, Upbeat beat, Hypnotic loops, Relaxing melody, Nostalgic,

Любит русская душа
Да прощенья не дает

Ой, да ли, да ли, да

b5d5e04e-0c2d-4792-b6eb-644bd083caa9.name: Every color
b5d5e04e-0c2d-4792-b6eb-644bd083caa9.sound:
Psychedelic soul, smooth male falsetto, hypnotic analog sequencer bassline, phased wah-wah guitar, lush Mellotron string arrangements, warm Wurlitzer electric piano, Hammond B3 organ with slow rotating Leslie speaker, dreamy atmosphere, 70s vibe, emotional delivery, poetic lyrics, hazy summer feel, 98 BPM, punchy analog drum machine (LinnDrum style), tight gated snare, crisp hi-hats, deep kick, layered vocal harmonies, catchy chorus with memorable melodic phrase, subtle sitar drone, analog tape saturation, dream sequence breakdown, late 80s analog production

Keywords: psychedelic soul, male falsetto, analog sequencer bass, phased guitar, Mellotron strings, Wurlitzer, Hammond organ, LinnDrum, gated snare, punchy drums, analog tape saturation, 80s production, vocal harmonies, catchy chorus, sitar drone, dreamy
b5d5e04e-0c2d-4792-b6eb-644bd083caa9.lyrics:
[Intro]
[LinnDrum groove with tight gated snare and crisp hi-hats]
[Warm Wurlitzer electric piano chord]
(Falsetto ad-lib: Ahhh... yeah...)
[Verse 1]
Crimson sky through the venetian blind
A silent movie plays in my mind
The clock on the wall has forgotten its hands
We're making new rules on these shifting sands
(Whispered response: New rules...)
[Chorus]
[Punchy drum fill into full beat]
(Echoes in the haze) Got me lost in a sunlit maze
(Echoes in the haze) Burning through these endless days
Every color bleeds, a beautiful sound
When your heart is the only ground
(Echoes in the haze)
[Verse 2]
The vinyl spins a forgotten refrain
A gentle static like summer rain
Your eyes see right through the fabric of things
Where the broken melody finally sings
(Harmony: Finally sings...)
[Chorus]
[Punchy drum fill into full beat]
(Echoes in the haze) Got me lost in a sunlit maze
(Echoes in the haze) Burning through these endless days
Every color bleeds, a beautiful sound
When your heart is the only ground
(Echoes in the haze)
[Bridge]
[Music strips back to deep kick and phased guitar]
[Hammond organ with slow Leslie swells underneath]
(Spoken word, intimate) They said we'd fade out... like a weak signal on a summer night... but baby, we found our frequency.
[Instrumental Break]
[Soaring Mellotron string melody]
[Analog sequencer bassline becomes more prominent]
[LinnDrum groove builds with energy]
[Final Chorus]
[Full arrangement with layered harmonies]
(ECHOES IN THE HAZE!) Got me lost in a sunlit maze!
(ECHOES IN THE HAZE!) Burning through these endless days!
Every color bleeds, a beautiful sound!
When your heart is the only ground!
(Echoes...)
[Outro]
[Gated snare hit with long reverb tail]
[Music fades to Wurlitzer and subtle sitar drone]
(Falsetto ad-lib: Echoes... in the haze...)
[Sound of analog tape winding down and stopping]

f112948b-d901-471e-b240-ab34fd313ea5.name: Rain don’t fall (Acoustic Variation)
f112948b-d901-471e-b240-ab34fd313ea5.sound: intense alternative rock/metal hybrid, 148 BPM, aggressive industrial percussion with distorted kick and snare, rapid hi-hats with machine-gun rhythm, heavy downtuned guitar riffs with palm muting, layered screaming and clean vocal contrast, emotional male lead vocal shifting between whispered vulnerability and raw screamed aggression, breakdown section with industrial noise textures (rain on metal, cracking glass, distant sirens), syncopated rhythmic chants (“falling like this”), atmospheric synth pads underneath distortion, dynamic shifts from silence to explosive chorus, no traditional melody — emotion-driven chaos, studio-quality vocal processing with heavy compression and bit-crush effects, inspired by post-grunge catharsis, urban isolation, internal collapse, cinematic release of pent-up rage, perfect for late-night headphones listening, mastered for high-volume systems, no clean chorus — all tension, no resolution, dark, urgent, desperate energy, acoustic guitar, campfire, bonfire, fingerpicked, raw, intimate, lo-fi, whispered vocals
f112948b-d901-471e-b240-ab34fd313ea5.lyrics:
[Verse 1 - Spoken / Whispered]
Rain don’t fall — it breaks the sky.
I’m standing here… and I don’t cry.
The windows scream, but I’m too numb
To feel the cold… or hear the drum.
[Pre-Chorus - Building Tension]
You said you’d stay…
But the clouds didn’t listen.
Now every drop’s a memory
That won’t let me in.
[Chorus - SHOUTED / AGGRESSIVE]
FALLING LIKE THIS!
(AGAIN AND AGAIN!)
WASHING OUT EVERYTHING I WAS!
FALLING LIKE THIS!
(NO MORE LIGHT!)
JUST THE SOUND OF ME… DISAPPEARING!
[Verse 2 - Half-Sung, Half-Shouted]
Thunder’s not noise — it’s my name.
Echoing through the hollow frame
Of a house that used to feel like home.
Now it’s just walls… and the rain’s alone.
[Pre-Chorus - More Intense]
You said you’d stay…
But the lightning took your voice.
Now every crack in the pavement
Is a hole where I lost choice.
[Chorus - EVEN LOUDER, DISTORTED]
FALLING LIKE THIS!
(AGAIN AND AGAIN!)
WASHING OUT EVERYTHING I WAS!
FALLING LIKE THIS!
(NO MORE LIGHT!)
JUST THE SOUND OF ME… DISAPPEARING!
[Bridge - Sudden Silence → Whisper → Explosion]
…
…
…
(whispered)
“I tried…”
(suddenly SHOUTED with distortion)
I TRIED TO BE THE STORM —
BUT I WAS JUST THE RAIN!
[Breakdown - Beat Drops Out → Industrial Noise Only]
*Sound design: heavy rain on metal roof, distant sirens, cracking glass, heartbeat slowing… then—*
[Final Chorus - Guttural, Broken Vocals, Layered with Distortion]
FALLING LIKE THIS!
(AGAIN AND AGAIN!)
WASHING OUT EVERYTHING I WAS!
FALLING LIKE THIS!
(NO MORE LIGHT!)
JUST THE SOUND OF ME…
…
…
…
DISAPPEARING…
[Outro - Fading Rain + Distant Echo]
…
…
…
*“I was the storm…”*
*“…but I was only the rain.”*

8df52087-d521-42b7-8df7-c7bd133364a4.name: Static Hymn
8df52087-d521-42b7-8df7-c7bd133364a4.sound: male vocal alternating lazy hoarse spoken-sung verses and raw strained choruses, breathy female whisper and ethereal high male harmony backing vocals, detuned clean electric guitar riff with analog chorus effect, sparse fingerpicked acoustic guitar with slight dissonance, ambient granular synth pads, light brushed snare only in choruses, tempo 84 BPM, key E minor, dynamic contrast between raw and fragile, 2025 indie folk meets 1991 alternative rock production, analog tape saturation, narrow stereo, dry intimate vocals, themes emotional exhaustion suburban decay quiet despair
8df52087-d521-42b7-8df7-c7bd133364a4.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[clean electric guitar: detuned, single-note riff with chorus, rain on metal roof]
[VERSE 1]
[spoken-sung, lazy, hoarse, slightly off-beat]
Your socks are still in my drawer,
your ghost sleeps on the floor.
I don’t miss you—just the noise
that drowned out all my quiet voice.
[VERSE 2]
[softer, fingerpicked acoustic guitar enters]
You called it love, I called it rust,
now I’m covered in the dust
of every promise you let rot—
but I keep watering the spot.
[CHORUS]
[raw, strained shout — voice cracks, emotional but not loud]
STATIC HYMN, play it slow…
burn the truth, let the lies grow.
I’M NOT ANGRY—
I’M JUST EMPTY WHERE YOU’VE BEEN!
(bék-vocal: breathy female whisper — “where you’ve been…”, left)
[VERSE 3]
[whispered, only acoustic and ambient pad]
Your name’s a scar I don’t touch,
but it aches when it rains too much.
I drive past your street at night—
just to feel something die twice.
[CHORUS]
[fragile, near-breaking, high male harmony above]
STATIC HYMN, fade to grey…
hope’s a debt I can’t repay.
I’M NOT LOST—
I’M JUST GHOSTS IN MY OWN SKIN!
(bék-vocal: ethereal high harmony — “own skin…”, right)
[OUTRO]
[guitar feedback swells, cuts to solo acoustic]
[whispered]
static… hymn…
[vinyl crackle, silence]

b3f95b12-5202-420b-89cc-33b8016701f3.name: Resolve
b3f95b12-5202-420b-89cc-33b8016701f3.sound: Dark trap, tense urban beats, erratic cello, police radio samples, haunting 808s
b3f95b12-5202-420b-89cc-33b8016701f3.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Heartbeat heavy in my chest again
Sirens cut the silence, close, then far
Breath comes slow, hands pressed to the wall
Street feels frozen while the minutes crawl
See the panic move outside my door
Tires spin, a shout, another open scar
I don’t run — I’ve seen it all before
Stay calm, it’s only chaos so far (stay calm)
[Chorus]
Keep my head up while they run
Storm all around, I won’t come undone
Waiting for a sunrise, holding on
Keep my head up while they run
[Verse 2]
Window cracked, hear voices split the air
French on the static while the world confesses
Cello lines just plucking at a prayer
Heart won’t jump, I learned from the restless
Look at shadows dart across the pavement
Tense in the space where hope feels thin
Every second stretches in the siren’s mercy
Still I’m standing, grounded in my skin (oh-oh)
[Chorus]
Keep my head up while they run
Storm all around, I won’t come undone
Waiting for a sunrise, holding on
Keep my head up while they run
[Bridge]
Close my eyes — not giving in
Breathe with the beat, let tension begin
Nothing breaks me, no I won’t bend
Still here, still me, still till the end
[Chorus]
Keep my head up while they run
Storm all around, I won’t come undone
Waiting for a sunrise, holding on
Keep my head up while they run

7658b19f-b020-40da-8367-b3feb856c85b.name: SHE MOVES IN STATIC
7658b19f-b020-40da-8367-b3feb856c85b.sound:
MALE VOCAL ONLY — START.  
LEAD VOCAL: MALE. LOW BARITONE. BRUTAL WHISPER. NO SINGING. NO MELODY. NO FALSETTO. SPOKEN PROSE. CENTERED. DRY. CLOSE-MIC.  
FEMALE BACKING: ONLY AS ATMOSPHERIC TEXTURE. NO MELODY. NO HARMONY. NO LYRICS. NO LEAD. ONLY REVERBED WHISPERS, WORDLESS VOCALS, FAR IN BACKGROUND. PANNED WIDE. NEVER LOUDER THAN MALE.  
STYLE: PSYCHEDELIC HYPNOTIC GROOVE. 1970s analog tape warmth.  
INSTRUMENTS:  
- BASS: dominant, slow, pulsing, hypnotic.  
- DRUMS: ride cymbal shimmer, kick heartbeat, snare ghost notes — no fills.  
- GUITAR: only atmospheric swells, mixed low, non-intrusive.  
TEMPO: 67 BPM — slow, trance-like.  
EFFECTS:  
- MALE VOCAL: light tape echo, low-pass filter, ASMR dry.  
- FEMALE BACKING: heavy reverb, reverse delay, vinyl crackle layer.  
- NO phaser, NO flanger on instruments.  
MOOD: sensual, dark, ritualistic, intimate, haunting.  
STRUCTURE: intro → verse → chorus → verse → chorus → bridge → outro.  
NO DISTRACTIONS. MALE WHISPER IS THE ANCHOR. FEMALE IS THE STATIC.  
MALE VOCAL ONLY — END.
7658b19f-b020-40da-8367-b3feb856c85b.lyrics:
[Intro: 8 sec — bass pulse, ride cymbal shimmer, vinyl crackle, guitar: one distant swell]
[FEMALE backing: wordless “ahh...” — heavy reverb, panned wide, low volume]
[MALE voice — dry, ultra-close, low baritone whisper]
She moves... in static...
[FEMALE: “mmm...” — reverse delay tail, like radio ghost]
Not in light... not in song...
[FEMALE: “shhh...” — vinyl crackle layered under]
→ [VERSE — MALE whisper, slower, more deliberate]
I don’t call her... she appears...
[FEMALE: “ooo...” — far right, decaying]
When the tape... forgets its fears...
[FEMALE: “hhh...” — left channel, tape flutter effect]
Her voice... is not a voice...
[FEMALE: “nnn...” — center, but buried under reverb]
It’s the space... between... my... noise...
[FEMALE: silence — then single “ahh...” — cut by tape stop SFX]
→ [CHORUS — MALE whisper, slightly more intensity, tape echo]
She moves... in static...
[FEMALE: “static... static...” — whispered, reversed, panned L→R]
Dances... where the signal... breaks...
[FEMALE: “breaks... breaks...” — fragmented, glitched]
I speak... she echoes... not replies...
[FEMALE: “not... not... not...” — stutters, then fades]
She’s the ghost... behind my... eyes...
[FEMALE: long “iiii...” — rising pitch, then cut]
→ [BRIDGE — MALE whisper drops to subvocal, almost inaudible]
(backing: none — 4 sec silence — only bass pulse)
She’s not mine... I’m... hers...
[FEMALE: single “hers...” — reversed, from deep sub-bass]
The static... chose... me... first...
[FEMALE: “first... first...” — whispered, panned wide, decaying]
→ [OUTRO — MALE fragmented whisper, fading]
She moves... still... here...
[FEMALE: “here... here...” — reverse delay, slower each time]
...in the... hiss... in the... hum...
[FEMALE: “hum... hum...” — merging with bass drone]
...when I... stop... she... comes...
[FEMALE: final “comes...” — stretched tape effect → dissolves into white noise → silence]

e48a1ec5-f71c-435b-8110-c8f7c0bf6489.name: SUNSET LETTER (WAIT FOR ME) (Variation)
e48a1ec5-f71c-435b-8110-c8f7c0bf6489.sound: Psychedelic electronic rock, deep baritone vocals, funky bassline, analog synth arpeggios, trippy guitar effects, drum machine with live drums, dark atmospheric vibe, sensual but tender lyrics — written as a letter from a man to a woman, to be read at sunset, warm, patient, intimate, hopeful, 110 BPM, vintage meets modern, hazy production, 90s alternative vibe, 70s funk influence, male vocal only, no female lead, lyrics feel like whispered letter, not sung — spoken with melody, like sunset studio
e48a1ec5-f71c-435b-8110-c8f7c0bf6489.lyrics:
[Intro: Warm analog synth arpeggio, funky bass slides in, drum machine + live snare shuffle, hazy guitar swell]
[MALE voice — deep baritone, spoken with gentle melody, intimate, like reading a letter aloud]
My love,
If you’re reading this… the sun’s probably low.
That golden hour you love — where the world slows…
And everything feels… possible.
(backing: light synth pad swells — like warmth)
→ [VERSE 1]
I’m not there yet.
But I’m closer than yesterday.
Every mile… every red light… every wrong turn…
It’s all just… steps back to you.
[guitar: subtle wah swell — like a smile]
I know you wait.
Not because you have to.
But because… you choose to.
And that’s the thing that keeps me driving…
Even when the road forgets its name.
[bass: playful slide — like a wink]
→ [CHORUS — slightly more rhythm, but still intimate]
So wait for me… just a little longer.
(backing: synth arpeggio brightens)
Not because I ask… but because you know —
(backing: drum groove locks in — live snare crack)
When I come… it’ll be worth every sunset…
(backing: guitar: trippy reverse echo on “sunset”)
Every minute… every mile… every “almost there”…
(backing: bassline dances — funky, warm)
→ [VERSE 2]
I dream of your porch.
Your tea going cold.
Your feet tucked under you.
The way you sigh when you’re pretending to be mad…
But your eyes… they’re smiling.
[drum machine: soft kick pulse — heartbeat]
I’m bringing back stories.
Not souvenirs.
The kind you whisper over wine…
When the night’s too good to sleep.
[guitar: e-bow swell — hazy, warm]
→ [CHORUS — fuller, but still tender]
So wait for me… just a little longer.
(backing: harmonies — wordless, airy, like breeze)
Not because I ask… but because you know —
(backing: live drums groove deeper)
When I come… it’ll be worth every sunset…
(backing: synth arpeggio sparkles)
Every minute… every mile… every “almost there”…
(backing: bass + guitar lock into funky pocket)
→ [BRIDGE — voice drops, more intimate, almost ASMR]
(backing: instruments drop out — only bass pulse and vinyl crackle)
Don’t rush the sky.
Don’t beg the moon.
Some things… are beautiful… because they take time.
Like us.
(backing: single synth note — holds, then fades)
→ [OUTRO — voice fades, music swells gently]
I’ll be there…
Before the stars forget your name.
(backing: full groove returns — warm, funky, hopeful)
Keep the light on…
I’m following it home.
(backing: guitar + synth fade into hazy sunset drone → vinyl crackle → silence)

a338b059-ebce-4317-bdf8-83f9dd9cc7bc.name: Vogue
