5a0f3b3e-021c-4389-beb1-d85a89fb27eb.name: Déjà touch, déjà vu
5a0f3b3e-021c-4389-beb1-d85a89fb27eb.sound: trance, euphoric, cinematic, 138 BPM, female vocals, multilingual, skibidi-style vocal play, shimmering supersaw leads, velvet reverb, stadium chorus
5a0f3b3e-021c-4389-beb1-d85a89fb27eb.lyrics:
[Intro: whispered harmony]
Regarde... (Do-do-doo)
Kokoro... (Do-do-doo)
[Verse 1]
You caught that moment, a flash across my face
Heard your laughter somewhere, tracing echoes in the space
J’attends encore — are you waiting too?
I skate across the silence, just to send a signal through
[Pre-chorus]
Every beat, uncertain, sliding sideways, losing ground
We orbit in the static, where our words don’t make a sound
(Tiens-moi fort, do-do-doo)
[Chorus]
Déjà touch, déjà vu, on repeat with you
Through this cosmic rush, are you feeling it too?
Déjà touch, déjà vu, running lines into new
Dancing on the future, everything’s deja-new
[Instrumental Drop / Skibidi-style Vocal Play]
Do-do-doo, do-do-doo
(Stella Noctis… do-do-doo)
[Verse 2]
Sunrise on my shoulder, change is shifting the air
Parler sans paroles, like we’re almost there
Switching from D to F sharp, I sense it in the beat
Tous les mondes qui basculent, meeting somewhere in between
[Pre-chorus]
We speak in little fragments, smile with half a clue
Syncopated glances, what are we about to do?
(Dakishimete, do-do-doo)
[Chorus]
Déjà touch, déjà vu, on repeat with you
Through this cosmic rush, are you feeling it too?
Déjà touch, déjà vu, running lines into new
Dancing on the future, everything’s deja-new
[Bridge: Spoken/Whispered, Multilingual]
Regarde… J’ai senti ce moment
Kokoro… 変わる気持ち
(Floating—do-do-doo)
[Build / Loop Tag]
It circles, it circles
Flashback, feedback, don’t let go
Encore une fois — encore une fois
[Chorus — Stadium Reverb]
Déjà touch, déjà vu, on repeat with you
Through this cosmic rush, are you feeling it too?
Déjà touch, déjà vu, running lines into new
Dancing on the future, everything’s deja-new
[Outro — Whispered]
Regarde…
Kokoro… (Do-do-doo…)
[DJ Fade-out/Loop]

36004f41-bca7-4257-8216-3799f81bdcf2.name: Envelope Dust (Variation)
36004f41-bca7-4257-8216-3799f81bdcf2.sound: Male baritone only—whispered verses, dry spoken-word choruses, intimate and raw. Rhythm driven by paper sounds: unfolding, folding, gentle tearing, drawer creaks. No instruments, no reverb, no digital effects. Only analog tape saturation, subtle wow/flutter, and light vinyl surface noise. Tempo: 74 BPM. Mood: introspective, ritualistic, tender solitude. Style: 1975 Los Angeles late-night apartment session, voice as confessional, paper as percussion and sacred object.
36004f41-bca7-4257-8216-3799f81bdcf2.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[paper unfolds slowly — crisp, dry sound]
[whispered, barely audible]
…again…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, synced to paper rustle]
I keep your letter in the left drawer—
third from the top, under rubber bands
that lost their stretch in ’73.
The ink’s faded to ghost-blue,
but I still hear your voice
in the creases.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[paper folds sharply — once, twice]
I never sealed it.
Never stamped it.
Just kept it breathing
in my pocket.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, low baritone, dry and close]
This envelope holds nothing but dust—
and the shape of a sentence I never said.
I read it like scripture.
I fold it like prayer.
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, closer, with lip sounds]
Sometimes I swear the paper smells
like your hair after rain.
Or is that just the damp
from the window left open?
I don’t check.
I don’t want to know.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[paper unfolds again — slower this time]
The words are gone.
But the rhythm remains.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, same tone, slight tape wobble]
This envelope holds nothing but dust—
and the shape of a sentence I never said.
I read it like scripture.
I fold it like prayer.
[POST-CHORUS]
[layered whispers, paper rustling in background]
Dust…
Shape…
Fold…
[soft tearing sound — then stops abruptly]
[OUTRO]
[paper placed gently back in drawer]
[drawer closes with soft thud]
[final whisper]
…tomorrow again…
[5 seconds of distant rain, then tape stop click]

e9d719fb-68d9-44d9-b6b2-d3583826431e.name: Static Lullaby
e9d719fb-68d9-44d9-b6b2-d3583826431e.sound: Male baritone only—whispered verses, dry spoken-word choruses with subtle AM-radio-like vocal distortion. Rhythm and texture driven entirely by analog radio static: warm hiss, tuning sweeps, signal dropouts, tube hum. No instruments, no reverb, no digital effects. Only tape saturation, light vinyl crackle, and natural room tone. Tempo: 88 BPM. Mood: spectral, intimate, haunted by presence in absence. Style: 1976 Los Angeles midnight broadcast from a bedroom studio, voice as signal, static as companion.
e9d719fb-68d9-44d9-b6b2-d3583826431e.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[radiostatic swells — warm, analog hiss, 88 BPM pulse underneath]
[tuning dial turns slowly, catching fragments: “…love you…”, “…gone…”, then gone]
[whispered, into an old mic]
…can you hear me through the snow?…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, rhythmic with static bursts]
I keep the dial between 98 and 99—
that’s where your voice hides
in the white noise.
Not words. Just… warmth.
Like a hand on my neck
in a dream I can’t wake from.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[static surges, then dips]
The antenna’s bent.
The signal’s dead.
But I still broadcast
into the static.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, low baritone, dry, slightly distorted like AM radio]
This is my lullaby:
hiss, hum, and half a name.
I sing to the dead air—
and the dead air sings back.
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, closer, breath audible]
Last night, I swear I heard you say
*“turn it off”*—
but maybe that was just the tube
burning out again.
I left it on.
I always leave it on.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[tuning dial clicks once, static shifts tone]
No station.
Just you.
In the gaps.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, same as before, with subtle tape saturation]
This is my lullaby:
hiss, hum, and half a name.
I sing to the dead air—
and the dead air sings back.
[POST-CHORUS]
[layered whispers under rising static]
Hiss…
Hum…
Half…
[static swells, then cuts to near-silence]
[OUTRO]
[radiostatic fades to low drone]
[final whisper, almost inhaled]
…still listening…
[radio power switch clicks off — then 4 seconds of rain outside, tape stop]

466fa4d3-434b-438f-8e4f-565da1dcb998.name: Ancient Echoes
466fa4d3-434b-438f-8e4f-565da1dcb998.sound: Mythic style, mystical ambient, Gregorian chant, Vedic mantras, deep male and female vocals, ethereal, trance, 70 BPM, ancient future, sacred, desert night, crystal resonance, heartbeat bass, spiritual awakening, love beyond time, return after 1000 years, cinematic, haunting, beautiful, timeless

aa19dd68-1fa8-4ae0-bf0b-2c10e5142a3d.name: Serenity
aa19dd68-1fa8-4ae0-bf0b-2c10e5142a3d.sound: «Meditative Soundscape - Deep Immersion»*> 📝 **Title:** *"Breath of Silence"*  > 📝 **Genre:** Ambient / Meditative / Sound Healing  > 📝 **Mood:** Peaceful, introspective, deeply calming, spiritual  > 📝 **Vibe:** Like floating in warm water under a starlit sky  ---### 🌿 Описание (основной промт):> Create a deep meditative soundscape that invites the listener into a state of inner stillness and surrender. The music should feel like a gentle journey through silence, where every sound appears like a soft ripple on the surface of awareness. No abrupt changes, no distracting rhythms — only flowing harmonies, subtle textures, and ambient layers that breathe together with the listener.  >> Instruments include: Tibetan singing bowls, crystal tones, ambient piano, shakuhachi flute, soft synth pads, distant nature sounds (gentle rain, forest ambiance, ocean waves). Add binaural beats at 7.83Hz (Schumann resonance) for grounding and deep relaxation.  >> Let the composition evolve slowly over time, with long reverbs, spatial depth, and moments of intentional silence. Use microtonal shifts and harmonic overtones to create a sense of expansion beyond time and space.  >> The goal is to make the listener feel safe, held, and completely immersed — as if they are dissolving into the music itself.---### 🕉️ Дополнительные ключевые слова:- slow breathing tempo  - healing frequencies  - theta brainwave stimulation  - ambient textures  - minimalistic composition  - surround sound experience  - nature ambiences  - voiceless chants  - sacred space  - emotional stillness  - transcendent atmosphere

c0e3d911-b9d6-4b43-9b6b-b2c75ba4c912.name: Light's Virtuoso

584f90ed-69c8-4a1b-b3a5-e121852332cf.name: Où Est L'Essence (Where Is The Essence) (Remix)
584f90ed-69c8-4a1b-b3a5-e121852332cf.sound: Trip-hop fusion, haunting French/Russian vocals, atmospheric bass, minimal piano, rain ambience
584f90ed-69c8-4a1b-b3a5-e121852332cf.lyrics:
[Piano intro with rain sounds]
[Verse 1 - Russian]
В прозрачном флаконе застыла душа
Парфюм дорогой, но внутри пустота
Мгновенья с тобой, растворились давно
В лаборатории тихо и темно
[Pre-chorus - French]
Dans mes fioles précieuses
Je cherche ton essence perdue
(Où est l'essence de toi?)
(Où est l'essence de nous?)
[Chorus - French/Russian]
Où est l'essence de nos jours?
В пустых комнатах твой аромат
Je respire mais je ne sens plus l'amour
Только память хранит наш закат
[Verse 2 - Russian]
Жасмин и роза смешались с дождём
В бутИке "Dior" я вспоминаю о нём
ДухИ создают иллюзию встреч
Но не могут твой образ сберечь
[Bridge - Whispered French/Russian layers]
[Rain intensifies]
Les notes s'évaporent dans l'air
(Воспоминания тают как дым)
Comme nos souvenirs d'hier
(В пустых флаконах наша любовь)
[Verse 3 - Russian]
В лаборатории среди духов
Я создаю аромат наших снов
Но каждый раз когда пробую я
Чувствую - это лишь пустота
[Chorus - French/Russian - Final]
Où est l'essence de nos jours?
В пустых комнатах твой аромат
Je respire mais je ne sens plus l'amour
Только память хранит наш закат
[Outro - Soft piano and rain fading]
(L'essence... perdue dans le temps)

c232c58e-0d8e-48f3-b720-0d4b3c6f4663.name: Timeless Sand
c232c58e-0d8e-48f3-b720-0d4b3c6f4663.sound: Lo-fi, french hip hop, Ambient wave, Harmonic, Chill vibe, female vocals, Dirty beats, echoing vocals,
c232c58e-0d8e-48f3-b720-0d4b3c6f4663.lyrics:
[Introduction - Robotic Voice *Mechanical voice processing*]
01001100 01000101 00100000 01010011 01000001 01000010 01001100 01000101
"INITIALIZING... EVERYTHING IS SAND... EVERYTHING WILL BE SAND..."
[Gentle melody of guitar and bass emerges]
As mãos se misturam com a areia,
O rio tão calmo, nada revela.
A pedra marca o que foi e o que é,
Um sinal há muito perdido
(Soft acoustic fingerpicking, descending bass)
[Guitar & Bass Interlude]
Põem suas mãos sobre a areia
As pedras marcam o tempo sem fim
Com cada grão, o deserto cresce
Não há movimento, só pó persiste
(Bass melodic line with harmonics)
[Guitar & Bass Pause]
Pedra no lugar sagrado
Luz estelar toma o espaço antigo
A areia não esconde estes caminhos
Quando o tempo flui dentro da terra
[Bridge - Calm]
Ondas de areia, flutuando livre
Como o tempo que passa sem fim
O espaço se transforma cristalino
Enquanto ventos do deserto sopram sem medo
(Ambient tones with reverb, Soft instrumental fade...)
[Guitar & Bass Transition]
As almas dispersas pelas dunas
Com pedras nas mãos, marcam os símbolos
Cristais brilham, suas faces claras
Na areia profunda, noite adentro
As mãos se misturam com a areia,
O rio tão calmo, não mostra terra.
A pedra marca o que foi e o que é,
Um sinal que há muito se perdeu
[Bridge]
E ninguém vê, e ninguém se move,
E ninguém pergunta por que se apaga...
"E assim eles caminhavam sobre a areia...
E assim eles procuravam, e nada foi encontrado...
E assim o vento se levantou novamente...
E assim o tempo nunca parará."
[Final]
[Bass decreases to single notes]
(Et ainsi le temps ne s'arrêtera jamais...)
[Guitar harmonics float like sand, Final ambient dissolves into silence fade...]

3b9adc14-097f-4a7c-881c-0fd70b48a5d7.name: Back to you 2
3b9adc14-097f-4a7c-881c-0fd70b48a5d7.sound: LUXURY female vocal tech house 128bpm, elite night club vibe, hypnotic vocals (female only), trancey memorable hook, velvet texture, marble fx, VIP FX: hidden 18.5kHz layer + 19kHz pulse (every 8 bars). RULES: NO male vocals, NO English, ONLY short vocal phrases in French/Italian/Spanish, NO verse lyrics, NO pre-chorus > 3 sec, DJ friendly: 16-bar intro and outro with clean groove for mixing, vocals used as rhythmic samples, chorus (hook) is catchy and extremely danceable, luxury positive club energy.

dde74268-5e19-4c7b-97b3-729bd74af350.name: Lost Pulse
dde74268-5e19-4c7b-97b3-729bd74af350.sound: Trip-hop, deep analog bass, atmospheric pads, slow downtempo beats, urban ambience
dde74268-5e19-4c7b-97b3-729bd74af350.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Through the rain tonight
Can't find my peace of mind
While the world moves on
Far below, alone
[Chorus]
The city breathes without me
(Breathes without me)
Watch it move without me
(Move without me)
[Verse 2 - Japanese]
Dare mo inai machi de
Mado ni ame ga furitsuzuku
Kono heya de mezameru
Kokoro wa uzuku dake
[Pre-chorus]
These walls hold me tight
As streets fill with light
Time stands still inside
While life passes by
[Chorus]
The city breathes without me
(Breathes without me)
Watch it move without me
(Move without me)
[Bridge]
[Rain sounds intensify]
Counting hours
Empty streets below
Signal lights change
But no one knows
(No one knows)
[Verse 3]
Morning comes too soon
Another sleepless night
Your side still empty
Time won't make this right
[Outro]
The city breathes
(It breathes)
The city moves
(It moves)
[Fade to rain sounds]

31740417-db55-470e-913d-ff6207e33a1d.name: Um Amor de Verão (A Summer Love)
31740417-db55-470e-913d-ff6207e33a1d.sound: Brazilian Forró, electronic fusion, accordion melodies, tropical percussion, modern bass
31740417-db55-470e-913d-ff6207e33a1d.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Na praia de Copacabana te vi dançar
O ritmo do forró no ar, não pude resistir
Seus passos leves na areia, sorriso a brilhar
Me aproximei devagar, querendo descobrir
[Pre-chorus 1]
Seus olhos encontraram os meus
Entre acordes do mar
O tempo parou por nós dois
Começamos a voar
[Chorus]
Um amor de verão
(Amor que vem e vai)
Tão doce ilusão
(Como brisa do mar)
Um amor de verão
(Na dança, te encontrei)
Guardado no coração
(Para sempre vou lembrar)
[Verse 2]
As noites de dança juntos, sob céu tropical
Seu sotaque diferente, historical postal
Mas as passagens marcadas não podem esperar
O destino nos separa, é hora de voltar
[Pre-chorus 2]
As ondas cantam nossa dor
Na beira do mar
Mas danço pra te encontrar
No som do lugar
[Chorus]
Um amor de verão
(Amor que vem e vai)
Tão doce ilusão
(Como brisa do mar)
Um amor de verão
(Na dança, te encontrei)
Guardado no coração
(Para sempre vou lembrar)
[Bridge]
[Accordion Solo]
Entre passos e saudade
Guardo nossa verdade
No som do acordeão
E no meu coração
[Chorus - Final]
Um amor de verão
(Amor que vem e vai)
Tão doce ilusão
(Como brisa do mar)
Um amor de verão
(Na dança, te encontrei)
Guardado no coração
(Para sempre vou lembrar)

c3d8e1d7-4796-4e2a-aa40-18010c24a775.name: Résonance
c3d8e1d7-4796-4e2a-aa40-18010c24a775.sound: French Rap, haunting cello, ethereal female vocals, urban nocturnal 808 beats
c3d8e1d7-4796-4e2a-aa40-18010c24a775.lyrics:
[Intro - Female Vocals & Cello]
«Le silence m'appelle ce soir»
(Dans la solitude je trouve ma force)
[Verse 1]
Les rues désertes devant moi s'étendent
Mon cœur bat au rythme de mes pas qui descendent
Dans ce labyrinthe de pierre et d'acier
Je marche seul, mais je n'ai plus peur d'avancer
La ville dort, mais je reste éveillé
Dans cette symphonie nocturne je suis accordé
Les yeux fermés, je sens le vent qui guide
Mes mouvements dans cet espace vide
[Chorus]
Mes pas résonnent dans le silence (dans le silence)
Mes pas résonnent dans le silence (je suis la cadence)
Mes pas résonnent, résonnent encore
Mes pas résonnent jusqu'à l'aurore
(Mes pas résonnent) Dans cette ville endormie
(Mes pas résonnent) Je trace mon chemin
(Mes pas résonnent) Dans cette mélodie
(Mes pas résonnent) Jusqu'au petit matin
[Cello Solo]
[City sounds fade in]
[Verse 2]
La solitude devient ma protection
Dans ces rues vides, je trouve ma direction
Les lampadaires éclairent mon chemin
Comme des étoiles guidant mon destin
Chaque pas compte, chaque souffle résonne
Dans cette ville qui m'abandonne
Mais dans ce vide, je deviens plus fort
La nuit m'écoute, et mon âme s'envole
[Bridge]
«Dans ces moments de solitude» (Je trouve ma force)
«Quand la ville dort profondément» (Je reste en course)
«Mes pas deviennent ma musique» (Ma résistance)
«Dans ce ballet de résilience» (Ma renaissance)
[Final Chorus]
Mes pas résonnent dans le silence (dans le silence)
Mes pas résonnent dans le silence (je suis la cadence)
Mes pas résonnent, résonnent encore
Mes pas résonnent jusqu'à l'aurore
(Mes pas résonnent) Je trouve ma voie
(Mes pas résonnent) Je reste moi
(Mes pas résonnent) Dans cette symphonie
(Mes pas résonnent) Je suis en vie
[Outro - Female Vocals & Cello]
«Le silence me libère enfin»
(Dans la solitude, j'ai trouvé ma force)

3b5f7861-61d3-4b6d-9978-ff169d1e1a42.name: Obsidian Tide
3b5f7861-61d3-4b6d-9978-ff169d1e1a42.sound: Hypnotic 70s-style psychedelic track: extremely deep, resonant male baritone vocal (intimate, enveloping, no female vocals), clean electric guitar with slow phaser and infinite decay reverb, fretless bass glissando, sparse hand percussion, harmonica swells in minor key, all processed through analog tape emulation — slow 60 BPM pulse, no synths, no distortion, no rhythmic drive, pure atmospheric immersion with organic instrumentation.
3b5f7861-61d3-4b6d-9978-ff169d1e1a42.lyrics:
[Verse – extremely low male vocal, chest resonance, intimate proximity effect, light tube warmth, centered]
The tide pulls thought from bone and skin,
The moon forgets where dreams begin.
[Chorus – same vocal, layered with sub-octave, slow tape delay, cavernous spring reverb]
*Sink… into the hollow deep…*
*Where even silence falls asleep…*
[Bridge – vocal drops to near-spoken whisper, right channel, with distant harmonica swell]
No shore… no sound… just the pull…

314562c7-ef7c-4684-8695-87a88d9e0303.name: Коллекция Лжи (Collection of Lies) (Cover)
314562c7-ef7c-4684-8695-87a88d9e0303.sound: Trap, French noir beats, dark synths, rain ambience, reverb vocals
314562c7-ef7c-4684-8695-87a88d9e0303.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
В моем зале тишина
Каждый шаг как новая страница
В бронзе лица и тела
Смотрят, молча судят, что случится
[Pre-chorus]
Мои сокровища так холодны
Но их истории горят огнём
[Chorus]
Каждый предмет лжёт обо мне
(Лжёт, лжёт, всё лжёт)
Каждый предмет лжёт обо мне
(Лжёт, лжёт, всё лжёт)
[Verse 2]
Фарфор из Китая на полках
Французское стекло в витринах
Все эти вещи говорят
О той, которой я не была
Собираю маски прошлого
Прячу правду за красотой
В каждом зале новая ложь
Но кто я без этих стен?
[Bridge]
Медь и серебро
Шёлк и жемчуга
Время застыло
В моих руках
(Каждый предмет...)
[Chorus]
Каждый предмет лжёт обо мне
(Лжёт, лжёт, всё лжёт)
Каждый предмет лжёт обо мне
(Лжёт, лжёт, всё лжёт)
[Outro]
Моя коллекция растёт
А правда тает как вода
Каждый предмет лжёт обо мне
Лжёт обо мне
Лжёт обо мне...

355ab3c4-cfc9-4e7e-988e-124e42cd85c5.name: Night Veil
355ab3c4-cfc9-4e7e-988e-124e42cd85c5.sound: Ambient meditation, slow saxophone, whispered Russian vocals, night forest soundscape
355ab3c4-cfc9-4e7e-988e-124e42cd85c5.lyrics:
[Movement I]
[Deep night forest, distant rain]
(Сон... тишина...)
[Breathy saxophone repeats two notes. Wind hums. Owl calls, barely heard.]

99069b33-6c58-436f-acb5-f4b127c5177d.name: Luxe
99069b33-6c58-436f-acb5-f4b127c5177d.sound: Euro Club, French vocals, luxury house production, analog 808, champagne fx
99069b33-6c58-436f-acb5-f4b127c5177d.lyrics:
[Instrumental Intro: pads, champagne glass SFX, 808 bass rise]
[Pre-chorus: whispered]
Regarde-moi
Regarde-moi
[Chorus: breathy, layered]
Viens avec moi
Viens... avec moi
(moi... moi)
[Instrumental Outro: pads, fading bass, vinyl crackle]
[Champagne glass SFX fade, luxury reverb tail]

1e9a5196-f4a9-4280-ab78-f30b41686a98.name: Pratibimb (Reflections)
1e9a5196-f4a9-4280-ab78-f30b41686a98.sound: Lo-fi noir hip-hop, Hindi vocals, deep sub-bass, glitch effects, atmospheric synths
1e9a5196-f4a9-4280-ab78-f30b41686a98.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Khaali station pe, meri aahat
Raat ki tanhaayi mein main
Aankhon mein khud ko dhoondh rahi
Toot-ti fluorescent ki roshni mein
(Ooo... khud ko dhoondh rahi)
[Pre-chorus]
Kaun hoon main? Kaisi hoon main?
Har parchaayi mujhse poochhe
(Har parchaayi poochhe)
[Chorus]
Main har sheeshe mein, apne aap ko dekhoon
Main har sheeshe mein, koi aur si lage
Main har sheeshe mein, apni kahani padhoon
Main har sheeshe mein, khud se milti jaoon
(Khud se milti... khud se milti...)
[Verse 2]
Train ki awaaz door kahin
Mere dil ki dhadkan jaisi
Khaamoshi mein mere kadam
Jawaab dhoondhe har pal mein
(Mmm... har pal mein)
[Solo]
[Ethereal vocalizations]
(Aaa... haaa... ooo...)
[Metallic scraping sounds]
(Main... main... main...)
[Bridge]
Aansuon mein dikhe mujhe
Sainkdon chehre mere
Har ek mein ek kahaani
Har ek mein ek raaz hai
(Ooo... ek raaz hai)
[Chorus]
Main har sheeshe mein, apne aap ko dekhoon
Main har sheeshe mein, koi aur si lage
Main har sheeshe mein, apni kahani padhoon
Main har sheeshe mein, khud se milti jaoon
(Khud se milti... khud se milti...)
[Outro]
Khaali station, bhare sheeshe
Main aur mere kai roop
Raat dhalti, main chalti
Khud ko samajhti jaoon
(Samajhti jaoon... samajhti jaoon...)

07dcea6f-d0c5-4d10-b382-4a774c6a4080.name: Mirror Confession
07dcea6f-d0c5-4d10-b382-4a774c6a4080.sound: Male baritone only—whispered verses, dry spoken-word choruses with a subtle, slightly delayed whisper echo (as if reflection answering). Rhythm from organic sounds: breath on mirror, water droplets sliding down glass, finger tracing fog, soft cloth wipe. No instruments, no reverb, no electronic effects. Only analog tape saturation, light vinyl crackle, and natural room tone. Tempo: 78 BPM. Mood: introspective, dualistic, quietly haunting. Style: 1975 Los Angeles bathroom at 4 AM, voice in dialogue with its own ghost, mirror as confessional booth.
07dcea6f-d0c5-4d10-b382-4a774c6a4080.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[slow breath fogs mirror — deep, warm]
[water droplet slides down glass — *plink*]
[whispered, to reflection]
…you first…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, synced to droplet rhythm]
You never blink.
I do.
That’s how I know you’re not me—
you’re the part that stayed behind
when I walked out that door
and never came back.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[finger draws a line through fog on glass]
You remember her voice.
I only remember the silence after.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, dry baritone — then immediately echoed by a slightly delayed whisper]
I ask: *“Do you still love her?”*
You answer: *“…do you?”*
I ask: *“Why didn’t we say it?”*
You answer: *“…why didn’t you?”*
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, closer, with wet breath]
Sometimes I wipe the glass clean—
just to see your face clearly.
But you look tired.
Like you’ve been waiting
longer than I have.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[second droplet — slower]
You hold the truth.
I hold the lie.
We both live here.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word + delayed whisper, same as before]
I ask: *“Do you still love her?”*
You answer: *“…do you?”*
I ask: *“Why didn’t we say it?”*
You answer: *“…why didn’t you?”*
[POST-CHORUS]
[two whispers overlapping, slightly out of phase]
…do you…
…do you…
…why didn’t…
…why didn’t…
[mirror wiped clean — soft cloth sound]
[OUTRO]
[long silence — then one final breath fogs the glass again]
[whispered, fading]
…your turn…
[3 seconds of dripping water, then tape stop]

b6eeef4b-f1b8-49bd-b85d-c8f8c1d18710.name: Silicon Tears (Variation)
b6eeef4b-f1b8-49bd-b85d-c8f8c1d18710.sound: male vocal monotone flat nasal tenor no vibrato, clean electric guitar repeating 4-note riff E-G-A-C with analog chorus, bass playing identical riff, light hi-hat only in choruses no snare no kick, tempo 92 BPM, key C minor, no dynamics no build no climax, 1999 Los Angeles alternative rock, analog tape saturation, stereo wide dry mix, themes California illusion fame emptiness digital decay
b6eeef4b-f1b8-49bd-b85d-c8f8c1d18710.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[clean electric guitar: E – G – A – C riff, chorus on, bass plays same notes]
[VERSE 1]
[monotone vocal on G, flat delivery]
She’s got stars in her Instagram,
rents her soul by the gram.
Her skin glows like a sunset screen—
but her heart’s a dead machine.
[CHORUS]
[vocal: G – A – C, same flat tone, hi-hat enters]
SILICON TEARS, they shine so clear—
wash away what’s real in here.
You buy your dreams in a plastic cup…
but the truth won’t fill it up.
(bék-vocal: “fill it up…” — same notes, softer)
[VERSE 2]
[vocal back on G, no drums]
He drives fast on a broken name,
chases ghosts in a fame game.
His smile’s bright like a neon sign—
but his eyes forgot to shine.
[CHORUS]
[vocal: G – A – C, hi-hat returns]
SILICON TEARS, they fall so slow—
in a world you’ll never know.
You trade your bones for a golden view…
but the real world’s not in you.
(bék-vocal: “not in you…”)
[OUTRO]
[guitar and bass repeat riff, fade out]

9a4efcbc-2d94-47c1-8ecc-78b6fd8f9c2b.name: Phantom Escape
9a4efcbc-2d94-47c1-8ecc-78b6fd8f9c2b.sound: Gangsta rap, haunting cello, French whispers, deep 808 bass, dark atmospheric noir
9a4efcbc-2d94-47c1-8ecc-78b6fd8f9c2b.lyrics:
[Intro]
[French Police Radio] Suspect en fuite, direction nord
Red and blue flash in my rear view
They're getting closer, but they don't know
What I've got hidden in the cargo
[Verse 1]
Racing through the back streets, keeping out of sight
Every turn calculated, every move precise
Got the package in the trunk, time is running thin
Sirens wailing distant but they're closing in
Papa taught me how to move swift and clean
Now I'm putting lessons learned into this scene
[French Police Radio] Bloquez toutes les sorties
[Hook]
They won't catch me tonight (Ils ne m'auront pas ce soir)
They won't catch me tonight (Ils ne m'auront pas ce soir)
They won't catch me tonight (Ils ne m'auront pas ce soir)
[Post-chorus]
(Disparaître dans la nuit)
(Comme un fantôme qui s'enfuit)
[Verse 2]
Down the alleyways where street lamps never reach
Through the tunnels where the echoes never cease
Got a plan they'll never see coming their way
Years of planning for exactly this day
[French Police Radio] Le suspect se dirige vers l'est
Breaking formation, watch them scramble now
Taking routes they never mapped out somehow
[Hook]
They won't catch me tonight (Ils ne m'auront pas ce soir)
They won't catch me tonight (Ils ne m'auront pas ce soir)
They won't catch me tonight (Ils ne m'auront pas ce soir)
[Solo]
[Haunting cello solo builds tension]
[Rap Verse]
Listen close to what I'm about to reveal
Family business, generations deep, this is real
Grandfather ran these streets back in Marseille
Now I carry on tradition, never gonna fail
Been preparing since I learned how to walk
Memorizing every street, every block
They think they got me cornered but they're wrong
Been three steps ahead of them all along
[French Police Radio] Perdu le contact avec le suspect
[Hook]
They won't catch me tonight (Ils ne m'auront pas ce soir)
They won't catch me tonight (Ils ne m'auront pas ce soir)
They won't catch me tonight (Ils ne m'auront pas ce soir)
[Post-chorus]
(Disparaître dans la nuit)
(Comme un fantôme qui s'enfuit)
[Outro]
[French Police Radio] Suspect disparu, mission terminée
Safe house up ahead, just like we planned
Family legacy safe in my hands
They never caught me tonight

de3e6b31-87e3-4068-a6bd-9b9c89d08d62.name: Designer Life
de3e6b31-87e3-4068-a6bd-9b9c89d08d62.sound: Dance-pop, dramatic 808 bass, atmospheric synths, Russian vocals, luxury soundscape
de3e6b31-87e3-4068-a6bd-9b9c89d08d62.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Private jet to Paris, just because I can
Gucci on my body, Cartier on my hand
Living life expensive, that's my daily plan
Top floor suite, yeah, that's where I land
[Pre-chorus]
Credit cards swiping, no limits in sight
Personal shopper on speed dial, alright
Caviar breakfast, that's my morning light
VIP list, yeah I do this life
[Chorus]
Every day's a fashion show (show, show)
Every night I'm living slow (slow, slow)
[Verse 2]
Hermès bags in every shade
Russian girl who got it made
Breakfast at Ritz, lunch at Prada
Champagne life, yeah, that's my mantra
[Sound: champagne pop, glasses clinking]
[Pre-chorus]
Red bottoms clicking down Rodeo Drive
First class living, yeah that's my vibe
Diamond rings sparkling, feeling so alive
Living large, watch how I arrive
[Chorus]
Every day's a fashion show (show, show)
Every night I'm living slow (slow, slow)
[Bridge]
Sometimes I think about the come up
Before my name was on the guest list
But now I'm where I'm meant to be
Living life so effortlessly
[Dance Break]
[Sound: shopping bags rustling, high heels on marble]
[Chorus - Final]
Every day's a fashion show (show, show)
Every night I'm living slow (slow, slow)
(Living that designer life, yeah)
(That's my designer life, yeah)

e0191edf-fa1e-4e1e-87cc-8413c875637c.name: Phantom Mirage
e0191edf-fa1e-4e1e-87cc-8413c875637c.sound: psychedelic 70s sound, lush evolving synth pads, detuned wah guitar with delay and modulation, warm upright bass, brushed snare with soft electronic percussion, layered analog organ drones with phaser, male lead vocal: rich deep baritone whisper with analog tape saturation and subtle distortion, close harmony male backing vocals with tape echo, vinyl crackle and tape hiss textures, natural analog delay and reverb, tempo 93 BPM, mood: dreamy nocturnal psychedelic, blending vintage warmth and texture with modern atmospheric production and depth
e0191edf-fa1e-4e1e-87cc-8413c875637c.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[soft crackling vinyl, ambience with vintage tape hiss]
[lush synth pad with slow evolving textures — 93 BPM]
[rich deep baritone male whisper, warm analog saturation, subtle distortion]
Shadows flicker in the haze...
[VERSE 1]
[detuned wah guitar with delay and subtle modulation]
Mirage dances on sun-bleached walls,
Silent echoes in empty halls,
Time slips like a fading flame,
Lost within a phantom’s name.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[layered analog organ drones with gentle phaser]
Veils of sound, a whispered thread,
Haunted paths we lightly tread,
[CHORUS]
[warm rounded upright bass, brushed snare, soft textured electronic percussion]
Phantom mirage, elusive light,
Floating through the velvet night.
[POST-CHORUS]
[harmonized male vocals in close minor harmonies, drenched in tape echo]
Phantom gaze,
Lost in the maze.
[OUTRO]
[vinyl crackle and tape hiss swell, slow synth fade with natural reverb and delay]
Fade to black...
Till light returns...

0168f8f9-3518-45a0-b14d-35596cdc2ca8.name: Static Lullaby
0168f8f9-3518-45a0-b14d-35596cdc2ca8.sound: Male baritone only—whispered verses, dry spoken-word choruses, raw and intimate. Rhythm and texture from organic found sounds: breath on glass, dripping faucet, floorboard creaks, hand wiping condensation. No instruments, no electronic sounds, no reverb, no digital effects. Only analog tape saturation, subtle wow/flutter, and light vinyl crackle. Tempo: 84 BPM. Mood: introspective, spectral, ritualistic solitude. Style: 1975 Los Angeles late-night domestic session, voice as both speaker and echo, silence as active presence.
0168f8f9-3518-45a0-b14d-35596cdc2ca8.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[slow breath fogs cold glass — once]
[distant drip from bathroom faucet]
[whispered, lips close to glass]
…do you hear me in the walls?…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, rhythmic with drip at 84 BPM]
I talk to the hallway after midnight—
just to hear my voice come back
a half-second late.
Sometimes it sounds like you.
Sometimes it sounds like nothing.
I prefer nothing.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[hand wipes fog off glass — slow scrape]
The mirror doesn’t blink.
But it listens.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, low baritone, dry, chest-resonant]
This is my lullaby:
breath, echo, and a name that sticks
to the back of my throat.
I speak to the silence—
and the silence speaks back
in my own voice.
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, closer, with audible swallow]
Last night I said your name
in the empty bathtub.
The tiles gave it back
softer, slower—
like you were underwater.
I said it again.
And again.
Until it meant nothing.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[footstep on creaky floorboard — once]
No one’s there.
But the house remembers.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, same tone, slight tape wobble]
This is my lullaby:
breath, echo, and a name that sticks
to the back of my throat.
I speak to the silence—
and the silence speaks back
in my own voice.
[POST-CHORUS]
[layered whispers, slightly delayed — as if bouncing off walls]
Breath…
Echo…
Name…
[long exhale fades into drip]
[OUTRO]
[drip continues — then stops abruptly]
[final whisper]
…still talking…
[3 seconds of absolute silence, then tape stop click]

f8b0e013-0a7b-4eaa-996b-eb6654eba386.name: На перроне пустом
f8b0e013-0a7b-4eaa-996b-eb6654eba386.sound: Russian romance ballad, melancholic piano, minor key, cinematic strings, female vocals
f8b0e013-0a7b-4eaa-996b-eb6654eba386.lyrics:
[Piano intro]
[Verse 1]
На перроне пустом я стою в тишине
Первый луч пробивается сквозь облака
Иней тает на старых перилах, и мне
Кажется, что пора отпускать
Помнишь, как мы встречались здесь в зимние дни?
Ты держал мои руки, спасая от стуж
Я не знала тогда, что минуты любви
Растворятся как дым
[Pre-chorus]
Между нами теперь километры дорог
Между нами молчание длится века
Я смотрю, как уходит последний вагон
В неизвестность без нас
[Chorus]
Тает иней, как таяло время вдвоём
Я пытаюсь поймать уходящую тень
Может быть, мы однажды друг друга поймём
Но сегодня я здесь без тебя
(Без тебя...)
[Verse 2]
На платформе знакомой чужие шаги
Чей-то смех, чья-то радость свиданий других
Я стираю твой номер, стираю следы
Наших встреч и разлук
Этот город хранит наши тайны в снегу
Наши письма, признания, шёпот в ночи
Но теперь я одна, и назад не могу
Повернуть
[Bridge]
Время лечит, но память сильнее его
В каждом вздохе морозного утра ты здесь
Отпускаю тебя, отпускаю его -
Наше прошлое тает как иней весной
[Chorus - Final]
Тает иней, как таяло время вдвоём
(Время вдвоём...)
Я пытаюсь поймать уходящую тень
Может быть, мы однажды друг друга поймём
Но сегодня я здесь без тебя
(Навсегда без тебя...)
[Outro - piano fades]

c4c97118-0a5b-4751-9422-9916bd760fa8.name: Train of Time
c4c97118-0a5b-4751-9422-9916bd760fa8.sound: Neo-classical singer-songwriter, haunting cello, smoky jazz saxophone, atmospheric reverb, French vocals
c4c97118-0a5b-4751-9422-9916bd760fa8.lyrics:
[Intro - Instrumental with whispered French vocals]
(Un, deux, trois... vingt-trois minutes)
[Verse 1]
Standing here alone tonight
Cold metal bench beneath
Footsteps echo down the hall
Time moves underneath
[Pre-Chorus 1]
Paper tickets in my hand
Numbers changing on the board
Counting minutes as they pass
The night feels like before
[Chorus]
Every train brings you closer to me (oh-oh)
Every train brings a new possibility (la-la-la)
Keep on waiting, that's all I can do
Every train brings you closer, it's true
[Instrumental Interlude - Cello & Saxophone]
[Verse 2 - Rap]
Platform empty, just me and my thoughts
Checking times, my mind's caught
Between here and where you might be
Moving through spaces I can't see
Twenty-three minutes till the next arrives
My heart skips with every announcement live
Watching faces pass me by
None of them the reason why
I'm standing here, year after year
In this station, crystal clear
[Pre-Chorus 2]
Steel tracks stretching far away
Morning fog begins to roll
Through the glass, the world's still dark
Time takes its toll
[Chorus]
Every train brings you closer to me (oh-oh)
Every train brings a new possibility (la-la-la)
Keep on waiting, that's all I can do
Every train brings you closer, it's true
[Solo - Saxophone]
[Cello builds intensity]
[Bridge]
La-la-la, waiting here
La-la-la, drawing near
(Vingt-quatre... vingt-cinq...)
[Final Chorus]
Every train brings you closer to me (closer to me)
Every train brings a new possibility (oh-oh-oh)
Keep on waiting, that's all I can do
Every train brings you closer
Every moment moves faster
Every train brings you closer, it's true
[Outro - Instrumental with fading whispers]
(Le dernier train...)

36680ba4-8a69-40d2-bf93-fbed67d9f78f.name: You not be me
36680ba4-8a69-40d2-bf93-fbed67d9f78f.sound: Trancey Female Vocal Tech House, 128 BPM, DJ-friendly, peak-time energy,  verses: strictly non-lyrical FEMALE vocals - ahh, ooh, breathy moans, chopped hey in staccato,  TRAP GROOVE: subtle 808 slides on bass (no overpowering), hi-hat rolls (1/32 notes), sparse trap kicks (every 3rd beat),  pre-chorus: hypnotic SHORT 2-4 sec, FEMALE whisper - go or now + single exhale, NO MELODY in pre-chorus,  chorus: explosive FEMALE memorable hook repetitive x4,  bouncy bassline with sidechain, euphoric pluck synths, punchy off-beat claps,  VIP-style FX ONLY post-chorus, radio-ready but underground mix,  trancey memorable hook, velvet texture, marble fx, VIP FX: hidden 18.5kHz layer + 19kHz pulse (every 8 bars). RULES: NO male vocals, NO English, ONLY short vocal samples & phrases in French/Italian/Spanish, NO verse lyrics, NO pre-chorus > 3 sec, DJ friendly: 16-bar intro and outro with clean groove for mixing, vocals used as rhythmic samples, chorus (hook) is catchy and extremely danceable, luxury positive club energy.

9f3c3db5-e3eb-4051-bfc7-ebbbf93c0316.name: Trembling of sand
9f3c3db5-e3eb-4051-bfc7-ebbbf93c0316.sound: Deep meditative ambient. Ancient Egyptian sounds: breathy ney flute, soft sistrum shimmer, distant frame drum pulses. Bass like deep earth rumble, making sand tremble. Add granular textures of shifting sand, close-miked exhalations. No orchestra, no rhythm. Long reverbs, microtonal tuning, binaural beats 7.83Hz. Spacious, sacred, timeless. Mood: inner resonance, stillness, awakening consciousness. Like standing in a desert temple at dawn — sand, wind, silence.

15ebacc1-6ad6-4bd8-a808-dafb3bb59d8c.name: Manic Symphony
15ebacc1-6ad6-4bd8-a808-dafb3bb59d8c.sound: experimental, minimal, electro, funk, Rap-rock high fidelity, Rap-rave, electro-hip-hop, provocative, intense beats, raw energy, miami rap, [instrumentation: [drums: [hyperactive breakbeats, aggressive 808 hits]], [bass: [distorted sub-bass, wobbling low-end]], [melodic: [cartoonish synths, warped jazz piano, toy piano stabs]], [vocals: [exaggerated cartoon raps, chaotic delivery, pitch shifting, unexpected vocal effects]]]  [Vocals: high-energy and exaggerated, rapid comedic delivery, unpredictable tonal shifts from deep growls to high-pitched squeals, sudden cartoonish yells and exaggerated annunciation][vocal tone: completely erratic, switching between ultra-serious and absurd clown-like energy in an instant][vocal dynamics: extreme volume swings, going from quiet muttering to full-on scream-rap][vocal rhythm: fast, tongue-twisting triplet flows mixed with stuttering stops and glitchy pauses][vocal layering: multiple overlapping voices for chaos, robotic harmonies, echoes of random words for comedic effect][vocal effects: heavy auto-tune in some parts, chipmunk pitch shifts, robotic voice distortions, manic laughter interspersed]  [Instruments: glitched-out synth leads, toy piano plinks, distorted brass stabs, carnival organ, booming bass, gunshot snares, random fart noises] [Rhythm: hyperactive drum programming, sudden BPM shifts, unexpected pauses, chaotic fills] [Effects: extreme stereo panning, randomly reversed vocal snippets, glitched-out reverb, exaggerated vocal echos] [Dynamics: completely unpredictable, swinging between whispering and full-volume screaming] [maniac,  psychopath breakdown,  crazy,  laugh,  western,  yandere,  yanderecore,  love] ,  [strong performance], [#riffusion.ai: 〔#create: [#PCM [Bit depth: 64-Bit float] [Sample Rate: 96 kHz] 〕 [#activate: maniac,  psychopath breakdown,  crazy,  laugh,  western,  yandere,  yanderecore,  love] ,  [strong performance]
15ebacc1-6ad6-4bd8-a808-dafb3bb59d8c.lyrics:
[crazy loud maniac laughter]hahahahaha(hahahaha)???
([hahahaha????????????????])
[loud crazy laughter]HEE-HEE-HEE!!!!(hee-hee-hee)!!!!
[Intro]
(whispered) "Yo... Yo... Wait, wait, wait—"
((Sudden explosion sound))
"AAAAAHHHHHH!! OKAY LET’S GO!!!"
[Verse 1]
Bing bang, flip-flop, runnin’ like a TikTok
Grandma in a jetpack, zoomin’ past a roadblock
Ayy! Chicken nugget, talkin’ in a French accent
[SFX: HONHONHON] "Bonjour, baguette!!"
*I’m in the stu with a cow and a goose* (MOO)
*Why is my voice goin’ high like a flute??!* (WHEEEE)
Did a backflip, landed on my left ear
Doctor said, "Sir, you need help," I said, "No fear!"
[Pre-Chorus]
((Manic laugh)) "HAHAHA!"
Bounce, bounce, bounce like a kangaroo’s house
Everybody lookin’ at me like I’m lost in a mouse!
((Echoed: "IN A MOUSE?!"))
Yeah, I meant what I said, don’t question my brain
My bars so insane they just called me a train—*CHOO CHOO!!*
[Chorus]
(Autotuned) **"I got five personalities and they ALL wanna fight!**
**One of them a cowboy, he just stole my bike!"**
((Gunshot sound)) "YEEHAW!"
**"The other one’s a robot, he be beepin’ all night!"**
((Robot voice: "BEEP BOP BEEP—I AM ERROR"))
[Verse 2]
OKAY! Walk in the store with a waffle in my pocket
Manager saw me, he scream, "Yo stop it!"
I said, "Sir, it’s my comfort waffle"
He said, "Bro what? You bout to cause a debacle"
Spit like a llama, my flow like a comet
I ate a CD now my voice sound robotic
((Glitched voice: "I AM... THE FUTURE... BZZT—"))
Jumped in the air, did a quadruple backflip
Landed on Mars, now I’m chillin’ with Patrick!
((SpongeBob voice: "Is mayonnaise an instrument?"))
[Bridge]
(Gigantic bass drop, entire beat glitches out)
((Suddenly whispered:))
"Have you ever licked a doorknob on purpose?"
((Beat slams back in—full chaos))
WOO! Runnin’ up a tree like a squirrel on a mission
Took a left turn and I woke up in a prison
Cellmate said, "Yo what you in for?"
I said, "I dunno, I was rappin' too hardcore"
[Glitch Breakdown]
((Beat slows down, voice gets all robotic and distorted))
"ERROR... SYSTEM FAILURE... BZZZZ—"
((Sudden pitch shift—voice super deep))
"THE WAFFLE OVERLORD HAS SPOKEN"
((Sudden chipmunk voice—squeaky fast rap))
"RAP-RAP-RAP-RAP-RAP YEEEHAW ZIP-ZOP ZAM!!"
[Outro]
(Ambient sound of cows mooing, then a loud explosion)
((Robot voice: "GOODBYE HUMANITY... SELF-DESTRUCT SEQUENCE IN 3... 2... 1..."))
*Beat suddenly cuts off mid-sentence.*

d3af4423-1440-4807-83e5-b688cf28d45d.name: Stars Keep Spinning (70s Psychedelic Rock)
d3af4423-1440-4807-83e5-b688cf28d45d.sound:
70s vibe Psychedelic, 
Warm, vintage analog production featuring classic instruments: electric guitar with mild fuzz and wah effects, Hammond organ with Leslie speaker, walking bass guitar, organic drum kit with vintage reverb, and occasional flute or Mellotron for texture. Slow tempo around 90 BPM with groovy, hypnotic rhythm. Vocals deep, male, slightly gritty with tape echo and natural analog chorus effects, delivering a brash but warm and soulful sound. Use only acoustic and electric instruments—no synths or electronic sounds—to create authentic 70s psychedelic atmosphere full of organic warmth and rich instrumental layers.
d3af4423-1440-4807-83e5-b688cf28d45d.lyrics:
[INTRO]
Stars above, they light the night (ahh)
Turning worlds with gentle light (oooh)
[vintage analog guitar arpeggio with warm tape delay, organ swell, soft natural room reverb]
[VERSE 1]
Someone gazes at the sky,
[deep, warm reverb on vocals, slight tape hiss]
Watching stars as they pass by,
[clean electric guitar with subtle fuzz]
Every spark a secret told,
[organic Hammond organ fills]
Whispers of a night so bold.
[slight vibrato on lead guitar harmonics]
[PRE-CHORUS 1]
And as the darkness falls, (falls)
[low, gritty vocal with tape echo]
The world begins to turn, (turn)
[snare rolls with warm vintage reverb]
Every night a story calls, (calls)
[bass guitar groove with natural slap tone]
In every star we learn.
[flute or Mellotron swell with natural delay]
[CHORUS]
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
[full vocal layering with analog chorus]
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
[wet guitar delay and subtle tape saturation]
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
[organ swell through Leslie speaker]
And every evening starts again tonight.
[smooth cymbal swell and organic percussion]
[VERSE 2]
Silent skies, a glowing dance,
[overdriven guitar riff with slow phaser]
Draw the dreamers in a trance,
[congas and bongos with natural room reverb]
Eyes reflect the endless space,
[soft acoustic guitar strums]
In their gaze, the world’s embrace.
[round, warm bass fills]
[PRE-CHORUS 2]
Hearts aligned with heaven's tune, (tune)
[vocals with mild phasing and tape delay]
Time’s a circle in this view, (view)
[slow organ swell]
Counting stars beneath the moon, (moon)
[Mellotron or flute with natural delay]
Night’s eternal rendezvous.
[ambient nature field recording, subtle]
[CHORUS]
(Repeat with fuller instrumentation and vocal harmonies)
[OUTRO]
So when you feel the stars above (above)
[vocals fading with tape echo and subtle breakup]
Know they’re turning all with love (with love)
[guitars and organ slowly fading with natural room reverb]
And every night when eyes arise,
The world keeps spinning ‘neath the skies.
[soft ambient outro with natural field sounds]

aa9454da-4899-497e-b97a-91a62ded2b28.name: Weightless (Variation)
aa9454da-4899-497e-b97a-91a62ded2b28.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
aa9454da-4899-497e-b97a-91a62ded2b28.lyrics:
[Soft ocean swell, light breeze, gentle synth pad fades in]

[Verse 1]
Took my shoes off where the sidewalk ends
Let the concrete cool what the day has penned
No emails buzzin’, no clock to chase
Just the rhythm of this quiet space

Saw a seagull float without a plan
Made me wonder — why do I hold so damn tight to sand?

[Pre-Chorus]
For once, I’m not buildin’
Just breathin’…
For once, I’m not fixin’
Just bein’…

[Chorus]
Weightless, for a minute
Let the world spin without me in it
Sky so wide, I disappear
But I’m finally… finally… here
(oh-oh, finally here)
(clap clap, just breathe)

[Verse 2]
Left my worries on a park bench seat
They’ll be waitin’ — but not right beneath my feet
Sunset paints the street in golden grace
And I don’t gotta earn this space

Sometimes freedom’s just a choice to pause
To let the current rewrite all the laws

[Pre-Chorus]
For once, I’m not chasin’
Just floatin’…
For once, I’m not racin’
Just knowin’…

[Chorus]
Weightless, for a minute
Let the world spin without me in it
Sky so wide, I disappear
But I’m finally… finally… here
(oh-oh, light as air)
(clap clap, nobody there)

[Bridge]
I know it won’t last —
The noise will call me back too fast
But even one deep breath, slow and true
Is a kind of victory… for me and you

[Chorus — softer, almost whispered]
Weightless… just a minute…
World can wait… I’m in it…
Sky holds me… soft and clear…
And I’m finally… finally… here
(oh… finally…)
(yeah… just here…)

[Outro]
Breathe in…
Breathe out…
Weightless…
(oh… just for now…)

8d70bedb-a7ab-4996-b085-f86685ee1865.name:
Westside Breeze
(conscious West Coast hip-hop with trap) (Cover)
8d70bedb-a7ab-4996-b085-f86685ee1865.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, brutal & emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes. 140 bpm
8d70bedb-a7ab-4996-b085-f86685ee1865.lyrics:
[Upbeat, sunlit intro with light piano motif and distant ocean waves]

[Verse 1]
Top down, sun high, no clouds in sight
Palm trees dancin’ in the golden light
Radio playin’ that old familiar sound
For a moment, I forget the weight I’ve found

[Pre-Chorus]
No map, just miles and open air
But even sunshine hides a silent care

[Chorus]
Westside breeze, lift me high
Blue sky kissin’ my eyes
Bassline groovin’, heart feels free
This is how summer’s meant to be!
(oh-ow, meant to be)
(clap clap)

[Verse 2]
Saw a kid laugh like he knew no pain
Made me wonder — when did I lose that flame?
Chasin’ dreams, but sometimes wonder why
If the finish line’s even worth the try
Friends say I’m fine — I say “Yeah, I’m good”
But the truth’s a current beneath the wood

[Pre-Chorus]
Still, the ocean’s wide, the sky’s still blue
Maybe healing starts with just pushin’ through

[Chorus]
Westside breeze, lift me high
Blue sky kissin’ my eyes
Bassline groovin’, heart feels free
This is how summer’s meant to be!
(oh-ow, still believe)
(clap clap)

[Bridge]
Yeah, the sun don’t judge — it just shines
On broken hearts and perfect lines
I’m not fixed, but I’m still here
With the wind, the doubt, the fear
And that’s okay

[Chorus]
Westside breeze, still lift me
Blue sky, still hold me
Bassline groovin’, quiet and slow
Maybe this is all I need to know
(oh, just let it be)
(yeah, Westside)

[Outro]
Breeze keeps blowin’
Me still growin’
Not perfect — but free
(oh… breeze…)

da8e1d86-98fa-4c94-aca4-40de7f1273a4.name: doesn’t sleep…
da8e1d86-98fa-4c94-aca4-40de7f1273a4.lyrics:
[vocal: deep male baritone, dry, close-mic, low-passed, slight tape saturation]
i walk the wire…
[bass: liquid analog pulse, E0–A1, 94 BPM]
[synth: Juno arpeggio, E minor, stereo swirl]
no fall…
just hum.
this city…
[bass swells, light distortion]
doesn’t sleep…
it watches.
i’m not silent…
[glitch: word “silent” stutters once]
i’m muted.
you hear static…
[vocal whisper-growl]
i hear the signal.
[fade: last word echoes in tape delay, synth swirls rise, then cut]

1a38788d-8c88-4b3a-a940-73bbae28e110.name: Echo Chamber
1a38788d-8c88-4b3a-a940-73bbae28e110.sound: dual male vocals: fast rhythmic rap verses with urgent tense delivery, clean melodic vulnerable tenor in choruses, haunting 4-note piano motif throughout, orchestral strings swelling in choruses, downtuned electric guitar power chords entering in final chorus, electronic scratches and glitch samples, live drums with double-kick and crisp snare, tempo 94 BPM, key B minor, dynamic arc from sparse intro to full climax, 2000s nu-metal alternative rock production, analog warmth with digital precision, stereo wide, themes futility effort repetition emotional exhaustion systemic pressure, structure intro verse pre-chorus chorus verse pre-chorus chorus outro
1a38788d-8c88-4b3a-a940-73bbae28e110.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[haunting piano motif (4 notes), vinyl crackle, subtle string pad]
[VERSE 1 — RAP]
[fast, rhythmic, tense delivery — not aggressive, but urgent]
I built a ladder outta broken plans,
climbed it blind with bloodied hands.
You watched me fall, rewound the tape—
said “Try again,” but changed the shape.
I speak in questions, you answer walls,
my voice just bounces, never calls.
I write in fire, you read in grey—
burn the page, then walk away.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[clean vocal enters, melodic, vulnerable]
I gave you time…
you gave me chains.
I gave you truth…
you called it pain.
[CHORUS]
[clean vocal: soaring, emotional, layered harmonies]
IT’S AN ECHO CHAMBER—
I SCREAM, BUT IT’S MY OWN VOICE!
EVERY STEP I TAKE
JUST BRINGS ME BACK TO NOISE!
I PUSH, I FALL, I BREAK, I BEND—
BUT NOTHING CHANGES IN THE END!
(bék-vocal: “in the end…” — soft, high harmony)
[VERSE 2 — RAP]
[even tighter flow, slight vocal fry, drums intensify]
You paint the future in perfect lines,
but blur the past when it don’t align.
I chase the light, it turns to shade,
another promise starts to fade.
I’m tired of running in reverse,
watching purpose turn to curse.
You say “just trust,” but trust is gone—
replaced by static, cold and long.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[clean vocal, strings swell]
I gave you hope…
you gave me dust.
I gave you all…
you said “not enough.”
[CHORUS]
[full arrangement: strings, piano, heavy guitars, electronic scratches]
IT’S AN ECHO CHAMBER—
I SCREAM, BUT IT’S MY OWN VOICE!
EVERY STEP I TAKE
JUST BRINGS ME BACK TO NOISE!
I PUSH, I FALL, I BREAK, I BEND—
BUT NOTHING CHANGES IN THE END!
(bék-vocal: “in the end…”)
[OUTRO]
[piano returns, clean vocal, exhausted]
[whispered]
…in the end…
[final piano note fades into silence]

7bca4927-24e7-4646-954e-7de4c015779f.name: Cosmic Vibes of 1973 (instrumental)
7bca4927-24e7-4646-954e-7de4c015779f.sound: psychedelic 70s, vintage synth, wah guitar, analog bass, mellow drums, phaser, reverb, delay, cosmic atmosphere, slow groove, vibrant colors, dreamy melodies
7bca4927-24e7-4646-954e-7de4c015779f.lyrics:
Floating deep in colors bright,
Echoes twist in purple light,
Whispers dance through time and space,
Lost within this cosmic place.
Spiral dreams like velvet haze,
Turning through mysterious ways,
Retro beats in slow embrace,
Feel the groove, the endless chase.

bd69305e-3e3a-4ab3-a65d-81026c60f995.name: (Più piano... aspetta...)
bd69305e-3e3a-4ab3-a65d-81026c60f995.sound: dark atmospheric r&b, male vocals with falsetto, haunting vocals, rain sounds, whisper vocals, synth-heavy, moody atmosphere, dreamy soundscapes, emotional depth, cinematic production
bd69305e-3e3a-4ab3-a65d-81026c60f995.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Più piano... aspetta...)
Sussurri da qualche parte, pioggia sul vetro
Gioco d'ombre dentro — sento tutto,
Taccio
[Verse 1]
Aspetto che la notte si sciolga tra le mani
Fumo leggero, appena — accarezzo il suono col respiro
Come un filo che guida, ma non muoverò un passo
Tutto deciderà uno sguardo, svanisco come un faro
(o-o-o)
Come piove nei sogni — di nuovo
Colpi attutiti, batte in ritmo
Tutte le linee scorrono dolci, lente e pigre
Non chiamo, osservo soltanto da qui
[Pre-Chorus]
Linee nascoste sotto la seta,
Città muta, e il respiro inzuppato
In questo mormorio — rischio dolcemente strano
Polso invisibile, mi chiama giù
(aspetta, aspetta)
[Chorus]
Ricordo il nostro momento (momento)
Il mio magnete silenzioso (magnete)
Nel respiro — aspetta,
fermati, non guardare
Ricordo il nostro momento (momento)
In questa pioggia — le mie
Ombre rimaste, ma il suono dice: aspetta, aspetta
[Bridge]
Tutti i contorni schiacciati,
come sale sulle labbra
La pausa dura,
suona come un gioco
Tutto ciò che è perso si sdoppia negli occhi
Dentro questo momento, come paura chiusa
(o-o-o)
[Chorus]
Ricordo il nostro momento (momento)
Il mio magnete silenzioso (magnete)
Nel respiro — aspetta, fermati, non guardare
Ricordo il nostro momento (momento)
In questa pioggia — le mie
Ombre rimaste, ma il suono dice: aspetta, aspetta
[Final Chorus]
Ricordo il nostro momento (momento)
In questa pioggia — le mie
Aspetta, aspetta, aspetta, aspetta, aspetta,
(aspetta, aspetta)
[Outro]
Resta tutto — solo suono, solo pioggia, solo momento
(o-o-o)
(aspetta, aspetta)

ef048701-2144-41bd-9113-bc2314ea39ac.name: Pratibimb (Reflections)
ef048701-2144-41bd-9113-bc2314ea39ac.sound: Bollywood-Emo Rap, atmospheric beats, deep bass, hindi vocals, ambient rain textures
ef048701-2144-41bd-9113-bc2314ea39ac.lyrics:
[Intro]
La la la... (Pratibimb...)
[Rain sounds fade in]
[Verse 1]
Tum chalte ho, main dekhti hoon
Paani mein aks tera
Kaun ho tum? Kahan chale?
Har kadam pe savera
[Chorus]
Har puddle mein ek kahani hai
(Kahani hai...)
Har aks mein koi anjani hai
(Anjani hai...)
Baarish mein tum dikhte ho
Par milte nahi, jaate ho
[Rain intensifies]
[Verse 2]
Ek maa ki chaal dekhi maine
Bachhe ko sambhaalti hui
Ek buzurg ka chehra dekha
Muskaan bikherti hui
[Pre-chorus]
Tum sab ke raaz
Main padh rahi
(Oh-oh... padh rahi)
[Chorus]
Har puddle mein ek kahani hai
(Kahani hai...)
Har aks mein koi anjani hai
(Anjani hai...)
Baarish mein tum dikhte ho
Par milte nahi, jaate ho
[Bridge]
Yeh sheher, yeh log
Yeh raaste, yeh mod
Main bas dekhti hoon
Tum sab ko door se
(La la la...)
[Final Chorus]
Har puddle mein ek kahani hai
(Kahani hai, oh kahani...)
Har aks mein koi anjani hai
