c37ace5d-f209-4ec7-bfbe-868b6b48cda8.name: and called it life…
c37ace5d-f209-4ec7-bfbe-868b6b48cda8.lyrics:
[VERSE]
[whispered, dry, close-mic — voice like gravel in a throat that hasn’t spoken in years]
you know…
[low-pass filter opens — 100Hz → 300Hz, 2s — as if the air itself is forgetting how to carry sound]
how rain smells…
[bit-crusher engages — 12-bit, 11kHz — the sound of a memory corrupted by time]
not like earth…
not like water…
but like the inside of a closed window…
after the last person left…
on glass…
[tape stop effect — 0.5s slowdown + pitch drop — like the moment before the power dies]
after midnight…
when the streetlights forget their names…
and the cars drive past like ghosts who don’t remember where they’re going…
[CHORUS]
[guitar and bass lock into tight groove — 92 BPM, mechanical, unyielding]
[vocal enters — 2 beats late, breath ragged, chest-heavy — deep, distorted, throat-splitting baritone, full vocal fry, no control, as if each word is pulled from bone]
i don’t want to be…
[distortion fades in — tube saturation, 5% — not warmth. the sound of a lung that learned to breathe static]
part of…
[drum machine cuts out — only bass remains, pulsing like a heart refusing to stop]
this city…
that taught me silence…
and called it peace…
that gave me screens…
and called it connection…
that fed me noise…
and called it life…
[OUTRO]
[music fades — only bass loop + distant city ambience, rain now heavy, steady, like a heartbeat without a body]
[vocal now processed through old phone filter — 300Hz–3.4kHz bandpass — as if speaking through a crack in the wall of a room that no longer exists]
can you hear…
[glitch: 17ms sample hold — repeats “breathe” as stutter — a digital echo of a breath that should’ve been the last]
how i…
[reverse reverb swells — 1.2s, then cuts abruptly — like the moment the machine decides you’re no longer needed]
breathe…?
[long pause — 3.7s — rain continues, slow, patient]
…
[one final whisper, barely audible, as if the voice is now coming from the walls]
…
i’m still here.

3a1a800a-406a-47e3-93c9-e12829717414.name: Mirror Confession (Variation)
3a1a800a-406a-47e3-93c9-e12829717414.sound: Male baritone only—whispered verses, dry spoken-word choruses with a subtle, slightly delayed whisper echo (as if reflection answering). Rhythm from organic sounds: breath on mirror, water droplets sliding down glass, finger tracing fog, soft cloth wipe. No instruments, no reverb, no electronic effects. Only analog tape saturation, light vinyl crackle, and natural room tone. Tempo: 78 BPM. Mood: introspective, dualistic, quietly haunting. Style: 1975 Los Angeles bathroom at 4 AM, voice in dialogue with its own ghost, mirror as confessional booth.
3a1a800a-406a-47e3-93c9-e12829717414.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[slow breath fogs mirror — deep, warm]
[water droplet slides down glass — *plink*]
[whispered, to reflection]
…you first…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, synced to droplet rhythm]
You never blink.
I do.
That’s how I know you’re not me—
you’re the part that stayed behind
when I walked out that door
and never came back.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[finger draws a line through fog on glass]
You remember her voice.
I only remember the silence after.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, dry baritone — then immediately echoed by a slightly delayed whisper]
I ask: *“Do you still love her?”*
You answer: *“…do you?”*
I ask: *“Why didn’t we say it?”*
You answer: *“…why didn’t you?”*
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, closer, with wet breath]
Sometimes I wipe the glass clean—
just to see your face clearly.
But you look tired.
Like you’ve been waiting
longer than I have.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[second droplet — slower]
You hold the truth.
I hold the lie.
We both live here.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word + delayed whisper, same as before]
I ask: *“Do you still love her?”*
You answer: *“…do you?”*
I ask: *“Why didn’t we say it?”*
You answer: *“…why didn’t you?”*
[POST-CHORUS]
[two whispers overlapping, slightly out of phase]
…do you…
…do you…
…why didn’t…
…why didn’t…
[mirror wiped clean — soft cloth sound]
[OUTRO]
[long silence — then one final breath fogs the glass again]
[whispered, fading]
…your turn…
[3 seconds of dripping water, then tape stop]

8e591f7d-89c4-416e-bc87-aad145ecd28e.name: Iron Dawn
8e591f7d-89c4-416e-bc87-aad145ecd28e.sound: retro chillwave with dreamy synths, cloud rap with atmospheric vocals, ethereal vocal samples
8e591f7d-89c4-416e-bc87-aad145ecd28e.lyrics:
Куплет 1:
Уже все чуяли грозу.
Уже все знали что-то.
Знали,
Что не напрасно, знать, везут
Солдаты черепах из стали.
Куплет 2:
Тревога в воздухе витала,
Как будто мир застыл в огне.
И каждый чувствовал, что мало
Осталось времени в войне.
Куплет 3:
Над городом туман клубился,
И ветер пел свою печаль.
Народ в смятении молился,
Чтоб не пришла кровавая даль.
Припев:
И началось…
Метнулись взоры,
Войной гражданскою горя,
И дымом пушечным с "Авроры"
Взошла железная заря.
Куплет 4:
И в сердце каждого тревога
Горела ярко, как костер.
Судьба народа и порога
Решалась в этот страшный спор.
Припев:
И началось…
Метнулись взоры,
Войной гражданскою горя,
И дымом пушечным с "Авроры"
Взошла железная заря.
Припев (повтор):
И началось…
Метнулись взоры,
Войной гражданскою горя,
И дымом пушечным с "Авроры"
Взошла железная заря.
Припев (повтор):
И началось…
Метнулись взоры,
Войной гражданскою горя,
И дымом пушечным с "Авроры"
Взошла железная заря.

8dcdf2f6-7d97-4748-a70d-f3b23d4afa60.name:
Midnight Reverie (Modern Psychedelic Reimagining)
 (Variation)
8dcdf2f6-7d97-4748-a70d-f3b23d4afa60.sound: modern psychedelic, ambient evolving synth pads, processed deep male vocal whisper with granular delay and distortion, filtered wah guitar samples with glitch effects, deep sub-bass, intricate electronic percussion, modulated organ drones with sidechain compression, multi-layered harmonized male vocals with granular reverb and tape delay effects, vinyl crackle textures blended with granular synthesis, lush spacious reverb and delay trails, tempo 95 BPM, mood: futuristic psychedelic, immersive, textured, nocturnal, blending vintage vibes with cutting-edge sound design and production techniques
8dcdf2f6-7d97-4748-a70d-f3b23d4afa60.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[ambient synth pads with evolving textures — 95 BPM]
[deep processed male whisper with layered distortion and granular delay]
Whispers intertwine with neon dreams...
[VERSE 1]
[filtered wah guitar samples with rhythmic glitching]
Shadows pulse on shifting walls,
Echoes weave digital calls,
Time bends in textured streams,
Wrapped in synthetic vinyl dreams.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[modulated organ drones with subtle sidechain and reverb automation]
Silent beats and drifting tones,
Underneath synthetic moans,
[CHORUS]
[deep sub-bass, complex glitch percussion, electronic brushed snares]
Flowing through electric night,
Feel the pulse, vibrant light.
[POST-CHORUS]
[multi-layered harmonized male vocals, heavily effected with granular reverb and tape delay]
Reverie,
Fading free.
[OUTRO]
[vinyl crackle textures mixed with modern granular synthesis fades]
[synth layers dissolve into lush reverb and delay trails]
Until dawn breaks...
[digital record scratch, reversing sample fades]

f10ffdc1-a861-4d88-97de-c610cf485cff.name: Drift
f10ffdc1-a861-4d88-97de-c610cf485cff.sound: Trip-hop, 75 BPM, nature ambiance, minimal drums, vinyl crackle, forest rain
f10ffdc1-a861-4d88-97de-c610cf485cff.lyrics:
[Vinyl crackle / gentle thunder]
[Verse 1]
hold out your hand, cold drip
settle in slow—bare skin, mist
exhale, drift (la, la, oh)
ribboned air, eyes half-lit
I hear you breathing in the small gaps
[Chorus]
time slows down, between the raindrops
your voice colors the hush (ooh-oh)
let me wait, let me stay
[Verse 2]
nothing moves, but ripple makes pause
half a thought, not quite lost
space between heartbeats, turn—unwind
(la-la, oh, la)
drawn out, just a little left behind
[Breakdown]
mmm-mmmm, oh
[Thunder rumbles, vinyl static]
oh, la, ah-ah
so still, so wide
[Pre-chorus]
words don’t land—just hang, dissolve
you blink slow—so do I
quiet is silver, soft as fog
slips through my hands, again-gone
[Bridge]
deluge—pause—hold
skin—wave—fold
sigh—leave—tone
[breath, breath, ahhhh]
[Chorus]
time slows down, between the raindrops
your voice colors the hush (ooh-oh)
let me stay, never run
oh, la, la, la, la
[soft distant thunder, river flowing, vinyl pops]

ff22dbb6-6fbe-483b-80b3-6116ddc62b39.name: Midnight Rails
ff22dbb6-6fbe-483b-80b3-6116ddc62b39.sound: Lo-fi fusion, jungle breakbeats, melancholic jazz, deep sub bass, urban atmosphere
ff22dbb6-6fbe-483b-80b3-6116ddc62b39.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Empty car swayin'
Just me and these thoughts again
Fluorescent flicker above
Ain't got nowhere to be
[Pre-chorus]
Time slips by like stations in the night
(Ooh, passing by, passing by)
[Chorus]
Midnight rails keep moving
While my mind stays still
Midnight rails keep moving
(But I'm frozen, frozen here)
[Verse 2]
Phone's dead, no signal
Reflection in the window pane
Someone's old paper
Dancing cross the floor
[Bridge]
[Sax Solo]
(Mmmm... yeah...)
Between the spaces
Between the faces
Between what was and could be
(Ooh, could be...)
[Verse 3]
Next stop, nobody
Rain starts tapping glass
Memory hits me sudden
'bout when we used to ride these lines
[Chorus]
Midnight rails keep moving
While my mind stays still
Midnight rails keep moving
(But I'm frozen, frozen here)
[Outro]
[Cello & Sax interlude]
(Ooh... way down deep...)
Last stop approaching
But I might just stay
Ride this line forever
Till these thoughts fade away

9a288d3d-8d6f-4310-a560-eb7ec7208f86.name: Urban Symphony
9a288d3d-8d6f-4310-a560-eb7ec7208f86.sound: Gangsta rap, dark orchestral cello, gritty 808 bass, urban atmospherics, 90-110 BPM
9a288d3d-8d6f-4310-a560-eb7ec7208f86.lyrics:
[Deep cello intro with 808 bass]
[Verse 1]
On the corner where I stand, yeah I understand
How the rhythm of the block makes a man who I am
Some might call it noise, but I recognize
Every sound got a purpose, every move got a price
Been here since day one, watching patterns flow
Like a maestro conducting what they'll never know
(They'll never know, never know...)
[Hook]
Every block got a melody
Every corner tells a story
Every block got a melody
(Got that symphony, got that harmony)
Every block got a melody
Every corner tells a story
Listen close and you might hear me
(Hear the symphony, feel the harmony)
[Verse 2]
Raw and uncut, that's how we move tonight
Deep bass rumbling like thunder, we do it right
Watch how I orchestrate, calculate, navigate
Through these streets that resonate, yeah we elevate
Been studying the score since I was just a kid
Learning every movement like a prodigy did
(Like a prodigy did...)
[Bridge - with prominent cello solo]
Ayy-yo-lay-oh, sum-day-oh
(Repeat x5 with layered vocals)
[Cello crescendo]
[Verse 3]
They think it's just noise but it's composition
Every step I take is with precision
Like classical arrangements in these veins
Street professor teaching different refrains
Watch how we conduct ourselves with pride
Creating masterpieces as we ride
(As we ride...)
[Final Hook - intense]
Every block got a melody
Every corner tells a story
Every block got a melody
(Got that symphony, got that harmony)
Every block got a melody
Every corner tells a story
Listen close and you might hear me
(Hear the symphony, feel the harmony)
[Outro - spoken with cello]
The streets keep playing their song
And I keep conducting along...
[Fade out with cello and 808s]

8485b0ce-c103-4fb0-9b49-6d15801ac72b.name: Phool Aur Leher (Flowers and Waves)
8485b0ce-c103-4fb0-9b49-6d15801ac72b.sound: Hindi emo trap fusion, lo-fi beats, dramatic female vocals, deep bass, atmospheric
8485b0ce-c103-4fb0-9b49-6d15801ac72b.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Shaam ki lori mein
Main kho gayi thi
Teri leher mein
Ab so gayi thi
(So gayi, so gayi)
[Chorus]
Har phool ke saath, ek yaad behti hai
(Yaad behti, behti jaaye)
Kal ka bojh aaj halka ho jaata hai
(Ho jaata, jaata hai)
[Verse 2]
Patjhad ke mausam mein
Patte girte hain
Jaise mere dil se
Yaadein bikhrti hain
(Bikhrti, bikhrti)
[Chorus]
Har phool ke saath, ek yaad behti hai
(Yaad behti, behti jaaye)
Kal ka bojh aaj halka ho jaata hai
(Ho jaata, jaata hai)
[Bridge]
Tu bhi badhti hai
Main bhi badhti hoon
[Deep bass harmonies]
Tere saath mein
Aage badhti hoon
(Badhti hoon, badhti jaaun)
[Pre-chorus]
Pal pal mein dhundti
Apne aap ko
Tere bahav mein
Mil jaati hoon
[Chorus]
Har phool ke saath, ek yaad behti hai
(Yaad behti, behti jaaye)
Kal ka bojh aaj halka ho jaata hai
(Ho jaata, jaata hai)
[Outro]
Main badal gayi
Tu wahi hai
(Wahi hai, wahi hai)
[Lo-fi fade out]

391e7585-432f-451c-82b7-2dfa5346107b.name: Static Lullaby (Variation)
391e7585-432f-451c-82b7-2dfa5346107b.sound: Male baritone only—whispered verses, dry spoken-word choruses, raw and intimate. Rhythm and texture from organic found sounds: breath on glass, dripping faucet, floorboard creaks, hand wiping condensation. No instruments, no electronic sounds, no reverb, no digital effects. Only analog tape saturation, subtle wow/flutter, and light vinyl crackle. Tempo: 84 BPM. Mood: introspective, spectral, ritualistic solitude. Style: 1975 Los Angeles late-night domestic session, voice as both speaker and echo, silence as active presence.
391e7585-432f-451c-82b7-2dfa5346107b.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[slow breath fogs cold glass — once]
[distant drip from bathroom faucet]
[whispered, lips close to glass]
…do you hear me in the walls?…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, rhythmic with drip at 84 BPM]
I talk to the hallway after midnight—
just to hear my voice come back
a half-second late.
Sometimes it sounds like you.
Sometimes it sounds like nothing.
I prefer nothing.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[hand wipes fog off glass — slow scrape]
The mirror doesn’t blink.
But it listens.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, low baritone, dry, chest-resonant]
This is my lullaby:
breath, echo, and a name that sticks
to the back of my throat.
I speak to the silence—
and the silence speaks back
in my own voice.
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, closer, with audible swallow]
Last night I said your name
in the empty bathtub.
The tiles gave it back
softer, slower—
like you were underwater.
I said it again.
And again.
Until it meant nothing.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[footstep on creaky floorboard — once]
No one’s there.
But the house remembers.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, same tone, slight tape wobble]
This is my lullaby:
breath, echo, and a name that sticks
to the back of my throat.
I speak to the silence—
and the silence speaks back
in my own voice.
[POST-CHORUS]
[layered whispers, slightly delayed — as if bouncing off walls]
Breath…
Echo…
Name…
[long exhale fades into drip]
[OUTRO]
[drip continues — then stops abruptly]
[final whisper]
…still talking…
[3 seconds of absolute silence, then tape stop click]

42af0a77-0c53-4168-b6d0-b0401f2f16ba.name: When The Lights Burn Out
42af0a77-0c53-4168-b6d0-b0401f2f16ba.sound: Rap-metal, aggressive nu-metal drums, 90s guitar riffs, raw bass, acoustic breakdowns
42af0a77-0c53-4168-b6d0-b0401f2f16ba.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Standing at the edge of what I know
Watching as familiar faces come and go
Every street sign points a different way
Everything I built just slips away
Time keeps moving but I'm standing still
Trying to climb but I'm rolling down this hill
Looking for direction in the dark
Left behind just like a question mark
[Chorus]
Where do we go when the lights burn out?
When everything we know turns inside out
What remains when the flame dies down?
Are we lost or are we finally found?
[Post-chorus]
Inside out, burning down
Finally found, hitting ground
(Where do we go now?)
(Where do we go?)
[Verse 2]
Walls I built are breaking day by day
Maps I drew keep leading me astray
Every answer brings another doubt
Can't tell what's in from what's without
Racing forward to escape the past
Building bridges that were meant to last
Now I'm caught between the then and now
Searching for the where but don't know how
[Chorus]
Where do we go when the lights burn out?
When everything we know turns inside out
What remains when the flame dies down?
Are we lost or are we finally found?
[Breakdown]
[Acoustic guitar]
Sometimes I wonder if I'm still the same
If the world changed or if I'm the one to blame
Standing in between what was and what will be
Looking for a light I used to see
[Final Chorus]
Where do we go when the lights burn out?
When everything we know turns inside out
What remains when the flame dies down?
Are we lost or are we finally found?
[Post-chorus]
Inside out, burning down
Finally found, hitting ground
(Where do we go now?)
(Where do we go?)

11ef737d-0355-4207-b3b7-6115b7456b26.name: Paradise Lost
11ef737d-0355-4207-b3b7-6115b7456b26.sound: avant-garde experimental soundscapes, hypnotic, droning shoegaze singer, vintage western swing with jazz elements, female singer
11ef737d-0355-4207-b3b7-6115b7456b26.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
С утра рассвет рисует блики на воде
В бокале тает лёд, я снова не в себе
Открытка для друзей - "Я в райском уголке"
А счастье, как всегда, от берега вдалеке
[Pre-chorus]
Банкноты на ветру
Коктейли до утра
Но что-то я никак не чувствую добра
[Chorus]
Рай не лечит, не спасает
Рука устала поднимать бокал
Рай не лечит, забывает
Что я хотела, о чём мечтала
[Verse 2]
Плыву с утра, где черепахи не спешат
Они мудрее нас - им точно есть что терять
На завтрак ананас и свежий кокос
А в горле ком непрошенных слёз
[Pre-chorus]
Всё то, что я хочу
Доступно на раз-два
Но сердце не стучит, как билось раньше да
[Chorus]
Рай не лечит, не спасает
Рука устала поднимать бокал
Рай не лечит, забывает
Что я хотела, о чём мечтала
[Rap]
Частный самолёт, белый песок под ногами
Вилла у воды, утро встречаю с духами
Шелест пальм вокруг, всё как в картинках красивых
Только пустота внутри не лечится силой
Платье от кутюр, туфли из новой коллекции
Но не заглушить дорогим шампанским рефлексий
Все завидуют мне, шлют сердечки, лайки
А я тону в тоске посреди этой сказки
[Bridge]
В океане тишины
Я ищу свои следы
Может быть на глубине
Я найду ответ себе
[Chorus]
Рай не лечит, не спасает
Рука устала поднимать бокал
Рай не лечит, забывает
Что я хотела, о чём мечтала
[Outro]
Рука устала... (устала...)
В раю пустом... (пустом...)
[Звук волн затихает]

9198b8ed-7c20-43b0-9ec4-3d29557e07bb.name: Westside Breeze
9198b8ed-7c20-43b0-9ec4-3d29557e07bb.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
9198b8ed-7c20-43b0-9ec4-3d29557e07bb.lyrics:
[Upbeat, sunlit intro with light piano motif and distant ocean waves]

[Verse 1]
Top down, sun high, no clouds in sight
Palm trees dancin’ in the golden light
Radio playin’ that old familiar sound
For a moment, I forget the weight I’ve found

[Pre-Chorus]
No map, just miles and open air
But even sunshine hides a silent care

[Chorus]
Westside breeze, lift me high
Blue sky kissin’ my eyes
Bassline groovin’, heart feels free
This is how summer’s meant to be!
(oh-ow, meant to be)
(clap clap)

[Verse 2]
Saw a kid laugh like he knew no pain
Made me wonder — when did I lose that flame?
Chasin’ dreams, but sometimes wonder why
If the finish line’s even worth the try
Friends say I’m fine — I say “Yeah, I’m good”
But the truth’s a current beneath the wood

[Pre-Chorus]
Still, the ocean’s wide, the sky’s still blue
Maybe healing starts with just pushin’ through

[Chorus]
Westside breeze, lift me high
Blue sky kissin’ my eyes
Bassline groovin’, heart feels free
This is how summer’s meant to be!
(oh-ow, still believe)
(clap clap)

[Bridge]
Yeah, the sun don’t judge — it just shines
On broken hearts and perfect lines
I’m not fixed, but I’m still here
With the wind, the doubt, the fear
And that’s okay

[Chorus]
Westside breeze, still lift me
Blue sky, still hold me
Bassline groovin’, quiet and slow
Maybe this is all I need to know
(oh, just let it be)
(yeah, Westside)

[Outro]
Breeze keeps blowin’
Me still growin’
Not perfect — but free
(oh… breeze…)

7ca8d0a4-4112-4b92-856c-58284031d470.name: Stars Keep Spinning (Trap-Soul Contemporary)
7ca8d0a4-4112-4b92-856c-58284031d470.sound:
Trap-Soul Contemporary Musical:  
Modern trap-soul production with smooth atmospheric synth pads, lush 808 sub bass, and soft lo-fi textures. Beat features crisp trap hi-hats with triplet rolls, snappy snares, and subtle snap percussion. Vocals are intimate with tasteful autotune and layered harmonies, including pitch modulation and vocal chops for rhythmic interest. Effects include gated reverbs, 1/8 note rhythmic delays, shimmer reverbs, tape stop transitions, and subtle vinyl crackle for warmth. Tempo around 70-75 BPM, designed for emotional, moody yet catchy soundscapes ideal for current mainstream radio and streaming playlists.
7ca8d0a4-4112-4b92-856c-58284031d470.lyrics:
[INTRO]
Stars above, they light the night (ah)
Turning worlds with gentle light (yeah)
[smooth atmospheric synth pads with subtle 808 sub bass swell, soft vinyl crackle]
[VERSE 1]
Someone gazes at the sky,
[intimate vocals with deep autotune, subtle pitch correction]
Watching stars as they pass by,
[lo-fi filtered keys with gentle reverb]
Every spark a secret told,
[light vocal chop backing layer]
Whispers of a night so bold.
[soft delay with filtered tremolo]
[PRE-CHORUS 1]
And as the darkness falls, (falls)
[gated reverb stutter with pitch modulation on “falls”]
The world begins to turn, (turn)
[vocal layering with slight doubling]
Every night a story calls, (calls)
[1/8 note rhythmic delay with vinyl wow effect]
In every star we learn.
[smooth pad swell with reverse reverb transition]
[CHORUS]
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
[wide stereo delay, soft harmonic chorus]
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
[vocal chops syncopated with trap hi-hat rolls]
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
[saturated reverb and long tail delay]
And every evening starts again tonight.
[soft 808 glides with shimmer effects]
[VERSE 2]
Silent skies, a glowing dance,
[filtered Rhodes piano with soft tremolo]
Draw the dreamers in a trance,
[subtle trap hi-hats and snap beats]
Eyes reflect the endless space,
[vocal doubling with phaser]
In their gaze, the world’s embrace.
[smooth 808 bass glides]
[PRE-CHORUS 2]
Hearts aligned with heaven's tune, (tune)
[vocal stereo panning with airy delay]
Time’s a circle in this view, (view)
[shimmer reverb with tape stop transition]
Counting stars beneath the moon, (moon)
[ambient pad swell]
Night’s eternal rendezvous.
[fade out with reverse shimmer]
[CHORUS]
(Repeat with expanded 808 layers and increased vocal harmony)
[OUTRO]
So when you feel the stars above (above)
[deep autotune fade with granular delay]
Know they’re turning all with love (with love)
[soft vinyl crackle and ambient texture fade]
And every night when eyes arise,
The world keeps spinning ‘neath the skies.
[subtle pad and 808 bass dissolve]

eb29779a-75a8-4f07-9931-142f237b741f.name: Static Hymn (Variation)
eb29779a-75a8-4f07-9931-142f237b741f.sound: Male baritone only — whispered verses, raw full-voice choruses with natural rasp. Backing vocals: two male voices in low harmonies (minor thirds), drenched in analog tape echo. Instruments: hypnotic overdriven bassline (C minor, repetitive), Fender Rhodes (melodic motifs, heavy tape echo), Vox organ (drones only, no vibrato), dry toms (quarter notes), light wooden percussion. Tempo: 98 BPM. No strings, no wah-wah, no drum kit, no reverb, no digital effects. Only analog tape saturation, light wow/flutter, vinyl crackle. Mood: ritualistic, nocturnal, emotionally raw. Style: 1975 Los Angeles underground — psychedelic soul stripped to its bones: voice, bass, echo, and rain. Catchy chorus built on repetition and emotional weight, not melody alone.
eb29779a-75a8-4f07-9931-142f237b741f.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[hypnotic bassline enters — C minor, repetitive, slightly overdriven]
[Fender Rhodes: three-note motif, drenched in single-repeat tape echo]
[Vox organ: low drone, no chords]
[toms play quarter notes — dry, close]
[MAN — whispered, rhythmic]
…again…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, tight to bass groove]
I burned your last letter
in a coffee can on the fire escape—
watched the ash rise
like black snow.
The wind took your name
and spelled it on my window…
I didn’t wipe it off.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[organ swells slightly, Rhodes echoes vocal phrase]
The streetlights hum
your lullaby…
[CHORUS]
[full baritone — raw, chesty, emotionally strained]
This is my hymn:
ash, rain, and the shape of your voice
in the static between seconds.
I don’t pray—
I pulse.
And the night pulses back.
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, bass walks down chromatically]
I wear your silence
like a coat with no buttons—
it flaps open
in every hallway.
The neighbors nod
like they know you’re gone…
but their eyes say *“still here.”*
[PRE-CHORUS]
[Rhodes plays dissonant cluster — G over C minor]
The clock’s got feathers.
Time’s bleeding.
[CHORUS]
[full baritone, more intense, harmonies enter — two male voices, low thirds]
This is my hymn:
ash, rain, and the shape of your voice
in the static between seconds.
I don’t pray—
I pulse.
And the night pulses back.
[BRIDGE – TRANCE]
[instruments lock into loop — bass + toms + organ drone]
[lead vocal: half-chanted, drenched in tape echo]
…pulse…
…static…
…hymn…
[backing vocals: wordless “ahh-ehh” — panned, decaying]
[FINAL CHORUS]
[full intensity — Rhodes soars with simple melodic phrase, no virtuosity]
[lead vocal: almost shouting, but controlled]
This is my hymn:
ash, rain, and the shape of your voice
in the static between seconds.
I don’t pray—
I pulse.
And the night…
pulses…
back…
[OUTRO]
[instruments fade — bass last to go]
[tape echo repeats “back…” three times]
[rain begins softly]
[tape stop click]

f1fce3bb-1c70-4df0-bca2-124d8765ada1.name: Ethereal Shadows
f1fce3bb-1c70-4df0-bca2-124d8765ada1.sound: psychedelic 70s, vintage synth, wah guitar, analog bass, brushed drums, phaser, reverb, delay, cosmic atmosphere, steady groove 88 BPM, male lead vocal: raw baritone — whispered verses, gritty full-voice choruses, warm analog saturation, backing vocals: close harmony male voices, whispered with tape echo, instruments: warm electric piano, muted acoustic guitar, upright bass, organ swells, analog tape effects, vinyl crackle, mood: psychedelic, ritualistic, nocturnal, surreal
f1fce3bb-1c70-4df0-bca2-124d8765ada1.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[vintage synth pad — smooth, 88 BPM]
[deep, gritty male whisper — textured, warm analog saturation]
Enter the realm unseen...
[VERSE 1]
[wah guitar rhythmic plucks]
Shifting shapes behind the haze,
Ghostly lights in velvet maze,
Time dissolves in silent streams,
Caught within our waking dreams.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[organ swells with phaser]
Veil of night, a whispered song,
Echoes linger, drifting long,
[CHORUS]
[deep bass groove, brushed drums steady]
Flowing through the cosmic tide,
Feel the pulse, the shifting ride.
[POST-CHORUS]
[harmonized backing vocals, reverb-heavy]
Ethereal,
Shadows fall.
[OUTRO]
[synth fades with delay]
The dream unfolds...
Until anew...

485f5a99-f2cc-4bc1-89d4-13ebc63005ff.name: Between
485f5a99-f2cc-4bc1-89d4-13ebc63005ff.sound: Trip-hop, cinematic cello lead, slow beats, French vocals, whispered layers, noir atmosphere
485f5a99-f2cc-4bc1-89d4-13ebc63005ff.lyrics:
[Intro - Instrumental with whispered vocals]
(Waiting... waiting...)
[Verse 1]
[Instrumental with cello lead]
[Pre-chorus 1]
Rain against the window pane
Time moves like winter snow
Empty streets down below
Morning feels so far away
[Chorus 1]
The hours hold their breath
In this quiet space
My heart keeps its pace
Till the sun breaks through
(Till the sun breaks through)
Each minute feels new
[Musical Interlude - Saxophone & Cello]
[Verse 2]
[Instrumental with saxophone lead]
[Pre-chorus 2]
Paper cups and coffee cold
Counting every star
Phone screen in the dark
Pictures from long ago
[Chorus 2]
The night holds its peace
In this gentle room
Dawn is coming soon
Through the curtains thin
(Through the curtains thin)
Let the light begin
[Bridge]
First train starts to run
Early birds take flight
Streetlamps fade to none
World returns to light
[Breakdown]
Still I'm here
Between then and now
Still I'm here
Between sleep and sound
[Outro]
(Waiting... almost there...)
[Fade out with cello and whispered vocals]

2047c233-79a4-4da8-82a0-5a51369f2db5.name: Digital Memory
2047c233-79a4-4da8-82a0-5a51369f2db5.sound: Dark electronic R&B, ethereal female vocals, deep 808s, industrial beats, dreamy synths
2047c233-79a4-4da8-82a0-5a51369f2db5.lyrics:
[Intro]
Scrolling back to twenty-twenty
Screen light in the dark
Double tap, scroll up, tap again
Who was I back then?
[Verse 1]
Profile pics from another time
Peace signs and fake smiles
Hair a different shade
Friends I never see
Tagged locations I forgot existed
Living life through filters
[Chorus]
Don't even recognize that girl anymore
Looking at these pictures but they feel so far
Don't even recognize that girl anymore
Who did I think I was trying to be back then?
[Verse 2]
Comments fading into static
Old captions make me cringe
Throwback posts hit different now
Changed my whole aesthetic
Deleted half my feed last night
Can't relate to my old life
[Breakdown]
[808 bass intensifies]
Scroll, tap, delete
Scroll, tap, delete
(Who even was she?)
Double tap to unlike
Everything before
(Let it all go)
[Bridge]
Time stamps tell their own story
Years compressed in megabytes
Profile to profile
Version after version of me
[Chorus]
Don't even recognize that girl anymore
Looking at these pictures but they feel so far
Don't even recognize that girl anymore
(But maybe that's okay)
Don't even recognize that girl anymore
(I like who I am today)

5fdced92-f92a-43de-8b47-7518aa1b73f3.name: La Couronne (The Crown)
5fdced92-f92a-43de-8b47-7518aa1b73f3.sound: French trap hip-hop, booming 808s, aggressive female rap, dynamic delivery
5fdced92-f92a-43de-8b47-7518aa1b73f3.lyrics:
[Intro]
Tu me regardes maintenant
Comme si j'étais différente
(Différente, différente)
Le prix du pouvoir
[808 bass drop]
[Verse 1]
Dans les rues de Paris
Les gens me saluent
Ils ne savent pas
Ce que ça coûte
Chaque pas que je fais
Résonne dans mon âme
Tu vois l'or sur ma tête?
Il brûle comme une flamme
[Chorus]
La couronne pèse mais je reste debout
(Debout, debout)
Les yeux fixés vers le haut, jusqu'au bout
La couronne pèse mais je garde ma force
(Ma force, ma force)
C'est mon destin, je trace ma route
[Verse 2]
Les pierres sont lourdes
Sur mes épaules ce soir
Mon royaume grandit
Mais je perds mon histoire
Chaque victoire gagnée
Laisse une cicatrice
Le pouvoir m'appelle
Mais à quel prix?
[Pre-chorus]
Je sens le poids
De leurs attentes
Chaque jour plus fort
Mais je chante
[Chorus]
La couronne pèse mais je reste debout
(Debout, debout)
Les yeux fixés vers le haut, jusqu'au bout
La couronne pèse mais je garde ma force
(Ma force, ma force)
C'est mon destin, je trace ma route
[Bridge]
Ils pensent me connaître
Mais c'est juste la surface
Le métal est froid
Sur ma peau de glace
[808 intensifies]
[Final Chorus]
La couronne pèse mais je reste debout
(Plus forte que jamais)
Les yeux fixés vers le haut, jusqu'au bout
(Jusqu'au bout, au bout)
La couronne pèse mais je garde ma force
(Je garde ma force)
C'est mon destin, je trace ma route
(Ma route, ma route)

444bbcdd-a206-47ae-9221-ab1a6acb32a3.name: Porch Light Ghost (Variation)
444bbcdd-a206-47ae-9221-ab1a6acb32a3.sound: Male baritone only—whispered verses, dry spoken-word choruses, intimate and raw. Rhythm from organic porch sounds: flickering light relay clicks, rain on roof and wood, creaking steps, distant thunder. No instruments, no reverb, no digital effects. Only analog tape saturation, subtle wow/flutter, and light vinyl crackle. Tempo: 72 BPM. Mood: nocturnal, devotional, quietly spectral. Style: 1975 Los Angeles backyard at night, voice as ritual keeper, porch as altar.
444bbcdd-a206-47ae-9221-ab1a6acb32a3.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[porch light flickers on — soft electrical *click*]
[wooden step creaks under weight]
[rain falls lightly on roof]
[whispered, to the empty yard]
…you’d like this rain…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, synced to raindrops]
I leave the light on past 3 AM—
not for you.
For the shape you left
in the wet wood of this step.
I sit in it.
It’s still warm.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[light flickers — *click… click…*]
The bulb’s dying.
So am I.
But we keep glowing.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, low baritone, dry and steady]
This light’s not a signal.
It’s a memory with a switch.
I turn it on—
and for a second,
you’re standing in the yard
shaking rain off your coat.
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, breath visible in cold air]
Last week, a stray cat sat here
in your exact spot.
I didn’t shoo it away.
I poured milk in a chipped bowl
and called it by your name.
It didn’t answer.
But it stayed.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[wood creaks as he shifts weight]
The rain knows your footsteps.
It stops when you’re near.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, same tone, slight tape saturation]
This light’s not a signal.
It’s a memory with a switch.
I turn it on—
and for a second,
you’re standing in the yard
shaking rain off your coat.
[POST-CHORUS]
[whispers layered, fading]
…coat…
…rain…
…stay…
[light flickers rapidly — then steadies]
[OUTRO]
[light clicks off]
[rain continues alone]
[final whisper]
…goodnight…
[8 seconds of rain on wood and metal, then tape stop]

d1b05143-426e-4c87-8c1d-65d51e8798f5.name: Crystal Walls
d1b05143-426e-4c87-8c1d-65d51e8798f5.sound: Hip-hop, trip beats, smooth female vocals, cello & piano instrumentals, 808s, reverb
d1b05143-426e-4c87-8c1d-65d51e8798f5.lyrics:
[Intro - Instrumental with Piano & Cello]
(Ooh... ah...)
[Pre-chorus 1]
Built these walls so high and clear
Every breath shows right through
Can't pretend I'm not here
When you see what I do
[Chorus]
See right through me, but you can't touch me
Built from crystal, still you can't touch me
(See through, see through)
These fragile walls are bulletproof
(Can't break, can't break)
[Verse 1 - Instrumental]
(La-da-da... mmm...)
[808s intensify]
[Pre-chorus 2]
Every crack tells a truth
Every surface reflects
Built this space just for you
Now watch what comes next
[Chorus]
See right through me, but you can't touch me
Built from crystal, still you can't touch me
(See through, see through)
These fragile walls are bulletproof
(Can't break, can't break)
[Bridge]
Transparent doesn't mean weak
I let you look but not reach
Standing strong in plain sight
Nothing left here to hide
[Cello & Piano Solo]
(Ooh... ah...)
[Final Chorus]
See right through me, but you can't touch me
Built from crystal, still you can't touch me
(See through, see through)
These fragile walls are bulletproof
(Can't break, can't break)
These fragile walls are mine
[Outro - Instrumental fade]
(Mmm... ah...)

5df1e456-5bfb-4248-aa41-9475b72472e0.name: Spin
5df1e456-5bfb-4248-aa41-9475b72472e0.sound: dance, tech-house, Arabian, 808, luxury, fast-paced, minimal vocals
5df1e456-5bfb-4248-aa41-9475b72472e0.lyrics:
[Intro]
Tick, tick—wrist light up
No time, fast lane, don’t stop
(Yeah, yeah)
[Verse 1]
Cool breeze, silk slide—double cup
Chrome face, second hand run up
Midnight stance, never slippin’ up
(Straight facts)
Countin’ down, glance—look at us
Spin the spot—watch band tight
You know the vibe, more than ice
City hum, everybody in sight
Heads turn, wrist caught the light
[Pre-Chorus]
Pave the tempo, skip a beat
Every tick, new sight to see
Moving circles, on repeat
Timing set, but I’m off-leash
[Chorus]
Flex time—feel the rush, keep movin’
Numbers spin, no snoozin’
Flex time—keep the groove, we cruisin’
Wrist talk, life’s in the movin’
[Post-Chorus]
Oh, can’t slow me down
(Down, down)
High life, I drown
(Time flies)
Flex time—now
[Verse 2]
Desert wind, beats underfoot
Guide the night—smooth in a look
Tracks roll, time slip unshook
Threadin’ lines, every page in the book
Pulse sync, back to that start
Steel-glint, shine in the dark
Turn it up, rhythm in the heart
Snap the clasp, play my part
[Pre-Chorus]
Pave the tempo, skip a beat
Every tick, new sight to see
Moving circles, on repeat
Timing set, but I’m off-leash
[Chorus]
Flex time—feel the rush, keep movin’
Numbers spin, no snoozin’
Flex time—keep the groove, we cruisin’
Wrist talk, life’s in the movin’
[Post-Chorus]
Oh, can’t slow me down
High life, I drown
Flex time—now
[Instrumental Breakdown]
[Fast, intricate rhythm with Arabian motifs]
[Bridge]
All in the wrist, quick as a myth
Blink and we’re gone, catchin’ the lift
Moments repeat, echo and drift
Hands on the dial, never let it slip
[Chorus]
Flex time—feel the rush, keep movin’
Numbers spin, no snoozin’
Flex time—keep the groove, we cruisin’
Wrist talk, life’s in the movin’
[Outro]
Flex time, (flex time, yeah)
No rewind, just the shine
In this light, yours and mine

619a2041-5938-4a60-8c1c-0514cbc3230f.name: Neon Pulse (Variation)
619a2041-5938-4a60-8c1c-0514cbc3230f.lyrics:
[VERSE]
[whispered, dry, close-mic — no reverb]
you know…
[low-pass filter opens — 100Hz → 300Hz, 2s]
how rain smells…
[bit-crusher engages — 12-bit, 11kHz — subtle grain]
on glass…
[tape stop effect — 0.5s slowdown + pitch drop]
after midnight…
[CHORUS]
[guitar and bass lock into tight groove — 92 BPM]
[vocal enters — 2 beats late, breath audible]
[reverb tail from previous line lingers — decaying under new phrase]
i don’t want to be…
[distortion fades in — tube saturation, 5%]
part of…
[drum machine cuts out — only bass remains]
this city…
[OUTRO]
[music fades — only bass loop + distant city ambience]
[vocal now processed through old phone filter — 300Hz–3.4kHz bandpass]
can you hear…
[glitch: 17ms sample hold — repeats “breathe” as stutter]
how i…
[reverse reverb swells — 1.2s, then cuts abruptly]
breathe…?
[final silence — 3.7s — only rain continues]

001b8a65-90aa-47e1-90f5-15932b45b1c8.name: Сигнал (Signal Variation)
001b8a65-90aa-47e1-90f5-15932b45b1c8.sound: trap, female vocals , atmospheric, filtered vocals, 808 kick, post-rock synth, reverb, Russian lyrics
001b8a65-90aa-47e1-90f5-15932b45b1c8.lyrics:
[intro]
[last signal, robotic voice]
[verse 1]
Одинокий сигнал в холодной тени,
Уставшие спутники шепчут мне,
Пульс, будто затихший во мгле,
Я — эхо в пустоте, размытое во времени.
[chorus]
Ты слышишь меня? (Can you hear me?)
Мой голос растворяется в ритме дождя,
Как будто бы шум, как будто бы я —
Остаток волн в магнитном поле сна.
[Переход/bridge]
Шёпот течет по проводам,
Затухая на расстоянии.
В этом ритуале — только я…
[final chorus ]
Ты слышишь меня? (Can you hear me?)
Мой голос — дрожащий луч,
Здесь нет ответа — только пульс,
И тишина качается во времени.
[outro]
Остаётся только шум.

1f7810fa-f2c9-4fbe-9ada-ea14fe3e45c1.name: Sanctum
1f7810fa-f2c9-4fbe-9ada-ea14fe3e45c1.sound: Create a deeply meditative ambient track with Tibetan singing bowls, ambient piano, shakuhachi flute, and soft nature sounds (dripping water, distant wind). Long reverberations, spacious depth, no rhythm. Use binaural beats (7.83Hz), microtonal shifts, and subtle silence between tones. The mood is introspective, grounded, sacred. Let it feel like lying in a quiet cave — safe, still, timeless.

93999ca0-7f2c-4da2-9599-260f1a7712a1.name: Слышу твой голос
93999ca0-7f2c-4da2-9599-260f1a7712a1.sound: trap, atmospheric, filtered vocals, 808 kick, post-rock synth, reverb, Russian lyrics
93999ca0-7f2c-4da2-9599-260f1a7712a1.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ушёл в себя, тишина давит, (эй)
Голос в голове - я зову, (да)
..
[Chorus]
Слышу твой голос, в облаках выше (медленно)
Линии тянутся, ты не слышишь
Вечер стелется, будто сыро
Только резонируют цифры – (а-а)
Слышу твой голос, в облаках выше
Сигнал сквозь холод, ты не слышишь
Плавно по кругу это повторю – (а-а)
[Verse 1]
Я помню путь сквозь ночь без окон
Молчу, но мысли – чистый ток
Светит экран, я внутри потока
Сны без слов – это мой итог
[Pre-Chorus]
Там, где твой голос тонет –
Тишина между стен
Ледяные ладони –
Тянутся, но нет
[Chorus]
Слышу твой голос, в облаках выше
Линии тянутся, ты не слышишь
Вечер стелется, будто сыро
Только резонируют цифры – (а-а)
[Verse 2] (English / Russian)
Rain on the glass, feel the old wires hum
Далеко внутри, там, где молчание дом
No names, no signals – I run anyway
Я в темноте – иду дальше (эй)
[Pre-Chorus]
Там, где твой голос тонет –
Тишина между стен
Ледяные ладони –
Тянутся, но нет
[Bridge]
Прошлое будто выцветший снимок
Скупы слова - остается тень
Я не жду ответа, мне нужен свет
Тишина хранит мой след
[Chorus] (melodic repeat)
Слышу твой голос, в облаках выше
Линии тянутся, ты не слышишь
Плавно по кругу это повторю – (а-а)
[Outro]
Молча тону в темноте (эй)
Ты не слышишь, но мне все равно

c96a5bdd-ab8d-486d-91d5-a54dcfccd4e7.name: Коллекция Лжи (Collection of Lies) (Cover)
c96a5bdd-ab8d-486d-91d5-a54dcfccd4e7.sound: Trap, French noir beats, dark synths, rain ambience, reverb vocals
c96a5bdd-ab8d-486d-91d5-a54dcfccd4e7.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
В моем зале тишина
Каждый шаг как новая страница
В бронзе лица и тела
Смотрят, молча судят, что случится
[Pre-chorus]
Мои сокровища так холодны
Но их истории горят огнём
[Chorus]
Каждый предмет лжёт обо мне
(Лжёт, лжёт, всё лжёт)
Каждый предмет лжёт обо мне
(Лжёт, лжёт, всё лжёт)
[Verse 2]
Фарфор из Китая на полках
Французское стекло в витринах
Все эти вещи говорят
О той, которой я не была
Собираю маски прошлого
Прячу правду за красотой
В каждом зале новая ложь
Но кто я без этих стен?
[Bridge]
Медь и серебро
Шёлк и жемчуга
Время застыло
В моих руках
(Каждый предмет...)
[Chorus]
Каждый предмет лжёт обо мне
(Лжёт, лжёт, всё лжёт)
Каждый предмет лжёт обо мне
(Лжёт, лжёт, всё лжёт)
[Outro]
Моя коллекция растёт
А правда тает как вода
Каждый предмет лжёт обо мне
Лжёт обо мне
Лжёт обо мне...

b62ffc2e-3782-4996-b04c-3ee047fc9bec.name: Tape Loop Memory (Variation)
b62ffc2e-3782-4996-b04c-3ee047fc9bec.sound: Male baritone only—whispered verses, dry spoken-word choruses, raw and intimate. Rhythm and texture from analog tape machine: reel motor hum, tape flutter, looped voice fragment (degrading slightly with each repeat), mechanical clicks. No instruments, no reverb, no digital effects. Only natural tape saturation, wow/flutter, and light vinyl surface noise. Tempo: 80 BPM. Mood: hypnotic, recursive, emotionally suspended. Style: 1976 Los Angeles bedroom archive session, voice as witness, tape loop as ghost.
b62ffc2e-3782-4996-b04c-3ee047fc9bec.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[tape recorder clicks on — motor hum begins]
[reel spins up — slight wobble]
[a voice fragment plays, distant, slightly muffled: *“…you coming back?”*]
[whispered, over the loop]
…again…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, synced to tape rhythm]
I found the reel in a shoebox
under winter scarves that still smell
like your perfume and bus exhaust.
The tape’s warped.
But your voice isn’t.
It’s stuck.
Right there.
On *“coming back.”*
[PRE-CHORUS]
[tape loop repeats: *“…you coming back?”* — slightly degraded each time]
I don’t rewind it.
I let it spin.
Until the words turn to weather.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, low baritone, dry]
This loop isn’t a memory—
it’s a question that forgot it was asked.
It plays.
I listen.
Neither of us answers.
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, closer, with audible breath]
Sometimes I talk over it—
tell you what happened after.
But the tape doesn’t care.
It only knows that one second
when you still believed
I’d return.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[tape loop slows slightly — motor strain]
The machine’s dying.
The question isn’t.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, same tone, with subtle tape distortion]
This loop isn’t a memory—
it’s a question that forgot it was asked.
It plays.
I listen.
Neither of us answers.
[POST-CHORUS]
[voice fragment repeats, fading into static]
…coming back?…
…coming back?…
…back?…
[tape begins to flutter wildly]
[OUTRO]
[tape runs out — reel spins freely]
[final whisper]
…no…
[motor stops. silence. then distant rain returns for 3 seconds. tape stop click.]

f1b3ddc5-4633-448b-8e02-2dff3d622ed9.name: Empty Chair Waltz
f1b3ddc5-4633-448b-8e02-2dff3d622ed9.sound: Male baritone only—whispered verses, dry spoken-word choruses in 3/4 waltz cadence. Rhythm from organic sounds: wooden chair scrapes, footsteps on creaky floorboards, rain falling in triple meter (emphasized drops). No instruments, no reverb, no digital effects. Only analog tape saturation, subtle wow/flutter, and light vinyl crackle. Tempo: 90 BPM in 3/4 time. Mood: tender, ritualistic, quietly devastating. Style: 1975 Los Angeles living room at night, voice as dance partner, silence as embrace.
f1b3ddc5-4633-448b-8e02-2dff3d622ed9.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[chair scrapes wood floor — slow, deliberate]
[rain begins in 3/4: *drop… drop-drop…*]
[whispered, as if to a partner]
…step with me…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, in waltz rhythm: 1-2-3, 1-2-3]
Your side of the floorboard
still creaks when I step near.
I think it remembers
the weight of your shoes—
red heels, left heel loose,
tapping *yes, yes, yes*
to a song we never heard.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[chair creaks as he “guides” it]
I hold your hand.
It’s made of air.
But my palm sweats
like it’s real.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, low baritone, dry, in waltz cadence]
One: I turn.
Two: you follow.
Three: the rain fills the space
where your breath should be.
We dance the same waltz
since the day you left—
you, in my arms,
me, in denial.
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, closer, with soft footstep sounds]
Sometimes I spin too fast—
just to feel you pull back.
But there’s no resistance.
Only the wind
pretending to be your dress
brushing my leg.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[rain intensifies slightly, still in 3/4]
The room holds its breath.
So do I.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, same rhythm, slight tape wobble]
One: I turn.
Two: you follow.
Three: the rain fills the space
where your breath should be.
We dance the same waltz
since the day you left—
you, in my arms,
me, in denial.
[POST-CHORUS]
[whispers layered in waltz pattern]
One… (you’re gone)
Two… (I know)
Three… (dance anyway)
[chair gently pushed back — soft thud]
[OUTRO]
[rain continues in 3/4]
[final whisper]
…thank you for the dance…
[5 seconds of rain and distant floor creak, then tape stop]

a68998c9-6a95-44e7-a774-64018854e127.name: Pulse
a68998c9-6a95-44e7-a774-64018854e127.sound: tech house, ultra-premium, TR-909 groove, deep subs, luxury FX
a68998c9-6a95-44e7-a774-64018854e127.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Champagne pop] [Soft crowd fade-in]
Ooh, la, la
Movin’ with the rhythm, just you and I (oh, oh)
Leather on my hand, marble under feet (la, la)
[Verse 1]
Tick of time in the silent space,
Counting pulses, tracing lines on your face
Eyes drift, magnetic—undone, incomplete
Every gesture, slow, in the endless repeat
[Pre-Chorus]
Silver threads tie us tight (yeah)
Soft discretion, velvet night
Can you feel the drive, electric flow?
Closer now, you already know
[Chorus]
It’s a silk pulse, running through the crowd (pulse, pulse)
Timeless, moving, steady and loud
Where old money meets the speed of the sound,
We move, up above, never coming down (oh)
It’s a silk pulse (it’s a silk pulse)
Silk pulse
[Instrumental] [Black Card swipe] [€500 drop]
[Verse 2]
Can’t measure the weight in the air,
We play the moment like it’s always been rare
Draped in the hush, we chase what’s unseen,
Bound to the rhythm that lives in between
[Pre-Chorus]
Diamond sighs in the air we breathe
Watch as midnight turns to belief
Fingers slip, the groove is divine
We’re never looking back, lost in the design
[Chorus]
It’s a silk pulse, running through the crowd (pulse, pulse)
Timeless, moving, steady and loud
Where old money meets the speed of the sound,
We move, up above, never coming down (oh)
It’s a silk pulse (it’s a silk pulse)
Silk pulse
[Breakdown]
[Clase Azul clink at 1 kHz]
(Mmm, oh)
[Hydraulic slam, falling cash FX]
Morse in the bass, you can feel the sign
Nineteen point nine, just a silent line
[Chorus]
It’s a silk pulse, running through the crowd (pulse, pulse)
Timeless, moving, steady and loud
Where old money meets the speed of the sound,
We move, up above, never coming down (oh)
It’s a silk pulse (it’s a silk pulse)
Silk pulse
[Outro]
[Ticking silent watches, crowd murmurs fade]
(La, la, la, oh)
[VIP FX]
Silk pulse

3fcd4b2b-fa79-49ad-944a-22f5c2627289.name: Monnaie
3fcd4b2b-fa79-49ad-944a-22f5c2627289.sound: French Rap, orchestral cello, haunting female vocals, cinematic 808s, urban atmosphere
3fcd4b2b-fa79-49ad-944a-22f5c2627289.lyrics:
[Intro - Female Vocals]
Dans les rues de Paris, je vois tout
Dans l'obscurité, je règne partout
[Verse 1]
Je marche seul dans ces quartiers
Les mots sont ma réalité
Chaque discussion est une transaction
Chaque murmure une révélation
Les gens me parlent sans hésiter
Leurs vérités vont m'enrichir
Je ne juge pas, je ne fais qu'écouter
C'est comme ça que je vais grandir
Les infos coulent comme une rivière
Dans mes poches, c'est mon trésor
Je connais toutes les barrières
Et les chemins vers de l'or
Je suis l'ombre qui vous observe
Le confident silencieux
Dans ce monde où tout se perd
Je reste toujours précieux
[Chorus - Female Vocals & Rap]
Les secrets de la ville sont ma monnaie
(Ooh, ma monnaie)
Je les garde, je les protège à jamais
(À jamais)
Dans ces rues où tout peut s'acheter
La confiance est la seule vérité
Les secrets de la ville sont ma monnaie
(Ooh, ma monnaie)
Je les porte comme une croix sacrée
(Ma destinée)
[Verse 2]
Les yeux fixés sur l'horizon
Je bâtis mon empire en silence
Pas besoin de faire le fanfaron
Ma force vient de ma patience
Les rumeurs sont mes alliées
Les vérités mon territoire
Dans ce jeu sophistiqué
Je trace ma trajectoire
Le pouvoir n'est pas dans la violence
Mais dans les mots qu'on me confie
Je garde toujours mon alliance
Avec ceux qui me font confie
[Bridge - Female Vocals & Rap]
[Cello Solo]
La ville me parle, je l'écoute bien
(Je l'entends)
Son cœur bat au même rythme que le mien
(Dans le temps)
[Chorus - Female Vocals & Rap]
Les secrets de la ville sont ma monnaie...
(Repeat chorus)
[Outro - Female Vocals]
Dans les rues de Paris, je vois tout
(Ahhh-ohhh)
Dans l'obscurité, je règne partout
(Je règne)

b3c6d626-30a4-4108-9ee9-b236c9a53129.name: Silent Heights
b3c6d626-30a4-4108-9ee9-b236c9a53129.sound: Trip-hop, melancholic cello/sax leads, deep 808 bass, slow beat, urban rain atmosphere
b3c6d626-30a4-4108-9ee9-b236c9a53129.lyrics:
[Intro - 32 bars]
[Rain and traffic sounds fade in]
[Melancholic cello and saxophone leads]
[808 bass enters with slow trip-hop beat]
[Vinyl crackle atmosphere]
[Pre-chorus]
Early morning at the harbor front
Watching boats drift past the glass towers
Built everything I thought I needed
But something's missing in these quiet hours
[Chorus]
Empty at the top
Success but still alone
Trading life for wealth
Now my heart's turned to stone

a82134c0-0bae-4f3a-9d80-d2d4cfe8f5ee.name: Folding the Absence (Variation)
a82134c0-0bae-4f3a-9d80-d2d4cfe8f5ee.sound: male baritone raw spoken-word whisper, English lyrics, 96 BPM, found sounds only (paper crumple, unfold, pencil scratch, drawer close, tape stop), analog effects (tape saturation, subtle wow/flutter, vinyl crackle, tape echo with dry decay), 1970s psychedelic texture (tactile, introspective, lo-fi), no reverb, no flanger, no phaser, no melody, cold sensuality, hypnotic groove, structure: intro-verse-prechorus-chorus-outro
a82134c0-0bae-4f3a-9d80-d2d4cfe8f5ee.lyrics:
[INTRO]
*(dry paper crumple, slow unfold, pencil scratch on grainy stock, tape machine whir)*
[VERSE]
I fold your absence into origami birds—
crease by crease, memory by memory.
They don’t fly. They just sit on the sill,
collecting dust like unpaid debts.
[PRE-CHORUS]
The paper remembers every touch.
I don’t.
[CHORUS]
Fold. Crease. Tuck the edge.
Repeat until the shape looks like peace.
But paper cuts deeper than silence—
especially when it’s blank.
[OUTRO]
*(final fold, tape abruptly stops, distant drawer closes, vinyl run-out groove)*

c64d7356-b155-4eb5-bcd1-43d95cdc56ff.name: Nightfall
c64d7356-b155-4eb5-bcd1-43d95cdc56ff.sound: Electronic, luxury house, French club hooks, deep sub-bass, sparkling percussion, high-end textures, 128 BPM, F# minor
c64d7356-b155-4eb5-bcd1-43d95cdc56ff.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Cartier bracelet chime]
Black card sent / diamond hats / just joined
I’m in – swipe.
Tiffany-high, drift right / (Cartier, tap twice)
[Verse]
Slide in—leather, velvet, bass in my step
Dior click, scarf hushes regrets
Everything coded, nothing’s left to chance
(Chanel… like a glass, text 12 dB down)
[Pre-chorus]
Danse… lumière…
Danse… lumière…
Lift me up, all eyes / energy climb
Rolex time delay, can you keep in line?
[Chorus]
Oui… la nuit!
Oui… la nuit!
F# A C#, looped for days
Oui… la nuit!
Move with me, just one phrase
(t-t-t)
Champagne drizzle, pulse break—runway raised
[Breakdown]
[Reverse: “Питер…”]
Vinyl scratch, slipper burst / (ghosting the feed)
Night left open, Monaco to Питер / ghost-sent hearts, luxury leader
[Final Chorus]
OUI! LA NUIT!
OUI! LA NUIT!
(Ritz piano, Bugatti surge)
Chase to the dawn / club never sleeps
Limousine close, door swings and speaks
Oui… la nuit!
[Outro effect][Limousine door, needle drop]

4ff3a2d1-0a25-46ac-8c32-8d0850bebf53.name: Pulse
4ff3a2d1-0a25-46ac-8c32-8d0850bebf53.sound: 90s Russian pop-disco, 138 BPM, dance beats, vintage synths, cassette effects
4ff3a2d1-0a25-46ac-8c32-8d0850bebf53.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Твой звонок — не беру,
Вижу «Busy» на FaceTime.
Палец скользит — «I miss you»,
Только не мой prime-time.
Клуб не пустой, но мне easy,
Девчонки в gold’овых jeans.
Я кручу свой minimix,
Не жду никаких tricks.
[Pre-chorus]
Drop в сердцах, like emoji,
Лайки, хайп — не важны ночью.
Пятница — mood upgrade,
Клуб — мой safe place.
[Chorus]
На dance-поле нет Problems,
Свет и бит выжигают Tokens.
Топим drama в bassline,
Только dance здесь — main sign.
(о-о-о, ла-ла-ла, с нами!)
На dance-поле нет Problems —
Эй, бывший, ты слышал?
(Слышал!)
[Кассета перематывается] [Cassette rewind]
[Verse 2]
TikTok кричит — “Let’s go!”
Детский смех — в моём stereo.
Смайлы свечей, я живу fast,
Swipe’аю грусть — delete past.
[Bridge]
[Sample: «А вот и нет!»]
Радар на меня — ловит light,
Время love — только в лайк.
[Chorus]
На dance-поле нет Problems,
Топим drama в bassline,
(О-о-о, ла-ла-ла, всё с нами!)
На dance-поле нет Problems —
Счастье — это онлайн.

48b65e19-393e-47ce-85c8-1a03937f1933.name: Souterrain
48b65e19-393e-47ce-85c8-1a03937f1933.sound: French Rap, haunting cello melodies, ethereal female vocals, dark urban soundscape
48b65e19-393e-47ce-85c8-1a03937f1933.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Metro sounds, brakes screeching]
(Dans la profondeur de la nuit...)
[Cello enters softly]
[Verse 1]
Je conduis mon train dans l'artère souterraine
Les visages fatigués racontent leurs peines
«Prochain arrêt» - ma voix résonne dans le vide
Mais ce soir, quelque chose change, les regards sont avides
Une femme en noir, dossier serré contre elle
Un homme qui note chaque station nouvelle
Dans mon rétroviseur, leurs chemins se croisent
Tandis que sous terre, les vérités s'apprivoisent
[Chorus]
Le dernier métro garde nos secrets
(Nos secrets, nos secrets...)
Les âmes perdues trouvent leur chemin
(Dans la nuit sans fin...)
[Verse 2]
Une valise abandonnée sur le quai désert
Des chuchotements échangés derrière les portes en fer
Je vois leurs reflets dans mes vitres teintées
Chaque nuit, les mêmes visages, les mêmes destinées
Mais ce soir les regards sont plus intenses
Les papiers changent de mains dans un silence
Je suis le gardien de leurs mystères profonds
Pendant que la ville dort, leurs traces se confondent
[Cello Solo]
[Deep, haunting melody]
(Les passagers de minuit...)
(Gardiens des vérités...)
[Verse 3]
Les caméras s'éteignent une par une
Dans ce labyrinthe où les destins s'empruntent
Je ralentis mon train, le temps se suspend
Les conspirations se tissent, je fais semblant
Dernière station, les portes se referment
Les secrets s'échappent comme la brume en hiver
Je reste seul avec mes observations
De cette ville qui vit dans l'obscuration
[Outro]
Le dernier métro garde nos secrets
(Les secrets de la nuit...)
[Cello fades]
[Metro sounds diminish]
(Dans la profondeur de la nuit...)

e47dbb1a-7dcd-4870-abdd-64142a5249a3.name: Silence
e47dbb1a-7dcd-4870-abdd-64142a5249a3.sound: French gangsta rap, orchestral cello, haunting female vocals, heavy 808 bass, urban atmosphere
e47dbb1a-7dcd-4870-abdd-64142a5249a3.lyrics:
[Intro - Female Vocals]
«Les rues me connaissent...»
«Le pouvoir dans le calme...»
[Verse 1]
Dans ma tête, stratégie parfaite
Tranquille dans les rues discrètes
Pas besoin de faire du bruit
Pour contrôler toute la nuit
J'observe, je calcule, je pense
Ma force c'est l'intelligence
[Pre-chorus]
(Mon esprit est une arme)
(Plus forte que l'alarme)
[Chorus]
Le silence est mon arme
Le silence est ma force
Le silence, je le charme
Sans remords, sans effort
(Sans un mot, je prends tout)
(Sans un son, je suis fou)
[Verse 2]
Les autres font trop de bruit
Moi je joue dans l'esprit
Stratégie calculée
Dans les quartiers contrôlés
Pas besoin de violence
Quand t'as l'intelligence
[Post-chorus]
«Le pouvoir du silence»
«La force de l'absence»
[Bridge]
[Cello Solo]
(Dans l'ombre je règne)
(Dans le calme je gagne)
Tous les coups sont prévus
Chaque mouvement, aperçu
La ville m'appartient
Sans lever un main
[Verse 3]
Les fous parlent sans cesse
Moi je compte mes pièces
Le vrai pouvoir se cache
Dans le silence, je me détache
Intelligence pure
Dans ces rues obscures
[Chorus]
Le silence est mon arme
Le silence est ma force
Le silence, je le charme
Sans remords, sans effort
(Sans un mot, je prends tout)
(Sans un son, je suis fou)
[Outro - Female Vocals]
«Le silence...»
«C'est la victoire...»
[Cello fades]

fe5329d3-f8c4-4b50-9587-e76fb79e6116.name: Cosmic Vibes of 1973
fe5329d3-f8c4-4b50-9587-e76fb79e6116.sound: psychedelic 70s, vintage synth, wah guitar, analog bass, mellow drums, phaser, reverb, delay, cosmic atmosphere, steady groove 90 BPM, male lead vocal: raw baritone — whispered verses, gritty full-voice choruses, natural rasp, analog tape saturation, whispered with tape echo, instruments: warm slightly detuned electric piano, muted acoustic guitar with offbeat strums, upright bass with round minimal tone, organ drones and swells, brushed snare only, no cymbals, analog tape effects, vinyl crackle, mono-compatible tape echo, mood: psychedelic, ritualistic, nocturnal, surreal
fe5329d3-f8c4-4b50-9587-e76fb79e6116.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[vintage synth hum — warm, 90 BPM]
[subtle phaser sweep]
[deep, raw baritone whisper — gritty and textured with natural rasp, analog tape saturation]
Step into the cosmic light...
[VERSE 1]
[guitar wah rhythm — tight and clear]
Floating deep in colors bright,
Echoes twist in purple light,
Whispers dance through time and space,
Lost within this cosmic place.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[phaser effect on synth, harmonized backing vocals]
Spiral dreams like velvet haze,
Turning through mysterious ways,
[CHORUS]
[analog bass groove, steady drums with punch]
Retro beats in slow embrace,
Feel the groove, the endless chase.
[POST-CHORUS]
[harmonized vocals, reverb layered]
Cosmic vibes,
Endless skies.
[OUTRO]
[delay on synth fades out]
[deep, raw baritone whisper — gritty, emotional, analog tape saturation, same intensity as intro]
Dream fades...
'Til next time...

3cc7161f-4fc6-4571-950d-ffcd2fd7c9a7.name: Eternal
3cc7161f-4fc6-4571-950d-ffcd2fd7c9a7.sound: mythic style, mystical ambient, Gregorian chant, Vedic mantras, deep male and female vocals, ethereal, trance, 70 BPM, ancient future, sacred, desert night, crystal resonance, heartbeat bass, spiritual awakening, love beyond time, return after 1000 years, cinematic, haunting, beautiful, timeless, meditative, ultra-deep bass, binaural beats, 3D sound, spatial audio, no modern instruments, no melodies, no beats, only resonance, only voice, only pulse, only memory, only dream, only return, only shimmer, only silence, only eternity

60005d4d-d546-4d80-a344-5b15eaa7fb75.name: Le Silence Entre Nous
60005d4d-d546-4d80-a344-5b15eaa7fb75.sound: French R&B, ethereal ambient pads, dreamy atmospheric production, slow tempo
60005d4d-d546-4d80-a344-5b15eaa7fb75.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Je pense à toi ce soir
Dans l'air paisible et noir
Les mots perdus dans l'espace
Le temps qui passe et passe
(La la la, oh oh)
[Pre-chorus]
Plus près, plus loin
Perdue dans ce besoin
De dire, de vivre
Mais les mots ne suivent pas
[Chorus]
Le silence entre nous (entre nous)
Le silence, c'est tout (c'est tout)
Le silence entre nous (oh oh)
Parle plus fort que tout
(La la la la la)
[Post-chorus]
(Oh oh oh oh)
(La di da di da)
[Ambient pad sounds]
[Verse 2]
Pensées qui persistent
Moments qui résistent
Dans l'air du soir si doux
Les mots restent tabous
(Oh oh oh)
[Chorus]
Le silence entre nous (entre nous)
Le silence, c'est tout (c'est tout)
Le silence entre nous (oh oh)
Parle plus fort que tout
(La la la la la)
[Bridge]
Dire ou taire
Faire ou défaire
Partir, rester
Dans cette réalité
(Oh oh oh)
[Final Chorus]
Le silence entre nous (entre nous)
Le silence, c'est tout (c'est tout)
Le silence entre nous (oh oh)
Parle plus fort que tout
[Post-chorus]
(La la la la la)
(Oh oh oh oh)
[Ambient pad fade]

82f79872-fe34-4f6d-83f7-9044b12d42e9.name: Earth's Pulse
82f79872-fe34-4f6d-83f7-9044b12d42e9.sound: Ambient electronic, evolving soundscape, deep earth tones, shimmering atmospherics, nature textures
82f79872-fe34-4f6d-83f7-9044b12d42e9.lyrics:
[Ambient intro with deep bass pulses]
In the quiet
All alone
Feel it moving
Down below
[Atmospheric swells]
Under my feet
Ancient beat
Rising slow
Through stone and soil
[Wildlife sounds fade in]
(Feel it pulse)
(Feel it rise)
(Feel it breathe)
When sun falls away
Earth comes alive
In my bones
Nature's sign
[Deep resonant tones build]
Breaking surface
Of the night
Wild ones calling
Taking flight
(Feel it pulse)
(Feel it rise)
(Feel it breathe)
[Atmospheric peak]
Deep beneath
Roots entwine
Cold air softens
Stars align
Time dissolves
As night unfolds
Earth's heartbeat
Makes me whole
[Wildlife sounds intensify]
I am breathing
With the land
As darkness deepens
Here I stand
(Feel it pulse)
(Feel it rise)
(Feel it breathe)
[Ambient outro]
Fading daylight
Earth below
Ancient rhythm
Lets me know
We are one now
In the night
Feel it moving
Inside
[Atmospheric sounds fade to deep bass pulses]
(Feel it pulse...)
(Feel it rise...)
(Feel it breathe...)

9e944976-d0b9-4709-8b01-053810a4c1fa.name: Stars Keep Spinning
9e944976-d0b9-4709-8b01-053810a4c1fa.sound: Atmospheric chillwave beat with a catchy synth melody, smooth trap-inspired drums, airy pads, subtle bass with a dreamy vibe, upbeat tempo around 100-110 BPM, vocals soft with light autotune, emotional but pop-friendly; vibe is youthful, hopeful, and hypnotic for a viral social media hit.
9e944976-d0b9-4709-8b01-053810a4c1fa.lyrics:
Intro:
Stars above, they light the night (ooooh)
Turning worlds with gentle light (ah-ah)
Verse 1:
Someone gazes at the sky,
Watching stars as they pass by,
Every spark a secret told,
Whispers of a night so bold.
Pre-Chorus 1:
And as the darkness falls, (falls)
The world begins to turn, (turn)
Every night a story calls, (calls)
In every star we learn.
Chorus:
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
And every evening starts again tonight.
Verse 2:
Silent skies, a glowing dance,
Draw the dreamers in a trance,
Eyes reflect the endless space,
In their gaze, the world’s embrace.
Pre-Chorus 2:
Hearts aligned with heaven's tune, (tune)
Time’s a circle in this view, (view)
Counting stars beneath the moon, (moon)
Night’s eternal rendezvous.
Chorus:
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
And every evening starts again tonight.
Outro:
So when you feel the stars above (above)
Know they’re turning all with love (with love)
And every night when eyes arise,
The world keeps spinning ‘neath the skies.

c72da3f9-6a04-440a-a030-78f992717a5d.name: Cosmic Vibes of 1973
c72da3f9-6a04-440a-a030-78f992717a5d.sound: psychedelic 70s, vintage synth, wah guitar, analog bass, mellow drums, phaser, reverb, delay, cosmic atmosphere, steady groove 90 BPM, deep rough brawny male vocal, aggressive yet beautiful male whisper in intro and outro, harmonized backing vocals, vibrant colors, dreamy melodies
c72da3f9-6a04-440a-a030-78f992717a5d.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[vintage synth hum — warm, 90 BPM]
[subtle phaser sweep]
[deep, rough, brawny male whisper—intense and textured]
Step into the cosmic light...
[VERSE 1]
[guitar wah rhythm — tight and clear]
Floating deep in colors bright,
Echoes twist in purple light,
Whispers dance through time and space,
Lost within this cosmic place.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[phaser effect on synth, harmonized backing vocals]
Spiral dreams like velvet haze,
Turning through mysterious ways,
[CHORUS]
[analog bass groove, steady drums with punch]
Retro beats in slow embrace,
Feel the groove, the endless chase.
[POST-CHORUS]
[harmonized vocals, reverb layered]
Cosmic vibes,
Endless skies.
[OUTRO]
[delay on synth fades out]
[deep, rough, brawny male whisper—same intensity as intro]
Dream fades...
'Til next time...

f1fe5469-e0b1-4bf1-a647-26a75473f428.name: Neon Dusk Communion (Variation)
f1fe5469-e0b1-4bf1-a647-26a75473f428.sound: Hypnotic psychedelic trap-infused groove, 98 BPM. Brutal male baritone — raw, raspy, intimate, with audible breath, lip sounds, and chest resonance. Spoken-sung flow, never melodic, always grounded in rhythm. Minimal lyrics, maximum texture. Voice drenched in analog tape echo, layered with a low-octave shadow (-12dB, slightly degraded). Rhythm: deep, sliding 808-style bass pulse (<100Hz, sine wave with analog saturation), crisp hi-hat triplets (1/16, 30% volume, panned right, mimicking rain on metal), off-beat wooden claps (no snare). No climax, no drop — only immersive spiral. Atmosphere: neon dusk, motel window, urban solitude. Sound: analog warmth (tape saturation, wow/flutter) blended with subtle digital shadow (light granular texture on vocal tails). Mood: cold sensuality, surreal repetition, lifetime as ritual — not a trip, but a vow. Style: underground ritual meets nocturnal trap — voice as anchor, bass as gravity.
f1fe5469-e0b1-4bf1-a647-26a75473f428.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[liquid bass pulse begins — C minor, slow, saturated]
[tape hiss swells like breath]
[voice: half-spoken, half-sung, drenched in analog echo]
…again…
[VERSE 1]
neon bleeds through wet glass—
pink, blue, gold…
your name in the steam…
I don’t wipe it off…
the street hums your frequency…
I tune in…
[PRE-CHORUS]
[bass drops an octave]
time’s not a line…
it’s a spiral…
I’m here…
again…
[CHORUS]
[voice lower, slower, layered with octave-down echo]
this is how I stay…
not leave…
not dream…
just… stay…
in the hum…
in the rain…
in the neon…
in the name…
[VERSE 2]
the motel clock’s stopped at 3:17—
good.
no future.
no past.
just this drip…
this breath…
this pulse…
[PRE-CHORUS]
[tape wobble intensifies]
the night’s not empty…
it’s full of you…
as static…
as light…
[CHORUS]
[voice even deeper, more saturated]
this is how I stay…
not leave…
not dream…
just… stay…
in the hum…
in the rain…
in the neon…
in the name…
[OUTRO]
[voice fragments into whisper]
…stay…
…hum…
…neon…
[bass fades slowly]
[tape hiss remains — then low-pass filter closes like eyelids]
[silence]

9b0b5a3e-959f-4264-adce-4a6b3c18ee10.name: Window Fog Alphabet (Variation)
9b0b5a3e-959f-4264-adce-4a6b3c18ee10.sound: Male baritone only—ultra-intimate whispered verses, fragile dry spoken-word choruses. Rhythm from organic window sounds: breath fogging glass, finger tracing wet letters, raindrops sliding down pane, soft plinks into sill. No instruments, no reverb, no digital effects. Only analog tape saturation, subtle wow/flutter, and light vinyl surface noise. Tempo: 68 BPM. Mood: devotional, ephemeral, quietly resigned. Style: 1975 Los Angeles dawn, voice as last attempt at permanence, fog as eraser of memory.
9b0b5a3e-959f-4264-adce-4a6b3c18ee10.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[deep breath fogs cold window — slow, wide]
[drop slides down glass — *shhhk*]
[whispered, barely formed]
…S…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, synced to finger tracing letters]
I write your name in the fog—
S… E…
but the E melts before I finish.
So I start again.
S… E… R…
The R drips into the sill
like a tear that forgot its reason.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[finger wipes clean, starts over]
The glass doesn’t care
if I spell it right.
But I do.
Because if I get it perfect—
just once—
maybe you’ll appear
on the other side.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, low baritone, dry, fragile]
I’m not writing to you.
I’m writing to keep you
from vanishing completely.
Each letter: a stitch.
Each drip: an undoing.
I write.
It fades.
I write again.
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, even quieter, with wet breath]
Today I tried your full name—
first, middle, last.
By the time I reached the Y,
the S was already gone.
So I stopped.
And just watched the fog
swallow the alphabet
whole.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[drop falls from bottom of glass — soft *plink*]
No name.
Just mist.
Just me.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, same tone, with subtle tape saturation]
I’m not writing to you.
I’m writing to keep you
from vanishing completely.
Each letter: a stitch.
Each drip: an undoing.
I write.
It fades.
I write again.
[POST-CHORUS]
[whispers dissolving into breath]
S…
E…
R…
[long exhale — fogs entire pane]
[OUTRO]
[glass completely fogged — no letters visible]
[final whisper, almost inhaled]
…gone…
[7 seconds of rain on window, then tape stop click]

47d5e17c-95f6-49b8-bd98-f5b28672d489.name: Window Fog Alphabet
47d5e17c-95f6-49b8-bd98-f5b28672d489.sound: Male baritone only—ultra-intimate whispered verses, fragile dry spoken-word choruses.
