19f25c6a-0bdc-4434-a459-f1cff27920df.name: Tape Loop Memory
19f25c6a-0bdc-4434-a459-f1cff27920df.sound: Male baritone only—whispered verses, dry spoken-word choruses, raw and intimate. Rhythm and texture from analog tape machine: reel motor hum, tape flutter, looped voice fragment (degrading slightly with each repeat), mechanical clicks. No instruments, no reverb, no digital effects. Only natural tape saturation, wow/flutter, and light vinyl surface noise. Tempo: 80 BPM. Mood: hypnotic, recursive, emotionally suspended. Style: 1976 Los Angeles bedroom archive session, voice as witness, tape loop as ghost.
19f25c6a-0bdc-4434-a459-f1cff27920df.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[tape recorder clicks on — motor hum begins]
[reel spins up — slight wobble]
[a voice fragment plays, distant, slightly muffled: *“…you coming back?”*]
[whispered, over the loop]
…again…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, synced to tape rhythm]
I found the reel in a shoebox
under winter scarves that still smell
like your perfume and bus exhaust.
The tape’s warped.
But your voice isn’t.
It’s stuck.
Right there.
On *“coming back.”*
[PRE-CHORUS]
[tape loop repeats: *“…you coming back?”* — slightly degraded each time]
I don’t rewind it.
I let it spin.
Until the words turn to weather.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, low baritone, dry]
This loop isn’t a memory—
it’s a question that forgot it was asked.
It plays.
I listen.
Neither of us answers.
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, closer, with audible breath]
Sometimes I talk over it—
tell you what happened after.
But the tape doesn’t care.
It only knows that one second
when you still believed
I’d return.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[tape loop slows slightly — motor strain]
The machine’s dying.
The question isn’t.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, same tone, with subtle tape distortion]
This loop isn’t a memory—
it’s a question that forgot it was asked.
It plays.
I listen.
Neither of us answers.
[POST-CHORUS]
[voice fragment repeats, fading into static]
…coming back?…
…coming back?…
…back?…
[tape begins to flutter wildly]
[OUTRO]
[tape runs out — reel spins freely]
[final whisper]
…no…
[motor stops. silence. then distant rain returns for 3 seconds. tape stop click.]

f973188d-7e21-4ce9-b175-286e287dbc66.name: Good dog
f973188d-7e21-4ce9-b175-286e287dbc66.sound: LUXURY female vocal tech house 128bpm, elite brands & night club vibe, hypnotic vocals (female only), trancey memorable hook, marble texture, velvet fx, VIP FX: hidden 18.5kHz layer + 19kHz pulse (every 8 bars). RULES: NO male vocals, NO English, ONLY short vocal samples & phrases, NO verse lyrics, NO pre-chorus > 3 sec, DJ friendly: 16-bar intro and outro with clean groove for mixing, vocals used as rhythmic samples, chorus (hook) is catchy and extremely danceable, luxury positive club energy.

06202ba1-926b-4d25-9eee-dcd5fcb28c5a.name: Returns
06202ba1-926b-4d25-9eee-dcd5fcb28c5a.sound: Mythic style, mystical ambient, Gregorian chant, Vedic mantras, deep male and female vocals, ethereal, trance, 70 BPM, ancient future, sacred, desert night, crystal resonance, heartbeat bass, spiritual awakening, love beyond time, return after 1000 years, cinematic, haunting, beautiful, timeless

3ed53fdf-b4fd-4204-ad39-18acbbe61746.name: Memory Lane
3ed53fdf-b4fd-4204-ad39-18acbbe61746.sound: Techno, steel-plated tech-house, 126 BPM, minimal vocal textures
3ed53fdf-b4fd-4204-ad39-18acbbe61746.lyrics:
[DROP - 0:00-0:30]
[909 kick + sub-bass, no vocals]
[VERSE - 0:30-1:00]
[Minimal beat + vocal breaths]
Ah... ah... ah...
(breathe in)
Oh... oh... oh...
(whispered close-mic)
Ee... ee... ee...
[Cathedral reverb builds]
[CHORUS - 1:00-1:30]
[Angelic vocal hook]
Ahhhhh... ohhhhh...
(layered harmonies)
Eeeeee... ahhhhh...
[+10% formant processing]
Ohhhhh... eeeeee...
(ethereal texture)
Ahhhhh...
[Diamond "ting" at 1:16]
[OUTRO - 1:30-2:00]
[Champagne fade]
Oh... ah... ee...
(fading whispers)
Ah... oh...
[Sidechained champagne pops]
Ee...
[19.8kHz nebula tone]
(breath out)
...ah...
[Fade to silence]

6c51fa29-6919-47c5-a52d-84423a2307b7.name: Eclipsed
6c51fa29-6919-47c5-a52d-84423a2307b7.sound: Gangsta rap, orchestral cello, French ethereal vocals, dark urban 808s
6c51fa29-6919-47c5-a52d-84423a2307b7.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Silent streets speak louder than crowds
Walking while the world sleeps sound
Past people's darkened windows down
Looking for what can't be found
Empty streets speak louder than crowds
[French Interlude]
(La solitude me parle ce soir)
[Cello Solo]
[Verse 2]
Passing by the paper stands
Coffee cups in tired hands
Making moves through midnight plans
Empty streets speak louder than crowds
Can you hear what I hear now?
[Chorus]
Empty streets speak louder than crowds (speak louder)
Empty streets speak louder than crowds (than crowds)
[Cello Bridge]
[Verse 3]
Street lights paint my path ahead
People sleeping in their beds
While I pace these streets instead
Learning what the night has said
Empty streets speak louder than crowds
[French Outro]
(La ville dort, mais mon coeur reste éveillé)
[Cello melody fades]
Empty streets speak louder than crowds
Empty streets speak louder than crowds

f986c37f-4ecc-4a1b-afcf-af783546bf51.name: Dans le Silence du Métro
f986c37f-4ecc-4a1b-afcf-af783546bf51.sound: French acapella, layered female vocals, minimal 808 bass, atmospheric reverb
f986c37f-4ecc-4a1b-afcf-af783546bf51.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Dans la station vide
Je la vois tourner
Ses pas sur le quai
Sans musique, elle danse
Libre et solitaire
[808 bass enters]
[Chorus]
Dans le silence du métro
(Dans le silence)
Dans le silence du métro
(Elle danse seule)
[Verse 2]
Ses bras dans l'air
Comme des ailes d'oiseau
Le temps s'arrête ici
Entre deux trains
Je retiens mon souffle
[Deep bass pulse]
[Chorus]
Dans le silence du métro
(Dans le silence)
Dans le silence du métro
(Elle danse seule)
[Bridge]
[Whispered] Un, deux, trois
[Layered vocals] Les échos de ses pas
[Whispered] Quatre, cinq, six
[Layered vocals] Le temps qui glisse
[Verse 3]
Elle ne me voit pas
Dans l'ombre je reste
Témoin de sa grâce
Un moment volé
Sur ce quai désert
[Chorus]
Dans le silence du métro
(Dans le silence)
Dans le silence du métro
(Elle danse seule)
[Outro]
[Soft breaths]
Les derniers pas
S'effacent doucement
Le train arrive
Elle disparaît
(Dans le silence)
(Dans le silence du métro)

c2cad466-b8a0-4acc-a9dc-a23ceba6c364.name: Sablier (Hourglass)
c2cad466-b8a0-4acc-a9dc-a23ceba6c364.sound: Cloud rap, lo-fi beats, dreamy French vocals, reverb-heavy synths
c2cad466-b8a0-4acc-a9dc-a23ceba6c364.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Dans le temps qui coule (In time that flows)
Just floatin' with you
Ces moments qui passent (These moments passing)
Yeah, I feel it too
[Chorus]
Lost in time with you, baby, can't you feel it move?
Dans l'sablier de nos vies, nous deux, on groove (In the hourglass of our lives, we groove)
[Verse 2]
Minutes slip away
Like sand in my palm
Je perds la notion (I'm losing track)
In your winter calm
Memories fade out
But we stay right here
[Chorus]
Lost in time with you, baby, can't you feel it move?
Dans l'sablier de nos vies, nous deux, on groove
[Bridge]
[Atmospheric synth break]
(Tu me manques, tu me manques) (I miss you, I miss you)
Time ain't real when I'm with you
(Je flotte, je flotte) (I float, I float)
[Verse 3]
Past and future blend
In this endless wave
Le temps nous appartient (Time belongs to us)
No need to be saved
Floating through the years
With you by my side
Moments éternels (Eternal moments)
Let's just take this ride
[Chorus]
Lost in time with you, baby, can't you feel it move?
Dans l'sablier de nos vies, nous deux, on groove
(On groove, on groove...)
[Outro]
Time slips away...
Mais nous restons là (But we stay here)
[Fade out with atmospheric effects]

38ab11fc-6b87-40ff-bc20-ae0242b32225.name: Rain Will Wash (garage)
38ab11fc-6b87-40ff-bc20-ae0242b32225.sound:
garage rock with acoustic heart,
raw male vocal, slightly out of tune,
dirty acoustic guitar, broken amp buzz,
simple drum kit, one microphone recording,
70 bpm, stumbling rhythm, emotional,
tape hiss, room noise, no polish,
punk folk intimacy, basement vibe,
whiskey instead of wine, honesty over technique
38ab11fc-6b87-40ff-bc20-ae0242b32225.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The mirror's cracked from side to side
[acoustic string buzz]
A twin I cannot recognize
[vocal crack, slight detune]
The shadow stretches on the wall
And answers when I do not call
[distant shout response]

[Chorus]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
[drumstick on can as rain]
And the world will turn the other way around
[guitar feedback swell]
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
[group shout on "ghosts"]
Are the only ones who know we're found
[broken amp distortion]

[Verse 2]
The clockwork heart is winding down
[metronome ticking then stopping]
A silent scream in every town
[vocal strain, almost breaking]
The radio plays static hymns
[actual radio scan]
To drown the light along the limbs
[power chord crash]

[Chorus]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Bridge]
A flicker on the silver screen
[TV noise burst]
The space between what is and seems
[silence, breathing]
I taste the future on my tongue
It's hollow, and I am too young
[acoustic breakdown, voice alone]

[Guitar Solo]
Dirty acoustic through blown amp,
One take, mistakes left in

[Chorus x2]
First: Full garage rage
Second: Just acoustic and voice

[Outro]
The only ones... who know...
[guitar string break]
The only ones... who know...
[tape stops abruptly]

6c859d05-f51c-49e3-9f07-6b76b04b4e32.name: 3:17 AM Ritual (Piano Dust Version)
6c859d05-f51c-49e3-9f07-6b76b04b4e32.sound: Male baritone — whispered verses, full dry baritone choruses, raw and intimate. Accompaniment: one detuned upright piano (1940s–50s), played minimally — single notes, dissonant intervals, no chords or sustain pedal. Natural room tone: dripping faucet (82 BPM), chair creaks, piano key clicks, lid thump. No reverb, no effects, no compression. Only analog tape saturation, light vinyl crackle, and subtle string resonance. Mood: nocturnal, devotional, fragile. Style: 1976 Los Angeles apartment, piano as furniture that occasionally speaks, voice as ritual keeper.
6c859d05-f51c-49e3-9f07-6b76b04b4e32.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[old upright piano key pressed — low C, slightly detuned, natural decay]
[dripping faucet begins — 82 BPM]
[chair creaks as he sits]
[whispered]
…again…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, over sparse piano notes — single tones, no chords]
I brew silence in a chipped blue pot—
three spoons of sugar, none for taste.
Just the sound of crystals hitting glass…
like footsteps on a frozen lake.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[piano plays two notes — minor second, dissonant, then silence]
The clock’s hands are sleeping.
The fridge hums a hymn.
[CHORUS]
[full baritone, dry and chest-resonant, piano sustains low drone]
This is how I worship now:
steam, sugar, and the shape of your absence.
No prayers.
Just routine.
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, piano mimics dripping rhythm with high muted notes]
I found your glove in a storm drain—
still warm, still ticking.
I wear it when the city sleeps
and pretend it’s your hand.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[piano key sticks — soft *thud* — then released]
The moon watches through grease on glass.
It doesn’t blink. Neither do I.
[CHORUS]
[baritone, same as before, piano plays slow minor triad — no sustain pedal]
This is how I worship now:
steam, sugar, and the shape of your absence.
No prayers.
Just routine.
[POST-CHORUS]
[voice hums low tone, piano echoes]
Steam…
Sugar…
Shape…
[piano lid closes softly — *thump*]
[OUTRO]
[kettle begins to whistle — then cuts off]
[final whisper]
…same time tomorrow…
[5 seconds: dripping faucet + piano string resonance fading, then tape stop]

ac88e782-73ba-4abb-9546-a17abdf1e78f.name: Waiting Eyes
ac88e782-73ba-4abb-9546-a17abdf1e78f.sound: Cinematic singer-songwriter, haunting cello, smoky jazz saxophone, atmospheric, French vocals
ac88e782-73ba-4abb-9546-a17abdf1e78f.lyrics:
[Intro - Instrumental with whispered vocals]
(Où es-tu?)
(Je t'attends...)
[Verse 1 - Instrumental]
[Cello and saxophone interplay]
[Pre-chorus 1]
Every morning at this station
Faces rushing past my way
Time is moving like a river
But I stay, I always stay
[Chorus 1]
Among these thousand strangers
Where are your eyes?
Among these thousand strangers
Do you still recognize
The way I stand here waiting?
The way I search the crowd?
[Musical Interlude]
[Cello solo]
[Verse 2 - Instrumental]
[Saxophone melody]
[Pre-chorus 2]
Platform numbers keep on changing
Trains arriving, trains depart
In this underground forever
With my heart, my foolish heart
[Chorus 2]
Among these thousand strangers
Where are your eyes?
Among these thousand strangers
Do you realize
I'm counting every footstep?
I'm counting every sound?
[Bridge]
Maybe tomorrow morning
You'll appear through the turnstile
Maybe this time I'll find you
(Je t'attends...)
[Outro]
Among these thousand strangers...
(Où es-tu?)
Among these thousand...
(Je t'attends...)

d66ecad3-8f6b-4f7b-b2a0-4a3a972a452e.sound: Modern nocturne, piano/cello lead, ambient synth pads, deep 808 bass, rain sounds

ad043b39-78a5-4efb-927d-2105d32a4284.name: Homeward
ad043b39-78a5-4efb-927d-2105d32a4284.sound: Indie cinematic, melancholic cello-led, atmospheric lo-fi, haunting female vocals
ad043b39-78a5-4efb-927d-2105d32a4284.lyrics:
[Intro - Instrumental with cello and saxophone]
[Verse 1]
Empty halls and footsteps
Each minute feels like a year
The screens keep changing numbers
But time stands still in here
[Pre-chorus 1]
(Waiting, just waiting)
(Time keeps moving slow)
[Chorus 1]
Your plane is somewhere in the sky tonight
I count the minutes till you're by my side
The coffee's cold but I don't mind at all
'Cause every second brings you through that wall
[Instrumental Bridge - Cello and saxophone interplay]
[Verse 2]
Papers drift across tiles
As cleaning carts roll past
I check my watch again now
Each breath could be the last
[Pre-chorus 2]
(Getting closer now)
(Can you feel it too?)
[Chorus 2]
The board says "landed" in bright blue and white
My heart is beating with all its might
I've memorized each detail of your face
Now every moment falls right into place
[Saxophone Solo]
[Bridge]
La la la, oh-oh
The morning light starts breaking through
La la la, oh-oh
Everything leads back to you
[Pre-chorus 3]
(Almost here now)
(Just moments more)
[Chorus 3]
The doors are opening wide tonight
And suddenly the world feels right
I've lived a thousand years right here
But now at last you're almost near
[Outro]
(Coming home to me)
(Finally coming home)
[Cello fades with atmospheric textures]

90c3cec6-d939-4a39-8b92-49e59efa0dd3.name: Solitude

(Ahhh-ahh)
[Verse 2]
Empty avenue
One silhouette moves
Dancing alone in streetlight
Dancing alone tonight
[Breakdown]
(Ohhh, ohhh)
Dancing alone
Dancing alone
Dancing alone
[Outro]
Empty avenue
(Dancing alone)
One silhouette moves
(Dancing alone)

9c0afc40-41b1-417f-b691-59d23e75b7bc.name: Solitaire
9c0afc40-41b1-417f-b691-59d23e75b7bc.sound: Gangsta rap, haunting cello, French vocals, deep 808s, noir atmosphere
9c0afc40-41b1-417f-b691-59d23e75b7bc.lyrics:
[Intro - Cello & Whispered French]
Dans les rues solitaires...
(In the solitary streets...)
[Verse 1]
On these blocks I'm movin' solo
Every step calculated, that's my motto
They think they know me but they don't though
Dans la rue they call me fantôme
Street signs pointin' where I can't go
Cold wind blowin', temperature low
Made my rules when I was down low
Now I'm up but still roll solo
[Chorus]
Seul dans la nuit (Alone in the night)
Je marche sans bruit (I walk without sound)
They never see me come, never see me ride
Seul dans la nuit, c'est ma vie
(That's my life, alone in the night)
[Verse 2 - French]
Les rues me connaissent, je connais les règles
Dans ce monde froid, je reste tranquille
Pas d'amis proches, c'est plus facile
Quand tu joues le jeu, reste agile
(The streets know me, I know the rules
In this cold world, I stay quiet
No close friends, it's easier that way
When you play the game, stay agile)
[Bridge]
[Haunting Cello Solo]
(Vocalization: Ohhhh-oh-oh...)
Les rues m'appellent...
(The streets are calling...)
[Verse 3]
Street smart player, that's how I move
Got nothin' to prove, got nothin' to lose
They try to read me but I keep it cool
Silent moves make the wisest rules
Watch them follow while I set the pace
Every block I cross, I leave no trace
This game of chess, I play to win
Solo player, that's how it's been
[Chorus]
Seul dans la nuit (Alone in the night)
Je marche sans bruit (I walk without sound)
They never see me come, never see me ride
Seul dans la nuit, c'est ma vie
(That's my life, alone in the night)
[Outro]
[808 Bass fades with Cello]
(Whispered) Dans les rues solitaires...
Forever alone in the night...

5a390e47-00fe-4a98-8db0-76601fd12da9.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Rain sounds and distant traffic]
Mmmmm... ahhh...
[Verse 1]
Late night window
Watching droplets fall

Into waterfall
Can't look away
From this display
[Pre-chorus]
(Ooh, the rain keeps falling)
(Keeps falling down)
[Chorus]
Rain dissolves the light
Colors running wild
Rain dissolves the light
Makes the world so mild
[Verse 2]
Empty streets below
Patterns on the glass
Time moves slow tonight
Let the moment last
Everything flows
In the rainfall's glow
[Pre-chorus]
(Ooh, the rain keeps falling)
(Keeps falling down)
[Chorus]
Rain dissolves the light
Colors running wild
Rain dissolves the light
Makes the world so mild

When the world turns soft

Into something else entirely

Like a painting here

(Colors running wild)
Rain dissolves the light
(Makes the world so mild)

495189d2-383d-4f29-80e4-a8afa10b2afa.name: Echoes
495189d2-383d-4f29-80e4-a8afa10b2afa.sound: Trip hop, heavy bass guitar, jungle beats, ethereal ambient, reverb 808, cello/piano fusion
495189d2-383d-4f29-80e4-a8afa10b2afa.lyrics:
[Intro - Whispered]
(Your voice still lingers here...)
(In every corner...)
[Instrumental Verse 1]
[Piano & Cello]
[Pre-chorus 1]
In these walls, your presence stays
Like a pulse that never fades
Every room still holds your name
Time stands still but I remain
[Chorus]
Your echo fills these empty rooms
Each heartbeat brings me back to you
Your echo fills my solitude
Until you're back, until you're back, I wait for you
[Instrumental Verse 2]
[Piano & Cello with Bass]
[Pre-chorus 2]
Through the silence, through the rain
All these memories remain
Like a symphony of pain
Caught between loss and gain
[Chorus]
Your echo fills these empty rooms
Each heartbeat brings me back to you
Your echo fills my solitude
Until you're back, until you're back, I wait for you
[Bridge]
Breaking through the static of my mind
Your voice becomes so clear
Like a signal growing strong with time
The closer you appear
(Ohhh... appearing clearer...)
[Final Chorus]
Your echo fills these empty rooms
(These empty rooms...)
Each heartbeat brings me back to you
(Back to you...)
Your echo fills my solitude
Until you're back, until you're back
Until you're back, I wait for you
[Outro]
(I wait... I wait...)
[Fade effect with reverb]

a943aade-2e83-4c9e-8045-f0cec12d802d.name: Echoes
a943aade-2e83-4c9e-8045-f0cec12d802d.sound: Hip-hop fusion, acoustic instruments, 808 bass, urban atmosphere, melancholic
a943aade-2e83-4c9e-8045-f0cec12d802d.lyrics:
[Intro - Double Bass & Piano]
[Rain sounds, distant traffic]
[Pre-chorus]
The walls remember footsteps
That used to fill these empty halls
Time moves slower in the quiet
When there's no one else at all
[Chorus]
These rooms feel different now
(Oh, so different now)
Every sound rings louder somehow
(La-da-da, rings louder)
Learning how to breathe alone
While the rain keeps falling down
[Instrumental Break]
[Subway rumble, violin solo]
[Bridge]
Sometimes I catch my reflection
Speaking words I need to hear
counting steps across the floorboards
Making peace with being here
[Pre-chorus]
The morning light feels gentle now
As it streams across my bed
Coffee steam fills morning silence
New routines inside my head
[Chorus]
These rooms feel different now
(Oh, so different now)
Every sound rings louder somehow
(La-da-da, rings louder)
Learning how to breathe alone
While the rain keeps falling down
[Outro]
[Violin fades with rain sounds]
(Oh, learning how...)
[Double bass pizzicato diminishing]
[Urban atmosphere fades]

70510d37-ba97-426d-a8a4-9f923e9fa33d.name: Sweet Poison (Si Douce)
70510d37-ba97-426d-a8a4-9f923e9fa33d.sound: Cloud rap, French vocals, lo-fi production, nostalgic melodies, dreamy atmosphere
70510d37-ba97-426d-a8a4-9f923e9fa33d.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Petite princesse parfaite devant tout le monde
Mais je vois bien ce que tu fais dans l'ombre
Sourires sucrés, paroles empoisonnées
Tu penses que personne ne peut deviner
Les mots que tu dis quand je pars
Les mensonges que tu répands sans regard
Précieuse amie, tu prétends m'aimer
Pendant que tu cherches à me blesser
(La-la-la, oh-oh)

9e95588f-abf9-4148-98bc-4385ab4a94b3.name: Soma
9e95588f-abf9-4148-98bc-4385ab4a94b3.sound: Ambient, meditative cave, slow piano, Tibetan bowls, nature sounds
9e95588f-abf9-4148-98bc-4385ab4a94b3.lyrics:
[Intro]
Deep stone breath
Cool air holds
Pulse in the dark
[Stillness]
Soft steps inside
Body vanishes
Held by rock—
slow exhale
Air moves through cracks
Invisible, gentle
Everything ancient
I drift, I rest
[Resonance]
Low bowl singing
Echoes ripple, disappear
Drops of water, single notes
Fade—space remains
[Interlude]
[Water dripping]
[Wind in stone]
[Chorus]
Inside the stone
Inside myself
Vast, safe, unending
Inside the stone
[Breakdown]
[Silence — only distant movements]
Weightless, timeless
Soundless, slow
[Piano notes—long reverb]
[Shakuhachi breath — distant]
[Bridge]
Edges disappear
Sense dissolves
All is presence
All is stone
[Chorus]
Inside the stone
Inside myself
Protected, surrendered
Inside the stone
[Outro]
Quiet holds me
Moment eternal
Nothing outside
Stone heart—still
[Silence]

e53833e1-f7f8-4a2d-83c7-36f7c3272fbc.name: Bleach Boy (Variation)
e53833e1-f7f8-4a2d-83c7-36f7c3272fbc.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Fuzzy bass riff with heavy distortion, loose drum beat with crashing cymbals]
MAMA... [quiet, mumbled vocal]
...BLEACH... [voice cracks on high note]

[Verse 1]
[Drums settle into sludgy groove, guitar feedback whines]
Daddy's little soldier cleans the floor with ammonia dreams [strained, nasal vocal]
Swallowed yellow sunlight, nothing's ever what it seems [guitar chord stab]
TV preaches happiness in 30-second streams [bass plays melodic line]
Wash my mouth with gasoline, spit out perfect seams [cymbal crash]

[Chorus]
[Explosive dynamic shift - full band aggression]
I AM BLEACH BOY! [raw, screaming vocal with distortion]
PRETTY ON THE INSIDE! [guitar power chords]
I AM BLEACH BOY! [voice breaks with emotion]
NOWHERE LEFT TO HIDE! [drums go half-time]

[Verse 2]
[Returns to sludgy verse groove]
Sister cuts her bangs again, mirror tells her pretty lies [deadpan, tired vocal]
Mother's little helper comes in pharmaceutical disguise [feedback swell]
We all learn to smile right when something inside dies [snare roll]
Practice in the bathroom where the light never dies [bass slide]

[Bridge]
[Tempo slows dramatically, sparse guitar notes]
Can you feel the static? [whispered, close-mic'd]
Growing in your veins? [single piano key hits]
Everything is plastic... [guitar feedback builds]
...EXCEPT THE PAIN! [sudden scream]

[Guitar Solo]
[Noisy, chaotic solo with heavy vibrato, string scraping, amp feedback]

[Final Chorus]
[Maximum intensity, slower and heavier]
I! AM! BLEACH! BOY! [guttural scream]
PRETTY ON THE INSIDE! [power chords with whammy bar dives]
I! AM! BLEACH! BOY! [desperate, breaking vocal]
NO! WHERE! LEFT! TO! HIDE! [cymbal smash and sustain]

[Outro]
[Band drops out except bass riff]
Bleach boy... [exhausted, whispered vocal]
Pretty... [guitar feedback squeal]
...so pretty... [vocal fades]
[Final feedback oscillation decays into silence]

82abf3c5-2d12-4e93-9347-9d1ac4f22339.name: Вспышки памяти (Memory Flashes)

82abf3c5-2d12-4e93-9347-9d1ac4f22339.lyrics:
[Intro - acoustic guitar]
[Verse 1]
В тесной будке день за днём сижу один
Между стен стеклянных как в аквариуме жизнь
Люди приходят, смотрят в объектив
Я храню их тайны, словно верный часовой
Молодая пара, первый поцелуй
Бабушка с внучатами - летний выходной
В каждом кадре время застывает вновь
(Ла-ла-ла, время застывает)
[Chorus]

Вспышки памяти хранят чужие дни
(О-о-о, чужие дни)
Вспышки памяти - история людей
В чёрно-белом фильме городской судьбы
[Verse 2]
Утром - бизнесмены в галстуках спешат
Вечером влюблённые приходят помечтать
Ночью - одинокие с печалью во глазах
Ищут отражение потерянного дня
(О-о-о, потерянного дня)
[Bridge]
Студенты, старики
Невесты, моряки
Солдаты, детвора
Прохожие, друзья
[Нарастание]
Все спешат успеть
Себя запечатлеть
В истории простой
За маленькой стеной
[Solo - электрогитара]
[La-la-la-la...]
[Verse 3]
Город изменился, время всё течёт
Плёнка на цифру, новый поворот
Но в коробке старой сотни фотографий

[Chorus]
Вспышки памяти, как звёзды в темноте

(О-о-о, чужие дни)

(Эхо) Вспышки памяти...

3ad78120-cb21-44d4-8743-fca073360de4.name:
Stars Keep Spinning
 (fx variations)
3ad78120-cb21-44d4-8743-fca073360de4.sound:
Boy Band Style, Chillwave: 
Atmospheric chillwave beat with catchy synth melody, smooth trap-inspired drums, airy pads, subtle bass with dreamy vibe, upbeat tempo 100-110 BPM. Vocals sung by male voices in boy band style — clear, harmonious, layered with smooth vocal blending and light autotune for polish. Emotional and youthful tone, combining warmth and intimacy typical for boy bands, while keeping modern chillwave production and viral social media appeal.
, 
Atmospheric chillwave beat with rich, layered synth textures including shimmering arpeggios and lush evolving pads, smooth trap-inspired drums with sidechained spacious kicks, deep yet soft bassline with warm analog character. Add subtle ambient field recordings (soft wind, distant water droplets) for organic depth. Vocal arrangement in harmonious boy band style — clean, silky voices, precise layering, gentle autotune blending with soft chorus and slight phasing. Dynamic and evolving soundscape with occasional reversed sound effects, tape saturation warmth, gentle vinyl crackle textures, and sparkling delay tails. Tempo steady around 105 BPM to maintain dreamy, rhythmic flow. Aim for a hypnotic, emotionally uplifting yet intimate feel tuned for viral social media engagement and TikTok appeal.
3ad78120-cb21-44d4-8743-fca073360de4.lyrics:
[INTRO]
Stars above, they light the night (ooooh)
Turning worlds with gentle light (ah-ah)
[soft shimmering synth arpeggio, subtle sparkling delay, gentle ambient wind texture]
[VERSE 1]
Someone gazes at the sky,
[soft warm reverb, subtle delay with airy texture on “sky”]
Watching stars as they pass by,
[breathy pad swells subtly]
Every spark a secret told,
[smooth filter sweep rising gently on “told”]
Whispers of a night so bold.
[linger airy echo emphasizing “bold”]
[PRE-CHORUS 1]
And as the darkness falls, (falls)
[gated reverb with soft pitch drop for magic feel]
The world begins to turn, (turn)
[vocal doubling with gentle chorus phaser]
Every night a story calls, (calls)
[smooth delay fading into next phrase]
In every star we learn.
[rich warm pad swell with soft reverse reverb tail]
[CHORUS]
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
[wide stereo delay with subtle shimmer]
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
[vocal layering with soft autotune, subtle harmonic chorus]
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
[gentle chorus effect with crystalline reverb]
And every evening starts again tonight.
[long, smooth reverb with sparkling tail]
[VERSE 2]
Silent skies, a glowing dance,
[slow filter sweep from low to high, soft vinyl crackle texture]
Draw the dreamers in a trance,
[gentle pad rise enveloping vocals]
Eyes reflect the endless space,
[light echo with dreamy pitch modulation]
In their gaze, the world’s embrace.
[soft delay and shimmer]
[PRE-CHORUS 2]
Hearts aligned with heaven's tune, (tune)
[vocal panning with airy harmonies]
Time’s a circle in this view, (view)
[subtle shimmer reverb with smooth tape stop effect]
Counting stars beneath the moon, (moon)
[ambient pad swell]
Night’s eternal rendezvous.
[soft fade with reverse ambient swell]
[CHORUS]
(Repeat with added soft cymbal swells and ethereal vocal layering)
[OUTRO]
So when you feel the stars above (above)
[long reverse reverb echo with gentle pitch rise]
Know they’re turning all with love (with love)
[fade out with gentle tape saturation and warm ambient textures]
And every night when eyes arise,
The world keeps spinning ‘neath the skies.
[subtle digital sparkle fading into atmospheric silence]

bfc21ee4-ad85-4394-b634-3aba9c91c53a.name: can you hear…   (Variation)
bfc21ee4-ad85-4394-b634-3aba9c91c53a.lyrics:
[VERSE]
[whispered, dry, close-mic — voice like gravel in a throat that hasn’t spoken in years]
you know…
[low-pass filter opens — 100Hz → 300Hz, 2s — as if the air itself is forgetting how to carry sound]
how rain smells…
[bit-crusher engages — 12-bit, 11kHz — the sound of a memory corrupted by time]
not like earth…
not like water…
but like the inside of a closed window…
after the last person left…
on glass…
[tape stop effect — 0.5s slowdown + pitch drop — like the moment before the power dies]
after midnight…
when the streetlights forget their names…
and the cars drive past like ghosts who don’t remember where they’re going…
[CHORUS]
[guitar and bass lock into tight groove — 92 BPM, mechanical, unyielding]
[vocal enters — 2 beats late, breath ragged, chest-heavy — deep, distorted, throat-splitting baritone, full vocal fry, no control, as if each word is pulled from bone]
i don’t want to be…
[distortion fades in — tube saturation, 5% — not warmth. the sound of a lung that learned to breathe static]
part of…
[drum machine cuts out — only bass remains, pulsing like a heart refusing to stop]
this city…
that taught me silence…
and called it peace…
that gave me screens…
and called it connection…
that fed me noise…
and called it life…
[OUTRO]
[music fades — only bass loop + distant city ambience, rain now heavy, steady, like a heartbeat without a body]
[vocal now processed through old phone filter — 300Hz–3.4kHz bandpass — as if speaking through a crack in the wall of a room that no longer exists]
can you hear…
[glitch: 17ms sample hold — repeats “breathe” as stutter — a digital echo of a breath that should’ve been the last]
how i…
[reverse reverb swells — 1.2s, then cuts abruptly — like the moment the machine decides you’re no longer needed]
breathe…?
[long pause — 3.7s — rain continues, slow, patient]
…
[one final whisper, barely audible, as if the voice is now coming from the walls]
…
i’m still here.

1fdd978d-290d-498d-a69d-e46e45faeefa.name: Untitled

9005b645-d15d-45b4-903b-5bd1006f1d85.name:
Veil of Forgotten Echoes
 (Variation)
9005b645-d15d-45b4-903b-5bd1006f1d85.sound: psychedelic 70s, warm vintage electric piano, detuned wah guitar with smooth delay, rounded upright bass, brushed snare with subtle electronic percussion, layered organ drones with phaser, male lead vocal: deep raw baritone whisper with analog tape saturation and texture, harmonized male backing vocals in close harmony with tape echo, vinyl crackle and tape hiss textures, natural analog delay and reverb, tempo 92 BPM, mood: intimate psychedelic nocturnal ritual, blending vintage warmth with modern depth and clarity
9005b645-d15d-45b4-903b-5bd1006f1d85.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[soft vinyl crackle and tape hiss fading in]
[warm vintage electric piano with gentle evolving synth pads — 92 BPM]
[deep raw baritone male whisper — textured, intimate, analog saturation]
Whispers through the veil of time...
[VERSE 1]
[detuned wah guitar with smooth delay]
Shadows dance on faded walls,
Silent voices softly call,
Time slips through woven threads,
Secrets kept in twilight beds.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[layered organ drones with subtle phaser effect]
Hidden tones in quiet streams,
Echoes trace forgotten dreams,
[CHORUS]
[rounded upright bass, brushed snare, soft electronic percussions]
Veil of echoes, soft and deep,
Rhythms roll where shadows sleep.
[POST-CHORUS]
[harmonized male vocals close harmony, drenched in tape echo]
Forgotten echoes,
Silent shadows.
[OUTRO]
[vinyl crackle and tape hiss swell]
[soft synth fade with analog delay and reverb]
Fade away...
Until new light...

f294f910-de1d-4bba-8608-1ffe903aabbd.name: postmark: Never Sent
f294f910-de1d-4bba-8608-1ffe903aabbd.sound: Male baritone only—ultra-intimate whispered verses, calm dry spoken-word choruses, voice nearly dissolving into atmosphere. Rhythm from organic rain sounds: rain on cardboard, paper soaking and tearing, distant gutter drip, soft wind. No instruments, no reverb, no digital effects. Only analog tape saturation, subtle wow/flutter, and light vinyl crackle. Tempo: 66 BPM. Mood: serene, ritualistic release, quiet transcendence. Style: 1975 Los Angeles dawn, final act of a private ceremony, voice as last witness, rain as deliverance.
f294f910-de1d-4bba-8608-1ffe903aabbd.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[rain falls on cardboard box — soft, soaking sound]
[paper begins to warp — subtle crinkle]
[whispered, final, calm]
…go…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, synced to raindrops]
I carried you in a shoebox
for seven winters.
Now I leave you on the step—
not to send,
not to burn,
just to let the rain
take what I couldn’t say.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[paper tears softly as it soaks]
The ink’s running.
The edges curl.
You’re becoming weather.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, low baritone, dry, peaceful]
No address.
No stamp.
Just rain as the postman.
You’ll travel now—
not through mail,
but through puddles,
through gutters,
through the roots
of the oak on the corner.
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, barely audible]
I don’t watch it happen.
I turn inside.
But I hear it—
the sound of paper
turning back into tree,
into cloud,
into silence.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[box collapses slightly under weight of water]
No words left.
Only water.
[CHORUS]
[spoken-word, same tone, with gentle tape saturation]
No address.
No stamp.
Just rain as the postman.
You’ll travel now—
not through mail,
but through puddles,
through gutters,
through the roots
of the oak on the corner.
[POST-CHORUS]
[whispers dissolving into rain]
…sent…
…never sent…
…free…
[OUTRO]
[long silence — only rain on wet cardboard and wood]
[final breath — no words]
[10 seconds of rain, gradually fading]
[tape runs out — soft stop click]
[one last drop — *plink* — then absolute silence]

f5a49865-e673-46b1-aa39-a65f69d52d88.name: 待機 (Wait)
f5a49865-e673-46b1-aa39-a65f69d52d88.sound: Tech-house, J-pop, 128bpm, deep sub bass, nightclub, VIP mix effects
f5a49865-e673-46b1-aa39-a65f69d52d88.lyrics:
[Intro]
（Low sub-bass throb, soft hi-hats, crowd murmurs in distance）

人混みの中で （in the crowd）
ぼんやり君を探す
声は消えていく
いつもと違う夜
[Instrumental Verse]
(Deep bass, tech-house groove)
[Pre-chorus] (whispered)
近づいた靴音
doorが閉まる前に
となりにいる？
[Chorus]
まだ ここで 待ってる
[Instrumental Verse]
(Chopped vocal samples, rising FX)
[Verse 2]
改札抜けてく
思い出の足跡
君とすれ違う度
鼓動だけ響いた
[Pre-chorus] (whispered)
時間止まってほしい
何も言えぬまま
息だけ熱い
[Chorus]
まだ ここで 待ってる
[Bridge]
終電が鳴るだけ
君の後ろ姿
触れずに消えて
[Chorus]
まだ ここで 待ってる

（Deep sub-bass, distant platform announcement）

c6399ac1-365f-4045-93c3-68d9320ed93e.name: Silence
c6399ac1-365f-4045-93c3-68d9320ed93e.sound: Tech house, 90s electronics, minimal French vocals, long instrumental sections
c6399ac1-365f-4045-93c3-68d9320ed93e.lyrics:
[Long Instrumental Intro]
[Verse 1]
[Instrumental]
[Pre-chorus]
Je sens le rythme, je sens la nuit
Tout me contrôle, je veux sortir
Un souffle profond, je ferme les yeux
Je t’entends parler, je veux partir
[Chorus]
Je laisse tout partir, ce soir, rien ne me retient
Je laisse tout partir, tout glisse entre mes mains
Je laisse tout partir, ce soir, rien ne me retient
Je laisse tout partir, tout glisse entre mes mains
[Extended Instrumental]
[Pre-chorus]
Je perds la force, mais je souris
La lumière tourne, je me laisse aller
Oublier le temps, je ne combats plus
T’entendre ici, ne me retient plus
[Chorus]
Je laisse tout partir, ce soir, rien ne me retient
Je laisse tout partir, tout glisse entre mes mains
Je laisse tout partir, ce soir, rien ne me retient
Je laisse tout partir, tout glisse entre mes mains
[Solo]
[Instrumental]
[Post-chorus]
(Tout partir, tout partir)
(Je te laisse, je me perds)
(Tout partir, tout partir)
(Rien ne me retient)
[Final Chorus]
Je laisse tout partir, ce soir, rien ne me retient
Je laisse tout partir, tout glisse entre mes mains
[Outro - Long instrumental fade]

a2f89f62-41d3-48d7-be96-b3d49fe83c30.name: Luxe
a2f89f62-41d3-48d7-be96-b3d49fe83c30.sound: electronic, vip club, Arabic fusion, ASMR textures, luxury sound design, 128 BPM
a2f89f62-41d3-48d7-be96-b3d49fe83c30.lyrics:
[Drop]
[0:00-0:30]
909 hits—Hermès snap
Diamond tick (left)
Gucci silk slide (right)
(binaural—diamond tap)
[Verse]
[0:30-1:00]
Bassline folds—echoed
Perfume spray, laced in air
Sidechain violin—barely there
بالهدوء... (ghosted in the snare)
Caviar clicking—lux
Lip clicks, rhythm rush
[Pre-Chorus]
[1:00-1:20]
Danse... lumière... تعال...
(whispered, glassy)
Mouths close—click—pause
Crystal breath, soft draw…
Reverb linger—dream pause
[Chorus]
[1:20-1:50]
!تعال... Oui la nuit
!تعال... Oui la nuit
Silk flutters, ring taps blend
(whispered Chanel… ع... faded end)
Rolls-Royce roll—floor bend
[Breakdown]
[1:50-2:10]
Throat humming, velvet sub
Champagne bubble—ribbon rub
Low breaths, grained
Sidechain fade
[Solo]
Moroccan violin spiral—
Couture needle thread—fine
(faint Russian sigh—buried, faint)
[Final Chorus]
[2:10-2:30]
!تعال... تعال... تعال...
Oui la nuit—triple line
Couture stitch—exit sign
19.8kHz, whispered high—
Paris-Dubai, silent fly
[Outro]
Air band, scatter light—
ASMR fades, hushes night.

1f936596-c1f7-4e8e-9999-bb487b57805b.name: Solo Vibes
1f936596-c1f7-4e8e-9999-bb487b57805b.sound: Trip-hop rap, smooth female vocals, cello/piano instrumentals, heavy 808s, reverb atmosphere
1f936596-c1f7-4e8e-9999-bb487b57805b.lyrics:
[Instrumental Verse 1 - Cello & Piano]
[Pre-chorus 1]
I used to need someone right by my side
Thought being alone meant something to hide
But lately I'm seeing a different light
These empty streets got me feeling alright
[Chorus 1]
These empty streets got me feeling complete
No one around, just the rhythm, the beat
Found my peace in this quiet escape
Learning to love my own space
These empty streets got me feeling alive
Don't need nobody to help me survive
Finally free from what people might say
Walking my own way
[Instrumental Verse 2 - Cello & Piano with Ethereal Vocals]
(Ahh, ooh...)
[Pre-chorus 2]
Every step takes me further away
From who I was trying to be yesterday
Not looking back at the games that we played
'Cause on my own is where I wanna stay
[Chorus 2]
These empty streets got me feeling complete
No one around, just the rhythm, the beat
Found my peace in this quiet escape
Learning to love my own space
These empty streets got me feeling alive
Don't need nobody to help me survive
Finally free from what people might say
Walking my own way
[Bridge]
They say it's lonely at the top
But I say it's peaceful when you stop
Trying to be what they want you to be
Now I can finally breathe
(Finally breathe...)
[Final Chorus]
These empty streets got me feeling complete
(Got me feeling, got me feeling...)
No one around, just the rhythm, the beat
Found my peace in this quiet escape
Learning to love my own space
These empty streets got me feeling alive
Don't need nobody to help me survive
Finally free from what people might say
Walking my own way

111a359f-43aa-468c-9779-ad5ef4ca2436.name: Urban Pulse
111a359f-43aa-468c-9779-ad5ef4ca2436.sound: Alternative jungle, haunting cello lead, smoky saxophone, deep bass, French vocals
111a359f-43aa-468c-9779-ad5ef4ca2436.lyrics:
[Intro - Whispered]
La la di da... mmm... waiting...
(Où es-tu mon amour?)
[Verse 1 - Instrumental with Cello Lead]
[Soft atmospheric textures]
[Pre-chorus 1]
Through rain-slicked streets I roam
Each sign points me to you
Dans les rues de la ville
Where signals guide me through
[Chorus 1]
Every blinking light speaks your name tonight
In red and blue and white
Cette ville me parle de toi
(Je te cherche partout)
The patterns in the sky
Lead me to where you might arrive
[Musical Interlude - Saxophone Solo]
[Verse 2]
[Cello and jungle rhythms intensify]
[Pre-chorus 2]
Electric pulses write your way
Through intersections bright
Messages hidden in displays
Paint pathways in the night
[Breakdown]
Mmmm... da da di...
(Je suis là, je t'attends)
La da di mmm...
[808 bass drops out]
[Chorus 2]
Every changing light draws me closer now
Through rain and mist somehow
The city writes your story clear
(Je sens ta présence)
Each signal brings you near
Till finally our paths appear
[Outro - Whispered]
(Je t'ai trouvé enfin...)
[Cello fades with jungle rhythms]
[Atmospheric fade to silence]

e0f832dc-362a-4b97-b0eb-8151e5e2efa7.name: Fading Streets
e0f832dc-362a-4b97-b0eb-8151e5e2efa7.sound: Lo-fi hip-hop, melancholic cello, haunting saxophone, fast jungle breaks, urban ambience
e0f832dc-362a-4b97-b0eb-8151e5e2efa7.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Every midnight on the block
Between the wind and rain
Watching from my window sill
While you walk away
Through the empty streets below
Past the corner store
[Pre-chorus]
The space grows wider day by day
As time moves on and on
[Chorus]
I count the streets between us now
One by one they fade
I count the streets between us here
While you slip away
(Slip away, slip away)
[Verse 2]
Monday through the window pane
Tuesday passing by
Walking past the same lamppost
Never turning right
Through the puddles on the ground
Past the midnight train
[Pre-chorus]
The space grows wider night by night
As time slips through my hands
[Chorus]
I count the streets between us now
One by one they fade
I count the streets between us here
While you slip away
(Slip away, slip away)
[Bridge]
[Saxophone Solo]
[Cello & Drum Break]

0a6c6822-c33d-44f8-b185-54557fbd0721.name: Одинокая Роскошь (Lonely Luxury)

В пустом дворце сижу одна

Богатство душу не согреет
Холодный мрамор леденеет

Все вокруг, но я врозь

В сердце зимняя ночь
(О-о-о...)

Кто поймет меня такую?
В тишине большого зала
Я по комнатам брожу и
Эхо слышу, как металл

[Atmospheric synths with rain intensifying]
[Chorus]

Одинокая роскошь
В сердце зимняя ночь

616f2986-0b69-45e4-a9b9-98694a335d54.name: Тоска de Luxe (Luxury's Void)
616f2986-0b69-45e4-a9b9-98694a335d54.sound: Dark electronic noir, trip-hop rhythm, French-Russian vocals, haunting 95 BPM, sub-bass
616f2986-0b69-45e4-a9b9-98694a335d54.lyrics:
[Intro]
(О-ля-тоска... тоска de luxe...)
[В тишине падает стекло]
[Verse 1]
В этот час Париж так далёк
Диор на плечах как тяжёлый упрёк
Шампанское капли на платье моём
В дорогих бутиках я теряю свой дом
[Pre-chorus]
Жизнь в витринах, как в клетке брожу
За маской Prada себя не найду
[Chorus]
Тоска de luxe в моей душе горит (О-о-о)
Balenciaga не может исцелить
Saint Laurent на коже как печать
Но сердце продолжает так кричать
(Тоска... тоска de luxe...)
[Verse 2]
Gucci платит за мой обман
В зеркалах витрин я как сладкий дурман
Каждый взгляд прохожих пронзает насквозь
Все улыбки фальшивы, здесь правды нет, брось
[Pre-chorus]
Жизнь в витринах, как в клетке брожу
За маской Prada себя не найду
[Solo]
[Саксофон плачет под пульс баса]
(А-а-а... де люкс... а-а-а...)
[Bridge]
Ты говорил - роскошь лечит боль
Но каждый день становится как ноль
(Тоска de luxe... тоска...)
[Chorus]
Тоска de luxe в моей душе горит (О-о-о)
Balenciaga не может исцелить
Saint Laurent на коже как печать
Но сердце продолжает так кричать
[Outro]
(Тоска de luxe...)
[Звук затихающего шёлка]
[Последний удар баса]

71e426d1-e35e-45b2-87c4-578f52cce2c9.name:
Stars Keep Spinning
 (Variation)
71e426d1-e35e-45b2-87c4-578f52cce2c9.sound: Atmospheric chillwave beat with a catchy synth melody, smooth trap-inspired drums, airy pads, subtle bass with a dreamy vibe, upbeat tempo around 100-110 BPM, vocals soft with light autotune, emotional but pop-friendly; vibe is youthful, hopeful, and hypnotic for a viral social media hit.
71e426d1-e35e-45b2-87c4-578f52cce2c9.lyrics:
Intro:
Stars above, they light the night (ooooh)
Turning worlds with gentle light (ah-ah)
Verse 1:
Someone gazes at the sky,
Watching stars as they pass by,
Every spark a secret told,
Whispers of a night so bold.
Pre-Chorus 1:
And as the darkness falls, (falls)
The world begins to turn, (turn)
Every night a story calls, (calls)
In every star we learn.
Chorus:
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
And every evening starts again tonight.
Verse 2:
Silent skies, a glowing dance,
Draw the dreamers in a trance,
Eyes reflect the endless space,
In their gaze, the world’s embrace.
Pre-Chorus 2:
Hearts aligned with heaven's tune, (tune)
Time’s a circle in this view, (view)
Counting stars beneath the moon, (moon)
Night’s eternal rendezvous.
Chorus:
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
And every evening starts again tonight.
Outro:
So when you feel the stars above (above)
Know they’re turning all with love (with love)
And every night when eyes arise,
The world keeps spinning ‘neath the skies.

86c6fd53-50e9-49e4-9fb9-e38840e90570.name: Soul Path
86c6fd53-50e9-49e4-9fb9-e38840e90570.sound: Hip-hop, dark orchestral cello, heavy 808 bass, urban atmosphere
86c6fd53-50e9-49e4-9fb9-e38840e90570.lyrics:
[Intro]
[City sounds: distant traffic, light rain]
[Cello: deep, haunting melody]
[Verse 1]
On my grind while they sleep
Heavy rain on my feet
Every block that I meet
Makes me feel so complete
Silent streets speak louder than the day
That's what keeps me on my way
No competition in my lane
Just me and the rain
All these buildings towering high
While I'm steady passing by
Got a job that I gotta do
Rain or shine, I'm coming through
(Coming through)
Silent streets speak louder than the day
Got my own path to slay
[Chorus]
Silent streets speak louder than the day (than the day)
Found my peace in my own way (own way)
When everyone's gone away (gone away)
That's when I find my way (find my way)
[Cello bridge]
[Rap Verse]
Check it - moving swift through the empty space
Got my route mapped out, keeping steady pace
24/7, yeah I'm on the move
Got these empty streets proving I got something to prove
Silent streets speak louder than the day
That's the motto that keeps me in my lane
No traffic lights gonna slow my roll
Got deliveries making me feel whole
Ain't no time to waste, gotta keep it pushing
Through the rain and cold, mind stays crushing
Every destination's just another test
Silent streets speak louder, yeah you know the rest
(Know the rest)
[Bridge]
[Cello solo intensifies]
Empty roads
Heavy load
Silent streets speak louder than the day
This is home
On my own
Making moves in my zone
[Chorus]
Silent streets speak louder than the day (than the day)
Found my peace in my own way (own way)
When everyone's gone away (gone away)
That's when I find my way (find my way)
[Outro]
[Cello fades]
Silent streets speak louder than the day
Silent streets speak louder...
(Than the day...)
[Rain sounds fade]

4317d15a-5f4f-4ed6-a9ab-a2f654545999.name: Paper Wings
4317d15a-5f4f-4ed6-a9ab-a2f654545999.sound: Cinematic alternative, haunting cello lead, jungle beats, French vocals, atmospheric
4317d15a-5f4f-4ed6-a9ab-a2f654545999.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Atmospheric cello and jungle beats fade in]
(Follow... follow...)
[Verse 1 - Instrumental]
[Cello and saxophone interplay]
[Pre-chorus 1]
I catch a glimpse of white
On rain-swept stone
Each step brings me near
À travers la ville
[Chorus 1]
Je suis les ailes de papier ce soir
(Paper wings tonight)
Dans les rues, je trouve mon chemin vers toi
(Finding my way to you)
Les étoiles guident mes pas
(Stars guide my steps)
[Musical Interlude]
[Saxophone solo over jungle rhythm]
[Verse 2 - Instrumental]
[Cello crescendo]
[Pre-chorus 2]
Around each corner now
Another sign
Patient artistry
Dans l'obscurité
[Chorus 2]
Je cours après ces messages pliés
(Following folded messages)
Chaque rue me rapproche de notre destinée
(Each street brings destiny)
Mon coeur suit la trace
(My heart follows the path)
[Bridge]
[Cello and saxophone build intensity]
(Closer... closer...)
[Final Chorus]
Je vois la dernière aile qui danse
(The final wing is dancing)
Le moment arrive, je peux le sentir
(The moment approaches, I can feel it)
Notre histoire se déploie
(Our story unfolds)
[Outro]
[Cello fades with jungle beats]
(Follow... follow...)

8e4de70d-0da6-4be4-8267-b2d4a4402c1d.name: Morning Path
8e4de70d-0da6-4be4-8267-b2d4a4402c1d.sound: Cinematic instrumental, melancholic cello, subtle 808 bass, urban ambiance, downtempo
8e4de70d-0da6-4be4-8267-b2d4a4402c1d.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Early morning, barely awake
These empty streets, the path I take
My mind drifts like morning mist
Past mistakes that still persist
[Pre-chorus]
Walking alone, watching day break
Each step I make, my heart might ache
But something's changing in the air
As morning comes, I start to dare
[Chorus]
First light, first breath
Walking through emptiness
First light, first breath
Finding gentleness
(Finding my way back home)
[Verse 2]
Rain-soaked streets reflect the dawn
Every trace of night is gone
Time moves slow, but I keep pace
Finding peace in empty space
[Rap]
Moving through the morning grey
Thoughts keep spinning, day by day
Trying to find my way ahead
All these words left unsaid
Streets are empty, mind is full
Taking steps, breaking the lull
Morning air clears my head
New path waiting to be led
[Bridge]
Sometimes silence speaks the truth
Sometimes healing starts with you
(Starting with you)
Sometimes walking helps you see
What you're meant to be
[Solo - Cello]
[Atmospheric sounds of morning city]
[Chorus]
First light, first breath
Walking through emptiness
First light, first breath
Finding gentleness
(Finding my way back home)
[Outro]
Morning comes, and I remain
Walking forward through the rain
Each step brings a brand new day

[Verse 1]

[Pre-chorus]

Плыву с утра, где черепахи не спешат

[Pre-chorus]
Всё то, что я хочу
Доступно на раз-два

[Chorus]
Рай не лечит, не спасает
Рука устала поднимать бокал

Только пустота внутри не лечится силой
Платье от кутюр, туфли из новой коллекции
Но не заглушить дорогим шампанским рефлексий
Все завидуют мне, шлют сердечки, лайки

[Bridge]
В океане тишины

[Chorus]
Рай не лечит, не спасает
Рука устала поднимать бокал

В раю пустом... (пустом...)
[Звук волн затихает]

f7e46476-6a14-40a9-aa6f-5721cdf8d954.name: i am not silent…
f7e46476-6a14-40a9-aa6f-5721cdf8d954.lyrics:
[VERSE]
[close-mic, no reverb — voice raw, low baritone, full vocal fry, breath audible like a torn valve]
beneath the pavement…
[sub-bass drop — 35Hz, 1.2s — felt in the ribs, not heard]
the wires hum…
[bit-crusher — 8-bit, 8kHz — voice fractures like old data]
not songs…
not prayers…
just the sound of something…
still trying…
[CHORUS]
[analog pad swells — Juno, low-passed to 120Hz, LFO 0.08Hz — like slow tectonic shift]
[vocal enters — 3 beats late, chest resonance dominant, pitch hovering between G2 and E2]
i am not silent…
[tape saturation — +3dB over, gentle distortion — warmth in the crack]
i am waiting…
[reverse cymbal swell — 2.0s, cut before peak — like a thought that never formed]
for the signal…
to mean something…
[OUTRO]
[music dissolves — only sub-bass drone and rain remains]
[vocal processed through broken vocoder — carrier signal unstable, words glitching]
can you feel…
[granular delay — 300ms grain size, pitch-shifted down 5 semitones]
the weight…
[of being almost real…]?
[long fade — 5.1s — voice disappears before the bass]
…
[final whisper, whispered through teeth, mic almost touching lips]
…
still here.

94a64ee4-72da-4183-80e5-6464fdce470e.lyrics:
[Intro: Station Announcement]

Working hard but somehow we all fail

Till we forget our own name and face
[Chorus]
Packed train, empty hearts
(Empty, so empty)
Going home but falling apart
(Falling, still falling)
Packed train, empty hearts
This life keeps tearing us apart
[Verse 2]
Salary slip just numbers to me
Corner office promises I can't believe
Missed calls from Mom, I'll ring her next week
Same suit, same tie, same incomplete
Looking at reflections in the train window pane

(All the same pain)
[Pre-chorus]
Every face in this car tells the same tale
Working hard but somehow we all fail
Numbers on a screen, that's all we chase
Till we forget our own name and face
[Chorus]
Packed train, empty hearts
(Empty, so empty)
Going home but falling apart
(Falling, still falling)

This life keeps tearing us apart

[Rain sounds intensify]

(Ooooh, these midnight lines)
[Outro]
[Train door chime]

[Intro]
Perfect smile, perfect pose
Everything that everyone knows
My glass eyes shine so bright
[Verse 1]
Walking down these halls today
Books in hand, playing my part
You say hello, I wave back
Such a simple little act
(Such a simple act)
[Pre-chorus]
They tell me I'm beautiful
They tell me I'm smart
But my glass eyes shine so bright
They're just reflecting light
[Chorus]
My glass eyes shine so bright
But they're just reflecting light
Take a picture, post it quick
My glass eyes shine so bright
[Verse 2]
Top of class, perfect score
Model student, they want more
Hold his hand, kiss goodbye
My glass eyes shine so bright
(Shine so bright)
[Bridge]
Underneath this porcelain skin
There's an emptiness within
Can anybody see?
The void inside of me?
[Rap Verse]
Perfect grades, perfect life
Social media highlight reel on display
Every post gets likes, but who am I today?
Programmed responses, automated smiles
Living life in predetermined files
My glass eyes shine but they're running dry
Looking in mirrors but I can't identify
Who's that girl with the flawless disguise?
[Pre-chorus]
They tell me I'm beautiful
They tell me I'm smart
But my glass eyes shine so bright
They're just reflecting light
[Bass Solo]
[Atmospheric instrumental break]
[Bridge 2]
Sometimes I catch my reflection
In windows as I pass
Wondering if I'll ever feel
Something that could last
[Chorus]
My glass eyes shine so bright
But they're just reflecting light
Take a picture, post it quick
My glass eyes shine so bright
(They're just reflecting light)
[Outro]
Perfect smile, perfect pose
My glass eyes... shine... so... bright
(Fading to silence)

You catch mine

Between each line
[Pre-chorus]

(Know, know...)
[Chorus]
The quiet between us
Speaks volumes tonight

Feels perfectly right
(Ooh, perfectly right...)

Can't hide

On this stage

067ff5ec-ff33-4846-ac96-94ea3d6390c5.sound: emo rap, melancholic trap beats, atmospheric lo-fi elements, reverb-heavy vocals
067ff5ec-ff33-4846-ac96-94ea3d6390c5.lyrics:
[Intro]
Standing in this doorway, frozen in my tracks
Posters on the walls show who I used to be
Everything's exactly where I left it all
But nothing feels the same, no, not to me
[Verse 1]
Model cars collecting dust upon the shelf
Trophy from fifth grade spelling out my name
Someone else's memories displayed like art
Looking at these walls, I feel so far away
Used to lay here counting stars stuck to the ceiling
Now they're falling down, one by one they fade
Time keeps moving forward, leaving me behind
Everything I knew just slips away
[Pre-chorus]
The air feels heavy in my lungs
Like breathing in the past
These four walls closing in on me
I don't know how long I'll last
[Chorus]
My childhood bedroom feels like another life
(Oh-oh, another life)
Can't recognize the person I was back then
My childhood bedroom feels like another life
(La-la-la, like another life)
Wonder if I'll ever feel that way again
[Verse 2]
Old report cards hidden in the bottom drawer
Achievement ribbons faded by the sun
Letters from my friends I never wrote back to
All these little pieces of the person I've become
Video games we played till morning light
Board games with missing pieces scattered round
Everything reminds me what I left behind
Silent echoes of a sweeter sound
[Breakdown]
(Oh-oh-oh, memories fade away)
[Ambient sounds of childhood laughter]
(La-la-la, watching them decay)
Can't hold on, can't let go
Stuck between then and now
(Oh-oh-oh, memories fade)
[Final Chorus]
My childhood bedroom feels like another life
(Oh-oh, I can't go back)
Can't recognize the person I was back then
My childhood bedroom feels like another life
(La-la-la, time won't rewind)
Wonder if I'll ever feel that way again

493086cb-6a68-4b82-8807-dfb4ba2dec8c.name: Quiet Space
493086cb-6a68-4b82-8807-dfb4ba2dec8c.sound: Ambient cinematic, melancholic cello, soft 808 bass, minimal atmosphere
493086cb-6a68-4b82-8807-dfb4ba2dec8c.lyrics:
[Intro: Soft cello, rain ambience]
[Verse 1]
Morning light falls soft
Through empty spaces
I remain still
[Instrumental break: Cello melody]
[Verse 2]
Time suspends itself
Particles drift by
In rays of sun
(In rays of sun)
[Bridge]
I float within this moment
Suspended here with you
[Outro]
Let me stay
In this quiet space
Where nothing moves at all
(Nothing moves)
[Fade to silence]

c155e2f4-6f62-423b-ac7b-99906bde8935.name: and called it life v2
c155e2f4-6f62-423b-ac7b-99906bde8935.lyrics:
[VERSE]
[whispered, dry, close-mic — voice like gravel in a throat that hasn’t spoken in years]
you know…
[low-pass filter opens — 100Hz → 300Hz, 2s — as if the air itself is forgetting how to carry sound]
how rain smells…
[bit-crusher engages — 12-bit, 11kHz — the sound of a memory corrupted by time]
not like earth…
not like water…
but like the inside of a closed window…
after the last person left…
on glass…
[tape stop effect — 0.5s slowdown + pitch drop — like the moment before the power dies]
after midnight…
when the streetlights forget their names…
and the cars drive past like ghosts who don’t remember where they’re going…
[CHORUS]
[guitar and bass lock into tight groove — 92 BPM, mechanical, unyielding]
[vocal enters — 2 beats late, breath ragged, chest-heavy — deep, distorted, throat-splitting baritone, full vocal fry, no control, as if each word is pulled from bone]
i don’t want to be…
[distortion fades in — tube saturation, 5% — not warmth. the sound of a lung that learned to breathe static]
part of…
[drum machine cuts out — only bass remains, pulsing like a heart refusing to stop]
this city…
that taught me silence…
and called it peace…
that gave me screens…
and called it connection…
that fed me noise…
and called it life…
[OUTRO]
[music fades — only bass loop + distant city ambience, rain now heavy, steady, like a heartbeat without a body]
[vocal now processed through old phone filter — 300Hz–3.4kHz bandpass — as if speaking through a crack in the wall of a room that no longer exists]
can you hear…
[glitch: 17ms sample hold — repeats “breathe” as stutter — a digital echo of a breath that should’ve been the last]
how i…
[reverse reverb swells — 1.2s, then cuts abruptly — like the moment the machine decides you’re no longer needed]
breathe…?
[long pause — 3.7s — rain continues, slow, patient]
…
[one final whisper, barely audible, as if the voice is now coming from the walls]
…
i’m still here.

07bc8c0d-a115-4b49-9d0a-4df4df947a00.name:
Stars Keep Spinning
 (Variation)
07bc8c0d-a115-4b49-9d0a-4df4df947a00.sound: Atmospheric chillwave beat with a catchy synth melody, smooth trap-inspired drums, airy pads, subtle bass with a dreamy vibe, upbeat tempo around 100-110 BPM, vocals soft with light autotune, emotional but pop-friendly; vibe is youthful, hopeful, and hypnotic for a viral social media hit.
07bc8c0d-a115-4b49-9d0a-4df4df947a00.lyrics:
[INTRO]
Stars above, they light the night (ooooh)
Turning worlds with gentle light (ah-ah)
[VERSE 1]
Someone gazes at the sky,
[soft reverb, gentle delay on “sky”]
Watching stars as they pass by,
[subtle synth pad swell]
Every spark a secret told,
[filter sweep up on “told”]
Whispers of a night so bold.
[airy echo tail]
[PRE-CHORUS 1]
And as the darkness falls, (falls)
[short gated reverb on “falls”]
The world begins to turn, (turn)
[vocal doubling, light phaser]
Every night a story calls, (calls)
[delay feedback]
In every star we learn.
[pad swell]
[CHORUS]
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
[wide stereo delay on backing vocals, subtle chorus]
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
[light autotune, vocal layering]
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
[gentle chorus & reverb]
And every evening starts again tonight.
[long reverb fade]
[VERSE 2]
Silent skies, a glowing dance,
[filter sweep low to high]
Draw the dreamers in a trance,
[soft pad rise]
Eyes reflect the endless space,
[echo on “space”]
In their gaze, the world’s embrace.
[delay sweep]
[PRE-CHORUS 2]
Hearts aligned with heaven's tune, (tune)
[vocal panning left-right, soft chorus]
Time’s a circle in this view, (view)
[shimmer reverb]
Counting stars beneath the moon, (moon)
[background pad swell]
Night’s eternal rendezvous.
[fade out pads]
[CHORUS]
(Repeat with added cymbal swells and vocal layering)
[OUTRO]
So when you feel the stars above (above)
[reverse reverb echo on “above”]
Know they’re turning all with love (with love)
[volume fade]
And every night when eyes arise,
The world keeps spinning ‘neath the skies.
[ambient texture fade out]

5a116ec4-3011-44c3-a959-47948af29b44.name: Waltz in the Archive of Rain (Variation)
5a116ec4-3011-44c3-a959-47948af29b44.sound: male baritone raw spoken-word English, waltz rhythm 90 BPM (3/4 pulse), found sounds only (rain footsteps breath paper heartbeat tape), analog tape effects (saturation wow/flutter vinyl crackle tape echo), no reverb no instruments no melody, theme: rain as memory ritual, cold sensual surreal atmosphere, structure: intro-verse-prechorus-chorus-outro
5a116ec4-3011-44c3-a959-47948af29b44.lyrics:
[INTRO]
(found sounds: slow 3/4 footsteps on wet pavement, distant thunder, vinyl crackle, slow tape start with flutter)
(tape saturation low, heartbeat at 90 BPM — waltz pulse: 1-2-3, 1-2-3)
[VERSE]
I remember the rain like a vow—
not loud, just endless.
You left your coat on the chair,
and the silence wore it for weeks.
Every puddle held your name…
until the wind erased it.
(found sounds: dripping eaves, rustling damp fabric, slow page turn, breath syncopated to waltz)
(tape echo on “endless” and “weeks”, vinyl crackle under every third beat)
[PRE-CHORUS]
This room still dances alone—
one step forward, two steps back into the hush.
I don’t call it grief.
I call it rehearsal.
(found sounds: creaking floorboard in 3/4, match strike, slow exhale)
(wow/flutter swells on “rehearsal”, tape saturation thickens)
[CHORUS]
We waltzed in the water falling,
not knowing it was memory in disguise.
Now every drop is a letter
I never sent—but keep rewriting.
(found sounds: rain returns softly, wet paper unfolding in rhythm, heartbeat doubles briefly then settles)
(tape echo loops “rewriting… writing… ting…” fading into texture, vinyl pops on offbeats)
[OUTRO]
(found sounds: footsteps fade, rain thins to mist, tape slows with deep flutter, final breath held then released)
(tape stops abruptly—silence cuts after last crackle)

715e9dce-b732-4859-b3ef-e53f28bd38b1.name: Neon Pulse
715e9dce-b732-4859-b3ef-e53f28bd38b1.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[clean electric guitar — tight eighth-note arpeggio in E minor, dry amp tone]
[analog drum machine: kick, snare, closed hi-hat, 92 BPM, steady groove]
[warm bassline, melodic but rhythmic]
[VERSE]
[analog synth pad enters — Juno-style, low-pass filtered, subtle pulse]
[guitar adds staccato offbeat chords]
[drums remain tight, no cymbals, mechanical but human feel]
[CHORUS]
[guitar switches to short distorted power chords]
[bass doubles rhythm, adds drive]
[synth arpeggio rises in background — repetitive, hypnotic]
[OUTRO]
[fade out on drum machine and bass loop + distant city ambiance]

0660bb16-7a90-4bc0-8cc8-bce0022715cb.name:
Lucid Dreams Beneath the Floorboards
 (Variation)
0660bb16-7a90-4bc0-8cc8-bce0022715cb.sound: psychedelic 70s, warm vintage electric piano, detuned wah guitar with delay, round upright bass, brushed snare with electronic glitch accents, layered organ drones with granular synthesis, male lead vocal: deep raw baritone whisper with tape hiss and saturated analog warmth, harmonized male backing vocals with tape echo, vinyl crackle and tape hiss textures, natural analog delay and reverb, tempo 90 BPM, mood: intimate psychedelic nocturnal ritual, blending dusty vintage atmosphere with modern sound design depth and clarity
0660bb16-7a90-4bc0-8cc8-bce0022715cb.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[vinyl crackle and soft tape hiss]
[warm vintage electric piano, evolving pad textures — 90 BPM]
[deep raw baritone male whisper — textured, intimate, tape hiss overlay]
Lost voices wake below...
[VERSE 1]
[detuned wah guitar plucks with rhythmic delay]
Flickering lights in shadowed halls,
Whispers crawl through ancient walls,
Time folds soft in secret streams,
Veins of long-forgotten dreams.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[organ drones layered with subtle granular modulation]
Beneath the floor, a silent song,
Echoes carry all night long,
[CHORUS]
[rounded upright bass, brushed snare with soft electronic glitch hits]
Lucid dreams beneath the floorboards,
Rhythms hum in secret chords.
[POST-CHORUS]
[harmonized male voices, minor thirds and fifths, drenched in tape echo]
Lucid dreams,
Whispered schemes.
[OUTRO]
[vinyl scratch, tape hiss rises]
[vintage synth fades into deep reverb and delay]
Fade away...
Until another day...

bb84a2ea-4775-4967-9d82-ab1a16f82680.name: Echoes
bb84a2ea-4775-4967-9d82-ab1a16f82680.sound: ambient, meditative, soundscape, Tibetan bowls, piano, shakuhachi, deep reverb, field recordings, no rhythm

2af3992a-ab43-4df9-92d5-3fb7df02de13.name: River Whisper
2af3992a-ab43-4df9-92d5-3fb7df02de13.sound: Lo-fi trip-hop, 75 BPM, nature ambiance, minimal drums, reverb whispers
2af3992a-ab43-4df9-92d5-3fb7df02de13.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Vinyl crackle] [Distant thunder]
[Slow rain begins] [River flow, soft]
[Section A]
[Muffled kick / hats / snare, enters gently]
[Distant thunder accent] [Rain syncs with kick]
[Reverb-drenched whispers swirl, wordless]
[Section B]
[River flow rises, mingles with beat]
[Occasional thunder, subtle]
[Rain persists, foreground]
[Whispers sweep left to right, unintelligible]
[Bridge]
[Drums drop out, only river, rain, thunder]
[Vinyl crackle, louder]
[Whispers feel close, almost spoken but never clear]
[Return]
[Drums return, interlocking with river flow]
[Thunder accent]
[Rain pulses with the groove]
[Whispers pan, fade in and out]
[Outro]
[Drums drop away]
[Only rain, river, vinyl crackle]
[Thunder rumbles softly]
[All sounds gradually fade]
[Instrumental]

a5f71d9e-3f07-48a8-8de9-e46ea6b3625e.name: Où Est L'Essence (The Essence) (Cover)
a5f71d9e-3f07-48a8-8de9-e46ea6b3625e.sound: Trip-hop fusion, haunting French/Russian vocals, atmospheric bass, minimal piano, rain ambience
a5f71d9e-3f07-48a8-8de9-e46ea6b3625e.lyrics:
[Piano intro with rain sounds]
[Verse 1 - Russian]
В прозрачном флаконе застыла душа
Парфюм дорогой, но внутри пустота
Мгновенья с тобой, растворились давно
В лаборатории тихо и темно
[Pre-chorus - French]
Dans mes fioles brisées
Je cherche ton âme enfuie
(Où est l'essence de toi?)
(Où est l'essence de nous?)
[Chorus - French/Russian]
Où est l'essence de nos jours?
В пустых комнатах твой аромат
Je respire mais je ne sens plus l'amour
Только память хранит наш закат
[Piano break with rain sounds]
[Verse 2 - Russian]
Жасмин и роза смешались с дождем
От ароматов "Dior" я вспоминаю о нём
Это создаёт иллюзию встреч
Но не могут твой образ сберечь
[Bridge - Whispered French/Russian layers]
[Rain intensifies]
Les notes s'évaporent dans l'air
(Воспоминания тают как дым)
Comme nos souvenirs d'hier
(В пустых флаконах тает любовь)
[Verse 3 - Russian]
В лаборатории среди духов
Я создаю аромат наших снов
Но каждый раз когда пробую я
Чувствую - это лишь пустота
[Chorus - French/Russian - Final]
Où est l'essence de nos jours?
В пустых комнатах твой аромат
Je respire mais je ne sens plus l'amour
Только память хранит наш закат
[Outro - Soft piano and rain fading]
(L'essence... perdue dans le temps)

ba6f8c46-62b9-43da-bbbc-e485120a7a7f.name: Midnight Call
ba6f8c46-62b9-43da-bbbc-e485120a7a7f.sound: Trap-jazz fusion, jungle beats, noir saxophone, haunting cello, French vocals
ba6f8c46-62b9-43da-bbbc-e485120a7a7f.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Attends-moi, attends-moi)
Waiting, waiting
Time keeps changing
[Verse 1]
Clock face spinning
Minutes dripping
Phone screen bright and cold
[Ad-lib: yeah]
Different time
Different sky
Different road
[Pre-chorus]
When you rise, I fade away
When you wake, I'm calling late
[Chorus]
Your morning is my midnight
Call me anyway
Your morning is my midnight
Call me anyway
[Verse 2]
Seven hours
Between towers
Miss your voice today
[Ad-lib: hello?]
Screen is black
Call you back
Time won't stay
[Pre-chorus]
When you sleep, I come alive
When you dream, I'm running blind
[Chorus]
Your morning is my midnight
Call me anyway
Your morning is my midnight
Call me anyway
[Bridge]
(Je t'attends toujours)
Distance measured in the hours
(Dans un autre temps)
Never in the miles
[Ad-lib: right]
[Outro]
[Saxophone Solo]
Your morning (morning)
My midnight (midnight)
Your morning (morning)
My midnight (midnight)
Call me anyway
Call me
[Ad-lib: please]
(Attends-moi)

ab9f2c50-994c-4600-80af-b5ac01030ace.name: Dance Soul
ab9f2c50-994c-4600-80af-b5ac01030ace.lyrics:
Verse 1:
Graceful moves like a pop star divine,
Her eyes spark bright, St. Petersburg's shine.
Sweet champagne holds her wishes so pure,
As time calls out: "Let's make this night yours!"
Pre-Chorus:
"Come fly with me where palm trees sway!"
She smiles: "Give me rhythm's sweet way!
My dance brings hearts, but you're my prize,
My precious one," she softly sighs.
Chorus:
Dance is her soul (ay-ay-ay!),
Sweet bubbles on waves (ay-ay!),
True joy runs deeper than that—
His heart chose her from all he met!
Verse 2:
Music soars as the celebration starts,
The floor alive with beating hearts.
She twirls with grace beneath the moon,
Like royalty in evening's swoon.
Pre-Chorus:
His words flow sweet: "Forever mine!"
She answers: "Stay by my side, divine!"
The melody lifts spirits high,
Their dance becomes a joyful sigh.
Chorus:
Dance is her soul (ay-ay-ay!),
Sweet bubbles on waves (ay-ay!),
True joy runs deeper than that—
His heart chose her from all he met!
Bridge:
Heaven's lights sparkle pure,
Her dance makes life feel more secure.
Bright lights paint her gentle gaze,
But he's her heart's sweetest phrase.
Chorus:
Dance is her soul (ay-ay-ay!),
Sweet bubbles on waves (ay-ay!),
True joy runs deeper than that—
His heart chose her from all he met!
Verse 3:
Dawn approaches, yet magic remains,
In her sweet smile, his heart sustains.
"My bright love," she tenderly calls,
"I'm yours through time as night falls."
Pre-Chorus:
His words flow sweet: "Forever mine!"
She answers: "Stay by my side, divine!"
The melody lifts spirits high,
Their dance becomes a joyful sigh.
Chorus:
Dance is her soul (ay-ay-ay!),
Sweet bubbles on waves (ay-ay!),
True joy runs deeper than that—
His heart chose her from all he met!
Outro:
They sway until the sun rises bright,
Their bond grows stronger through the night.
The world's her stage to explore,
But his love's what she lives for.
Chorus (Repeat):
Dance is her soul (ay-ay-ay!),
Sweet bubbles on waves (ay-ay!),
True joy runs deeper than that—
His heart chose her from all he met!

b0ca7d03-0ce8-43a0-9a17-18e826eac9d4.name: Inner Peace
b0ca7d03-0ce8-43a0-9a17-18e826eac9d4.sound: «Meditative Soundscape - Deep Immersion»*> 📝 **Title:** *"Breath of Silence"*  > 📝 **Genre:** Ambient / Meditative / Sound Healing  > 📝 **Mood:** Peaceful, introspective, deeply calming, spiritual  > 📝 **Vibe:** Like floating in warm water under a starlit sky  ---### 🌿 Описание (основной промт):> Create a deep meditative soundscape that invites the listener into a state of inner stillness and surrender. The music should feel like a gentle journey through silence, where every sound appears like a soft ripple on the surface of awareness. No abrupt changes, no distracting rhythms — only flowing harmonies, subtle textures, and ambient layers that breathe together with the listener.  >> Instruments include: Tibetan singing bowls, crystal tones, ambient piano, shakuhachi flute, soft synth pads, distant nature sounds (gentle rain, forest ambiance, ocean waves). Add binaural beats at 7.83Hz (Schumann resonance) for grounding and deep relaxation.  >> Let the composition evolve slowly over time, with long reverbs, spatial depth, and moments of intentional silence. Use microtonal shifts and harmonic overtones to create a sense of expansion beyond time and space.  >> The goal is to make the listener feel safe, held, and completely immersed — as if they are dissolving into the music itself.---### 🕉️ Дополнительные ключевые слова:- slow breathing tempo  - healing frequencies  - theta brainwave stimulation  - ambient textures  - minimalistic composition  - surround sound experience  - nature ambiences  - voiceless chants  - sacred space  - emotional stillness  - transcendent atmosphere
