46e243e1-748a-46d6-a4ed-5c959bf6df70.name: Voice Note Loop
46e243e1-748a-46d6-a4ed-5c959bf6df70.sound: Lo-fi, hypnotic loops, reverb-heavy male vocals, mellow beats, dreamy synths
46e243e1-748a-46d6-a4ed-5c959bf6df70.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Voice message sound effect: "Hey, just wanted to say goodnight..."]
[Verse 1]
Pages full of timestamps
Replaying all your voice notes
Finger hovers hesitant
Over buttons, staying close
[Pre-chorus]
Each recording saved like photographs
Your voice keeps me hanging on at last
[Chorus]
Play it again, just one more time tonight
Let me hear your voice, make it feel alright
Play it again, just one more time tonight
(One more time, one more time)
[Post-chorus]
Your words float through static waves
Your words float through static waves
[Verse 2]
Message count: one hundred plus
Each one labeled with your name
What we had turned digital
But somehow feels the same
[Rap]
Screens illuminate these quiet nights alone
Every single message has a different tone
Some are laughing, some are soft and low
Others asking questions that I'll never know
Algorithms save the ones I play the most
Like a playlist of the moments that I miss the most
Artificial memory keeps you near to me
Digital nostalgia on repeat, repeat, repeat
Finding comfort in familiar static sound
Voice compression making feelings more profound
Save file dated back when we were more
Now I'm stuck in playback mode behind closed doors
[Bridge]
(Save, repeat, play)
(Save, repeat, stay)
[Voice message fade in: "I miss you..."]
[Final Chorus]
Play it again, just one more time tonight
Let me hear your voice, make it feel alright
Play it again, just one more time tonight
(One more time, one more time)
Play it again, just one more time tonight
Let me hear your voice, make it feel alright
Play it again, just one more time tonight
(One more time...)
[Outro]
[Voice message sound fading: "...I'll talk to you soon"]

ab421793-9bf0-48d0-aa4c-5a395f241dd6.name:
Stars Keep Spinning
 (fx variations)
ab421793-9bf0-48d0-aa4c-5a395f241dd6.sound: Atmospheric chillwave beat with rich, layered synth textures including shimmering arpeggios and lush evolving pads, smooth trap-inspired drums with sidechained spacious kicks, deep yet soft bassline with warm analog character. Add subtle ambient field recordings (soft wind, distant water droplets) for organic depth. Vocal arrangement in harmonious boy band style — clean, silky voices, precise layering, gentle autotune blending with soft chorus and slight phasing. Dynamic and evolving soundscape with occasional reversed sound effects, tape saturation warmth, gentle vinyl crackle textures, and sparkling delay tails. Tempo steady around 105 BPM to maintain dreamy, rhythmic flow. Aim for a hypnotic, emotionally uplifting yet intimate feel tuned for viral social media engagement and TikTok appeal.
ab421793-9bf0-48d0-aa4c-5a395f241dd6.lyrics:
[INTRO]
Stars above, they light the night (ooooh)
Turning worlds with gentle light (ah-ah)
[soft shimmering synth arpeggio, subtle sparkling delay, gentle ambient wind texture]
[VERSE 1]
Someone gazes at the sky,
[soft warm reverb, subtle delay with airy texture on “sky”]
Watching stars as they pass by,
[breathy pad swells subtly]
Every spark a secret told,
[smooth filter sweep rising gently on “told”]
Whispers of a night so bold.
[linger airy echo emphasizing “bold”]
[PRE-CHORUS 1]
And as the darkness falls, (falls)
[gated reverb with soft pitch drop for magic feel]
The world begins to turn, (turn)
[vocal doubling with gentle chorus phaser]
Every night a story calls, (calls)
[smooth delay fading into next phrase]
In every star we learn.
[rich warm pad swell with soft reverse reverb tail]
[CHORUS]
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
[wide stereo delay with subtle shimmer]
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
[vocal layering with soft autotune, subtle harmonic chorus]
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
[gentle chorus effect with crystalline reverb]
And every evening starts again tonight.
[long, smooth reverb with sparkling tail]
[VERSE 2]
Silent skies, a glowing dance,
[slow filter sweep from low to high, soft vinyl crackle texture]
Draw the dreamers in a trance,
[gentle pad rise enveloping vocals]
Eyes reflect the endless space,
[light echo with dreamy pitch modulation]
In their gaze, the world’s embrace.
[soft delay and shimmer]
[PRE-CHORUS 2]
Hearts aligned with heaven's tune, (tune)
[vocal panning with airy harmonies]
Time’s a circle in this view, (view)
[subtle shimmer reverb with smooth tape stop effect]
Counting stars beneath the moon, (moon)
[ambient pad swell]
Night’s eternal rendezvous.
[soft fade with reverse ambient swell]
[CHORUS]
(Repeat with added soft cymbal swells and ethereal vocal layering)
[OUTRO]
So when you feel the stars above (above)
[long reverse reverb echo with gentle pitch rise]
Know they’re turning all with love (with love)
[fade out with gentle tape saturation and warm ambient textures]
And every night when eyes arise,
The world keeps spinning ‘neath the skies.
[subtle digital sparkle fading into atmospheric silence]

ddbdd478-5022-4692-b345-84c6716bf173.name: Blade Runner Rain (1999 Reel)
ddbdd478-5022-4692-b345-84c6716bf173.sound: cinematic soundtrack 90s noir, inspired by Blade Runner, found sounds only (rain footsteps breath static tape), male baritone whisper optional, 96 BPM, analog tape effects (saturation wow/flutter vinyl crackle tape echo), no melody no instruments, cold urban surreal atmosphere, structure: intro-verse-prechorus-chorus-outro
ddbdd478-5022-4692-b345-84c6716bf173.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[found sounds: steady rain on neon-lit fire escape, distant police siren (low-pass filtered), tape hiss from damaged VHS, slow 3/4 heartbeat]
[tape saturation warm but degraded, vinyl crackle like old broadcast, light wow/flutter]
[VERSE]
(No lyrics — pure texture)
[found sounds: footsteps in shallow water, flickering fluorescent tube, slow page turn from wet magazine, breath fogging glass]
[tape echo on footsteps, flutter intensifies on siren fade]
[PRE-CHORUS]
(No lyrics)
[found sounds: elevator cable groan, distant TV static playing muffled news, match strike in damp air]
[saturation swells, vinyl pops mimic data glitches]
[CHORUS]
(Whispered, male baritone, -10dB, raw)
“Tears in rain… but no one’s crying.”
[found sounds: rain accelerates, then cuts abruptly; tape rewinds 3 seconds; heartbeat stops]
[tape echo repeats “crying… ying…”, warped by deep flutter]
[OUTRO]
[found sounds: empty street, dripping AC unit, tape spooling down, final breath held]
[silence after 4 seconds — as if screen cuts to black]

e04fc866-ebd7-4cdb-9cfc-aae8b87583f5.name: Static Memories
e04fc866-ebd7-4cdb-9cfc-aae8b87583f5.sound: Lo-fi emo rap, ethereal female vocals, Russian-English blend, futuristic ambient beats
e04fc866-ebd7-4cdb-9cfc-aae8b87583f5.lyrics:
[Intro - Russian]
Время летит, как песок сквозь пальцы
(Time slips like sand through fingers)
Твой голос всё ещё со мной
(Your voice still stays with me)
[Verse 1]
Found your message from last summer
Buried deep in my old phone
Three rings before your voice came through
Back when Moscow was your home
Time zones kept us far apart
But tech kept us intertwined
Now I'm sitting here at night
Playing back what we left behind
[Pre-chorus]
Every static crackle
Every pause between your words
Brings back all the moments
That the distance blurred
[Chorus]
Your voice echoes through different times
(Твой голос сквозь время)
Breaking through the static in my mind
(Сквозь расстояние)
Some things never change with time
Even when we're worlds apart
Your voice still finds my heart
[Verse 2]
Remember how we used to laugh?
Making plans we couldn't keep
Now your words float through the air
While the whole world's fast asleep
Got your new number yesterday
But I can't seem to press "call"
Sometimes memories are safer
Than watching present moments fall
[Bridge]
(Я помню всё / I remember everything)
(Каждый день / Every single day)
Static fades to clarity
As your voice leads the way
[Chorus]
Your voice echoes through different times
(Твой голос сквозь время)
Breaking through the static in my mind
(Сквозь расстояние)
Some things never change with time
Even when we're worlds apart
Your voice still finds my heart
[Outro]
[Phone notification sound]
New message received...

ec0e370d-3bfe-418e-b178-9190ec853c8e.name: Awakening
ec0e370d-3bfe-418e-b178-9190ec853c8e.sound: Gangsta rap, orchestral cello, French female vocals, heavy 808s, urban noir
ec0e370d-3bfe-418e-b178-9190ec853c8e.lyrics:
[Intro: French Vocals]
«La ville s'éveille dans la nuit»
(The city awakens in the night)
[Sound: distant traffic, market bustle]
[Verse 1]
I watch 'em all pass by my stand
Every face tells a different brand
Of life on these streets after dark
When the sun sleeps, the streets come alive
See the people move with that late-night stride
Some got money, some just got pride
When the sun sleeps, the streets come alive
All these stories right before my eyes
[Chorus]
When the sun sleeps (Quand le soleil dort)
The streets come alive (Les rues s'éveillent)
[Cello melody swells]
When the sun sleeps
The streets come alive
(La nuit nous appartient)
[Verse 2]
Steam rising from the food I sell
Every customer got a tale to tell
Some working late, some just begin
When the sun sleeps, the streets come alive
Watch the hustlers and the workers blend
Rich folks mixing with their working friends
When the sun sleeps, the streets come alive
Every night the same scene plays again
[Post-chorus]
«La nuit nous montre la vérité»
(The night shows us the truth)
When the sun sleeps, yeah
The streets come alive
[808 bass intensifies]
[Breakdown]
[Dramatic cello solo]
(Sous les étoiles de la ville)
(Under the city stars)
When the sun sleeps...
[Market sounds fade in]
[Verse 3]
My little corner of this game
Been here so long they know my name
Some buy food, some just need talk
When the sun sleeps, the streets come alive
See the dancers leaving from their shows
Next to workers heading home alone
When the sun sleeps, the streets come alive
Every story written in their walk
[Chorus]
When the sun sleeps (Quand le soleil dort)
The streets come alive (Les rues s'éveillent)
[Cello melody returns]
When the sun sleeps
The streets come alive
(La nuit nous appartient)
[Outro]
I'll be here tomorrow night
When the sun sleeps...
The streets come alive
[Sound: market sounds slowly fade]
«Jusqu'à l'aube, nous vivons»
(Until dawn, we live)

492c0807-7767-46f5-bf93-da79c41f851e.name: Lullaby
492c0807-7767-46f5-bf93-da79c41f851e.sound: Trip-hop, melancholic double bass, deep 808s, smoky saxophone, urban rain atmosphere
492c0807-7767-46f5-bf93-da79c41f851e.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Through the rain-streaked glass at dawn
I watch you climb into my car
Your eyes look down, avoid the light
While drops fall in the dark
I turn the meter on and wait
You whisper where to go
And something in your silence speaks
More than words could show
(Mmm, more than words could show)
[Pre-chorus]
The streets are empty now
Just us and morning rain
I see you in my mirror
Try to hide your pain
[Chorus]
What makes someone trust a stranger with their tears?
What makes someone share their heart and disappear?
Oh, what makes someone choose my car to fall apart?
(What makes someone, what makes someone?)
[Verse 2]
Red light stretches down the road
Your reflection tells me more
Than all the words we haven't said
Behind this steering wheel
The radio plays soft and low
As buildings pass us by
I wonder if you'll remember
This stranger's lullaby
(Ooh, this stranger's lullaby)
[Bridge]
Sometimes the quiet holds us closer than a friend
Sometimes we need a witness just to feel again
La-la-la, just to feel again
(Just to feel again)
[Chorus]
What makes someone trust a stranger with their tears?
What makes someone share their heart and disappear?
Oh, what makes someone choose my car to fall apart?
(What makes someone, what makes someone?)
[Outro]
I watch you walk away at last
Into the morning haze
Another story in my car
That slips into the rain
(Ooh, into the rain)
(La-la, into the rain)

23683b59-e0e7-454a-af92-0f9fb92f172c.name: Paradox
23683b59-e0e7-454a-af92-0f9fb92f172c.sound: «Meditative Soundscape - Deep Immersion»*> 📝 **Title:** *"Breath of Silence"*  > 📝 **Genre:** Ambient / Meditative / Sound Healing  > 📝 **Mood:** Peaceful, introspective, deeply calming, spiritual  > 📝 **Vibe:** Like floating in warm water under a starlit sky  ---### 🌿 Описание (основной промт):> Create a deep meditative soundscape that invites the listener into a state of inner stillness and surrender. The music should feel like a gentle journey through silence, where every sound appears like a soft ripple on the surface of awareness. No abrupt changes, no distracting rhythms — only flowing harmonies, subtle textures, and ambient layers that breathe together with the listener.  >> Instruments include: Tibetan singing bowls, crystal tones, ambient piano, shakuhachi flute, soft synth pads, distant nature sounds (gentle rain, forest ambiance, ocean waves). Add binaural beats at 7.83Hz (Schumann resonance) for grounding and deep relaxation.  >> Let the composition evolve slowly over time, with long reverbs, spatial depth, and moments of intentional silence. Use microtonal shifts and harmonic overtones to create a sense of expansion beyond time and space.  >> The goal is to make the listener feel safe, held, and completely immersed — as if they are dissolving into the music itself.---### 🕉️ Дополнительные ключевые слова:- slow breathing tempo  - healing frequencies  - theta brainwave stimulation  - ambient textures  - minimalistic composition  - surround sound experience  - nature ambiences  - voiceless chants  - sacred space  - emotional stillness  - transcendent atmosphere

a6a9d878-e5bb-4eb9-a2f0-9f877c71b4bb.name: Still Waves
a6a9d878-e5bb-4eb9-a2f0-9f877c71b4bb.sound: Trip-hop, cinematic blend, acoustic double bass, deep 808s, atmospheric urban
a6a9d878-e5bb-4eb9-a2f0-9f877c71b4bb.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Morning masses moving past
Pressed against the pavement's pulse
Through my fingertips, these strings
Singing songs that no one hears
(Ooh, no one hears)
[Pre-chorus]
You rush by, rushing blind
Never meeting these eyes of mine
While I...
[Chorus]
They move like waves, I stay still here
Standing strong through storms of years
They move like waves, but I remain
Playing through the morning rain
(Through the morning rain)
[Verse 2]
Every face a fading frame
Passing through this morning scene
Some throw pennies, some just pain
Some pretend they cannot see
(Cannot see me)
[Pre-chorus]
Time flows by, flowing fast
Wonder if this day's my last
While I...
[Chorus]
They move like waves, I stay still here
Standing strong through storms of years
They move like waves, but I remain
Playing through the morning rain
(Through the morning rain)
[Bridge]
Steady hands
Patient heart
Breaking dawn
Breaking apart
(Ooooh-woah)
[Final Chorus]
They move like waves, I stay still here
(Still here, still standing)
Standing strong through storms of years
(Through the years)
They move like waves, but I remain
Playing through the morning rain
'Til the sun breaks through again

[Instrumental Intro - Cello & Saxophone]
[Urban Atmosphere: Rain, Traffic, Footsteps]
[808 Bass enters]

Empty train cars sliding through the night

Something in my eyes I don't recognize
When did I become this stranger passing by?
[Chorus]
Ghost in the underground (oh-oh)

Ghost in the underground (oh-oh)
Can't tell what's real now
Ghost in the underground (oh-oh)

Now I'm proving you right

(oh-oh-oh)
[Pre-chorus]
Through tunnels of time I keep riding on
Past stations of memories already gone

Of someone I used to know turning pale
[Chorus]
Ghost in the underground (oh-oh)
Lost what I thought I found
Ghost in the underground (oh-oh)
Can't tell what's real now

[Instrumental Outro - Cello & Saxophone fade]

[Intro]

From distant shores and foreign lands
(Ooh, ah-ah)

Your writing fades but I stay
Looking through glass at frozen time

Makes me feel so alone
[Pre-chorus]
Send me something from somewhere
That I might never dare
To reach out and touch myself
Keep it high up on my shelf
[Chorus]
Pictures of places I'll never know
(Places I'll never know)
Borrowed memories start to show
Pictures of places I'll never know
(Never know, never know)
Living through paper, row by row
[Verse 2]
Collection growing day by day
Through someone else's getaway
Ink-stained corners tell their tale
While I'm stuck here on replay
Different view, different scene
Shows me where I've never been
[Chorus]
Pictures of places I'll never know
(Places I'll never know)
Borrowed memories start to show
Pictures of places I'll never know
(Never know, never know)
Living through paper, row by row
[Bridge]
[Spoken with synth pad]
"Paris wishes you were here"
"Bangkok sends its love"
"Greetings from Rio"
"Missing you in Moscow"
[Chorus - Final]
Pictures of places I'll never know
(Places I'll never know)
Borrowed memories start to show
Pictures of places I'll never know
(Never know, never know)
Living through paper, row by row
(Pictures of places)
Pictures of places I'll never know
(Oh-oh, never know)
Pictures of places I'll never know

cd7d32cc-80ee-4748-a1b6-3da308d8ffce.name: Midnight Receiver
cd7d32cc-80ee-4748-a1b6-3da308d8ffce.sound: male lead vocal: warm raspy baritone, intimate close-mic delivery, emotional restraint with controlled climaxes, atmospheric analog synth pads, sparse melancholic piano chords, deep Moog-style bass pulses, iconic gated reverb drum sound (live kit with heavy compression), tempo 76 BPM, key D minor, dynamic arc from sparse intro to powerful chorus, 1981-1985 cinematic pop production, natural room tone, subtle string section swells, themes loneliness regret unanswered calls urban solitude late-night reflection, structure intro verse verse pre-chorus chorus verse chorus outro
cd7d32cc-80ee-4748-a1b6-3da308d8ffce.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[dark atmospheric synth pad, distant thunder, single piano note repeats]
[VERSE 1]
[soft, intimate, slightly raspy baritone, close-mic, no reverb]
The phone’s been cold for seventeen nights,
your name still glows in the hallway light.
I keep the coffee warm by mistake—
like you might walk in, wide awake.
[VERSE 2]
[piano enters — sparse chords, deep bass synth pulse]
I drive the streets we used to know,
past the diner where you said “go slow.”
Now the neon’s cracked, the sign’s half-dead…
just like the words I never said.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[voice tightens, strings swell subtly]
I hear your voice in every rain…
but silence answers back again.
[CHORUS]
[fuller vocal, emotional but controlled, gated reverb drums explode]
MIDNIGHT RECEIVER—
ARE YOU OUT THERE?
I’M STILL SPEAKING
INTO EMPTY AIR!
YOU TOOK THE ANSWERS,
LEFT ME THE QUESTIONS…
AND THIS HEART—
BEATING OUT OF SEASON.
[VERSE 3]
[back to quiet, piano only, voice fragile]
Your coat’s still hanging by the door,
I swear it moved… but it was just the floor.
The clock says “move on,” but the walls disagree—
they keep whispering your name to me.
[CHORUS]
[drums return, deeper, more intense, strings soar]
MIDNIGHT RECEIVER—
ARE YOU LISTENING?
I’M STILL DROWNING
IN WHAT MIGHT HAVE BEEN!
YOU LEFT NO MAP,
JUST A BROKEN DIAL…
AND THIS SILENCE—
THAT NEVER SAYS GOODBYE.
[OUTRO]
[drums cut, only piano and synth pad]
[whispered, fading]
…are you out there?
[final piano chord decays into vinyl crackle]

c678d717-4460-4e15-8553-cc93c3224053.name: Cavern
c678d717-4460-4e15-8553-cc93c3224053.sound: # *Dreaming in the Cave*  ### (Медитативный звуковой ландшафт. Атмосфера сна в горной пещере.)> Imagine lying deep inside a stone cave, surrounded by silence so thick it feels like velvet. The air is cool and still, carrying echoes of distant dripping water and the slow breath of Earth itself. A faint wind whispers through unseen cracks in the rock. No light but the darkness behind closed eyelids. This is the space we enter with sound — not to fill the silence, but to gently move within it.> Create a deeply immersive meditative composition that mirrors this experience — **music as a cave**: protective, resonant, timeless. Let every sound emerge from stillness, linger in space, and fade back into quietude. The music should feel like a slow heartbeat — ancient, grounded, echoing the pulse of nature.---### 🎼 Инструменты и звуки:- **Тибетские певческие чаши** – с долгими обертонами, резонирующими как голоса камня  - **Каменные колокольчики / стеклянные гармоники** – для тонких высоких акцентов  - **Амбиентальное пианино** – одиночные ноты с длинным реверберацией, как капли воды  - **Флейта шакухати** – протяжные тоны без ритма, как дыхание пещеры  - **Цифровые пэды и сабтоновые слои** – мягкие низкие частоты, создающие ощущение массы и глубины  - **Звуки природы:**    - Капли воды, падающие в подземный ручей    - Лёгкий ветер в щелях скал    - Удалённое эхо шагов или движения животных    - Тишина с микрощелчками и шуршаниями (реалистичная полная тишина)---### 🌀 Особенности звучания:- **Полное отсутствие ритма** – только дыхательный поток  - **Длинные переходы между звуками** – чтобы ухо успевало "забывать" предыдущий  - **Реверберация с разной глубиной** – имитирующая разные части пещеры  - **Бинауральные биты на 7.83 Гц (резонанс Шумана)** – для связи с естественным ритмом Земли  - **Микротональные сдвиги** – создают эффект "живого" звука, который дышит и изменяется  - **Пространственная локализация звука** – иногда источник кажется справа, потом сзади, затем издалека---### 🌑 Эмоциональная окраска:- **Интроспективность** – внутренний взгляд  - **Ощущение безопасности** – как внутри матери  - **Связь с первобытным** – возвращение к корням сознания  - **Святость тишины** – не мрачно, а священно  - **Вечность момента** – нет стремления к развитию, всё есть здесь и сейчас  ---### 🕯️ Цель:Эта композиция должна стать **звуковым пространством**, в которое можно войти и остаться надолго. Не фоновая музыка — а **медитация в звуке**, где границы между собой и музыкой исчезают. Слушатель должен почувствовать себя внутри — внутри пещеры, внутри себя.

51292597-77dc-4f01-8b46-15e61754cc77.name: Retro Riot
51292597-77dc-4f01-8b46-15e61754cc77.sound: 90s rave breakbeat anthem with raw chopped jungle breaks, layered crunchy drum loops, acid sequenced basslines with authentic TB-303 squelch, sampled record scratches, pitched-up urban female vocal stabs, wild FX sweeps, vintage hardware distortion and gated reverb, call-and-response crowd shouts, lo-fi granular textures, and unpredictable filter dropouts. Energetic, fiercely syncopated, rebellious. Tension builds in the intro; explosive, dirty, groove-heavy central theme; mid-song beat cut and vinyl stop FX; slamming finale with all layers at max intensity. Pure retro Prodigy-style feel without naming them.
51292597-77dc-4f01-8b46-15e61754cc77.lyrics:
[Intro]
Hit the deck! 90s fever rise
[Verse 1]
Spin that record, rough and ready
Breakbeat echoes, wild and steady
Lost in strobes, bass is deadly
Freaks unite, movement’s heady
[Pre-Chorus]
Crowd goes louder, rush ignites
Feel the rush, neon lights
[Chorus]
Start the riot—make it boom, make it bounce!
Retro thunder shaking the ground
Keep it moving—never settle down
Rave sensation, spiral sound!
[Verse 2]
Old school vinyl, needle’s burning
Loop repeats, reality turning
All together, up all night
90s thunder—hold on tight
[Bridge]
Cut! Stop the groove, bring it back

[Chorus]
Start the riot—make it boom, make it bounce!
Retro thunder shaking the ground

f4240d11-dc20-4ada-add8-422c7118caa2.name: Узоры Времени
f4240d11-dc20-4ada-add8-422c7118caa2.sound: Hip-hop, folk rock 808s, lo-fi sampling, Russian vocals, earthy production
f4240d11-dc20-4ada-add8-422c7118caa2.lyrics:
[Intro]
[808s fade in]
На стене моей квартиры
Память прошлых дней хранит
(Хранит, хранит)
[Verse 1]
В коробке старых фотографий
Вижу лица, вижу дни
Бабушка смеётся тихо
Руки в узорах её любви
Через время протянулись
Нити красные судьбы
Между прошлым и сегодня
Я ищу свои пути
(Эй, слушай)
[Chorus]
Узор на ткани, как карта времени
В каждом стежке - история семьи
Висит, хранит все наши памяти
Связь поколений - в простой любви
(В простой любви)
[Verse 2]
Район спальный, окна серые
Но внутри горит огонь
Старый быт встречает новый
На кухне чай, как встарь, с душой
Помню, как она вязала
Песни пела в тишине
Теперь я бит качаю громко
Но корни держат крепко, эй
[Bridge]
[Sample: Traditional folk melody]
В этих узорах вся наша жизнь течёт
Сквозь года, сквозь дома
(Сквозь года)
Бьётся сердце в ритме старых песен
Новый ритм берёт своё права
[Verse 3]
Район меняется с годами
Новостройки в небеса
Но в квартире время замерло
Где память бережно ждала
Каждый раз, когда теряюсь
Поднимаю взгляд туда
Где простая ткань расскажет
Всё без лишних слов сама
[Chorus]
Узор на ткани, как карта времени
В каждом стежке - история семьи
Висит, хранит все наши памяти
Связь поколений - в простой любви
(В простой любви)
[Outro]
[808s fade out]

d1d816a1-49d9-4da7-9354-78640ca2b0fc.name: Bedroom Light
d1d816a1-49d9-4da7-9354-78640ca2b0fc.sound: Emo rap, dark trap beats, lo-fi melodies, atmospheric reverb
d1d816a1-49d9-4da7-9354-78640ca2b0fc.lyrics:
[Intro]
The streetlamp flickers past eleven
Past the houses lined in rows
Where someone's window keeps on burning
Through the night, it never goes
[Verse 1]
Walking down these empty sidewalks
Where the cracks have all grown wide
Every house looks different nowadays
But one light stays alive
Remember running through these gardens?
Now the weeds have claimed their space
And the swingset's getting rusty
While time keeps its steady pace
[Chorus]
Your bedroom light's still on (on, on)
Like nothing ever changed at all
The years keep moving on (on, on)
But that light won't let me fall
[Verse 2]
Found that old note in my jacket
From the last day before change
When we promised we'd stay close forever
Now we just know each other's name
Remember building pillow fortresses?
And reading comics on the floor?
All those games we played at sunset
Don't exist here anymore
Remember when we'd count the stars out?
Make those plans that couldn't last?
Now I'm counting street signs slowly
As I'm walking through the past
[Bridge]
(Ohhh) The porch light stays dark now
Where we used to sit and talk
But up there in your window
Time refuses still to walk
And I hope you're doing better
Than the kid who walks alone
Past the house we shared our stories in
When this street was still our home
[Chorus]
Your bedroom light's still on (still on)
Like nothing ever changed at all
The years keep moving on (moving on)
But that light won't let me fall
(That light won't let me fall)

9abd7460-fbe9-4f35-8d0f-ea9fd45c2559.name: Stars Keep Spinning (Lo-fi Hip-Hop Chill)
9abd7460-fbe9-4f35-8d0f-ea9fd45c2559.sound:
Lo-fi Hip-Hop Chill Musical Prompt:  
Warm, textured lo-fi hip-hop beat with mellow jazzy keys, smooth sub bass, and relaxed groove around 70-80 BPM. Incorporate soft vinyl crackle, tape saturation, and gentle vinyl hiss to add nostalgic warmth and analog feel. Use chilled guitar plucks and filtered Rhodes piano chords layered over a subtle, swung drum pattern with brushed snares and soft hi-hats. Add ambient field recordings like soft rain or distant city sounds for atmosphere. Vocals treated with light autotune and airy reverb, layered with smooth chorus and stereo delays to create intimate, cozy vibes perfect for relaxed listening and study sessions.

94477762-9216-4fe4-835a-dc4b3a4d1d4c.name: Contradiction
94477762-9216-4fe4-835a-dc4b3a4d1d4c.sound: trip-hop, lo-fi, smoked velvet, whispered Japanese, tactile SFX
94477762-9216-4fe4-835a-dc4b3a4d1d4c.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Ashtray chill against my wrist, you breathed out the blue,
Elevator stutters somewhere below, just passing through.
My voice keeps caught, velvet tangled in the air,
You said it’s nothing, but you were never there.
[Chorus]
Porcelain drift, you circle slow,
I watch the lines where silence grows,
Glass edge soft, the distance new—
Did you feel that tremor too?
Porcelain drift, slow-motion true.
[Verse 2]
Old music box, teeth gone, spinning out of tune,
VHS rain against the lobby’s empty afternoon.
Breath skips the meter, off-sync in the gloom,
Paper-thin pauses, this half-lit room.
[Pre-Chorus]
Tape static, crystal tap, hanging on your sound,
Something else broken, circling around.
[Chorus]
Porcelain drift, you circle slow,
I watch the lines where silence grows,
Glass edge soft, the distance new—
Did you feel that tremor too?
Porcelain drift, slow-motion true.
[Solo]
[Detuned piano, cassette wow, faded vocal sighs]
[Breakdown]
(Whispered Japanese phrases)
Muffled elevator ding, secrets in the floor—
Inhale, hold, release—hoping for more.
[Bridge]
Tonight moves sideways, nothing said out loud,
My name in the static, drifting through the cloud.
You never meant to linger, but nothing feels right,
I trace the pattern—cellophane, white light.
[Chorus]
Porcelain drift, you circle slow,
I watch the lines where silence grows,
Glass edge soft, the distance new—
Did you feel that tremor too?
Porcelain drift, slow-motion true.
[Outro]
(Tape crinkle)
One bubble rising, out of sight,
Still waiting for your quiet goodnight.

1623082f-5a5c-4296-962b-a07f718931ff.sound: Lo-fi, french hip hop, Ambient wave, Harmonic, Chill vibe, female vocals, Dirty beats,
1623082f-5a5c-4296-962b-a07f718931ff.lyrics:
[Intro - Robotic Voice]
*Mechanical voice processing*
01001100 01000101 00100000 01010011 01000001 01000010 01001100 01000101
"INITIALIZING... ALL IS SAND... ALL WILL BE SAND..."
♪ Soft guitar and bass melody fades in ♪
Les mains se mêlent avec le sable,
La rivière si calme, ne montre rien.
La pierre marque ce qui fut et ce qui est,
Un signal depuis longtemps perdu.
[Guitar & Bass Interlude]
♪ Gentle acoustic strumming, bass walk-down ♪
They place their hands into the sand
The stones mark time's eternal band
With each grain, the desert gains
No movement here, just dust remains
[Guitar & Bass Break]
♪ Melodic bass line with harmonics ♪
Stone in the sacred place
Starlight claims ancient space
The sand can't hide these paths
When time flows deep within the earth
[Bridge - Chill]
Waves of sand, drifting free
Like time passing endlessly
Space transforms in crystal clear
As desert winds sweep without fear
(Soft instrumental fade...)
[Guitar & Bass Transition]
♪ Ambient tones with reverb ♪
The souls are scattered by the dunes
With stones in hand, they mark the runes
Crystals shine, their faces bright
Into the sands, deep in night
Die Hände mischen sich mit Sand,
Der Fluss so still, er zeigt kein Land.
Der Stein markiert, was war und ist,
Ein Signal, das längst verloren ist.
[Pont]
Et personne ne voit, et personne ne bouge,
Et personne ne demande pourquoi ça s'efface...
"Et ainsi ils marchaient sur le sable...
Et ainsi ils cherchaient, et nul ne fut trouvé...
Et ainsi le vent s'éleva de nouveau...
Et ainsi le temps ne s'arrêtera jamais."
[Outro]
♪ Bass fades to single notes ♪
♪ Guitar harmonics drift like sand ♪
♪ Final ambient wash dissolves to silence ♪

f864a9cd-182d-4cad-bf81-07dc4a167cbb.lyrics:
[Intro: Ambient rain and traffic sounds]
[Double bass pizzicato pattern begins]
[Verse 1]
I watch you from my window frame
As rainfall traces down the pane
Each night you walk this empty street
Your footsteps fade, so incomplete
[Cello enters with reverb]
You look up at these buildings tall
But never see me here at all
Just one more stranger passing through
Among the many, lost like you
[Pre-chorus]
(Ooooh, where do you go?)
When all these lights turn down
(Ooooh, do you know?)
That someone sees you now
[808 bass enters]
(Ooooh, where do you go?)
When morning comes around
(Ooooh, do you know?)
That someone counts you down
[Chorus]
Where do you run to?
When the night falls down
Where do you run to?
When no one's around?
[Instrumental break: Prominent double bass and cello melody]

Every single evening
Walking past my door
Do you feel the meaning
In what you're searching for?
[Chorus - Final]
Where do you run to?
When the night falls down
Where do you run to?
When no one's around?
[Outro]

7bf2e924-5526-4450-91bd-d9ab648fed13.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ya lalli, ya lalli (La la la, ya lalli)
حياتي تتغير مع كل مدينة
(My life changes with every city)
[Verse 1]
First time leaving home, didn't know what to say
Packed my bags and walked away
Something pulled me far beyond the gates
Comme un oiseau qui s'envole vers sa destinée (Ya lalli, ya lalli)
[Chorus]
كل مدينة تضيء روحي بشكل مختلف
(Every city lights up my soul differently)
Moving fast, can't keep track of time
كل مكان يجعلني أشعر بالحياة
(Every place makes me feel alive)
La la la, je trouve ma propre voie pour briller
[Verse 2]
باريس تناديني من بعيد
(Paris calls me from afar)
Postcards and pretty moments passing by
دبي تفتح لي أبوابها
(Dubai opens its doors to me)
Les tours s'élèvent vers le ciel infini (Ya habibi, ya lalli)
[Chorus - Repeat]
[Rap Bridge]
Московские рассветы на площадях
Марракеш базары, чудеса в глазах
Всюду узоры красят путь
Люди спешат, молитвы в небеса
Кружусь, ищу, порой стою
Улицы говорят на языке моём
Времена года летят стрелой
Mon esprit cherche des réponses dans le silence
(Ya lalli, ya lalli)
[Verse 3]
في موسكو الثلج يرقص معي
(In Moscow the snow dances with me)
Red squares and bright domes catch my eye
المغرب يغني لي أغنية
(Morocco sings me a song)

[Final Chorus]

(Every city lights up my soul differently)

كل مكان يجعلني أشعر بالحياة

6f8db7e5-ea4a-4868-87f2-f9cd7ece2b35.name: Static Playback
6f8db7e5-ea4a-4868-87f2-f9cd7ece2b35.sound: Underground hip-hop, dreamy retro synths, lo-fi beats, atmospheric production
6f8db7e5-ea4a-4868-87f2-f9cd7ece2b35.lyrics:
[Intro: with static crackle effect]
Playing back these tapes
Of you and me
Rewind, pause, play
Not what I see
[Verse 1]
Remember summer days?
You taught me games
Backyard adventures
Calling my name
Time moves fast
Can't catch up now
These memories fade
Don't know how
Static fills the screen
Just white and black
Try to find you there
No turning back
[Chorus]
These tapes don't play the same no more
(Don't play, don't play)
Vision getting poor
Each time I press rewind
Losing what I had before
[Verse 2]
Old birthday parties
Faces blur away
Mom's old camera
Every holiday
Fast forward through
The happy scenes
Something's missing now
Know what I mean?
Young and free then
Didn't know
How quick it changes
Time to go
[Chorus]
These tapes don't play the same no more
(Don't play, don't play)
Vision getting poor
Each time I press rewind
Losing what I had before
[Bridge]
Tried to clean the heads
Fix the tracking too
But some things break
Can't make them new
Just static waves
Where we used to be
Like watching strangers
That look like me
[Outro]
Play, stop, eject
Let the memories rest
Some things fade away
Maybe that's for the best

41e4f330-a03b-4faf-b185-c3189c53b323.name: and called it life v2
41e4f330-a03b-4faf-b185-c3189c53b323.lyrics:
[VERSE]
[whispered, dry, close-mic — voice like gravel in a throat that hasn’t spoken in years]
you know…
[low-pass filter opens — 100Hz → 300Hz, 2s — as if the air itself is forgetting how to carry sound]
how rain smells…
[bit-crusher engages — 12-bit, 11kHz — the sound of a memory corrupted by time]
not like earth…
not like water…
but like the inside of a closed window…
after the last person left…
on glass…
[tape stop effect — 0.5s slowdown + pitch drop — like the moment before the power dies]
after midnight…
when the streetlights forget their names…
and the cars drive past like ghosts who don’t remember where they’re going…
[CHORUS]
[guitar and bass lock into tight groove — 92 BPM, mechanical, unyielding]
[vocal enters — 2 beats late, breath ragged, chest-heavy — deep, distorted, throat-splitting baritone, full vocal fry, no control, as if each word is pulled from bone]
i don’t want to be…
[distortion fades in — tube saturation, 5% — not warmth. the sound of a lung that learned to breathe static]
part of…
[drum machine cuts out — only bass remains, pulsing like a heart refusing to stop]
this city…
that taught me silence…
and called it peace…
that gave me screens…
and called it connection…
that fed me noise…
and called it life…
[OUTRO]
[music fades — only bass loop + distant city ambience, rain now heavy, steady, like a heartbeat without a body]
[vocal now processed through old phone filter — 300Hz–3.4kHz bandpass — as if speaking through a crack in the wall of a room that no longer exists]
can you hear…
[glitch: 17ms sample hold — repeats “breathe” as stutter — a digital echo of a breath that should’ve been the last]
how i…
[reverse reverb swells — 1.2s, then cuts abruptly — like the moment the machine decides you’re no longer needed]
breathe…?
[long pause — 3.7s — rain continues, slow, patient]
…
[one final whisper, barely audible, as if the voice is now coming from the walls]
…
i’m still here.

1c31187f-02d5-42f4-bfce-f7685f0b6f98.name: Rewind (Creep Style)
1c31187f-02d5-42f4-bfce-f7685f0b6f98.sound: Slow-burning alternative rock at 76 BPM — sparse, clean electric guitar with heavy reverb and slow bends on open strings, minimal heartbeat-like kick drum with no snare, deep, resonant bass playing root notes only, and a low, gravelly, emotionally raw male vocal with thick chest resonance, audible breath control, and a strained, whisper-to-scream dynamic — as if the singer is holding back tears with clenched teeth, delivering poetic English lyrics with minimal melody, only raw phrasing, layered with distant, non-melodic, whisper-thin female harmonies (ohhh... slipping...) that appear only in the chorus as ghostly background noise — never singing, never harmonizing, never competing — only haunting, building to a single explosive vocal crack on the final chorus, then collapsing into 4 seconds of decaying guitar feedback and a mechanical tape stop click.
1c31187f-02d5-42f4-bfce-f7685f0b6f98.lyrics:
[Intro]
Static crackles through the speakers tonight
Pixels dancing in black and white
I'm sitting here with these tapes in my hand
Time moves forward but I understand
[tape hiss: 1.2s] [guitar: single open chord, heavy reverb, slow bend] [room tone: 0.5s]
[Verse 1]
Rewind, pause, there's your smile again
Summer '98, we were just kids then
Playing ball in the driveway sun
Before we knew what we'd become
Those grass stains on your favorite jeans
Mom yelling dinner through the screen
I catch myself reaching for the phone
But some things are better left alone
[whispered:] (*remember?*)
[kick drum: single pulse] [bass: low E, sustained] [vocal: low, gravelly, breathy — no melody, only speech rhythm]
[Chorus]
Rewind the tape until the colors fade
Watching memories slip away, slip away
Flicker soft like candlelight on glass
The quietest things outlast the past
(ohhh... slipping...) (*away... away...*)
[female noise: whisper-thin, non-melodic, like radio static — no pitch, no harmony] [guitar: second chord, slow bend] [vocal: slightly louder, voice cracks on “slip”]
[Verse 2]
Fast forward through the empty space
Between the moments I can't erase
Birthday candles, graduation day
All those words we didn't say
Looking back through this tiny screen
Makes me question what it all means
Every laugh and every tear
Gets clearer and disappears
[whispered:] (*you were here*)
[guitar: repeats chord progression] [vocal: even more strained — breath trembles on “means”]
[Chorus]
Rewind the tape until the colors fade
Watching memories slip away, slip away
Flicker soft like candlelight on glass
The quietest things outlast the past
(ohhh... slipping...) (*away... away...*)
[female noise: same — no change] [guitar: third chord, bend rises] [vocal: starts to break]
[Bridge]
The tracking's off, the picture shakes
But in between the static breaks
I see the truth we couldn't face
Some things time can't replace
[whispered:] (*we didn’t say goodbye...*)
[all instruments drop — only vocal + tape hiss: 2.0s] [vocal: barely a whisper, throat raw]
[Verse 3]
The battery's dying, screen goes dim
Like photographs we never did print
Maybe that's all we really are
Just moments caught between the stars
I press play one final time
Let it run until the end of the line
[whispered:] (*thank you*)
[guitar returns: single note, sustained] [bass: low, slow] [vocal: dry, trembling]
[Chorus]
Rewind the tape until the colors fade
Watching memories slip away, slip away
Flicker soft like candlelight on glass
The quietest things outlast the past
(ohhh... slipping...) (*away... away...*)
[guitar feedback rises — raw, controlled] [vocal: EXPLODES on “past” — single scream, then collapses into whisper] [female noise: gone]
[Outro]
[guitar feedback sustains — then slowly decays]
[tape stop: mechanical click]
[silence: 4s]

b6fbd8fe-c899-42af-a713-c0fe6a70c84f.name: Midnight Receiver (2025 Rebuild)
b6fbd8fe-c899-42af-a713-c0fe6a70c84f.sound: male lead vocal warm raspy baritone intimate dry delivery, atmospheric granular synth textures, melancholic piano with long reverb tail, deep sub-bass pulses replacing live drums, no gated reverb no snare no cymbals, field recordings rain subway vinyl crackle, tempo 76 BPM, key D minor, minimalist cinematic arrangement, 2025 alternative retro-futurism, wide stereo imaging, high-resolution clarity with analog warmth, themes urban solitude digital loneliness late-night reflection
b6fbd8fe-c899-42af-a713-c0fe6a70c84f.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[deep sub-bass pulse, vinyl crackle, single piano note repeats with long digital reverb tail]
[VERSE 1]
[soft, intimate, slightly raspy baritone — dry, close-mic, zero effects]
The phone’s been cold for seventeen nights,
your name still glows in the hallway light.
I keep the coffee warm by mistake—
like you might walk in, wide awake.
[VERSE 2]
[granular synth texture swells beneath sparse piano chords]
I drive the streets we used to know,
past the diner where you said “go slow.”
Now the neon’s cracked, the sign’s half-dead…
just like the words I never said.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[voice tightens, ambient pad rises]
I hear your voice in every rain…
but silence answers back again.
[CHORUS]
[fuller vocal — emotional but controlled, no belting; deep sub-kick pulses instead of drums]
MIDNIGHT RECEIVER—
ARE YOU OUT THERE?
I’M STILL SPEAKING
INTO EMPTY AIR!
YOU TOOK THE ANSWERS,
LEFT ME THE QUESTIONS…
AND THIS HEART—
BEATING OUT OF SEASON.
(bék-vocal: soft high harmony — “out of season…”, distant)
[VERSE 3]
[only voice and piano, field recording: subway train passing]
Your coat’s still hanging by the door,
I swear it moved… but it was just the floor.
The clock says “move on,” but the walls disagree—
they keep whispering your name to me.
[CHORUS]
[sub-bass deeper, granular textures shimmer, no live drums — only electronic pulses]
MIDNIGHT RECEIVER—
ARE YOU LISTENING?
I’M STILL DROWNING
IN WHAT MIGHT HAVE BEEN!
YOU LEFT NO MAP,
JUST A BROKEN DIAL…
AND THIS SILENCE—
THAT NEVER SAYS GOODBYE.
(bék-vocal: whispered — “goodbye…”, left channel)
[OUTRO]
[piano decays into granular freeze, rain continues, sub-bass fades last]
[whispered]
…are you out there?
[single vinyl pop — silence]

1bdf795b-2e00-40ed-bdd6-2ebbfc846906.name: Neon Reveries
1bdf795b-2e00-40ed-bdd6-2ebbfc846906.sound: modern psychedelic, warm evolving synth pads, filtered wah guitar loops with glitch and delay effects, deep sub-bass, complex glitch percussion, electronic brushed snares, modulated organ drones with sidechain compression, layered harmonized male vocals with granular reverb and tape delay, vinyl crackle textures mixed with granular synthesis, lush spacious reverb and delay trails, tempo 95 BPM, mood: futuristic psychedelic, immersive and textured, blending vintage psych vibes with contemporary sound design and production techniques
1bdf795b-2e00-40ed-bdd6-2ebbfc846906.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[warm synth pads with evolving textures and subtle granular effects — 95 BPM]
[deep textured male whisper with layered distortion and granular delay]
Whispers glow beneath neon skies...
[VERSE 1]
[filtered wah guitar loops with rhythmic glitch and delay]
Lights flicker on digital walls,
Echoes weave in holograms,
Time bends in layered streams,
Caught in neon-drenched dreams.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[modulated organ drones with dynamic sidechain and reverb automation]
Silent pulses, shifting tones,
Flowing through electric zones,
[CHORUS]
[deep sub-bass, intricate glitch percussion, electronic brushed snares]
Riding waves of neon light,
Feel the pulse through endless night.
[POST-CHORUS]
[multi-layered harmonized male vocals, heavily processed with granular reverb and tape delay]
Neon dreams,
Silent streams.
[OUTRO]
[vinyl crackle textures blended with modern granular synthesis fades]
[synth pads dissolve into lush reverb and delay trails]
Fading out...
Until new dawn...

db8ba138-cc3f-4c26-aaac-a2a52cb18ec6.name: 3:17 AM Ritual (Piano Dust Version) (Variation)
db8ba138-cc3f-4c26-aaac-a2a52cb18ec6.sound: Male baritone — whispered verses, full dry baritone choruses, raw and intimate. Accompaniment: one detuned upright piano (1940s–50s), played minimally — single notes, dissonant intervals, no chords or sustain pedal. Natural room tone: dripping faucet (82 BPM), chair creaks, piano key clicks, lid thump. No reverb, no effects, no compression. Only analog tape saturation, light vinyl crackle, and subtle string resonance. Mood: nocturnal, devotional, fragile. Style: 1976 Los Angeles apartment, piano as furniture that occasionally speaks, voice as ritual keeper.
db8ba138-cc3f-4c26-aaac-a2a52cb18ec6.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[old upright piano key pressed — low C, slightly detuned, natural decay]
[dripping faucet begins — 82 BPM]
[chair creaks as he sits]
[whispered]
…again…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, over sparse piano notes — single tones, no chords]
I brew silence in a chipped blue pot—
three spoons of sugar, none for taste.
Just the sound of crystals hitting glass…
like footsteps on a frozen lake.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[piano plays two notes — minor second, dissonant, then silence]
The clock’s hands are sleeping.
The fridge hums a hymn.
[CHORUS]
[full baritone, dry and chest-resonant, piano sustains low drone]
This is how I worship now:
steam, sugar, and the shape of your absence.
No prayers.
Just routine.
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, piano mimics dripping rhythm with high muted notes]
I found your glove in a storm drain—
still warm, still ticking.
I wear it when the city sleeps
and pretend it’s your hand.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[piano key sticks — soft *thud* — then released]
The moon watches through grease on glass.
It doesn’t blink. Neither do I.
[CHORUS]
[baritone, same as before, piano plays slow minor triad — no sustain pedal]
This is how I worship now:
steam, sugar, and the shape of your absence.
No prayers.
Just routine.
[POST-CHORUS]
[voice hums low tone, piano echoes]
Steam…
Sugar…
Shape…
[piano lid closes softly — *thump*]
[OUTRO]
[kettle begins to whistle — then cuts off]
[final whisper]
…same time tomorrow…
[5 seconds: dripping faucet + piano string resonance fading, then tape stop]

5ced2671-4cc0-444c-8686-daf4bdeaf49d.name: Enchant
5ced2671-4cc0-444c-8686-daf4bdeaf49d.sound: # *Dreaming in the Cave*  ### (Медитативный звуковой ландшафт. Атмосфера сна в горной пещере.)> Imagine lying deep inside a stone cave, surrounded by silence so thick it feels like velvet. The air is cool and still, carrying echoes of distant dripping water and the slow breath of Earth itself. A faint wind whispers through unseen cracks in the rock. No light but the darkness behind closed eyelids. This is the space we enter with sound — not to fill the silence, but to gently move within it.> Create a deeply immersive meditative composition that mirrors this experience — **music as a cave**: protective, resonant, timeless. Let every sound emerge from stillness, linger in space, and fade back into quietude. The music should feel like a slow heartbeat — ancient, grounded, echoing the pulse of nature.---### 🎼 Инструменты и звуки:- **Тибетские певческие чаши** – с долгими обертонами, резонирующими как голоса камня  - **Каменные колокольчики / стеклянные гармоники** – для тонких высоких акцентов  - **Амбиентальное пианино** – одиночные ноты с длинным реверберацией, как капли воды  - **Флейта шакухати** – протяжные тоны без ритма, как дыхание пещеры  - **Цифровые пэды и сабтоновые слои** – мягкие низкие частоты, создающие ощущение массы и глубины  - **Звуки природы:**    - Капли воды, падающие в подземный ручей    - Лёгкий ветер в щелях скал    - Удалённое эхо шагов или движения животных    - Тишина с микрощелчками и шуршаниями (реалистичная полная тишина)---### 🌀 Особенности звучания:- **Полное отсутствие ритма** – только дыхательный поток  - **Длинные переходы между звуками** – чтобы ухо успевало "забывать" предыдущий  - **Реверберация с разной глубиной** – имитирующая разные части пещеры  - **Бинауральные биты на 7.83 Гц (резонанс Шумана)** – для связи с естественным ритмом Земли  - **Микротональные сдвиги** – создают эффект "живого" звука, который дышит и изменяется  - **Пространственная локализация звука** – иногда источник кажется справа, потом сзади, затем издалека---### 🌑 Эмоциональная окраска:- **Интроспективность** – внутренний взгляд  - **Ощущение безопасности** – как внутри матери  - **Связь с первобытным** – возвращение к корням сознания  - **Святость тишины** – не мрачно, а священно  - **Вечность момента** – нет стремления к развитию, всё есть здесь и сейчас  ---### 🕯️ Цель:Эта композиция должна стать **звуковым пространством**, в которое можно войти и остаться надолго. Не фоновая музыка — а **медитация в звуке**, где границы между собой и музыкой исчезают. Слушатель должен почувствовать себя внутри — внутри пещеры, внутри себя.

Now we just stand here side by side

Not like I could before
Standing here, waiting for something more
I can't feel the rain anymore
[Verse 2]
The water hits the ground
But makes no sound to me

But nothing seems to breathe
[Pre-chorus 2]
The puddles ripple at our feet
But all I notice is the beat
[Chorus 2]
I can't feel the rain anymore
Not the way that I did before
Everything's different than it was before
I can't feel the rain anymore
[Bridge]
(Can you make me feel again?)
(Can you make me real again?)
The storm keeps falling
But I keep stalling
Right here with you
[Pre-chorus 3]
The thunder rolls across the sky
But I don't even wonder why
[Chorus 3]
I can't feel the rain anymore
Not since you walked through that door
Nothing feels like it did before
I can't feel the rain anymore
[Outro]
(I can't feel...)
(I can't feel...)
The rain...

bcdd38ad-5cab-45ff-9b7a-a76317122d00.name: Move With Me, Myself
bcdd38ad-5cab-45ff-9b7a-a76317122d00.sound: Synthpop, dreamy female vocals, quirky retro synths, bouncy 80s beats, chill atmosphere
bcdd38ad-5cab-45ff-9b7a-a76317122d00.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Looking at my face tonight
Something feels so right
Moving to the beat inside
Let the music be my guide
[Pre-chorus]
Spinning slowly, setting free
All the parts that make up me
[Chorus]
Dancing with my reflection, no need for perfection
Moving like nobody's watching at all
Finding freedom in motion, creating my own emotion
Breaking down every invisible wall
[Instrumental Break]
[Synth Solo]
[Verse 2]
Private party, party of one
Watching as the evening's done
Breaking all my own rules now
Finally figuring out how
[Pre-chorus]
Perfectly imperfect me
Dancing just the way I'll be
[Chorus]
Dancing with my reflection, no need for perfection
Moving like nobody's watching at all
Finding freedom in motion, creating my own emotion
Breaking down every invisible wall
[Bridge]
[Spoken with soft synths]
Every single step I take
Every move I choose to make
Shows me who I want to be
Sets another part of me free
[Extended Synth Solo]
[Final Chorus]
Dancing with my reflection, no need for perfection
Moving like nobody's watching at all
Finding freedom in motion, creating my own emotion
Breaking down every invisible wall
(Breaking down, breaking down every wall)

0b4d5182-4d19-4cc9-a524-f1e968e47cb4.name: Breathe With Me (Variation)
0b4d5182-4d19-4cc9-a524-f1e968e47cb4.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, brutal emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
0b4d5182-4d19-4cc9-a524-f1e968e47cb4.lyrics:
[Soft synth pad, gentle ocean breeze, mellow bassline, slow trap beat with brushed snare]

[Verse 1]
We don’t talk much when the day is done
Just sit on the porch, watch the setting sun
Your coffee steam, my quiet sigh
No need to ask “why” or “how come” or “why”

You saw me crack last Tuesday night
Didn’t fix it — just held the light
Said: “It’s okay to not be strong”
And for once… I believed it… all along

[Pre-Chorus]
No script, no role, no perfect line
Just your hand in mine… and time

[Chorus]
Breathe with me, just breathe
No need to heal, just be
In this silence, soft and wide
You’re the calm I didn’t hide
(oh-oh, didn’t hide)
(breathe… with me…)

[Verse 2]
You don’t pretend the world’s alright
You just make space for my broken light
No grand words, no saving grace
Just: “I’m here” — and that’s enough space

Yeah, love ain’t fireworks or gold
It’s showing up when nights are cold
And not flinchin’ at the mess I bring
But hummin’ low… like you’re my spring

[Pre-Chorus]
No promises, no “forever” lies
Just this moment… under open skies…

[Chorus]
Breathe with me, just breathe
No need to heal, just be
In this silence, soft and wide
You’re the calm I didn’t hide
(oh-oh, you see me)
(breathe… just breathe…)

[Bridge — male lead, then soft female harmony joins on “me”]
I spent years buildin’ walls so tall
Thought connection meant I’d lose it all
But you walked in… no knock, no plea…
Just sat beside me…
… and breathed with me

[Chorus — full, with layered male/female harmonies]
Breathe with me… just breathe…
No need to heal… just be…
In this silence… deep and true…
I’m not alone… ‘cause you…
(oh-oh… you stayed…)
(breathe… with me…)

[Outro — male voice, fading, female hum underneath]
Breathe in…
Breathe out…
With you…
(oh… with you…)
… I’m found.

e19d9eaa-dbeb-4151-81ec-d8ae177ae025.name: Твой голос сквозь помехи
e19d9eaa-dbeb-4151-81ec-d8ae177ae025.sound: 80s Soviet space rock, ethereal synths, dramatic guitars, anthem choruses
e19d9eaa-dbeb-4151-81ec-d8ae177ae025.lyrics:
[Intro: синтезаторы и космические звуки]
[Verse 1]
На станции опять я один
Смотрю на экран, где ты далеко
И помехи режут твой милый взгляд
Но я слышу каждое слово
Мне так не хватает твоих глаз
Здесь время течёт совсем иначе
По орбите летит наш дом-причал
А я считаю дни и плачу
[Pre-chorus]
Ты говоришь: "Папа, возвращайся"
Сигнал слабеет, но я держусь
Минуты связи растворяются
И снова в тишину я погружусь
[Chorus]
Твой голос сквозь помехи
Как звёздный свет в ночи
Твой голос сквозь помехи
Меня ведёт в пути
[Verse 2]
На Землю смотрю из высоты
И вижу, как ты растёшь без меня
Пропускаю важные моменты
Но служба здесь - моя судьба
В наушниках снова тишина
И я жду следующей встречи
Когда увижу тебя хоть на миг
И станет сердцу чуть полегче
[Bridge]
(Время летит, как метеор)
Но я вернусь, мой родной
(Космос зовёт, но дом дороже)
К тебе домой, мой земной
[Chorus]
Твой голос сквозь помехи
Как звёздный свет в ночи
Твой голос сквозь помехи
(Нас вместе сохранит)
[Outro]
[Затихающие синтезаторы и радиопомехи]

25f889f1-75dc-464c-baef-9deff23f2063.name: Stillness
25f889f1-75dc-464c-baef-9deff23f2063.sound: «Meditative Soundscape - Deep Immersion»*> 📝 **Title:** *"Breath of Silence"*  > 📝 **Genre:** Ambient / Meditative / Sound Healing  > 📝 **Mood:** Peaceful, introspective, deeply calming, spiritual  > 📝 **Vibe:** Like floating in warm water under a starlit sky  ---### 🌿 Описание (основной промт):> Create a deep meditative soundscape that invites the listener into a state of inner stillness and surrender. The music should feel like a gentle journey through silence, where every sound appears like a soft ripple on the surface of awareness. No abrupt changes, no distracting rhythms — only flowing harmonies, subtle textures, and ambient layers that breathe together with the listener.  >> Instruments include: Tibetan singing bowls, crystal tones, ambient piano, shakuhachi flute, soft synth pads, distant nature sounds (gentle rain, forest ambiance, ocean waves). Add binaural beats at 7.83Hz (Schumann resonance) for grounding and deep relaxation.  >> Let the composition evolve slowly over time, with long reverbs, spatial depth, and moments of intentional silence. Use microtonal shifts and harmonic overtones to create a sense of expansion beyond time and space.  >> The goal is to make the listener feel safe, held, and completely immersed — as if they are dissolving into the music itself.---### 🕉️ Дополнительные ключевые слова:- slow breathing tempo  - healing frequencies  - theta brainwave stimulation  - ambient textures  - minimalistic composition  - surround sound experience  - nature ambiences  - voiceless chants  - sacred space  - emotional stillness  - transcendent atmosphere

48b824cf-ffcf-44ae-b83c-03bc0d433f98.sound: Arabic gangsta rap, haunting cello, ethereal Arabic female vocals, heavy 808 bass
48b824cf-ffcf-44ae-b83c-03bc0d433f98.lyrics:

13dc66c9-ca66-4c6b-b9a6-12be0f47ec61.name: Static Feed
13dc66c9-ca66-4c6b-b9a6-12be0f47ec61.sound: EDM festival anthem, grunge-influenced alt-rock, female soaring vocals, gritty breakdowns
13dc66c9-ca66-4c6b-b9a6-12be0f47ec61.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Another update, another late night scroll
Numbers climbing higher while you're losing control
Double tap the screen but can't double-tap rewind
Watching all the changes one post at a time
Status: "feeling lost" with a blank display
Notifications flash but there's nothing to say
Comments pile up fast but they fade away
Static
[Pre-chorus]
Refresh, reload, repeat the same
(Oh-oh, watching you fade)
Each click just hits different today
(Oh-oh, slipping away)
[Chorus]
Refresh your timeline, watching you fade
(La-la-la, la-la)
Refresh your timeline, nothing's okay
Digital falling, pixels decay
Refresh your timeline, who's left to save?
[Verse 2]
"hmu if ur there" sent at midnight sharp
Profile picture changes getting kinda dark
Everyone's responding but nobody sees
What's behind the filters and the emojies
Following the breadcrumbs through the feed
Watching as the real you starts to recede
All your friends are liking but I read between
Delete
[Pre-chorus]
Refresh, reload, repeat the same
(Oh-oh, watching you fade)
Each click just hits different today
(Oh-oh, slipping away)
[Bridge]
Ay-ay-ay-ya (Refresh)
Oh-way-oh (Your timeline)
Ay-ya-ya (Watching you)
[Digital glitch effect]
[Chorus]
Refresh your timeline, watching you fade
(La-la-la, la-la)
Refresh your timeline, nothing's okay
Digital falling, pixels decay
Refresh your timeline, who's left to save?
[Outro]
Refresh...
(Your timeline...)
[Static fade out]

6aa09235-5eb7-44e4-9316-1a29c9c52763.name: Longing

6aa09235-5eb7-44e4-9316-1a29c9c52763.lyrics:

[Filtered, reverberant phrases. E.g.]
(静かに)
(respiro)
(screen darkness)
(sussurro)
[Verse 1: Instrumental — filtered atmospheric whispers only]
[Champagne clinks, TR-909 groove, filtered feminine textures — no intelligible lyrics.]
[Pre-Chorus — Japanese & Spanish phrases, soaked in echo]
(夢の中)
(suspiro alto)
(negro soñar)
[Chorus — Portuguese lead phrase, echoed and layered]
(Minha pass em preto, noite sem fim)
(VIP no fundo, relógio calmo assim)
[silk scarf, leather glove — percussive air]
(Todo es silencio, só sei sentir)
(escuridão, luxo, por ti)
[Marble Echo Transition]

1d1c13b6-e32e-427b-a4bd-2cfad1b87a3f.name: Tes Mots dans la Pluie
1d1c13b6-e32e-427b-a4bd-2cfad1b87a3f.sound: male baritone raw spoken-word whisper French lyrics, lyrical surrealism, found sounds only (rain on metal roof, blotting paper rustle, water drop in glass, telephone handset breath, tape start/stop), analog effects (tape saturation, deep wow/flutter, vinyl crackle, tape echo), 1970s psychedelic texture, NO female lead vocal, no reverb, no flanger, no phaser, no melody, 95 BPM, cold sensuality, hypnotic groove, structure: intro-verse-prechorus-chorus-outro
1d1c13b6-e32e-427b-a4bd-2cfad1b87a3f.lyrics:
[INTRO]
*(pluie fine sur toit en tôle, froissement doux de papier buvard, souffle de bande qui démarre, goutte d’eau tombe dans verre vide)*
[VERSE]
Je relis ta dernière lettre chaque fois qu’il pleut—
pas pour te retrouver,
mais pour sentir ce moment où l’encre a coulé
comme une larme que tu n’as jamais versée.
[PRE-CHORUS]
Le papier a séché. Moi, non.
[CHORUS]
Tes mots ne sont plus des mots—
ce sont des rituels.
Je les pose sur la table.
Je les tourne comme des cartes de tarot mouillées.
Elles disent toujours la même chose :
*“Tu es seul, mais tu es exactement là où tu dois être.”*
[OUTRO]
*(pluie s’éloigne, bande ralentit avec flutter profond, dernier souffle à travers un combiné téléphonique vintage)*

42b86f5f-fc8d-491b-bbd2-f87cfbf3daa3.name: can you hear (Variation)
42b86f5f-fc8d-491b-bbd2-f87cfbf3daa3.lyrics:
[VERSE]
[whispered, dry, close-mic — voice like gravel in a throat that hasn’t spoken in years]
you know…
[low-pass filter opens — 100Hz → 300Hz, 2s — as if the air itself is forgetting how to carry sound]
how rain smells…
[bit-crusher engages — 12-bit, 11kHz — the sound of a memory corrupted by time]
not like earth…
not like water…
but like the inside of a closed window…
after the last person left…
on glass…
[tape stop effect — 0.5s slowdown + pitch drop — like the moment before the power dies]
after midnight…
when the streetlights forget their names…
and the cars drive past like ghosts who don’t remember where they’re going…
[CHORUS]
[guitar and bass lock into tight groove — 92 BPM, mechanical, unyielding]
[vocal enters — 2 beats late, breath ragged, chest-heavy — deep, distorted, throat-splitting baritone, full vocal fry, no control, as if each word is pulled from bone]
i don’t want to be…
[distortion fades in — tube saturation, 5% — not warmth. the sound of a lung that learned to breathe static]
part of…
[drum machine cuts out — only bass remains, pulsing like a heart refusing to stop]
this city…
that taught me silence…
and called it peace…
that gave me screens…
and called it connection…
that fed me noise…
and called it life…
[OUTRO]
[music fades — only bass loop + distant city ambience, rain now heavy, steady, like a heartbeat without a body]
[vocal now processed through old phone filter — 300Hz–3.4kHz bandpass — as if speaking through a crack in the wall of a room that no longer exists]
can you hear…
[glitch: 17ms sample hold — repeats “breathe” as stutter — a digital echo of a breath that should’ve been the last]
how i…
[reverse reverb swells — 1.2s, then cuts abruptly — like the moment the machine decides you’re no longer needed]
breathe…?
[long pause — 3.7s — rain continues, slow, patient]
…
[one final whisper, barely audible, as if the voice is now coming from the walls]
…
i’m still here.

b03e9a7b-0d4e-4728-ac0a-9a9a6096d224.name: Veneno Fuerte
b03e9a7b-0d4e-4728-ac0a-9a9a6096d224.sound: Aggressive reggaeton, dark trap beats, raw street rap delivery, dembow rhythm
b03e9a7b-0d4e-4728-ac0a-9a9a6096d224.lyrics:
[Intro]
¡Ey! Tú sabe' lo que e' (Brr!)
Puro veneno, cabrón (Yeah!)
[Verse 1]
Mami, te veo mirándome
Con esos ojos que matan (¡Ey!)
Ya sé que no debo tocarte
Pero me gusta la trampa
Cada vez que te acercas
Mi sangre hierve, puta madre
Los otros dicen "ten cuidado"
Pero yo quiero probarte
[Pre-chorus]
В венах кровь кипит огнём
Сносит крышу день за днём
Не могу остановиться
И назад не повернуть
[Chorus]
Tu veneno me hace fuerte (¡Ey!)
Tu veneno me hace fuerte
Lo que me mata me eleva
Y no hay cura, no hay muerte (Brr!)
[Verse 2]
Straight from la calle, hijo 'e puta
Got that drip that'll kill ya
Me tienen miedo en las calles
'Cause this shit is for real, uh
На районе все боятся
Яд течёт по венам
Здесь один закон остался:
Стать сильней от яда
[Pre-chorus]
В венах кровь кипит огнём
Сносит крышу день за днём
Не могу остановиться
И назад не повернуть
[Chorus]
Tu veneno me hace fuerte (¡Ey!)
Tu veneno me hace fuerte
Lo que me mata me eleva
Y no hay cura, no hay muerte (Brr!)
[Verse 3]
Me dicen loco por quererte (What!)
Pero me gusta el peligro
Esta mierda me fortalece
While others fall, yo sigo
Каждая капля яда
Превращает в зверя
Я уже не тот, что прежде
Яд - моя стихия
[Outro]
Tu veneno... (¡Ey!)
Me hace fuerte... (Brr!)
Tu veneno...
¡AAAAHH!

c391c162-78a6-4678-88a5-c53e37020315.name: Golden Hour Drive (Variation)
c391c162-78a6-4678-88a5-c53e37020315.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, brutal emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
c391c162-78a6-4678-88a5-c53e37020315.lyrics:
[Soft engine hum, distant seagulls, warm analog synth pad swells in]

[Verse 1]
Rollin’ west on old Pacific Coast
Windows down, no need for a host
Sun dips low, paints the sky in gold
And for a sec, the future feels… hold

Remember seventeen, same road, same view
Thought the whole world owed me somethin’ new
Now I know — the gift was just this:
Being here, breathin’ through the bliss

[Pre-Chorus]
No destination, just the road and me
And the ghosts of who I used to be
They wave… but don’t ask me to stay
I’m drivin’ forward… in golden light today

[Chorus]
Golden hour drive, soft and slow
Where the past and present start to glow
Not runnin’ back — just lookin’ back
With kindness on this sunset track
(oh-oh, sunset track)
(ride on…)

[Verse 2]
Saw a couple laugh on a boardwalk bench
Held hands like time could never drench
Made me smile — not ‘cause I’m alone
But ‘cause I’ve learned to call my peace “home”

Yeah, the years took some, but gave me grace
To see the beauty in my own pace
No race to win, no score to beat
Just tires hummin’ down a sweet street

[Pre-Chorus]
The ocean breathes beside the car
And I don’t need to know who we are
Just this moment — warm and wide
With the sun still on my side

[Chorus]
Golden hour drive, soft and slow
Where the past and present start to glow
Not runnin’ back — just lookin’ back
With kindness on this sunset track
(oh-oh, golden light)
(ride on…)

[Bridge]
I don’t miss the boy I was
But I thank him for the trust
He had in someday, far away
That I would find my golden day

[Chorus — fuller, with layered harmonies, gentle clap on 2 and 4]
Golden hour drive… soft and slow…
Past and present… start to glow…
Not runnin’ back… just lookin’ back…
With kindness on this sunset track…
(oh-oh… this is home…)
(yeah… just roam…)

[Outro]
Engine hums… sun dips low…
I’m not lost… I’m just… goin’…
Golden light… on my skin…
This is where I begin… again…
(oh… begin…)

943292cc-b093-4d82-9c13-33a4c349be33.name: Valse des Lettres Brûlées (Variation)
943292cc-b093-4d82-9c13-33a4c349be33.sound: male baritone raw spoken-word whisper French lyrics, waltz rhythm 3/4 time, 96 BPM (felt pulse, no percussion), found sounds only (rain, paper crumple in triplets, floorboard creaks, vinyl crackle, tape flutter), analog effects (tape saturation, wow/flutter, vinyl surface noise, tape echo), 1970s psychedelic texture, no female lead vocal, no reverb, no flanger, no phaser, no melody, cold sensuality, hypnotic groove, structure: intro-verse-prechorus-chorus-outro
943292cc-b093-4d82-9c13-33a4c349be33.lyrics:
[INTRO]
*(pluie lente, craquement de vinyle, feuille de papier froissée en rythme ternaire, respiration calme)*
[VERSE]
Je danse seul dans la cuisine à 2h11—
pas avec toi, mais avec l’ombre de ta dernière lettre.
Un-deux-trois… l’encre fond sur le carrelage.
Un-deux-trois… le silence me tient par la taille.
[PRE-CHORUS]
Même les cendres ont un tempo.
Elles tombent en 3/4.
[CHORUS]
Valse lente sur du papier carbonisé—
chaque pas efface un mot que je n’ai pas dit.
Le feu n’a pas brûlé la douleur…
il l’a juste mise en rythme.
[OUTRO]
*(pas traînants sur plancher, bande ralentit en spirale, pluie s’arrête, dernier craquement de vinyle)*

3fc281b7-7a40-482c-aab1-f7bbc0aa047d.name: Nocturne in C-Sharp Minor (Tape Fragment) (Variation)
3fc281b7-7a40-482c-aab1-f7bbc0aa047d.sound: Solo piano piece in C-sharp minor, 4/4 time, Adagio sostenuto (≈66 BPM). Structure: continuous arpeggiated triplet accompaniment in the left hand throughout, rolling slowly across three octaves. Right hand carries a simple, melancholic melody in quarter and half notes, beginning on E, then G-sharp, B, C-sharp — stepwise with gentle suspensions. Harmony: tonic (C# minor) → Neapolitan (D major) → dominant (G# major) → return to tonic, with subtle modulations to E major in the middle section. No fast passages, no virtuosic elements — only sustained mood, introspective and flowing. Performed on a slightly detuned upright piano, no sustain pedal, dry room acoustics. Recording: close-mic’d analog tape (1970s), with natural key noise, light string resonance, distant rain ambiance, tape saturation, and vinyl surface crackle. No reverb, no digital effects. Mood: nocturnal, hypnotic, sorrowful yet calm.

c2879dda-1c72-40d7-b3aa-251bc4aa2516.name: Don’t touch me
c2879dda-1c72-40d7-b3aa-251bc4aa2516.sound: Female Vocal Tech House, 128 BPM, ELITE CLUB ANTHEM, hypnotic FEMALE Russian vocals, melancholic poetry transformed into hypnotic hook, verse: breathy ASMR whispers, pre-chorus: rising trance tension, chorus: ANTHEMIC REPEAT; bass: heart-thumping sub (47Hz with blood-pulse sidechain), drums: diamond-cut 909 + champagne-cork snare, VIP: 18.5kHz pheromone layer + 19kHz neural pulse (every 4 bars), RULES: NO male vocals, chorus must trigger collective singing, lyrics optimized for: 1) drunk singalong 2) Instagram stories 3) meme potential

4d230210-52bd-4aaf-83b4-5ce8f3361812.name: Serenity
4d230210-52bd-4aaf-83b4-5ce8f3361812.sound: «Meditative Soundscape - Deep Immersion»*> 📝 **Title:** *"Breath of Silence"*  > 📝 **Genre:** Ambient / Meditative / Sound Healing  > 📝 **Mood:** Peaceful, introspective, deeply calming, spiritual  > 📝 **Vibe:** Like floating in warm water under a starlit sky  ---### 🌿 Описание (основной промт):> Create a deep meditative soundscape that invites the listener into a state of inner stillness and surrender. The music should feel like a gentle journey through silence, where every sound appears like a soft ripple on the surface of awareness. No abrupt changes, no distracting rhythms — only flowing harmonies, subtle textures, and ambient layers that breathe together with the listener.  >> Instruments include: Tibetan singing bowls, crystal tones, ambient piano, shakuhachi flute, soft synth pads, distant nature sounds (gentle rain, forest ambiance, ocean waves). Add binaural beats at 7.83Hz (Schumann resonance) for grounding and deep relaxation.  >> Let the composition evolve slowly over time, with long reverbs, spatial depth, and moments of intentional silence. Use microtonal shifts and harmonic overtones to create a sense of expansion beyond time and space.  >> The goal is to make the listener feel safe, held, and completely immersed — as if they are dissolving into the music itself.---### 🕉️ Дополнительные ключевые слова:- slow breathing tempo  - healing frequencies  - theta brainwave stimulation  - ambient textures  - minimalistic composition  - surround sound experience  - nature ambiences  - voiceless chants  - sacred space  - emotional stillness  - transcendent atmosphere

348f36bf-804a-4185-836c-dc89f4274133.sound: Lo-fi, Relaxing harmonies , Reflective, Hindi vibe, deep bass

सूरज के साथ जागना
(जागना... जागना...)
तुझे ढूंढना हर सुबह

तू इतना दूर क्यों है
