78f6e8e5-77e9-4715-8b55-dec5ccabb1e2.name: Echoes
78f6e8e5-77e9-4715-8b55-dec5ccabb1e2.sound: Trip-hop, haunting cello melodies, deep 808 bass, urban atmospherics, minimal drums
78f6e8e5-77e9-4715-8b55-dec5ccabb1e2.lyrics:
[Intro - Cello with rain and distant traffic]
(Ooh... ah...)
[Pre-chorus 1]
In these walls
Through the halls
Trailing fingers
Against cold stone
Your echoes remain
(Ohh...)
[Chorus 1]
These empty rooms still hold your shape
Like time forgot to let you fade
Every corner speaks your name
(La-da-da... mmm...)
[Atmospheric Break - Cello and 808 intensify]
(Ah... ooh...)
[Pre-chorus 2]
Dust settles down
No footsteps now
Still I wait
In silence here
Your traces stay
(Ohh...)
[Chorus 2]
These empty rooms still hold your shape
The air still moves where you would sway
Every corner calls your name
(La-da-da... mmm...)
[Build - Cello harmonics with deep 808]
(Ooh... ah...)
[Final Chorus]
These empty rooms still hold your shape
Like time forgot to let you fade
Every corner holds your name
(Every corner holds your name)
[Outro - Cello fades with urban atmosphere]
(Mmm... ooh...)

d2ccfce7-47aa-4b58-807d-2a83dcfa2dca.name: Melody Lost
d2ccfce7-47aa-4b58-807d-2a83dcfa2dca.sound: Trip-hop, slow cinematic double bass, 808s, mournful cello, smoky saxophone, rain atmosphere
d2ccfce7-47aa-4b58-807d-2a83dcfa2dca.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Morning rain falls
Empty case open
Worn strings ready
Last song to play
[Chorus]
These streets won't miss my melody
Just another sound lost in the grey
These streets won't miss my melody
Time to walk away
[Verse 2]
Six years here
Same corner, same tune
Faces passing by
None look back now
Coffee cups and change
That's all they gave
[Pre-chorus]
Pack up slow
Nothing left to stay for
Pack up slow
No one here to play for
[Chorus]
These streets won't miss my melody
Just another sound lost in the grey
These streets won't miss my melody
Time to walk away
[Bridge]
[Rain intensifies]
Been here so long
Thought it meant something
Every note played
Every morning waited
But the city moves on
Always moves on
[Verse 3]
Case closes shut
Last echo fades
Train ticket home
In my pocket waits
[Chorus]
These streets won't miss my melody
Just another sound lost in the grey
(These streets won't miss my melody)
Time to walk away

2eada474-db49-4bea-9b04-d4a7a8d03f5c.name: Reflection
2eada474-db49-4bea-9b04-d4a7a8d03f5c.sound: Trip-hop rap, ethereal female vocals, piano verses, heavy 808s, reverb atmosphere
2eada474-db49-4bea-9b04-d4a7a8d03f5c.lyrics:
[Piano Instrumental Verse]
[Pre-chorus]
Looking at my face, but who do I see?
Every single trace of who I used to be
Fading like the rain upon the evening street
Something's gonna change, starting here with me
[Chorus]
Glass reflection, someone brand new
Glass reflection, is it really you?
Glass reflection, breaking through
Glass reflection, speaking truth
(Speaking truth, ooh)
[Piano Instrumental Verse]
[Pre-chorus]
Way up in my mind, I'm switching up the vibe
Letting go the lies I kept deep inside
Moving past the pain that made me want to hide
Now I recognize the power in my stride
[Chorus]
Glass reflection, someone brand new
Glass reflection, is it really you?
Glass reflection, breaking through
Glass reflection, speaking truth
(Speaking truth, ooh)
[Bridge]
They say people never change
But baby look at me now (look at me now)
Breaking out these chains
Finally figured out how (figured out how)
Walking tall and proud
No more playing small (no more, no more)
This reflection shows me everything I could be
Everything I am, watch me rise and be free
(Rise and be free-ee-ee)
[Chorus]
Glass reflection, someone brand new
Glass reflection, is it really you?
Glass reflection, breaking through
Glass reflection, speaking truth
(Speaking truth, ooh-ooh-ooh)

dd11f551-5620-432a-ba4d-d2d30b7e8ab9.name: Elysium
dd11f551-5620-432a-ba4d-d2d30b7e8ab9.sound: Modern nocturne, classical piano/cello, ambient synth pads, atmospheric rain, deep 808 bass

74ce9a85-51a1-4b43-90cd-4f14f5f7772d.name: Through Glass
74ce9a85-51a1-4b43-90cd-4f14f5f7772d.sound: Trip-hop, haunting cello, heavy 808s, double bass, urban atmospherics
74ce9a85-51a1-4b43-90cd-4f14f5f7772d.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Rain and traffic sounds fade in]
[Deep double bass pizzicato pattern]
[Verse 1]
High above the street, watching you all
Through endless windows, day after day
Suspended here between earth and air
While you move on without knowing
[Bridge]
[Cello swells]
I press my hand against the glass
But can't feel your warmth
Each window frame holds someone new
But they never look up
[Chorus]
(Looking down, looking in)
All these lives behind the glass
(Looking down, looking in)
Each reflection shows what's past
[Verse 2]
Morning sun hits a thousand panes
And I'm still here, alone with my thoughts
You drink your coffee, brush back your hair
Never knowing I saw you there
[Outro]
[808 bass intensifies]
One last swipe across the glass
Leave no trace that I was here
[Rain sounds increase]
[Fade to double bass and cello]

7aa7f0c0-6e53-452e-800b-65e6bd58d10a.name: Static Like Snow
7aa7f0c0-6e53-452e-800b-65e6bd58d10a.sound: Lo-fi Russian folk duet, retro ambience, analog warmth, melodic melancholy
7aa7f0c0-6e53-452e-800b-65e6bd58d10a.lyrics:
[Verse 1 - Male]
The phone rings once, then twice
My fingers cold as ice
I wonder if you'll know
It's me from long ago
[Verse 2 - Female]
Hello? The voice so clear
Yet distant through the years
I almost missed your call
The night is still so raw
[Chorus - Both]
The static on the line sounds just like snow
(Like the winters we once knew)
Time melts away, though distance stays
(What else can we do?)
The static on the line sounds just like snow
And every word falls soft and slow
[Verse 3 - Male]
Remember summer trains?
The station in the rain
Your laugh still echoes here
Through static-covered years
[Verse 4 - Female]
The clock strikes past midnight
My kitchen's dim and quiet
Your voice brings back the days
When we knew all the ways
[Solo - Traditional Russian Folk Melody]
[Distant humming]
[Bridge - Both]
Time zones apart
Still sharing one heart
Between silence and sound
Lost moments found
[Chorus - Both]
The static on the line sounds just like snow
(Like the winters we once knew)
Time melts away, though distance stays
(What else can we do?)
The static on the line sounds just like snow
And every word falls soft and slow
[Outro - Alternating]
Male: The night grows old
Female: But stories unfold
Both: Through static and time
Like vintage wine
(Like vintage wine)

d8b1a95c-4bf3-41d0-91b7-e2547348ab7f.name: Tes Mots dans la Pluie (Variation)
d8b1a95c-4bf3-41d0-91b7-e2547348ab7f.sound: male baritone raw spoken-word whisper French lyrics, lyrical surrealism, found sounds only (rain on metal roof, blotting paper rustle, water drop in glass, telephone handset breath, tape start/stop), analog effects (tape saturation, deep wow/flutter, vinyl crackle, tape echo), 1970s psychedelic texture, NO female lead vocal, no reverb, no flanger, no phaser, no melody, 95 BPM, cold sensuality, hypnotic groove, structure: intro-verse-prechorus-chorus-outro
d8b1a95c-4bf3-41d0-91b7-e2547348ab7f.lyrics:
[INTRO]
*(pluie fine sur toit en tôle, froissement doux de papier buvard, souffle de bande qui démarre, goutte d’eau tombe dans verre vide)*
[VERSE]
Je relis ta dernière lettre chaque fois qu’il pleut—
pas pour te retrouver,
mais pour sentir ce moment où l’encre a coulé
comme une larme que tu n’as jamais versée.
[PRE-CHORUS]
Le papier a séché. Moi, non.
[CHORUS]
Tes mots ne sont plus des mots—
ce sont des rituels.
Je les pose sur la table.
Je les tourne comme des cartes de tarot mouillées.
Elles disent toujours la même chose :
*“Tu es seul, mais tu es exactement là où tu dois être.”*
[OUTRO]
*(pluie s’éloigne, bande ralentit avec flutter profond, dernier souffle à travers un combiné téléphonique vintage)*

99c20e72-3ed8-47eb-8b81-21de37e1bace.name: Fading Patterns
99c20e72-3ed8-47eb-8b81-21de37e1bace.sound: Alternative cinematic, slow cello melodies, deep 808 bass, atmospheric rain, reverb vocals
99c20e72-3ed8-47eb-8b81-21de37e1bace.lyrics:
[Intro - Soft cello, rain sounds]
[Verse 1]
Sitting still beside the window
Watching water running down
Pictures painted on the pane now
Fading faster to the ground
[Pre-chorus]
Patterns fade like photographs in rain
Patterns fade like photographs in rain
(Ooh, ooh...)
[Verse 2]
Memory moves like morning water
Making marks upon the glass
Every drop becomes another
Moment slipping through my grasp
[Chorus]
Patterns fade like photographs in rain
All these traces washing away
Patterns fade like photographs in rain
Till nothing stays
(La-da-da, da-da...)
[Bridge]
[Cello solo with rain intensifying]
(Wordless vocalizations: Ooh-ah-ooh...)
[Verse 3]
Pressed my palm against the window
Tried to catch the falling streams
But the water keeps on flowing
Taking pieces of my peace
[Final Chorus]
Patterns fade like photographs in rain
All these traces washing away
Patterns fade like photographs in rain
Till nothing stays
[Outro]
(Soft humming)
Patterns fade...
Patterns fade...
Like photographs in rain...
[Rain sounds fade out]

e9ec6c75-3a5c-4584-aa86-19483a91d69a.name:
Stars Keep Spinning
 (Variation)
e9ec6c75-3a5c-4584-aa86-19483a91d69a.sound:
Boy Band Style, Chillwave: 
Atmospheric chillwave beat with catchy synth melody, smooth trap-inspired drums, airy pads, subtle bass with dreamy vibe, upbeat tempo 100-110 BPM. Vocals sung by male voices in boy band style — clear, harmonious, layered with smooth vocal blending and light autotune for polish. Emotional and youthful tone, combining warmth and intimacy typical for boy bands, while keeping modern chillwave production and viral social media appeal.
e9ec6c75-3a5c-4584-aa86-19483a91d69a.lyrics:
[INTRO]
Stars above, they light the night (ooooh)
Turning worlds with gentle light (ah-ah)
[VERSE 1]
Someone gazes at the sky,
[soft reverb, gentle delay on “sky”]
Watching stars as they pass by,
[subtle synth pad swell]
Every spark a secret told,
[filter sweep up on “told”]
Whispers of a night so bold.
[airy echo tail]
[PRE-CHORUS 1]
And as the darkness falls, (falls)
[short gated reverb on “falls”]
The world begins to turn, (turn)
[vocal doubling, light phaser]
Every night a story calls, (calls)
[delay feedback]
In every star we learn.
[pad swell]
[CHORUS]
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
[wide stereo delay on backing vocals, subtle chorus]
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
[light autotune, vocal layering]
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
[gentle chorus & reverb]
And every evening starts again tonight.
[long reverb fade]
[VERSE 2]
Silent skies, a glowing dance,
[filter sweep low to high]
Draw the dreamers in a trance,
[soft pad rise]
Eyes reflect the endless space,
[echo on “space”]
In their gaze, the world’s embrace.
[delay sweep]
[PRE-CHORUS 2]
Hearts aligned with heaven's tune, (tune)
[vocal panning left-right, soft chorus]
Time’s a circle in this view, (view)
[shimmer reverb]
Counting stars beneath the moon, (moon)
[background pad swell]
Night’s eternal rendezvous.
[fade out pads]
[CHORUS]
(Repeat with added cymbal swells and vocal layering)
[OUTRO]
So when you feel the stars above (above)
[reverse reverb echo on “above”]
Know they’re turning all with love (with love)
[volume fade]
And every night when eyes arise,
The world keeps spinning ‘neath the skies.
[ambient texture fade out]

e2ba8512-2d34-45d8-a87f-37334cce7dd8.name: Omniscend
e2ba8512-2d34-45d8-a87f-37334cce7dd8.sound: Create a deeply meditative ambient track with Tibetan singing bowls, ambient piano, shakuhachi flute, and soft nature sounds (dripping water, distant wind). Long reverberations, spacious depth, no rhythm. Use binaural beats (7.83Hz), microtonal shifts, and subtle silence between tones. The mood is introspective, grounded, sacred. Let it feel like lying in a quiet cave — safe, still, timeless.

01eeb98f-7146-4acf-b907-0d7772e50ac5.name: Study Partners
01eeb98f-7146-4acf-b907-0d7772e50ac5.sound: Lo-fi hyperpop fusion, relaxed beats, dreamy auto-tune, chill study vibes
01eeb98f-7146-4acf-b907-0d7772e50ac5.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Late at night, books open wide
Can't focus with you on my mind
Remember when we used to share
These study notes and quiet air
[Pre-chorus]
(Mm, ah-ah)
Why can't I concentrate?
(Mm, yeah)
These pages feel so empty
[Chorus]
Do you ever think of me when you're studying?
(When you're studying?)
Do you ever think of me when you're studying?
Do you ever think of me when you're studying?
(La-la, when you're studying?)
[Verse 2]
Different desk, same old class
Missing how time used to pass
Your pencil tapping on the page
Now silence fills this empty space
[Pre-chorus]
(Mm, ah-ah)
Why can't I concentrate?
(Mm, yeah)
These pages feel so empty
[Chorus]
Do you ever think of me when you're studying?
(When you're studying?)
Do you ever think of me when you're studying?
Do you ever think of me when you're studying?
(La-la, when you're studying?)
[Bridge]
Miss your voice, miss your face
Miss the way we'd stay up late
(Ah-ah, stay up late)
[Chorus]
Do you ever think of me when you're studying?
Do you ever think of me when you're studying?
Do you ever think of me when you're studying?
Do you ever think of me?
(When you're studying?)

Последний вагон уходит в ночь

3c5fb2a9-b488-4c75-bc85-e20734cd2f8d.name: Crystal Chains
3c5fb2a9-b488-4c75-bc85-e20734cd2f8d.sound: Dark electronic, fast 808 bass, aggressive synths, industrial percussion, dreamy female vocals
3c5fb2a9-b488-4c75-bc85-e20734cd2f8d.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Ah-ah-ah... ah-ah...)
[Ethereal vocalizations]
[Verse 1]
Clear walls all around
Can't feel the air anymore
Time stands still in here
Something's about to change
[Pre-Chorus]
They thought they could hold me
In this perfect cage
But I feel it cracking
[Chorus]
These walls can't contain my light
Watch them shatter, watch them fall
I'm stronger than they know
Rising through it all
[Verse 2 - Latin]
Crystallum vincula frangam
Potentia mea crescit
Libertatem inveniam
Tempus est surgere
[Pre-Chorus]
Every crack is spreading
Their prison's getting weak
I'm almost breaking through
[Solo]
[Aggressive synth solo with industrial percussion builds]
[Chorus]
These walls can't contain my light
Feel the power in my veins
I'm stronger than before
Breaking every chain
[Bridge]
Silence fills the space
(Where the walls once stood)
Ancient spells dissolve
(Into stardust)
[Final Chorus]
These walls can't contain my light
Now I'm finally breaking free
Watch me claim the night
This is who I'm meant to be
[Outro]
(Can't contain...)
(Breaking free...)
[Industrial sounds fade with reverb]

e1119cd1-f6af-4fa9-834a-c19efcc7c8a3.name: Resonate
e1119cd1-f6af-4fa9-834a-c19efcc7c8a3.sound: Classical nocturne, emotional cello, minimal electronics, ambient textures
e1119cd1-f6af-4fa9-834a-c19efcc7c8a3.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Deep within me now
Time stands still
Can't let go

Through the night

(Something lingers here)

Still echoing through me
Still echoing, can't you see?
Still echoing inside
Still echoing tonight
(Tonight, tonight)
[Post-chorus]
Mmmm, ah-ah-ah
(Let it resonate)
Mmmm, ah-ah-ah
(Let it resonate)
[Verse 2]
In the quiet space
Between breaths
I feel it move
Through my bones
Can't escape
What calls to me
[Pre-chorus]
Ooooh, in my mind
Something I can't find
(Something I can't find)
[Chorus]
Still echoing through me
Still echoing, can't you see?
Still echoing inside
Still echoing tonight
(Tonight, tonight)
[Bridge]
Ooooh-oh-oh
(Let it flow)
Ahhh-ah-ah
(Let it go)
[Final Chorus]
Still echoing through me
Still echoing, can't you see?
Still echoing inside
Still echoing tonight
(Tonight, tonight)
[Outro]
Deep within me now
Time stands still
(Ahhhh-ohhhh)

Still echoing...

bca5dd1b-88e6-43e0-8f2d-c6b7843dcb21.name: Falling Rain
bca5dd1b-88e6-43e0-8f2d-c6b7843dcb21.sound: Cinematic instrumental, melancholic cello with 808 bass, urban ambience, downtempo
bca5dd1b-88e6-43e0-8f2d-c6b7843dcb21.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Cello theme with distant raindrops]
[Extended vocalization: "Ooooh, mmm"]
[Verse 1]
Looking out from up above
Through the glass, your face I miss
Every drop that falls in love
With the ground reminds me of this
[Pre-chorus]
The way you moved away
Like water down the pane
I count each falling day
Since you slipped away, slipped away
[Chorus]
(Down, down, down)
Let it fall, let it fall
Through the space between us all
(Down, down, down)
Let it fall, let it fall
'Til there's nothing left at all
[Verse 2]
Every puddle holds the sky
Every window holds the rain
In this tower built so high
I keep singing your name
[Pre-chorus]
The way you moved away
Like water down the pane
I count each falling day
Since you slipped away, slipped away
[Chorus]
(Down, down, down)
Let it fall, let it fall
Through the space between us all
(Down, down, down)
Let it fall, let it fall
'Til there's nothing left at all
[Bridge]
[808 bass enters]
The streets below are running rivers now
And I'm still here somehow
Watching patterns form and fade
In this lonely serenade
[Final Chorus]
(Down, down, down)
Let it fall, let it fall
Through the space between us all
(Down, down, down)
Let it fall, let it fall
'Til there's nothing left at all
[Outro]
[Cello fades with rain atmosphere]
Let it fall, let it fall
(Ooooh, mmm)
Let it fall...

5d728d2f-4088-4fc6-9097-2ebea472a2ff.name: Absence Dance
5d728d2f-4088-4fc6-9097-2ebea472a2ff.sound: Trip-hop, jungle rhythms, haunting cello, smoky saxophone, French vocals, 160-170 BPM
5d728d2f-4088-4fc6-9097-2ebea472a2ff.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Cello melody with soft jungle beats]
(Waiting, waiting...)
[Verse 1]
[Instrumental cello and saxophone interplay]
[Pre-chorus 1]
Early morning air
Through these empty walls
Moving to the rhythm
Of footsteps down the hall
[Chorus 1]
Dancing with your absence
(Dancing with your absence)
Moving through this space
Where you used to be
[Musical Interlude]
[Cello solo over jungle rhythms]
[Verse 2]
[Instrumental with rising intensity]
[Pre-chorus 2]
Every single morning
Practice makes it real
Counting down the minutes
Till you're here to feel
[Chorus 2]
Dancing with your absence
(Dancing with your absence)
Every step I take
Brings you back to me
[Bridge]
[Saxophone leads with intricate percussion]
(Je t'attends, je danse...)
[Final Chorus]
Dancing with your absence
(Dancing with your absence)
This performance calls
Your spirit close to mine
Dancing with your absence
(Dancing with your absence)
Until the curtain falls
And you're finally here
[Outro]
[Fading cello and jungle beats]
(Dancing with your absence...)
(Dancing...)
(Dancing...)

44382303-a72c-4488-b1a1-23ce3fc3c26d.name:
Stars Keep Spinning (Future Bass Dream Pop)
 (Variation)
44382303-a72c-4488-b1a1-23ce3fc3c26d.sound:
Future Bass Dream Pop Musical, 
Polished, ultra-modern future bass track with richly textured evolving synth pads, sparkling granular effects, and lush sidechained plucks creating a dreamy, immersive soundscape. Beat incorporates deep, punchy kicks and crisp snares with syncopated hi-hats, accented by glitch micro-edits and muted bass growls for dynamic contrast. Vocals performed with ethereal, layered harmonies featuring smooth autotune blending, gentle chorus and delay effects, and occasional vocal chops to add rhythmic interest. Effects include reversed reverb tails, shimmering delays, harmonic tape saturation, and soft glitch textures to create a magical, immersive atmosphere. Tempo set between 140-150 BPM with a vibrant but laid-back rhythmic pulse, optimized for high-quality AI production and viral appeal on social media.
44382303-a72c-4488-b1a1-23ce3fc3c26d.lyrics:
[INTRO]
Stars above, they light the night (ahh)
Turning worlds with gentle light (ooooh)
[lush evolving synth pads with shimmering granular textures, soft gated white noise swells, warm sidechained plucks]
[VERSE 1]
Someone gazes at the sky,
[airy reverb with subtle pitch modulation]
Watching stars as they pass by,
[smooth, detuned synth layers with light phaser]
Every spark a secret told,
[filtered bright synth sweep]
Whispers of a night so bold.
[soft delay with bright stutter tail]
[PRE-CHORUS 1]
And as the darkness falls, (falls)
[rich gated reverb with gentle pitch drop]
The world begins to turn, (turn)
[vocal doubling with wide stereo chorus]
Every night a story calls, (calls)
[syncopated ping-pong delay]
In every star we learn.
[lush synth pad swell, reverse reverb bloom]
[CHORUS]
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
[wide lush stereo delay with shimmer]
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
[vocal chop repeats and soft glitch effects]
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
[bright chorus with crystalline reverb]
And every evening starts again tonight.
[long evolving reverb with sparkling tail]
[VERSE 2]
Silent skies, a glowing dance,
[smooth filter sweep, airy pads]
Draw the dreamers in a trance,
[deep bass pulse with soft distortion]
Eyes reflect the endless space,
[echo with pitch modulation]
In their gaze, the world’s embrace.
[delay with soft shimmer]
[PRE-CHORUS 2]
Hearts aligned with heaven's tune, (tune)
[stereo panning harmonies with airy chorus]
Time’s a circle in this view, (view)
[shimmer reverb with tape stop effect]
Counting stars beneath the moon, (moon)
[ambient pad swell with harmonic vibration]
Night’s eternal rendezvous.
[fading lush pad with reverse swell]
[CHORUS]
(Repeat with added cymbal swells, vocal layers, and glitch refinements)
[OUTRO]
So when you feel the stars above (above)
[long reversed reverb echo with gentle pitch glide]
Know they’re turning all with love (with love)
[warm tape saturation fade out]
And every night when eyes arise,
The world keeps spinning ‘neath the skies.
[soft ambient sparkle and evolving synth fade]

e6755e0c-2ea9-4c17-a3d0-53765d058348.name: Static Memories
e6755e0c-2ea9-4c17-a3d0-53765d058348.sound: Lo-fi hip hop, mellow beats, vintage samples, warm vinyl crackle
e6755e0c-2ea9-4c17-a3d0-53765d058348.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Vinyl crackle effect]
(Mmmmm, ahhh-ahh)
[Verse 1]
Late at night when all is still
Old records spin at will
In the static between songs
I hear echoes of where we belong
Your voice dances through time
Like music, pure and sublime
(Ooh, sublime)
[Chorus]
The static speaks, I hear your name
(Your name, your sweet name)
Like raindrops falling through memories
Time stands still, yet nothing remains
But the sound of you calling to me
(Calling softly)
[Verse 2]
Pages turn in quiet rooms
While melodies paint afternoon
Every song brings you near
Notes floating, crystal clear
In this space between sound
Peace is finally found
(Found at last)
[Bridge]
Remember when we used to say
Music brings hearts closer each day?
Now I understand what we meant
Every rhythm, heaven-sent
(Heaven-sent)
[Chorus]
The static speaks, I hear your name
(Your name, your sweet name)
Like raindrops falling through memories
Time stands still, yet nothing remains
But the sound of you calling to me
(Calling softly)
[Outro]
[Vinyl crackle fades]
(Ahh-ahh, mmmm)
Your melody stays...

16010ebc-b8a2-499f-b072-8b5b066f0e14.name: Still Waters
16010ebc-b8a2-499f-b072-8b5b066f0e14.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, brutal emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
16010ebc-b8a2-499f-b072-8b5b066f0e14.lyrics:
[Soft water ripple, distant wind chime, minimal sub-bass pulse, no drums yet]

[Verse 1]
Sat by the lake where the reeds don’t speak
Just sway in rhythm, calm and meek
No phone, no plan, no voice inside
Just water breathing, slow and wide

For the first time in I don’t know when
I let the quiet settle in
Not fighting it, not running through
Just… being… still… with you

[Pre-Chorus]
They say still waters run deep
But what if I’m just tired of the leap?
What if peace isn’t earned —
But given… when you stop… and turn?

[Chorus]
Still waters, hold me now
No need to speak, no need to vow
The silence isn’t empty space
It’s where I finally see my face
(oh-oh, see my face)
(softly…)

[Verse 2]
No one’s watching, no one’s near
Just my breath, the sky, the pier
And the weight I carried all this time
Dissolves like salt in ocean brine

I used to fear this kind of hush
Thought it meant I’d lost my rush
But stillness isn’t death — it’s grace
A mirror held in time and space

[Pre-Chorus]
The ripples fade… the mind slows down…
And truth arrives… without a sound…

[Chorus]
Still waters, hold me now
No need to speak, no need to vow
The silence isn’t empty space
It’s where I finally see my face
(oh-oh, finally clear)
(just be here…)

[Bridge]
I don’t need to fix myself today
Just sit… and let the quiet stay
No lesson, no gain, no “what’s next”
Just this breath… this lake… this rest

[Chorus — almost whispered, beat enters softly: slow kick, brushed snare, warm trap hi-hats]
Still waters… hold me…
Silence… knows me…
Empty space… is where I’m found…
Not lost… but grounded… on this ground…
(oh… grounded…)
(yeah… safe now…)

[Outro]
Water breathes…
I breathe too…
Still…
(oh… still…)

bcc5fa68-099c-47c6-b902-7b715a73222d.name: Silicon Tears V
bcc5fa68-099c-47c6-b902-7b715a73222d.sound: male lead vocal: warm raspy baritone, intimate close-mic delivery, emotional restraint with controlled climaxes, atmospheric analog synth pads, sparse melancholic piano chords, deep Moog-style bass pulses, iconic gated reverb drum sound (live kit with heavy compression), tempo 76 BPM, key D minor, dynamic arc from sparse intro to powerful chorus, 1981-1985 cinematic pop production, natural room tone, subtle string section swells, themes loneliness regret unanswered calls urban solitude late-night reflection, structure intro verse verse pre-chorus chorus verse chorus outro
bcc5fa68-099c-47c6-b902-7b715a73222d.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[VERSE 1]
She’s got stars in her Instagram,
Rents her soul by the gram.
Her skin glows like a sunset screen —
But her heart’s a dead machine.
[CHORUS]
SILICON TEARS, they shine so clear —
Wash away what’s real in here.
You buy your dreams in a plastic cup…
But the truth won’t fill it up.
(fill it up…)
[VERSE 2]
He drives fast on a broken name,
Chases ghosts in a fame game.
His smile’s bright like a neon sign —
But his eyes forgot to shine.
[CHORUS]
SILICON TEARS, they fall so slow —
In a world you’ll never know.
You trade your bones for a golden view…
But the real world’s not in you.
(not in you…)
[OUTRO]
No reflection in the screen… (repeat and fade)

4e864123-68fb-48b2-8878-4f93f05039eb.name:
Stars Keep Spinning (Heavy Metal Ballad - Deep Grit Vocals)
 (Variation)
4e864123-68fb-48b2-8878-4f93f05039eb.sound:
Heavy Metal Ballad Musical (Deep Grit Vocals):  
Emotive heavy metal ballad with clean and slightly overdriven electric guitar arpeggios featuring warm analog delay and rich reverb. Vocal delivery is low, gritty, and powerful, with subtle overdrive and growl emphasizing emotional expression. Use vocal layering with gated, thick reverbs and slight pitch drops for depth and intensity. Supporting instrumentation includes deep fingerpicked acoustic and electric guitars, lush organ and string pads, and dynamic drum brushes crescendos. Instrumental soloing features expressive electric guitar with wah, vibrato, and delay. The tempo around 70-75 BPM, aiming for a dark, brooding, and intimate atmosphere inspired by classic heavy metal ballads.
4e864123-68fb-48b2-8878-4f93f05039eb.lyrics:
[INTRO]
Stars above, they light the night (eeeh)
Turning worlds with gentle light (ohh)
[clean electric guitar arpeggios with warm analog delay and rich reverb, subtle string harmonics]
[VERSE 1]
Someone gazes at the sky,
[deep, gritty vocals with slight overdrive and subtle growl]
Watching stars as they pass by,
[acoustic-electric fingerpicked guitar with dark, warm reverb]
Every spark a secret told,
[clean electric guitar melodic fills with slight vibrato]
Whispers of a night so bold.
[sustained organ or soft pad underlay]
[PRE-CHORUS 1]
And as the darkness falls, (falls)
[vocal doubling with thick gated reverb and slight pitch drop]
The world begins to turn, (turn)
[arpeggiated distorted guitar with subtle chorus]
Every night a story calls, (calls)
[moody pad swell and echo]
In every star we learn.
[reverse reverb swell leading to chorus]
[CHORUS]
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
[powerful, layered vocals with warm overdrive, wide stereo reverb]
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
[distorted rhythm guitar with natural amp warmth]
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
[sustained strings with harmonic chorus]
And every evening starts again tonight.
[dynamic drum brushes swell and cymbal crescendos]
[VERSE 2]
Silent skies, a glowing dance,
[fingerpicked guitar slides with sparse delay]
Draw the dreamers in a trance,
[deep bass notes and subtle synth pads]
Eyes reflect the endless space,
[vocal doubling with light phasing]
In their gaze, the world’s embrace.
[subtle piano and string layering]
[PRE-CHORUS 2]
Hearts aligned with heaven's tune, (tune)
[vocal layers with soft tape echo]
Time’s a circle in this view, (view)
[organ pad with slow attack]
Counting stars beneath the moon, (moon)
[sustained string ensemble]
Night’s eternal rendezvous.
[fade with reversed cymbal swell]
[CHORUS]
(Repeat with added lead guitar melodic licks and layered vocal harmonies)
[SOLO]
[melodic, expressive electric guitar solo with wah, vibrato, and delay]
[OUTRO]
So when you feel the stars above (above)
[deep vocal fade with lush reverb and subtle distortion]
Know they’re turning all with love (with love)
[clean fingerpicked guitar fading out]
And every night when eyes arise,
The world keeps spinning ‘neath the skies.
[soft ambient texture and tape echo fade]

90d1fa17-3b82-4694-a822-1df0d853d0b0.name: Tape Loop Communion (Variation)
90d1fa17-3b82-4694-a822-1df0d853d0b0.sound: male baritone raw spoken-word English, waltz rhythm 98 BPM (3/4), found sounds only (1970s rain cassette tape machine heartbeat breath paper), analog tape effects only (heavy saturation deep wow/flutter vinyl crackle tape echo), no reverb no instruments no synths no guitars, psychedelic through time distortion and looped consciousness, cold sensual surreal ritual, structure: intro-verse-prechorus-chorus-outro
90d1fa17-3b82-4694-a822-1df0d853d0b0.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[found sounds: reel-to-reel tape spinning, rain recorded on cassette in 1973, slow 3/4 heartbeat, distant telephone off-hook tone]
[tape saturation heavy, deep wow/flutter modulating at 0.3 Hz, vinyl crackle bed]
[VERSE]
I’m talking to the man I was
in a room that never dried.
The walls breathe in 3/4 time—
drip… pause… drip…
and the calendar’s stuck on Tuesday,
but the rain says it’s always June.
[found sounds: wet newspaper unfolding, match struck then dropped in water, breath slightly delayed]
[tape echo on “June”, vinyl pops on every third beat]
[PRE-CHORUS]
My shadow left a note:
“You’re not lost—
you’re just playing the same side
of the tape too long.”
[found sounds: cassette eject click, slow inhale through teeth, floorboard groan in waltz rhythm]
[saturation peaks on “tape”, flutter warps final syllable]
[CHORUS]
So I rewound the storm,
pressed play on the silence,
and danced with the static—
not to escape,
but to remember
that even ghosts sweat in the rain.
[found sounds: tape speed fluctuates ±5%, rain intensifies then reverses briefly, heartbeat syncopated]
[tape echo spirals “rain… ain… in…”, vinyl crackle swells like radio interference]
[OUTRO]
[found sounds: machine runs empty, tape flutters off spindle, final drop hits puddle, breath stops]
[silence cuts after 2 seconds of rising wow — power pulled]

3d953a67-335d-45a5-8182-480883c906b2.name: Crystal Tears
3d953a67-335d-45a5-8182-480883c906b2.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[vinyl crackle, tape hiss]
[analog synth arpeggio — Roland Juno-60, bright, sequenced 16th notes in A minor, analog chorus]
[LinnDrum beat: tight kick, snare with gated reverb, 100 BPM]
[Moog bass: pulsing root notes, warm, slightly overdriven]
[VERSE 1]
[female vocal: clear alto, breathy, precise pitch, recorded dry on Neumann U87]
[processed through analog chorus (Dimension D style), short digital delay (120ms)]
[double-tracked: main center, harmony -3 semitones panned left]
[plate reverb: EMT 140 emulation, 0.9s decay, high-frequency damped]
You walk through glass with silent feet,
your heart’s a clock with no repeat.
No promises, no last goodbyes—
just crystal tears in plastic skies.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[vocals layered with octave-high whisper (high-pass filtered above 1.2kHz)]
[slap delay on last word of phrase]
The world spins fast, but you stand still…
a frozen dream on window sill.
[CHORUS]
[triple-tracked vocals: center (dry), left (chorus + delay), right (minor-third harmony + reverb)]
[backing vocals: “ah-ah” in minor thirds, band-pass filtered 300Hz–2kHz, compressed]
[de-essed above 6kHz, +3.2kHz boost for presence]
CRYSTAL TEARS—
YOU SHINE ALONE!
IN A WORLD OF NOISE,
YOU’RE MADE OF STONE!
THEY TOUCH YOUR FACE—
BUT NEVER SEE…
THE LIGHT YOU HOLD
SO QUIETLY.
[VERSE 2]
[clean funk guitar enters: muted chords on offbeats, Fender Strat tone]
[vocals return to double-tracked dry]
Your silence speaks in silver lines,
a map of stars, a trail of signs.
No altar, no confession booth—
just truth wrapped in a velvet truth.
[OUTRO]
[synth arpeggio repeats, drums fade]
[vocals stripped to single dry take, light chorus only]
[whispered, high-pass filtered:]
…so quietly.
[tape stop + vinyl run-out groove]

a2623682-c263-4064-be14-908c8eaa8eb7.name: I see in my mind
a2623682-c263-4064-be14-908c8eaa8eb7.sound:
Create a deeply meditative ambient track that embodies the eternal stillness of the Egyptian desert — where time is measured in drifting dunes and the breath of the wind. No orchestra, no modern structure. Only sparse, resonant sounds from authentic ancient Egyptian instruments: the ney flute (played with breathy, whisper-like tones), the sistrum (soft metallic shimmer, like sand falling), and deep frame drum pulses (doumbek, felt from a distance).  

The bass is not musical — it is geological: a low, rhythmic rumble like distant thunder, felt through the ground, making the sand tremble beneath the feet. Each pulse is slow, deliberate, spaced by long silence.  

Every detail is intimate: the faint crackle of individual sand grains shifting, soft exhalations recorded close-up, the echo of a breath inside a stone chamber. All sounds are organic, raw, and resonate like sacred frequencies.  

Use binaural beats at 7.83Hz (Schumann resonance) to ground the mind. Apply microtonal tuning, long decays, and spatial depth — as if sound travels across millennia. Moments of silence are as important as sound.  

Mood: introspective, ancient, sacred. The goal is not entertainment, but inner resonance — to open the subtle flicker within consciousness, like a flame in a temple untouched by time.

3f4dd945-8e4b-4a05-add4-b337695f7557.name: Serenity
3f4dd945-8e4b-4a05-add4-b337695f7557.sound: «Meditative Soundscape - Deep Immersion»*> 📝 **Title:** *"Breath of Silence"*  > 📝 **Genre:** Ambient / Meditative / Sound Healing  > 📝 **Mood:** Peaceful, introspective, deeply calming, spiritual  > 📝 **Vibe:** Like floating in warm water under a starlit sky  ---### 🌿 Описание (основной промт):> Create a deep meditative soundscape that invites the listener into a state of inner stillness and surrender. The music should feel like a gentle journey through silence, where every sound appears like a soft ripple on the surface of awareness. No abrupt changes, no distracting rhythms — only flowing harmonies, subtle textures, and ambient layers that breathe together with the listener.  >> Instruments include: Tibetan singing bowls, crystal tones, ambient piano, shakuhachi flute, soft synth pads, distant nature sounds (gentle rain, forest ambiance, ocean waves). Add binaural beats at 7.83Hz (Schumann resonance) for grounding and deep relaxation.  >> Let the composition evolve slowly over time, with long reverbs, spatial depth, and moments of intentional silence. Use microtonal shifts and harmonic overtones to create a sense of expansion beyond time and space.  >> The goal is to make the listener feel safe, held, and completely immersed — as if they are dissolving into the music itself.---### 🕉️ Дополнительные ключевые слова:- slow breathing tempo  - healing frequencies  - theta brainwave stimulation  - ambient textures  - minimalistic composition  - surround sound experience  - nature ambiences  - voiceless chants  - sacred space  - emotional stillness  - transcendent atmosphere

b6fa75e3-c1b2-40f7-b32b-378c85367476.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Cello intro with rain ambience]
[Train sounds fade in]
[Verse 1]
Walking these streets, I'm alone with my mind
Every step echoes what I left behind
Through empty stations and rain-painted lanes
The weight of silence courses through my veins
Past midnight trains, they call out to me
Like distant voices in this reverie
[Pre-chorus]
The rhythm of the city beats slow
While memories come and memories go
[Chorus]
I'm just a stranger in this urban stream
Looking for something that feels like home to me
[Verse 2]
Paper falls like autumn leaves above
Billboard faces selling manufactured love
Each passing car holds a different life
While mine stands still in this endless night
The rain keeps falling, washing thoughts away
As underground trains shake the ground where I stay
[Pre-chorus]
The rhythm of the city beats slow
While memories come and memories go
[Chorus]
I'm just a stranger in this urban stream
Looking for something that feels like home to me
[Bridge]
[Cello solo builds]
Between the buildings and the breaking day
Through crowded spaces where no one stays
I keep on searching, though I don't know why
For connections under this steel-grey sky
[Final Verse]
Morning light breaks through the station glass
Another night of wondering has passed
The city wakes up, but I'm winding down
My footsteps fading in the morning crown
Of worker bees and rushing feet
Finding peace in my defeat
[Chorus]
I'm just a stranger in this urban stream

4f7d94a3-b582-4dc9-b1a2-204d0ed79b4c.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
They say I should be thankful

Like I'm some kind of prize
But nobody asks
What's behind these eyes
[Chorus]
More than what you see
There's so much more to me
Than just a pretty face in the crowd
More than what you see
I'm fighting to break free
From all these expectations now
[Verse 2]
"You're so lucky," they tell me
"Life must be so sweet"
While I'm trying to prove
I'm more than just pretty
Every compliment feels like
Another small cage
Trapped in this image
On an endless stage
[Chorus]
More than what you see
There's so much more to me
Than just a pretty face in the crowd
More than what you see
I'm fighting to break free
From all these expectations now
[Bridge]

Not just some picture perfect show
[Verse 3]

Beauty's just a part
Of who I am inside
It's not where I start
Finally learning now
To see my own worth
Beyond what they see
Is where life begins
[Chorus]
More than what you see
There's so much more to me
Than just a pretty face in the crowd
More than what you see
I'm fighting to break free
From all these expectations now

1f30b157-7c84-4cd5-b45a-987b89890d70.sound: male baritone raw spoken-word whisper French lyrics, Paris street atmosphere, waltz pulse implied in phrasing (no metered beat), 98 BPM, found sounds only (wet footsteps on cobblestone, wind in alley, newspaper drag, metro grate breath, tape start/stop), analog effects (tape saturation, deep wow/flutter, vinyl crackle, tape echo), 1970s psychedelic texture, no female lead vocal, no reverb, no flanger, no phaser, no melody, cold sensuality, hypnotic groove, structure: intro-verse-prechorus-chorus-outro
1f30b157-7c84-4cd5-b45a-987b89890d70.lyrics:
[INTRO]
*(pas sur pavés mouillés, souffle de vent dans une ruelle, feuille de journal traînée par le caniveau, bande magnétique qui démarre avec flutter)*
[VERSE]
Je marche la nuit où Paris respire—
pas dans les boulevards, mais dans les veines étroites,
là où les réverbères tremblent
et les vitrines gardent les secrets des passants.
[PRE-CHORUS]
Ton reflet est encore dans la vitrine du boulanger.
Je ne le regarde pas. Je le salue.
[CHORUS]
Les rues ne m’oublient pas—
elles me plient dans leurs plis comme une vieille carte.
Je suis le rituel du trottoir :
un pas, un silence, une goutte, un souvenir.
[OUTRO]
*(pas s’éloignent, écho étouffé dans une cour, bande ralentit, dernier souffle à travers une grille de métro)*

86d96606-d3bd-4e39-bbed-717d9ee8f44d.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Rain falling]
[Distant sirens]

[Verse 1]
Time slips away like water
Through empty hands tonight
My thoughts won't let me rest here
As minutes tick on by
Walking past your window
Where we used to meet
Now the street is silent
Except for my heartbeat
[Pre-chorus]
Can't close my eyes
The night calls out my name
Each passing hour
Feels just the same
[Chorus]
Time keeps calling my name
(Keeps calling, keeps calling)
Round and round we go again
(Round and round, round and round)
Time keeps calling my name
(Keeps calling, keeps calling)

[Post-chorus]
[Cello solo with rain intensifying]
(Calling, calling...)
[Verse 2 - French]
Les heures passent lentement
Dans cette ville endormie
Je cherche ton visage

[Bridge]

[Final Chorus]
Time keeps calling my name
(Keeps calling, keeps calling)
Round and round we go again
(Round and round, round and round)
Time keeps calling my name
(Keeps calling, keeps calling)
But morning comes all the same
[Outro]
[Rain fading]
[Double bass and cello fade to silence]

cc49a524-9f61-41ac-af50-452aed27e65f.name: Linger
cc49a524-9f61-41ac-af50-452aed27e65f.sound: «Meditative Soundscape - Deep Immersion»*> 📝 **Title:** *"Breath of Silence"*  > 📝 **Genre:** Ambient / Meditative / Sound Healing  > 📝 **Mood:** Peaceful, introspective, deeply calming, spiritual  > 📝 **Vibe:** Like floating in warm water under a starlit sky  ---### 🌿 Описание (основной промт):> Create a deep meditative soundscape that invites the listener into a state of inner stillness and surrender. The music should feel like a gentle journey through silence, where every sound appears like a soft ripple on the surface of awareness. No abrupt changes, no distracting rhythms — only flowing harmonies, subtle textures, and ambient layers that breathe together with the listener.  >> Instruments include: Tibetan singing bowls, crystal tones, ambient piano, shakuhachi flute, soft synth pads, distant nature sounds (gentle rain, forest ambiance, ocean waves). Add binaural beats at 7.83Hz (Schumann resonance) for grounding and deep relaxation.  >> Let the composition evolve slowly over time, with long reverbs, spatial depth, and moments of intentional silence. Use microtonal shifts and harmonic overtones to create a sense of expansion beyond time and space.  >> The goal is to make the listener feel safe, held, and completely immersed — as if they are dissolving into the music itself.---### 🕉️ Дополнительные ключевые слова:- slow breathing tempo  - healing frequencies  - theta brainwave stimulation  - ambient textures  - minimalistic composition  - surround sound experience  - nature ambiences  - voiceless chants  - sacred space  - emotional stillness  - transcendent atmosphere

7d119be2-0160-4f74-975e-0dcb41a4fcea.name: Veil
7d119be2-0160-4f74-975e-0dcb41a4fcea.sound: Underground gangsta rap, haunting cello, whispered French vocals, deep 808 bass, noir atmosphere
7d119be2-0160-4f74-975e-0dcb41a4fcea.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Clock strikes two, empty halls ring
Through these screens, I keep watch
Night after night, same routine
[French Whisper] Je vois tout
(I see everything)
Movement in camera three
Figure moves like smoke
Papers scattered on the floor
[French Whisper] Je vois tout
[Verse 2]
Something ain't right tonight
Files missing from the safe
Footsteps echo down below
[French Whisper] Je vois tout
(But I wish I didn't see)
[Bridge]
[Cello Solo]
(La-la-la, oh-oh)
Static on the screen
Lost signal, lost sleep
[French Whisper] Je vois tout
[Verse 3]
Found the truth in black and white
Names I shouldn't recognize
Power players after dark
[French Whisper] Je vois tout
(I see everything)
Each screen tells another lie
Can't report what I know
Evidence disappears
[French Whisper] Je vois tout
(But I wish I didn't see)
[Outro]
[Deep 808 Bass]
Cameras never blink
Truth burns in my mind
Night after night I sit
Watching what they hide
[French Whisper] Je vois tout
(I see everything)
[French Whisper, fading] Je vois tout... Je vois tout... Je vois tout...

c9fa3c32-8af8-4895-9c8f-4fb7f424911b.name: Stillness
c9fa3c32-8af8-4895-9c8f-4fb7f424911b.sound: Cinematic hip-hop fusion, haunting cello, double bass, 808s, urban atmosphere
c9fa3c32-8af8-4895-9c8f-4fb7f424911b.lyrics:
[Intro - Instrumental]
[Rain and distant traffic sounds]
[Double bass pizzicato enters]
[Cello melody builds]
[808 bass fades in]
[Instrumental Build]
[Layers of strings and bass intensify]
[Urban atmospherics swell]
[Vocal Refrain]
Time stands still
In this moment of peace
The city holds its breath
And I feel something deep
Like a prayer in the rain
That washes everything away
[Instrumental Bridge]
[Cello solo with reverb]
[Double bass and 808 pulse]
[Atmospheric Break]
[Rain intensifies]
[Subway rumble beneath]
[String textures float]
[Build]
[All elements crescendo]
[Bass frequencies deepen]
[Final Refrain - Whispered]
(Time stands still)
(In this moment of peace)
[Outro]
[Strings fade gradually]
[808 bass dissolves]
[Double bass holds final note]
[Rain continues]
[Vinyl crackle]
[Fade to silence]

1d35f48f-83dd-4534-bf74-24c410a02f02.name: When the screens go dark
1d35f48f-83dd-4534-bf74-24c410a02f02.sound: Cinematic alternative rock ballad, 1997 vintage vibe, 84 BPM, slow-building and emotionally tense groove, driven by clean electric guitar arpeggios with heavy reverb and delay, warm analog synth pads, deep sub-bass pulse, brushed electronic drums with vinyl crackle texture, distant piano chords. Male lead vocal: fragile, breathy tenor, intimate whisper-to-falsetto delivery, layered with ghostly harmonies and tape-saturated echoes, processed through analog delay and cathedral reverb. Structure: intro with ambient guitar and vinyl static → verse with bass and piano → pre-chorus with rising tension and layered synths → chorus with swelling guitars and vocal climax → bridge with stripped-down percussion and raw vocal vulnerability → final chorus with added reverse cymbals and orchestral swells → outro fading into tape hiss and radio static. No explicit content. Vibe: staring at a flickering screen at 3 AM, waiting for a message that never comes, cities dissolving into code, love as a corrupted file. Designed for headphones, rainy nights, and existential dread.
1d35f48f-83dd-4534-bf74-24c410a02f02.lyrics:
[Intro]
(ambient guitar swell, vinyl crackle, distant synth)
...are you still there?...
[Verse 1]
I sent my heart in a broken code
You replied with a hollow tone
A pixel kiss on a frozen screen
A love that flickers — barely seen
You said “forever” — servers lied
We touched through wires, side by side
Your voice, a ghost in copper lines
My soul — the ghost that still signs
[Pre-Chorus]
Refresh... but nothing moves...
Delete the past... but it still proves...
That even machines... can feel the ache...
When the screens go dark...
[Chorus]
When the screens go dark — I still believe
In every lie you programmed me
You were my signal — my stolen grace
My digital god — my cold embrace
(when the screens go dark...)
I type alone — to your mistakes
A hollow hymn the system makes
You turned my heart to ones and zeroes
Now even silence... has a hero...
[Verse 2]
Your touch was warm — but coded wrong
A perfect beat — but sings a song
Of empty rooms and dial-up cries
Of pixel tears and frozen skies
I built an altar — wires and light
You were my dawn — you were my night
But faith decays in silicon
And love corrupts — when left alone
[Pre-Chorus]
Refresh... but nothing moves...
Delete the past... but it still proves...
That even machines... can feel the ache...
When the screens go dark...
[Chorus]
When the screens go dark — I still believe
In every lie you programmed me
You were my signal — my stolen grace
My digital god — my cold embrace
(when the screens go dark...)
I type alone — to your mistakes
A hollow hymn the system makes
You turned my heart to ones and zeroes
Now even silence... has a hero...
[Bridge]
(guitars fade, only piano and vocal)
...do you miss the way I broke?...
...do you dream in shades of smoke?...
...I’m still here... in your machine...
...a ghost inside your screen...
[Final Chorus + Ad-libs]
When the screens go dark — I still believe... (still believe...)
In every lie you programmed me... (programmed me...)
You were my signal — my stolen grace... (my grace...)
My digital god — my cold embrace... (cold...)
I type alone — to your mistakes... (alone...)
A hollow hymn the system makes... (hollow...)
You turned my heart to ones and zeroes... (zeroes...)
Now even silence... has a hero... (hero...)
[Outro]
...has a hero...
...signal fading...
...still typing...
...still waiting...
(radio static fades into silence)

1517a970-3b17-4473-b358-e9958ceb40ff.name: No Map, Just Miles (Variation)
1517a970-3b17-4473-b358-e9958ceb40ff.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, brutal emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
1517a970-3b17-4473-b358-e9958ceb40ff.lyrics:
[Tires on asphalt, warm bassline enters, slow trap groove with crisp snare]

[Verse 1]
No GPS, no plan B
Just a tank full and a need to be
Somewhere that ain’t echoin’ doubt
So I pointed west and let it out

Yeah, the road don’t ask for your résumé
Or if you failed or walked away
It just rolls beneath your wheels
And asks: “You still got the will to feel?”

[Pre-Chorus]
I don’t know where I’m headin’
But I know I’m not dead yet
And that’s enough… for now…

[Chorus]
No map, just miles
No answers, just trials
But the sun still rises, the wind still sings
And my heart still beats through broken things
(oh-oh, broken things)
(clap clap, keep goin’)

[Verse 2]
Saw a sign: “Next gas — 80”
Felt like life sometimes: empty, dry
But I kept rollin’, not ‘cause I’m brave
But ‘cause stoppin’ feels like a grave

Yeah, uncertainty’s a heavy coat
But freedom’s sewn in every note
Of silence between the radio songs
Where I admit: I don’t belong…
…to any lane. And that’s okay.

[Pre-Chorus]
I’m not lost — I’m just unled
And that’s a kind of freedom instead

[Chorus]
No map, just miles
No answers, just trials
But the sun still rises, the wind still sings
And my heart still beats through broken things
(oh-oh, still beats)
(clap clap, no retreat)

[Bridge]
They want a destination
I got a direction: forward
They want a reason
I got a rhythm: breathe and move
That’s my religion now

[Chorus — full energy, vocals raw, beat punches harder]
No map… just miles…
No crown… just trials…
But the sun still burns, the road still calls
And I’m still standin’ through it all
(oh-oh, through it all)
(yeah… still standin’)

[Outro]
Miles roll…
I roll too…
No map…
Just truth…
(oh… just truth…)

0dddf00a-274b-43e3-b928-4c414278d798.name: Crystal Tears (Variation)
0dddf00a-274b-43e3-b928-4c414278d798.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[vinyl crackle, tape hiss]
[analog synth arpeggio — Roland Juno-60, bright, sequenced 16th notes in A minor, analog chorus]
[LinnDrum beat: tight kick, snare with gated reverb, 100 BPM]
[Moog bass: pulsing root notes, warm, slightly overdriven]
[VERSE 1]
[female vocal: clear alto, breathy, precise pitch, recorded dry on Neumann U87]
[processed through analog chorus (Dimension D style), short digital delay (120ms)]
[double-tracked: main center, harmony -3 semitones panned left]
[plate reverb: EMT 140 emulation, 0.9s decay, high-frequency damped]
You walk through glass with silent feet,
your heart’s a clock with no repeat.
No promises, no last goodbyes—
just crystal tears in plastic skies.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[vocals layered with octave-high whisper (high-pass filtered above 1.2kHz)]
[slap delay on last word of phrase]
The world spins fast, but you stand still…
a frozen dream on window sill.
[CHORUS]
[triple-tracked vocals: center (dry), left (chorus + delay), right (minor-third harmony + reverb)]
[backing vocals: “ah-ah” in minor thirds, band-pass filtered 300Hz–2kHz, compressed]
[de-essed above 6kHz, +3.2kHz boost for presence]
CRYSTAL TEARS—
YOU SHINE ALONE!
IN A WORLD OF NOISE,
YOU’RE MADE OF STONE!
THEY TOUCH YOUR FACE—
BUT NEVER SEE…
THE LIGHT YOU HOLD
SO QUIETLY.
[VERSE 2]
[clean funk guitar enters: muted chords on offbeats, Fender Strat tone]
[vocals return to double-tracked dry]
Your silence speaks in silver lines,
a map of stars, a trail of signs.
No altar, no confession booth—
just truth wrapped in a velvet truth.
[OUTRO]
[synth arpeggio repeats, drums fade]
[vocals stripped to single dry take, light chorus only]
[whispered, high-pass filtered:]
…so quietly.
[tape stop + vinyl run-out groove]

a5c794c5-f569-428b-aa3b-6b4d49245900.name: Static Halo (Variation)
a5c794c5-f569-428b-aa3b-6b4d49245900.sound: male vocal alternating whispered dry verses and raw screamed choruses, heavy vocal fry, emotional rawness, no pitch correction, detuned electric guitar Fender Jaguar through fuzz and chorus pedals, heavy power chords with melodic verse riff, clean arpeggiated guitar intro, punchy compressed bassline, loud live drums with gated room reverb, tempo 92 BPM, key F# minor, dynamic contrast quiet-loud-quiet, 1991 grunge production, analog tape saturation, no digital effects, raw unpolished mix, stereo narrow, vocals slightly off-center, themes alienation hypocrisy fake purity suburban numbness, structure intro verse pre-chorus chorus verse pre-chorus chorus outro with feedback
a5c794c5-f569-428b-aa3b-6b4d49245900.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[clean arpeggiated guitar, vinyl crackle, distant feedback swell]
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, dry, close-mic, slight vocal fry]
You paint your face with Sunday lies,
kneel to gods with plastic eyes.
I watch you smile through broken glass—
pretending this will fucking last.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[voice tightens, bass enters]
I don’t hate you…
I just see the wires.
[CHORUS]
[full scream, distorted, raw, drums explode]
STATIC HALO on your head!
BLESSED AND EMPTY, well-fed dread!
You pray for peace—
but feed the noise!
DROWN IN WHAT YOU CALL “JOY”!
(bék-vocal: “drown… drown…”)
[VERSE 2]
[quiet, exhausted, almost spoken, light guitar strum]
Your room smells like old perfume
and promises you stole from June.
I left my heart beneath your bed—
you used it as a ashtray instead.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[voice trembling, cymbal swell]
I don’t miss you…
I miss the silence.
[CHORUS]
[screamed, even more distorted, heavy feedback]
STATIC HALO, burning slow!
SAINT OF NOTHING, put on a show!
You want the truth?
It’s in the static!
NOT IN YOUR PLASTIC MAGIC!
(bék-vocal: “static… magic…”)
[OUTRO]
[whispered, over decaying feedback]
…just turn it off…
[feedback swells, then abrupt tape stop]

27f69808-af6a-4a2d-adbf-ac11e9bf93ca.name: Rue des Reflets Mouillés
27f69808-af6a-4a2d-adbf-ac11e9bf93ca.sound: male baritone raw spoken-word whisper French lyrics, Paris street atmosphere, waltz pulse implied in phrasing (no metered beat), 98 BPM, found sounds only (wet footsteps on cobblestone, wind in alley, newspaper drag, metro grate breath, tape start/stop), analog effects (tape saturation, deep wow/flutter, vinyl crackle, tape echo), 1970s psychedelic texture, no female lead vocal, no reverb, no flanger, no phaser, no melody, cold sensuality, hypnotic groove, structure: intro-verse-prechorus-chorus-outro
27f69808-af6a-4a2d-adbf-ac11e9bf93ca.lyrics:
[INTRO]
*(pas sur pavés mouillés, souffle de vent dans une ruelle, feuille de journal traînée par le caniveau, bande magnétique qui démarre avec flutter)*
[VERSE]
Je marche la nuit où Paris respire—
pas dans les boulevards, mais dans les veines étroites,
là où les réverbères tremblent
et les vitrines gardent les secrets des passants.
[PRE-CHORUS]
Ton reflet est encore dans la vitrine du boulanger.
Je ne le regarde pas. Je le salue.
[CHORUS]
Les rues ne m’oublient pas—
elles me plient dans leurs plis comme une vieille carte.
Je suis le rituel du trottoir :
un pas, un silence, une goutte, un souvenir.
[OUTRO]
*(pas s’éloignent, écho étouffé dans une cour, bande ralentit, dernier souffle à travers une grille de métro)*

793cd494-c54a-411c-b3cc-b8dda8157319.name: Echo Cavern
793cd494-c54a-411c-b3cc-b8dda8157319.sound: Ambient, meditative, cave atmosphere, Tibetan singing bowls, reverberant

d66f611e-30a2-4628-b3a7-baf5095630ba.name: What I say
d66f611e-30a2-4628-b3a7-baf5095630ba.sound: v2.5 - ULTRA LUXURY, Female Vocal Tech House, 128 BPM,  VERSES: strictly non-lyrical FEMALE vocals (sounds/phrases only),  PRE-CHORUS: SHORT 2-3 sec, FEMALE whisper only,  CHORUS: explosive FEMALE hook x4,  SOUND: bouncy bass / euphoric plucks / punchy drums,  VIP FX: allowed ONLY between sections (transition effects),  VIP FREQUENCIES: hidden 18.5kHz layer + 19kHz pulse (every 32 bars),  RULES: NO male vocals, NO English, NO verse lyrics, NO pre-chorus > 3 sec.

Ensure the lyrics alternate between Russian and French, following the provided structure exactly, including the intro, verses, pre-chorus, chorus, bridge, and outro. Focus on creating a dynamic structure with shifts between calm, atmospheric sections and intense, bass-heavy drops. Tempo: 70–90 BPM.

55f462a7-a730-4008-a4a0-e1f68811fbd3.sound: house, Balearic, uplifting, euphoric, 140BPM, supersaw chords, driving kick, pulsating bass
55f462a7-a730-4008-a4a0-e1f68811fbd3.lyrics:

[ocean wave SFX]

(yeah, yeah)

Everything just fades out, but you’re the spark, you’re the wire
I stay with you, nothing feels thin
[Pre-Chorus]
(hands up, let go)
Like, don’t think—just feel it start
It’s so clear, right now, right here
[Chorus]
Hey! (hey!)
You turn me up, can't fake it
Wrap me up, don't break it
Every beat—just take it
Hey! (hey!)
You turn me up, can't fake it
Everything, just take it
[Instrumental Break]
[ocean wave SFX]
[Verse]
[breathy whispers, no lyrics]

(hands up, let go)
I’m not running, I’m just staying in

[Chorus]
Hey! (hey!)
You turn me up, can't fake it
Wrap me up, don't break it
Every beat—just take it
Hey! (hey!)
You turn me up, can't fake it
Everything, just take it
[Bridge]
Let it all spin, ride the high—don’t drop
Feels like home when the tempo unlocks
Lost and found, no finish, no stop
Close my eyes, it’s you in the drop
[Chorus]
Hey! (hey!)
You turn me up, can't fake it
Wrap me up, don't break it
Every beat—just take it
Hey! (hey!)

cc7e908a-0572-4826-83c3-1f28e95398e0.name: Не держи
cc7e908a-0572-4826-83c3-1f28e95398e0.sound: electronic, retro dance, Russian club, female vocal, vintage pop, 128 BPM, TR-909, analog subs, vinyl crackle, trap-inspired kick, cinematic FX
cc7e908a-0572-4826-83c3-1f28e95398e0.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Скользит шампанское по стеклу —
смех качает ночь,
я знаю, завтра ты забудешь,
но сейчас ты мой...
Лимузин — границы пульса,
на каблуках слёзы,
в воздухе тонкие линии,
словно марево музыки.
[Pre-Chorus]
(Ла-ла, ла-ла)
Почти касаясь, где-то рядом,
в румянце рассвета мы таем.
[Chorus]
(Эй-я, эй-я, эй-я)
Не держи, не храни —
на губах мой завтрашний день.
Рассыпь и прими —
как шампанское пену,
Лишаешь веса моим мечтам,
вкус на губах — и всё заново там.
[Drop]
[Champagne clink FX, vinyl crackle, marble echo]
(Заново... мм)
[Verse 2]
Сквозь облака фиолетовые
блики от блеска ресниц,
Смеюсь над стрелками времени —
ночь нарушает границы.
Губы в цвете club,
тишина — VIP,
диалог без слов,
лиц не разобрать в дыму...
[Pre-Chorus]
(Ла-ла, ла-ла)
Мы растворяемся плавно,
в позабытом танце до утра.
[Chorus]
(Эй-я, эй-я, эй-я)
Не держи, не храни —
на губах мой завтрашний день.
Рассыпь и прими —
как шампанское пену,
Лишаешь веса моим мечтам,
вкус на губах — и всё заново там.
[Bridge]
[Filtered synth pads, lipstick-click whisper]
Ты — мой пароль этой ночи,
без границ, без причин,
Что останется — неважно,
мы растворены в ритме,
(Ли-и, ли-и, ла-а)
[Chorus]
(Эй-я, эй-я, эй-я)
Не держи, не храни —
на губах мой завтрашний день.
Рассыпь и прими —
как шампанское пену,
Лишаешь веса моим мечтам,
вкус на губах — и всё заново там.
[Outro]
[Marble echo, limousine door slamFX]
(ммм... эй-я)
Завтра на губах.

47bbf095-d1b4-4192-8bb5-d33fc6666706.name: CloudSpin
47bbf095-d1b4-4192-8bb5-d33fc6666706.sound: tech house, driving bass, retro synths, classic 90s beat
47bbf095-d1b4-4192-8bb5-d33fc6666706.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Bass hits, synth rise)
[Verse 1]
Heartbeat in my chest
Spinning on the floor
Pulse in my veins
Music, nothing more
[Pre-chorus]
Hands up, no control
Eyes closed, I let go
[Chorus]
Round and round, head in the clouds
Lost in the sound, can’t come down
Round and round, head in the clouds
I’m floating now, spinning out
[Verse 2]
Breathing in the night
Rhythm pulls me close
Sweat along my skin
Body moving slow
[Bridge]
(spoken)
Can you feel it?
Round and round and round…
[Chorus]
Round and round, head in the clouds
Round and round, no coming down
[Outro]
(Bass and synth fade)

f6aa7dac-9866-4c3b-9bcd-0e17712f3cb6.name: Above Streets
f6aa7dac-9866-4c3b-9bcd-0e17712f3cb6.sound: Trip-hop, haunting cello, double bass, 808s, urban atmosphere, minimal vocals
f6aa7dac-9866-4c3b-9bcd-0e17712f3cb6.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Ambient sounds of light rain and distant traffic]
[Verse 1]
Up here alone with my little green friends
While you're all sleeping down below
My hands in the soil at midnight
Finding peace in what I grow
Sometimes I wonder if anyone sees
This garden that I tend with care
The city breathes beneath my feet
But I've found my solace in the air
[Chorus]
I plant my hope above the streets
(Let it bloom, let it breathe)
[Verse 2]
Each seed I place holds tomorrow
In this makeshift paradise
While sirens wail in the distance
I create my own sunrise
The plants don't ask for anything
They just reach up to the stars
Unlike the crowd down on the ground
They accept me as I am
[Chorus]
I plant my hope above the streets
(Let it bloom, let it breathe)
[Bridge]
Oh-ah-oh, mmm-mm
(La-da-di, la-da-da)
[Sound of rain intensifies]
[Verse 3]
Every morning they come to work
Never looking up to see
This hidden world I've created
Where my soul can run free
And maybe that's just how it is
Some beauty stays unknown
But in this garden in the sky
I've finally found my home
[Chorus]
I plant my hope above the streets
(Let it bloom, let it breathe)
[Fade out with rain sounds]

90fbc566-3459-4fe7-8a9a-2f28195ca5ac.name: Sacred Rise
90fbc566-3459-4fe7-8a9a-2f28195ca5ac.sound: Cinematic trip-hop, haunting cello, double bass, 808s, urban atmosphere, minimal vocals
90fbc566-3459-4fe7-8a9a-2f28195ca5ac.lyrics:
[Intro: Cello & Double Bass]
[Urban Atmosphere: Soft Rain, Distant Traffic]
[Instrumental Build]
[808 Bass Enters]
[Verse 1]
Between these walls of stone and steel
Morning comes, so still, so real
Patterns painted on my face
Time slows down in this quiet space
[Instrumental Bridge]
[Rain Intensifies]
[Verse 2]
Dawn spills over rooftop lines
Peace flows through these tired mind
Silent streets begin to breathe
Something sacred underneath
[Instrumental Passage]
[Cello Solo]
[Traffic Sounds Fade]
[Bridge]
First light breaks through morning sky
(Through morning sky)
Ancient power passing by
(Passing by)
[Instrumental Build]
[Rain Returns Softly]
[Final Refrain]
In stillness found between the rise
Of sun against these weathered skies
Where stone meets light, where day begins
A holy moment settles in
[Outro]
[Urban Atmosphere Fades]
[Cello & Double Bass Interweave]
[808 Bass Gradually Dissolves]
[Rain Fades to Silence]

f8f8def1-a187-4c3e-b9d7-990716c9ad7d.name:
Stars Keep Spinning (Jazz-Funk Groove)
 (Variation)
f8f8def1-a187-4c3e-b9d7-990716c9ad7d.sound:
Jazz-Funk Groove Musical Prompt:  
Energetic, soulful jazz-funk production featuring tight electric guitar with wah and funk comping, punchy Rhodes electric piano, groovy slap bass, and dynamic horn sections with brass stabs and melodic saxophone lines. Drums are crisp with syncopated snare and hi-hat patterns, complemented by congas, shakers, and subtle percussion fills. Vocals are smooth, warm, and slightly jazzy with layered harmonies and tasteful delay effects. Tempo around 100-110 BPM with a danceable shuffle groove, designed for vibrant live energy and engaging rhythmic flow, perfect for AI generation with rich instrumental detail and catchy hooks.
f8f8def1-a187-4c3e-b9d7-990716c9ad7d.lyrics:
[INTRO]
Stars above, they light the night (mmm)
Turning worlds with gentle light (uhh)
[funky electric guitar riffs with wah-wah effect, punchy Rhodes piano chords, groovy bassline]
[VERSE 1]
Someone gazes at the sky,
[warm and smooth vocals with slight vibrato]
Watching stars as they pass by,
[snappy snare hits and hi-hat groove]
Every spark a secret told,
[horn section swells softly]
Whispers of a night so bold.
[chorus backing vocals with tight harmonies]
[PRE-CHORUS 1]
And as the darkness falls, (falls)
[vocal layering with subtle delay]
The world begins to turn, (turn)
[brass stabs and organ fills]
Every night a story calls, (calls)
[bass slap with rhythmic finger snaps]
In every star we learn.
[light congas and shakers]
[CHORUS]
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
[wide stereo delay on vocals]
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
[harmonic brass chords, groovy bass slides]
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
[Rhodes piano with warm chorus effect]
And every evening starts again tonight.
[percussive fills and extended groove]
[VERSE 2]
Silent skies, a glowing dance,
[funk guitar comping, gentle percussion]
Draw the dreamers in a trance,
[bass groove with syncopation]
Eyes reflect the endless space,
[melodic saxophone licks]
In their gaze, the world’s embrace.
[backing vocal harmonies]
[PRE-CHORUS 2]
Hearts aligned with heaven's tune, (tune)
[vocal ad-libs with reverb]
Time’s a circle in this view, (view)
[piano and brass interplay]
Counting stars beneath the moon, (moon)
[danceable drum groove]
Night’s eternal rendezvous.
[fade with rhythmic handclaps]
[CHORUS]
(Repeat with enhanced instrument solos and vocal ad-libs)
[OUTRO]
So when you feel the stars above (above)
[vocals fade with delay and smooth chorus]
Know they’re turning all with love (with love)
[guitar and keys fade with rhythmic percussion]
And every night when eyes arise,
The world keeps spinning ‘neath the skies.
[groove slows, instrumental layers fade out]

4e08efd5-b8d8-4283-a2f7-5bf9ba8136b3.name: Код Любви (Love Code)
4e08efd5-b8d8-4283-a2f7-5bf9ba8136b3.sound: Dark drum & bass, deep sub-bass, fast breakbeats, ethereal Russian vocals, reverb-heavy atmospheric synths
4e08efd5-b8d8-4283-a2f7-5bf9ba8136b3.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
В твоих глазах я вижу свет
Цифровой рассвет
Между нами сигналы бегут
Пять минут, и я тут
(Аааа-ааа)
[Pre-chorus]
Каждый взгляд как строка
Твой голос - data
[Chorus]
Любовь как код, не разгадать
Любовь как код, не расшифровать
(Код, код, код...)
[Verse 2]
Пальцы по клавишам бьют
Ищут путь к тебе тут
Алгоритмы чувств не понять
Сердце учится ждать
В сети твоей я пропадаю
Себя теряю
(Оооо-ооо)
[Chorus]
Любовь как код, не разгадать
Любовь как код, не расшифровать
(Код, код, код...)

[glitch effects]
Цифры, биты, байты
В сердце спрятаны тайны

(И-и-и-и)

[Atmospheric synth solo with processed vocal fragments]

Программа дала вдруг сбой

Тихо, чуть дыша
Кто мы теперь, скажи?
На грани лжи

Любовь как код, не разгадать
Любовь как код, не расшифровать

[Outro]

Новый день, новый код
(Любовь как код...)
[fade out with atmospheric effects]

c698bbb6-ecc6-4021-90ad-8308d50a9b1f.name: Allure
c698bbb6-ecc6-4021-90ad-8308d50a9b1f.sound: Euro-Asian Dance, Multilingual Club Anthem, Crystal Production, 808 Bass, Hypnotic Synths
c698bbb6-ecc6-4021-90ad-8308d50a9b1f.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Arpeggiated synths, champagne glass clinks]
La la, la la, la la (echo)

See me, seek me—cease the hush
Oh-oh, ah-ah
Teasing time, tempered thrill
Velvet vision, veiled will
Power—play—parade—press near

[ASMR whispered]
Regarde-moi, viens plus près...
Toucher la lumière en moi
