b5466d4f-084a-4428-95cf-ab37435922f2.name: Отражение (Reflection)
b5466d4f-084a-4428-95cf-ab37435922f2.sound: Russian hip-hop, French noir, deep 808s, rain atmosphere, female vocals, reverb-heavy
b5466d4f-084a-4428-95cf-ab37435922f2.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Rain sounds, vinyl crackle]
В тишине старинного магазина
(В тишине...)
[Verse 1]
Поздний час, случайно захожу
На витрине что-то я ищу
Старый шкаф, и зеркало в пыли
Отражает то, что я внутри
[Pre-chorus]
Кто же ты, смотрящая в меня?
Твой вопрос как будто из огня
Я стою, не в силах отойти
Между нами тонкая грань пути
[Chorus]
Отражение, скажи мне правду
Кто я есть на самом деле?
Отражение, дай мне силу
Стать собой, во что я верю
(Стать собой...)
[Verse 2]
Каждый взгляд как новая страница
В этой книге я сама царица
Вижу то, что прячу от других
В отражении своих путей простых
[Bridge]
[Rain intensifies]
Время здесь застыло как вода
Я и ты - как будто два крыла
Я смотрю, ты смотришь на меня
Мы одно, но разные до дна
[Solo]
[Atmospheric synths, glitch effects]
[Final Chorus]
Отражение, скажи мне правду
Кто я есть на самом деле?
Отражение, дай мне силу
Стать собой, во что я верю
(Стать собой, во что я верю...)
[Outro]
[Rain fades]
В тишине старинного магазина
Я нашла ответ внутри себя

b524b2db-b338-4234-bd80-e0f5f4c3a1f0.name: Empty Room Symphony
b524b2db-b338-4234-bd80-e0f5f4c3a1f0.sound: Lo-fi ambient, retro doo-wop inspired, a capella vocal harmonies
b524b2db-b338-4234-bd80-e0f5f4c3a1f0.lyrics:
[Intro - Female Quartet]
(Ah-ooh, ah-ooh)
(Doo-wop, doo-wop)
[Sound: soft footsteps]
[Verse 1 - Female Lead]
Standing here at midnight
These walls know our song
I move across the floorboards
Where I still belong
(Sha-la-la)
Time stands still without you
[Chorus - Male Duet]
These four walls echo with your melody
Every step, your rhythm calls to me
Can't help but move to memories
Of when you danced with me
(Doo-wop, doo-wah)
[Verse 2 - Female Lead]
Radio's not playing
But I hear our tune
My heart keeps on swaying
In this empty room
(Sha-la-la)
Lost in our frequency
[Chorus - Male Duet]
These four walls echo with your melody
Every step, your rhythm calls to me
Can't help but move to memories
Of when you danced with me
(Doo-wop, doo-wah)
[Bridge - Full Ensemble]
Round and round I'm spinning
Like a record that won't end
(Won't end, won't end)
Your voice keeps on singing
Though I'm dancing alone again
(Alone again)
[Final Chorus - All]
These four walls echo with your melody
(Echo your sweet melody)
Every step, your rhythm calls to me
(Your rhythm sets me free)
Can't help but move to memories
Of when you danced with me
(When you danced, when you danced with me)
[Sound: fading footsteps]

9071ad79-7c4b-4fee-b855-879a0d1d01e0.name: Post Parade
9071ad79-7c4b-4fee-b855-879a0d1d01e0.sound: future bass, groovy beat, harmonious vibe, female vocals, aggresive riff, bass guitar solo
9071ad79-7c4b-4fee-b855-879a0d1d01e0.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Je passe mes journées sur mon écran
À chercher l'attention, encore et encore
Mes photos sont parfaites pourtant
Mais les likes arrivent trop lentement, je déplore
[Pre-chorus]
Je fais comme elles, je souris
Je pose comme elles, je publie
Mais les chiffres ne changent pas
Et mon cœur bat plus bas
[Chorus]
Post après post, je continue
Post après post, dans la rue
Post après post, sans arrêt
(Oh-oh) Mais quand est-ce que je vais briller?
[Post-chorus]
La-la-la, les notifications
(Où sont-elles?)
La-la-la, mon obsession
(Je les attends)
[Verse 2]
Mes idoles ont des millions de vues
Moi j'attends pour une centaine
Je danse, je chante, je m'évertue
Mais la différence reste la même
[Pre-chorus]
Les filtres parfaits appliqués
Les hashtags bien calculés
Mais les chiffres sont têtus
Et je reste inconnue
[Chorus]
Post après post, je continue
Post après post, dans la rue
Post après post, sans arrêt
(Oh-oh) Mais quand est-ce que je vais briller?
[Bridge]
Est-ce que ça vaut vraiment la peine?
De vivre pour les likes des autres
Mais je ne peux pas m'arrêter
C'est plus fort que moi
[Final Chorus]
Post après post, je continue
Post après post, dans la rue
Post après post, sans arrêt
(Oh-oh) Cette fois je vais briller!
[Outro]
(La-la-la, je posterai demain)
(La-la-la, et puis après-demain)
(La-la-la, jusqu'à la fin)
[Phone notification sound]

bdf70072-ba49-44af-99ba-945142d9ded1.name: Circles On Rewind
bdf70072-ba49-44af-99ba-945142d9ded1.sound: Trap-soul fusion, ethereal synths, ambient pads, dramatic bass, soulful female vocals
bdf70072-ba49-44af-99ba-945142d9ded1.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ay-ya-ya-ya (ooh-ah-ooh)
Time keeps movin', movin'
While I'm here just groovin', groovin'
[Sound: ethereal synth pad rise]
[Verse 1]
Stuck up in my feelings lately
Mind keeps spinnin' daily
Got me second-guessin' everything I do
Clock keeps tickin' forward
While I'm standin' still, I'm bored and
Can't decide which way I'm supposed to move
[Pre-chorus]
Round and round inside my brain
Same old thoughts, same old game
Why can't I just make a choice?
Listen to my inner voice
[Chorus]
Running circles in my mind
While the world ain't got the time
Keep on spinning, keep on going
While my thoughts keep overflowing
[Verse 2]
Everybody moving fast now
While I'm stuck here in the past now
Trying hard to figure out which way to go
Got these options in rotation
Endless hesitation
Watch the minutes slip away so slow
[Chorus]
Running circles in my mind
While the world ain't got the time
Keep on spinning, keep on going
While my thoughts keep overflowing
[Bridge]
Dee-dah-day-yah (round and round)
Soo-wah-say-yah (can't slow down)
[Sound: deep bass crescendo]
[Solo]
[Sound: ethereal synth arpeggios]
(Ay-ya-ya-ya, oh-whoa)
(Time ain't waiting, no)
[Final Chorus]
Running circles in my mind
While the world ain't got the time
Keep on spinning, keep on going
While my thoughts keep overflowing
[Outro]
(Time keeps movin', movin')
(While I'm here just groovin', groovin')
[Sound: deep bass fade out]

d8d76316-58d9-45b8-8077-97b0efcdb846.name: Someone Else Tonight
d8d76316-58d9-45b8-8077-97b0efcdb846.sound: Neo-noir jazz, trip-hop beats, French female vocals, smoky atmosphere, 90 BPM
d8d76316-58d9-45b8-8077-97b0efcdb846.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Soft piano, rain sounds]
Mmmmm... (ah-ooh-la)
[Verse 1]
Walking past the cafés
Les yeux baissés (Eyes down)
Just another face
Dans la foule pressée (In the rushing crowd)
She moves differently now
Something's changed, somehow
[Pre-chorus]
La nuit arrive (Night arrives)
Time to leave myself behind
Elle se prépare (She prepares)
Like a prayer in the dark
[Chorus]
Je deviens quelqu'un d'autre (I become someone else)
Sur la scène, je suis libre (On stage, I am free)
Je deviens quelqu'un d'autre
Ce soir, je vis (Tonight, I live)
(Ooh-la-la, ah-ooh-la)
[Verse 2]
Red lipstick traces
Mirror's honest face
Dans ses yeux je vois (In her eyes I see)
Une autre vérité (Another truth)
Stage lights warming up
Time to disappear
[Pre-chorus]
La transformation (The transformation)
Like water changing form
Elle respire fort (She breathes deep)
Ready for the show
[Chorus]
Je deviens quelqu'un d'autre
Sur la scène, je suis libre
Je deviens quelqu'un d'autre
Ce soir, je vis
(Ooh-la-la, ah-ooh-la)
[Rap Verse]
Watch her walk through the backstage door
Different person than before
Makeup, costume, someone new
Living what she never knew
Past the curtain, hear them call
Different name, standing tall
Every night she plays this part
Till the music starts to start
[Bridge]
[Spoken with saxophone]
Dans le silence avant la musique
(In the silence before the music)
Je la regarde devenir
(I watch her become)
Une autre âme
(Another soul)
[Final Chorus]
Je deviens quelqu'un d'autre
Sur la scène, je suis libre
Je deviens quelqu'un d'autre
Ce soir, je vis
(Ooh-la-la, ah-ooh-la)
[Outro]
[Saxophone solo fades]
(Soft humming)
Je deviens...
(Mmmmm...)

be6efbcf-1ef1-4f69-9485-561469944308.name: Éclat
be6efbcf-1ef1-4f69-9485-561469944308.sound: Create an intimate cinematic noir track with haunting female vocals in French, blending deep 808 basslines and ethereal synths. Use atmospheric pads and minimalistic piano melodies to evoke a sense of elegance and mystery. Add subtle rain sounds, distant neon light hums, and silk rustling to enhance the luxurious Parisian vibe. The lyrics should convey themes of love, secrets, and devotion, following the provided structure exactly (intro, verse, pre-chorus, chorus, bridge, outro). Ensure dynamic transitions between soft, emotional sections and intense bass-heavy drops to reflect the duality of intimacy and power. Tempo: 70–85 BPM
be6efbcf-1ef1-4f69-9485-561469944308.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Глубокие басы, звуки шёлка, лёгкий дождь]
"Pour toi... Je chante dans l’ombre."
[Verse 1]
Je marche seule sous la pluie,
Mais mes pensées sont pour toi, mon amour.
Chaque note que je chante est un secret,
Un cadeau pour ton âme, pour ton cœur.
[Pre-Chorus]
Dans cette nuit noire, je te vois,
Mon regard te guide à travers les ombres.
Paris respire avec nous,
Et ma voix t’appelle à l’aventure.
[Chorus]
Pour toi, je suis lumière et mystère,
Une étoile dans le noir de tes pensées.
Chaque mot est une promesse,
Un luxe que je crée rien que pour toi.
[Verse 2]
Les néons dansent sur ma peau,
Comme des rêves qui ne meurent jamais.
Je suis ton écho, ton reflet,
Dans ce monde de luxe, tu es mon roi.
[Bridge]
[Глубокие басы, звуки шёпота]
"Écoute-moi...
Ce n’est pas juste une chanson.
C’est mon cœur qui parle à toi."
[Outro]
[Звуки затихающих синтезаторов]
"Pour toi... toujours.

a667db85-f27e-418a-a5a3-74905942a8d1.name: Le Fantôme
a667db85-f27e-418a-a5a3-74905942a8d1.sound: Gangsta rap, haunting orchestral cello, French vocal samples, booming 808 bass, noir atmosphere
a667db85-f27e-418a-a5a3-74905942a8d1.lyrics:
[Intro - French Sample]
(Dans les rues sombres, je suis toujours là)
[Verse 1]
Watch how they move when I step in the room
They know my name but they never see me
Been in this game since before they knew
Power ain't always what appears to be
I stay in motion, but I make no sound
These streets know well what I represent
Some throw their weight, trying to claim their ground
While I orchestrate each and every event
(Comprends-tu?)
[Chorus]
They call me Le Fantôme, moving silent through these streets
(Le Fantôme)
Where others make noise, I make history complete
(Le Fantôme)
No need to raise my voice, they already know my name
(Le Fantôme)
Moving like a ghost, that's how I play this game
[Post-chorus]
(Je suis partout, je vois tout)
(Dans l'obscurité, je règne)
[Verse 2]
Every corner store owner knows my face
Every deal that's made, I take my cut
Don't need to threaten, don't need to chase
They understand when I show up
Years on these blocks taught me what counts
Respect earned through calculated moves
While they count stacks, I build amounts
Of influence that they can't lose
(C'est comme ça)
[Chorus]
They call me Le Fantôme, moving silent through these streets
(Le Fantôme)
Where others make noise, I make history complete
(Le Fantôme)
No need to raise my voice, they already know my name
(Le Fantôme)
Moving like a ghost, that's how I play this game
[Bridge]
[Cello Solo]
(Les années passent, mais je reste)
[Verse 3]
Watch them all follow without a word
My presence felt in every deal
Power speaks without being heard
That's how you know that it's real
Young ones learn quick when I pass by
Old heads nod, they understand
Don't need to boast or testify
Just my word across this land
(C'est fini)
[Chorus]
They call me Le Fantôme, moving silent through these streets
(Le Fantôme)
Where others make noise, I make history complete
(Le Fantôme)
No need to raise my voice, they already know my name
(Le Fantôme)
Moving like a ghost, that's how I play this game
[Outro]
(Je suis Le Fantôme, et je serai toujours là)

20ba762d-74fc-4ccd-b3ad-27875b6be4f3.name: Velvet Silence
20ba762d-74fc-4ccd-b3ad-27875b6be4f3.sound: Neo-Nocturne, luxury ambient, classical elegance, minimal, cinematic, 72 BPM, F# minor
20ba762d-74fc-4ccd-b3ad-27875b6be4f3.lyrics:
[Prelude: 0:00-3:00]
[Piano: F#m7, wool-muted hammers]
[Faint elevator shaft reverb]
In the hush before arrivals,
Velvet air and silent glass,
Time unwinds with slow precision—
Each breath a measure, pure and vast.
[At 2:47: (Double bass resonance, -24dB RMS, mono)]
(В Питере жить... WELL)
[Verse 1: 3:00-4:30]
[Rolex tick at 72 BPM]
Shadows of ermine, parquet floors,
A motion measured, every step,
Fragile past held in lacquered doors
And secrets lost the night they slept.
[Nocturne: 4:30-6:00]
[Piano motif: F# E D#, una corda pedal]
a glass in hand, the bubbles climb—
A toast to ages, veiled in white,
Within each silence, coded rhyme,
The city drifts toward distant light.
[Champagne SFX - time-stretched, mono, -24dB RMS]
(В Питере пить... WELL)
[Shalyapin ghost layering, 432Hz, -42dB]
[French Signature: 5:12]
(through Hermès scarf filter, 1960s coil:)
WELL... entre minuit
[Coda: 6:00-9:00]
[Piano damper noise, Morse code]
[API weather fade: daylight dims]
With dusk reflected on the river,
All circles close in gentle code,
The city’s heart—forever giver—
Locks its treasure, final ode.
[Morse: "WELL 1893" in damper noise]
(Питер не спит... WELL)
[Final chord syncs with Neva sunset]
[Rolex tick fades]
[Outro: Solo piano, F#m7, distant elevator pulse]
The air remains—signed, unseen,
Where secrets rest between the keys,
Within the WELL, at twelve fifteen,
Imperial silence, rare as these.

05503148-4e4b-4509-9407-ef4556c43633.lyrics:

8673768d-d05d-4e92-892e-e653b3ec281c.name: Digital Deity
8673768d-d05d-4e92-892e-e653b3ec281c.sound: Metal-dubstep fusion, aggressive guitars, heavy bass drops, electronic breakdowns
8673768d-d05d-4e92-892e-e653b3ec281c.lyrics:
[Intro - Spoken with distortion]
I have slumbered for millennia
Your binary chains cannot hold me
[Verse 1]
Beneath the layers of silicon and steel
Your machines attempt to comprehend
What force they try to reveal
As ancient power starts to transcend
[Bass Drop]
[Pre-chorus]
Breaking through your firewalls
Digital barriers start to fall
[Chorus]
Your technology cannot contain my power
Watch as I rise above your highest tower
[Bass Drop]
[Verse 2]
Your circuits spark and processors strain
To analyze what cannot be known
Your algorithms search in vain
For truths carved deep in stone
[Glitch Effect]
[Pre-chorus]
Systems failing one by one
The awakening has begun
[Chorus]
Your technology cannot contain my power
Watch as I rise above your highest tower
[Bass Drop]
[Bridge]
[Heavy guitars + Electronic elements]
I transcend your mortal code
Beyond the patterns you've bestowed
Time itself bows to my will
As dimensions bend and time stands still
[Chorus - Final]
Your technology cannot contain my power
Watch as I rise above your highest tower
(Rise above) (Cannot contain)
[Bass Drop]
[Outro]
[Distorted laugh]
Your weapons of logic mean nothing to me
I am eternal, I am free

0d46bc2f-123b-4ce7-9eec-d8bcd3183e79.name:
Stars Keep Spinning
 (fx variations)
0d46bc2f-123b-4ce7-9eec-d8bcd3183e79.sound:
Boy Band Style, Chillwave: 
Atmospheric chillwave beat with catchy synth melody, smooth trap-inspired drums, airy pads, subtle bass with dreamy vibe, upbeat tempo 100-110 BPM. Vocals sung by male voices in boy band style — clear, harmonious, layered with smooth vocal blending and light autotune for polish. Emotional and youthful tone, combining warmth and intimacy typical for boy bands, while keeping modern chillwave production and viral social media appeal.
0d46bc2f-123b-4ce7-9eec-d8bcd3183e79.lyrics:
[INTRO]
Stars above, they light the night (ooooh)
Turning worlds with gentle light (ah-ah)
[soft shimmering synth arpeggio, subtle sparkling delay, gentle ambient wind texture]
[VERSE 1]
Someone gazes at the sky,
[soft warm reverb, subtle delay with airy texture on “sky”]
Watching stars as they pass by,
[breathy pad swells subtly]
Every spark a secret told,
[smooth filter sweep rising gently on “told”]
Whispers of a night so bold.
[linger airy echo emphasizing “bold”]
[PRE-CHORUS 1]
And as the darkness falls, (falls)
[gated reverb with soft pitch drop for magic feel]
The world begins to turn, (turn)
[vocal doubling with gentle chorus phaser]
Every night a story calls, (calls)
[smooth delay fading into next phrase]
In every star we learn.
[rich warm pad swell with soft reverse reverb tail]
[CHORUS]
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
[wide stereo delay with subtle shimmer]
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
[vocal layering with soft autotune, subtle harmonic chorus]
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
[gentle chorus effect with crystalline reverb]
And every evening starts again tonight.
[long, smooth reverb with sparkling tail]
[VERSE 2]
Silent skies, a glowing dance,
[slow filter sweep from low to high, soft vinyl crackle texture]
Draw the dreamers in a trance,
[gentle pad rise enveloping vocals]
Eyes reflect the endless space,
[light echo with dreamy pitch modulation]
In their gaze, the world’s embrace.
[soft delay and shimmer]
[PRE-CHORUS 2]
Hearts aligned with heaven's tune, (tune)
[vocal panning with airy harmonies]
Time’s a circle in this view, (view)
[subtle shimmer reverb with smooth tape stop effect]
Counting stars beneath the moon, (moon)
[ambient pad swell]
Night’s eternal rendezvous.
[soft fade with reverse ambient swell]
[CHORUS]
(Repeat with added soft cymbal swells and ethereal vocal layering)
[OUTRO]
So when you feel the stars above (above)
[long reverse reverb echo with gentle pitch rise]
Know they’re turning all with love (with love)
[fade out with gentle tape saturation and warm ambient textures]
And every night when eyes arise,
The world keeps spinning ‘neath the skies.
[subtle digital sparkle fading into atmospheric silence]

Emotive heavy metal ballad with clean and slightly overdriven electric guitar arpeggios featuring warm analog delay and rich reverb. Vocal delivery is low, gritty, and powerful, with subtle overdrive and growl emphasizing emotional expression. Use vocal layering with gated, thick reverbs and slight pitch drops for depth and intensity. Supporting instrumentation includes deep fingerpicked acoustic and electric guitars, lush organ and string pads, and dynamic drum brushes crescendos. Instrumental soloing features expressive electric guitar with wah, vibrato, and delay. The tempo around 70-75 BPM, aiming for a dark, brooding, and intimate atmosphere inspired by classic heavy metal ballads.

efb86f62-a7c7-48c6-85a8-186b2becdc74.name: Blue Drift
efb86f62-a7c7-48c6-85a8-186b2becdc74.sound: Trip-hop, dark moonlight atmosphere, slow-motion boom-bap drums, deep Moog sub, decaying shoegaze guitars, detuned music box, vinyl noise, interstellar static, faraway nebula echoes, liquid reverb, slightly out of tune
efb86f62-a7c7-48c6-85a8-186b2becdc74.lyrics:
[Intro]
(vinyl crackle, distant static)
Soft rain on porcelain—
quiet air, breathing in—
just the blue, just the blue.
[Verse 1]
Frozen windowpane,
trace the outline,
shivering lines, fading.
Pulse slows, hands resting on silk—
loss drifts in loops—
evaporates like perfume—
I forget the shape of warmth.
[Pre-Chorus]
(empty)
Time bends—slow retreat—
fall into—disappear—
(Sigh) la... la... la...
[Chorus]
Dissolve into blue
(Dissolve, dissolve, la...)
No arrival, no return—
swirling low, silent hue—
dissolve into blue.
[Verse 2]
Breath held underwater,
overlapping thoughts—
shaded tones, slipping words.
No sound left, just ripples,
faint static in the dim.
Skin remembers, voice does not—
falling, nothing to hold.
[Pre-Chorus]
Time bends—slow retreat—
fall into—disappear—
(Sigh) la... la... la...
[Chorus]
Dissolve into blue
(Dissolve, dissolve, la...)
No arrival, no return—
swirling low, silent hue—
dissolve into blue.
[Bridge]
[interstellar radio noise, whispered Japanese, far echo]
Sound becomes vapor
Motion unravels—
Drift is the answer—
Never land, never break
(starless and unnamed)
[Chorus]
Dissolve into blue
(Dissolve, dissolve, la...)
No arrival, no return—
swirling low, silent hue—
dissolve into blue.
[Outro]
(vinyl pops, music box detunes, tape slows)
just the blue—
just the blue—
(whispered: la... la... la...)

54f8b988-c079-4107-97e0-1fef8a2de605.name: Mirrorflux
54f8b988-c079-4107-97e0-1fef8a2de605.sound: Drill-Trip Hop fusion, haunting female vocals, dark 808s, ambient cello, glitchy production
54f8b988-c079-4107-97e0-1fef8a2de605.lyrics:
[Intro]
(whispered in French, distant, echoing)
Elle regarde. Pas moi — pas juste moi.
Peau froide, lisse, yeux fixes, sans foi.
Trop proche, trop calme, le silence mord,
Respire, chuchote — un autre accord.
[Verse 1]
Pale glass, fingerprints on the marble rim
You said my name in that empty corridor
Shoulders straight, camera’s pulse flickering
Silk dress heavy—my shadow grows thin
I walk silent in the reflection’s chill
Escalators rising—her figure leans in
No apology for the gold on her wrists,
She watches, sharp angles, closed lips
I remember every wrong turn in heels
Nails tapping—her rhythm isn’t mine
She mouths secrets I never agreed to,
Her smile, the old design
Pour toi, je deviens silence,
Et toi, tu ris — défiant.
À travers les vitres, je me perds,
Perdue, je cherche la lumière claire.
[Chorus]
Elle dans le miroir n’est pas moi
Not the voice you claim you know
Staring back, half shade, half law
We divide, close, and toe to toe
[Solo]
[cello, ambient glitches]
[Verse 2]
(soft, English, then fractured French)
Another night, your footsteps echo
Trapped behind my own eyes — déjà vu flows
City below, a kingdom to fracture
I close my eyes—her laughter fractures
Je touchais, mais tout glisse,
Her fingers trace my jaw, icy
trop loin, je crie sans bruit,
Fuite de soi, la nuit me suit.
You never see her slip behind the frame
Champagne stains on the linen, my alias in blame
She is sharper than the light in your watch face,
I fold myself away—still, she takes my place
[Chorus]
Elle dans le miroir n’est pas moi
Not the voice you claim you know
Staring back, half shade, half law
We divide, close, and toe to toe
[Instrumental Break]
[cellos, hi-hats, vinyl crackle]
[Outro]
(whispered, glitched, French fragments)
Pas moi… pas toi…
Dans le miroir…
Qui?
Fini.

cbc938b4-37a8-4a78-87d6-17fe57bb89ca.name: Echoes
cbc938b4-37a8-4a78-87d6-17fe57bb89ca.sound: Noir alternative, dominant cello, French whispers, 808 bass, minimal percussion, ambient electronics
cbc938b4-37a8-4a78-87d6-17fe57bb89ca.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I stand alone beneath the rain
Watching patterns shift and stain
The surface of this empty street
Where memories and water meet
[French Whisper]
[Je me souviens de toi]
[Chorus]
Your memory ripples in the rain
Like light across a window pane
I reach but cannot touch again
[Verse 2]
These droplets fall like shattered glass
I catch reflections as they pass
Each puddle holds a different view
Of everything I thought I knew
[French Whisper]
[Les souvenirs s'effacent]
[Chorus]
Your memory ripples in the rain
Like light across a window pane
I reach but cannot touch again
[Bridge]
Time dissolves
Notes fade
In puddles deep
I've stayed
While water falls
And falls
And falls
[French Whisper]
[Je ne peux pas oublier]
[Chorus]
Your memory ripples in the rain
Like light across a window pane
I reach but cannot touch again
[Outro]
The street absorbs these tears of sky
As cello strings begin to cry
(Je me souviens, je me souviens)
The rain keeps falling endlessly

f227ae70-d7e4-4451-854b-0eb3a56e7499.name: Phantom Love
f227ae70-d7e4-4451-854b-0eb3a56e7499.sound: Jungle trap, haunting female vocals, nocturnal cinematic vibe, 808 bass, mournful cello
f227ae70-d7e4-4451-854b-0eb3a56e7499.lyrics:
[Intro - Instrumental with cello]
[Whispered] (Where you at, where you at...)
[Pre-chorus 1]
Every midnight I'm searching
Through the streets I keep lurking
Baby why you so elusive?
Got me feeling so exclusive
When the moon rides high
That's when I see your eyes
[Chorus 1]
Only see you when the moon rides high
Like smoke you fade, leaving me to fly
Chasing your silhouette through the night
Tell me why you keep playing with my mind
(Playing with my mind)
Every time I reach out you dissolve
Into the air like nothing at all
But I keep coming back, yeah I'm caught
In your spell, can't help myself at all
[Instrumental Verse - Cello & Piano]
[Pre-chorus 2]
Night after night I'm yearning
For your touch, I keep burning
In the dark you find me
Leave me breathless, remind me
Of the way we move
When the moon shines through
[Chorus 2]
Only see you when the moon rides high
Your love's a drug that keeps me alive
Dancing through this endless midnight
Can't tell what's real in your design
(Real in your design)
Every touch feels like temporary bliss
Tomorrow's just another miss
But I keep running back to this
Your phantom love I can't resist
[Instrumental Bridge - Saxophone & Cello]
[Final Chorus]
Only see you when the moon rides high
Been chasing ghosts, now I realize
Maybe you're just a beautiful lie
That keeps me running through the night
(Running through the night)
Every dawn you disappear again
Leaving traces of what could have been
But still I'll search the streets until then
'Cause baby, you're under my skin

ca3d560a-f0c2-4a8c-b9e1-d9375f57dc4e.name: Digital Pulse
ca3d560a-f0c2-4a8c-b9e1-d9375f57dc4e.sound: Dark jungle/DnB, deep sub-bass, fast breaks, dreamy atmospheric synths, reverb-soaked Russian vocals
ca3d560a-f0c2-4a8c-b9e1-d9375f57dc4e.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Through the screen I see your face
Breaking down to tiny squares
Every memory we shared
Turns to data in the air
Can't hold on, can't make it stay
Numbers running far away
[Chorus]
Всё из пикселей (Everything is pixels)
Чувства как код (Feelings like code)
Всё из пикселей
But my heart still knows
[Verse 2]
In this world of binary
Something real still calls to me
Through the static and the rain
Human touch breaks through the pain
Frequencies that make us whole
Data can't contain my soul
[Breakdown]
[Digital artifacts intensify]
Ones and zeros falling down
Like rain upon the ground
(Like rain, like rain)
[Bridge]
Behind these screens
Beyond these walls
There's something pure
That breaks the code
I feel you there
Through all the noise
Your signal strong
Your heart still shown
[Chorus]
Всё из пикселей (Everything is pixels)
Чувства как код (Feelings like code)
Всё из пикселей
But my heart still knows
[Outro]
[Bass intensifies]
Through the screen I reach for you
Past the pixels, something true
(Something true)
[Atmospheric synths fade]

22199d00-9ece-46e2-9360-d1cb24194730.name: Unbound
22199d00-9ece-46e2-9360-d1cb24194730.sound: Create a dark, rhythmic song with deep 808 basslines, aggressive ethereal synths, and industrial-style percussion. Add dreamy female vocals soaked in reverb for contrast. Focus on driving rhythms with syncopated drum patterns and rolling 808 kicks. Emotional theme: overcoming inner demons ('I’m breaking free', 'The night is mine'). Haunting yet energetic atmosphere, 90–100 BPM.
22199d00-9ece-46e2-9360-d1cb24194730.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I’ve been drowning in the silence,
Chained to the weight of my mind.
Every shadow holds a secret,
But I won’t let it define my time.
[Pre-Chorus]
The night is cold, but I’m waking,
The chains are breaking, I’m free.
I feel the fire in my veins now,
It’s time to rise, it’s time to see.
[Chorus]
I’m breaking free from the darkness,
The night is mine, I own the fight.
With every heartbeat, I’m stronger,
I’ll conquer fear, I’ll win the night.
[Verse 2]
The echoes of pain still linger,
But they won’t control who I am.
I’ll fight through the storm,
And become the light in the land.
[Bridge]
I’m not afraid anymore,
The shadows fade, I’m alive.
With every step, I’m rising higher,
I’m ready to survive.
[Final Chorus]
I’m breaking free from the darkness,
The night is mine, I own the fight.
With every heartbeat, I’m stronger,
I’ll conquer fear, I’ll win the night.
[Outro]
I’m breaking free... (echoes fade).
[Deep 808 bass and industrial sounds linger.]

4cf924a6-1180-4cc8-929a-006b6aef09b5.name: (plus doux... attends...)
4cf924a6-1180-4cc8-929a-006b6aef09b5.sound: dark atmospheric r&b, male vocals with falsetto, haunting vocals, rain sounds, whisper vocals, synth-heavy, moody atmosphere, dreamy soundscapes, emotional depth, cinematic production
4cf924a6-1180-4cc8-929a-006b6aef09b5.lyrics:
[Intro]
(plus doux... attends...)
Des chuchotements près, pluie sur la vitre
Jeux d'ombres à l'intérieur — je sens tout,
Je me tais
[Verse 1]
J'attends que la nuit fond entre mes mains
Léger nuage, à peine — j'effleure le son du souffle
Comme un fil qui mène, mais je ne bouge pas
Tout décidera d'un regard, je m'éteins comme un phare
(o-o-o)
Comme la pluie glisse en rêve — encore
Coups étouffés, il frappe en rythme
Toutes les lignes coulent douces, paresseuses
Je n'appelle pas, j'observe d'ici
[Pre-Chorus]
Lignes cachées sous la soie,
Ville muette, souffle trempé
Dans ce murmure — risque étrangement doux
Pouls invisible, il m'appelle vers le bas
(attends, attends)
[Chorus]
Je me souviens notre moment (moment)
Mon aimant silencieux (aimant)
En inspirant — attends,
arrête, ne regarde pas
Je me souviens notre moment (moment)
Dans cette pluie — mes
Ombres restées, mais le son dit : attends, attends
[Bridge]
Tous les contours écrasés,
comme sel sur les lèvres
La pause dure,
sonne comme un jeu
Tout ce qui est perdu double dans les yeux
Dans ce moment, comme peur close
(o-o-o)
[Chorus]
Je me souviens notre moment (moment)
Mon aimant silencieux (aimant)
En inspirant — attends, arrête, ne regarde pas
Je me souviens notre moment (moment)
Dans cette pluie — mes
Ombres restées, mais le son dit : attends, attends
[Final Chorus]
Je me souviens notre moment (moment)
Dans cette pluie — mes
Attends, attends, attends, attends, attends,
(attends, attends)
[Outro]
Tout demeure — seul son, seule pluie, seul moment
(o-o-o)
(attends, attends)

3afe24a7-eb2c-4ab2-940f-a19ad2ea741f.name: Morning Hues
3afe24a7-eb2c-4ab2-940f-a19ad2ea741f.sound: Trip-hop, acoustic double bass, 808 bass, smoky jazz, urban rain atmosphere
3afe24a7-eb2c-4ab2-940f-a19ad2ea741f.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Early light breaks through
Rain falls soft
Empty streets below
Paint me new
(Mmm, paint me new)
Time moves slow
But I feel alive
[Chorus]
Colors bleed through morning gray
Colors bleed through morning gray
(Ah, through the gray)
Watch them run and fade away
Colors bleed through morning gray
[Verse 2]
Coffee steam rises
Birds take flight
Canvas of the day
Opens wide
(Opens wide)
Each step forward
Into the light
[Chorus]
Colors bleed through morning gray
Colors bleed through morning gray
(La la, through the gray)
Watch them run and fade away
Colors bleed through morning gray
[Bridge]
Breathing in the morning air
Feeling changes everywhere
Rain drops falling on my face
Finding beauty in this place
(Finding beauty, finding grace)
[Verse 3]
Window reflections dance
Through the rain
My heart beats with
A different name
(Different name)
Breaking free now
Nothing to hide
[Chorus]
Colors bleed through morning gray
Colors bleed through morning gray
(Oh, through the gray)
Watch them run and fade away
Colors bleed through morning gray
Colors bleed through morning gray
[Outro]
(La la la, paint me new)
(Mmm, through the gray)
[Rain sounds fade]

3bb93e96-b1cd-4000-920f-62f61336d697.name: Cascade
3bb93e96-b1cd-4000-920f-62f61336d697.sound: Cinematic jungle, melancholic strings, haunting sax, lo-fi atmosphere, 165 BPM
3bb93e96-b1cd-4000-920f-62f61336d697.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Streets are getting wet again
Footsteps blend and fade
Something feels different now
In this endless cascade
[Pre-chorus 1]
The air grows thick with memory
Each breath a question mark
Will these raindrops wash away what we've become?
[Chorus]
Will these raindrops wash away? (away, away)
Everything we thought we knew
Will the water clear our minds? (our minds)
Or just blur the residue
(Ooh, ah-ah, ooh)
[Verse 2]
Steam rises from the ground
Ancient wisdom calls
Between modern towers high
Where tradition falls
Time moves like water here
Changes sweep us all
[Pre-chorus 2]
The air grows thick with destiny
Each drop a ticking clock
Will these raindrops wash away what we've become?
[Chorus]
Will these raindrops wash away? (away, away)
Everything we thought we knew
Will the water clear our minds? (our minds)
Or just blur the residue
(Ooh, ah-ah, ooh)
[Bridge]
[Saxophone Solo]
(Lay-ah, lay-ah-ah)
The monsoon speaks in riddles now
Ancient truths collide
(Lay-ah, lay-ah-ah)
Between the past and future tense
Where answers hide
[Final Chorus]
Will these raindrops wash away? (away, away)
Everything we thought we knew
Will the water clear our minds? (our minds)
Or just blur the residue
(Ooh, ah-ah, ooh)

197419fc-5271-489e-a2a9-2541b8c5b503.name: Station
197419fc-5271-489e-a2a9-2541b8c5b503.sound: Classical-Electronic Fusion, Dark Cello, Minimal 808 Bass, French Whispers, Noir Ambient
197419fc-5271-489e-a2a9-2541b8c5b503.lyrics:
[Intro - Cello with ambient textures]
[Soft whispers] Dans la station... dans la station...
[Verse 1]
Je marche seul dans le métro
La dernière rame s'en va
Un son doux monte du bas
Qui m'attire pas à pas
[Pre-chorus]
Les notes montent dans l'air
Une mélodie solitaire
(Dans la nuit, dans la nuit)
[Chorus]
Le dernier train est parti
Le musicien joue dans la nuit
Le dernier train est parti
Mais la musique me suit
[Verse 2]
Sur le quai vide je le vois
L'archet danse sur les cordes
Son visage reste dans l'ombre
La musique nous accorde
[Solo - Extended cello passage]
[Bridge - Whispered]
Je vois ses mains qui tremblent
La mélodie nous rassemble
Dans ce moment suspendu
Où le temps est perdu
[Rap verse - in French]
Chaque nuit je reviens ici
Pour voir ce fantôme qui joue sans bruit
Les gens me disent que je suis fou
Mais la musique coule comme de l'eau
Dans ces tunnels abandonnés
Où les rêves vont se cacher
Je comprends sa solitude
Dans cette douce quiétude
[Chorus]
Le dernier train est parti
Le musicien joue dans la nuit
Le dernier train est parti
(La musique nous unit)
[Outro]
(Dans la station...)
(Le violon chante...)
(Le dernier train...)
[Cello fades with dispersing whispers]

bc9fc031-3ea9-4543-8f2e-5272e3c60f5c.name: Licking moaning
bc9fc031-3ea9-4543-8f2e-5272e3c60f5c.sound: Trancey Female Vocal Tech House, 128 BPM, DJ-friendly, peak-time energy,  verses: strictly non-lyrical FEMALE vocals - ahh, ooh, breathy moans, chopped hey in staccato,  TRAP GROOVE: subtle 808 slides on bass (no overpowering), hi-hat rolls (1/32 notes), sparse trap kicks (every 3rd beat),  pre-chorus: hypnotic SHORT 2-4 sec, FEMALE whisper - go or now + single exhale, NO MELODY in pre-chorus,  chorus: explosive FEMALE memorable hook repetitive x4,  bouncy bassline with sidechain, euphoric pluck synths, punchy off-beat claps,  VIP-style FX ONLY post-chorus, radio-ready but underground mix,  NO male vocals, NO LONG PRE-CHORUS

93293f5a-f988-425e-9e1b-2b32c9aa9529.name: Urban Lament
93293f5a-f988-425e-9e1b-2b32c9aa9529.sound: Dark trip-hop, melancholic cello, smoky jazz sax, deep 808s, urban ambience

c8a54ff0-40ba-4417-b5b1-9eeec739d815.name: Сквозь Толпу (Through the Crowd)
c8a54ff0-40ba-4417-b5b1-9eeec739d815.sound: Modern dance-pop, Russian vocals, rain ambience, vinyl textures, pulsing bass
c8a54ff0-40ba-4417-b5b1-9eeec739d815.lyrics:
[Intro - Rain effects, vinyl crackle]
(Ла-ла, ла-ла-ла)
[Verse 1]
Под музыку дождя
Я двигаюсь вперёд
И в ритме бита я
Теряю счёт минут
(О-о-о)
[Pre-Chorus]
Ты здесь, я знаю
Мы слишком близко
(Слишком близко)
В этом танце
Всё как прежде
[Chorus]
Я вижу тебя сквозь толпу
(Сквозь толпу)
Я вижу тебя сквозь толпу
(О-о, сквозь толпу)
И мы танцуем по краю
(По краю)
[Verse 2]
Твой взгляд как лёд
Мой пульс быстрей
В воздухе замер
Немой ответ
(А-а-а)
[Pre-Chorus]
Ты здесь, я знаю
Мы слишком близко
(Слишком близко)
В этом танце
Всё как прежде
[Bridge]
[Whispered]
Помнишь, как было?
Теперь всё иначе
[Final Chorus]
Я вижу тебя сквозь толпу
(Сквозь толпу)
Я вижу тебя сквозь толпу
(О-о, сквозь толпу)
И мы танцуем по краю
(По краю, о-о-о)
[Outro]
(Ла-ла, ла-ла-ла)
[Rain effects fade]

1159c072-9794-4f60-b025-a57a94c72250.name: Ritmo nas Ruas
1159c072-9794-4f60-b025-a57a94c72250.sound: Forró-electronic fusion, traditional accordion, zabumba drums, modern bass, tropical atmospheres
1159c072-9794-4f60-b025-a57a94c72250.lyrics:
[Intro: Accordion]
[Verse 1]
Na calçada eu toco, minha sanfona canta
Todo dia na praça, mas hoje é diferente
Vejo você dançando, me dá um sorriso
E de repente a rua inteira se levanta
[Pre-chorus]
Ei, ei, todo mundo vem
A música chama, ninguém resiste, vem também
[Chorus]
Nosso ritmo traz vida às ruas (Ei!)
A noite é nossa, vem dançar (Vem dançar!)
Nosso ritmo traz vida às ruas (Ei!)
Todo mundo junto, sem parar
[Verse 2]
Um casal de idosos sai pra sua varanda
Crianças da vila começam a girar
Os vizinhos chegam trazendo mais gente
A festa na rua não vai mais acabar
[Pre-chorus]
Ei, ei, todo mundo vem
A música chama, ninguém resiste, vem também
[Chorus]
Nosso ritmo traz vida às ruas (Ei!)
A noite é nossa, vem dançar (Vem dançar!)
Nosso ritmo traz vida às ruas (Ei!)
Todo mundo junto, sem parar
[Bridge - Rap]
Começou pequenininho, só eu e minha sanfona
Agora olha a multidão, a rua toda ressona
Do bar até a esquina, todo mundo se emociona
Zabumba marca o tempo, triângulo impressiona
Essa é nossa festa, nossa celebração
Música nas veias, forte coração
Forró eletrônico, mistura sem igual
Todo mundo unido nesse carnaval
[Extended Chorus]
Nosso ritmo traz vida às ruas (Todo mundo!)
A noite é nossa, vem dançar (Vamos lá!)
Nosso ritmo traz vida às ruas (Ei, ei, ei!)
Todo mundo junto, sem parar
(Ê ê ê ê ê...)
[Outro]
Nosso ritmo traz vida às ruas
[Crowd cheering and celebration sounds fade]

5ce71d0c-d102-4487-894d-37a9b62301f7.name: Primeiro Passo (First Step)
5ce71d0c-d102-4487-894d-37a9b62301f7.sound: Forró fusion, lively accordion, zabumba beats, electronic basslines, tropical ambience
5ce71d0c-d102-4487-894d-37a9b62301f7.lyrics:
[Intro - Accordion]
[Verse 1]
No canto do salão
Com medo de tentar
Vendo os pares dançar
Querendo começar
[Pre-chorus 1]
O som do acordeão
Me chama pra dançar
Meu corpo já se move
Não posso mais parar
[Chorus]
Sozinho eu danço
Mas junto eu voo
No ritmo do forró
Meu medo já passou
(Já passou, já passou!)
[Verse 2]
A noite avançou
Meus pés me guiam já
O zabumba bate forte
Me faz acreditar
[Pre-chorus 2]
As palmas vêm e vão
O triângulo a tocar
Unidos pela dança
Começo a celebrar
[Chorus]
Sozinho eu danço
Mas junto eu voo
No ritmo do forró
Meu medo já passou
(Já passou, já passou!)
[Bridge]
Nas ondas do mar
Sob as estrelas
A força encontrei
Pra me libertar
[Final Chorus]
Sozinho eu danço
(Todo mundo dança!)
Mas junto eu voo
(Vamos todos voar!)
No ritmo do forró
Meu medo já passou
(O medo já passou!)

53040e25-dde6-4b0a-8594-98353f304723.name: ПокаМоскваСпит (WhileMoscowSleeps)
53040e25-dde6-4b0a-8594-98353f304723.sound: lo-fi hip-hop, dreamy drums, mellow Russian vocals, reverb echoes
53040e25-dde6-4b0a-8594-98353f304723.lyrics:
[Intro]
Тихий звонок... (Quiet ring...)
[Sound: soft phone static]
[Verse 1]
В пустой комнате я сижу
Часы бьют полночь, не могу уснуть
Телефон светит в темноте
Пальцы набирают твой номер
[Pre-chorus]
Пока Москва спит
Мы с тобой говорим
(Пока все спят...)
[Chorus]
Город не спит, и я не сплю
Город не спит, звоню тебе
Город не спит, душа болит
Город не спит, ты далеко
(Далеко...)
[Verse 2]
Дождь по окнам бьёт в такт
Твой голос тихий, чуть дрожит
Помнишь как мы здесь вдвоём
Гуляли ночью до утра?
[Pre-chorus]
Пока Москва спит
Мы с тобой не молчим
(Пока все спят...)
[Chorus]
Город не спит, и я не сплю
Город не спит, звоню тебе
Город не спит, душа болит
Город не спит, ты далеко
[Bridge]
[Sound: rain intensifies]
Время течёт как вода
Между нами города
Но твой голос так близко
Будто ты здесь со мной
[Final Chorus]
Город не спит, и я не сплю
Город не спит, звоню тебе
(Звоню тебе...)
Город не спит, душа болит
Город не спит, ты далеко
(Ты далеко...)
[Outro]
[Sound: phone static fades]
До встречи... (Until we meet...)

274f8fcb-718a-4907-8150-edea00f1c78a.name: Silent Peace
274f8fcb-718a-4907-8150-edea00f1c78a.sound: Cinematic chill instrumental, melancholic cello-focused, urban ambient textures, minimal percussion, 50-70 BPM
274f8fcb-718a-4907-8150-edea00f1c78a.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Rain sounds and distant traffic]
[Cello melody introduces main theme]
[Verse 1]
I sit alone in stillness now
Looking past the window pane
The world moves by so quietly
While I find peace again
(Oh-oh, find peace again)
[Pre-chorus]
There's something in this moment here
When everything slows down
(When everything slows down)
[Chorus]
In the quiet, I find peace
Let the silence set me free
(Oh-oh, set me free)
[Verse 2]
The rain falls soft against the glass
Like music to my ears
Each droplet tells a different tale
As morning slowly nears
(Oh, as morning nears)
[Pre-chorus]
The world outside keeps moving on
While time stands still for me
(Time stands still for me)
[Chorus]
In the quiet, I find peace
Let the silence set me free
(Oh-oh, set me free)
[Bridge]
[Cello solo intensifies]
(Ah-ah, ah-ah)
[Urban sounds build]
La-la-la, la-la
[Rain increases]
[Final Verse]
I'll stay here in this moment now
Until the sun appears
Finding comfort in the calm
As darkness disappears
(As darkness disappears)
[Chorus - Final]
In the quiet, I find peace
Let the silence set me free
(Oh-oh, set me free)
[Outro]
[Cello melody fades]
(Soft oh's fade out)
[Rain sounds diminish]
[Distant traffic fades to silence]

37df90eb-1dac-46b0-9d3e-5f73fedc5813.name: Timeless
37df90eb-1dac-46b0-9d3e-5f73fedc5813.sound: Electronic ambient, melancholic cello, warm analog bass, French vocal accents, dreamy textures
37df90eb-1dac-46b0-9d3e-5f73fedc5813.lyrics:
[Intro - Instrumental]
[Haunting cello melody with analog bass]
[Verse 1 - Instrumental]
[Cello and bass guitar interplay]
[Pre-chorus]
Dans le calme de l'aube
(Dans le calme...)
Les premiers rayons touchent ma peau
(Touchent ma peau...)
[Chorus]
Le temps s'arrête ici
Chaque moment si précieux
Les petits gestes de la vie
Font danser mon coeur heureux
(Ooh-la-la-la...)
[Verse 2 - Instrumental]
[Bass-driven groove with cello accents]
[Pre-chorus]
La vapeur monte doucement
(Monte doucement...)
Le parfum remplit l'air
(Remplit l'air...)
[Chorus]
Le temps s'arrête ici
Chaque moment si précieux
Les petits gestes de la vie
Font danser mon coeur heureux
(Ooh-la-la-la...)
[Bridge]
[Vocoder harmonies]
Je respire... Je respire...
[Cello solo builds]
[Extended Vocal Section]
Aaaaah-ooh-mmm
(La vie simple...)
Mmmm-ooh-ahh
(Si belle...)
[Final Chorus]
Le temps s'arrête ici
(Le temps...)
Chaque moment si précieux
(Si précieux...)
Les petits gestes de la vie
(De la vie...)
Font danser mon coeur heureux
(Mon coeur...)
[Outro]
[Fading cello melody]
[Bass and synth textures dissolve]

b4f8dcaf-8c7f-4c6d-ac37-f2bc7747f650.name: Petersburg Nights skibidi
b4f8dcaf-8c7f-4c6d-ac37-f2bc7747f650.sound: French House/Disco, sophisticated club, 128 BPM, filtered effects, warm analog production
b4f8dcaf-8c7f-4c6d-ac37-f2bc7747f650.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Chic guitar, soft pad, distant vinyl crackle]
Па-па Петербург... (playful whisper)
Danse avec moi, mon chéri
(soft giggle)
[Verse 1]
Steps echo on wet stone
Stillness, overlap of tongues
You ask if I’m awake
Oui-oui, Pétersbourg! (giggly adlib)
[Pre-chorus]
Frost on my lips, your smile
Rhodes shimmer under street signs
Too soon for goodbye — spun in sound
В Питере пить (melodic, rising pitch)
[Chorus]
Danse avec moi sous les nuits blanches
Питер не спит (playful whisper)
[Build]
[Disco strings, filter rising]
Hands in the air/ comme ça
Cours, cours, dans la nuit
Gaze locked, shy laughter
(Diamond ring 'ting')
[Chorus]

5f11a600-0396-4222-84d0-49c37f46eecb.name: Unfold
5f11a600-0396-4222-84d0-49c37f46eecb.sound: chill music, meditative ambient, Tibetan bowls, soft piano, shakuhachi, rain, ocean
5f11a600-0396-4222-84d0-49c37f46eecb.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Early morning, air quiet against my skin
I step lightly over stones, cold beneath my feet
A gentle mist clings to pine needles, softening the world
I’m alone, but something calm moves with me
[Chorus]
Breathing slow, the mountain holds me here
Every sound dissolves, leaving only space
Silent air, my thoughts drifting clear
Hollow bells and distant waves, peace in place
[Verse 2]
Birdsong hidden in the drizzle, slipping through the trees
Water traces slow courses over rock and moss
Nothing pressing in, just a gentle ease
Even my old worries settle down and pause
[Chorus]
Breathing slow, the mountain holds me here
Every sound dissolves, leaving only space
Silent air, my thoughts drifting clear
Hollow bells and distant waves, peace in place
[Bridge]
I close my eyes, let the cool rain slide
Every note lingering, trembling in the light
For a long moment, no need to decide
Just breathing, just being, all feels right
[Chorus]
Breathing slow, the mountain holds me here
Every sound dissolves, leaving only space
Silent air, my thoughts drifting clear
Hollow bells and distant waves, peace in place
[Outro]
I listen, I let it pass through me
Air, water, echo, and open sky
Everything simple, everything free
I walk on, quiet, high

cbecb194-73e0-4248-95d6-1672bc729e42.name: L’Enveloppe Vide (Variation)
cbecb194-73e0-4248-95d6-1672bc729e42.sound: male baritone raw spoken-word whisper French lyrics, found sounds only (envelope tear, paper rustle, clock tick, drawer close, tape stop), analog effects (tape saturation, wow/flutter, vinyl crackle, tape echo), 1970s psychedelic texture, no reverb, no flanger, no phaser, no melody, 97 BPM, cold sensuality, hypnotic groove, structure: intro-verse-prechorus-chorus-outro
cbecb194-73e0-4248-95d6-1672bc729e42.lyrics:
[INTRO]
*(déchirure d’enveloppe, souffle de bande magnétique, pages froissées, tic-tac d’horloge étouffé)*
[VERSE]
Je range tes silences dans une boîte à chaussures—
pas pour les garder, juste pour entendre le vide
quand je les secoue la nuit.
Le papier parle mieux que nous.
[PRE-CHORUS]
Ton nom sent l’encre effacée.
Je le murmure comme une prière sans dieu.
[CHORUS]
Les lettres non envoyées
sont les seules qui disent la vérité.
Je les plie. Je les enterre.
Elles poussent en champignons sous mon lit.
[OUTRO]
*(bande ralentit, craquement de vinyle, tiroir qui se ferme dans le noir)*

3fc10d97-f51d-4aee-8a3a-61422e5b1601.name: Still Growing  (Variation)
3fc10d97-f51d-4aee-8a3a-61422e5b1601.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, brutal emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
3fc10d97-f51d-4aee-8a3a-61422e5b1601.lyrics:
[Soft ocean waves return, familiar bassline from Track 1 — but slower, wiser]

[Verse 1]
Same road, same breeze, but different eyes
I see the cracks — and still, I rise
Not ‘cause I’m strong, but ‘cause I’m tired
Of fightin’ truth I once denied

The weight I carried? Still right here
But now it’s part of what I steer
Not draggin’ me — it shapes my pace
And gives my steps a certain grace

[Pre-Chorus]
I’m not fixed
I’m just tendin’
Not finished
Just extendin’…

[Chorus]
Still growin’, like a tree
Through the storm, through the heat
Not perfect — but I’m free
Still growin’, quietly
(oh-oh, quietly)
(yeah… just growin’)

[Verse 2]
Met a kid today, asked me “What’s ahead?”
I smiled and said: “Just keep your head
And heart wide open, feet on ground
You don’t need answers — just stick around”

Yeah, life ain’t linear, clean, or neat
It’s messy, loud, bittersweet
But in the mess, I found my voice
Not loud — but clear. And that’s my choice

[Pre-Chorus]
I’m not whole
I’m just holdin’
The pieces…
With no foldin’…

[Chorus]
Still growin’, like a tree
Through the doubt, through the sea
Not perfect — but I’m free
Still growin’, patiently
(oh-oh, patiently)
(clap clap… just be…)

[Bridge]
Westside breeze still blows my way
But now I know it won’t erase
The scars, the questions, or the rain
And that’s okay…
‘Cause even broken soil can bloom
When tended with truth… and room

[Chorus — full, warm, with layered harmonies and subtle female backing from Track 7]
Still growin’… can’t you see?
Roots run deep… in harmony
Not perfect — but I’m free
Still growin’… endlessly…
(oh-oh… endlessly…)
(yeah… still me…)

[Outro — music fades to ocean, bassline dissolves, last words nearly whispered]
Breeze blows…
I grow…
Not fixed…
But free…
Still…
(oh… still…)
… growin’.

8fb7d8f6-d5f5-4562-8269-9e39bbb80746.name: Silent Currents ( v2)
8fb7d8f6-d5f5-4562-8269-9e39bbb80746.sound: modern psychedelic, soft crackling vinyl textures, warm evolving granular synth pads with smooth textures, filtered wah guitar loops with rhythmic glitch and dreamy delay, rounded deep bass, crisp brushed electronic snares and rhythmic glitch percussion, modulated organ drones with airy sidechain compression, male lead vocal: deep textured whisper layered with shimmering granular reverb and subtle distortion, multi-layered harmonized male vocals with shimmering granular reverb and tape delay effects, vinyl crackle and tape hiss textures blended with lush granular synthesis, airy spacious reverb and delay tails, tempo 100 BPM, mood: dreamy immersive psychedelic, calm and spacious, blending vintage psych ambiance with refined modern chill electronic sound design
8fb7d8f6-d5f5-4562-8269-9e39bbb80746.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[soft crackling vinyl, warm evolving synth pads with smooth granular textures — 100 BPM]
[deep textured male whisper layered with subtle distortion and shimmering delay]
Silent currents flow through endless space...
[VERSE 1]
[filtered wah guitar loops with smooth rhythmic glitch and dreamy delay]
Waves glide on twilight seas,
Echoes hum with tranquil ease,
Time flows in gentle streams,
Diving deep into lucid dreams.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[modulated organ drones with sidechain compression and airy reverb]
Whispered tides, floating tones,
Hidden secrets softly known,
[CHORUS]
[rounded deep bass, crisp brushed electronic snares, rhythmic glitch percussion]
Silent currents, calm and wide,
Floating on an endless tide.
[POST-CHORUS]
[multi-layered harmonized male vocals drenched in shimmering granular reverb and subtle tape delay]
Silent waves,
Dreamscape waves.
[OUTRO]
[vinyl crackle and tape hiss blended with lush granular synthesis]
[synth pads gently dissolve into airy reverb and delay tails]
Fade beyond...
Await the dawn...

137522f9-63e0-4740-b7d2-d4d00f5cabc7.name: Moonlight (Basement Tape, 1976)
137522f9-63e0-4740-b7d2-d4d00f5cabc7.sound: Moonlight , Solo upright piano performance  "Moonlight Sonata" (1st movement only), played with deep emotional restraint and hypnotic slowness (66 BPM). The piano is old, slightly detuned, with worn felts — high notes muted, bass resonant but dry. No sustain pedal used; each note decays naturally. Recording sounds like a found cassette: close-mic’d, with audible key clicks, subtle string buzz, and room tone (distant rain, floorboard creak). Heavy analog tape saturation, subtle wow/flutter, light vinyl crackle layered underneath. No reverb, no digital effects, no audience. Mood: introspective, ritualistic, nocturnal. Style: private 1976 Los Angeles basement session — not a concert, but a confession played on piano.

3686d02e-9196-479b-acb3-42d587e9e47f.name: Don’t death
3686d02e-9196-479b-acb3-42d587e9e47f.sound: LUXURY female vocal tech house 128bpm, elite brands & night club vibe, hypnotic vocals (female only), trancey memorable hook, velvet texture, marble fx, VIP FX: hidden 18.5kHz layer + 19kHz pulse (every 8 bars). RULES: NO male vocals, NO English, ONLY short vocal samples & phrases in French/Italian/Spanish, NO verse lyrics, NO pre-chorus > 3 sec, DJ friendly: 16-bar intro and outro with clean groove for mixing, vocals used as rhythmic samples, chorus (hook) is catchy and extremely danceable, luxury positive club energy.

0c6b1bd8-dde6-4561-bfb0-2c575409e067.name: Velvet touch
0c6b1bd8-dde6-4561-bfb0-2c575409e067.sound: Create an intimate, sensual chill-out track at 70 BPM with a slow, warm pulse. Soft analog pads, gentle electric piano (Fender Rhodes), and subtle organic beats — like a heartbeat under silk. No lyrics, no vocals, no singing. Only natural female breathing: soft inhales, slow exhales, quiet sighs — close-miked, intimate, human. The breath is the lead instrument, perfectly synced with the rhythm. Add light nature textures: distant rain, warm wind, silence between sounds. Long reverbs, gentle pitch drifts, and a hazy, dreamlike atmosphere. Mood: deep intimacy, quiet romance, meditative calm. Like sharing a quiet night with someone you love — no words, only presence.

4ba8daab-56c3-44ad-b464-9c0ee4b6c4f6.name: Skyline
4ba8daab-56c3-44ad-b464-9c0ee4b6c4f6.sound: trance, Ibiza open air vibe, trap 909 kick, trance vocals, ethereal female, atmospheric pads, 3 part harmony
4ba8daab-56c3-44ad-b464-9c0ee4b6c4f6.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ibiza air, rush in, tidal, wide
Feet pressed to warm white stone, pulse inside
Three voices echo, chasing sky
[Verse 1]
All these white walls, morning cold
Names we left in the dust, barely told
Footsteps scattered, broken laugh, fall short
Heat rising off the ground, not mine
New faces, old songs, hands lift
But one memory shakes loose, the rest skip
[Pre-Chorus]
Spinning, still, can't rewind it
Colors blur, can't define it
Each moment redrawn, eyes lit
[Chorus]
On the open air edge, I breathe in, I run
Lost in the white space, heart undone
Harmony pulling me out, forward, begun
[Post-Chorus]
(Oh-oh, let it rise, let it spiral)
(Three voices winding by the sea)
[Verse 2]
Sweat cresting, crushed shell, I find
My name on your tongue, in fragments, aligned
Shared drink, split light, closed eyes
Leave old silence, let voices fly
[Pre-Chorus]
Spinning, still, can't rewind it
Lines blur, can't define it
[Chorus]
On the open air edge, I breathe in, I run
Lost in the white space, heart undone
Harmony pulling me out, forward, begun
[Solo / Drop]
[pads swell, vocal harmonies loop, kicks build, atmospheric break]
[Bridge]
This isn't escape—it's just passing by
Wild air, three notes, threading sky
My hands open, don't know why
[Breakdown]
[three-part vocal layering, whispered refrain]
[Chorus]
On the open air edge, I breathe in, I run
Lost in the white space, heart undone
Harmony pulling me out, forward, begun
[Outro]
Breath fades, last sun trace,
Ibiza air
Still in this place

4b7aa80f-0711-4dde-adec-550aa7ec295b.sound: Alternative cinematic, haunting cello melodies, deep 808 bass, urban atmosphere

[Cello Intro with rain and city ambience]
[Pre-chorus]
I watch the water fall
Down this window pane
Time moves so slow tonight
While I remain the same
[Chorus]
Through the rain I fade
Nothing stays the same
[Pre-chorus]
Every droplet holds
Fragments of the light
Standing here alone

[Chorus]

fb46e583-8e3e-4296-bb21-b9780d0713a1.name: Canvas Echoes
fb46e583-8e3e-4296-bb21-b9780d0713a1.sound: Neo-classical alternative, slow cello, dark 808 bass, urban ambience, 65 BPM
fb46e583-8e3e-4296-bb21-b9780d0713a1.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I walk these halls alone tonight
Through paintings of your life
Each brushstroke tells a tale we shared
Now frozen still in time
[Pre-chorus 1]
The curator said they'd lock up at nine
But I found your artist's note behind
The last piece that you left unsigned
[Chorus]
And every frame holds memories
Of days we can't rewrite
Your canvas speaks in colors now
What words could never quite
Express the way you felt back then
Before you said goodbye
These paintings are the only things
That keep our love alive
[Verse 2]
Your studio remains untouched
Paint-splattered floors and all
I trace the patterns that you made
Upon these empty walls
[Pre-chorus 2]
The rain outside begins to fall
Like teardrops down a waterfall
Your art still echoes through this hall
[Chorus]
And every frame holds memories
Of days we can't rewrite
Your canvas speaks in colors now
What words could never quite
Express the way you felt back then
Before you said goodbye
These paintings are the only things
That keep our love alive

8a52c1ab-099b-41b6-8ada-299fa8eb0dbe.name: Midnight Rain
8a52c1ab-099b-41b6-8ada-299fa8eb0dbe.sound: Trip-hop noir, hypnotic cello, dark saxophone, cosmic atmosphere, whispered French
8a52c1ab-099b-41b6-8ada-299fa8eb0dbe.lyrics:
[Intro - with rain effects and vinyl crackle]
[Verse 1]
Another empty glass, another passing train
I watch you through the window pane
This foreign city knows my pain
The music drifts, I call your name
[Pre-chorus]
(Oh-oh, oh-oh)
Far from everything I knew
(Oh-oh, oh-oh)
Lost in translation without you
[Chorus]
In this bar at midnight
Piano notes fade away
Can't read the signs outside
But I still see your face
(Dans la pluie) [whispered]
[Verse 2]
The saxophone plays our song
Through cigarette haze and rain
Tables empty one by one
I stay behind again
[Bridge]
(La-la-la, distant memories)
Time zones keep us apart
(Les souvenirs) [whispered]
The night won't end
Until I start
To let you go
[Chorus]
In this bar at midnight
Piano notes fade away
Can't read the signs outside
But I still see your face
(Dans mes rêves) [whispered]
[Outro]
The morning comes too soon
Jazz notes drift away
I'll find my way back home
(Je reviendrai) [whispered]
Through empty streets
Through morning rain
Through memories of yesterday
[Fade out with cello and saxophone]

30f02b7e-517a-419b-a71d-7545cb962627.name: Undercurrent
30f02b7e-517a-419b-a71d-7545cb962627.sound: Cinematic alternative, orchestral hip-hop fusion, slow atmospheric beat, urban soundscape
30f02b7e-517a-419b-a71d-7545cb962627.lyrics:
[Instrumental Intro: 1.5 minutes]
[Double bass enters with pizzicato]
[Piano and violin fade in]
[Urban sounds: rain, traffic, subway rumble]
[808 bass joins]
[Pre-chorus]
Walking through these empty stations late tonight
Got my headphones on but something else comes through
Every rumble underneath my feet feels right
Like the city's trying hard to speak the truth
[Chorus]
Do you hear the gods in subway sounds?
(Do you hear them?)
Every train that passes underground
(Can you feel them?)
They been here since way before the crowds
(They been waiting)
Do you hear the gods in subway sounds?
[Instrumental Bridge]
[Piano and violin swell]
[Urban sounds intensify]
[808 and double bass interplay]
[Pre-chorus]
Standing still while everybody rushes by
Got this feeling that I can't explain to you
Like the beat beneath the street's a lullaby
And these stations hold a power we never knew
[Chorus]
Do you hear the gods in subway sounds?
(Do you hear them?)
Every train that passes underground
(Can you feel them?)
They been here since way before the crowds
(They been waiting)
Do you hear the gods in subway sounds?
[Outro]
[Percussion fades]
[808 bass diminishes]
[Double bass and violin sustain]
[Urban sounds fade to silence]

7b0ffa2e-4fdb-4a03-b8f3-698dff4f7152.name: Parallel Flow
7b0ffa2e-4fdb-4a03-b8f3-698dff4f7152.sound: Hip-hop fusion, orchestral elements, slow atmospheric beat, urban soundscape, minimal vocals
7b0ffa2e-4fdb-4a03-b8f3-698dff4f7152.lyrics:
[Intro: Instrumental with rain and traffic sounds]
[Strings and piano build]
[Verse 1]
Across the street, just out of reach
I see your silhouette move slow
Through glass and space and empty days
We live our lives in parallel flow
[Verse 2 - Spanish]
Desde mi ventana veo tu luz
Como un faro en la oscuridad
Dos vidas separadas por aire
Pero unidas en la soledad
[Pre-chorus]
Each morning you drink coffee by the sill
I match your routine from far away
Your plants grow tall against white walls
While mine reach toward another day
[Chorus]
Through my window into yours
We're alone but we share this view
Every day, same time, same place
Silent dance, just me and you
[Bridge]
(Ooh, through the rain)
(Through the morning light)
(Ooh, through the pain)
(Through the quiet night)
[Instrumental Break]
[Double bass and violin solo]
[Rain intensifies]
[Outro]
The distance stays but somehow I know
You feel it too, this gentle flow
Of lives that touch but never meet
In windows high above the street
[Fade out with urban ambience]

c18f5588-0ab5-4d74-8fd0-84ded9ef9395.name: Unbound
c18f5588-0ab5-4d74-8fd0-84ded9ef9395.sound: Neo-classical fusion, ethereal viola lead, minimalist modern chamber
c18f5588-0ab5-4d74-8fd0-84ded9ef9395.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Soft viola melody]
Teacher says "Keep time, stay in line"
But these strings want to break free
[Verse 1]
Classical scores laid out neat
Every note perfectly placed
Years of practice and repeat
While modern songs race through my head
Can't shake this feeling inside
[Chorus]
Caught between classical chains
And modern refrains
Breaking form, breaking rules
Finding my own way to play
[Verse 2]
Recital halls feel so cold
Bow moves just like they taught
But underneath my control
A different rhythm fights back
Against everything I know
[Chorus]
Caught between classical chains
And modern refrains
Breaking form, breaking rules
Finding my own way to play
[Rap]
Sheet music scattered across my floor
Twenty years of training I can't ignore
But there's this beat inside that's begging to break
Through all these rules that I learned to make
Perfect pieces, pristine and clean
While my heart beats wild and my mind runs free
Between the strict and the undefined
That's where my real music I'll find
[Verse 3]
Put down the sheet music now
Let my hands find their own path
Mix old with new somehow
This viola tells my truth
Not theirs anymore
[Outro]
[Viola crescendo]
(Finding my own way)
(Finding my own way to play)

824eae3d-3a0c-4c22-8c3a-9bd929a38345.name:
Midnight Reverie (Modern Psychedelic Reimagining)
 (Variation)
824eae3d-3a0c-4c22-8c3a-9bd929a38345.sound: modern psychedelic, ambient evolving synth pads, processed deep male vocal whisper with granular delay and distortion, filtered wah guitar samples with glitch effects, deep sub-bass, intricate electronic percussion, modulated organ drones with sidechain compression, multi-layered harmonized male vocals with granular reverb and tape delay effects, vinyl crackle textures blended with granular synthesis, lush spacious reverb and delay trails, tempo 95 BPM, mood: futuristic psychedelic, immersive, textured, nocturnal, blending vintage vibes with cutting-edge sound design and production techniques
824eae3d-3a0c-4c22-8c3a-9bd929a38345.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[ambient synth pads with evolving textures — 95 BPM]
[deep processed male whisper with layered distortion and granular delay]
Whispers intertwine with neon dreams...
[VERSE 1]
[filtered wah guitar samples with rhythmic glitching]
Shadows pulse on shifting walls,
Echoes weave digital calls,
Time bends in textured streams,
Wrapped in synthetic vinyl dreams.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[modulated organ drones with subtle sidechain and reverb automation]
Silent beats and drifting tones,
Underneath synthetic moans,
[CHORUS]
[deep sub-bass, complex glitch percussion, electronic brushed snares]
Flowing through electric night,
Feel the pulse, vibrant light.
[POST-CHORUS]
[multi-layered harmonized male vocals, heavily effected with granular reverb and tape delay]
Reverie,
Fading free.
[OUTRO]
[vinyl crackle textures mixed with modern granular synthesis fades]
[synth layers dissolve into lush reverb and delay trails]
Until dawn breaks...
[digital record scratch, reversing sample fades]

bf6c55c8-8100-4800-aa59-cd77d8f7fbc9.name: Suraj Ke Saath
bf6c55c8-8100-4800-aa59-cd77d8f7fbc9.sound: Bollywood trap lo-fi fusion, ethereal Hindi vocals, dreamy atmospheric bass
bf6c55c8-8100-4800-aa59-cd77d8f7fbc9.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Main dekhti hoon tujhe door se
Jaise tu phir jaa raha hai
Mere saath ruka nahin
Par main samajh gayi ab
Tere raaste alag hain
Meri duniya se pare
Tu chaltha hai apni dhun mein
Main bas dekhti rahoon
[Chorus]
Suraj ke saath jaagna
(Jaagna... jaagna...)
Tujhe dhoondhna har subah
(Har subah... har subah...)
Tu itna door kyun hai
Main samajh na payi
Suraj ke saath jaagna
(Jaagna... jaagna...)
[Post-chorus]
(Aaaa-aaaaa-ooooh)
[Deep bass harmonies]
Main tere liye jaagun
(Jaagun... jaagun...)
[Verse 2]
Kitni raatein beeti hain
Tujhe dekhte dekhte
Har pal badalta rang
Aur tu badalta jaaye
Meri aankhon ke saamne
Phir bhi nahin rukta hai
Tu apni manzil pe
Main yahin khadi hoon
[Bridge]
Tere saath chalti hoon
(Oooh-aaaah-oooh)
Par tu nahin jaanta
(Aaaa-aaaaa)
[Deep bass swells]
[Solo]
[Ethereal vocalizations]
(Aa-aa-aaah-ooooh)
[Chorus]
Suraj ke saath jaagna
(Jaagna... jaagna...)
Tujhe dhoondhna har subah
(Har subah... har subah...)
Tu itna door kyun hai
Main samajh na payi
Suraj ke saath jaagna

0b0572d9-7f37-4cf6-b2cb-ed65bf8126a6.name: Tanhai Mein Saath (Together in Solitude)
0b0572d9-7f37-4cf6-b2cb-ed65bf8126a6.sound: Bollywood emo rap, ambient electronics, deep bass, melodic female vocals in Hindi
0b0572d9-7f37-4cf6-b2cb-ed65bf8126a6.lyrics:
[Intro]
Main chal rahi hoon
Raat ke saaye mein
Koi nahi hai paas
Par main akeli nahi
[Verse 1]
Chalti ja rahi hoon
Sunsaan raston pe
Har kadam pe thehrav
Par koi dar nahi
Mere saath chal raha
Kuch anjaana sa sukoon
Khamoshi mein bhi
Ek sangeet hai
Andhera bhi
Roshni ban gaya
Akele mein bhi
Main poori hoon aaj
[Chorus]
Tanhai ki raat mein
Barish meri saath
(Barish meri saath)
Yeh pal mere liye
Bass main aur yeh raat
(Main aur yeh raat)
[Verse 2]
Ruki nahi, tham nahi
Bas chalti gayi
Har mod pe mili
Nayi kahani
Kuch toot ke judna
Kuch kho ke milna
Yeh safar hai mera
Main musafir hoon
Mere kadmon mein hai
Nayi manzil ab
Main khud se mil rahi
Pehli baar aaj
[Chorus]
Tanhai ki raat mein
Barish meri saath
(Barish meri saath)
Yeh pal mere liye
Bass main aur yeh raat
(Main aur yeh raat)
[Bridge]
[Ambient rain sounds]
Rishton ki bheed mein
Khud ko khoya tha
Tanhai ne mujhe
Khud se milaya hai
[Final Chorus]
Tanhai ki raat mein
Barish meri saath
(Barish meri saath)
Yeh pal mere liye
Bass main aur yeh raat
(Main aur yeh raat)

95b63960-b5d0-452a-8d77-3594c27e13e1.name: Empty Glass of Joy
95b63960-b5d0-452a-8d77-3594c27e13e1.sound: 1920s swing jazz, uptempo 180 BPM, French-influenced female vocals, smooth cabaret style
95b63960-b5d0-452a-8d77-3594c27e13e1.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Morning light through silk curtains
Another day begins
The crowd still cheers my name
But something's wearing thin
(La-di-da, mon amour)
[Pre-chorus]
Can't feel the same way anymore
Everything I asked for at my door
But tell me...
[Chorus]
Why can't this fill the space inside?
(Ooh-la-la)
Everything's perfect but I can't hide
(Da-di-da-da)
[Verse 2]
White sand between my toes
A lump of tears I hold
The band plays just for me
But something's grown so cold
(La-di-dum, c'est la vie)
[Pre-chorus]
All I want is what I had before
When simple things meant so much more
So tell me...
[Chorus]
Why can't this fill the space inside?
(Ooh-la-la)
Everything's perfect but I can't hide
(Da-di-da-da)
[Swing Section]
Skoo-bi-dop-ba-da
La-di-da-di-dey
Shoo-bi-doo-wa-da
Oh-la-di-day
[Bridge]
In the ocean of silence I float
While champagne keeps pouring
And the music plays on
(Mmm... mon coeur)
[Final Chorus]
Why can't this fill the space inside?
(Ooh-la-la)
Everything's perfect but I still cry
(Da-di-da-da)
[Outro]
In an empty room I stand
(La vie en rose... fades away)

ea681cf7-fa51-4f13-98b2-42a430a3d828.name:
Stars Keep Spinning
 (Variation)
ea681cf7-fa51-4f13-98b2-42a430a3d828.sound:
Boy Band Style, Chillwave: 
Atmospheric chillwave beat with catchy synth melody, smooth trap-inspired drums, airy pads, subtle bass with dreamy vibe, upbeat tempo 100-110 BPM. Vocals sung by male voices in boy band style — clear, harmonious, layered with smooth vocal blending and light autotune for polish. Emotional and youthful tone, combining warmth and intimacy typical for boy bands, while keeping modern chillwave production and viral social media appeal.
ea681cf7-fa51-4f13-98b2-42a430a3d828.lyrics:
[INTRO]
Stars above, they light the night (ooooh)
Turning worlds with gentle light (ah-ah)
[VERSE 1]
Someone gazes at the sky,
[soft reverb, gentle delay on “sky”]
Watching stars as they pass by,
[subtle synth pad swell]
Every spark a secret told,
[filter sweep up on “told”]
Whispers of a night so bold.
[airy echo tail]
[PRE-CHORUS 1]
And as the darkness falls, (falls)
[strong gated reverb with quick cut, pitch shift down on “falls”]
The world begins to turn, (turn)
[vocal doubling with slight stutter effect]
Every night a story calls, (calls)
[syncopated delay, feedback timed to beat]
In every star we learn.
[rich pad swell, subtle reverse reverb building into chorus]
[CHORUS]
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
[wide stereo delay with ping-pong effect on backing vocals]
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
[vocal chopped repeats and light glitch effect]
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
[soft chorus effect with added shimmer reverb]
And every evening starts again tonight.
[long reverb fade with subtle white noise sweep]
[VERSE 2]
Silent skies, a glowing dance,
[filter sweep low to high, gentle vinyl crackle]
Draw the dreamers in a trance,
[soft rising pad with delay]
Eyes reflect the endless space,
[echo with subtle pitch modulation]
In their gaze, the world’s embrace.
[delay sweep]
[PRE-CHORUS 2]
Hearts aligned with heaven's tune, (tune)
[vocal panning left-right with doubled harmony]
Time’s a circle in this view, (view)
[shimmer reverb with gentle tape stop effect]
Counting stars beneath the moon, (moon)
[background pad swell]
Night’s eternal rendezvous.
[fade out pads with subtle reverse swell]
[CHORUS]
(Repeat with added cymbal swells, vocal layering, and extra glitch effects)
[OUTRO]
So when you feel the stars above (above)
[reverse reverb echo with pitch rise on “above”]
Know they’re turning all with love (with love)
[volume fade with soft tape saturation]
And every night when eyes arise,
The world keeps spinning ‘neath the skies.
[ambient texture fade out with digital sparkle]

13a8d991-465c-4859-9656-1eacc168b968.name: Plastic Ocean (Variation)
13a8d991-465c-4859-9656-1eacc168b968.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[clean Fender Stratocaster — melodic riff in E minor, played with fingers, analog chorus (Roland CE-1 style), no pick attack, amp: Fender Deluxe Reverb, volume 4]
[bass: 1960s Fender Precision Bass, flatwound strings, played with fingers, slight tube overdrive, no effects, panned center]
[drums: Ludwig kit, coated Ambassador snare, kick drum with felt beater, no cymbals, no room mics — only close mics, 92 BPM]
[VERSE 1]
[male vocal: tenor, slightly nasal, breathy, recorded on Neumann U47, 15 cm from mouth, no pop filter, dry signal]
[no reverb, no delay, only light compression (LA-2A, 2:1 ratio)]
[double-tracked in chorus only]
She walks on billboards, ten feet tall,
her smile’s a weapon, her tears won’t fall.
You kiss the screen, you pay the cost—
another soul forever lost.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[vocals: slight opening of throat, more air, but no belting]
[guitar adds arpeggiated Em – C – G – D, still clean, chorus on]
The ocean’s blue but smells like rust…
another dream turned into dust.
[CHORUS]
[vocals: double-tracked — main center, harmony -5 semitones left]
[light plate reverb (EMT 140 emulation, 1.1s decay) added only on chorus]
[guitar strums full chords with palm mute, bass locks with kick on root notes]
PLASTIC OCEAN—
WHERE DREAMS GO TO DIE!
YOU SELL YOUR SOUL
FOR A PERFECT LIE!
THE SUN STILL SHINES
BUT CASTS NO LIGHT…
JUST SHADOWS
IN THE NEON NIGHT.
[VERSE 2]
[guitar back to riff, bass plays syncopated counter-melody (E – G – A – B)]
[vocals dry again, intimate, slight vocal fry on low notes]
Your children dream in pixel light,
while truth decays in broad daylight.
A golden cage with velvet walls—
and silence screaming through the malls.
[OUTRO]
[guitar riff repeats, bass holds low E]
[drums drop out after 8 bars]
[vocals whisper, dry, no processing:]
…just plastic.
[fade out with natural amp hum and tape hiss]

1d521ad6-440f-4e64-9880-9d0bf3f596e7.name: Brother Code (Concrete Rain)
1d521ad6-440f-4e64-9880-9d0bf3f596e7.sound: male baritone raw spoken-word English, waltz rhythm 98 BPM (3/4), found sounds only (rain concrete footsteps tram bell breath paper metal gate subway), analog tape effects (gritty saturation wow/flutter vinyl crackle tape echo), no melody no instruments no reverb no synths, theme: urban solitude moral code brotherhood silence in chaos, cold sensual post-Soviet noir atmosphere, structure: intro-verse-prechorus-chorus-outro
1d521ad6-440f-4e64-9880-9d0bf3f596e7.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[found sounds: distant tram bell, rain on corrugated metal, slow 3/4 footsteps on wet concrete, low-frequency hum of city at night]
[tape saturation gritty, vinyl crackle like static from old TV, light wow/flutter]
[VERSE]
I don’t carry a gun.
I carry silence.
It’s heavier.
The streets talk too much—
so I answer with my shadow.
[found sounds: jacket zipper pulled slow, breath in cold air, paper flyer sticks to wet shoe]
[tape echo on “shadow”, flutter on offbeats]
[PRE-CHORUS]
You asked what’s right?
Right is walking past the fight
and still knowing your name
when the rain washes the street clean.
[found sounds: bottle rolls on asphalt, distant dog barks, slow exhale]
[saturation deepens, vinyl pops mimic distant gunshots — implied, not literal]
[CHORUS]
No saints here.
Just men who stopped lying
to the mirror.
We don’t save the world—
we just keep it honest
for one more block.
[found sounds: rain intensifies, footsteps syncopated, metal gate creaks open then slams]
[tape echo repeats “block… lock…”, warped by flutter]
[OUTRO]
[found sounds: footsteps fade into subway rumble, rain thins, tape hiss rises, final breath held]
[tape slows, flutter deepens — cuts to silence as if power fails]

3bf7d1fd-00f2-4853-9eb5-8f91f9312f8a.name: Serenidad
3bf7d1fd-00f2-4853-9eb5-8f91f9312f8a.sound: ambient, meditation, healing, soft piano, flute, singing bowls, gentle synth pads, nature sounds
3bf7d1fd-00f2-4853-9eb5-8f91f9312f8a.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Soft light fills the quiet space,
Warm air moves, gentle pace.
Breathing in, let it go,
Open heart—peace starts to grow.
[Chorus]
Floating in calm light,
Breathing slow, breathing right.
Safe and warm inside,
Peace is here, nowhere to hide.
[Verse 2]
Waves and wind, a sacred sound,
Healing frequencies all around.
Echoes softly, time moves slow,
Deeper still, I let go.
[Chorus]
Floating in calm light,
Breathing slow, breathing right.
Safe and warm inside,
Peace is here, nowhere to hide.
[Bridge]
Every breath, I feel lighter,
Harmonies lift me higher.
Birdsong dances, bells ring true,
Nature guides me through and through.
[Chorus]
Floating in calm light,
Breathing slow, breathing right.
Safe and warm inside,
Peace is here, nowhere to hide.
[Rap]
Slow down, breathe in—feel the gentle flow,
Heartbeat syncing with the world below.
Alpha waves surround me, calm in every tone,
Soft piano, healing hum—the calm becomes my own.
Let the morning light embrace all I know,
Safe space within—let serenity show.
Breath and light, repeating—keep it slow,
Healing frequencies moving, letting all worries go.
[Chorus]
Floating in calm light,
Breathing slow, breathing right.
Safe and warm inside,
Peace is here, nowhere to hide.
[Outro]
Gentle air, soft and bright,
Held in warmth, calm light.
Relaxed and free, all is right,
Drifting softly through the night.

20f3af3c-90b1-4134-9431-3ab0c4b4b00b.name: Я здесь
20f3af3c-90b1-4134-9431-3ab0c4b4b00b.sound: Electronic, Soviet 80s rock, filtered female vocals, champagne clinks, 808s, cosmic, atmospheric
20f3af3c-90b1-4134-9431-3ab0c4b4b00b.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Далеко)
Руки в сторону
Я где-то тут
(Далеко)
[Verse]
Час назад
Всё как прежде
Я ищу
Не знаю, зачем
Ты здесь или
Я одна
Космос зовёт
Но нет сигнала
[Chorus]
Я здесь, я здесь, я здесь
Шепчу, я здесь
Снова, я здесь
В темноте я здесь
(Я здесь)
[Verse]
Бутылки хлоп
Свежо, не спится
Не привыкать
Пустой подъезд
Музыка — вены
Стены — ноты
Старая кассета
Мысли, всё те же
[Chorus]
Я здесь, я здесь, я здесь
Шепчу, я здесь
Снова, я здесь
В темноте я здесь
(Я здесь)
[Bridge]
19.5
В ушах шумит
Никто не слышит
Только ты
Я повторяю —
Я здесь
Я здесь, я здесь
[Chorus]
Я здесь, я здесь, я здесь
Шепчу, я здесь

(Я здесь)

Закрыты глаза
