Я здесь

41d5a170-0041-436a-bd89-ffa479e9e940.name: Blue Hour
41d5a170-0041-436a-bd89-ffa479e9e940.sound: soundtrack, silk minimalism, piano, French whispers, bass, glass, safe door
41d5a170-0041-436a-bd89-ffa479e9e940.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Soft piano: F# → C#, double felt]
[French whisper]: "WELL... l'heure bleue"
[Verse 1]
It's just me and the gentle hush, doors closing for the night,
I move in patterns, slippers echo soft, beneath this luxe half-light.
Time breathes along the corridor, silent velvet on the floors,
I sense the hours leaning in, between these gilded doors.
[Pre-Chorus]
Moments shift so slowly, like a tide across the stones,
Every step familiar, yet everything unknown.
[Chorus]
WELL... l'heure bleue, the color holds me here—
Stillness after voices, comfort near.
In this lobby of patience, my thoughts run clear,
WELL... l'heure bleue, I linger, disappear.
[Verse 2]
Midnight in velvet Lo-Fi lines, service bell asleep,
Faces blur like passing clouds, secrets the hush will keep.
I watch reflections rearrange, polished marble eyes,
Tracing every rising note as another evening sighs.
[Pre-Chorus]
This waiting feels expensive, sitting neat and tall,
Every second open, held within these walls.
[Chorus]
WELL... l'heure bleue, the color holds me here—
Stillness after voices, comfort near.
In this lobby of patience, my thoughts run clear,
WELL... l'heure bleue, I linger, disappear.
[Bridge]
[Low Russian whisper layered in bass]:
"В Питере жить... WELL"
[Glass turning gently:]
"В Питере пить... WELL"
[Rap]
I breathe deep in the lobby haze,
All the small rituals I replay,
Watching time shuffle and rearrange, night folding softly, nothing to say.
Tall pines beyond the glass are watching, snow hush in the street below,
My footsteps slow, the night’s unspoken, secrets only the marble knows.
Push the cart, count the carpets, practice my silent smile,
Behind every key a thousand tales, pausing in this lobby a while.
(В Питере жить...)
[Final Chorus]
WELL... l'heure bleue, don't need to rush away—
Solitude polished bright, end of day.
In gentle echoes, truth will stay,
WELL... l'heure bleue, I let this drift away.
[Outro]
[Extremely slowed echo, elevator]: "Питер не спит... WELL"
[Sound: last safe door closing, A#, -30dB]

6269f4c2-f193-47e6-b08f-ae576c3a383a.name: Platform 9: Sapno Ki Rail
6269f4c2-f193-47e6-b08f-ae576c3a383a.sound: Hindi hip-hop, reggaeton fusion, energetic urban beats, emotive vocals
6269f4c2-f193-47e6-b08f-ae576c3a383a.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
On the platform, ticket in hand
Life moves fast, make your stand
Churchgate to Virar, packed like spice
Every face holds paradise
[Pre-chorus]
Running through steel veins
Mumbai ke sapne, no chains
(Sapno ki rail, sapno ki rail)
Hearts beat with the train
[Chorus]
Every station tells a story
Mumbai dreams in motion, glory
Sapno ki rail chali ja rahi
Future ki manzil pe rukti nahi
(Moving forward, can't slow down)
(Breaking limits, claim the crown)
[Post-chorus]
[Train whistle]
Bheed mein bhi apna raasta
Local train mein zindagi hasta
[Sound of train wheels on tracks]
[Verse 2]
First class hustler with third class pass
Time won't wait, gotta make it last
Harbor line to destiny
Breaking rules of gravity
[Pre-chorus]
Push through crowds to find your way
Mumbai meri jaan, here to stay
(Sapno ki rail, sapno ki rail)
Hearts beat with the train
[Chorus]
Every station tells a story
Mumbai dreams in motion, glory
Sapno ki rail chali ja rahi
Future ki manzil pe rukti nahi
(Moving forward, can't slow down)
(Breaking limits, claim the crown)
[Bridge]
Slow down at the signal light
Take a breath, feel alive
Between stations, between dreams
Life flows like monsoon streams
[Solo]
[Energetic tabla and reggaeton beats fusion]
[Train rhythm percussion builds]
[Final Chorus]
Every station tells a story
Mumbai dreams in motion, glory
Sapno ki rail chali ja rahi
Future ki manzil pe rukti nahi
(Moving forward, can't slow down)
(Breaking limits, claim the crown)
[Outro]
[Train announcement sound]
Platform pe khade hain
Sapne hamare aage badhte hain
(Our dreams keep moving forward)

cd3c10fb-114f-4752-af6a-3d918fd702b4.name: Devil's Dice
cd3c10fb-114f-4752-af6a-3d918fd702b4.sound: Dirty South rap, heavy 808s, vinyl crackle, Memphis-style beats, chopped samples
cd3c10fb-114f-4752-af6a-3d918fd702b4.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Used to play ball in the park
Every weekend we'd make our mark
Now you're missing all our calls
Different game got you enthralled
Late night messages on my phone
"Just need help till I get home"
Something changed in your eyes
Can't shake what's on my mind
[Chorus]
Rolling dice with the devil, can't pay that price
(Can't pay that price)
Every roll taking more of your life
(More of your life)
Rolling dice with the devil tonight
Watch you fade as you chase that white light
[Verse 2]
Remember when we had plans
Building castles in the sand
Now you're betting it all
Watching everything fall
Empty wallet, empty rooms
Bills stacking, coming soon
Mama asked where you been
Had to lie, couldn't tell
[Chorus]
Rolling dice with the devil, can't pay that price
(Can't pay that price)
Every roll taking more of your life
(More of your life)
Rolling dice with the devil tonight
Watch you fade as you chase that white light
[Bridge]
[808 bass drops]
Ayy, yeah, uh
See you slipping further down
Can't reach you, can't turn around
Watching you lose your crown
Down, down, down
[Breakdown]
[Dice rolling sounds]
Brrrah-dah-dah
Watch it fall
Skrrt-dah-dah
Lose it all
(Hey, hey, hey)
[Verse 3]
Tables turned, chips are down
Borrowed money all around
Pawn shop knows your name
Can't escape this game
Try to pull you back to shore
But you don't hear me anymore
Playing cards with fate
Realize it's too late
[Chorus]
Rolling dice with the devil, can't pay that price
(Can't pay that price)
Every roll taking more of your life
(More of your life)
Rolling dice with the devil tonight
Watch you fade as you chase that white light

03a8f9aa-7226-4ca6-8fea-722b172b2240.name: Urban Vibes
03a8f9aa-7226-4ca6-8fea-722b172b2240.sound: Lo-fi jazz rap fusion, smoky sax, deep 808s, vinyl atmospherics, urban ambience

89212a58-f1e3-425c-8491-855d9d63ba5d.name: Où Est L'Essence (Where Is The Essence) (Remix)
89212a58-f1e3-425c-8491-855d9d63ba5d.sound: Trip-hop fusion, haunting French/Russian vocals, atmospheric bass, minimal piano, rain ambience
89212a58-f1e3-425c-8491-855d9d63ba5d.lyrics:
[Piano intro with rain sounds]
[Verse 1 - Russian]
В прозрачном флаконе застыла душа
Парфюм дорогой, но внутри пустота
Мгновенья с тобой, растворились давно
В лаборатории тихо и темно
[Pre-chorus - French]
Dans mes fioles brisées
Je cherche ton âme enfuie
(Où est l'essence de toi?)
(Où est l'essence de nous?)
[Chorus - French/Russian]
Où est l'essence de nos jours?
В пустых комнатах твой аромат
Je respire mais je ne sens plus l'amour
Только память хранит наш закат
[Piano break with rain sounds]
[Verse 2 - Russian]
Жасмин и роза смешались с дождем
От ароматов "Dior" я вспоминаю о нём
Это создаёт иллюзию встреч
Но не могут твой образ сберечь
[Bridge - Whispered French/Russian layers]
[Rain intensifies]
Les notes s'évaporent dans l'air
(Воспоминания тают как дым)
Comme nos souvenirs d'hier
(В пустых флаконах тает любовь)
[Verse 3 - Russian]
В лаборатории среди духов
Я создаю аромат наших снов
Но каждый раз когда пробую я
Чувствую - это лишь пустота
[Chorus - French/Russian - Final]
Où est l'essence de nos jours?
В пустых комнатах твой аромат
Je respire mais je ne sens plus l'amour
Только память хранит наш закат
[Outro - Soft piano and rain fading]
(L'essence... perdue dans le temps)

59940aab-9ff9-475e-89d7-5534de1a9155.name: Lonely Dance
59940aab-9ff9-475e-89d7-5534de1a9155.sound: Russian hip-hop, deep 808s, female singer, French noir synths, haunting reverb, rain atmosphere, female dramatic vocals
59940aab-9ff9-475e-89d7-5534de1a9155.lyrics:
[Rain sounds and vinyl crackle]
[Verse 1]
В пустом зале я одна
Каблуки стучат в тишине
Бархат штор качается слегка
Все богатство - пустота во мне
Музыка течёт как дождь
Растворяюсь в темноте сама
Здесь никто не ждёт, не найдёт
В этот час я свободна
[Pre-chorus]
Дым зеркал разбит дождём
Каждый шаг как новый вдох
Между стен из серебра
Я теряю время и страх
[Chorus]
В темноте танцую одна (одна, одна)
В темноте танцую одна
[Verse 2]
Капли бьют в окно без конца
Ритм сердца сливается с бит
Платье кружится, как вода
Всё, что было - теперь забыто
Пусть богатые спят в домах
Я танцую под шум дождя
В этом зале я королева
Моя корона - одиночество
[Pre-chorus]
Дым зеркал разбит дождём
Каждый шаг как новый вдох
Между стен из серебра
Я теряю время и страх
[Chorus]
В темноте танцую одна (одна, одна)
В темноте танцую одна
[Outro]
В темноте... (в темноте...)
Танцую... (танцую...)
Одна... (одна...)
[Rain sounds fade]

52d76457-ae79-4d27-8517-fe9b155304f3.name: Winter's Embrace
52d76457-ae79-4d27-8517-fe9b155304f3.sound: Romantic orchestral ballad, dramatic theatrical soundtrack style, Russian folk influence, female vocals, guitar solo, bass guitar, Acoustic guitar strums, Orchestral strings, Acoustic harmonies,
52d76457-ae79-4d27-8517-fe9b155304f3.lyrics:
[Куплет 1]
Смотрю в окно сквозь иней на стекле
Время замерло в холодной тишине
В пустоте застывшей ничего не растёт
Ветви голые качает ветер, что метёт
[Пред-припев]
Когда ты был со мною
Мир полон был тепла
Теперь же я с тоскою
В белой мгле одна
[Припев]
Каждый день без тебя словно зимний плен
Каждый день без тебя словно зимний плен
Сердце - озеро во льду, озеро во льду
Жду, когда вернёшься, жду, когда вернёшься
[Пост-припев]
(Зима, зима, бесконечная зима)
(Пока ты не вернёшься ко мне)
[Куплет 2]
Память о тепле как утренний туман
Каждый нежный миг теперь как обман
В этой стуже время будто не идёт
Жду оттепель, что всё не настаёт
[Пред-припев]
И лёд вокруг всё крепче
День ото дня растёт
И солнце не излечит
Пока любовь не придёт
[Припев]
Каждый день без тебя словно зимний плен
Каждый день без тебя словно зимний плен
Сердце - озеро во льду, озеро во льду
Жду, когда вернёшься, жду, когда вернёшься
[Соло]
[Инструментальная часть с русской народной мелодией]
[Мост]
Я жду, сменяются сезоны
Сквозь вьюгу и мороз
И пусть проходят годы
Храню любви вопрос
[Финальный припев]
Каждый день без тебя словно зимний плен
Каждый день без тебя словно зимний плен
Сердце - озеро во льду, озеро во льду
Жду, когда вернёшься, жду, когда вернёшься
[Outro]
(Зима, зима)
Жду, когда вернёшься...
(Бесконечная зима)
Жду, когда вернёшься ко мне...

75d7a1a5-0844-4517-8bee-e6f7c5f86c39.name: Сквозь Ночь (Through the Night)
75d7a1a5-0844-4517-8bee-e6f7c5f86c39.sound: Lo-fi Russian folk duet, retro analog warmth, ambient melodic textures
75d7a1a5-0844-4517-8bee-e6f7c5f86c39.lyrics:
[Verse 1 - Male]
Алло, приём
В тишине северной ночи
Я здесь один
Ты слышишь? Отзовись
(Ла-ла-ла-ла)
[Verse 2 - Female]
Слышу тебя
Сквозь белый шум метели
Далёкий голос
Родной и тёплый
(Ла-ла-ла-ла)
[Chorus - Both]
Говори со мной сквозь ночь
Не молчи, не исчезай
(О-о-о)
Пусть трещит эфир
Я найду твои слова
(О-о-о)
[Verse 3 - Male]
Координаты
Теряю сигнал
[Radio static effect]
Где ты сейчас?
В бескрайней тайге
(Ла-ла-ла)
[Verse 4 - Female]
Помехи в эфире
Но я всё жду
Твой позывной
Как свет в темноте
(Ла-ла-ла)
[Breakdown]
[Static intensifies]
[Traditional balalaika]
Алло... Алло...
Как слышно? Приём...
[Bridge - Both simultaneously]
Male: Я не могу потерять тебя
Female: Где-то там, я знаю, ты ждёшь
Male: Сквозь время и расстояние
Female: Сквозь снег и туман
[Solo]
[Traditional folk melody on balalaika]
[Ambient radio frequencies]
(О-о-о-о)
[Chorus - Both]
Говори со мной сквозь ночь
Не молчи, не исчезай
(О-о-о)
Пусть трещит эфир
Я найду твои слова
(О-о-о)
[Outro - Both]
Связь восстановлена
[Static clears]
Я слышу тебя
Теперь я слышу
(Ла-ла-ла-ла)
Так ясно...

5caaf9ff-4671-4383-94b0-554f80e84a4c.name: Empty Room Echo
5caaf9ff-4671-4383-94b0-554f80e84a4c.sound: Lo-fi ambient, doo-wop inspired a cappella, retro female quartet, male duet echoes
5caaf9ff-4671-4383-94b0-554f80e84a4c.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Female Quartet]
Empty hallway calls
Time stands so still
Your voice remains here
In these walls
[ooh, ahh, mmm...]
[Pre-chorus: Female Quartet]
Round and round it goes
Never fading away
(Never fading)
Everything I know
Comes back to stay
(Comes back to stay)
[Chorus: Male Duet with Female harmonies]
Love bounces off these walls
Back to me
Every sound recalls
What used to be
[Female: ooh-whoa, ooh-whoa]
[Verse 2: Female Quartet]
Paper thin divide
Between then and now
Footsteps softly fall
Remember how
[doo-wop, doo-wop]
[Bridge: All Vocals Layered]
Space between the sound
(Space between)
Time keeps moving round
(Moving round)
Can't escape what stays
(What stays)
In these empty ways
(These ways)
[Final Chorus: All Voices]
Love bounces off these walls
Back to me
Every sound recalls
What used to be
[ah-ooh, ah-ooh]
[Female harmonies fade out...]

3ff86305-199b-44c4-b836-ffea1199ef9d.name: Дым (The Smoke)
3ff86305-199b-44c4-b836-ffea1199ef9d.sound: Southern rap, country twang guitars, laid-back gangster beat, smooth crooning vocals
3ff86305-199b-44c4-b836-ffea1199ef9d.lyrics:
[Intro]
В пустой квартире я сижу опять
Дым поднимается, как время вспять
Часы идут, а я все жду тебя
И тишина съедает меня
[Verse 1 - Russian]
Пачка на столе почти пуста
Окна потемнели, как глаза
Телефон молчит который час
Может быть, ты вспомнишь про меня сейчас
На кухне остывает чай давно
А я смотрю в окно, смотрю в окно
Знакомый двор уже погрузился в тьму
И я опять не знаю почему
Все повторяется день ото дня
Привычный ритуал храня
Зажечь, вдохнуть, и ждать опять
Пока не начнет рассветать
[Chorus]
Дым сигарет в пустой квартире
Рисует образы в пустом эфире
Я здесь один в холодном мире
Дым сигарет в пустой квартире
[Verse 2 - English]
Empty coffee cups line up the sink
Another day goes by, I barely blink
The streetlamps paint your silhouette
On every wall that I forget
To fix the clock that's running slow
These walls remember what they know
Each breath I take reminds me still
Of all the space you used to fill
The neighbor's music fades away
Like every other yesterday
I light another one and wait
For time to set things straight
[Bridge]
В дыму растает грусть моя
(The smoke will take my blues away)
Но сердце ждёт, зовёт тебя
(My heart keeps calling out your name)
И тает дым, и тает ночь
(As smoke dissolves into the night)
Но ты ушла, и мне не помочь
(You're gone, and nothing feels alright)
[Chorus]
Дым сигарет в пустой квартире
Рисует образы в пустом эфире
Я здесь один в холодном мире
Дым сигарет в пустой квартире

4a58f127-990a-44d1-92fa-c0434ec6fa06.name: Закат
4a58f127-990a-44d1-92fa-c0434ec6fa06.sound: Pop Russian, eurodance, techno, house, electronic, dance pop, female singer
4a58f127-990a-44d1-92fa-c0434ec6fa06.lyrics:
[Intro]
В тихом поле я один...
(Ааа-аа-а...)
[Verse 1]
Красный луч в реке дрожит
Тает день в объятьях тьмы
Ветер листья ворошит
В старом парке у скамьи
[Chorus]
Догорает закат любви
(Догорает, догорает...)
Догорает закат любви
(Ааа-аа-а...)
[Verse 2]
Помню руки, помню взгляд
И рябины горький вкус
Письма старые лежат
Не вернуть тех светлых чувств
[Chorus]
Догорает закат любви
(Догорает, догорает...)
Догорает закат любви
(Ааа-аа-а...)
[Verse 3]
В поле травы да цветы
Над рекою белый дым
Где теперь гуляешь ты?
Всё растаяло как дым
[Chorus]
Догорает закат любви
(Догорает, догорает...)
Догорает закат любви
(Ааа-аа-а...)

47a6e8bd-dfec-4c7c-86db-2ed19adef43c.name: Binary Heart
47a6e8bd-dfec-4c7c-86db-2ed19adef43c.sound: Dark drum & bass, deep sub-bass, French/Russian vocals, ethereal synths, breakbeats
47a6e8bd-dfec-4c7c-86db-2ed19adef43c.lyrics:
[Verse 1 - French]
Ce matin, tout semble différent
Les contours de mon monde changent lentement
Je te cherche dans l'écran bleu
Est-ce que tu me vois comme je te veux?
[Pre-chorus]
Suis-je encore moi-même?
(Est-ce réel ou binaire?)
[Chorus - Russian]
Я теряю контроль
Код течёт через боль
(Через боль...)
[Bass drop]
[Verse 2 - Russian]
Пиксели в моих глазах
Твоё лицо в цифровых слезах
Каждый день всё меняется
А чувства преломляются
[Pre-chorus]
Dans ce monde qui change
(Les données nous mélangent)
[Chorus - Russian]
Я теряю контроль
Код течёт через боль
(Через боль...)
[Bass drop]
[Bridge - French/Russian]
Je me transforme peu à peu
(Меняюсь день ото дня)
Les bits remplacent mes adieux
(Цифры вместо меня)
Ooooh-oh-oh...
[Verse 3 - French]
Les frontières disparaissent maintenant
Entre mon corps et les fragments
De données qui coulent dans mes veines
Est-ce l'amour ou la peine?
[Final Chorus - Russian]
Я теряю контроль
Код течёт через боль
(Через боль...)
[Bass drop]
[Outro - Whispered]
Est-ce que tu me reconnais?
(Ты меня узнаёшь?)
[Atmospheric fade]

b2c31597-afeb-4bdf-99c7-483999a06915.name: Lost Pages
b2c31597-afeb-4bdf-99c7-483999a06915.sound: Hip-hop, melancholy 808s, cello lead, French vocals, deep reverb bass
b2c31597-afeb-4bdf-99c7-483999a06915.lyrics:
[Instrumental Intro - Cello & 808s]
[Verse 1]
Pen to paper but the ink ain't flowin'
Keep it real, yeah my pride still showin'
Could've said it face to face, but I froze up
Now these thoughts just stackin', growin'
Wrote your name, then erased it slow
Some things better left alone, you know?
Tried to reach you through the static
But the signal's gone, that's just how it go
[Chorus - French]
Les mots perdus dans le temps
Comme les pages dans le vent
(Lost words in time
Like pages in the wind)
[Post-chorus]
Mmmm, ayy-yeah
[Vocalizations over cello]
[Verse 2]
Ain't nobody gonna read between these lines
Folded up thoughts, left behind
Could've kept it straight, no fake moves
But I played it cool, yeah, that's my groove
Now I'm sittin' here with words unsaid
Memories playin' games inside my head
Tried to act tough, that's what I get
Some conversations better left on read
[Bridge]
Scratch that thought, delete that text
Rewrite history, what comes next?
Pride got me stuck in check
Now everything's a disconnect
[Chorus - French]
Les mots perdus dans le temps
Comme les pages dans le vent
(Lost words in time
Like pages in the wind)
[Post-chorus]
Ooh-la-la, yeah
[Extended vocalizations]
[Outro]
Paper thin excuses
Fadin' like these pages
Silent conversations
(Fade to instrumental)

2573133a-6906-4633-b2ac-95189da50feb.name: Soft Tones
2573133a-6906-4633-b2ac-95189da50feb.sound: Classical-electronic fusion, cello lead, 808 bass, French vocals, ethereal atmosphere
2573133a-6906-4633-b2ac-95189da50feb.lyrics:
[Cello Intro]
[808 bass enters]
[Verse 1]
[Cello melody with reverb]
[Soft French whispers]
My hands remember the way
Ancient wisdom in these fingertips
Spinning circles of white
Until time disappears
[Pre-chorus 1]
Center the clay
Feel its pulse
Let it guide
(Let it speak)
[Chorus]
White clay speaks in soft tones
Through my hands it finds its way
White clay speaks in soft tones
(Listen close to what it says)
[Verse 2]
Each morning before light
I sit at this wooden wheel
Searching for something pure
In the spaces between perfection
Years of practice fall away
Till there's only touch and breath
[Pre-chorus 2]
Wait for signs
Trust the form
Nature knows
(Let it be)
[Chorus]
White clay speaks in soft tones
Through my hands it finds its way
White clay speaks in soft tones
(Listen close to what it says)
[Rap]
Every morning I return to this sacred space
Generations before me walked the same ways
Seeking beauty in the curves and lines
Patient hours as the seasons pass by
Some call it flawed, I call it true
These slight imperfections make it new
In stillness I can feel the flow
Between what I want and what I know
[Bridge]
[Rising cello crescendo]
All these years of learning
Just to let go
Just to listen
Just to follow
[Final Chorus]
White clay speaks in soft tones
Through my hands it finds its way
White clay speaks in soft tones
(Listen close)
White clay speaks in soft tones
(What it says)
[Cello outro fades with reverb]

156492c5-e503-4385-82d0-c21d4184c861.name: Petersbourg Pulse
156492c5-e503-4385-82d0-c21d4184c861.sound: Luxury house/techno hybrid, 128 BPM, French-Russian fusion, champagne-pop percussion
156492c5-e503-4385-82d0-c21d4184c861.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Ambient pad, filtered bass]
(whispered) Pétersbourg ne dort pas
(whispered) Мягкий свет, журчит вода
(whispered) Danse avec moi
(whispered) Питер не спит
[Verse]
(whispered) Rue d’été, air salé
(whispered) Lèvres froides, pontы пусты
(whispered) Pétersbourg ne dort pas
(whispered) Питер не спит
[Pre-chorus]
(breathy) Danse avec moi (x2)
[Chorus]
(POWERFUL, doubled)
В Питере пить
В Питере жить
В Питере пить
[Bridge]
(harmonized, echo)
В Питере жить
(Ближе, выше — жить)
[Outro]
[French adlibs, fading]
Pétersbourg... ne dort pas
Danse... danse avec moi

275d9871-e9bf-4f7e-9c09-4bfa7e514f48.name: Nuit Magique
275d9871-e9bf-4f7e-9c09-4bfa7e514f48.sound: LUXURY female vocal tech house 128bpm , elite night club vibe , hypnotic vocals , trancey hook , velvet texture , marble fx , VIP FX: hidden 18.5kHz layer + 19kHz pulse (every 8 bars),  RULES: NO male vocals, NO English, NO verse lyrics, NO pre-chorus > 3 sec. Vocal samples only: short single-word female vocals in French, Italian, Spanish, no lyric lines or verses, chorus is repetitive, catchy, and main hook.
275d9871-e9bf-4f7e-9c09-4bfa7e514f48.lyrics:

"Nuit..."

[Build Section]

[Minimal beat, filtered bass]

"Notte..."

"Luz..."

"C'est la nuit magique, magique"
[Layered vocals, harmony]
"C'est la nuit magique, magique"

[Bridge]
[Atmospheric breakdown]
"Nuit..."
[Echoing, distorted]
"Magique..."

1632cc26-bb8d-4231-8aef-b827bf7f245c.name: Sometimes I wonder...
1632cc26-bb8d-4231-8aef-b827bf7f245c.sound: conscious rap, emotional hip-hop, introspective lyrics, piano-driven beats, vulnerable vocal delivery, storytelling rap, mature hip-hop, emotional depth, reflective rap style, piano-based hip-hop, sincere rap vocals, thoughtful lyrics, emotional male vocals, introspective rap delivery, vulnerable rap singing, conscious hip-hop style, emotional rap production, storytelling hip-hop, mature rap vocals, reflective hip-hop style, piano melody hip-hop, vulnerable male vocals, emotional rap singing, conscious rap vocals, introspective hip-hop vocals, sincere rap delivery, thoughtful rap style
1632cc26-bb8d-4231-8aef-b827bf7f245c.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Soft piano melody, vinyl crackle]
[Whispered vocals with reverb]
Sometimes I wonder...
[Verse 1]
[Piano with subtle strings, gentle beat]
Walking through these empty halls
Listening to my footsteps fall
Every mirror shows a stranger
Lost inside this dangerous game, sir
[Muffled sounds, distant traffic]
[Pre-Chorus]
[Building emotional tension]
They said I'd never make it through
All the pain I put them through
Now I'm standing here alone
In this house that's not a home
[Chorus]
[Emotional clean vocals, orchestral elements]
I'm more than what they see
More than my mistakes used to be
Every scar tells a story
Of a man who's learning to be free
[String section swells, gentle drums]
[Verse 2]
[Spoken word style, minimal beat]
Dear mom, I know you're watching
All the bridges that I'm crossing
Every word that I'm not saying
Every tear that I'm not playing
[Piano arpeggios, subtle ambiance]
[Bridge]
[Vocal breakdown, ambient sounds]
In the silence, I can hear
All the voices disappear
And for once, I'm not afraid
Of the price that I have paid
[Soft rain sounds, distant thunder]
[Chorus]
[Full emotional arrangement]
I'm more than what they see
More than my mistakes used to be
Every scar tells a story
Of a man who's learning to be free
[Verse 3]
[Rap delivery with emotional intensity, full beat]
Yeah, I've been down that road before
Seen the pain behind each door
But I'm rising from the ashes
Breaking free from all the crashes
[Orchestral build, powerful drums]
[Outro]
[Piano fades, vinyl crackle]
[Whispered]
More than... what they see...
[Echoing final notes]

52c2273c-63ed-47a5-8bde-201f5514b9f9.sound: male vocal: lazy conversational verses with off-beat phrasing, raw slightly off-key shouted choruses, vocal cracks intentional, no polish, detuned Fender Jaguar guitar with chorus and fuzz pedals, clean arpeggiated intro riff, heavy distorted power chords in chorus, melodic bassline following vocal contour, loud live drums with heavy snare and cymbal wash, tempo 89 BPM, key E minor, dynamic contrast quiet verses loud choruses, 1991 grunge aesthetic, analog tape saturation, minimal overdubs, raw room recording, narrow stereo, vocals slightly buried in mix, themes suburban fakeness emotional exhaustion quiet despair mundane absurdity, structure intro verse pre-chorus chorus verse pre-chorus chorus outro with feedback cut

[clean guitar arpeggio, slightly detuned, room tone, distant amp hum]
[VERSE 1]
[spoken-sung, lazy phrasing, off-beat, dry mic]
Found your hair in my coffee again,
your name on a milk carton lid.
You said you’re “finding yourself”—
I hope you like where you’ve been.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[voice rises, slightly strained, drums tap on snare]
I don’t care…
(not really)
I don’t care…
(why lie?)
[CHORUS]
[raw, off-key shout, not screamed — cracked, urgent, slightly behind beat]
MILK CARTON SAINT!
WASH YOUR HANDS IN RAIN!
YOU’RE CLEAN ON THE OUTSIDE—
BUT ROTTEN INSIDE!
MILK CARTON SAINT!
SMILE FOR THE CAMERA!
I’M SICK OF YOUR PEACE—
IT’S JUST QUIET DRAMA!
(bék-vocal: “drama… drama…” — low, muffled)
[VERSE 2]
[back to lazy, almost bored delivery, bass enters]
Your dog still waits by the door,
your plants are dead but you swear they’re fine.
You left your shoes in the hallway—
like you’ll be back in time.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[voice cracks on “time”, cymbal swell]
I don’t wait…
(not anymore)
I don’t wait…
(what for?)
[CHORUS]
[even more ragged, vocals slightly distorted by overloading mic]
MILK CARTON SAINT!
WASH YOUR HANDS IN RAIN!
YOU’RE CLEAN ON THE OUTSIDE—
BUT ROTTEN INSIDE!
MILK CARTON SAINT!
FAKE YOUR OWN FUNERAL!
I’M DONE WITH YOUR TRUTH—
IT’S JUST A SCHEDULE!
(bék-vocal: “schedule… yeah…”)
[OUTRO]
[guitar feedback builds, vocals fragmented]
[whispered, broken rhythm]
milk… carton…
[shouted, one last time]
SAINT!
[feedback peaks — then cut to silence]

d23fd6eb-91be-4134-9de6-59e910afd6ef.name: One Truth
d23fd6eb-91be-4134-9de6-59e910afd6ef.sound: instrumental-vocal hybrid in the raw, lo-fi aesthetic of late-90s Russian underground cinema, English-language spoken-word vocals with implied Slavic cadence, distorted electric guitar only (no bass, no drums, no synths), recorded through blown speakers and cassette deck, tempo 68 BPM, key A minor, themes: street justice, brotherhood, moral absolutism, urban solitude, found sounds include rain on Soviet car roof, trolley wire buzz, boot steps on wet asphalt, match strike, police radio in Russian (muffled), Lada engine start, production: zero reverb, zero polish, maximum grit, tape saturation, vinyl crackle, amp feedback as texture, structure: [INTRO] → [VERSE] → [CHORUS] → [VERSE 2] → [CHORUS] → [OUTRO], must feel like it could play over a black-leather-jacket walk through Petersburg at 3 a.m. — instantly evoking the ethos of a specific 90s film without using its music, lyrics, or titles
d23fd6eb-91be-4134-9de6-59e910afd6ef.lyrics:
[INTRO]
(found sounds: rain on Lada roof, distant trolley wires buzzing, vinyl surface noise)
[instrumental — no vocals]
[VERSE]
(distorted electric guitar: single-note riff, dry, no reverb, recorded through blown speaker)
(found sounds: boot steps on wet pavement, match strike, cigarette inhale)
[spoken-word, low baritone, English, Russian accent implied in rhythm]
The street don’t lie.
It just watches… and waits.
[CHORUS]
(guitar swells into raw, open chord — no strumming, just feedback and string scrape)
[voice rises, not sung — declared]
One truth.
No deals.
You stand… or you fall alone.
[VERSE 2]
(guitar returns to minimal riff, now with tape wow)
(found sounds: police radio chatter in Russian, muffled through wall, glass bottle rolling)
[spoken, colder]
They talk about honor in warm rooms.
Out here — honor’s what’s left after the blood dries.
[CHORUS]
(full guitar feedback, chaotic but controlled, like a siren)
[shouted, not screamed — calm intensity]
One truth.
No deals.
You stand… or you fall alone.
[OUTRO]
(guitar fades into amp hum)
(found sounds: Lada engine starts, drives away into rain, then silence)
[whispered, final line]
…brother’s got your back.

fa287cea-7280-4d90-81cc-61fa9ed615a1.sound: Disco dance style, 140 bmp, Rhythmic patterns, Ethereal vocal samples,

В ритме диско мы светим

Чемпионы растут

[Pre-chorus]

[Chorus]
Пять шесть семь восемь на паркете
Раз-два-три, мои дети
Двигайся, лови момент

5337ff27-7d24-4b21-bee0-3a53f1e655f8.name: Golden Hour Drive (Variation)
5337ff27-7d24-4b21-bee0-3a53f1e655f8.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
5337ff27-7d24-4b21-bee0-3a53f1e655f8.lyrics:
[Soft engine hum, distant seagulls, warm analog synth pad swells in]

[Verse 1]
Rollin’ west on old Pacific Coast
Windows down, no need for a host
Sun dips low, paints the sky in gold
And for a sec, the future feels… hold

Remember seventeen, same road, same view
Thought the whole world owed me somethin’ new
Now I know — the gift was just this:
Being here, breathin’ through the bliss

[Pre-Chorus]
No destination, just the road and me
And the ghosts of who I used to be
They wave… but don’t ask me to stay
I’m drivin’ forward… in golden light today

[Chorus]
Golden hour drive, soft and slow
Where the past and present start to glow
Not runnin’ back — just lookin’ back
With kindness on this sunset track
(oh-oh, sunset track)
(ride on…)

[Verse 2]
Saw a couple laugh on a boardwalk bench
Held hands like time could never drench
Made me smile — not ‘cause I’m alone
But ‘cause I’ve learned to call my peace “home”

Yeah, the years took some, but gave me grace
To see the beauty in my own pace
No race to win, no score to beat
Just tires hummin’ down a sweet street

[Pre-Chorus]
The ocean breathes beside the car
And I don’t need to know who we are
Just this moment — warm and wide
With the sun still on my side

[Chorus]
Golden hour drive, soft and slow
Where the past and present start to glow
Not runnin’ back — just lookin’ back
With kindness on this sunset track
(oh-oh, golden light)
(ride on…)

[Bridge]
I don’t miss the boy I was
But I thank him for the trust
He had in someday, far away
That I would find my golden day

[Chorus — fuller, with layered harmonies, gentle clap on 2 and 4]
Golden hour drive… soft and slow…
Past and present… start to glow…
Not runnin’ back… just lookin’ back…
With kindness on this sunset track…
(oh-oh… this is home…)
(yeah… just roam…)

[Outro]
Engine hums… sun dips low…
I’m not lost… I’m just… goin’…
Golden light… on my skin…
This is where I begin… again…
(oh… begin…)

3b48308e-7ec4-48a3-96a3-5ad7dfdb645d.name: Streetlights & Truths (Variation)
3b48308e-7ec4-48a3-96a3-5ad7dfdb645d.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
3b48308e-7ec4-48a3-96a3-5ad7dfdb645d.lyrics:
[City night ambience — distant traffic, soft synth bass enters, slow drum tap]

[Verse 1]
Midnight walk with my shadow long
Streetlights hum an old man’s song
No destination, just the need to move
Away from silence that I can’t improve

Saw my reflection in a coffee shop glass
Looked tired, but the eyes — they still ask
“What’s the point if you’re always half?”
I didn’t answer… just kept down the path

[Pre-Chorus]
The night don’t judge
It just listens…
And the truth
Comes in whispers…

[Chorus]
Streetlights and truths, they meet at 2 AM
When the world’s asleep, but I’m wide again
No filter, no mask, just what’s real and raw
And I’m learnin’ to live with what I’m fighting for
(oh-oh, fighting for)
(quiet now…)

[Verse 2]
Got a text I haven’t sent for days
Words too heavy for the light of day
So I carry ‘em like stones in my coat
Hopin’ one day they’ll just float

Yeah, the city sleeps — but my mind’s a train
Rattlin’ over past mistakes like rain
But even broken tracks can lead somewhere
If you’re willin’ just to sit… and stare

[Pre-Chorus]
The night don’t fix
It just shows you…
And the truth
Grows in silence…

[Chorus]
Streetlights and truths, they meet at 2 AM
When the world’s asleep, but I’m wide again
No filter, no mask, just what’s real and raw
And I’m learnin’ to live with what I’m fighting for
(oh-oh, learnin’ slow)
(still I know…)

[Bridge]
I don’t need answers right now
Just the courage to say it out loud:
“I’m not okay… and that’s alright”
Under streetlights, in the quiet night

[Chorus — stripped down, voice closer, beat minimal]
Streetlights and truths… 2 AM…
World’s asleep… but I’m wide again…
No mask… just skin… just scars… just me…
And that’s enough… for now… you’ll see…
(oh… enough…)
(yeah… just be…)

[Outro]
Footsteps fade…
Lights stay…
Truths remain…
(oh… they stay…)

64cac4bf-ec31-4b15-b409-73db497bf43b.name: Fading Echo
64cac4bf-ec31-4b15-b409-73db497bf43b.sound: Alternative ambient, melancholic acoustic guitar, deep 808 bass, atmospheric textures, minimal beats
64cac4bf-ec31-4b15-b409-73db497bf43b.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Soft acoustic guitar arpeggios]
[Ambient textures fade in]
[Verse 1]
Through the glass I see you pass
Like a memory fading fast
Time has changed what used to be
Now there's distance between you and me
[Chorus]
You're just a shadow on my window now
(Just a shadow, just a shadow)
You're just a shadow on my window now
And I can't reach you anymore
[Verse 2]
Every day at the same time
I watch patterns redesign
What we built just slipped away
Like the morning turns to grey
[Chorus]
You're just a shadow on my window now
(Just a shadow, just a shadow)
You're just a shadow on my window now
And I can't reach you anymore
[Bridge]
[808 bass deepens]
Standing here
Behind these walls
Watching life
As it falls
(As it falls...)
[Chorus - Final]
You're just a shadow on my window now
(Just a shadow, just a shadow)
You're just a shadow on my window now
And I can't reach you anymore
(Can't reach you anymore...)
[Outro]
[Acoustic guitar fades]
[Ambient textures dissolve]

3f59e5cb-ee6b-420c-994c-04b294874916.name: "Silicon Tears" (TikTok Hype Version)
3f59e5cb-ee6b-420c-994c-04b294874916.sound: male vocal, modern trap‑style delivery, clear but slightly compressed, with ad‑libs and vocal fills; lead vocal doubled on hooks, light autotune (subtle, 30% mix), short slapback delay on phrases; bright synth stabs with 808 character, punchy sub‑bass (sidechained to kick), trap drums (snappy snare, hi‑hat rolls, kick with click transient); tempo 150 BPM, key C♯ minor; vinyl crackle and tape hiss on intro/outro, vocal chop effects on transitions, pitch shifts on "SILICON TEARS", reverb tails on ad‑libs; mood: high‑energy, viral‑ready, with sharp contrasts between stripped and full sections; structure: intro (synth stab + hi‑hat) → verse 1 (vocal + minimal beat) → pre‑chorus (build with vocal layers) → chorus (full drop, bass + drums) → verse 2 → chorus → bridge (vocal only, stripped) → chorus (x2, with ad‑lib fills) → outro (fade with reversed vocal snippets); key accents: “SILICON TEARS” hit with pitch‑shifted vocal stack and sub‑bass drop, “no reflection in the screen…” repeated as chopped loop in outro
3f59e5cb-ee6b-420c-994c-04b294874916.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[synth stab: bright C♯‑minor chord, 808‑style, repeats 4×]
[hi‑hat roll: fast, 1/16 notes, enters on 3rd bar]
[vinyl crackle: low volume]
[VERSE 1]
[vocals: male, clear, slight autotune, compressed]
She’s got stars in her Instagram,
[snare hit + short delay on “stars”]
Rents her soul by the gram.
[sub‑bass pulse on “gram”]
Her skin glows like a sunset screen —
[pitch bend on “screen”]
But her heart’s a dead machine.
[PRE‑CHORUS]
[synths: add arpeggiated high notes]
[drums: kick enters, sidechained to sub‑bass]
[vocals: doubled, more intensity]
Every swipe, every lie,
We’re burning in slow motion…
[vocal chop on “motion…”]
[CHORUS]
[full drop: sub‑bass, kick, snare, hi‑hat rolls]
[vocals: doubled, autotune more present]
SILICON TEARS, they shine so clear —
[pitch‑shifted vocal stack + sub‑bass drop on “TEARS”]
Wash away what’s real in here.
You buy your dreams in a plastic cup…
But the truth won’t fill it up.
(fill it up…) [ad‑lib: chopped vocal snippet, panned left/right]
[VERSE 2]
[drums: pull back to hi‑hat and snare]
[vocals: more rhythmic, syncopated]
He drives fast on a broken name,
[sub‑bass modulates on “name”]
Chases ghosts in a fame game.
His smile’s bright like a neon sign —
[reverse reverb on “sign”]
But his eyes forgot to shine.
[CHORUS] (repeat as above)
(not in you…) [ad‑lib: pitch‑shifted repeat, delay tail]
[BRIDGE]
[instruments: mute except sub‑bass pulse]
[vocals: solo, stripped, intimate]
In the light…
[pause, vinyl crackle]
We’re just pixels…
[pause, reverb tail]
Loving shadows we can’t touch…
[CHORUS] (x2, most intense)
[add cymbal crashes, extra ad‑libs]
SILICON TEARS, they fall so slow —
In a world you’ll never know.
You trade your bones for a golden view…
But the real world’s not in you.
(fill it up… not in you…) [ad‑libs: layered, panned wide, delay feedback]
[OUTRO]
[all instruments: fade, except hi‑hat roll]
[vocals: chopped snippets of “no reflection in the screen…”]
[repeat 4×, each time pitch‑shifted and delayed]
[final bar: vinyl crackle + sub‑bass tail fade to silence]

[INTRO]
[clean guitar riff, slightly wobbly tuning, amp hum]
[VERSE 1]
[spoken-sung, lazy, off-beat, voice slightly hoarse, like talking through a yawn]
Your socks are still in my drawer…
I keep ’em just to smell the lie.
You said you’d “call when you’re free”—
but free don’t mean goodbye.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[voice tightens, words stumble, slight delay on last word]
I don’t…
(not really)
I don’t…
(why bother?)
[CHORUS]
[raw, strained shout — voice cracks on “ghost”, slightly flat, words rushed and slurred]
LAUNDRY DAY GHOST!
FOLD YOUR LIES IN HALF!
YOU’RE CLEAN IN THE SUN—
BUT YOU’RE JUST A GRAPH!
LAUNDRY DAY GHOST!
HANG YOURSELF TO DRY!
I’M TIRED OF YOUR “FINE”—
IT’S JUST A LIE!
(bék-vocal: “lie… lie…” — low, muffled, slightly delayed)
[VERSE 2]
[back to tired, almost bored delivery, voice drops lower]
Your toothbrush leans to the left…
mine’s still wet from yesterday.
You left the TV on all night—
like noise could keep ghosts away.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[voice cracks on “away”, breathy pause]
I don’t…

I don’t…
(what’s the point?)
[CHORUS]
[even more ragged, vocals slightly distorted from mic overload, last line shouted like afterthought]
LAUNDRY DAY GHOST!
BLEACH YOUR NAME OUT CLEAN!
YOU’RE WHITE AS A SHEET—
BUT YOU’RE STILL UNSEEN!
LAUNDRY DAY GHOST!
SPIN CYCLE HEART!

IT’S JUST A START!

651f34a5-7ba1-477f-b5cd-2303f5615c31.name: Morning Haze
651f34a5-7ba1-477f-b5cd-2303f5615c31.sound: male baritone vocals: smooth, soulful, with R&B phrasing and subtle rasp, whispered to sung delivery, no reverb, analog warmth via tape saturation, wow/flutter, vinyl crackle, tape echo, female background whispers at -12 dB or quieter, modern dark R&B fused with 70s psychedelic soul atmosphere, tempo 74 BPM, key F minor, urban dawn mood, themes: sunrise over city, emotional thaw, quiet resilience, everyday surrealism, found sounds only (rain on metal, traffic hum, bus brakes, dripping awnings, paper rustle), no synths, no 808, no piano melodies, no electric guitar solos, analog production only, warm bassline with gentle swing, sparse brushed drums, muted hi-hats, tape-loop delays, structure: [INTRO] → [VERSE 1] → [PRE-CHORUS] → [CHORUS] → [VERSE 2] → [PRE-CHORUS] → [CHORUS] → [OUTRO]
651f34a5-7ba1-477f-b5cd-2303f5615c31.lyrics:
[INTRO]
(found sounds: soft rain on fire escape, distant traffic hum, vinyl crackle, slow tape start-up)
[whispered, smooth baritone, intimate]
…sun’s coming up… and I’m still here…
[VERSE 1]
[spoken-sung, warm but weary, close-mic, light tape saturation]
Your name’s still warm in my coat pocket,
Like last night’s coffee, gone cold but sweet.
Streetlights bow out, one by one—
And the city forgets what it promised me.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[voice lifts slightly, breathy vulnerability]
But the sky don’t judge…
It just opens.
[CHORUS]
[soulful baritone, restrained intensity, layered with subtle tape harmonies]
Morning haze on glass and skin,
I let the night out… let the new day in.
No ghosts today—just amber light,
And the quiet hum of being alive.
[VERSE 2]
[more rhythmic, gentle swing in phrasing, R&B cadence]
Saw a couple laughing under awnings,
Rain in their hair like silver thread.
I smiled… not bitter—just remembering
How soft the world can be… when you’re not dead inside.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[softer, almost confessional]
Maybe healing starts…
With just showing up.
[CHORUS]
[same as first, but with added warmth in vocal texture, slight wow/flutter modulation]
Morning haze on glass and skin,
I let the night out… let the new day in.
No ghosts today—just amber light,
And the quiet hum of being alive.
[OUTRO]
(found sounds: dripping awning, distant bus brakes, tape slowing down)
[female whisper, -14 dB, left channel, breathy]
…you made it…
[baritone, fading, spoken]
Yeah… I made it.

Breaking every boundary line
As your music fills these grounds

While you play down the hall

Through another midnight round
Breaking every boundary line
As your music fills these grounds

67eb51d8-6772-48a1-b52f-4673aafa8fcc.name: Fading Light

67eb51d8-6772-48a1-b52f-4673aafa8fcc.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ayy, yeah (ohh-ohhh)
I see you fading, fading away
[Verse 1]
Remember when your face lit up the whole room?
Now I'm watching you dissolve into the gloom
Used to shine so bright, now you're barely there
Like winter came and never left the air
Been noticing the changes day by day
How you move different, got nothing to say
Looking at these pictures from last fall
When your light was burning through it all
Now you're just a shell of what I knew
And I can't find a way to reach through
Every time I try to make you see
You pull away, drift further from me
[Pre-chorus]
And I watch you fade (fade)
Like leaves in December (ohh)
Everything's changed (changed)
But do you remember? (remember)
[Chorus]
Your smile doesn't reach your eyes anymore
Something's different than before
Your smile doesn't reach your eyes
And I can't pretend I don't realize
[Verse 2]
Remember summer nights we stayed up late?
Now you're just existing, going through the motions straight
Text messages left on read for days
While I'm over here trying to navigate
Through the walls you built up brick by brick
Atmosphere around you getting thick
Used to radiate like July sun
Now December frost has come undone
[Pre-chorus]
And I watch you fade (fade)
Like leaves in December (ohh)
Everything's changed (changed)
But do you remember? (remember)
[Chorus]
Your smile doesn't reach your eyes anymore
Something's different than before
Your smile doesn't reach your eyes
And I can't pretend I don't realize
[Bridge]
(Ohhh-ohh-ohh)
Where did all your light go?
(Ahhh-ahh)
I miss who you used to be
Your smile doesn't reach your eyes
Your smile doesn't reach your eyes
[Outro Chorus]
Your smile doesn't reach your eyes anymore
(I see you fading away)
Something's different than before
(Please don't fade away)
Your smile doesn't reach your eyes
And I can't pretend I don't realize

Силу древних минут
Одиночество - дар
Ночь скрывает мой шаг
Каждый вздох, каждый взгляд
Превращается в знак
[Pre-chorus]
В тишине я становлюсь сильнее
С каждым вдохом всё смелее
Пусть весь мир за дверью ждёт
Моя сила здесь растёт
[Chorus]
В тишине я становлюсь сильнее
В тишине я становлюсь мудрее
В тишине раскрою крылья
В тишине найду спасенье
[Verse 2]
Дождь рисует узор
На холодном стекле
Мой полночный простор
Дарит власть в тишине
Здесь никто не найдёт
Мой священный обряд
Время тайны течёт
Сквозь безмолвный парад
[Bridge]
(В тишине...) Я слышу пульс земли
(В тишине...) Секреты все мои
(В тишине...) Становлюсь сильней

0367a551-31d1-4fd0-b6b4-cf7646b358d9.lyrics:
[Verse 1]

Feel the pressure build beneath my skin

[Verse 2]
My bones absorb the frequencies
Each vibration sets them free
But still this feeling won't subside
The bass just echoes in my mind
Pressure rising, can't control

Feel the pressure build beneath my skin
Feel the pressure, where do I begin
(Pressure, pressure) [808 bass intensifies]

When everything goes quiet
That's when I hear it most
The pulse inside my veins
Like a rhythm from a ghost
The pressure keeps on building
Till I might explode
[Breakdown]
Pressure
(Building)
Pressure
(Rising)
Pressure
(Breaking)
[Cello solo]
[Final Verse]
Now I understand at last
Why this feeling had to last
The pressure shapes me day by day
Till I become the bass I play
These frequencies won't let me go
They're all I'll ever know
[Chorus]
Feel the pressure build beneath my skin
Feel the pressure, where do I begin
(Pressure, pressure)

ccba1f6e-cb79-42f8-b1e0-6c3ac30fd53c.name: Binary Love
ccba1f6e-cb79-42f8-b1e0-6c3ac30fd53c.sound: Create a dynamic jungle/drum and bass track with deep sub-basslines, fast breakbeat rhythms, and atmospheric synths. Add smooth, dreamy female vocals in French, soaked in reverb for an ethereal touch. The song should have a clear structure:[Intro] : Start with atmospheric synths and deep sub-bass drones to create a dreamy, digital atmosphere. Add glitch effects and soft vocalizations or whispers for an otherworldly touch.[Verse 1] : Introduce smooth female vocals singing poetic lyrics about love in a digital world ('Dans ce monde binaire', 'L'amour traverse le pare-feu'). Accompany the vocals with rolling sub-basslines and syncopated drum patterns. Use sparse ethereal synths to maintain tension.[Pre-Chorus] : Build tension by layering synths and adding a rising melody. Increase the intensity of the sub-bass and introduce rapid-fire breakbeats. Add harmonies to the vocals for depth.[Chorus] : Explode into a high-energy melody with the central theme 'L'amour traverse le pare-feu'. Make the sub-bass prominent and add layered ethereal synths for texture. Include rapid handclaps or shakers for extra groove.[Verse 2] : Return to a slightly softer dynamic with minimal instrumentation. Add new lyrical ideas about decoding love ('Chaque pixel me rapproche'). Keep the rolling sub-bass but reduce the density of synths and percussion.[Bridge] : Create a moment of calm with only ethereal synths and reverb-soaked vocals. Gradually reintroduce the sub-bass and add a rising synth melody to build up to the final chorus. Include glitch effects and distorted industrial sounds for added tension.[Final Chorus] : Repeat the chorus with added layers (e.g., harmonies, additional synths) to make it even more powerful and immersive.[Outro] : Gradually fade out with atmospheric synths, deep sub-bass drones, and reverb-soaked vocal echoes. End with lingering glitch effects and soft whispers. Use a tempo of 170 BPM to maintain a fast, driving rhythm. Focus on creating a haunting, rhythmic, and emotionally immersive experience.
ccba1f6e-cb79-42f8-b1e0-6c3ac30fd53c.lyrics:
[Intro - Atmospheric Synths]
Whispering synths and deep sub-bass create a dreamy, digital atmosphere.
[Verse 1 - French]
Dans ce monde binaire,
Je te vois à travers l'écran.
Tes données me parlent,
Chaque bit est une caresse.
Entre nous, des lignes de code,
Mais mon cœur bat en analogique.
Pour toi, mon amour distant,
L'amour traverse le pare-feu.
"Nous sommes des pixels dans un océan numérique,
Mais nos âmes sont des étoiles qui brillent."
[Pre-Chorus - French]
Signal perdu, mais je persiste,
Chaque pixel me rapproche.
Dans ce réseau infini,
Je décode ton message.
[Chorus - French]
(L'amour traverse le pare-feu)
Notre amour est un signal infini.
(Entre zeros et uns)
Nous dansons entre les données.
(Notre code est éternel)
Un code d'amour, toujours vivant.
[Verse 2 - French]
Ta présence digitale,
Me fait vivre autrement.
Dans ce monde virtuel,
Notre connexion est réelle.
Les murs de données ne peuvent pas cacher
Ce que nos cœurs ont toujours su.
"Chaque ligne de code est un murmure,
Un souffle d'amour dans le cyberespace."
[Pre-Chorus - French]
Signal perdu, mais je persiste,
Chaque pixel me rapproche.
Dans ce réseau infini,
Je décode ton message.
[Chorus - French]
(L'amour traverse le pare-feu)
Notre amour est un signal infini.
(Entre zeros et uns)
Nous dansons entre les données.
(Notre code est éternel)
Un code d'amour, toujours vivant.
[Bridge - French]
Algorithme ne peut comprendre,
Ce que nos âmes ont trouvé.
Dans chaque byte, mon cœur bat,
Appelant ton nom à travers l'éther.
"Les systèmes peuvent nous diviser,
Mais notre amour reste indestructible."
[Final Chorus - French]
(L'amour traverse le pare-feu)
Notre amour est un signal infini.
(Entre zeros et uns)
Nous dansons entre les données.
(Notre code est éternel)
Un code d'amour, toujours vivant.
[Outro - French]
Dans ce monde numérique,
Nous sommes éternels.
(Notre amour traverse le pare-feu)
Un code d'amour, toujours vivant.

f1177afe-4089-49c5-b6bc-1af29903a19b.name: L'Agent Double (The Double Agent)
f1177afe-4089-49c5-b6bc-1af29903a19b.sound: Trip-hop noir, French vocals, deep bass, ethereal synths, glitch effects, rain ambience
f1177afe-4089-49c5-b6bc-1af29903a19b.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Rain sounds, deep bass]
Mmm... je suis perdue...

(Je perds mon âme...)

Les codes et signaux
Sur les murs mouillés

[Solo]
[Ethereal synth melody with rain intensifying]
[Bridge]
[Static effects]
Attention, attention...
Le temps s'arrête ici
Entre deux vérités
Entre deux vies
(Entre deux vies...)
[Chorus]
Dans l'obscurité, je perds mon nom
(Je perds mon nom...)
Plus rien n'est vrai, plus rien n'est bon
Dans cette mission, je perds mon âme
(Je perds mon âme...)
Qui suis-je vraiment? Je ne sais pas
[Outro]
[Rain fading]
Je suis perdue...
Dans mon propre jeu...
(Perdue... perdue...)

9ef24363-9a77-48a1-9dcc-3e5b446750ed.name: L'Envol des Anges
9ef24363-9a77-48a1-9dcc-3e5b446750ed.sound: French trap, booming 808s, female rap vocals, luxurious production, atmospheric synths
9ef24363-9a77-48a1-9dcc-3e5b446750ed.lyrics:
[Intro]
Je regarde la scène vide (ah)
Les lumières s'allument une dernière fois (dernière fois)
[Verse 1]
Les années passent comme des notes de musique
Dans mes veines coule la passion rythmique
Chaque pas raconte une histoire d'amour
Sur le plancher qui a vécu tant de beaux jours
Mes yeux suivent leurs mouvements gracieux
Ces âmes pures qui dansent vers les cieux
Le temps s'arrête quand elles s'élancent
Dans l'air qui vibre avec leur élégance
J'ai donné ma vie à cet art sacré
Maintenant c'est l'heure de les regarder
Leurs pieds dessinent des poèmes sur scène
Pendant que mon cœur doucement saigne
Dans l'ombre des coulisses je souris
En voyant leurs rêves qui s'épanouissent
Ces étoiles brillent de leur propre lumière
Pendant que je m'efface derrière
[Chorus]
Je regarde mes anges danser ce soir
C'est le moment de les laisser voler, voir
[Verse 2]
Les applaudissements résonnent dans ma tête
Comme un orage qui refuse la retraite
Chaque saut, chaque tour me rappelle
Ces moments où j'étais immortelle
Les années d'apprentissage et de sueur
Se transforment en instants de splendeur
Dans leurs yeux je vois mon reflet
Cette passion que je leur ai donnée
La musique pulse comme mon sang
Les violons pleurent en les accompagnant
Ma dernière leçon est terminée
Mais leur voyage vient de commencer
Je laisse partir mes colombes blanches
Vers un ciel où leurs ailes se déplanchent
Les voir briller est ma récompense
Dans cette sublime dernière danse
[Chorus]
Je regarde mes anges danser ce soir
C'est le moment de les laisser voler, voir
[Bridge]
Dans l'obscurité des coulisses (des coulisses)
Je vois leur lumière qui glisse (qui glisse)
Mon héritage prend son envol (son envol)
Leurs mouvements sont ma parole (ma parole)
(Les étoiles brillent, les étoiles dansent)
(Mon cœur s'envole avec leur élégance)
[Chorus]
Je regarde mes anges danser ce soir
C'est le moment de les laisser voler, voir
(C'est leur moment de briller)

b7c5007c-5b94-4193-a4b5-3411a69e9ee8.name: Digital Ghost
b7c5007c-5b94-4193-a4b5-3411a69e9ee8.sound: Dark jungle/DnB, deep sub-bass, French/Russian vocals, atmospheric synths, 170 BPM
b7c5007c-5b94-4193-a4b5-3411a69e9ee8.lyrics:
[Verse 1 - French]
Dans mon téléphone
Je vois son visage
Pixels par pixels
Je perds son image
[Chorus - Russian]
Я здесь в цифрах
В памяти живу
Все из пикселей
Я тебя зову
(Я тебя зову)
[Verse 2 - French]
Les photos s'effacent
Bit après bit
Son sourire reste
Dans ce paradis
[Chorus - Russian]
Я здесь в цифрах
В памяти живу
Все из пикселей
Я тебя зову
(Я тебя зову)
[Bridge - French/Russian]
Je suis perdue ici
В этом коде
Cherchant sa trace
Где ты?
Les données s'effritent
Забываю
(Забываю...)
[Verse 3 - French]
Mémoire corrompue
Je sens sa présence
Dans chaque donnée
Dans chaque séquence
[Chorus - Russian]
Я здесь в цифрах
В памяти живу
Все из пикселей
Я тебя зову
[Outro - French/Russian]
(Dans les données)
Я исчезаю
(Dans le système)
Пропадаю
Les bits s'éteignent
Прощай
[Synth atmosphere fades]

bd603f4e-ba57-4b9b-80f2-a9b5c21fca15.name: Elevate
bd603f4e-ba57-4b9b-80f2-a9b5c21fca15.sound: drum and bass, liquid, luxury, female vocal, crisp percussion, lush keys, 128BPM
bd603f4e-ba57-4b9b-80f2-a9b5c21fca15.lyrics:
[Intro]
(la la la, oh oh)
[Verse 1]
I glide through the silence, all alone
Soft rush in my chest as I move
Late air on my skin, it’s unknown
I’m chasing the world, just passing through
[Pre-Chorus]
Floating further (oh), letting go
Every moment, slow then close
[Chorus]
Take me higher, let me run
Light surrounds us, rush begun
(la la la, oh)
Take me higher, let me run
Find my power, I won’t be undone
(La la, la la)
[Instrumental Drop]
[Verse 2]
Traces of laughter in the night
I breathe in new life as I soar
Moving through calm and flashing light
I’m finding my heart, yearning for more
[Pre-Chorus]
Floating further (oh), letting go
Every moment, slow then close
[Chorus]
Take me higher, let me run
Light surrounds us, rush begun
(la la la, oh)
Take me higher, let me run
Find my power, I won’t be undone
(La la, la la)
[Bridge]
All the noise falls away
In the rush, I feel safe
Can you feel it, can you stay?
Running with me, side by side
[Solo]
[VIP FX] (vocalizing, ah ah)
[Chorus]
Take me higher, let me run
Light surrounds us, rush begun
Take me higher, let me run
With you here, I won’t be undone
(la la, la la)
[Outro]
(oh, la la, oh)

188b223d-e2c1-481c-84c4-b53dcf287858.name: Celestial Drift
188b223d-e2c1-481c-84c4-b53dcf287858.sound: Tech-house, female vocals, Arabian Spanish, 128 BPM, atmospheric
188b223d-e2c1-481c-84c4-b53dcf287858.lyrics:
[Intro]
[TR-909 kick heartbeat, sub-bass enters]
[Verse 1]
Atrapada aquí dentro
Mind melting, mind melting
Silent steps on stone
Always alone, alone
[Pre-chorus]
Breathing barely, breathing barely
Can't escape the pull
Pull me deeper, pull
[Chorus]
Libre soy cuando caigo
Free when falling down
Silent screams surround
No way back now
Lost but somehow found
[Verse 2]
Arabian whispers fade
Made my choice, my choice
Locked behind these walls
All my silent calls, calls
[Pre-chorus]
Breathing barely, breathing barely
Can't escape the pull
Pull me deeper, pull
[Chorus]
Libre soy cuando caigo
Free when falling down
Silent screams surround
No way back now
Lost but somehow found
[Breakdown]
[Filtered vocals, tape stop FX]
Silencio... silencio...
Breathing in the dark
Breathing in the dark
[Diamond tap left ear, vinyl crackle]
[Bridge]
Buscando salida pero
Searching but the door won't budge
All these hallways lead to me
Me, me, me
[Final Chorus]
Libre soy cuando caigo
Free when falling down
Silent screams surround
No way back now
Lost but somehow found
Always somehow found
[Outro]
[Limo door slam under 60Hz]
Silent steps fade out
Fade out, fade out

ec83092d-4f25-49bf-b386-7cbc9a3ec4c2.name: Contradiction
ec83092d-4f25-49bf-b386-7cbc9a3ec4c2.sound: tech house, 128 BPM, TR-909, cinematic, club, rooftop, deep subs, luxury FX
ec83092d-4f25-49bf-b386-7cbc9a3ec4c2.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Clean Beat]
[FX: Champagne pop, Black Card swipe]
[Atmospheric vocal textures: Japanese, Spanish, Portuguese, warped, layered]
[Verse 1]
Pulse spinning slow,
Night running deep,
Heat on repeat,
Heartbeat, heartbeat —
Sync with the low,
[FX: Clase Azul clink on 1 kHz, sidechained]
Silk in the dark,
Move, never speak,
Lift through the spark.
[Pre-Chorus]
(Echoed vocalizations: airy Japanese syllables, reverb-heavy, fading in and out)
Hands in the air, breathe —
Skyline beneath me,
Shift, don’t explain,
Rhythm in veins.
[Chorus]
(Portuguese, non-lexical distant calls)
[Heavy reverb, chopped and filtered]
Owning the room, owning the night,
Never a word, just light on light,
Let the bass, let the beat,
Move my feet, move my feet.
[Drop]
[FX: Explosive kick + sub-slam, crowd gasp]
(Vocal hit: Spanish syllables, stuttered and automated)
[Verse 2]
Echo on glass,
Midnight unrolls,
Breath on my skin,
Now we begin —
Rooftop alive,
Trip through the drive,
Sleek body waves,
Stay in this phase.
[Breakdown]
[Halftime beat, vocal textures swelling]
(Japanese phrase chopped, echoed, reversed)
All just for now,
No need to know —
Flow into now,
It’s all we own.
[Chorus]
(Portuguese, non-lexical, atmospheric)
Owning the room, owning the night,
Never a word, just light on light,
Let the bass, let the beat,
Move my feet, move my feet.
[Outro]
[Clean Beat, filtered FX: card swipe, glass clink]
[Whispered Japanese textures, fading]
[Beat ends]

198d0bc4-f09b-4041-811e-35588e7bf0b3.name: Говори со мной
198d0bc4-f09b-4041-811e-35588e7bf0b3.sound: R&B fusion, Russian folk melodies, duet vocals, soulful harmonies, emotional ballad
198d0bc4-f09b-4041-811e-35588e7bf0b3.lyrics:
[Verse 1 - Male]
Я так далеко
Но сердце с тобой
В телефоне твой голос
Говори со мной
Время не ждёт
Москва или LA
Пусть океан между нами
Я чувствую тебя
[Pre-chorus - Female]
Сквозь экраны и расстояния (ой-да)
Я слышу дыхание
В тишине ночной
Говори со мной
[Chorus - Both]
Говори, говори со мной
Сердце бьётся в унисон с тобой
(Ай-яй, говори со мной)
Две души через океан
Говори, не молчи, я там
(Ой-да, я здесь, я с тобой)
[Verse 2 - Female]
На часах рассвет
А я не могу спать
В наушниках твой смех
Продолжай мечтать
Помнишь тот день?
Мы танцевали в дожде
И пусть всё изменилось
Ты всё тот же во мне
[Bridge - Both]
Ла-ла-ла, время летит
Ла-ла-ла, сердце болит
(Говори со мной, милый мой)
(Я здесь, я с тобой, любовь моя)
[Rap - Male]
Километры, часы, города между нами
Но любовь сильней, чем все расстояния
Твой голос - как свет в темноте
Каждое слово хранит память о тебе
Через спутники, через провода
Я слышу, как бьётся твоё сердце всегда
[Chorus - Both]
Говори, говори со мной
Сердце бьётся в унисон с тобой
(Ай-яй, говори со мной)
Две души через океан
Говори, не молчи, я там
(Ой-да, я здесь, я с тобой)
[Outro - Both]
Говори со мной...
(Я слышу тебя...)
Говори со мной...
(Я всегда с тобой...)

32742125-6728-42fc-8445-0d6723c3215d.name: Stillness
32742125-6728-42fc-8445-0d6723c3215d.sound: Trip-hop, slow downtempo, deep analog synth bass, atmospheric pads, urban ambience, 60-80 BPM
32742125-6728-42fc-8445-0d6723c3215d.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Rain and distant traffic sounds]
[Verse 1]
My mind keeps running
Time stands so still
Counting backwards
Against my will
These walls are watching
As minutes fade
(Minutes fade away)
[Chorus]
When darkness lingers
And I can't rest
When darkness lingers
Inside my head
(Inside my head)
[Verse 2]
The clock ticks slower
With every beat
My thoughts get louder
Down empty streets
The night is calling
But won't release
(Won't release me)
[Chorus]
When darkness lingers
And I can't rest
When darkness lingers
Inside my head
(Inside my head)
[Bridge]
Round and round
The hours spin
Round and round
Can't let them in
(Let them in)
[Verse 3]
The morning's coming
But I remain
Still wide awake
Still the same
These walls are watching
As minutes fade
(Minutes fade away)
[Chorus - Outro]
When darkness lingers
And I can't rest
When darkness lingers
Inside my head
(Inside, inside my head)
[Fade out with rain sounds]

3b1e95fb-2b3b-4b3e-81f4-8088c5ccf932.name: Heartbeat
3b1e95fb-2b3b-4b3e-81f4-8088c5ccf932.sound: Gangsta rap, haunting cello lead, French-English vocals, deep 808 bass, noir atmosphere
3b1e95fb-2b3b-4b3e-81f4-8088c5ccf932.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Mon coeur bat pour toi ce soir (My heart beats for you tonight)
Through the streets I hear you call
Les sirènes dans la nuit (The sirens in the night)
Running fast but I'm running slow
Je ne peux pas dormir (I cannot sleep)
Every time I hear those sounds
Comme les battements de ton coeur (Like the beats of your heart)
I know you're somewhere in this town
[Chorus]
Two hearts beating, beating like sirens
(Oh-oh-oh, la-la-la)
Two hearts meeting, meeting in silence
(Oh-oh-oh, la-la-la)
[Verse 2]
Les rues sont vides maintenant (The streets are empty now)
But I feel you everywhere
Dans chaque coin de la ville (In every corner of the city)
Looking up at your window there
Je t'attends toujours (I'm always waiting for you)
Every night at the same spot
Les minutes sont des heures (Minutes turn to hours)
Till I see you or maybe not
[Chorus]
Two hearts beating, beating like sirens
(Oh-oh-oh, la-la-la)
Two hearts meeting, meeting in silence
(Oh-oh-oh, la-la-la)
[Bridge]
Mon amour perdu dans la ville
Je cours après toi, je cours
Les sirènes chantent notre histoire
Dans la nuit, dans la nuit...
(Ohhhhhh-ohhhhh) [Extended vocalization]
[Verse 3]
The city keeps us apart tonight
But I hear your heartbeat still
À travers le bruit (Through the noise)
I'm following your trail
Je ne peux pas t'oublier (I cannot forget you)
Even when the morning comes
Notre amour est éternel (Our love is eternal)
Through these streets we run
[Chorus]
Two hearts beating, beating like sirens
(Oh-oh-oh, la-la-la)
Two hearts meeting, meeting in silence
(Oh-oh-oh, la-la-la)

8c137369-02d3-46de-864e-89aebdc3cc33.name: Checkmate
8c137369-02d3-46de-864e-89aebdc3cc33.sound: Underground rap, haunting cello, whispered French vocals, deep 808, noir atmosphere
8c137369-02d3-46de-864e-89aebdc3cc33.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Each move you make
I anticipate
Your strategy
It's all too late
[Pre-chorus]
Moving piece by piece
Through this strategy
(Pourquoi tu te caches?)
(Derrière tes pièces?)
[Chorus]
Why do you hide?
Behind your pawns?
Why do you hide?
Until the dawn?
(Pourquoi, pourquoi?)
[Verse 2]
Your queen exposed
Your king confined
Your moves all closed
Your fate designed
[Pre-chorus]
Piece by piece now
Watch them fall down
(Tu ne peux pas fuir)
(C'est presque fini)
[Chorus]
Why do you hide?
Behind your pawns?
Why do you hide?
Until the dawn?
(Pourquoi, pourquoi?)
[Bridge]
I see through you
Your empty plays
Your false display
Of strength decays
I know your fear
I taste your doubt
Can't run away
Can't find way out
[Solo]
[Haunting cello with 808 bass drops]
[Verse 3]
Your bishop falls
Your knight retreats
Your castle walls
Accept defeat
[Pre-chorus]
Time slips away
Your final day
(C'est terminé)
(Tu as perdu)
[Chorus]
Why do you hide?
Behind your pawns?
Why do you hide?
Until the dawn?
(Pourquoi, pourquoi?)
[Outro]
Check...
(Échec...)
Check...
(Échec...)
Checkmate
(Et mat)

8db212b3-88ac-4f03-bdd3-08891bad0206.name: حبيبي
8db212b3-88ac-4f03-bdd3-08891bad0206.sound: Lo-fi, Relaxing harmonies , Reflective, Arabic vibe, deep bass
8db212b3-88ac-4f03-bdd3-08891bad0206.lyrics:
الكوبليه الأول:
قلبي معاك، يا حبيبي، في كل خطوة
والليل يروي حكايتنا، مثل النجوم الساحرة
أنت نور عيوني، وسحر أحلامي
معاك، الدنيا تبقى جميلة وكلامي
اللازمة:
يا حبيبي، يا غالي، أنت كل حياتي
معاك، قلبي يغنّي، ويفرح بوجودك
يا حبيبي، يا نور، أنت كل أمنياتي
معاك، الدنيا تبقى، وقلبي يعيش معاك
الكوبليه الثاني:
بحبك، يا حبيبي، من أول نظرة
والوقف معاك، حلم كبير، وروحنا متّرة
أنت القمر اللي بيضيء دروبي
معاك، كل الحزن يروح، وتبقى حبيبي
اللازمة:
يا حبيبي، يا غالي، أنت كل حياتي
معاك، قلبي يغنّي، ويفرح بوجودك
يا حبيبي، يا نور، أنت كل أمنياتي
معاك، الدنيا تبقى، وقلبي يعيش معاك
الجسر:
يا حبيبي، خلّي الدنيا تسمع كلامنا
وخلّي الحب يبقى، مهما كانت الأحوال
أنت لي، وأنا لك، مهما بعدنا
حبنا أقوى من الزمن، وأجمل من الخيال
اللازمة:
يا حبيبي، يا غالي، أنت كل حياتي
معاك، قلبي يغنّي، ويفرح بوجودك
يا حبيبي، يا نور، أنت كل أمنياتي
معاك، الدنيا تبقى، وقلبي يعيش معاك

705967fd-a131-42f4-a6dc-b26b7625f8ce.name: Harmony
705967fd-a131-42f4-a6dc-b26b7625f8ce.sound: Cinematic instrumental, mournful cello, subtle 808 bass, urban atmosphere, 80-110 BPM
705967fd-a131-42f4-a6dc-b26b7625f8ce.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
High above it all tonight
My bow moves slow and steady
In this garden paradise
Where past and present blend so readily
The strings beneath my fingers sing
Of something pure and true
While down below, the beats begin
To paint the midnight blue
[Pre-chorus]
Every note I play
Dances through the rain
[Ooooh, ooooh]
[Chorus]
I'm searching for a melody to make sense of it all
Between these ancient strings and modern calls
[Verse 2]
Practice makes the hours fly
As raindrops keep the tempo
Far below, the trains roll by
Creating rhythms as they go
My music finds its way through time
Between the old and new
Each stroke a careful counted rhyme
That only night shines through
[Pre-chorus]
Every sound that flows
Through the garden grows
[Ahhh, ahhh]
[Chorus]
I'm searching for a melody to make sense of it all
Between these ancient strings and modern calls
[Bridge]
Sometimes I feel so small
Playing to these walls
But when the music rises
Something in me realizes
That every single note
Is like a bridge we wrote
[Solo]
[Cello solo with subtle 808 bass underneath]
[Final Verse]
Morning light will soon appear
But still my bow keeps moving
Finding peace between the years
In what these strings are proving
That harmony can live and breathe
Where worlds collide and meet
In simple songs we can believe
Make everything complete
[Chorus]
I'm searching for a melody to make sense of it all
Between these ancient strings and modern calls
(Between these ancient strings... and modern calls)

e05f47ed-b616-40a6-8781-87900f3a977f.name: Nocturne
e05f47ed-b616-40a6-8781-87900f3a977f.sound: Alternative R&B, nocturnal saxophone, deep 808 bass, ambient rain, urban soundscape

8348e5f7-a504-408b-a5be-dfc7adba6b8d.name: Late Night Release
8348e5f7-a504-408b-a5be-dfc7adba6b8d.sound: Lo-fi hyperpop fusion, dreamy beats, autotuned vocals, study session ambiance
8348e5f7-a504-408b-a5be-dfc7adba6b8d.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
My screen is turned down low
Trying to keep my eyes from getting sore
The world outside is quiet now
And I'm here with my notes once more
[Pre-chorus]
Everyone's offline tonight
And that's just fine with me
The numbers and the words align
In this tranquility
[Chorus]
While the world is sleeping
I'm finding my peace
In the blue light beaming
Through my late-night release
(Through my late-night release)
[Verse 2]
Got my headphones playing soft
As I highlight line after line
There's something special in these hours
When time feels like it's all mine
[Pre-chorus]
The silence holds me close
Like a friend who understands
That sometimes solitude shows
What the daylight can't
[Chorus]
While the world is sleeping
I'm finding my peace
In the blue light beaming
Through my late-night release
(Through my late-night release)
[Bridge]
[Autotuned, ethereal]
And maybe I should rest my head
But these moments feel too rare
When everything makes sense instead
And the quiet takes me there
[Chorus]
While the world is sleeping
I'm finding my peace
In the blue light beaming
Through my late-night release
(Through my late-night release)

0043b01c-bf0a-4a33-bbe2-ad1ebd531e31.name: Belle Mensonge (Beautiful Lie)
0043b01c-bf0a-4a33-bbe2-ad1ebd531e31.sound: Dark cinematic trap, French vocals, minimal synth, glitch effects, heavy 808s
0043b01c-bf0a-4a33-bbe2-ad1ebd531e31.lyrics:
[Intro]
Dans la nuit, je disparais
(Into the night, I fade away)
[Verse 1]
Les yeux qui suivent mes pas
Derrière le rideau de soie
Je porte leur masque parfait
Mais ils ne me connaissent jamais
Dans ce monde de cristal
Chaque sourire cache un signal
Je joue mon rôle ce soir
Sans laisser tomber le noir
[Pre-chorus]
Les caméras ne voient pas
Ce qui se cache là-bas
Sous les paillettes d'argent
Je garde tous leurs secrets
[Chorus]
Je danse entre deux mondes
(Dancing between two worlds)
Les vérités se fondent
(Where truths dissolve and blur)
Dans l'obscurité profonde
(In darkness deep and pure)
Je suis leur belle mensonge
(I am their beautiful lie)
[Verse 2]
Chaque fête, nouvelle cible
Les mots glissent, invisibles
Je collectionne leurs voix
Dans mon carnet de soie
Les codes et les mystères
S'échangent dans la lumière
Je suis leur papillon
Qui vole sans direction
[Bridge]
Entre le vrai et le faux
Je navigue sur leurs mots
La mission continue
Jusqu'à la fin prévue
[Chorus]
Je danse entre deux mondes
(Dancing between two worlds)
Les vérités se fondent
(Where truths dissolve and blur)
Dans l'obscurité profonde
(In darkness deep and pure)
Je suis leur belle mensonge
(I am their beautiful lie)
[Outro]
Dans la nuit, je disparais
Comme si je n'existais jamais
(Into the night, I fade away
As if I never existed)

f1fb6532-1ab1-4f8e-9f98-97680fa33257.name: Dans L'Ombre (In The Shadow)
f1fb6532-1ab1-4f8e-9f98-97680fa33257.sound: Dark trap noir, minimal synth, French vocals, atmospheric pads, glitch effects, 60-90 BPM
f1fb6532-1ab1-4f8e-9f98-97680fa33257.lyrics:
[Intro]
Je vois tout, dans le silence (I see everything, in silence)
[La-la-la, distant echoes]
[Verse 1]
Minuit sonne à l'hôtel de luxe
Mes pas glissent sur le marbre froid
Les diamants brillent sous mon chiffon
Pendant que les riches dorment, je suis là, moi
(Oh-oh-oh)
[Pre-chorus]
Les sourires faux dans les couloirs
Les regards vides, les coeurs de pierre
Je nettoie leurs traces chaque soir
Dans l'ombre des riches, je persévère
[Chorus]
Dans l'ombre des riches, je vois la vérité
Derrière le luxe, tout est calculé
(Dans l'ombre, dans l'ombre)
[Verse 2]
Les parfums chers masquent leurs mensonges
Les bijoux cachent leurs âmes vides
Dans les suites, j'efface leurs fautes
Les secrets tombent comme leurs masques
Je ramasse leurs illusions brisées
(La-la-la)
[Bridge]
Cette nuit j'ai vu une larme
Sur l'oreiller en soie pure
Une lettre déchirée sur le sol
Et j'ai compris que l'argent ne fait pas le bonheur
(Oh-oh, la-la-la)
[Chorus]
Dans l'ombre des riches, je vois la vérité
Derrière le luxe, tout est calculé
(Dans l'ombre, dans l'ombre)
[Outro]
Je continuerai ma ronde silencieuse
Témoin des vies dorées qui se décomposent
[Vinyl crackle fades]
(La-la-la, oh-oh)

75ce9a0a-f467-4e6d-891f-ceb47db70dfc.name: Les Cartes Ne Mentent Jamais
75ce9a0a-f467-4e6d-891f-ceb47db70dfc.sound: French noir electronic, atmospheric bass, ethereal reverb, coastal ambience, 70-90 BPM
75ce9a0a-f467-4e6d-891f-ceb47db70dfc.lyrics:
[Intro: Ambient waves and synths]
[Verse 1]
Je vois son destin
Dans les vagues du matin
Les cartes sur la table
Son avenir probable
(Son avenir, son avenir)
[Pre-Chorus]
Madame veut savoir
Dans mon miroir noir
Les cartes ne mentent jamais
Les cartes ne mentent jamais
[Chorus]
Les cartes ne mentent jamais
Dans la mer, dans l'air
Les cartes ne mentent jamais
Je vois tout si clair
(Les cartes ne mentent jamais)
[Verse 2]
Elle cherche l'amour
Dans mes mots, mes tours
Les lignes de sa main
Parlent d'un lendemain
(D'un lendemain, d'un lendemain)
[Pre-Chorus]
Les signes sont là
Tout se dévoila
Les cartes ne mentent jamais
Les cartes ne mentent jamais
[Chorus]
Les cartes ne mentent jamais
Dans la mer, dans l'air
Les cartes ne mentent jamais
Je vois tout si clair
(Les cartes ne mentent jamais)
[Bridge]
[Spoken with reverb]
Les étoiles dansent
Sur la Méditerranée
Son destin se lance
Je le vois passer
Les cartes ne mentent jamais
[Final Chorus]
Les cartes ne mentent jamais
Dans la mer, dans l'air
Les cartes ne mentent jamais
Je vois tout si clair
(Les cartes ne mentent jamais)
[Outro]
Son destin écrit
Dans la nuit qui luit
Les cartes ne mentent jamais
(Jamais, jamais, jamais...)

75718e54-b807-482f-ab22-3aa99718f4ae.name: Distance
75718e54-b807-482f-ab22-3aa99718f4ae.sound: Trip-hop, 808 beats, deep bass, cello lead, French/Portuguese vocals, ethereal atmosphere
75718e54-b807-482f-ab22-3aa99718f4ae.lyrics:
[Intro - Instrumental with atmospheric vocals]
(Ah... ah... ah...)
[Verse 1 - Instrumental with subtle vocals]
(Mmm... je ne peux pas...)
(Tão longe...)
[Pre-chorus - French]
Je te vois partir
Comme l'eau qui coule
Entre mes doigts froids
Pourquoi restes-tu si loin?
Dans un autre monde
Sans me regarder
Je tends la main mais
Tu n'es plus là
[Chorus - French/Portuguese]
Où es-tu maintenant? (Onde você está?)
Je ne peux pas t'atteindre (Não posso te alcançar)
Dans cette distance bleue (Na distância azul)
Perdue sans toi (Perdida sem você)
[Verse 2 - Instrumental with subtle vocals]
(Por que você mudou...)
(Si distant...)
[Pre-chorus - Portuguese]
Cada dia passa
Como uma onda
Me afogando mais
Por que você mudou?
Tento te tocar
Mas você se vai
Como água fria
Na escuridão
[Chorus - French/Portuguese]
Où es-tu maintenant? (Onde você está?)
Je ne peux pas t'atteindre (Não posso te alcançar)
Dans cette distance bleue (Na distância azul)
Perdue sans toi (Perdida sem você)
[Outro]
(Je cherche encore...)
(Ainda procuro...)
(Où es-tu...?)
(Onde você está...?)

75d0fb61-61a4-4f48-9239-d461b31394c8.name: Vortex
75d0fb61-61a4-4f48-9239-d461b31394c8.sound: Tech house, 128 BPM, jet-black, ASMR female vocals, processed, luxury club textures
75d0fb61-61a4-4f48-9239-d461b31394c8.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Ah... oh... ee...)
[Marble riser]
[Drop: 0:00-0:30]
(Ah— ah... ah—) [armored 909 kick]
(Ah... oh—)
[Verse: 0:30-1:00]
(ah, oh, ee... oh)
[Close-mic whispers, building]
(ee... ah... ah-ah)
[Caviar spoon percussion]
[Chorus: 1:00-1:30]
(breath: ah-ah-ah— oh, ee)
(oh, ee— ah... oh)
[Helicopter rotor vocal lift]
(AH-ah-ah)
(ah— oh— ee—) [rising to belting]
[VIP FX]
[AI champagne cork pop - surround]
[Crystal flute ping]
[Verse: 1:30-2:00]
(ah... ee...) [Velvet rope drag]
(oh-eh-ee) [RFID scan burst]

[Money textures]
