96b7487e-a586-4178-af26-c376eeab93ba.name: The sky broke open… just to let me fall. (Acoustic Variation)
96b7487e-a586-4178-af26-c376eeab93ba.sound: acoustic guitar, campfire, bonfire, fingerpicked, raw, intimate, lo-fi, whispered vocals
96b7487e-a586-4178-af26-c376eeab93ba.lyrics:
[Verse 1 - Whispered, with piano & distant rain]
The sky broke open… just to let me fall.
No one heard me scream — but the thunder called.
I wore my sorrow like a gown of lace,
And danced alone in this cathedral space.
[Pre-Chorus - Softly building, strings entering]
You said the storm would pass…
But I am not the rain.
I am the silence after it has torn the world apart.
[Chorus - Full orchestral swell, voice soaring, layered harmonies]
FALLING LIKE THIS —
Through shattered glass and burning skies.
I’m not broken…
I’m the echo that won’t die.
FALLING LIKE THIS —
With every drop, I say goodbye.
To the girl I was…
Before the heavens cried.
[Verse 2 - Haunting, cello-driven, breathy vocals]
Your name still lingers on the windowpane,
A ghost written in water, soft and plain.
I trace your letters… they dissolve, they fade —
Just like the light you swore you’d never take.
[Pre-Chorus - More intense, choir whispers enter]
You said the storm would pass…
But I am not the rain.
I am the hollow where your love once rang.
[Chorus - Even bigger, choir joins, timpani rolls]
FALLING LIKE THIS —
Through shattered glass and burning skies.
I’m not broken…
I’m the echo that won’t die.
FALLING LIKE THIS —
With every drop, I say goodbye.
To the girl I was…
Before the heavens cried.
[Bridge - Sudden silence. Only piano and single vocal note. Then — EXPLOSION.]
(whispered)
“I tried to be the light…”
(suddenly full orchestra + choir + voice shattering into high C)
BUT I WAS THE STORM THAT BROKE THE SKY!
[Instrumental Break — Cinematic string crescendo, thunder cracks, church bells tolling slowly]
[Final Chorus - Voice trembling, fragile, almost breaking — then soaring again]
FALLING LIKE THIS —
Through shattered glass and burning skies…
I’m not broken…
I’m the echo that won’t die.
FALLING LIKE THIS —
With every drop, I say goodbye…
To the girl I was…
Before the heavens cried…
…before I learned
how beautiful it is…
to break…
and still…
sing.
[Outro - Fading piano, single violin, distant rain]
…
…
*“I was the storm…
…that learned to sing.”*

fe8c3157-764c-4bd0-8fc0-fcde75f771fc.name: Breathe With Me
fe8c3157-764c-4bd0-8fc0-fcde75f771fc.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, brutal emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
fe8c3157-764c-4bd0-8fc0-fcde75f771fc.lyrics:
[Soft synth pad, gentle ocean breeze, mellow bassline, slow trap beat with brushed snare]

[Verse 1]
We don’t talk much when the day is done
Just sit on the porch, watch the setting sun
Your coffee steam, my quiet sigh
No need to ask “why” or “how come” or “why”

You saw me crack last Tuesday night
Didn’t fix it — just held the light
Said: “It’s okay to not be strong”
And for once… I believed it… all along

[Pre-Chorus]
No script, no role, no perfect line
Just your hand in mine… and time

[Chorus]
Breathe with me, just breathe
No need to heal, just be
In this silence, soft and wide
You’re the calm I didn’t hide
(oh-oh, didn’t hide)
(breathe… with me…)

[Verse 2]
You don’t pretend the world’s alright
You just make space for my broken light
No grand words, no saving grace
Just: “I’m here” — and that’s enough space

Yeah, love ain’t fireworks or gold
It’s showing up when nights are cold
And not flinchin’ at the mess I bring
But hummin’ low… like you’re my spring

[Pre-Chorus]
No promises, no “forever” lies
Just this moment… under open skies…

[Chorus]
Breathe with me, just breathe
No need to heal, just be
In this silence, soft and wide
You’re the calm I didn’t hide
(oh-oh, you see me)
(breathe… just breathe…)

[Bridge — male lead, then soft female harmony joins on “me”]
I spent years buildin’ walls so tall
Thought connection meant I’d lose it all
But you walked in… no knock, no plea…
Just sat beside me…
… and breathed with me

[Chorus — full, with layered male/female harmonies]
Breathe with me… just breathe…
No need to heal… just be…
In this silence… deep and true…
I’m not alone… ‘cause you…
(oh-oh… you stayed…)
(breathe… with me…)

[Outro — male voice, fading, female hum underneath]
Breathe in…
Breathe out…
With you…
(oh… with you…)
… I’m found.

ba854e37-1b9c-4394-8109-f729251ec307.name: Safety Line
ba854e37-1b9c-4394-8109-f729251ec307.sound: Rap-metal fusion, aggressive drums, 90s nu-metal guitar riffs, raw bass, acoustic breakdowns
ba854e37-1b9c-4394-8109-f729251ec307.lyrics:
[Intro - Heavy Guitar Riff]
[Verse 1]
Painted paths in perfect lines
Following your grand design
Pushed and pulled by careful hands
Playing puppet to your plans
Learning lessons day by day
Never knowing price to pay
Picked apart and put in place
Proud performer, perfect grace
Pattern maker, pulling strings
Promises and precious things
Paper crowns and plastic praise
Future fading through the haze
[Chorus]
You taught me how to reach the heights
Then watched me fall through empty sky
Practiced words and polished lies
Now I see through your disguise
(Through your disguise...)
[Verse 2]
Power preacher on parade
Poisoned every word you made
Calculating every cost
Counting cards already lost
Breaking backs to build your throne
Bleeding others to the bone
Master of manipulate
Architect of alternate fate
[Pre-chorus]
Running rivers backwards now
Breaking every sacred vow
Twisted teacher, time to see
Everything you made of me
[Chorus]
You taught me how to reach the heights
Then watched me fall through empty sky
Practiced words and polished lies
Now I see through your disguise
(Through your disguise...)
[Bridge - Acoustic Guitar]
Quietly collecting pieces
Of the trust you took away
Stronger now without your guidance
Finally found my own way...
[Verse 3 - Building Intensity]
Taking back what's mine to take
Every chain you made, I break
Rising from recruited ranks
Giving back these borrowed thanks
Standing on my own two feet
Victory in my defeat
[Final Chorus - Full Intensity]
You taught me how to reach the heights
(But I learned to fly...)
Then watched me fall through empty sky
(On my own design...)
Practiced words and polished lies
Now I see through your disguise
(I SURVIVE!)
[Outro]
[Heavy riff with fadeout]

0fcc205c-0c75-42ef-a8dc-196c051f14aa.name: Take It Slow
0fcc205c-0c75-42ef-a8dc-196c051f14aa.sound: R&B ballad, slow tempo, sensual groove, intimate vocals
0fcc205c-0c75-42ef-a8dc-196c051f14aa.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Baby, look at me tonight
The way you touch my hand
Something in your eyes
Makes me understand
Want you close to me
Let me show you how
Just you and me
Right here, right now
[Pre-chorus]
Your breath against my skin
The way you pull me in
No need to rush this thing
Just let it begin
[Chorus]
Take it slow, let the moment flow
(Let it flow, oh)
Take it slow, let the moment flow
(Baby, let it flow)
Take it slow, let the moment flow
(Let me show you love)
Take it slow, ooh, take it slow
[Mmm, ooh...]
[Verse 2]
Every single touch
Sets my soul on fire
Tell me what you want
Take me even higher
I've been waiting long
For a night like this
Just me and you
Nothing we could miss
[Pre-chorus]
Your heart against my heart
We'll never be apart
No need to rush this thing
Just let it start
[Chorus]
Take it slow, let the moment flow
(Let it flow, oh)
Take it slow, let the moment flow
(Baby, let it flow)
Take it slow, let the moment flow
(Let me show you love)
Take it slow, ooh, take it slow
[Mmm, ooh...]
[Bridge - French]
Mon amour, reste avec moi
Cette nuit n'appartient qu'à nous
Dans tes bras, je me sens moi
Laisse-moi t'aimer jusqu'au bout
[Final Chorus]
Take it slow, let the moment flow
(Let me show you, baby)
Take it slow, let the moment flow
(Oh, let me love you right)
Take it slow, let the moment flow
(This is our moment)
Take it slow, ooh, take it slow
[Aah... ooh...]

f457fe3c-1fbb-41ae-9eb1-af16a7b4c9c0.name: Golden Hour Drive (Variation)
f457fe3c-1fbb-41ae-9eb1-af16a7b4c9c0.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
f457fe3c-1fbb-41ae-9eb1-af16a7b4c9c0.lyrics:
[Soft engine hum, distant seagulls, warm analog synth pad swells in]

[Verse 1]
Rollin’ west on old Pacific Coast
Windows down, no need for a host
Sun dips low, paints the sky in gold
And for a sec, the future feels… hold

Remember seventeen, same road, same view
Thought the whole world owed me somethin’ new
Now I know — the gift was just this:
Being here, breathin’ through the bliss

[Pre-Chorus]
No destination, just the road and me
And the ghosts of who I used to be
They wave… but don’t ask me to stay
I’m drivin’ forward… in golden light today

[Chorus]
Golden hour drive, soft and slow
Where the past and present start to glow
Not runnin’ back — just lookin’ back
With kindness on this sunset track
(oh-oh, sunset track)
(ride on…)

[Verse 2]
Saw a couple laugh on a boardwalk bench
Held hands like time could never drench
Made me smile — not ‘cause I’m alone
But ‘cause I’ve learned to call my peace “home”

Yeah, the years took some, but gave me grace
To see the beauty in my own pace
No race to win, no score to beat
Just tires hummin’ down a sweet street

[Pre-Chorus]
The ocean breathes beside the car
And I don’t need to know who we are
Just this moment — warm and wide
With the sun still on my side

[Chorus]
Golden hour drive, soft and slow
Where the past and present start to glow
Not runnin’ back — just lookin’ back
With kindness on this sunset track
(oh-oh, golden light)
(ride on…)

[Bridge]
I don’t miss the boy I was
But I thank him for the trust
He had in someday, far away
That I would find my golden day

[Chorus — fuller, with layered harmonies, gentle clap on 2 and 4]
Golden hour drive… soft and slow…
Past and present… start to glow…
Not runnin’ back… just lookin’ back…
With kindness on this sunset track…
(oh-oh… this is home…)
(yeah… just roam…)

[Outro]
Engine hums… sun dips low…
I’m not lost… I’m just… goin’…
Golden light… on my skin…
This is where I begin… again…
(oh… begin…)

73c249ab-cc37-4832-8b32-320557a816ef.name: Weightless (Variation)
73c249ab-cc37-4832-8b32-320557a816ef.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
73c249ab-cc37-4832-8b32-320557a816ef.lyrics:
[Soft ocean swell, light breeze, gentle synth pad fades in]

[Verse 1]
Took my shoes off where the sidewalk ends
Let the concrete cool what the day has penned
No emails buzzin’, no clock to chase
Just the rhythm of this quiet space

Saw a seagull float without a plan
Made me wonder — why do I hold so damn tight to sand?

[Pre-Chorus]
For once, I’m not buildin’
Just breathin’…
For once, I’m not fixin’
Just bein’…

[Chorus]
Weightless, for a minute
Let the world spin without me in it
Sky so wide, I disappear
But I’m finally… finally… here
(oh-oh, finally here)
(clap clap, just breathe)

[Verse 2]
Left my worries on a park bench seat
They’ll be waitin’ — but not right beneath my feet
Sunset paints the street in golden grace
And I don’t gotta earn this space

Sometimes freedom’s just a choice to pause
To let the current rewrite all the laws

[Pre-Chorus]
For once, I’m not chasin’
Just floatin’…
For once, I’m not racin’
Just knowin’…

[Chorus]
Weightless, for a minute
Let the world spin without me in it
Sky so wide, I disappear
But I’m finally… finally… here
(oh-oh, light as air)
(clap clap, nobody there)

[Bridge]
I know it won’t last —
The noise will call me back too fast
But even one deep breath, slow and true
Is a kind of victory… for me and you

[Chorus — softer, almost whispered]
Weightless… just a minute…
World can wait… I’m in it…
Sky holds me… soft and clear…
And I’m finally… finally… here
(oh… finally…)
(yeah… just here…)

[Outro]
Breathe in…
Breathe out…
Weightless…
(oh… just for now…)

02ed53e2-40c8-4392-a949-9e424c7cfd91.name: Rain Will Wash  (Variation)
02ed53e2-40c8-4392-a949-9e424c7cfd91.sound:
psychedelic jazz, smoky male vocal,
upright bass, brushed drums, distant trumpet,
slow swing 70 bpm, late night club,
whiskey warmth, cigarette smoke reverb,
piano chords, walking bass, saxophone sighs,
rainy window, neon sign blur,
intimate confession, 3am philosophy
02ed53e2-40c8-4392-a949-9e424c7cfd91.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The mirror's cracked from side to side
A twin I cannot recognize
The shadow stretches on the wall
And answers when I do not call

[Chorus]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Verse 2]
The clockwork heart is winding down
A silent scream in every town
The radio plays static hymns
To drown the light along the limbs

[Chorus]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Bridge]
A flicker on the silver screen
The space between what is and seems
I taste the future on my tongue
It's hollow, and I am too young

[Chorus]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Chorus]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Outro]
The only ones... who know...
The only ones... who know...

b9ac7200-7e58-4738-9e2a-889b6e60b3b7.name:
Stars Keep Spinning
 (Variation)
b9ac7200-7e58-4738-9e2a-889b6e60b3b7.sound:
Boy Band Style, Chillwave: 
Atmospheric chillwave beat with catchy synth melody, smooth trap-inspired drums, airy pads, subtle bass with dreamy vibe, upbeat tempo 100-110 BPM. Vocals sung by male voices in boy band style — clear, harmonious, layered with smooth vocal blending and light autotune for polish. Emotional and youthful tone, combining warmth and intimacy typical for boy bands, while keeping modern chillwave production and viral social media appeal.
b9ac7200-7e58-4738-9e2a-889b6e60b3b7.lyrics:
[INTRO]
Stars above, they light the night (ooooh)
Turning worlds with gentle light (ah-ah)
[VERSE 1]
Someone gazes at the sky,
[soft reverb, gentle delay on “sky”]
Watching stars as they pass by,
[subtle synth pad swell]
Every spark a secret told,
[filter sweep up on “told”]
Whispers of a night so bold.
[airy echo tail]
[PRE-CHORUS 1]
And as the darkness falls, (falls)
[strong gated reverb with quick cut, pitch shift down on “falls”]
The world begins to turn, (turn)
[vocal doubling with slight stutter effect]
Every night a story calls, (calls)
[syncopated delay, feedback timed to beat]
In every star we learn.
[rich pad swell, subtle reverse reverb building into chorus]
[CHORUS]
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
[wide stereo delay with ping-pong effect on backing vocals]
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
[vocal chopped repeats and light glitch effect]
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
[soft chorus effect with added shimmer reverb]
And every evening starts again tonight.
[long reverb fade with subtle white noise sweep]
[VERSE 2]
Silent skies, a glowing dance,
[filter sweep low to high, gentle vinyl crackle]
Draw the dreamers in a trance,
[soft rising pad with delay]
Eyes reflect the endless space,
[echo with subtle pitch modulation]
In their gaze, the world’s embrace.
[delay sweep]
[PRE-CHORUS 2]
Hearts aligned with heaven's tune, (tune)
[vocal panning left-right with doubled harmony]
Time’s a circle in this view, (view)
[shimmer reverb with gentle tape stop effect]
Counting stars beneath the moon, (moon)
[background pad swell]
Night’s eternal rendezvous.
[fade out pads with subtle reverse swell]
[CHORUS]
(Repeat with added cymbal swells, vocal layering, and extra glitch effects)
[OUTRO]
So when you feel the stars above (above)
[reverse reverb echo with pitch rise on “above”]
Know they’re turning all with love (with love)
[volume fade with soft tape saturation]
And every night when eyes arise,
The world keeps spinning ‘neath the skies.
[ambient texture fade out with digital sparkle]

aa91f99a-e70f-470b-9cc7-9a5320895523.name: Echo Station
aa91f99a-e70f-470b-9cc7-9a5320895523.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Reverse cymbal swell into delayed guitar notes, analog synth drone]
[Verse 1]
[Driving bassline with chorus effect, crisp drums]
The signal fades from the orbital station (orbital station)
Your voice dissolves in the static's narration (static's narration)
[Clean guitar with spacey delay joins]
We built our castles in digital sand
Now I can't find your hand...
[Pre-Chorus]
[Drums build with tom fills, synth arpeggiator enters]
And all our memories are turning into code...
(turning into code...)
[Chorus]
[Wall of sound: distorted guitars, powerful drums, deep bass]
ECHO STATION! Can you hear me through the noise?
Through the vacuum and the silent voids!
[Synth lead melody soars over chords]
Every transmission, every broken dream!
Nothing is real, or so it seems...
[Verse 2]
[Band pulls back, bass becomes more melodic]
The monitors glow in the dark control room (control room)
Bloom of pixels like digital flowers in bloom (in bloom)
[Rhythm guitar chugs softly]
Your face appears then dissolves in the stream
Was any of it real, or just a dream?...
[Pre-Chorus]
[Energy builds again, synth becomes more urgent]
And all our memories are turning into code...
(turning into code...)
[Chorus]
[Full wall of sound returns, vocals more desperate]
ECHO STATION! Can you hear me through the noise?
Through the vacuum and the silent voids!
[Synth lead fights with guitar melody]
Every transmission, every broken dream!
Nothing is real, or so it seems...
[Bridge]
[Sudden drop: only pulsating synth bass and filtered drums]
I'm floating weightless between the stars
Counting all my scars...
[Guitar feedback builds slowly]
The universe whispers in binary speech
Just out of reach...
[Guitar Solo]
[Heavy with delay and reverb, melodic yet chaotic, over driving rhythm section]
[Final Chorus]
[Massive sound, layered vocals with harmonies]
ECHO STATION! CAN YOU HEAR ME THROUGH THE NOISE!
THROUGH THE VACUUM AND THE SILENT VOIDS!
[Double-time drum fills]
EVERY TRANSMISSION, EVERY BROKEN DREAM!
NOTHING IS REAL! NOTHING IS WHAT IT SEEMS!
[Outro]
[Elements break apart: guitar feedback, synth noises, drum echoes]
Echo... station...
(through the noise... through the void...)
Fades into radio static and single repeating synth note

ef533bc8-fb39-41d6-92f2-a54e106094d0.name: 3:17 AM Ritual (Moonlight Fragment) (Variation)
ef533bc8-fb39-41d6-92f2-a54e106094d0.sound: Male baritone — whispered verses, dry full baritone choruses. Piano: fragmented quotes from Beethoven’s Moonlight Sonata (1st movement), played on a worn upright piano — only essential notes, no full phrases, no sustain pedal, slightly detuned. Integrated as organic room sounds: bass pulses, incomplete arpeggios, single melodic fragments. Rhythm still driven by dripping faucet (82 BPM), chair creaks, kettle. No reverb, no digital effects. Only analog tape saturation, light vinyl crackle, and natural piano wood resonance. Mood: nostalgic, fractured, ritualistic. Style: 1975 Los Angeles apartment — a man, a piano, and a memory he can’t play all the way through.
ef533bc8-fb39-41d6-92f2-a54e106094d0.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[upright piano: first three notes of Beethoven’s Moonlight Sonata — C# minor arpeggio, slow, detached, slightly muffled]
[dripping faucet begins — 82 BPM]
[whispered, over the last note’s decay]
…you used to hum this…
[VERSE 1]
[whispered, piano plays only bass C# — once per line]
I brew silence in a chipped blue pot—
three spoons of sugar, none for taste.
Just the sound of crystals hitting glass…
like footsteps on a frozen lake.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[piano: fragmented arpeggio — incomplete, missing the top note]
The clock’s hands are sleeping.
The fridge hums a hymn.
[CHORUS]
[full baritone, dry — piano sustains C# minor chord (no pedal), then stops abruptly]
This is how I worship now:
steam, sugar, and the shape of your absence.
No prayers.
Just routine.
[VERSE 2]
[whisper returns, piano mimics dripping with high E — soft, muted]
I found your glove in a storm drain—
still warm, still ticking.
I wear it when the city sleeps
and pretend it’s your hand.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[piano: left-hand triplet pulse from Sonata’s 1st movement — slowed to 82 BPM, then fades]
The moon watches through grease on glass.
It doesn’t blink. Neither do I.
[CHORUS]
[baritone, same as before — piano plays only the root and fifth: C# + G#]
This is how I worship now:
steam, sugar, and the shape of your absence.
No prayers.
Just routine.
[POST-CHORUS]
[voice hums the Sonata’s melody — barely, off-key]
…da-da-da…
[piano answers with one final arpeggio — but stops at the third note]
[OUTRO]
[kettle whistles — cuts off]
[final whisper]
…you never finished it…
[5 seconds: dripping faucet + piano string vibration, then tape stop click]

a4fa9560-8df7-41a9-ae7e-b8fea2a9cc82.name: dancing alone in the dark (male version)
a4fa9560-8df7-41a9-ae7e-b8fea2a9cc82.sound: male falsetto R&B ballad, 94 BPM, cinematic synth-wave production, deep sub-bass that vibrates the chest, pulsing 808 kick with sidechain compression, shimmering analog synths with heavy chorus, distant reversed vocal echoes (“ghost in the rhythm”), fragile male falsetto lead vocal with breathy breaks, subtle pitch wobble on high notes, emotional vocal cracks on “I still feel you”, ambient hotel hallway reverb, neon sign glow texture in high end, vinyl crackle under verses, soft rain outside window samples panned left, whispered ad-libs (“you’re still here…”), no percussion drops, minimal hi-hats with swing groove, lush layered harmonies in chorus, 18kHz air layer like city lights at midnight, moody romantic melancholy, luxury loneliness, mastered for Spotify深夜 playlists, perfect for late-night drives, cinematic atmosphere, emotional restraint, studio-quality vocal processing, inspired by late-night urban isolation, intimate yet vast sound design, slow-burning emotional build, no chorus overload — quiet power, velvet-smooth textures, glowing darkness, noir romance vibe, vocal tone: tender, trembling, vulnerable, as if singing to a ghost
a4fa9560-8df7-41a9-ae7e-b8fea2a9cc82.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Your perfume still lingers on the sheets,
I don’t sleep here — I just breathe it.
The AC hums low, but your shadow’s warm,
I swear I hear you breathing in the storm.
[Pre-Chorus]
You said, “We’ll do this again,”
But love don’t come with a return.
Now the keycard won’t swipe right —
Just echoes in the hallway tonight.
[Chorus]
I’m dancing alone in the dark,
Your voice in the bass, playing my heart.
Neon signs bleed through the glass,
That kiss was a drug I can’t quit.
I know you’re gone…
But I still feel you in every drop —
A ghost in the rhythm,
A memory wrapped in velvet smoke.
[Verse 2]
I found your ring on the bathroom floor,
Still warm like you left it there before.
The pool’s empty, the music’s dead,
But I play our song on repeat instead.
[Bridge]
They turned off the lights.
Turned off the heat.
But the night still calls your name…
And I answer.
[Chorus]
I’m dancing alone in the dark,
Your voice in the bass, playing my heart.
Neon signs bleed through the glass,
That kiss was a drug I can’t quit.
I know you’re gone…
But I still feel you in every drop —
A ghost in the rhythm,
A memory wrapped in velvet smoke.

e360defa-f579-4ae5-b653-4ef2c92d560d.name: Davisha
e360defa-f579-4ae5-b653-4ef2c92d560d.sound: LUXURY female vocal tech house 128bpm , elite night club vibe , hypnotic vocals , trancey hook , velvet texture , marble fx , VIP FX: hidden 18.5kHz layer + 19kHz pulse (every 8 bars),  RULES: NO male vocals, NO English, NO verse lyrics, NO pre-chorus > 3 sec.

b2026c97-11a7-4799-aed6-c2cd173c2c26.name: Velvet Sidechain Mirage
b2026c97-11a7-4799-aed6-c2cd173c2c26.sound: lo-fi trip-hop with a smoked velvet atmosphere at 78 BPM, female whispered vocals, mix of Japanese and French phrases (nicotine-stained ASMR delivery). Suede-wrapped 808 kick with sub-bass bloom, snare is a snapped cigarette filter, hi-hats tumble like diamond chips. Obscure Moog prototype bass with tube amp hum, pads are decaying grand piano felt prepared with silk. Crystal ashtray tap SFX every 16 bars, VHS luxury hotel lobby ambiance textures. Detuned music box with missing teeth, broken elevator jazz melodies, vinyl locked groove. Only 7th/9th suspended chords, arrangement with at least 40% silence. Tape crinkle, vocal breaths off-grid, 19kHz private elevator ding, sub-bass like idling sports car three floors below. 0.8% cassette wow on drums, pads sidechained to cigar smoke exhales, one champagne bubble hidden in the left channel.
b2026c97-11a7-4799-aed6-c2cd173c2c26.lyrics:
[Intro – Whispered Japanese]
静かな夜に溶けていく (Shizukana yoru ni tokete iku)
[French] À l’étage, seule avec la fumée
[Verse – Japanese/French split]
煙草とヴェルヴェットシーツ (Tabako to veruvetto shiitsu)
[F] Tes lèvres goût de nicotine sous les néons
[JP] ガラスの灰皿、時が止まる (Garasu no haizara, toki ga tomaru)
[F] L’hôtel rêve, ascenseur sans fin
[Bridge – overlapping breath]
[JP] 静けさ息で乱して (Shizukesa iki de midashite)
[F] Souffle cassé, secret perdu
[Outro]
[JP – fading]
エレベーターの鐘が鳴る (Erebētā no kane ga naru)
[French – whispered]
Silence doré, sous la moquette
[Silence, breaths, lingering hiss]

Touch like a rush,

You pull me in

Touch like a rush, rush

Running through the rhythm, feet off the ground
Every breath another, reason not to slow down
Lost in the shimmer, drawn to your sound
Chasing out the silence, every second counts

Your eyes pull close, like gravity

350608e1-0ce0-407c-855d-d29a8187ce1a.name: Mysterio
350608e1-0ce0-407c-855d-d29a8187ce1a.sound: tech-house, late-night, female vocal snippets, rhythmic breaths, Spanish, French, deep sub-bass, TR-909, VIP FX, afterhours
350608e1-0ce0-407c-855d-d29a8187ce1a.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
(Déjame)
[mouth click]
Déja... Déjame...
[breath]
Pa-pa... (diamond tap)
Pa... pa...
[French: Viens...]
(syncopate: Viens)
[Pre-Chorus]
[leather snare swish]
Pa-pa... mmm...
(Breathing: Déjame... viens... viens...)
[Spanish: cerca?]
[French: encore?]
[Chorus]
Déja... Viens... ¿sientes?
(mouth sound: click, inhale)
Viens... Déjame... où?
Viens... Viens... / Déjame... Déjame... [repeat]
[Post-chorus]
[filtered breath]
Click-uh, tap, tape stop FX—
Viens... viens—viens
(whispered: viens...)
[Verse 2]
[chopped vocal: Déjame]
Dé... Déjame...
[breath]
Pa... pa...
Viens...
(soft: viens... viens)
[Lipstick snap]
[Bridge]
(whisper: Viens... viens)
Sidechain breathe (vi-vien-vient)
TR909 pulses deeper (déjame)
Close... closer?
[Chorus]
Déja... Viens... ¿sientes?
Viens... Déjame... où?
Viens... Viens... / Déjame... Déjame... [repeat]
[Post-chorus/Outro]
Viens... viens... viens...
Déjame... déjame... déjame...
(fading: viens... viens...)
[vocal dissolve, vinyl crackle]
[limo door slam under 60Hz]

9e2337e6-7342-4bb1-9346-4eb9c43ba6b3.name: Вижу
9e2337e6-7342-4bb1-9346-4eb9c43ba6b3.sound: trap, atmospheric, filtered vocals, 808 kick, post-rock synth, reverb, Russian lyrics
9e2337e6-7342-4bb1-9346-4eb9c43ba6b3.lyrics:
[Интро]
(звук дыхания)
Ушёл в себя, тишина давит (эй)
Чистый стиль – я в формате (да)
[Chorus]
Вижу свой статус в облаках выше (медленно)
Линии тянутся, ты не слышишь
Вечер стелется, будто сыро
Только резонируют цифры – (а-а)
Вижу свой статус в облаках выше
Сигнал сквозь холод, ты не слышишь
Плавно по кругу это повторю – (а-а)
[Verse 1]
Я помню путь сквозь ночь без окон
Молчу, но мысли – чистый ток
Светит экран, я внутри потока
Сны без слов – это мой итог
[Pre-Chorus]
Там, где твой голос тонет –
Тишина между стен
Ледяные ладони –
Тянутся, но нет
[Chorus]
Вижу свой статус в облаках выше
Линии тянутся, ты не слышишь
Вечер стелется, будто сыро
Только резонируют цифры – (а-а)
[Verse 2] (English / Russian)
Rain on the glass, feel the old wires hum
Далеко внутри, там, где молчание дом
No names, no signals – I run anyway
Я в частоте – иду дальше вновь
[Pre-Chorus]
Там, где твой голос тонет –
Тишина между стен
Ледяные ладони –
Тянутся, но нет
[Bridge]
Прошлое тихо, будто выцветший снимок
Скупы слова – остаётся ритм
Я не жду ответа, сам себя приму
Сигнал улова ловит мой мир
[Chorus] (melodic repeat)
Вижу свой статус в облаках выше
Линии тянутся, ты не слышишь
Плавно по кругу это повторю – (а-а)
[Аутро]
Молча тону в частоте (эй)
Ты не слышишь и это ок

c1e0d40e-f3d3-4414-9eee-edff87977120.name: WELL
c1e0d40e-f3d3-4414-9eee-edff87977120.sound: lo-fi, minimal, soft French-Russian piano, whispered ambience, slow tempo
c1e0d40e-f3d3-4414-9eee-edff87977120.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Soft piano F# → C#, double-socked, gentle room noise]
[French whisper: "WELL... l'heure bleue"]
[Verse 1]
suitcase on the floor—
a cold hallway breath
half-thoughts collect
shirt sleeve, folded corners
something left, or not yet
[Pre-Chorus]
Keys in the palm
waiting for nothing
a distant low hum
WELL... WELL...
[Chorus]
fading in the lobby—WELL
tracing old carpet lines
lights blink, say less, WELL
WELL... just passing by, (WELL)
WELL...
[Interlude]
[Ambient lobby noises, soft bass vibration]
[Verse 2]
strangers pass by
morning in the glass
shoes untied, phone silent
window smudged, breath drawn
stay or move, WELL
[Chorus]
fading in the lobby—WELL
tracing old carpet lines
lights blink, say less, WELL
WELL... just passing by, (WELL)
WELL...
[Bridge]
voices behind doors
heartbeat in the lift
"В Питере жить... WELL" (bass echoes)
"В Питере пить... WELL" (glass turns)
[Final]
"Питер не спит... WELL" (elevator echo, slowed 10x)
[Safe door latch, A#, -30dB]
[Outro]
WELL... WELL... WELL...

2d963228-2c41-4ab2-bbad-2caa4637b2d0.name: Majesty
2d963228-2c41-4ab2-bbad-2caa4637b2d0.sound: Lounge house, neo-classical, ultra-luxury bar jazz
2d963228-2c41-4ab2-bbad-2caa4637b2d0.lyrics:
[Cocktail Hour Intro - Piano and Double Bass]
[Ice clinking, leather chair creak]
[Verse 1]
I sit here at WELL
Where the silence speaks louder than words
Crystal glass in my hand
And I wonder how I got this far
From that young face in old photographs
Who believed the world was small
Here at WELL
Here at WELL
[Pre-Chorus - French spoken]
Un verre au WELL... c'est la vie
[Chorus]
If I could tell you now
What the years would bring
Would you still take that first step
Into this life of kings
Here at WELL, here at WELL
The lessons cost everything
Here at WELL, here at WELL
But look at what they bring
[Verse 2 - Russian elements in bass]
The lobby holds its breath tonight
Marble floors reflect my past
Every choice that led me here
To this leather chair at last
Kid, you'll trade your simple dreams
For champagne in crystal halls
Here at WELL
Here at WELL
[Pre-Chorus - French spoken]
La nuit s'endort
[Chorus]
If I could tell you now
What the years would bring
Would you still take that first step
Into this life of kings
Here at WELL, here at WELL
The lessons cost everything
Here at WELL, here at WELL
But look at what they bring
[Bridge - Vibraphone enters]
You'll learn that luxury
Has its own kind of weight
That success tastes different
When you're sitting here alone
But you'll make it, kid
You'll make it to this throne
[Final Chorus]
So I'll tell you now
What the years will bring
Take that first step
Into this life of kings
Here at WELL, here at WELL
The lessons cost everything
Here at WELL, here at WELL
But look at what they bring
[Coda - Piano theme, elevator doors]
Here at WELL
Here at WELL
Look at what they bring

5b77682d-fcc5-4719-b3e4-7115118bd973.name: MidnIGHT
5b77682d-fcc5-4719-b3e4-7115118bd973.sound: Night club vibe, 2:00, dance, euro, luxury production, energetic beats, 808 bass & hypnotic’s pads , instrumental verses, lyrics chorus & post-chorus, instrumental breaks for dance, instrumental intro & outro fade

68008004-d61e-49a5-a8d9-000030f13492.name: Птица моя
68008004-d61e-49a5-a8d9-000030f13492.sound: Russian folk, R&B duet, melodic chorus with traditional balalaika undertones
68008004-d61e-49a5-a8d9-000030f13492.lyrics:
[Verse 1 - Male]
В тишине я слышу твой голос вдали
Между гор и рек, где метели прошли
Каждый день ищу я знакомый твой след
Но найти не могу, лишь пустой силуэт
Птица моя, где же ты сейчас?
[Oй-ой-ой]
[Pre-chorus]
Позови меня сквозь туман
Дай мне знак, что ты близко там
(Эй, позови...)
[Chorus]
Птица моя, отзовись
В небе синем появись
Сердце к сердцу летит
Песня наша звучит
Птица моя, отзовись
[Verse 2 - Female]
Я слышу, как ветер несёт твои сны
Через поля, через дали весны
Помню тепло наших встреч у реки
Где же теперь ты? Ответь, подскажи
Птица моя, я зову тебя
[Ой-да-ой]
[Pre-chorus]
Позови меня сквозь туман
Дай мне знак, что ты близко там
(Эй, позови...)
[Chorus]
Птица моя, отзовись
В небе синем появись
Сердце к сердцу летит
Песня наша звучит
Птица моя, отзовись
[Bridge - Both]
Время как река течёт
Но любовь всё ждёт и ждёт
(Ла-ла-ла, ой да ла-ла-ла)
[Verse 3 - Both]
Вместе мы снова, как в первый тот раз

[Chorus - Final]

d4ee4452-687c-426b-bbc4-160ca7ad379f.name: Nocturne
d4ee4452-687c-426b-bbc4-160ca7ad379f.sound: experimental, avant-garde, piano, nocturne, urban, processed vocals, moody, 72 BPM
d4ee4452-687c-426b-bbc4-160ca7ad379f.lyrics:
[I. НОКТЮРН ДЛЯ КОНСЬЕРЖА]
[Left Channel: Piano, distant]
[Right Channel: Female voice (tape faded, 1962)]
WELL... entre minuit
---pause---
Pulse counting, pulse waiting (long inhale)
drip— drip— F# E D#
Midnight folds / crushed velvet air
(mm—mm—woh—well)
Rusted locks / no names here
Key in palm palm in shadow
[Instrumental: Morse played on piano strings - "Питер не спит"]
----
[II. КОВЁР ИЗ ШЁЛКА И ВИСКИ]
[Mono: Contrabass vibrato]
(В Питере пить... WELL)
Memory spills, chalice tipped (reverse tape: WELL мечты)
Silk underfoot, glint of rush,
L'addition... s'il vous plaît (whispered, through feather)
soft cracks, rooms rearrange (ah ah ah—well—uh—ah)
----
[III. ЛИФТ В ВЕЧНОСТЬ]
[7 Metronome ticks — each softer, £8,000 echo]
I ascend—pulse is absent
Glass in hand (champagne static)
(Piter... WELL) (whispered, abandoned)
[Outro: Low, stacking vocal harmonies on the edge of infrasound]
uhh... eh... WELL... woh-oh, ah...

7a55bdcc-5e6d-45da-b7e6-8469a96c5a72.name: Time Chase
7a55bdcc-5e6d-45da-b7e6-8469a96c5a72.sound: Gangsta rap, haunting orchestral cello, French whispers, deep 808, noir atmosphere
7a55bdcc-5e6d-45da-b7e6-8469a96c5a72.lyrics:
[Intro - Whispered French]
Le temps nous échappe
Les heures s'envolent
La nuit nous rattrape
Le destin nous contrôle
[Verse 1]
Walking these streets alone tonight
Following trails that lead me right
To where it all went down that day
When everything just slipped away
Clock striking ten, I check my phone
Another message, still unknown
Your last location's getting cold
While police reports unfold
Every step I take gets faster now
Every corner makes me wonder how
You disappeared without a trace
Left me running in this space
Time keeps moving, can't slow down
Through the streets of this cold town
Twelve strikes ring from the bell tower
Each sound draining my power
[Hook - Whispered French]
Le temps nous échappe (time slips away)
Les heures s'envolent (hours fly by)
La nuit nous rattrape (night catches up)
Le destin nous contrôle (destiny controls us)
[Verse 2 - Rap]
One more hour till midnight strikes
Following leads that don't seem right
Every clue leads to dead ends
Every witness just pretends
I'm getting closer to the truth
But evidence remains aloof
Each step echoes through these streets
While my heart steadily beats
Phone rings - unknown number calls
Message plays through static walls
"Minuit à la cathédrale"
That's where this chase will fall
Time is ticking, almost there
Feel the tension in the air
Bells are ringing through the night
As I prepare for this fight
[Bridge - Alternating French/English]
Le temps (Running out of moments)
S'épuise (Getting closer now)
La vérité (Truth is coming)
Se dévoile (Can't turn back)
[Final Verse]
Church bells strike the midnight hour
Rain begins to slowly shower
Standing here beneath the spires
As all my hope expires
Then I see you in the dark
Standing by the ancient arch
All this time you watched me search
From shadows of this church
Now the truth comes crashing down
As you step onto the ground
Face to face at last we stand
Time slips through my hands
Everything makes sense right now
Why you left, the when and how
In this moment time stands still
As church bells echo shrill
[Outro - Whispered French]
Le temps nous échappe
Les heures s'envolent
La nuit nous rattrape
Le destin nous contrôle

Time is ticking, pressure builds

(Whispered radio chatter fades out)

422dd022-fc1f-4192-a0d6-59c0745fcef1.name: AND THE NIGHT
422dd022-fc1f-4192-a0d6-59c0745fcef1.sound:
A warm, hazy Christmas miracle recorded in 1973. The track is built around a BRUTAL, WEATHERED MALE VOCAL — a voice of cracked leather, gravel, and spent embers. It's a LOW, CHESTY BARITONE that RASPS and WHISPERS, constantly hovering between a strained, intimate hush and a raw, emotional GROWL, as if every word is pulled from a deep, aching place. The roughness isn't aggressive; it's the sound of raw, unfiltered wonder.

The music is gentle, psychedelic soul. A soft, swinging rhythm from brushed drums and walking upright bass. Dreamy, twinkling Fender Rhodes electric piano chords. Wistful, lyrical lines from a muted trumpet that sound like smiles. Subtle bells and celesta sparkle like distant Christmas lights.

The production is all vintage warmth and closeness — soft tape saturation, a cozy room reverb, making the voice feel both close-mic'd and vast. The mood is genuine, stunned nostalgia. It's the sound of a scarred man struck silent by beauty on a cold street, his voice breaking not from sorrow, but from the sheer weight of the feeling.
422dd022-fc1f-4192-a0d6-59c0745fcef1.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Gritty, intimate whisper, close-mic'd]
The city's dressed in Christmas lace,
A frozen, sparkling, bright embrace.
(vocal stays in low register, breathy)
A thousand lanterns line the streets,
Where every stranger that you meet...
(voice tightens, slight rasp)
They stop and stare, they catch their breath,
This beauty cheating winter's death.
(chesty, pushed whisper)
The shop windows, they gleam and glow,
With tales of joy in falling snow.

[Pre-Chorus: Voice strains, becomes more present]
And can you feel it in the air?
This magic, heavy, everywhere?
(a raw, spoken quality)
It wraps around us like a thread...
A story in each streetlight's head...

[Chorus: Voice opens into a raw, strained BARITONE, not shouting]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN...
(voice cracks on "WRAP")
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN...
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE...
(gravelly, sustained)
LOOKING BACK... AT ME...
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND...
(emotion breaks through)
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND...
IT'S PULSING IN THE EVENING AIR...
A SECRET... THAT WE ALL SHARE...

[Verse 2: Returns to the gritty whisper, but warmer]
The tram bells ring a distant cheer,
The scent of pine is crystal clear.
A couple laughs, their hands entwined,
A brighter future in their mind.
(voice smiles through the rasp)
The old man by the chestnut stand,
Sees wonder in this fairyland.
His eyes reflect the colored streams,
Of long-forgotten, childhood dreams.

[Pre-Chorus: Repeat with more vocal fry]
And can you feel it in the air?
This magic, heavy, everywhere?
It wraps around us like a thread...
A story in each streetlight's head...

[Chorus: More forceful, the strain is intentional]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN!
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN!
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE!
LOOKING BACK... AT ME!
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND!
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND!
IT'S PULSING IN THE EVENING AIR!
A SECRET... THAT WE ALL SHARE!

[Bridge: Voice clears slightly, becoming a direct, husky confession]
Oh, the frost it paints the window glass...
But out there, nothing comes to pass...
But peace... and such a strange delight...
(slow, deliberate)
To be alive... in such a night...
The city's heart... it beats so slow...
In every lamp's... electric glow...

[Final Chorus: Apotheosis. Voice is ravaged, emotional, but still a baritone]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN!
(tearing grit)
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN!
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE!
LOOKING BACK... AT ME!
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND!
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND!
IT'S PULSING... IN MY VEINS TONIGHT!
(full chest voice, breaking)
THIS CITY... BURNS... SO BRIGHT!

[Outro: Voice collapses back to the original, exhausted whisper]
It's so beautiful this year...
(breathy, fading)
So beautiful...
You can see it... in their eyes...
No one's in disguise...
Just the lights...
And the night...
...and the snow...
...and it's right...
...so right...

5594ee9a-2b24-4ede-bfa4-aee49a80c61e.name: Iron Dawn
5594ee9a-2b24-4ede-bfa4-aee49a80c61e.sound: retro chillwave with dreamy synths, cloud rap with atmospheric vocals, ethereal vocal samples
5594ee9a-2b24-4ede-bfa4-aee49a80c61e.lyrics:
[intro Ambient tones with reverb, Soft acoustic finger picking, descending bass]
Куплет 1:
Уже все чуяли грозу.
Уже все знали что-то.
Знали,
Что не напрасно, знать, везут
Солдаты черепах из стали.
Куплет 2:
Тревога в воздухе витала,
Как будто мир застыл в огне.
И каждый чувствовал, что мало
Осталось времени в войне.
Бридж:
Минуты тяжкие текли,
Как капли зимнего дождя.
И в этот час со всей земли
Сошлись пути, судьбу вершá.
Набатом бились времена,
И рвался старый мир кругом.
Была та ночь обречена
Стать новой жизни рубежом.
Припев:
И началось…
Метнулись взоры,
Войной гражданскою горя,
И дымом пушечным с "Авроры"
Взошла железная заря.
Куплет 3:
Над городом туман клубился,
И ветер пел свою печаль.
Народ в смятении молился,
Чтоб не пришла кровавая даль.
Куплет 4:
И в сердце каждого тревога
Горела ярко, как костер.
Судьба народа и порога
Решалась в этот страшный спор.
Припев:
И началось…
Метнулись взоры,
Войной гражданскою горя,
И дымом пушечным с "Авроры"
Взошла железная заря.
[Bass decreases to single notes ]
Припев (повтор):
И началось…
Метнулись взоры,
Войной гражданскою горя,
И дымом пушечным с "Авроры"
Взошла железная заря.
Припев (повтор):
И началось…
Метнулись взоры,
Войной гражданскою горя,
И дымом пушечным с "Авроры"
Взошла железная заря.
[outro Final ambient dissolves into silence fade...]

71b25d5a-f008-4dc3-9e2d-16278ab01ebe.name: Northern Light
71b25d5a-f008-4dc3-9e2d-16278ab01ebe.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Warm synth pad, vinyl crackle, distant bass guitar harmonics]
[Verse 1]
[Drum machine with deep kick, sparse snare with long reverb]
White nights don't end, just fade to blue (fade to blue)
This neon cross watches over me and you (me and you)
[Clean electric guitar with chorus enters]
I trace the patterns on the frosted glass
Waiting for this lonely hour to pass...
[Pre-Chorus]
[Bassline becomes more active, synth strings swell]
And the city breathes with a thousand lights
(thousand lights...)
[Chorus]
[Full arrangement, driving bass, powerful drums]
I'm not asking for forever, just for tonight
Hold me close in this northern light
[Wah-wah guitar fills]
Under this sky so pale and bright
We'll forget everything till morning's light...
[Verse 2]
[Band pulls back to verse arrangement]
The elevator shaft sings its metal song (metal song)
We've been standing here, knowing right from wrong
[Bass becomes more melodic]
Your hand feels warm in this chilly air
Like a promise that you'll always care...
[Pre-Chorus]
[Bassline intensifies, drums build]
And the city breathes with a thousand lights
(thousand lights...)
[Chorus]
[Full band returns with energy]
I'm not asking for forever, just for tonight
Hold me close in this northern light
[Wah-wah guitar accents]
Under this sky so pale and bright
We'll forget everything till morning's light...
[Bridge]
[Band drops to bass and drums only, vocals become more intimate]
The clock on the wall has stopped at three
Just you here, alone with me...
[Synth strings gradually return]
All the words we left unsaid
Are dancing in my head...
[Guitar Solo]
[Melodic, emotional solo over chorus changes, light distortion with delay]
[Final Chorus]
[Full band, passionate vocals with strong backing harmonies]
I'm not asking for forever, just for TONIGHT!
Hold me close in this NORTHERN LIGHT!
[Powerful drum fills]
Under this sky so pale and bright!
We'll forget everything till morning's light!
[Outro]
[Elements drop out one by one - drums first, then guitar]
Only bass, synth pad and vocal harmonies remain
(fade to blue... northern light...)
Fade out with vinyl crackle

83ff8bc6-1aa9-475a-9075-291d53784feb.name: Eternal Nights
83ff8bc6-1aa9-475a-9075-291d53784feb.sound: Arabian vibe, Harmonic vocals, lo-fi beats, deep emotion, ambient synth,
83ff8bc6-1aa9-475a-9075-291d53784feb.lyrics:
[intro]
ألف ليلة وليلة تبدأ
حكايات ساحرة تعانق القلوب
[verse 1]
في كل ليلة جديد
حكاية تسرد على عرش الدهر
شخوص تتنقل عبر الزمن
وأحلام تتحقق في عالم السحر
[pre-chorus]
نسمع صدى الأصوات
تتوالى كقصائد شعرية
[chorus]
ألف ليلة وليلة
عالم من خيال وأحلام
حيث يلتقي الماضي والحاضر
وفي النهاية نجد السلام
[post chorus]
باللغات العالمية نسافر
نجمع الحب من كل أرض
[bridge - бэк-вокал на разных языках]
English: "One thousand nights of wonder"
Español: "Mil noches de maravilla"
Français: "Mille nuits d'émerveillement"
中文: "一千个奇妙之夜"
Русский: "Тысяча волшебных ночей"
Deutsch: "Tausend Nächte des Wunders"
Português: "Mil noites de maravilha"
Italiano: "Mille notti di magia"
[instrumental break]
[verse 2]
حكايات الشجرة العالية
تدور مع الزمن والأيام
لكن جمالها يبقى خالداً
كما نجوم السماء تتوالى
[pre-chorus]
نرى أمامنا عالماً
يمتزج فيه الواقع بالخيال
[chorus]
ألف ليلة وليلة
عالم من خيال وأحلام
حيث يلتقي الماضي والحاضر
وفي النهاية نجد السلام
[vocal interlude - многоязычное хоровое пение]
"One thousand... Mil y una... Mille et une..."
[bridge 2]
كل قصة تروى بلغة الحب
تجمعنا على طاولة واحدة
نتشارك الذكريات والأمل
ونكتب معاً فصلاً جديداً
[final chorus]
ألف ليلة وليلة تبقى خالدة (Arabic)
Тысяча и одна ночь вечен (Russian)
One thousand and one nights remain eternal (English)
Mil y una noches viven para siempre (Spanish) Mille et une nuits restent éternelles (French)
(Повтор основной арабской строки) ألف ليلة وليلة تبقى خالدة
千零一夜永远流传 (Chinese)
Tausendundeine Nächte bleiben ewig (German)
Mil e uma noites vivem para sempre (Portuguese)
Mille e una notte resta eterna (Italian)
(Финальная мощная строка на арабском) وتعيش الحكايا للأبد في قلوبنا
[outro]
ألف ليلة وليلة تنتهي
لكن قلبها يبقى حياً
في كل زمان ومكان
تعيش الحكايا للأبد

0ff3e63e-5c0e-4581-aa6a-485845abd591.name: Static Veins
0ff3e63e-5c0e-4581-aa6a-485845abd591.sound: Dark electronic, ethereal female vocals, industrial beats, deep 808 bass, haunting synths
0ff3e63e-5c0e-4581-aa6a-485845abd591.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I feel it coursing through my mind
Like radio waves that bind
You programmed me to stay in line
But something's breaking the design
[Pre-Chorus]
Static fills my veins tonight
But underneath the noise, I fight
[Chorus]
Static fills my veins but I'm still alive
Breaking through the waves, I'll survive
(I'll survive, I'll survive)
[Verse 2]
These wires wrapped around my heart
Are fraying at the ends and start
Your frequencies can't reach me now
I'm learning how to feel somehow
[Pre-Chorus]
The signal's getting weaker now
As human patterns show me how
[Chorus]
Static fills my veins but I'm still alive
Breaking through the waves, I'll survive
(I'll survive, I'll survive)
[Bridge]
La-da-di-da, oh-way-oh
Ka-li-ma-ta, so-way-oh
[Industrial beats intensify]
Ah-eh-ih-oh, breaking free
Na-na-na-na, let me be
[Final Chorus]
Static fills my veins but I'm still alive
Every beat's my own, I'll survive
Your code is breaking down inside
As real emotions amplify
(I'm alive, I'm alive)
[Outro]
[Mechanical sounds fading]
(Feel the pulse... feel the change...)
The static clears...
I'm awake...

ce6ddc7f-9cb7-4d4a-8b57-096060443207.name: Streetlights & Truths
ce6ddc7f-9cb7-4d4a-8b57-096060443207.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
ce6ddc7f-9cb7-4d4a-8b57-096060443207.lyrics:
[City night ambience — distant traffic, soft synth bass enters, slow drum tap]

[Verse 1]
Midnight walk with my shadow long
Streetlights hum an old man’s song
No destination, just the need to move
Away from silence that I can’t improve

Saw my reflection in a coffee shop glass
Looked tired, but the eyes — they still ask
“What’s the point if you’re always half?”
I didn’t answer… just kept down the path

[Pre-Chorus]
The night don’t judge
It just listens…
And the truth
Comes in whispers…

[Chorus]
Streetlights and truths, they meet at 2 AM
When the world’s asleep, but I’m wide again
No filter, no mask, just what’s real and raw
And I’m learnin’ to live with what I’m fighting for
(oh-oh, fighting for)
(quiet now…)

[Verse 2]
Got a text I haven’t sent for days
Words too heavy for the light of day
So I carry ‘em like stones in my coat
Hopin’ one day they’ll just float

Yeah, the city sleeps — but my mind’s a train
Rattlin’ over past mistakes like rain
But even broken tracks can lead somewhere
If you’re willin’ just to sit… and stare

[Pre-Chorus]
The night don’t fix
It just shows you…
And the truth
Grows in silence…

[Chorus]
Streetlights and truths, they meet at 2 AM
When the world’s asleep, but I’m wide again
No filter, no mask, just what’s real and raw
And I’m learnin’ to live with what I’m fighting for
(oh-oh, learnin’ slow)
(still I know…)

[Bridge]
I don’t need answers right now
Just the courage to say it out loud:
“I’m not okay… and that’s alright”
Under streetlights, in the quiet night

[Chorus — stripped down, voice closer, beat minimal]
Streetlights and truths… 2 AM…
World’s asleep… but I’m wide again…
No mask… just skin… just scars… just me…
And that’s enough… for now… you’ll see…
(oh… enough…)
(yeah… just be…)

[Outro]
Footsteps fade…
Lights stay…
Truths remain…
(oh… they stay…)

3133c5da-8d85-4e8e-b99c-6e23e4e2bf82.name: Rain Will
3133c5da-8d85-4e8e-b99c-6e23e4e2bf82.sound:
psychedelic jazz noir, smoked velvet baritone,
upright bass walking through fog, brushed snare like rainfall,
distant muted trumpet crying through brick walls,
slow swing 68 bpm, last call at the blue lotus club,
whiskey warmth in the throat, cigarette smoke becoming reverb,
piano chords left hanging, unanswered questions,
saxophone sighs between verses, breath as instrument,
rainy window reflections, neon signs bleeding color,
intimate confession to the bartender, 3am philosophy,
tape saturation like old bourbon, vinyl crackle as percussion,
double bass harmonics like streetlight shimmer,
no drums, only brush on cymbal, heartbeat tempo,
minor 7th chords, unresolved progressions,
space between notes wider than the notes themselves,
one take, no overdubs, room microphone bleed,
cigarette ash on the piano, empty glass resonance,
dawn never comes in this club
3133c5da-8d85-4e8e-b99c-6e23e4e2bf82.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The mirror's cracked from side to side
A twin I cannot recognize
The shadow stretches on the wall
And answers when I do not call

[Chorus]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Verse 2]
The clockwork heart is winding down
A silent scream in every town
The radio plays static hymns
To drown the light along the limbs

[Chorus]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Bridge]
A flicker on the silver screen
The space between what is and seems
I taste the future on my tongue
It's hollow, and I am too young

[Chorus]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Chorus]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Outro]
The only ones... who know...
The only ones... who know...

1cfcecb4-7a54-4bfb-8845-f012804d6fe5.name: Echo Station (drier vox, -10s)
1cfcecb4-7a54-4bfb-8845-f012804d6fe5.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Fingerpicked acoustic guitar, subtle vinyl crackle, distant piano]

[Verse 1]
[Soft drums enter, brushed snare, warm bass line]
The chandelier still swings from last night's dance (last night's dance)
There's stillness in this second chance (second chance)
[Electric guitar with tremolo joins]
Your shadow lingers on the stair
And perfume hangs in the morning air...

[Pre-Chorus]
[Drums build slightly, bass becomes more melodic]
And outside, the rain begins to fall
(begins to fall...)

[Chorus]
[Full band swells, strings enter, emotional intensity]
PORCELAIN SKY, breaking so easily
All your promises come back to me
[Slide guitar weeps in background]
Every "forever" was a sweet mistake
For heaven's sake...

[Verse 2]
[Band returns to intimate arrangement]
The clock ticks loud in the empty hall (empty hall)
Photographs begin to pall (begin to pall)
[Bass walks gently underneath]
I trace your face behind the glass
Watching all the hours pass...

[Pre-Chorus]
[Energy builds again, strings swell]
And outside, the rain begins to fall
(begins to fall...)

[Chorus]
[Full arrangement returns, vocals more powerful]
PORCELAIN SKY, breaking so easily
All your promises come back to me
[Slide guitar cries out]
Every "forever" was a sweet mistake
For heaven's sake...

[Bridge]
[Band drops to piano and vocal only]
I counted all the cracks upon the ceiling...
[Strings enter slowly, one by one]
Each one a different feeling...
[Drums re-enter with soft mallets]
None of them were you...

[Instrumental Break]
[Piano takes lead melody, strings swell, gentle drum build]

[Final Chorus]
[Full orchestral arrangement, passionate vocals]
PORCELAIN SKY, BREAKING SO EASILY!
ALL YOUR PROMISES COME BACK TO ME!
[Slide guitar soars over top]
EVERY "FOREVER" WAS A SWEET MISTAKE!
FOR HEAVEN'S SAKE! FOR HEAVEN'S SAKE!

[Outro]
[Elements fade: drums first, then strings, then bass]
Only piano and vocal remain
(porcelain sky...)
Final

4f97a9ec-c1bc-4864-a0f8-d854e17d2926.name: Bonus Track: Echoes Through Time (Chillwave Psychedelic Remix)
4f97a9ec-c1bc-4864-a0f8-d854e17d2926.sound: chillwave psychedelic, warm lush evolving synth pads with soft granular textures, filtered chopped wah guitar loops with dreamy glitch and smooth delay, deep warm synth bass, soft laid-back electronic drums with brushed snares and gentle glitch percussion, airy wide ambient pads, vintage deep baritone male vocal samples layered with gentle tape hiss and shimmer, multi-layered harmonized vocals with airy granular delay and tape saturation, vinyl crackle and tape hiss textures blended with granular synthesis, wide lush reverb and delay, tempo 100 BPM, mood: dreamy chillwave psychedelic fusion, smooth, calming, nostalgic yet futuristic, blending vintage vocal essence with modern chillwave sound design and temporal psychedelic aesthetics
4f97a9ec-c1bc-4864-a0f8-d854e17d2926.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[vintage vinyl crackle fades into warm, lush chillwave synth pads with soft granular textures — 100 BPM]
[deep raw baritone male vocal samples from album tracks, layered with gentle analog tape hiss and subtle shimmer]
[VERSE 1 - layered vocal snippets]
Lost voices wake below,
Whispers glow beneath neon skies,
Mirage dances on sun-bleached walls,
Silent currents flow through endless space.
[BUILD-UP]
[filtered wah guitar loops chopped with dreamy glitch effects and smooth delay]
Time folds soft in secret streams,
Phantom mirage, elusive light,
Waves ripple on twilight seas,
Veils of sound embrace the night.
[CHORUS - vocal harmonies sampled with airy granular delay and tape saturation]
Echoes through the timeless haze,
Dreams and shadows intertwined,
Psychedelic pulses pave,
A cosmic wave, beyond time.
[DROP]
[deep warm synth bass, soft laid-back electronic drums with brushed snares and gentle glitch percussion, airy pads]
Fading light, a glowing tide,
Flowing where the shadows sleep,
Neon dreams, silent streams,
Fade beyond… until rebirth.
[OUTRO]
[vinyl crackle and tape hiss blended with lush granular synthesis and wide ambient reverb]
Voices fade into the dawn,
Until the new day calls.

8086f61e-03b3-4a96-9aca-6c9d0534fc90.name: Qui Suis-je (Who Am I)
8086f61e-03b3-4a96-9aca-6c9d0534fc90.sound: French noir electronic, ethereal synths, deep 808 bass, coastal ambience, 70-90 BPM
8086f61e-03b3-4a96-9aca-6c9d0534fc90.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Ocean waves and soft rain]
[Verse 1]
Dans ce parfum de sel marin
Je te cherche mais ne vois rien
Ces yeux qui croisent les miens ce soir
Me font douter de mon histoire
(Ah, ah-ah)
[Pre-chorus]
Derrière la soie et le velours
Qui sommes-nous dans ces détours?
(Oh-oh, oh-oh)
[Chorus]
Qui suis-je quand tu me regardes?
Est-ce moi que tu vois ce soir?
Dans ce bal où les cœurs s'attardent
Je perds mon âme dans le noir
(La-la, la-la-la)
[Post-chorus]
(Ah-ah, dans le noir)
(Oh-oh, qui suis-je?)
[Verse 2]
Sur la terrasse de cristal
Les vagues chantent le festival
De ces visages inconnus
Qui dansent jusqu'à l'imprévu
[Bridge]
[Spoken softly]
Les apparences nous séparent
Mais la vérité nous lie
(Oh-oh)
[Chorus]
Qui suis-je quand tu me regardes?
Est-ce moi que tu vois ce soir?
Dans ce bal où les cœurs s'attardent
Je perds mon âme dans le noir
[Outro]
[Rain intensifies]
(La-la-la, qui suis-je?)
(Oh-oh-oh, dans le noir)

639acf5b-4678-4977-992c-3340fa81378c.name: Siren Call
639acf5b-4678-4977-992c-3340fa81378c.sound: Alternative drum&bass, melancholic cello, noir saxophone, urban field recordings, lo-fi grit
639acf5b-4678-4977-992c-3340fa81378c.lyrics:
[Intro]
(La-la, la-la-la...)
[Urban sounds fade in]
[Verse 1]
Walking past your window again
Just another face in the blur
Can't tell if you're even in there
Through the static and the stir
[Pre-chorus]
The buses rush by like always
Your phone keeps ringing my calls away
Between the horns and the trains
I swear I hear you say
[Chorus]
Why does every siren sound like my name?
(Oh, oh, like my name)
Why does every siren sound like my name?
(Oh, oh, like my name)
Can't get away from the strain
Of hearing you through the rain
[Verse 2]
Eight million voices outside
But yours is the one I can't find
Through construction site lullabies
And subway car battle cries
[Pre-chorus]
The city's getting louder now
As I'm trying to break through somehow
Between the beats and the pain
I swear I hear you say
[Chorus]
Why does every siren sound like my name?
(Oh, oh, like my name)
Why does every siren sound like my name?
(Oh, oh, like my name)
Can't get away from the strain
Of hearing you through the rain
[Rap]
Fast forward through the morning crowd
Head down while my thoughts get loud
Every footstep's got me counting time
Every street sign's got me losing mine
Pressed against the window of the L-train
Watch the stations pass like memories fade
Signal's cutting in and out again
Static on the line won't let me pretend
That I don't hear your voice in passing cars
In coffee shop bells and crossing guards
In every beat of this city's heart
In every sound that tears us apart
And maybe I'm just going crazy here
Or maybe you're actually somewhere near
But all these sounds keep drowning out
Everything I need to shout
[Bridge]
[Cello and sax interlude]
The quiet moments slip away
(La-la-la...)
Between the cracks of everyday
(La-la-la...)
I'm trying to find some peace of mind
But this city won't rewind
[Chorus]
Why does every siren sound like my name?
(Oh, oh, like my name)
Why does every siren sound like my name?
(Oh, oh, like my name)
Can't get away from the strain
Of hearing you through the rain
[Outro]
(La-la, la-la-la...)
[Urban sounds fade out]

19063182-af50-476d-9740-7967e51e344a.name: Le Masque d'Or
19063182-af50-476d-9740-7967e51e344a.sound: Electronic Forró fusion, noir atmospherics, luxurious coastal soundscape, French vocals
19063182-af50-476d-9740-7967e51e344a.lyrics:
[Intro: Ocean waves, rain]
[Verse 1]
Je te vois là
Dans la foule
Ton masque brille
Cette nuit
Je m'approche
Sans un mot
Tu me regardes
Je le sais
[Pre-chorus]
Les vagues dansent
La nuit avance
Mon cœur balance
Entre nous deux
[Chorus]
Derrière le masque d'or
Je perds mon chemin
Derrière le masque d'or
C'est notre destin
(Notre destin, notre destin)
[Verse 2]
La musique
Nous emporte
Tes yeux brillent
Je frissonne
La distance
Disparaît
Dans la danse
Je me perds
[Pre-chorus]
Les vagues dansent
La nuit avance
Mon cœur balance
Entre nous deux
[Chorus]
Derrière le masque d'or
Je perds mon chemin
Derrière le masque d'or
C'est notre destin
(Notre destin, notre destin)
[Solo: Accordion]
[Bridge]
Je veux savoir
Qui tu es
Dans mes bras
Sans masque
Sans peur
Sans doute
Cette nuit
À Rio
[Chorus]
Derrière le masque d'or
Je perds mon chemin
Derrière le masque d'or
C'est notre destin
(Notre destin, notre destin)
[Outro: Waves fade]

6e2b0e16-e0a6-451c-81e9-d2a2ae351233.name: Frozen Heart
6e2b0e16-e0a6-451c-81e9-d2a2ae351233.sound: Dramatic ballad, orchestral soundtrack, romantic Russian classical influence
6e2b0e16-e0a6-451c-81e9-d2a2ae351233.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Time stands still in this cold embrace
My heart beats slow, yet I keep faith
I search for warmth in empty space
While winter lingers in this place
[Pre-chorus]
Each morning brings the same gray sky
(Ah-ah-ah)
I'm waiting here, still wondering why
[Chorus]
Like a frozen heart, I'm waiting for the thaw to start
In this endless winter, we've been kept too long apart
[Verse 2]
Remember how the flowers bloomed
When love was new and unassumed
Now ice has formed where petals fell
And time has cast its frozen spell
[Pre-chorus]
The world feels different without you
(Ah-ah-ah)
But spring will guide me back to you
[Chorus]
Like a frozen heart, I'm waiting for the thaw to start
In this endless winter, we've been kept too long apart
[Bridge]
[Orchestral swell]
(La-la-la, ah-ah)
I feel the change coming through
Like morning sun breaking anew
[Final Chorus]
Like a frozen heart, I'm waiting for the thaw to start
In this endless winter, we've been kept too long apart
(We've been kept too long apart)

f0443852-3306-4642-9e0f-fe95827b27d8.name: The Way You Look

f0443852-3306-4642-9e0f-fe95827b27d8.lyrics:
[Verse 1]

My heart starts racing, can't keep pace

Without saying a single sound
[Chorus]
The way you look at me says everything
Don't need to speak, just let me sing
Baby when you're close like this
Everything I want, everything I miss
(Oh, everything, oh everything)
[Post-chorus]
La-la-la, let me feel
La-la-la, this is real
(Oh baby)
[Verse 2]
Your fingertips brush past my skin
Temperature rising deep within
Every breath becomes so slow
Taking time, letting feelings flow
[Pre-chorus]
The night is ours completely now
Lost in moments, showing how
Every touch becomes a sign
Of what's been yours and what's been mine
[Chorus]
The way you look at me says everything
Don't need to speak, just let me sing
Baby when you're close like this
Everything I want, everything I miss
(Oh, everything, oh everything)
[Solo]
[Smooth R&B guitar solo]
[Bridge]

[Chorus]

255b3f62-51e3-4fda-b685-038e6f9b3557.name: Waves Returning
255b3f62-51e3-4fda-b685-038e6f9b3557.sound: Ambient experimental, ocean soundscape, naturalistic textures, atmospheric drones
255b3f62-51e3-4fda-b685-038e6f9b3557.lyrics:
[Intro]
Are we all just waves
Returning to shore?
[Verse 1]
Sitting here alone
Salt in my hair
Wind on my face
Watching the tide
Come and go
Like my thoughts of you
(ooh, ooh)
[Pre-chorus]
Each day I write
These words in sand
They wash away
Just like our plans
[Chorus]
Are we all just waves?
Moving back and forth
Are we all just waves?
Finding our way home?
(la la la, finding our way)
[Verse 2]
Pink sky above
Reminds me when
We sat right here
Made promises
That couldn't last
Beyond sunset
(ah-ah-ah)
[Bridge]
The water asks
Where did you go?
I have no words
Just empty notes
In bottles thrown
To ocean floors
(mmm...)
[Pre-chorus]
My heart writes signs
In shifting sand
They drift away
Like grains of time
[Chorus]
Are we all just waves?
Moving back and forth
Are we all just waves?
Finding our way home?
(la la la, finding our way)
[Outro]
I let you flow
Back to sea
Maybe that's
What love should be
Like waves that know
When to release
(ooh, when to release)
[Final]
Are we all just waves...
Returning to shore...

64e3608d-e293-4329-be1c-6496fdb995ba.name: Одинокий сигнал в холодной тени,
64e3608d-e293-4329-be1c-6496fdb995ba.sound: Trip hop, ethereal female vocals, heavy bass guitar, fast jungle beats, reverb 808 bass, ambient cello

[intro]
[last signal, robotic voice]
[verse 1]
Одинокий сигнал в холодной тени,
Уставшие спутники шепчут мне,

[chorus]

Lonely girl with gentle hair

[Subtle guitar arpeggios]
[Pre-Chorus]

Time is slipping, night is falling

[Chorus]

Underneath this crystal sky
We don't need no fancy moves

[Romantic saxophone, lush strings]
[Verse 2]

I've been waiting all my life

Like the stars are shining brighter

c4079762-4e35-45ad-a680-25acd8799822.name: Stars Keep Spinning (Soviet Rock 80s)
c4079762-4e35-45ad-a680-25acd8799822.sound:
Soviet Rock 80s Musical:  
Energetic 1980s rock sound with clean, slightly overdriven electric guitars, driving bass guitar, and acoustic drum kit recorded with natural room ambience. Powerful and confident male vocals with slight grain and natural doubling, supported by layered vocal harmonies and warm, sustained organ pads. Rhythmic guitar strumming with melodic lead guitar fills and dynamic drum fills to emphasize emotional peaks. Tempo around 110-115 BPM with steady, marching rhythm. Production emphasizes organic warmth, clarity, and live band feel typical of rock records from that era, without electronic effects or modern processing.
c4079762-4e35-45ad-a680-25acd8799822.lyrics:
[INTRO]
Stars above, they light the night (э-э)
Turning worlds with gentle light (оу-оу)
[clean electric guitar with slight overdrive, driving bass guitar, energetic analog drums with natural room reverb]
[VERSE 1]
Someone gazes at the sky,
[strong, confident male vocals with slight grain]
Watching stars as they pass by,
[powerful rhythm guitar chord strikes]
Every spark a secret told,
[melodic lead guitar fills]
Whispers of a night so bold.
[organ or synth pad subtly supporting]
[PRE-CHORUS 1]
And as the darkness falls, (falls)
[vocal doubling with warm reverb]
The world begins to turn, (turn)
[steady drum rolls and cymbal crashes]
Every night a story calls, (calls)
[bass guitar walking with groove]
In every star we learn.
[dramatic guitar bend and slight delay]
[CHORUS]
Look up, the stars are shining just for you (shining just for you)
[vocal harmonies layered with natural reverb]
Every night, they spin the world anew (spin the world anew)
[strong chorus guitar strumming and bass drive]
Eyes that watch keep the magic in the light, (magic in the light)
[classic organ sustained chords]
And every evening starts again tonight.
[dynamic drum fills and guitar accents]
[VERSE 2]
Silent skies, a glowing dance,
[clear lead guitar licks with vibrato]
Draw the dreamers in a trance,
[groovy bass under tight drum pattern]
Eyes reflect the endless space,
[mellow synth pad in background]
In their gaze, the world’s embrace.
[rhythmic guitar strums]
[PRE-CHORUS 2]
Hearts aligned with heaven's tune, (tune)
[vocal layering with subtle chorus]
Time’s a circle in this view, (view)
[soft organ swell]
Counting stars beneath the moon, (moon)
[steady bass rhythm]
Night’s eternal rendezvous.
[fade with harmonious guitar chords]
[CHORUS]
(Repeat with full band and emphatic vocal harmonies)
[OUTRO]
So when you feel the stars above (above)
[vocals fading with tape echo]
Know they’re turning all with love (with love)
[guitar, bass and drums gradually fade]
And every night when eyes arise,
The world keeps spinning ‘neath the skies.
[soft ambient fade with percussion trails]

55a92d44-59c5-4ccc-90f7-340df458ca5c.name: La Forteresse
55a92d44-59c5-4ccc-90f7-340df458ca5c.sound: Boom bap hip-hop, aggressive female rap, French lyrics, surreal atmospheric textures
55a92d44-59c5-4ccc-90f7-340df458ca5c.lyrics:
[Intro - Spoken]
Paris, cinq heures du matin
Les rues vides m'appellent encore une fois
[Verse 1]
Tu m'as laissée seule dans cette ville sans âme
Chaque pas sur le pavé crie ton nom, quelle drame
Les cafés sont fermés, les vitrines sont froides
Je marche sans but pendant que le métro déploie
Ces wagons solitaires comme mes pensées qui fuient
Les stations défilent, ma colère me suit
Tu pensais me briser dans ce béton glacial
Mais je suis plus forte, c'est mon territoire vital
Je prends le micro, je balance mes vérités
Sur ce beat qui frappe comme mon cœur blessé
Les immeubles gris témoignent de ma rage pure
Dans ces rues désertes, je trouve ma cure
Le soleil se lève sur mes nouveaux débuts
Pendant que tes mensonges deviennent poussière, tu
Ne peux plus m'atteindre dans mon nouveau royaume
Où je règne seule, plus besoin de ton fantôme
[Chorus]
Seule dans la ville grise (Je survive)
Plus forte que tes promesses (Sans toi)
Seule dans la ville grise (Je m'élève)
Je construis ma forteresse (C'est mon choix)
[Verse 2]
Les pigeons s'envolent quand je crache mes mots
Sur les Champs-Élysées, je trace mon nouveau flow
Tu cherches une princesse? J'suis devenue reine
De ces boulevards vides où mon âme est souveraine
Les premiers métros emmènent les gens au boulot
Pendant que je domine ce beat comme un solo
Chaque rime est une pierre dans mon édifice
Plus besoin de toi pour que mon monde grandisse
La Tour Eiffel observe ma métamorphose
Témoin silencieux de tout ce que je pose
Sur ce micro qui brûle entre mes mains fortes
Pendant que ton souvenir franchit la dernière porte
[Chorus]
Seule dans la ville grise (Je survive)
Plus forte que tes promesses (Sans toi)
Seule dans la ville grise (Je m'élève)
Je construis ma forteresse (C'est mon choix)
[Outro]
La ville est à moi maintenant
Et je ne reviendrai jamais en arrière

c6c05bdf-4fdd-4c18-82fc-78c4b1c0604a.name: One Truth (Variation)
c6c05bdf-4fdd-4c18-82fc-78c4b1c0604a.sound: instrumental-vocal hybrid in the raw, lo-fi aesthetic of late-90s Russian underground cinema, English-language spoken-word vocals with implied Slavic cadence, distorted electric guitar only (no bass, no drums, no synths), recorded through blown speakers and cassette deck, tempo 68 BPM, key A minor, themes: street justice, brotherhood, moral absolutism, urban solitude, found sounds include rain on Soviet car roof, trolley wire buzz, boot steps on wet asphalt, match strike, police radio in Russian (muffled), Lada engine start, production: zero reverb, zero polish, maximum grit, tape saturation, vinyl crackle, amp feedback as texture, structure: [INTRO] → [VERSE] → [CHORUS] → [VERSE 2] → [CHORUS] → [OUTRO], must feel like it could play over a black-leather-jacket walk through Petersburg at 3 a.m. — instantly evoking the ethos of a specific 90s film without using its music, lyrics, or titles
c6c05bdf-4fdd-4c18-82fc-78c4b1c0604a.lyrics:
