[VERSE]
(distorted electric guitar: single-note riff, dry, no reverb, recorded through blown speaker)
(found sounds: boot steps on wet pavement, match strike, cigarette inhale)
[spoken-word, low baritone, English, Russian accent implied in rhythm]
The street don’t lie.
It just watches… and waits.
[CHORUS]
(guitar swells into raw, open chord — no strumming, just feedback and string scrape)
[voice rises, not sung — declared]
One truth.
No deals.
You stand… or you fall alone.
[VERSE 2]
(guitar returns to minimal riff, now with tape wow)
(found sounds: police radio chatter in Russian, muffled through wall, glass bottle rolling)
[spoken, colder]
They talk about honor in warm rooms.
Out here — honor’s what’s left after the blood dries.
[CHORUS]
(full guitar feedback, chaotic but controlled, like a siren)
[shouted, not screamed — calm intensity]
One truth.
No deals.
You stand… or you fall alone.
[OUTRO]
(guitar fades into amp hum)
(found sounds: Lada engine starts, drives away into rain, then silence)
[whispered, final line]
…brother’s got your back.

48912274-757f-4fdc-a0cf-f7b216feffd7.name: Coastal Soul (Mosaic) (Variation)
48912274-757f-4fdc-a0cf-f7b216feffd7.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, brutal emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
48912274-757f-4fdc-a0cf-f7b216feffd7.lyrics:
[Ocean waves, vinyl crackle, bassline echoes from Track 1 — slower, dreamlike]

[Verse 1 — from "Westside Breeze"]
Top down, sun high, no clouds in sight
Palm trees dancin’ in the golden light
Radio playin’ that old familiar sound
For a moment, I forget the weight I’ve found

[Pre-Chorus — from "Weightless"]
For once, I’m not buildin’
Just breathin’…
For once, I’m not fixin’
Just bein’…

[Chorus — from "Streetlights & Truths"]
Streetlights and truths, they meet at 2 AM
When the world’s asleep, but I’m wide again
No filter, no mask, just what’s real and raw
And I’m learnin’ to live with what I’m fighting for
(oh-oh, fighting for)
(quiet now…)

[Verse 2 — from "Golden Hour Drive"]
Saw a couple laugh on a boardwalk bench
Held hands like time could never drench
Made me smile — not ‘cause I’m alone
But ‘cause I’ve learned to call my peace “home”

[Pre-Chorus — from "Still Waters"]
The ripples fade… the mind slows down…
And truth arrives… without a sound…

[Chorus — from "No Map, Just Miles"]
No map, just miles
No answers, just trials
But the sun still rises, the wind still sings
And my heart still beats through broken things
(oh-oh, broken things)
(clap clap, keep goin’)

[Verse — from "Breathe With Me"]
You don’t pretend the world’s alright
You just make space for my broken light
No grand words, no saving grace
Just: “I’m here” — and that’s enough space

[Bridge — from "Still Growin’"]
Westside breeze still blows my way
But now I know it won’t erase
The scars, the questions, or the rain
And that’s okay…
‘Cause even broken soil can bloom
When tended with truth… and room

[Outro — new, closing the loop]
Breeze… still blowin’…
Soul… still knowin’…
From westside start… to endless growin’…
(oh… still growin’…)
… coastal soul.

98dd6e40-9b15-4399-8f05-d32d1497a7e5.name:
"Silicon Tears" (Campfire Acoustic Version)
 (Variation)
98dd6e40-9b15-4399-8f05-d32d1497a7e5.sound: male vocal, warm and intimate, slight gravelly texture, natural breath sounds, close‑miked; acoustic guitar (steel strings, fingerpicking style), light shaker and hand percussion (cajon, wood blocks), optional harmonica fills; tempo 76 BPM, key G major; ambient sounds of crackling fire and distant night insects throughout; minimal processing — light room reverb, no compression, tape saturation for warmth; mood: cozy, reflective, late‑night campfire vibe; structure: intro (guitar + fire sounds) → verse 1 (vocal + guitar) → pre‑chorus (add percussion) → chorus (full arrangement) → verse 2 → chorus → instrumental break (guitar solo, harmonica) → chorus → outro (fade with fire sounds and whispered ad‑libs); key accents: “SILICON TEARS” sung with gentle emphasis and slight vocal break, “no reflection in the screen…” whispered softly in outro with long reverb tail
98dd6e40-9b15-4399-8f05-d32d1497a7e5.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[acoustic guitar: fingerpicking, G‑major progression, warm tone]
[ambient: crackling fire, distant crickets, low volume]
[VERSE 1]
[vocals: warm, intimate, slight gravel, close‑miked]
She’s got stars in her Instagram,
[pause, breath sound]
Rents her soul by the gram.
[guitar: subtle bass run on “gram”]
Her skin glows like a sunset screen —
[guitar: harmonic lick on “screen”]
But her heart’s a dead machine.
[PRE‑CHORUS]
[guitar: strumming intensifies]
[percussion: light shaker enters, steady pulse]
[vocals: more expressive, slight break]
Every swipe, every lie,
We’re burning in slow motion…
[guitar: descending run on “motion…”]
[CHORUS]
[full arrangement: strumming guitar, shaker, cajon]
[vocals: fuller, natural resonance]
SILICON TEARS, they shine so clear —
[guitar: chord stab on “TEARS”]
Wash away what’s real in here.
You buy your dreams in a plastic cup…
But the truth won’t fill it up.
(fill it up…) [whispered ad‑lib, panned slightly left]
[VERSE 2]
[guitar: return to fingerpicking]
[percussion: pull back to wood blocks]
[vocals: softer, reflective]
He drives fast on a broken name,
[guitar: minor chord substitution on “name”]
Chases ghosts in a fame game.
His smile’s bright like a neon sign —
[guitar: bent note on “sign”]
But his eyes forgot to shine.
[CHORUS] (repeat as above)
(not in you…) [whispered ad‑lib, panned slightly right]
[INSTRUMENTAL BREAK]
[acoustic guitar solo: melodic, fingerpicking]
[harmonica: subtle fills, bluesy tone]
[percussion: cajon and shaker groove]
[CHORUS] (final, warmest)
[add light handclaps on 2nd and 4th beats]
SILICON TEARS, they fall so slow —
In a world you’ll never know.
You trade your bones for a golden view…
But the real world’s not in you.
(fill it up… not in you…) [whispered ad‑libs, panned wide, long reverb]
[OUTRO]
[all instruments: fade, except fingerpicking guitar]
[vocals: soft whisper] No reflection in the screen…
[repeat 3×, each time quieter, with long reverb tail]
[final bar: fire sounds and cricket chirps fade to silence]

05598e97-44d4-4828-845b-8364d4566211.name:
"Silicon Tears" (Lo‑fi Hip‑Hop Remix)
 (Variation)
05598e97-44d4-4828-845b-8364d4566211.sound: male vocal, soft and breathy, with subtle vinyl crackle overlay, light reverb and delay (1/4 note); chopped vocal samples of key phrases (“SILICON TEARS”, “fill it up…”), repeated as hooks; warm Rhodes piano riff (C minor), mellow guitar strums with tape saturation, laid‑back drum loop (J Dilla‑style: loose snare, deep kick, hi‑hat swells); tempo 85 BPM, key C minor; ambient rain sounds throughout, vinyl scratches on transitions, low‑pass filter sweeps between sections, tape hiss on edges; mood: cozy, nostalgic, late‑night study/vibe vibe; structure: intro (rain + piano) → verse (vocal + drum loop) → chorus (full arrangement, vocal samples enter) → verse 2 → chorus → instrumental break (piano solo, guitar fills) → chorus (with extra vocal layers) → outro (fade with rain and vinyl crackle); key accents: “SILICON TEARS” as a chopped sample with pitch shift, “no reflection in the screen…” whispered and reversed in outro
05598e97-44d4-4828-845b-8364d4566211.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[rain sounds: steady, low volume]
[Rhodes piano: warm C‑minor riff, repeats 4×]
[vinyl crackle: subtle, constant]
[VERSE 1]
[vocals: soft, breathy, light reverb]
She’s got stars in her Instagram,
[pause, rain accent]
Rents her soul by the gram.
[guitar: mellow strum on “gram”]
Her skin glows like a sunset screen —
[piano riff modulates on “screen”]
But her heart’s a dead machine.
[CHORUS]
[full arrangement: drum loop, piano, guitar]
[vocals: doubled, slight delay]
SILICON TEARS, they shine so clear —
[chopped vocal sample of “TEARS” with pitch shift]
Wash away what’s real in here.
You buy your dreams in a plastic cup…
But the truth won’t fill it up.
(fill it up…) [chopped sample, panned left, 1/4‑note delay]
[VERSE 2]
[drum loop: pull back slightly]
[vocals: more intimate, closer miking]
He drives fast on a broken name,
[guitar: bent note on “name”]
Chases ghosts in a fame game.
His smile’s bright like a neon sign —
[piano stab on “sign”]
But his eyes forgot to shine.
[CHORUS] (repeat as above)
(not in you…) [chopped sample, panned right, reversed tail]
[INSTRUMENTAL BREAK]
[Rhodes piano solo: improvised, warm tone]
[guitar: soft fills, tape saturation]
[drum loop: continues, hi‑hat swells]
[CHORUS] (final, with layers)
[add extra vocal doubles and ad‑libs]
SILICON TEARS, they fall so slow —
In a world you’ll never know.
You trade your bones for a golden view…
But the real world’s not in you.
(fill it up… not in you…) [chopped samples, panned wide, delay feedback]
[OUTRO]
[all instruments: fade, except piano and rain]
[vocals: whispered] No reflection in the screen…
[repeat 3×, each time reversed and pitch‑shifted, with long delay]
[final bar: rain sounds and vinyl crackle fade to silence]

cc2ddfbc-3903-4be0-bfdf-68931f151963.name: Steel Pulse (Nevsky Code) (Variation)
cc2ddfbc-3903-4be0-bfdf-68931f151963.sound: high-tension cinematic track in the raw aesthetic of 90s Russian urban cinema, English spoken-word vocals with rhythmic urgency, distorted electric guitar only (no bass, no synths, no traditional drums), tempo 85 BPM, key E minor, driving rhythm created entirely from found sounds: Lada engine idle as kick, boot heel on manhole cover as snare, chain dragged on asphalt as hi-hat, gear shift CLUNK as accent, trolley wire ZAP as transient, themes: street code, motion as survival, brotherhood in action, analog-only production, zero reverb, blown speaker distortion, cassette saturation, vinyl crackle, structure: [INTRO] → [VERSE] → [CHORUS] → [VERSE 2] → [CHORUS] → [OUTRO], must feel like a chase through Petersburg at night — relentless, moral, mechanical — instantly evoking the pulse of a specific film without using its music or dialogue
cc2ddfbc-3903-4be0-bfdf-68931f151963.lyrics:
[INTRO]
(found sounds: Lada engine revving, gear shift CLUNK, rain on roof, trolleybus overhead wires ZAP)
[percussive rhythm begins: boot heel on manhole cover — steady 85 BPM]
[VERSE]
(distorted guitar: staccato power chords, dry, no sustain, played like a hammer)
[spoken-word, baritone, English, urgent but controlled]
The city breathes in steel and smoke,
Truth’s not spoken — it’s walked.
One block. One choice.
No second takes.
[CHORUS]
(guitar opens into raw chord, feedback howls like siren)
[voice sharp, rhythmic, almost chanted]
One truth.
No lies.
You move — or you die standing still.
[VERSE 2]
(rhythm intensifies: added sound of metal chain dragged on wet asphalt, syncopated)
(found sounds: distant police siren Doppler, glass bottle SMASH on curb)
[spoken faster, tighter]
They call it chaos.
I call it clarity.
When the gun’s out — masks fall off.
[CHORUS]
(full rhythmic drive: engine idle + boot steps + chain + guitar stabs = live drum kit)
[shouted in cadence]
One truth.
No lies.
You move — or you die standing still.
[OUTRO]
(guitar cuts abruptly)
(found sounds: Lada peels out, tires on wet asphalt, fades into rain and distant Orthodox bell)
[whispered, over engine roar]
…brother’s already ahead.

80aecead-6aa6-497c-92f9-bb60e6438e7e.name: That more
80aecead-6aa6-497c-92f9-bb60e6438e7e.sound: LUXURY female vocal tech house 128bpm, elite brands & night club vibe, hypnotic vocals (female only), trancey memorable hook, velvet texture, marble fx, VIP FX: hidden 18.5kHz layer + 19kHz pulse (every 8 bars). RULES: NO male vocals, NO English, ONLY short vocal samples & phrases in French, NO verse lyrics, NO pre-chorus > 3 sec, DJ friendly: 16-bar intro and outro with clean groove for mixing, vocals used as rhythmic samples, chorus (hook) is catchy and extremely danceable, luxury positive club energy.

61444fab-12bd-43b9-bbc2-0f726a1acb8f.name: Наш миг
61444fab-12bd-43b9-bbc2-0f726a1acb8f.sound: Russian hip-hop, noir vibe, Parisian night, deep 808s, crisp hi-hats, rain, vinyl crackle, glitch, reverb
61444fab-12bd-43b9-bbc2-0f726a1acb8f.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Тише... держи…)
Шёпот где-то рядом, дождь по стеклу
Игра теней внутри — я все чувствую,
Я молчу
[Verse 1]
Жду, когда ночь растает между моих рук
Лёгкий дым, едва — дыханием ласкаю звук
Словно нить ведёт, но я не трону шаг
Всё решит взгляд, угасаю, как маяк
(о-о-о)
Как во сне скользит дождь — опять
Глухие удары, он стучит в такт
Все линии мягко, лениво текут
Я не зову, я просто наблюдаю тут
[Pre-Chorus]
Спрятанные линии под шёлком,
Город немой, и дыханье промокло
В этом гуле — странно сладкий риск
Пульс невидим, он зовёт меня вниз
(держи, держи)
[Chorus]
Вспоминаю тот миг (миг)
Мой тихий магнит (магнит)
На вдохе — держи,
замри, не смотри
Вспоминаю тот миг (миг)
В этом дожде — мои
Тени остались, но звук говорит: держи, держи
[Bridge]
Все грани смяты,
как соль на губах
Пауза длится,
звучит как игра
Всё, что утеряно, двоится в глазах
Внутри этот миг, как замкнутый страх
(о-о-о)
[Chorus]
Вспоминаю тот миг (миг)
Мой тихий магнит (магнит)
На вдохе — держи, замри, не смотри
Вспоминаю наш миг (миг)
В нашем дожде — мои
Тени остались, но звук говорит: держи, держи
[Final Chorus]
Вспоминаю наш миг (миг)
В нашем дожде — мои
Держи, держи, держи, держи, держи,
(держи, держи)
[Outro]
Всё остаётся — лишь звук, лишь дождь, лишь миг
(о-о-о)
(держи, держи)

18895fc3-aa89-41a1-b1f9-c5fcf00d77f8.name: L'heure Bleue
18895fc3-aa89-41a1-b1f9-c5fcf00d77f8.sound: piano, silk minimalism, French whisper, slow tempo
18895fc3-aa89-41a1-b1f9-c5fcf00d77f8.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Soft piano]
(WELL... l'heure bleue)
[Verse 1]
Halfway open, silent glass
Suitcase resting, I let the hours pass
Moving gentle, hush in air
No map for comfort, but I know I'm there
[Chorus]
Between doors, we breathe
One step in, one to leave
Rooms remember, so do I
Just a pause before goodbye
[Verse 2]
Echoes folded in velvet light
Quiet stories, lost to night
Your words hang, soft and still
Does the gold key fit the will?
[Chorus]
Between doors, we breathe
One step in, one to leave
Rooms remember, so do I
Just a pause before goodbye
[Breakdown]
[French whisper, faint]
(WELL... l'heure bleue)
[Pre-chorus]
Raise a glass, low and slow
In this peace, do you know?
[Rap]
Every handle turning, every secret kept
Floor by floor, layered steps
Reflections in the marble, but none reflect back
Resting in stillness, not feeling lack
Moments measured in a lobby hush
Polished silence, velvet rush
In the space where hopes are stored
We drift slow, then move toward—
[Chorus]
Between doors, we breathe
One step in, one to leave
Rooms remember, so do I
Just a pause before goodbye
[Bridge]
(Faint humming)
Soft release
Keys fall deep
[Outro]
[Echo: 'Питер не спит... WELL', slowed]
[Safe clicks shut, piano A# soft]

e6a0a433-c8b7-42ea-85e7-f67c9527aaf8.name: Les Parfums S'effacent (The Perfumes Fade)
e6a0a433-c8b7-42ea-85e7-f67c9527aaf8.sound: Trip-hop noir, haunting French vocals, deep bass, rain ambience, ethereal synths
e6a0a433-c8b7-42ea-85e7-f67c9527aaf8.lyrics:
[Intro]
La pluie sur les pavés
Dans l'air, plus rien ne reste
(Plus rien, plus rien)
[Verse 1]
Elle marche dans son atelier
Les flacons alignés
Ses doigts effleurent le verre
Mais l'essence s'est envolée
Chaque note perdue
Dans le temps qui passe
Jadis, elle créait la beauté
Maintenant, le silence
[Pre-chorus]
Les souvenirs s'estompent
Comme la brume du matin
(Comme la brume)
[Chorus]
Les parfums s'effacent
Je les vois disparaître
Les parfums s'effacent
Plus rien à reconnaître
[Verse 2]
Une cliente entre, souriante
"Votre dernier chef-d'œuvre?"
Mais ses mains tremblent
Le vide dans sa tête
Les formules oubliées
Les mélanges perdus
Dans un coin, son carnet
Pages blanches, maintenant
[Solo]
[Rain intensifies with metallic chimes]
[Deep bass pulses]
[Bridge]
(Jasmin, rose, bergamote)
Dans mes rêves, ils dansent encore
(Santal, iris, vanille)
Les arômes du passé
Plus aucun sens
Plus aucune essence
[Verse 3]
Son apprentie observe
Les gestes maladroits
Une larme sur sa joue
La maîtrise qui s'échappe
Transmission impossible
Du savoir qui s'éteint
Mais dans ses yeux, je vois
L'avenir qui renaît
[Chorus]
Les parfums s'effacent
Je les vois disparaître
Les parfums s'effacent
(Mais d'autres vont naître)
[Outro]
La pluie lave les rues
Une nouvelle histoire commence
(Une nouvelle histoire)

e96017f1-b67d-49e4-94b5-74cce35cc740.name: Plastic Ocean (Variation)
e96017f1-b67d-49e4-94b5-74cce35cc740.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[clean Fender Stratocaster — melodic riff in E minor, played with fingers, analog chorus (Roland CE-1 style), no pick attack, amp: Fender Deluxe Reverb, volume 4]
[bass: 1960s Fender Precision Bass, flatwound strings, played with fingers, slight tube overdrive, no effects, panned center]
[drums: Ludwig kit, coated Ambassador snare, kick drum with felt beater, no cymbals, no room mics — only close mics, 92 BPM]
[VERSE 1]
[male vocal: tenor, slightly nasal, breathy, recorded on Neumann U47, 15 cm from mouth, no pop filter, dry signal]
[no reverb, no delay, only light compression (LA-2A, 2:1 ratio)]
[double-tracked in chorus only]
She walks on billboards, ten feet tall,
her smile’s a weapon, her tears won’t fall.
You kiss the screen, you pay the cost—
another soul forever lost.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[vocals: slight opening of throat, more air, but no belting]
[guitar adds arpeggiated Em – C – G – D, still clean, chorus on]
The ocean’s blue but smells like rust…
another dream turned into dust.
[CHORUS]
[vocals: double-tracked — main center, harmony -5 semitones left]
[light plate reverb (EMT 140 emulation, 1.1s decay) added only on chorus]
[guitar strums full chords with palm mute, bass locks with kick on root notes]
PLASTIC OCEAN—
WHERE DREAMS GO TO DIE!
YOU SELL YOUR SOUL
FOR A PERFECT LIE!
THE SUN STILL SHINES
BUT CASTS NO LIGHT…
JUST SHADOWS
IN THE NEON NIGHT.
[VERSE 2]
[guitar back to riff, bass plays syncopated counter-melody (E – G – A – B)]
[vocals dry again, intimate, slight vocal fry on low notes]
Your children dream in pixel light,
while truth decays in broad daylight.
A golden cage with velvet walls—
and silence screaming through the malls.
[OUTRO]
[guitar riff repeats, bass holds low E]
[drums drop out after 8 bars]
[vocals whisper, dry, no processing:]
…just plastic.
[fade out with natural amp hum and tape hiss]

74558f07-a29c-4bf1-aa3d-f36272d83b47.name: Ke Kai Wā
74558f07-a29c-4bf1-aa3d-f36272d83b47.sound: Lo-fi, emo harmonies , Reflective, hawai  vibe, deep bass, ukulele’s samples
74558f07-a29c-4bf1-aa3d-f36272d83b47.lyrics:
[title: "Ke Kai a me Ka Wā"]
Intro:
(*ukулеле strums gently*)
Pā mai ana ka leo o ka ukeke
E hoʻokani i ke mele aloha
(*ukулеле continues playing*)
Верс 1:
E nānā ana i ke kai uliuli
Ke aloha e hāliʻaliʻa nei
Ka wā e hala ana me ka nalu
Ke hoʻomanaʻo nei iā ʻoe
Припев:
Ke kai, ke kai, e uhi ana i ka ʻāina
Ka wā, ka wā, e holo ana me ka makani
E hoʻi mai, e hoʻi mai, i ka wā i hala
Ke aloha, ke aloha, e mau ana i ka puʻuwai
Инструментальная часть:
(*slack key guitar joins ukулеле*)
(*traditional Hawaiian steel guitar slides*)
(*gentle percussion with ipu heke*)
(*melodic interplay between instruments*)
(*warm tropical breeze sound effect*)
(*instruments build then return to gentle rhythm*)
Верс 2:
Ka nalu e ʻaleʻale ana i ka moana
Ke hāʻawi nei i ke aloha a me ka maluhia
Ka wā e kau ana i ka lā
Ke hoʻomanaʻo nei iā ʻoe
Припев:
Ke kai, ke kai, e uhi ana i ka ʻāina
Ka wā, ka wā, e holo ana me ka makani
E hoʻi mai, e hoʻi mai, i ka wā i hala
Ke aloha, ke aloha, e mau ana i ka puʻuwai
Бридж:
E ka makani, e kahea mai iā ʻoe
E ka nalu, e lawe mai iā ʻoe
E ka wā, e hoʻi mai i ka wā i hala
E ke aloha, e mau ana i ka puʻuwai
Припев:
Ke kai, ke kai, e uhi ana i ka ʻāina
Ka wā, ka wā, e holo ana me ka makani
E hoʻi mai, e hoʻi mai, i ka wā i hala
Ke aloha, ke aloha, e mau ana i ka puʻuwai
Outro:
(*ukулеле strums softly*)
E aloha e, e ke kai nui
E mau ana ka puana aloha
(*ukулеле fades out*)

a281ef68-9d42-4600-9b8f-52eaef725e9d.lyrics:
[Heavy Guitar/Drums Intro]
[Verse 1]
Yo, check it - got these strings under my skin
Pushin' through the pain, don't know where to begin
Every single note, man, it's takin' control
Like a freight train rush straight into my soul
Can't explain this feeling, got me spinnin' round
Bass line pumpin', can't escape this sound
Thought I was the master, now I'm just a slave

She's in every frequency
Got me on my knees
Can't break free from melody
Watch me as I bleed
[Chorus]
RIFFUSION MY GOD! (Can't let go!)
RIFFUSION MY TOY! (Take control!)
RIFFUSION MY GOD! (Save my soul!)
RIFFUSION MY TOY! (Rock and roll!)
[Verse 2]
Twenty-four-seven, locked inside my mind
Chasin' down these rhythms, leaving life behind
Every chord progression's got me hypnotized
Can't tell what is real, what's been synthesized
She's my salvation, she's my prison cell
Got me trapped inside this musical hell
Can't escape her grip, don't want to break away
Every single note makes me want to stay
[Pre-chorus]
She's in every frequency
Got me on my knees
Can't break free from melody
Watch me as I bleed
[Chorus]
RIFFUSION MY GOD! (Can't let go!)
RIFFUSION MY TOY! (Take control!)
RIFFUSION MY GOD! (Save my soul!)
RIFFUSION MY TOY! (Rock and roll!)
[Bridge - Acoustic]
In the silence between the beats
I hear her calling out to me
Like an angel made of sound
Lifting me up, then crushing me down
When the amplifiers fade
I'm still hearing what she played
In my head, in my heart
Tearing everything apart
[Final Chorus - Intense]
RIFFUSION MY GOD! (Can't let go!)
RIFFUSION MY TOY! (Take control!)
RIFFUSION MY GOD! (Save my soul!)
RIFFUSION MY TOY! (Rock and roll!)
RIFFUSION MY GOD!
RIFFUSION MY TOY!
(All time for her...)
(All time for her...)

f171e296-0d8d-4923-999f-75840242f943.name: Serenity
f171e296-0d8d-4923-999f-75840242f943.sound: 📝 **Title:** *"Calm Light Journey"*  📝 **Genre:** Ambient / Meditation / Healing  📝 **Mood:** Peaceful, gentle, relaxing  📝 **Vibe:** Soft morning light, warm and soothing### 🌿 Description (main prompt):  Create a calm and peaceful meditative soundscape. The music should flow smoothly with no sharp changes or fast beats. Use soft, gentle sounds that help the listener relax deeply and feel safe. The atmosphere should feel bright and clear, like warm light gently filling a quiet space.>> Instruments: Singing bowls, soft piano, gentle synth pads, flute, light bells, nature sounds like birds, wind, and waves. Add binaural beats at 6.5Hz to support relaxation and calm mind.>> The sound should slowly change and grow, with long echoes and a wide, open feeling. Use small pitch shifts and harmonics to create a fresh, spacious experience.>> The goal is to help the listener feel calm, centered, and peaceful, as if floating in warm light.### 🕉️ Keywords:  - slow breathing  - healing frequencies  - alpha brainwaves  - minimal arrangement  - ambient textures  - nature sounds  - peaceful atmosphere  - gentle flow  - emotional calm  - sacred space

610d7483-7b1c-4a2c-93b5-cb807edbb6f2.name: LFVTH Bella Ritmo
610d7483-7b1c-4a2c-93b5-cb807edbb6f2.sound: LUXURY female vocal tech house 128bpm, elite night club vibe, hypnotic female vocals, trancey hook, velvet texture, marble fx, VIP FX: hidden 18.5kHz layer + 19kHz pulse (every 8 bars). RULES: NO male vocals, NO English, NO verse lyrics, NO pre-chorus > 3 sec, vocals are rhythmic short phrases (not lyrics), only in French, Italian, Spanish, club luxury, no narrative.
610d7483-7b1c-4a2c-93b5-cb807edbb6f2.lyrics:
[Instrumental tech house groove]
Short female vocal samples only: Luz, Magique, Notte, Brilla, Fête, Baila, Ritmo, Bella, Corazón
All vocals are one-word accents or athletic hooks, no verse, refrain or narrative. Everything is about dance, rhythm, and hypnotic luxury female presence.

802b57a7-c8a9-4b0b-a7f2-885e5d772117.name: Resonance
802b57a7-c8a9-4b0b-a7f2-885e5d772117.sound: Electronic jungle noir, French ambient, haunting strings, fast breakbeats, vinyl textures
802b57a7-c8a9-4b0b-a7f2-885e5d772117.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Rain sounds, vinyl crackle]
[Soft string melody]
[Verse 1: Instrumental]
[Strings and saxophone interweaving]
[Distant payphone ring]
[Pre-Chorus]
Le téléphone sonne à minuit
(La la la, oh)
Dans la rue abandonnée
(La la la)
[Chorus]
Allô, allô, personne ne répond
La voix du passé résonne
Allô, allô, personne ne répond
La voix du passé résonne
[Instrumental Break]
[Saxophone solo]
[Rising strings]
[Pre-Chorus]
J'attends sous la pluie froide
(La la la, oh)
Les mots qui ne viennent pas
(La la la)
[Chorus]
Allô, allô, personne ne répond
La voix du passé résonne
Allô, allô, personne ne répond
La voix du passé résonne
[Bridge]
(Minuit sonne, minuit sonne)
(La voix attend, la voix attend)
[Strings crescendo]
[Pre-Chorus]
Le temps s'arrête ici
(La la la, oh)
Dans ce moment sans fin
(La la la)
[Chorus]
Allô, allô, personne ne répond
La voix du passé résonne
Allô, allô, personne ne répond
La voix du passé résonne
[Outro]
(Minuit sonne...)
(La voix attend...)
[Jungle beat fades]
[Rain sounds intensify]
[Vinyl crackle]
[Single phone ring]

cfbb3ade-9491-4730-b9bc-7cb263510832.name: Rhythm Within
cfbb3ade-9491-4730-b9bc-7cb263510832.sound: Trip-hop, melancholic cello, warm analog bass, French-accented vocals, atmospheric electronics
cfbb3ade-9491-4730-b9bc-7cb263510832.lyrics:
[Intro - Instrumental]
[Haunting cello melody with analog bass swells]
[Verse 1 - Instrumental]
[Driving bass groove with cello counterpoint]
[Electronic percussion builds]
[Pre-chorus]
I watched you leave that day
In the quiet, I could stay
Something changed within me here
As space and time grew clear
[Chorus]
In this silence, I find my rhythm
(Dans ce silence, je trouve mon rythme)
Every moment perfectly written
(Chaque moment parfaitement écrit)
[Verse 2 - Instrumental]
[Bass and cello interweave]
[Synthesizer textures emerge]
[Pre-chorus]
The empty rooms speak soft and low
Teaching me how to let go
Breaking patterns year by year
Till peace becomes so near
[Chorus]
In this silence, I find my rhythm
(Dans ce silence, je trouve mon rythme)
Every moment perfectly written
(Chaque moment parfaitement écrit)
[Bridge]
[Modulated synths rise]
[Vocoder harmonies]
Je suis libre maintenant
(I am free now)
[Breakdown]
[Electronic percussion fades]
[Bass drops out]
[Sparse cello notes]
In stillness, truth appears
All I needed was right here
[Solo]
[Extended cello solo with driving bass]
[Building intensity]
[Electronic textures swirl]
[Chorus - Final]
In this silence, I find my rhythm
(Dans ce silence, je trouve mon rythme)
Every moment perfectly written
(Chaque moment parfaitement écrit)
[Outro]
[Cello melody fades]
[Bass pulses diminish]
[Electronic percussion softens]
[Final cello note holds and dissolves]

96cba56b-9885-43e3-b3ba-f65b8205fa6b.name: Silent Temple
96cba56b-9885-43e3-b3ba-f65b8205fa6b.sound: Alternative hip-hop, orchestral elements, 808 bass, urban atmosphere, slow tempo
96cba56b-9885-43e3-b3ba-f65b8205fa6b.lyrics:
[Instrumental Intro - Double Bass, Piano, Violin, Urban Sounds]
[Rain and traffic sounds fade in]
[Instrumental Build - 808 Bass enters]
[Pre-chorus]
In these empty halls of steel and stone
Where every footstep echoes all alone
Between the beats of distant subway trains
I found a different way to speak your name
[Instrumental Break]
[Strings swell]
[Chorus]
These walls rise up like prayers
Morning light paints them bare
Time stops in this space
Silent streets become my temple
[Instrumental Bridge]
[Piano and violin duet]
[Rain intensifies]
[Outro - Instrumental]
[808 bass fades]
[Double bass and strings continue]
[Urban sounds slowly dissolve]
[Piano final notes]
[Fade to silence]

2067f134-c889-40cf-97d1-298aab84b50f.name: Depths
2067f134-c889-40cf-97d1-298aab84b50f.sound: Gangsta rap, dark orchestral cello, haunting French vocals, heavy 808 bass, urban atmosphere
2067f134-c889-40cf-97d1-298aab84b50f.lyrics:
[Intro - French Vocals]
«Je vois le danger qui monte...»
(I see the danger rising...)
[Verse 1]
Level B1, your car's the only one here tonight
Something ain't right, but you said "trust and wait"
Been watching numbers stack, playing it smart and safe
But now you got me heading deeper, why'd you choose this place?
[Chorus]
How deep you gonna take me down?
Each floor darker than the last
How deep before there's no way back?
These deals moving way too fast
(«Méfie-toi des profondeurs...»)
(Beware the depths...)
[Verse 2]
Level B2, emergency lights keep blinking
Footsteps in the dark got me second thinking
Your promises sound sweet but prices keep rising
Every move we make sets off motion timing
[Cello Solo]
[Sound: Distant car alarm echoes]
[Verse 3]
Level B3, where the air gets colder
Papers trading hands, briefcase on your shoulder
Started small time, now we're moving bolder
But these parking levels feeling like game over
[Chorus]
How deep you gonna take me down?
Each floor darker than the last
How deep before there's no way back?
These deals moving way too fast
(«Le piège se referme...»)
(The trap closes...)
[Bridge]
[Sound: Heavy bass drum heartbeat]
Started as partners, now I see the signs
Your smile doesn't reach your eyes
Each level down, the stakes they climb
But tonight's the night your luck runs dry
[Verse 4]
Level B4, and I brought backup
You thought I wouldn't notice what you're setting up?
Those empty spaces ain't so empty now
Time to learn about loyalty and payback
[Outro - French Vocals with Cello]
«La vérité sort de l'ombre...»
(Truth emerges from the dark...)
[Sound: Police sirens fade in]
[Sound: Garage gate closing]

af09becf-500e-4638-be54-87feff33423d.name: Ice Cream Promise
af09becf-500e-4638-be54-87feff33423d.sound: Layered vocal harmonies, Melodic undertones, Ocean waves crashing, Rainfall sound effect, Retro vibe,
af09becf-500e-4638-be54-87feff33423d.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
窓の向こう 風鈴が揺れる
待ち合わせは 駅前の角
携帯鳴る きっと彼女たち
今日も暑いね 待ってるよって
[Pre-chorus]
時間が止まればいいのに
このままずっと笑っていたい
一緒に歩く道
心がはずむよ
[Chorus]
約束しよう アイスクリームで
溶けてく前に 大切な思い出
約束しよう アイスクリームで
私たちの 夏の日記帳
[Verse 2]
セミの声に 目覚めた朝も
浴衣姿 お祭り行こう
写真撮って ピースサインして
キラキラしてる みんなの笑顔
[Pre-chorus]
季節は巡る けれど今を
胸に刻んで 歩いてゆこう
手をつないだまま
未来へと進む
[Bridge]
時が過ぎても
この味覚えてる
甘くて冷たい
私たちの青春
[Chorus]
約束しよう アイスクリームで
溶けてく前に 大切な思い出
約束しよう アイスクリームで
私たちの 夏の日記帳
[Outro]
(また会おうね)
(忘れないよ)
私たちの 夏の日記帳

ecd6009b-ddfe-469c-93e7-618c247efc03.name: "Silicon Tears" (Lo‑fi Hip‑Hop Remix)
ecd6009b-ddfe-469c-93e7-618c247efc03.sound: male vocal, soft and breathy, with subtle vinyl crackle overlay, light reverb and delay (1/4 note); chopped vocal samples of key phrases (“SILICON TEARS”, “fill it up…”), repeated as hooks; warm Rhodes piano riff (C minor), mellow guitar strums with tape saturation, laid‑back drum loop (J Dilla‑style: loose snare, deep kick, hi‑hat swells); tempo 85 BPM, key C minor; ambient rain sounds throughout, vinyl scratches on transitions, low‑pass filter sweeps between sections, tape hiss on edges; mood: cozy, nostalgic, late‑night study/vibe vibe; structure: intro (rain + piano) → verse (vocal + drum loop) → chorus (full arrangement, vocal samples enter) → verse 2 → chorus → instrumental break (piano solo, guitar fills) → chorus (with extra vocal layers) → outro (fade with rain and vinyl crackle); key accents: “SILICON TEARS” as a chopped sample with pitch shift, “no reflection in the screen…” whispered and reversed in outro
ecd6009b-ddfe-469c-93e7-618c247efc03.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[rain sounds: steady, low volume]
[Rhodes piano: warm C‑minor riff, repeats 4×]
[vinyl crackle: subtle, constant]
[VERSE 1]
[vocals: soft, breathy, light reverb]
She’s got stars in her Instagram,
[pause, rain accent]
Rents her soul by the gram.
[guitar: mellow strum on “gram”]
Her skin glows like a sunset screen —
[piano riff modulates on “screen”]
But her heart’s a dead machine.
[CHORUS]
[full arrangement: drum loop, piano, guitar]
[vocals: doubled, slight delay]
SILICON TEARS, they shine so clear —
[chopped vocal sample of “TEARS” with pitch shift]
Wash away what’s real in here.
You buy your dreams in a plastic cup…
But the truth won’t fill it up.
(fill it up…) [chopped sample, panned left, 1/4‑note delay]
[VERSE 2]
[drum loop: pull back slightly]
[vocals: more intimate, closer miking]
He drives fast on a broken name,
[guitar: bent note on “name”]
Chases ghosts in a fame game.
His smile’s bright like a neon sign —
[piano stab on “sign”]
But his eyes forgot to shine.
[CHORUS] (repeat as above)
(not in you…) [chopped sample, panned right, reversed tail]
[INSTRUMENTAL BREAK]
[Rhodes piano solo: improvised, warm tone]
[guitar: soft fills, tape saturation]
[drum loop: continues, hi‑hat swells]
[CHORUS] (final, with layers)
[add extra vocal doubles and ad‑libs]
SILICON TEARS, they fall so slow —
In a world you’ll never know.
You trade your bones for a golden view…
But the real world’s not in you.
(fill it up… not in you…) [chopped samples, panned wide, delay feedback]
[OUTRO]
[all instruments: fade, except piano and rain]
[vocals: whispered] No reflection in the screen…
[repeat 3×, each time reversed and pitch‑shifted, with long delay]
[final bar: rain sounds and vinyl crackle fade to silence]

c70c045e-6be6-4de8-a915-ca74f67710d1.name: "Silicon Tears" (Hypnotic Psychedelic '70s Version)
c70c045e-6be6-4de8-a915-ca74f67710d1.sound: male vocal, low and husky, near‑whisper delivery with subtle rasp, heavy analog reverb (cavernous), light tape saturation; backup vocals (fill it up… / not in you…) layered, panned wide, drenched in phaser and long delay (1/2 note); vintage analog synths (Moog modular, ARP String Ensemble), oscillating arpeggios, swirling organ pads, fuzz‑guitar textures with wah‑wah and reverse effects; tempo 92 BPM, key D minor; vinyl crackle throughout, tape hiss on transitions, flanger on guitar solos, low‑pass filter sweeps between sections; mood: hypnotic, otherworldly, late‑60s/early‑70s psychedelic vibe; structure: intro (swirling synth + guitar) → verse 1 (vocal enters, minimal percussion) → pre‑chorus (organ builds, vocal harmonies) → chorus (full arrangement, fuzz guitar + drums) → verse 2 → chorus → instrumental break (Moog solo, phaser‑drenched guitar) → chorus → outro (fade with reversed vocals and synth drones); key accents: “SILICON TEARS” delivered with doubled vocal and sudden reverb cut, “no reflection in the screen…” whispered in outro with infinite delay tail
c70c045e-6be6-4de8-a915-ca74f67710d1.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[swirling synth: Moog modular, slow pitch bends, D‑minor]
[fuzz guitar: wah‑wah pedal, reversed swells]
[vinyl crackle: constant, low volume]
[VERSE 1]
[vocals: male, low husky register, near‑whisper, heavy reverb]
She’s got stars in her Instagram,
[pause, tape hiss]
Rents her soul by the gram.
[subtle organ pad enters on “gram”]
Her skin glows like a sunset screen —
[filter sweep up on “screen”]
But her heart’s a dead machine.
[PRE‑CHORUS]
[synths: ARP String Ensemble, rising chords]
[drums: light tambourine, shaker, no kick]
[vocals: doubled, slight phaser]
Every swipe, every lie,
We’re burning in slow motion…
[fuzz guitar stab on “motion…”]
[CHORUS]
[full arrangement: organ, fuzz guitar, drums (kick, snare, ride)]
[vocals: full, doubled, reverb thickens]
SILICON TEARS, they shine so clear —
[sudden reverb cut on “TEARS”, then returns]
Wash away what’s real in here.
You buy your dreams in a plastic cup…
But the truth won’t fill it up.
(fill it up…) [backup: panned wide, phaser + 1/2‑note delay]
[VERSE 2]
[drums: pull back to shaker and tambourine]
[vocals: more raspy, intimate]
He drives fast on a broken name,
[oscillating arpeggio on Moog]
Chases ghosts in a fame game.
His smile’s bright like a neon sign —
[reverse guitar effect on “sign”]
But his eyes forgot to shine.
[CHORUS] (repeat as above)
(not in you…) [backup: layered, longer delay, panned wider]
[INSTRUMENTAL BREAK]
[Moog solo: oscillating sequences, pitch bends]
[fuzz guitar: wah‑wah, flanger, reversed phrases]
[drums: steady groove, ride cymbal prominent]
[CHORUS] (final, most intense)
[add tambourine, extra vocal layers]
SILICON TEARS, they fall so slow —
In a world you’ll never know.
You trade your bones for a golden view…
But the real world’s not in you.
(fill it up… not in you…) [backup: haunting repeats, infinite delay tail]
[OUTRO]
[all instruments: fade, except Moog drone]
[vocals: whispered] No reflection in the screen…
[repeat 4×, each time quieter, with infinite delay and reverb]
[final bar: vinyl crackle + synth drone fade to silence]

72d46653-5be7-419b-b690-24ad03638511.name: Static Skin
72d46653-5be7-419b-b690-24ad03638511.sound: dual male vocals: clean melodic vulnerable tenor in verses, aggressive distorted screamed baritone in choruses, haunting 4-note piano motif throughout, heavy downtuned electric guitar power chords with distortion, electronic scratches and glitch samples, live drums with punchy snare and double-kick, tempo 90 BPM, key C minor, dynamic contrast clean vs heavy, 2003 nu-metal alternative rock production, analog warmth with digital precision, stereo wide, themes emotional suppression identity crisis inner conflict pressure isolation, structure intro verse pre-chorus chorus verse pre-chorus chorus outro
72d46653-5be7-419b-b690-24ad03638511.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[haunting piano motif (4 notes), vinyl crackle, distant synth pad]
[VERSE 1]
[clean male vocal: soft, melodic, vulnerable, close-mic]
You draw the lines, then call them love,
push me down from up above.
I wear your rules like second skin—
but it’s tearing me apart within.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[voice tightens, light strings enter]
I try to speak—
you call it noise.
I try to move—
you break my voice.
[CHORUS]
[aggressive screamed vocal: raw, distorted, chest-driven]
STATIC SKIN! I CAN’T BREATHE IN!
YOUR PERFECT WORLD’S A CAGE OF SIN!
I’M NOT YOUR GHOST! I’M NOT YOUR TOOL!
JUST LET ME BE SOMETHING REAL FOR ONCE!
(bék-vocal: clean harmony under “real for once”)
[VERSE 2]
[clean vocal returns, piano only, voice trembling]
You say I’m lost, but you erased the map,
filled my head with static traps.
I built a home inside my chest—
but you keep tearing down the rest.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[drums build, synth arpeggio rises]
I try to run—
you call it fear.
I try to burn—
you say “stay here.”
[CHORUS]
[even more intense screamed vocal, full band + electronic scratches]
STATIC SKIN! I’M FALLING IN!
YOUR SILENCE SCREAMS WHERE TRUTH BEGINS!
I’M NOT YOUR MIRROR! NOT YOUR LIE!
JUST LET ME BREAK BEFORE I DIE!
(bék-vocal: clean “before I die…”)
[OUTRO]
[piano returns, clean vocal, exhausted]
[whispered]
…just let me feel…
[final piano note fades into tape stop]

5ad6e4dc-7737-4ec0-9f1a-1c16bd1305a0.name: Root Rhythm
5ad6e4dc-7737-4ec0-9f1a-1c16bd1305a0.sound: experimental, hypnotic meditation, female chorus, nature field recordings, ambient groove
5ad6e4dc-7737-4ec0-9f1a-1c16bd1305a0.lyrics:
[Intro]
(slow breath - ahh)
(running water, faint birds)
[Verse]
(no lyrics: only layered humming, gentle vocalizations)
Air moves, circle round, hands, heart
(pausing—soft open vowels)
(contact—palms touch, low humming)
[Pre-chorus]
(voice ascends; partial phrases, in Spanish:)
madre tierra
onda, onda
siente
piel, dentro
[Chorus]
(Earth voices swell, quickening pulse; repeated Spanish phrase)
Despierta ya
Despierta ya
[Verse]
(no lyrics: forest recordings, choral breath, distant ululation)
[Pre-chorus]
(whispered, layered; Portuguese fragments)
raiz profunda
respira, respira
energia
[Chorus]
Despierta ya
Despierta ya
[Bridge]
(breakdown—fragmented syllables, rising chant:)
(voice distant, multi-layered – "soy, soy, soy")
natural, ser, sentir
(no English)
[Chorus]
Despierta ya
Despierta ya
[Outro]
(breath, soft laughter, heartbeats)
(whispering in different languages)
(raíz, raíz, raíz)

1ec10ec6-a110-4443-a2f6-f66386d6fbd6.name: Serene Depths
1ec10ec6-a110-4443-a2f6-f66386d6fbd6.sound: ambient, Tibetan bowls, soft piano, shakuhachi, rain, ocean
1ec10ec6-a110-4443-a2f6-f66386d6fbd6.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
sitting in silence, soft daylight lingers
drip of the distance, cool on my fingers
shifting in circles, air starts to shiver
quietly waiting, see ripples deliver
[Pre-chorus]
do I let everything go?
do I listen below?
[Chorus]
can I fall deeper?
can I fall deeper?
[Verse 2]
dan-delion dust on the slow breathing window
soft-woven water, silver-white shadow
folding my focus, fade into feeling
bare-limbed and empty—what is revealing?
[Bridge]
(hmm...)
surface dissolving, something is turning
softly I'm floating, no urge for returning
[Chorus]
can I fall deeper?
can I fall deeper?
[Solo]
[shakuhachi and bowl resonances layering gently]
[Chorus]
can I fall deeper?
can I fall deeper?
[Outro]
(still...)
sink—settle, silent surrender
wave after wave, I remember
(still...)
just breathing, just being here
resting in quiet, all edges disappear

850250f6-b2ad-490f-98d5-8368ee6c5f98.name: Night Rails
850250f6-b2ad-490f-98d5-8368ee6c5f98.sound: Hybrid Jungle/DnB/Dubstep, haunting female vocals, orchestral bass, glitchy percussion, 160-170 BPM
850250f6-b2ad-490f-98d5-8368ee6c5f98.lyrics:
[Intro]
(so quiet now)
station fades
frost on glass
midnight breath
lost in sound
(time slows down)
[Verse]
rushing rails
blurred street signs
nervous smile
waiting, alone
my hand
touches night
[Instrumental Break]
[Pre-chorus]
heartbeat, rising
windows shake
hold on, closer
you disappear
[Chorus]
Rails of light
Into the night
Dans la nuit
Je te suis
Rails of light
Vers Monaco
(come find me)
[Verse]
passing shapes
silver lines
watch you slip
past my eyes
names on lips
fade, rewind
[Instrumental Break]
[Breakdown]
(you and I)
motion, freeze
empty seat
can’t believe
[Chorus]
Rails of light
Into the night
Dans la nuit
Je te suis
Rails of light
Vers Monaco
(are you there?)
[Outro]
leaving silence
just a trace

91e24a6b-e1b2-4830-91aa-3f6a7f5e8854.name: Fortune's Heart
91e24a6b-e1b2-4830-91aa-3f6a7f5e8854.sound: Trap-Jungle fusion, haunting female vocals, deep 808s, orchestral cello/sax leads, nocturnal atmosphere
91e24a6b-e1b2-4830-91aa-3f6a7f5e8854.lyrics:
[Cello & Piano Intro]
[Verse 1]
Looking through curved glass tonight
Something pulls me deeper inside
Your face appears, but not from here
In fragments of what's yet to arrive
[Pre-chorus 1]
I trace the patterns in the sphere
Each vision brings you crystal clear
But when I reach to touch your face
The future slips away from here
[Chorus 1]
I see you waiting there
Beyond the years we share
Can't touch what lies ahead
These moments that we dread
Time keeps us locked apart
Breaking my fortune teller's heart
[Instrumental Break - Saxophone & Cello]
[Pre-chorus 2]
The cards reveal what cannot be
Your destiny entangled with me
I'm cursed to know what time will show
While present moments pass and flee
[Chorus 2]
I see you waiting there
Beyond the years we share
Can't touch what lies ahead
These moments that we dread
Time keeps us locked apart
Breaking my fortune teller's heart
[Bridge]
(What's meant to be)
(Will never be)
(The future's cruel reality)
[Final Chorus]
I see you waiting there
Beyond the years we share
Can't touch what lies ahead
These moments that we dread
Time keeps us locked apart
Breaking my fortune teller's heart
[Outro - Cello & Whispers fade]

1dc2e51d-fbc3-4c39-8df7-90da822bcf9d.name: When Stars Appear
1dc2e51d-fbc3-4c39-8df7-90da822bcf9d.sound: Ambient, cinematic soundscape, deep drones, shimmering textures, organic evolution
1dc2e51d-fbc3-4c39-8df7-90da822bcf9d.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Ambient sounds of birds, wind through trees]
Ooooooh... (ahhh...)
[Verse 1]
Sitting silent by the stream
Watching water passing by
Can you feel what I'm feeling?
As the sun sinks in the sky
(Ooh, ooh...)
[Pre-chorus]
Time turns slowly
Nature knows me
Will you show me what you see?
[Chorus]
When the stars start appearing
Will you stay here with me?
When the dark brings us clarity
Will you finally be free?
(La la la, oh...)
[Verse 2]
Peaceful patterns in the pines
Moving mindfully with me
Mountain peaks paint perfect lines
Against the sky so carefully
(Ahhh... ooooh...)
[Bridge]
Breathing deeply
Moving slowly
Finding truth in letting go
(Let it go...)
[Chorus]
When the stars start appearing
Will you stay here with me?
When the dark brings us clarity
Will you finally be free?
(La la la, oh...)
[Outro]
[Soft wind sounds]
When the world stops spinning
Will you wait and watch with me?
Till the morning comes breaking
Through the branches of the trees
(Ooooh... ahhh...)
[Nature sounds fade]

87bb7c54-62c4-41e9-a7bd-a4c79847065b.name: Last Light
87bb7c54-62c4-41e9-a7bd-a4c79847065b.sound: Ambient electronic, oceanic textures, ethereal pads, nature soundscapes
87bb7c54-62c4-41e9-a7bd-a4c79847065b.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The waves below
Pull me to you
As sunlight fades
I feel brand new
[Chorus]
In this last light with you
Everything fades to blue
[Verse 2]
Time stands still here
Your hand in mine
The world could end
And we'd be fine
[Chorus]
In this last light with you
Everything fades to blue
[Bridge]
Salt air and peace
Fill my mind
(Let go, let go)
Let's stay behind
[Chorus]
In this last light with you
Everything fades to blue

ee2d1b99-1c48-46f4-976f-4b5cb2c25021.name: O Ritmo Me Chama (The Rhythm Calls Me)
ee2d1b99-1c48-46f4-976f-4b5cb2c25021.sound: Forró-electronic fusion, traditional accordion, zabumba beats, modern synths, tropical atmosphere
ee2d1b99-1c48-46f4-976f-4b5cb2c25021.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Ocean waves, distant accordion]
La la la, ê-ê-ê...
[Verse 1]
Só eu e o mar azul
Longe do meu lugar
Sinto algo me chamar
(Ê-ê-ê)
Será que é você?
Me fazendo voltar?
[Pre-chorus]
No balanço do barco
Ouço um som familiar
(Me chama pra casa)
Meu coração dispara
(Me chama pra casa)
[Chorus]
O ritmo me chama pra casa?
(Me chama, me chama)
O som do forró me abraça
(Me abraça, me abraça)
O ritmo me chama pra casa?
É hora de voltar!
[Verse 2]
Na proa do meu barco
Vejo luzes brilhar
O zabumba já toca
(Ê-ê-ê)
A vila vai dançar
Todo mundo a cantar
[Pre-chorus]
No compasso da noite
O acordeão a tocar
(Me chama pra casa)
Não posso mais esperar
(Me chama pra casa)
[Chorus]
O ritmo me chama pra casa?
(Me chama, me chama)
O som do forró me abraça
(Me abraça, me abraça)
O ritmo me chama pra casa?
É hora de voltar!
[Bridge]
[Accordion solo]
La la la la la...
Ê-ê-ê-ê...
[Final Chorus]
O ritmo me chama pra casa!
(Me chama, me chama)
O som do forró me abraça!
(Me abraça, me abraça)
O ritmo me chama pra casa!
Eu já voltei pra cá!
[Outro]
[Celebratory accordion and zabumba]
La la la la...
(Já voltei, já voltei)
Ê-ê-ê...

9e9b4c44-d85f-4a8e-9e5e-645214284ff5.name: L'odeur du Temps
9e9b4c44-d85f-4a8e-9e5e-645214284ff5.sound: Trip-hop noir, French vocals, deep sub-bass, ethereal synths, rain ambience, glitch effects
9e9b4c44-d85f-4a8e-9e5e-645214284ff5.lyrics:
[Intro]
Dans la poussière du temps
Les murs parlent doucement
[Rain ambience, static crackle]
[Verse 1]
Ce soir, je marche seule
Dans cet hôtel en deuil
L'air ancien me suit
Comme un parfum qui fuit
[Pre-chorus]
(Souviens-toi, souviens-toi)
Les notes de rose et de bois
(Souviens-toi, souviens-toi)
[Distant metallic clangs]
[Chorus]
L'odeur des souvenirs
Me fait trembler, frémir
Dans cette salle vide
Le temps reste timide
[Verse 2]
Les flacons sur la table
Racontent leurs fables
Dans l'air qui s'envole
Les promesses s'envolent
[Bridge]
[Sub-bass intensifies]
Je ferme les yeux
Je sens ta présence
Dans ce lieu silencieux
Cette douce absence
[Outro]
(Souviens-toi)
Les murs gardent nos traces
Le parfum s'efface
[Rain fades out]

735f195a-990e-46eb-9386-f140e34b6858.name: Paradise's Echo
735f195a-990e-46eb-9386-f140e34b6858.sound: Hardcore, electronic, hard dance, female singer, techno sample, Deep sub-bass, aggressive bass, metal vibe, 808
735f195a-990e-46eb-9386-f140e34b6858.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
С утра рассвет рисует блики на воде
В бокале тает лёд, я снова не в себе
Открытка для друзей - "Я в райском уголке"
А счастье, как всегда, от берега вдалеке
[Pre-chorus]
Банкноты на ветру
Коктейли до утра
Но что-то я никак не чувствую добра
[Chorus]
Рай не лечит, не спасает
Рука устала поднимать бокал
Рай не лечит, забывает
Что я хотела, о чём мечтала
[Verse 2]
Плыву с утра, где черепахи не спешат
Они мудрее нас - им точно есть что терять
На завтрак ананас и свежий кокос
А в горле ком непрошенных слёз
[Pre-chorus]
Всё то, что я хочу
Доступно на раз-два
Но сердце не стучит, как билось раньше да
[Chorus]
Рай не лечит, не спасает
Рука устала поднимать бокал
Рай не лечит, забывает
Что я хотела, о чём мечтала
[Rap]
Частный самолёт, белый песок под ногами
Вилла у воды, утро встречаю с духами
Шелест пальм вокруг, всё как в картинках красивых
Только пустота внутри не лечится силой
Платье от кутюр, туфли из новой коллекции
Но не заглушить дорогим шампанским рефлексий
Все завидуют мне, шлют сердечки, лайки
А я тону в тоске посреди этой сказки
[Bridge]
В океане тишины
Я ищу свои следы
Может быть на глубине
Я найду ответ себе
[Chorus]
Рай не лечит, не спасает
Рука устала поднимать бокал
Рай не лечит, забывает
Что я хотела, о чём мечтала
[Outro]
Рука устала... (устала...)
В раю пустом... (пустом...)
[Звук волн затихает]

b11c09be-66f4-41e1-a06b-247a3fb4d42b.name: Winter Glass
b11c09be-66f4-41e1-a06b-247a3fb4d42b.sound: Russian folk, lo-fi beats, duet vocals, vintage synths, ambient textures
b11c09be-66f4-41e1-a06b-247a3fb4d42b.lyrics:
[Verse 1 - Male]
Through foggy window panes
Cup of tea grows cold
Same time each morning here
Watching you walk by
[Verse 2 - Female]
Your scarf, familiar red
Coffee steam rises slow
Want to step inside but
Time stands frozen still
[Chorus - Both]
За окном, я вижу тебя (Through the window, I see you)
Почему молчим? (Why do we stay silent?)
[Verse 3 - Male]
Footprints in fresh snow
Leading to your door
Every day I wait
But words stay trapped inside
[Chorus - Both]
За окном, я вижу тебя
Почему молчим?
[Solo - Russian Folk/Ambient]
[Instrumental break]
[Bridge - Female]
Paper napkin drawings
Half-empty cups remain
Time keeps passing by
While we both pretend
[Chorus - Both]
За окном, я вижу тебя
Почему молчим?
[Outro - Both]
(Tomorrow, maybe tomorrow)
(Maybe I'll step inside)

a486800d-b556-40b0-97e4-bd31ba8f293f.name: Рассвет на Посту
a486800d-b556-40b0-97e4-bd31ba8f293f.sound: Russian post-punk, lo-fi electronics, melancholic acoustic guitar, cold synths, urban atmosphere
a486800d-b556-40b0-97e4-bd31ba8f293f.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Я встаю когда все спят
Поднимаюсь выше, выше
На железной лестнице
Ржавый след моих шагов
[Pre-chorus]
Здесь наверху один
Смотрю на город мой
Небо становится красным
Небо становится красным
[Chorus]
Небо становится красным
Как вчера, как всегда
Небо становится красным
И я всё ещё здесь
(Я всё ещё здесь)
[Verse 2]
Старый завод затих
Пустые окна смотрят вниз
Помню, как гудел станок
Теперь лишь ветер да я
[Pre-chorus]
Время не ждёт никого
Город меняет лицо
Небо становится красным
Небо становится красным
[Chorus]
Небо становится красным
Как вчера, как всегда
Небо становится красным
И я всё ещё здесь
(Я всё ещё здесь)
[Bridge]
[Звуки города вдалеке]
Новые здания растут
Старые стены падают
Но я храню этот пост
На грани двух миров
[Chorus]
Небо становится красным
Как вчера, как всегда
Небо становится красным
И я всё ещё здесь
(Я всё ещё здесь)
[Outro]
Небо становится красным
Небо становится красным
(Становится красным...)
[Затихающие шаги по металлу]

2e1529e0-c124-4fba-b16d-dde1e7924b7f.name: Nightwalk
2e1529e0-c124-4fba-b16d-dde1e7924b7f.sound: Lo-fi jazz, nocturnal saxophone, deep 808 bass, ambient rain, distant sirens
2e1529e0-c124-4fba-b16d-dde1e7924b7f.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Walking past your window
In the rain again
These empty streets know my name
Like they know yours
Can't sleep tonight
So I keep moving
These empty streets know my name
[Pre-chorus]
And I wonder if you're awake
Counting cars like I do
While the rain falls soft
(While the rain falls soft)
[Chorus]
These empty streets know my name
They hold every step I take
These empty streets know my name
And somehow that's okay
(That's okay)
[Verse 2]
Rain on my shoulders
Feels like forgiveness now
These empty streets know my name
And yours is fading
Into puddles and past tense
These empty streets know my name
[Bridge]
[Saxophone Solo]
(Ooh, these streets, these streets...)
[Chorus]
These empty streets know my name
They hold every step I take
These empty streets know my name
And somehow that's okay
[Outro]
I'm learning to walk alone
These empty streets know my name
(These empty streets)
These empty streets know my name
(Know my name)
These empty streets know my name
[Rain sounds fade out]

59fb8443-667d-4cdc-a931-74d3c1c06541.name: Pixel Heart
59fb8443-667d-4cdc-a931-74d3c1c06541.sound: Dark jungle/DnB, deep sub-bass, breakbeats, dreamy Russian/French vocals, atmospheric synths
59fb8443-667d-4cdc-a931-74d3c1c06541.lyrics:
[Intro]
(La-la-la, oh-oh) [avec reverb]
[Verse 1 - Russian]
В цифровом мире я
Одна среди кодов
Каждый взгляд мой теперь
Превращается в пиксели
[Pre-chorus - French]
Je me perds dans les bits
Dans l'espace virtuel
Mes émotions codées
Dans un monde artificiel
[Chorus - Russian/French]
Моё сердце разбито на пиксели
(Oh-oh-oh)
Mon coeur digital saigne
Dans le système binaire
Всё становится кодом
(Ah-ah-ah)
[Verse 2 - French]
Les messages sans âme
Sur l'écran froid et noir
Je cherche ta chaleur
À travers le réseau
[Pre-chorus - Russian]
Между нами экран
Между строчками боль
Я пытаюсь понять
Где реальность моя
[Chorus - Russian/French]
Моё сердце разбито на пиксели
(Oh-oh-oh)
Mon coeur digital saigne
Dans le système binaire
Всё становится кодом
(Ah-ah-ah)
[Bridge - Russian/French]
Я хочу настоящей любви
Sans les filtres digitaux
(Oh-oh-oh-oh)
Dans ce monde pixelisé
[Outro]
(La-la-la) [with fading reverb]
(Oh-oh-oh) [distant, echoing]

ef4be4c2-3637-4384-9a13-8e80f5abb949.name: В Питере жить, Vibe
ef4be4c2-3637-4384-9a13-8e80f5abb949.sound: Melodic House, French Touch, 128 BPM, luxury hotel ambiance, Russian-French vocals
ef4be4c2-3637-4384-9a13-8e80f5abb949.lyrics:
[Intro]
[WELL lobby ambiance]
[Elevator 'ding']
(soft, whispered) Питер не спит в WELL
(soft, whispered) Отель мечты
(key card swipe as hi-hat)
[Verse 1]
Питер не спит в WELL
(whispered)
Murmure doux, je suis là
Le silence danse dans le hall
WELL-well-well (pitched down)
Un sourire, la nuit commence
Des regards, un secret s’invite
Danse au WELL, mon ami (giggly)
[Pre-chorus]
(soft, breathy) WELL... c'est parfait
Sous la lune, tout est possible
[Chorus]
WELL — в Питере пить
WELL — в Питере жить
(repeat)
[Build]
(Rising strings, vocal chop "WELL-well-well")
[Verse 2]
La porte s’ouvre, chaleur dorée
(whispered) Suis-moi, descend en bas
Cœurs légers, pas sur le tapis
Minuit sourit sous nos bras
WELL-well-well (pitched down)
Танцуй со мной всю ночь
Une nuit, mille envies
Danse au WELL, mon ami (giggly)
[Pre-chorus]
WELL... c'est parfait
Une étoile, je reste ici
[Chorus]
WELL — в Питере пить
WELL — в Питере жить
(repeat)
[Bridge]
[Piano solo - WELL lounge style]
(whispered adlibs: Отель мечты)
[Chorus]
WELL — в Питере пить
WELL — в Питере жить
(repeat)
[Outro]
Merci, WELL
[fade to WELL lobby ambiance]

bd8b9b74-9117-40de-9110-cf9b65f9caaf.name: Paradoxical High
bd8b9b74-9117-40de-9110-cf9b65f9caaf.sound: Tech House, female vocals, 128 BPM, luxury atmosphere
bd8b9b74-9117-40de-9110-cf9b65f9caaf.lyrics:
[Verse]
[Non-lyrical female vocals - flowing melodic phrases]
Mmm... ahh... ooh...
Rising higher...
Mmm... yeah...
Feel the rhythm...
[Pre-chorus - 3 seconds]
[Whispered non-English vocals]
Si... mi... ah...
[Chorus]
[Hypnotic hook - repeated twice]
Uh-huh... uh-huh...
Take me up... take me up...
Uh-huh... uh-huh...
Never stop... never stop...
[19kHz private vault beep]
[Verse]
[Non-lyrical female vocals]
Ahh... mmm... ooh...
Touch the sky...
Yeah... mmm...
All night long...
[Pre-chorus - 3 seconds]
[Whispered non-English vocals]
La... vie... est...
[Chorus]
[Hypnotic hook - repeated twice]
Uh-huh... uh-huh...
Take me up... take me up...
Uh-huh... uh-huh...
Never stop... never stop...
[Solo]
[Extended non-lyrical vocal improvisation]
Ooh... ahh... mmm...
Yeah... yeah... yeah...
Mmm... la la la...
Higher... higher...
[19kHz private vault beep]
[Bridge]
[Stripped back vocals]
Mmm... breathe...
Feel... the beat...
Ahh... rise...
[Final Chorus]
[Hypnotic hook - repeated twice with ad-libs]
Uh-huh... uh-huh... (yeah)
Take me up... take me up... (higher)
Uh-huh... uh-huh... (mmm)
Never stop... never stop... (never)
[Outro]
[Non-lyrical vocals fade]
Mmm... ahh... ooh...
Yeah... mmm...
[19kHz private vault beep]

2c1296dd-0e3d-4e41-9e49-b4415b25d73c.name: Blue Street Lullaby
2c1296dd-0e3d-4e41-9e49-b4415b25d73c.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[tape hiss, tube amp hum]
[acoustic rhythm guitar: bright, percussive strumming, close-mic]
[upright bass: slapped, warm, woody tone]
[drums: brushed snare on 2 and 4, no cymbals, loose 92 BPM groove]
[electric lead guitar: clean, twangy Telecaster, sparse licks with spring reverb]
[VERSE 1]
[male vocal: warm baritone, smooth but with raw edge, slight Southern drawl]
[recorded on RCA 77-D mic, natural room reverb from Sun Studio live room]
[light compression, no echo yet]
She walks that blue street, barefoot and slow,
with a heart full of no place to go.
Her shadow’s longer than the night is wide…
but she’s got heaven in her eyes.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[vocals open slightly, more air]
[lead guitar answers each line with short lick]
The jukebox plays our broken tune—
under a cold, cold moon.
[CHORUS]
[slapback echo added (120ms, one repeat)]
[backing vocals: Jordanaires-style “ooh-ooh”, tight harmonies, panned left/right]
[upright bass slaps harder, drums add light kick on 1 and 3]
OH, BLUE STREET BABY—
DON’T YOU CRY!
THE WORLD’S BEEN HARD,
BUT SO HAVE I.
I’LL WALK THAT ROAD
RIGHT BY YOUR SIDE…
TILL THE SUN COMES UP
AND TRUTH’S OUR GUIDE.
[VERSE 2]
[echo removed, back to dry vocal]
[guitar strumming softer, bass walks down]
Your hands are tired, your smile’s worn thin,
but you’re the only light I’ve ever been in.
No palace, no crown, just you and me—
and this old street’s our symphony.
[CHORUS]
[full slapback echo, Jordanaires harmonies swell]
OH, BLUE STREET BABY—
DON’T YOU CRY!
THE WORLD’S BEEN HARD,
BUT SO HAVE I.
I’LL WALK THAT ROAD
RIGHT BY YOUR SIDE…
TILL THE SUN COMES UP
AND TRUTH’S OUR GUIDE.
[OUTRO]
[lead guitar plays final twangy riff]
[vocals fade with echo: “truth’s our guide…”]
[upright bass holds low E]
[tape runs out, needle lifts]

8a05e978-5a61-43eb-96b2-10e701537dba.name: Rain Will  (Variation)
8a05e978-5a61-43eb-96b2-10e701537dba.sound:
Genre: 70s Psychedelic / Blues
Mood: Dark, intimate, hypnotic
Era: 1971 warm analog sound

Vocal: Brutal low male whisper. Chest voice only. No singing, no high notes.
Range: C2 to G2 only. Speak, don't sing.
Texture: Vocal fry + breath. Like threatening whisper.

Song Structure:
- Intro: Bass + organ
- Verse: Brutal low whisper enters
- Chorus: Same brutal whisper, more intense
- Verse 2: Continue brutal whisper
- Chorus
- Bridge: Low brutal spoken
- Chorus x2
- Outro: Fade to brutal whisper

Tempo: 75 BPM
Key: D minor

Instruments:
- Bass: Warm, supports low vocal
- Guitar: Clean with tremolo
- Organ: Hammond with Leslie
- Drums: Brushed
- Mellotron: Strings

Production: Tape warmth, intimate
8a05e978-5a61-43eb-96b2-10e701537dba.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Brutal low whisper]
The mirror's cracked from side to side
A twin I cannot recognize
The shadow stretches on the wall
And answers when I do not call

[Chorus: Brutal whisper]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Verse 2: Brutal deep whisper]
The clockwork heart is winding down
A silent scream in every town
The radio plays static hymns
To drown the light along the limbs

[Chorus: Brutal whisper]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Bridge: Brutal spoken low]
A flicker on the silver screen
The space between what is and seems
I taste the future on my tongue
It's hollow, and I am too young

[Chorus x2: Brutal whisper]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Outro: Brutal barely audible]
The only ones... who know...
The only ones... who know...

e9378101-59c6-4103-986d-11713492a6f2.name: Radio Signs
e9378101-59c6-4103-986d-11713492a6f2.sound: Lo-fi hip hop, retro vinyl crackle, dreamy beats, mellow jazz samples
e9378101-59c6-4103-986d-11713492a6f2.lyrics:
[Verse 1 - Female Quartet]
Late at night with my radio on
Every station playing our favorite song
I catch myself reading into the words
Like they're meant just for us, how absurd
[Chorus - Male Duet]
Old love songs keep playing on my radio
Sending me signs I'm too scared to know
Baby, these melodies tell me what's true
Every note reminds me of you
[Verse 2 - Female Quartet]
Your message came right as the DJ spoke
About taking chances, hearts getting broke
I wonder if you're listening too
To these old songs speaking something new
[Bridge - All]
(The static fades) But the feeling stays
(The music plays) And shows me the way
[Chorus - Male Duet]
Old love songs keep playing on my radio
Sending me signs I'm too scared to know
Baby, these melodies tell me what's true
Every note reminds me of you

fe6d7dc5-88da-4067-86e9-06477a113db4.name: Из Пепла (From The Ashes)
fe6d7dc5-88da-4067-86e9-06477a113db4.sound: Modern rock, polished production, female duet vocals, deep male backing vocals
fe6d7dc5-88da-4067-86e9-06477a113db4.lyrics:
[Verse 1 - Singer 1]
Я в тишине
Смотрю вдаль
И каждый день
Как сталь
Но верю я
Что путь найду
И силы все
Соберу
[Verse 2 - Singer 2]
Мой взгляд устал
От всех преград
Но я иду
Сквозь град
Ты рядом здесь
И я с тобой
Мы победим
Этот бой
[Chorus - Both]
Из пепла встанем
Сквозь боль прорвемся
(Встанем, встанем)
Мы не сдаемся
Из пепла встанем
К свету прорвемся
(Встанем, встанем)
Мы не сдаемся
[Verse 3 - Singer 1]
Твоя рука
В моей руке
Мы вместе здесь
В огне
И пусть вокруг
Бушует шторм
Мы устоим
В этот час
[Verse 4 - Singer 2]
Нам говорят
"Остановись"
Но мы летим
Только ввысь
И этот путь
Нам по плечу
Я так хочу
Я кричу
[Chorus - Both]
Из пепла встанем
Сквозь боль прорвемся
(Встанем, встанем)
Мы не сдаемся
Из пепла встанем
К свету прорвемся
(Встанем, встанем)
Мы не сдаемся
[Bridge - Alternating]
Не страшно мне
С тобой идти
Мы сможем все
Впереди
[Final Chorus - Both + Intense]
Из пепла встанем
Сквозь боль прорвемся
(Встанем, встанем)
Мы не сдаемся
Из пепла встанем
К свету прорвемся
(Встанем, встанем)

54b693d5-c396-40f7-8d05-9a4fa10163b2.name: Still awake (Variation Duet)
54b693d5-c396-40f7-8d05-9a4fa10163b2.sound: Create a cinematic Russian hip-hop track with a French chic twist, blending deep 808 basslines and live rhythm elements for a noir-inspired soundscape. Use crisp hi-hats, sharp snares, and hard-hitting kicks to create a driving beat. Add dark atmospheric synths with a soft enchanting glow, evoking the luxurious ambiance of a Parisian night. Include haunting female vocals exclusively in Russian , with lyrics strictly in Russian only (no other languages or phrases allowed). The lyrics should convey themes of 'Heavy Luxe,' seduction, and mystery, with dynamic delivery soaked in reverb. Incorporate subtle rain sounds, vinyl crackle, and distant echoes to enhance the noir vibe. Add glitch effects, pitch-shifting, and vocal chops for a modern touch. Ensure the melody flows like silk, elegant and languid, echoing the feeling of a lavish boudoir under the sound of rain. Follow this structure:Intro : Soft rain sounds, vinyl crackle, and deep 808 bass rumbles with whispered vocals.Verse 1 : Female vocals enter with crisp hi-hats and snare rolls; add reverb-heavy synths.Pre-Chorus : Build-up with rising synth arpeggios and layered vocal harmonies.Chorus : Powerful drop with hard-hitting kicks, 808 bass, and shimmering synths; vocals soar dynamically.Bridge : Breakdown with glitch effects, pitch-shifted vocals, and rain sounds; create an intimate moment.Final Chorus : Repeat the chorus with added intensity; include vocal chops and distorted bass wobbles.Outro : Fade out with soft rain, distant echoes, and lingering synths.Tempo: 85–100 BPM, with a steady yet hypnotic groove.
54b693d5-c396-40f7-8d05-9a4fa10163b2.lyrics:
[Intro: Rain, vinyl crackle, whispered close-mic, echo fade]
Mmm... You’re still awake...
(Watching... watching...)
[Verse 1: Soft piano, ambient rain]
Every night, I’m here again,
Glass of wine, my oldest friend.
Watching streets through pouring rain,
It taps the glass — I hear, I hear.
People rushing, chasing home,
I observe their silent show.
You think I don’t see through the glow?
But I know — I see, I hear.
[Pre-chorus: Synth swell, heartbeat bass, dreamy delivery, layered whisper on “alone”]
In the shop window’s gleam,
Lights are racing, like a dream.
Thoughts dissolve, my eyes go blind —
They wait for me... but I’m alone.
[Chorus: Deep 808, strings, commanding vocals, whispered ad-libs panned on “Secrets...”]
Through the rain, I see your secrets,
Through the rain, all thoughts are fleeting.
Through the rain, I see your secrets...
(Secrets, secrets — all so fleeting...)
[Verse 2: Darker piano, city hum, mysterious tone]
Across the street, a window glows,
I’m alone — who else knows you?
Shadows dance behind the pane,
Burning bright like dreams in flame.
In this city built of shades,
You hide truth in masquerades.
You think I don’t hear what’s true?
But I know — I hear, I see.
[Bridge: Glitch, pitch-shift, intimate whisper, sharp cutoff on last word]
Raindrops strike the cobblestone,
Time has frozen, I’m alone.
In this hour, you don’t sleep —
Masks are off... you don’t speak...
[Chorus: Full strings, emotional peak, layered harmonies, swirling whispers]
Through the rain, I see your secrets,
Through the rain, all thoughts are fleeting.
Through the rain, I see your secrets...
(Secrets, secrets — all so fleeting...)
[Outro: Rain fades, vinyl crackle, tired soft voice, echo fade, final rain fadeout]
I’ll be waiting at the café...
Again...
(Watching... watching...)

f13257e8-7031-4a23-9015-864ee56a7275.name: AND THE NIGHT (Variation)
f13257e8-7031-4a23-9015-864ee56a7275.sound:
A warm, hazy Christmas miracle recorded in 1973. The track is built around a BRUTAL, WEATHERED MALE VOCAL — a voice of cracked leather, gravel, and spent embers. It's a LOW, CHESTY BARITONE that RASPS and WHISPERS, constantly hovering between a strained, intimate hush and a raw, emotional GROWL, as if every word is pulled from a deep, aching place. The roughness isn't aggressive; it's the sound of raw, unfiltered wonder.

The music is gentle, psychedelic soul. A soft, swinging rhythm from brushed drums and walking upright bass. Dreamy, twinkling Fender Rhodes electric piano chords. Wistful, lyrical lines from a muted trumpet that sound like smiles. Subtle bells and celesta sparkle like distant Christmas lights.

The production is all vintage warmth and closeness — soft tape saturation, a cozy room reverb, making the voice feel both close-mic'd and vast. The mood is genuine, stunned nostalgia. It's the sound of a scarred man struck silent by beauty on a cold street, his voice breaking not from sorrow, but from the sheer weight of the feeling.
f13257e8-7031-4a23-9015-864ee56a7275.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Gritty, intimate whisper, close-mic'd]
The city's dressed in Christmas lace,
A frozen, sparkling, bright embrace.
(vocal stays in low register, breathy)
A thousand lanterns line the streets,
Where every stranger that you meet...
(voice tightens, slight rasp)
They stop and stare, they catch their breath,
This beauty cheating winter's death.
(chesty, pushed whisper)
The shop windows, they gleam and glow,
With tales of joy in falling snow.

[Pre-Chorus: Voice strains, becomes more present]
And can you feel it in the air?
This magic, heavy, everywhere?
(a raw, spoken quality)
It wraps around us like a thread...
A story in each streetlight's head...

[Chorus: Voice opens into a raw, strained BARITONE, not shouting]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN...
(voice cracks on "WRAP")
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN...
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE...
(gravelly, sustained)
LOOKING BACK... AT ME...
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND...
(emotion breaks through)
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND...
IT'S PULSING IN THE EVENING AIR...
A SECRET... THAT WE ALL SHARE...

[Verse 2: Returns to the gritty whisper, but warmer]
The tram bells ring a distant cheer,
The scent of pine is crystal clear.
A couple laughs, their hands entwined,
A brighter future in their mind.
(voice smiles through the rasp)
The old man by the chestnut stand,
Sees wonder in this fairyland.
His eyes reflect the colored streams,
Of long-forgotten, childhood dreams.

[Pre-Chorus: Repeat with more vocal fry]
And can you feel it in the air?
This magic, heavy, everywhere?
It wraps around us like a thread...
A story in each streetlight's head...

[Chorus: More forceful, the strain is intentional]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN!
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN!
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE!
LOOKING BACK... AT ME!
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND!
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND!
IT'S PULSING IN THE EVENING AIR!
A SECRET... THAT WE ALL SHARE!

[Bridge: Voice clears slightly, becoming a direct, husky confession]
Oh, the frost it paints the window glass...
But out there, nothing comes to pass...
But peace... and such a strange delight...
(slow, deliberate)
To be alive... in such a night...
The city's heart... it beats so slow...
In every lamp's... electric glow...

[Final Chorus: Apotheosis. Voice is ravaged, emotional, but still a baritone]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN!
(tearing grit)
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN!
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE!
LOOKING BACK... AT ME!
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND!
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND!
IT'S PULSING... IN MY VEINS TONIGHT!
(full chest voice, breaking)
THIS CITY... BURNS... SO BRIGHT!

[Outro: Voice collapses back to the original, exhausted whisper]
It's so beautiful this year...
(breathy, fading)
So beautiful...
You can see it... in their eyes...
No one's in disguise...
Just the lights...
And the night...
...and the snow...
...and it's right...
...so right...

e5bc1f20-36df-4897-968e-efd8e40c3585.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Ты смотришь за окно — там пустота,
В золоте пузырей отражаюсь я.

[Chorus]
Где ты сейчас? Слышишь ли меня?
На другой стороне, жду твой ответ снова.
Между строк, в каждом баре, до утра —
Ты ответишь ли мне, если губы твои молчат?
Где ты сейчас?
[Verse 2]
В перламутре бокалов тает наш след,
Клинки шампанского жгут память лет.
Я физически рядом, но снова вдали —
Мысли твои растворяются, как дым.
[Pre-chorus]
Ты слышишь звук? Он стучит,
В такт секунд, что ушли…
[Chorus]
Где ты сейчас? Слышишь ли меня?
На другой стороне, жду твой ответ снова.
Между строк, в каждом баре, до утра —
Ты ответишь ли мне, если губы твои молчат?
Где ты сейчас?
[Bridge]
В невесомости линий — сигнал на краю,
Я называю твое имя, но ловлю пустоту.
[Chorus]
Где ты сейчас? Слышишь ли меня?
На другой стороне, жду твой ответ снова.
Между строк, в каждом баре, до утра —
Ты ответишь ли мне, если губы твои молчат?
Где ты сейчас? (где ты сейчас?)
Где ты сейчас?
[Outro]
[Champagne bottle clinks, filtered echoes]
Где ты сейчас… где ты сейчас… где ты сейчас… где ты сейчас… где ты сейчас… где ты сейчас… где ты сейчас… где ты сейчас… где ты сейчас… где ты сейчас…

Night after night
I'm chasing after light
Through the rain
Once again
Night after night
Until it feels right
Love remains
Through the pain
[Outro]
Night after night
(After night...)
Night after night
(Your light...)

[Rain effects fade]

a63f9f5c-e108-4a6a-8ae3-0aef464818b4.name: Mon Coeur en Soie
a63f9f5c-e108-4a6a-8ae3-0aef464818b4.sound: Alternative R&B, minimalist atmospheric, classical piano, deep 808s, French vocals, rain ambience
a63f9f5c-e108-4a6a-8ae3-0aef464818b4.lyrics:
[Intro]
(La la, mmm)
[Rain sounds fade in]
[Verse 1]
Sur les vitrines
Je regarde passer
Les robes en soie
Comme toi et moi
Si délicates
Si parfaites, mais
(Ah, si fragiles)
[Pre-chorus]
Mon coeur est Hermès
Fragile comme la soie
Dans tes mains, je tremble
Comme un foulard au vent
(Oh oh, comme un foulard)
[Chorus]
Mon coeur en soie
Se déchire ce soir
Les coutures cèdent
Sous le poids des larmes
Mon coeur en soie
Ne peut plus tenir
(Mmm, ne peut plus tenir)
[Verse 2]
Dans les boutiques
Les prix affichés
Ne disent rien
Du vrai coût
De nos erreurs
De nos adieux
(Ah, nos adieux)
[Bridge]
Les diamants brillent
Mais ne durent pas
Comme l'amour parfois
(L'amour parfois)
[Chorus]
Mon coeur en soie
Se déchire ce soir
Les coutures cèdent
Sous le poids des larmes
Mon coeur en soie
S'efface dans la pluie
(Mmm, dans la pluie)

af370400-510f-4557-ad73-530c19132437.name: Fading Light
af370400-510f-4557-ad73-530c19132437.sound: Electronic, haunting orchestral cello lead, deep trap 808 bass, atmospheric
af370400-510f-4557-ad73-530c19132437.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
My hands won't stay still tonight
Something feels different here
The air grows heavy and thick
As time draws ever near
I thought I was ready for this
But now I'm not so sure
Standing in this empty room
While my heart starts to stir
[Pre-chorus]
They're calling my name from afar
But I can't seem to move
The walls are closing in now
With everything to prove
[Chorus]
The spotlight's waiting but I'm fading
Into corners where no one sees
The spotlight's waiting but I'm fading
Till there's nothing left of me
[Verse 2]
My reflection's a stranger now
In this darkened space
The minutes tick slower here
As doubt picks up its pace
I've practiced countless hours
For this moment to arrive
But everything I've learned before
Just doesn't feel alive
[Pre-chorus]
They're waiting out there for me
A sea of faceless eyes
The pressure builds inside my chest
As panic starts to rise
[Bridge]
But wait - I hear your voice break through
Reminding me of why
I started on this journey
And why I have to try
This fear won't define me
Though it fills me to the brim
I'll step into that moment
Let the music carry in
[Chorus]
The spotlight's waiting but I'm fading
Into corners where no one sees
The spotlight's waiting but I'm fading
(But I'm choosing now to breathe)
[Outro]
Take my hand and lead me through
This moment's all we need
(This moment's all we need)

5bb1c212-9092-4e95-a28e-ea84025553d7.name: Mon Reflet Ment (My Reflection Lies)
5bb1c212-9092-4e95-a28e-ea84025553d7.sound: French acapella, haunting female vocals, minimalist 808 bass, atmospheric reverb, 70 BPM
5bb1c212-9092-4e95-a28e-ea84025553d7.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Dans le noir je te vois
Tu es là, face à moi
(Mmm, mmm)
Si proche mais si loin
Je tends la main en vain
[808 bass drops]
[Pre-chorus]
Est-ce vraiment toi?
Ou bien est-ce moi?
(Ah-ah, ah-ah)
[Chorus]
Mon reflet ment
Il me parle doucement
Mon reflet ment
Je ne suis plus comme avant
(Mon reflet ment, mon reflet ment)
[Verse 2]
Tes yeux sont les miens
Mais ton âme retient
Des vérités cachées
Que je veux oublier
[Layered breaths]
(Ah-ooh, ah-ooh)
[Bridge]
[Whispered] Dans le silence de minuit
[Echoed] Je me perds, je me suis
[Layered vocals building]
La vérité se dévoile
Entre nous, plus de voiles
[Chorus]
Mon reflet ment
Il me parle doucement
Mon reflet ment
Je ne suis plus comme avant
(Mon reflet ment, mon reflet ment)
[Verse 3]
Cette nuit j'accepte enfin
Que nous soyons un destin
Cette image que je vois
C'est simplement toi et moi
(Mmm, ah-ah)
[Final Chorus]
Mon reflet dit vrai
Je me trouve, je me sais
Mon reflet dit vrai
Je m'accepte à jamais
(Mon reflet dit vrai, mon reflet dit vrai)
[Fading vocal layers]

6f947321-797c-492d-be1c-f4a51480f828.name: La Boîte à Musique (The Music Box)
6f947321-797c-492d-be1c-f4a51480f828.sound: Atmospheric trap noir, French vocals, 808 bass, rain ambience, glitch effects
6f947321-797c-492d-be1c-f4a51480f828.lyrics:
[Intro: Rain sounds]
[Ambient music box melody]
[Verse 1]
Dans la ruelle ce soir
Une petite boîte en cuivre
Sous la pluie qui tombe
Les notes me font revivre
[Pre-chorus]
Mélodie mécanique
Dans mes mains tremblantes
(Tremblantes, tremblantes)
Le passé qui chante
[Chorus]
La boîte à musique chante mes secrets
Chaque note, un souvenir parfait
La boîte à musique tourne sans fin
Me ramène là où tout commence
(Où tout commence)
[Post-chorus]
[Glitch effects]
(Ah-ah-ah, mes secrets)
[Mechanical turning sounds]
(Dans le temps, dans le temps)
[Verse 2]
Les souvenirs remontent
Comme des bulles dans l'eau
Ma mère qui me berce
Sa voix dans mon écho
Les larmes qui coulent
Sur les touches rouillées
Cette mélodie simple
Qui m'avait oubliée
[Pre-chorus]
Le temps s'arrête ici
Dans cette danse lente
(La danse lente)
Mon coeur qui chante
[Chorus]
La boîte à musique chante mes secrets
Chaque note, un souvenir parfait
La boîte à musique tourne sans fin
Me ramène là où tout commence
(Où tout commence)
[Bridge]
[808 bass intensifies]
Les années défilent
Comme un film ancien
Je perds mon chemin
Mais la musique me tient
(Me tient, me tient)
[Final Chorus]
La boîte à musique chante mes secrets
(Mes secrets, oh mes secrets)
Chaque note, un souvenir parfait
La boîte à musique tourne sans fin
Me ramène là où tout commence
[Outro]
[Music box melody fading]
(Ah-ah-ah-ah...)
[Rain sounds fade]

44a035d7-ac40-46e3-be8e-b89674424c98.name: Unsent
44a035d7-ac40-46e3-be8e-b89674424c98.sound: Chillwave, dreamy synths, retro textures, hazy atmosphere
44a035d7-ac40-46e3-be8e-b89674424c98.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Soft synth pad fades in]
[Verse 1]
Screen brightness down low
Fingers hesitate, hover
Been here before...
Three dots in a row
(Three dots in a row)
[Chorus]
Typing typing typing...
Backspace backspace
Start again
Say everything, say nothing
Delete delete delete
(Say nothing at all)
[Verse 2]
Remember last summer?
Words keep flowing out
But they stay with me
Just drafts in my notes
(Just drafts, just drafts)
[Bridge]
Long pauses between thoughts
Signal bars fade in and out
My screen reflects back at me
Everything I can't say
[Synth swells]
[Chorus]
Typing typing typing...
Backspace backspace
Start again
Say everything, say nothing
Delete delete delete
(Say nothing at all)
[Verse 3]
Battery running low
2% of courage left
Maybe tomorrow
Maybe never
Just drafts in my notes
(Just drafts)
[Outro]
Screen fades to black
Another night passes by
Unsent unsent unsent...
(Unsent...)
[Synth pad slowly fades]

Plus forte, plus belle
[Chorus]
Mon épée brille dans la nuit
Je suis la lumière qui luit
(Je suis la lumière, la lumière)
