a04a8633-03a9-46ff-b0d6-1002557e0dc4.name: Nike in the Louvre
a04a8633-03a9-46ff-b0d6-1002557e0dc4.sound: Cloud rap français, dreamy trap production, ethereal synths, heavy 808s, atmospheric
a04a8633-03a9-46ff-b0d6-1002557e0dc4.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ah-yi, ah-yi, mm-hmm
(La la la, eh eh)
[Chorus]
Why you looking at my sneakers in the museum?
Acting like I don't belong in this room, yeah
Ces chaussures tell my own story too
Walking through art like I got something to prove
[Verse 1]
I strut past Mona Lisa's smile
Air Forces clean, that's my own style
They stare me down, I hold my ground
Like I'm a painting they just found
Mixing cultures, that's what I do
French finesse with that American groove
Tell me why you acting confused
When I bring my world into your view?
[Verse 2 - French]
Dans les couloirs du Louvre ancien
Mes Jordan brillent, tout le monde le voit bien
L'art moderne sur mes pieds
Représente qui je suis, qui je serai
C'est pas juste une marque pour moi
C'est mon identité, ma voie
Tu peux juger si tu veux
Mais je reste moi, c'est tout ce que je peux
[Bridge]
Ya-ya-ya, ski-di-bop
Ra-ta-ta, mm-pop
(Watch them judge, let them talk)
(That's my art, that's my walk)
[Chorus]
Why you looking at my sneakers in the museum?
Acting like I don't belong in this room, yeah
Ces chaussures tell my own story too
Walking through art like I got something to prove
[Verse 3]
Supreme mixed with Saint Laurent
Breaking rules was never what I want
But my style's a masterpiece
On these marble floors I find my peace
You can find me by Venus de Milo
Rocking Cortez like they're my halo
Questions in their eyes when they pass
But I'm just art in my own class
[Outro]
(La la la, eh eh)
Ya-ya-ya, mm-hmm
(C'est moi, c'est moi)

e8004e58-5722-402a-afd4-f9f31130c41a.name: Boondein (Raindrops)
e8004e58-5722-402a-afd4-f9f31130c41a.sound: Lo-fi Bollywood, mellow beats, dreamy sitar samples, bedroom production
e8004e58-5722-402a-afd4-f9f31130c41a.lyrics:
[Intro]
Barish ki boondein, barish ki boondein
(Falling, falling, softly calling)
[Verse 1]
Main yahan baitha hoon
Videshi zameen par
Sheeshe pe boondein
Yaadein lekar aayi
Maa ki meethi baatein
Bachpan ke din they
[Chorus]
Barish ki boondein, mere dil ko chhoondein
(The raindrops touch my heart)
Ghar ki yaad aaye, dil ko samjhaye
(Memories of home speak to my soul)
[Verse 2]
Naye sheher mein main
Kitaabein khuli hai
Par mann abhi bhi
Purane ghar mein hai
Phone pe awaaz
Door se aati hai
[Rap]
Videsh ki rahon mein dhoondhta hoon apna rasta
Calendar pe din ginte, time zone mein fasta
Study table pe coffee, neend se hai naata
Window se dekhu duniya, lag rahi hai parai
Maa ke haath ka khana, yaad aata hai daily
Messages type karta, feelings chhup ke bhejta
Dost kehte rehte, "tu jaldi laut aa"
Time beetta jaye, main yahan pe rukta
[Bridge]
Rim jhim rim jhim
Yaadein barsaat ki
(Memories rain down)
Dil mein mere
Ghar ki baat ki
[Chorus]
Barish ki boondein, mere dil ko chhoondein
(The raindrops touch my heart)
Ghar ki yaad aaye, dil ko samjhaye
(Memories of home speak to my soul)
[Outro]
Barish ki boondein...
(Coming home soon...)

875f7104-e127-40ad-a32d-6b9629b36698.name: Ghost
875f7104-e127-40ad-a32d-6b9629b36698.sound:
75 BPM, female vocal trip-hop, haunted celestial vibe,  

[CORE SOUND]  
• Drums: Crumbling moonrock beats (kick=dusty meteor, snare=cracked ice),  
• Bass: Dying star sub (Moog with 12sec portamento),  
• Pads: Black hole guitars (reverse shoegaze drones),  
• Melodies: Ghost music box (detuned ±18 cents),  

[VOCALS]  
• Style: Japanese ASMR poetry (decaying transmission),  
• Processing:  
  - NASA radio EQ (narrow 400Hz band),  
  - Lunar surface reverb (8sec decay),  
  - Occasional tape stop effect,  

[SFX ATMOSPHERE]  
1) Interstellar interference (random ±7% pitch wobble),  
2) Vinyl nebula hiss (left channel only),  
3) Dying piano wire (1 note every 32 bars),  

[GOLDEN RULES]  
1) Harmony: Only diminished/7th chords,  
2) No BPM consistency (±3 fluctuations),  
3) Final mix must include:  
   - 1 unexpected silence (2-4 sec),  
   - 1 "wrong note" (intentional),  
4) Dynamic range: 4dB (compression banned).

ba6bf61e-89b9-4200-9472-fd118ef26e27.name: Thought Provoking
ba6bf61e-89b9-4200-9472-fd118ef26e27.sound: LUXURY Female Vocal Tech House, 128 BPM, ELITE CLUB ANTHEM (Berghain-ready), hypnotic trancey FEMALE Russian vocals (breathy ASMR, indie-pop singer with moody vocals-style intimacy), melancholic poetry as hypnotic hook. Verse: close-mic whispers with lip-noise texture. Pre-chorus: rising trance tension (filter sweep + white noise). Chorus: ANTHEMIC REPEAT (triple-tracked: dry center / +1 octave air / -1 octave demon). Bass: heart-thumping sub (47Hz, LFO 0.5Hz modulation). Drums: diamond-cut 909 (transient +3dB attack) + fizzy champagne-cork snare (500Hz body, 12kHz sparkle). VIP: 18.5kHz pheromone layer + 19kHz neural pulse (subliminal style, every 4 bars, L/R pan). RULES: 1) Female vox ONLY (no androgyny) 2) Chorus = drunk singalong (max 5 words) 3) First 3 sec = hook (TikTok-proof) 4) Test meme potential: ‘Would Russians cry to this at 4AM?’
ba6bf61e-89b9-4200-9472-fd118ef26e27.lyrics:

f122ee81-222d-4f92-a1cc-8a4bad328c0d.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Rolling trance beat, cosmic arps, soft atmospheric wind)
Oooh (aah, aah)
[Verse 1]
Rooms spinning, half awake
Heartbeat racing, in the break
Lost in the shimmer, raw and real
Minutes stretch, beginnings steal
Fading night on my skin
Breathe in, settle in
[Pre-Chorus]
Weightless, I wait
Edge of sunrise, hesitate
Moving slow, holding tight
Waves come over, still the night
[Chorus]
Hold me before the morning breaks
Three-note pulse, lifting me
Keep me, this is all it takes
On the edge of sunrise, chasing free
(Aah, aah)
[Solo]
[Cosmic supersaw lead, hypnotic arpeggios, wordless "Aah" vocals floating]
[Verse 2]
Steps echo, shadows gone
Rushing forward, carried on
Nerves spark, flicker bright
Rising tide, losing sight
Catching moments, a strand, a line
Bittersweet, suspended in time
[Pre-Chorus]
Weightless, I wait
Edge of sunrise, hesitate
Hope flickers, in the haze
Lost and found in thousand ways
[Chorus]
Hold me before the morning breaks
Three-note pulse, lifting me
Keep me, this is all it takes
On the edge of sunrise, chasing free
(Aah, aah)
[Breakdown]
[Orchestral swell, amen breakbeats, floaty vocal echoes]
(Aah, aah)
[Bridge]
Still standing on the line
Racing but falling behind
Every word, almost gone
Still holding on
[Chorus]
Hold me before the morning breaks
Three-note pulse, lifting me
Keep me, this is all it takes
On the edge of sunrise, chasing free
(Aah, aah, aah)
[Outro]
(Clean trance beat, subtle rolling bass)
Edge—Edge of sunrise
(Aah, aah, aah)

fb5d6589-fc30-4ddb-aee2-1ecf65384bd5.name: Fading Names
fb5d6589-fc30-4ddb-aee2-1ecf65384bd5.sound: Trip-hop, dark melancholic jazz, smoky saxophone, emotional cello, deep 808s, urban rain ambience
fb5d6589-fc30-4ddb-aee2-1ecf65384bd5.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I walk these empty streets at night
Can't find my way to rest
The rain keeps falling soft and slow
Like time upon my chest
Each footstep through the puddles
Marks another hour alone
[Pre-chorus]
Every corner feels familiar
Every window's dark as stone
[Chorus]
These shadows know my name
(They know my name)
Been walking here so long
These shadows know my name
(They know my name)
Till morning comes along
[Verse 2]
The saxophone plays down the block
A lonely, fading tune
My memory plays old movies
Of what I used to do
The rain washes away my steps
But can't wash clean my mind
[Pre-chorus]
Every alley holds a question
Every answer's hard to find
[Chorus]
These shadows know my name
(They know my name)
Been walking here so long
These shadows know my name
(They know my name)
Till morning comes along
[Bridge]
[Soft spoken with saxophone and cello]
In these quiet hours
Between the night and day
I've learned to live with ghosts
Who never fade away
[Final Chorus]
These shadows know my name
(They know my name)
Been walking here so long
These shadows know my name
(They know my name)
Till morning comes along

8c62468f-4ca9-490e-b486-a90b01dfae65.name: Urban Pulse
8c62468f-4ca9-490e-b486-a90b01dfae65.sound: Alternative R&B instrumental, lo-fi fusion, dark cinematic, urban atmosphere, deep 808s

ac20bde0-f246-43e6-b968-31f9666cbc19.name: Stations of Memory
ac20bde0-f246-43e6-b968-31f9666cbc19.sound: French noir trap, atmospheric electronic, haunting vocals, rain-soaked ambience, glitch effects
ac20bde0-f246-43e6-b968-31f9666cbc19.lyrics:
[Intro: Ambient Rain & Metro Sounds]
[Verse 1]
Through empty platforms I wander alone
Footsteps echo on weathered stone
Each passing train holds fragments of lives
Like scattered photographs that survive
I collect these voices in the dark
As they float through this concrete ark
My mind's a station where memories wait
For connections that come too late
[Pre-chorus]
The night grows deeper, time slips away
These strangers' words have more to say
[Chorus]
Dans les couloirs du métro perdu
(Lost in the metro corridors)
Les voix des fantômes qui ne dorment plus
(Voices of ghosts who no longer sleep)
Mes souvenirs dansent sous la pluie
(My memories dance in the rain)
Entre les lignes de ma vie
(Between the lines of my life)
[Verse 2 - French]
Je marche seule dans ce labyrinthe
Les murs gardent nos histoires, nos plaintes
Chaque station, un nouveau chapitre
Du livre que je ne peux plus lire
[Metro announcement sounds]
[Breakdown]
Static crackles through the air
Distant voices everywhere
(Everywhere, everywhere...)
[Bridge]
Time dissolves like rain on glass
Present merges with the past
Voices blend in symphony
Of what was and what could be
[Verse 3]
Paper tickets, torn and old
Each one with a story untold
In this underground museum of night
Where memories fade in fluorescent light
I collect these pieces of sound
Till morning comes around
[Outro]
[Rain intensifies]
[Metro doors closing sounds]
(Les derniers murmures de la nuit...)
(The last whispers of the night...)

459dd512-c640-4772-92f0-e3fa04fa7a9f.name: Река Времени (River of Time)
459dd512-c640-4772-92f0-e3fa04fa7a9f.sound: Emo rap, lo-fi beats, Arabian instruments, reverbed female vocals, ambient noise
459dd512-c640-4772-92f0-e3fa04fa7a9f.lyrics:
[Ambient intro: Palace echoes, footsteps]
[Verse 1]
Я хожу по этим залам
В тишине ночной луны
Вспоминаю, как бывало
Мы с тобой здесь жили, мы
[Pre-chorus]
Время как вода течёт по этим залам
Время как вода уносит нас с тобой
(Уносит нас с тобой)
[Chorus]
Время как вода течёт по этим залам
Время как вода, я здесь совсем одна
Каждый шаг звучит как эхо прошлых дней
В пустоте дворца ищу твои следы
[Palace ambience]
[Verse 2]
Помнишь ты меня учила
Как любить и как прощать
А теперь я заблудилась
И не знаю, как дышать
[Chorus]
Время как вода течёт по этим залам
Время как вода, я здесь совсем одна
Каждый шаг звучит как эхо прошлых дней
В пустоте дворца ищу твои следы
[Rap]
По мраморным ступеням поднимаюсь выше
Каждый зал пустой, но твой я голос слышу
Здесь когда-то музыка и смех звучали
А теперь лишь время пишет на стенах печали
Где же ты сейчас? В каких краях далёких?
Я брожу одна среди колонн высоких
Помню, как мы здесь мечтали о судьбе
Я кричу во тьму, но эхо лишь в ответ мне
В этих залах время остановилось
Но без тебя вся жизнь остановилась
[Footsteps echo]
[Bridge]
(Время лечит, говорят)
(Но моё застыло здесь)
(В этих каменных стенах)
(Где тебя со мною нет)
[Post-chorus]
Время как вода течёт по этим залам
[Arabian vocal runs]
Время как вода, я здесь совсем одна
[Arabian instruments intensify]
[Outro]
Время как вода течёт по этим залам
Время как вода... течёт...
[Ambient palace sounds fade]

1782192b-859e-40f6-80f7-df54082d5430.name: Silicon Tears (Variation)
1782192b-859e-40f6-80f7-df54082d5430.sound: male vocal monotone flat nasal tenor no vibrato, clean electric guitar repeating 4-note riff E-G-A-C with analog chorus, bass playing identical riff, light hi-hat only in choruses no snare no kick, tempo 92 BPM, key C minor, no dynamics no build no climax, 1999 Los Angeles alternative rock, analog tape saturation, stereo wide dry mix, themes California illusion fame emptiness digital decay, male lead vocal: deep gravelly baritone, whiskey-rough intimate smoky delivery, breathy phrasing with controlled vocal fry, clean electric guitar repeating 4-note riff E-G-A-C with analog chorus effect, warm repetitive bassline in unison, light brushed hi-hat only in choruses, distant rain field recording, tempo 92 BPM, key C minor, no distortion no drums no climax, atmospheric noir mood, 1990s cinematic alternative, analog tape saturation vinyl crackle subtle room reverb on vocal only, themes California illusion fame emptiness regret urban loneliness, structure intro verse chorus verse chorus outro
1782192b-859e-40f6-80f7-df54082d5430.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[clean electric guitar: E – G – A – C riff, chorus on, bass plays same notes]
[VERSE 1]
[monotone vocal on G, flat delivery]
She’s got stars in her Instagram,
rents her soul by the gram.
Her skin glows like a sunset screen—
but her heart’s a dead machine.
[CHORUS]
[vocal: G – A – C, same flat tone, hi-hat enters]
SILICON TEARS, they shine so clear—
wash away what’s real in here.
You buy your dreams in a plastic cup…
but the truth won’t fill it up.
(bék-vocal: “fill it up…” — same notes, softer)
[VERSE 2]
[vocal back on G, no drums]
He drives fast on a broken name,
chases ghosts in a fame game.
His smile’s bright like a neon sign—
but his eyes forgot to shine.
[CHORUS]
[vocal: G – A – C, hi-hat returns]
SILICON TEARS, they fall so slow—
in a world you’ll never know.
You trade your bones for a golden view…
but the real world’s not in you.
(bék-vocal: “not in you…”)
[OUTRO]
[guitar and bass repeat riff, fade out]

1a7843f8-0288-44b0-86e0-2f3fdac6f54e.name: Minuit Masqué
1a7843f8-0288-44b0-86e0-2f3fdac6f54e.sound: French hip-hop, dark 808 bass, elegant synths, nocturnal atmosphere
1a7843f8-0288-44b0-86e0-2f3fdac6f54e.lyrics:
[Intro]
Minuit masqué... minuit masqué...
Dans le noir on se cache
(On se cache, on se cache)
[Verse 1]
Par la fenêtre
Le clair de lune
Des silhouettes qui passent
Pas un mot
Dans ce grand manoir
Les murs qui nous observent
Minuit masqué
On avance sans bruit
[Chorus]
Minuit masqué, dans le noir on se cache
Les yeux brillent derrière les masques
Minuit masqué, personne ne sait qui passe
Dans l'ombre on efface nos traces
(Masqués, on se cache)
(Masqués, dans le noir)
[Verse 2]
Des pas feutrés
Des regards qui se croisent
Sous les lustres éteints
J'entends les murmures
Les verres qui tintent
Dans la salle cachée
Minuit masqué
Le jeu commence maintenant
[Pre-chorus]
Les codes secrets
Les portes fermées
Tout le monde joue son rôle
(Son rôle, son rôle)
[Chorus]
Minuit masqué, dans le noir on se cache
Les yeux brillent derrière les masques
Minuit masqué, personne ne sait qui passe
Dans l'ombre on efface nos traces
(Masqués, on se cache)
(Masqués, dans le noir)
[Bridge]
Le temps s'arrête
Dans ce monde à part
Les règles changent
Quand la nuit devient art
Minuit masqué...
[Solo]
[Dark synth instrumental with haunting melodies]
[Chorus - Final]
Minuit masqué, dans le noir on se cache
Les yeux brillent derrière les masques
Minuit masqué, personne ne sait qui passe
Dans l'ombre on efface nos traces
(Masqués, on se cache)
(Masqués, dans le noir)
[Outro]
Minuit masqué...
(On se cache)
Minuit masqué...
(Dans le noir)

6521a078-e7da-47fb-bfaa-9980d8aa5614.name: Midnight Echoes
6521a078-e7da-47fb-bfaa-9980d8aa5614.sound: Cinematic downtempo, melancholic cello, jazzy sax, jungle beats, urban atmosphere
6521a078-e7da-47fb-bfaa-9980d8aa5614.lyrics:
[Intro - Instrumental with ambient sounds]
(Ooh... waiting... calling...)
[Verse 1 - Instrumental with whispered vocals]
(Where have you gone?)
(I'm still here...)
[Pre-chorus 1]
Time stands frozen in this empty room
Each minute stretches like a lifetime without you
The clock face watches as I pace the floor
Between midnight and morning, I ask once more
[Chorus]
Where are you now, between midnight and morning?
Are you thinking of me while the world is transforming?
When every heartbeat echoes your name
And memories dance like rainfall against the window pane
Between midnight and morning, I'm lost in space and time
(Lost in space and time...)
[Verse 2 - Instrumental with whispered vocals]
(Still waiting...)
(Come back to me...)
[Pre-chorus 2]
Street lamps paint patterns on my wall
Your silhouette, I think I hear your call
The night train's distant melody
Reminds me of the way you used to be
[Chorus]
Where are you now, between midnight and morning?
Are you thinking of me while the world is transforming?
When every heartbeat echoes your name
And memories dance like rainfall against the window pane
Between midnight and morning, I'm lost in space and time
(Lost in space and time...)
[Bridge]
La-la-la, oh-oh-oh
Time suspended in the dark
(Waiting, still waiting...)
[Outro]
Where are you now...?
Between midnight and morning...
(Ooh... still waiting...)
[Fade out with instrumental and ambient effects]

d4625db3-5a62-4dc3-8364-78f922182eff.name: Midnight Nexus
d4625db3-5a62-4dc3-8364-78f922182eff.sound: Classical fusion, cello lead, 808 bass, ethereal French vocals, ambient electronic
d4625db3-5a62-4dc3-8364-78f922182eff.lyrics:
[Intro - Cello Solo]
[Verse 1]
Numbers on my screen
Different city, different scene
Can't remember which is ahead
Which is behind instead
[Pre-chorus 1]
Phone in my hand again
(Говори со мной - speak to me)
Calculating time zones
When you might be home
[Chorus]
It's always midnight somewhere between us
(C'est toujours minuit quelque part entre nous)
[Verse 2]
Half-typed messages wait
Sometimes too early, sometimes late
Your morning sun
While my day is done
(Напиши мне - write to me)
[Pre-chorus 2]
Calendar marked in two
Different colors, different views
Morning coffee meets midnight tea
(Поговори со мной - talk to me)
[Chorus]
It's always midnight somewhere between us
(C'est toujours minuit quelque part entre nous)
[Bridge]
Distance measured not in miles
But in moments missed
Your yesterday is my tomorrow
Our time slips and shifts
[Breakdown]
[Cello intensifies]
(Расскажи мне - tell me)
Waiting...
(Je t'attends - I'm waiting)
Still waiting...
(Говори со мной - speak to me)
[Verse 3]
Window light changes slow
Watch the hours come and go
Your voice breaks through
Wrong time, but still true
[Chorus]
It's always midnight somewhere between us
(C'est toujours minuit quelque part entre nous)

c3f7bac5-8ec5-42f6-b86e-0b8c872a4592.name: Farewell
c3f7bac5-8ec5-42f6-b86e-0b8c872a4592.sound: Russian romance, melancholic piano, minor key, ethereal strings, female vocals
c3f7bac5-8ec5-42f6-b86e-0b8c872a4592.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Ah-ah-ah... Oh-oh...)
[Verse 1]
Холодный рассвет на пустом вокзале
(The cold dawn at the empty station)
Твой поезд ждёт, время не щадит
(Your train is waiting, time shows no mercy)
Мы столько слов друг другу не сказали
(So many words between us left unsaid)
И сердце от печали так болит
(And my heart aches so much from sorrow)
[Pre-chorus]
В последний раз смотрю в твои глаза
(One last time I look into your eyes)
В последний раз касаюсь я руки
(One last time I touch your hand)
[Chorus]
В последний раз, в последний раз
(One last time, one last time)
Уходит всё как талая вода
(Everything flows away like melting water)
В последний раз, любовь моя
(One last time, my love)
Прощай, я отпускаю навсегда
(Farewell, I'm letting go forever)
[Verse 2]
На перроне след твоих шагов растает
(Your footsteps will vanish on the platform)
Часы спешат, минуты не вернуть
(The clock hurries on, moments won't return)
И только эхо тихо повторяет
(And only the echo softly repeats)
"В последний раз" - мой одинокий путь
("One last time" - my lonely path)
[Breakdown]
(La-la-la...)
В последний раз...
(One last time...)
(Oh-oh-oh...)
[Bridge]
Пусть время лечит, память сохранит
(Let time heal, but memory preserve)
Тот миг, когда все стрелки замерли
(That moment when all clock hands froze)
[Final Chorus]
В последний раз, в последний раз
(One last time, one last time)
Уходит всё как талая вода
(Everything flows away like melting water)
В последний раз, любовь моя
(One last time, my love)
Прощай, я отпускаю навсегда
(Farewell, I'm letting go forever)
[Outro]
(В последний раз... в последний раз...)
(One last time... one last time...)
[Piano fades]

84416c2e-e5f2-4eb5-a564-b7e380a0c4d6.name: Pause
84416c2e-e5f2-4eb5-a564-b7e380a0c4d6.sound: lounge, soundtrack, ultra-luxury, muted piano, sub bass, 78 BPM, sensual spoken word
84416c2e-e5f2-4eb5-a564-b7e380a0c4d6.lyrics:
[0:00-12:00 | FRENCH FOUNDATION]
[Piano: Felt-muted F#m7, every 20 sec]
[Bass: Sinusoidal sub pulse C#0, 30 sec intervals]
[SFX: watch tick, 78BPM, low]
[French Spoken]
C'est l'heure
Encore là
Très doux
Reste ici
[4:17]
WELL... c'est l'heure [spoken]
[French Spoken]
Sur la chaise
Pour moi
Silence
Respire
[8:33]
WELL... c'est l'heure [spoken]
[12:00-18:00 | RUSSIAN MOMENTS]
[SFX: ambient textures under]
[12:45]
В Питере жить... WELL [whispered, -24dB]
[15:22]
В Питере пить... WELL [whispered, piano sustain]
[17:59]
Питер не спит... WELL [whispered, HVAC hum]
[18:00-24:00 | FRENCH CODA]
[French Whisper, Hermès scarf filter]
Pause douce
Rien d'autre
WELL... à jamais
[SFX: Elevator chime F#5]
[SFX: WELL door click]

777ef292-3a7b-4694-b151-9deaed8d0aef.name: Nocturne
777ef292-3a7b-4694-b151-9deaed8d0aef.sound: soundtrack, slow tempo, nocturne, classical piano, minor key, atmospheric, stereo details
777ef292-3a7b-4694-b151-9deaed8d0aef.lyrics:
[Intro]
(piano intro, faint ticking)
La, la... la, la, la...
[Verse 1]
Keys turning smooth, alone in the chair
F# minor, fingers rest on the air
“WELL... entre minuit” (right channel, distant)
Lobby wears velvet, the marble so cold
C# phrygian shadows, secrets on hold
[Chorus]
This is the night shift, just breathing in still
Soft steps across silk, hallways don’t spill
On my watch nothing moves, but the music and time
La, la, la... waiting with rhythm and rhyme
[Verse 2]
Footsteps are faded, low voices gone
Русские тени, echo in mono long
Strings play “Питер не спит”—no one will know
Numbers and faces slip under the door
L’addition... s’il vous plaît (leftward whisper), then nothing more
[Chorus]
This is the night shift, quiet and real
Patek Philippe ticking, under the wheel
On my watch nothing drifts, only music and wine
Oh, oh, oh... counting each measure in line
[Bridge]
(seven soft metronome beats)
Spotlight on velvet, champagne unpops
Lift goes to nowhere, lobby clock stops
[Solo]
(piano arpeggio)
[Final Chorus]
This is the night shift, passing like steam
Silk under footsteps, silent routine
On my watch nothing breaks—just piano and light
La... la, la... holding the night
[Outro]
[last metronome strike, champagne fizz]
(softly, as if distant in a hall)
“Питер... WELL”
[End]

c4171026-4821-4013-859e-5a9ec26a5e6d.name: Тяжелый шик
c4171026-4821-4013-859e-5a9ec26a5e6d.sound: Russian hip-hop, noir vibe, Parisian night, deep 808s, crisp hi-hats, rain, vinyl crackle, glitch, reverb
c4171026-4821-4013-859e-5a9ec26a5e6d.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Звук дождя, виниловый щелчок, глубокий бас]
(Тише... ла-ла-ла)
Шёпот где-то рядом, дождь по стеклу
Игра теней внутри — я все чувствую, я молчу
[Verse 1]
Жду, когда ночь растает между моих рук
Лёгкий дым, едва — дыханием ласкаю звук
Словно нить ведёт, но я не трону шаг
Всё решит взгляд, угасаю, как маяк
(о-о-о)
Из-под ресниц скользит дождь — опять
Глухие удары, счёт стучит в такт
Все линии мягко, лениво текут
Я не зовут, я просто наблюдаю тут
[Pre-Chorus]
Спрятанные линии под шелком
Город немой, и дыханье промокло
В этом гуле — странно сладкий риск
Пульс невидим, он зовёт меня вниз
(ла-ла-ла)
[Chorus]
Это тяжёлый шик (тяжёлый)
Мой тихий магнит (магнит)
На вдохе — держи, замри, не смотри
Это тяжёлый шик (шик)
В этом дожде — мои
Тени остались, но звук говорит: держи, держи, держи
[Bridge]
[Глитч, питч шифт, дождь]
Все грани смяты, как соль на губах
Пауза длится, звучит как игра
Всё, что утеряно, двое в глазах
Внутри этот шик, как затянутый страх
(о-о-о)
[Chorus]
Это тяжёлый шик (тяжёлый)
Мой тихий магнит (магнит)
На вдохе — держи, замри, не смотри
Это тяжёлый шик (шик)
В этом дожде — мои
Тени остались, но звук говорит: держи, держи, держи
[Final Chorus]
Это тяжёлый шик (шик)
В этом дожде — мои
Держи, держи, держи, держи, держи, держи, держи, держи, держи, держи
(ла-ла-ла)
[Outro]
[Мягкий дождь, трещание винила, эхо]
Всё остаётся — лишь звук, лишь дождь, лишь шик
(о-о-о)

85987e4d-43a4-4236-929b-4e44aecfaa9e.name: LuxeFlow
85987e4d-43a4-4236-929b-4e44aecfaa9e.sound: drum and bass, liquid, luxury, deep reese bass, silk texture, crisp 2-step drums, champagne highs, female French vocal, 128BPM
85987e4d-43a4-4236-929b-4e44aecfaa9e.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Ouh la la... ahh)
[Verse 1]
Nuit claire, parfum dans l’air
Rires doux, je cherche sur la mer
Un sourire, effleuré, incertain
Mon cœur glisse entre les mains
(Silence...)
[Instrumental Break]
[ad-libs: (ouh, ahh)]
[Pre-Chorus]
Un regard—trop loin, trop près
Paillettes tournent, tout disparaît
La soie coule, mots non-dits
Murmures portés sous la pluie
[Chorus]
Éloignée, aimantée, j’avance (oh oh oh)
Désirée, effacée, j’attends (ah ah ah)
Suspendue, je danse, sans fin
Soirée serein…
Encore, encore, sans fin
[Drop]
(Ouh la la, ahh… encore)
[Verse 2]
Vibration — souffle suspendu
Lumière glisse, tout s’estompe, inconnu
Trace légère sur ma peau
J’inspire, expire, et c’est trop tôt
[Instrumental Break (VIP FX)]
[ad-libs: (la la la, ahh)]
[Bridge]
Invisible fil entre toi, moi
Reflets soyeux—rien ne va
Ni demain ni hier, présent infini
Perdue, trouvée, je t’oublie
[Chorus]

1c3cd496-858e-48be-bb61-f2ea0601983e.name: Untitled
1c3cd496-858e-48be-bb61-f2ea0601983e.sound:
Create a deeply meditative ambient track that evokes the vast silence of ancient Egypt — endless dunes under a starlit sky, time dissolving into sand. Deep, resonant bass tones pulse like the heartbeat of the desert, slowly fading into the wind. The soft, constant shimmer of shifting sand creates a natural high-frequency texture, like distant stars whispering.  

Incorporate authentic ancient Egyptian instruments: the haunting ney flute, the deep rumble of the frame drum (doumbek), and the ethereal sound of the sistrum — all played with minimalism and sacred intention. Let each note linger, decay, and vanish like footprints erased by the breeze.  

Add long reverberations, spacious depth, and no fixed rhythm — only the slow breath of the desert. Use binaural beats at 7.83Hz (Schumann resonance) for grounding. Subtle microtonal shifts and moments of silence enhance the sense of timelessness.  

The mood is introspective, ancient, sacred. Let it feel like standing before a pyramid at dawn — sand falling, wind singing, eternity listening.

b803dfe5-e487-4498-8be0-ba54943301ea.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
b803dfe5-e487-4498-8be0-ba54943301ea.lyrics:
[Soft water ripple, distant wind chime, minimal sub-bass pulse, no drums yet]

[Verse 1]
Sat by the lake where the reeds don’t speak
Just sway in rhythm, calm and meek
No phone, no plan, no voice inside
Just water breathing, slow and wide

For the first time in I don’t know when
I let the quiet settle in
Not fighting it, not running through
Just… being… still… with you

[Pre-Chorus]
They say still waters run deep
But what if I’m just tired of the leap?
What if peace isn’t earned —
But given… when you stop… and turn?

[Chorus]
Still waters, hold me now
No need to speak, no need to vow
The silence isn’t empty space
It’s where I finally see my face
(oh-oh, see my face)
(softly…)

[Verse 2]
No one’s watching, no one’s near
Just my breath, the sky, the pier
And the weight I carried all this time
Dissolves like salt in ocean brine

I used to fear this kind of hush
Thought it meant I’d lost my rush
But stillness isn’t death — it’s grace
A mirror held in time and space

[Pre-Chorus]
The ripples fade… the mind slows down…
And truth arrives… without a sound…

[Chorus]
Still waters, hold me now
No need to speak, no need to vow
The silence isn’t empty space
It’s where I finally see my face
(oh-oh, finally clear)
(just be here…)

[Bridge]
I don’t need to fix myself today
Just sit… and let the quiet stay
No lesson, no gain, no “what’s next”
Just this breath… this lake… this rest

[Chorus — almost whispered, beat enters softly: slow kick, brushed snare, warm trap hi-hats]
Still waters… hold me…
Silence… knows me…
Empty space… is where I’m found…
Not lost… but grounded… on this ground…
(oh… grounded…)
(yeah… safe now…)

[Outro]
Water breathes…
I breathe too…
Still…
(oh… still…)

b9d11ee1-91f7-4c1f-b4e6-48bb249395f4.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, brutal emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
b9d11ee1-91f7-4c1f-b4e6-48bb249395f4.lyrics:

[Verse 1]

And asks: “You still got the will to feel?”

[Pre-Chorus]
I don’t know where I’m headin’
But I know I’m not dead yet
And that’s enough… for now…

[Chorus]
No map, just miles
No answers, just trials
But the sun still rises, the wind still sings
And my heart still beats through broken things
(oh-oh, broken things)
(clap clap, keep goin’)

[Verse 2]
Saw a sign: “Next gas — 80”
Felt like life sometimes: empty, dry
But I kept rollin’, not ‘cause I’m brave
But ‘cause stoppin’ feels like a grave

Yeah, uncertainty’s a heavy coat
But freedom’s sewn in every note
Of silence between the radio songs
Where I admit: I don’t belong…
…to any lane. And that’s okay.

[Pre-Chorus]
I’m not lost — I’m just unled
And that’s a kind of freedom instead

[Chorus]
No map, just miles
No answers, just trials
But the sun still rises, the wind still sings
And my heart still beats through broken things
(oh-oh, still beats)
(clap clap, no retreat)

[Bridge]
They want a destination
I got a direction: forward
They want a reason
I got a rhythm: breathe and move
That’s my religion now

[Chorus — full energy, vocals raw, beat punches harder]
No map… just miles…
No crown… just trials…
But the sun still burns, the road still calls
And I’m still standin’ through it all
(oh-oh, through it all)
(yeah… still standin’)

[Outro]
Miles roll…
I roll too…
No map…
Just truth…
(oh… just truth…)

a6cffaf1-5e84-492f-b0c2-70058c0bc590.name: AND THE LIGHTS (Variation)
a6cffaf1-5e84-492f-b0c2-70058c0bc590.sound:
The track is dominated by a LOW, CHESTY, AND UTTERLY DESTROYED MALE BARITONE. A voice of gravel, smoke, and splintered wood — a DEEP, GRAVELLY WHISPER that strains and CRACKS into a raw, emotional GROWL. It feels PHYSICAL, like words pushed through torn vocal cords. This is not a singing voice; it's a broken instrument of visceral confession.

This iconic vocal sits at the heart of a warm, hypnotic psychedelic jazz-soul ballad from 1974. The sound is alive and intimate: recorded live in a smoky club with a tight, groovy band — upright bass, brushed drums, Fender Rhodes electric piano, and a wandering, muted trumpet that answers the vocal's cry. The production is saturated with vintage tube warmth, subtle tape compression, and a gentle swirl of phaser, making the voice feel both close and otherworldly. The mood is a gritty celebration — magical, nostalgic light seen through a lens of raw, human weariness.
a6cffaf1-5e84-492f-b0c2-70058c0bc590.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Gritty, intimate whisper, close-mic'd]
The city's dressed in Christmas lace,
A frozen, sparkling, bright embrace.
(vocal stays in low register, breathy)
A thousand lanterns line the streets,
Where every stranger that you meet...
(voice tightens, slight rasp)
They stop and stare, they catch their breath,
This beauty cheating winter's death.
(chesty, pushed whisper)
The shop windows, they gleam and glow,
With tales of joy in falling snow.

[Pre-Chorus: Voice strains, becomes more present]
And can you feel it in the air?
This magic, heavy, everywhere?
(a raw, spoken quality)
It wraps around us like a thread...
A story in each streetlight's head...

[Chorus: Voice opens into a raw, strained BARITONE, not shouting]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN...
(voice cracks on "WRAP")
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN...
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE...
(gravelly, sustained)
LOOKING BACK... AT ME...
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND...
(emotion breaks through)
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND...
IT'S PULSING IN THE EVENING AIR...
A SECRET... THAT WE ALL SHARE...

[Verse 2: Returns to the gritty whisper, but warmer]
The tram bells ring a distant cheer,
The scent of pine is crystal clear.
A couple laughs, their hands entwined,
A brighter future in their mind.
(voice smiles through the rasp)
The old man by the chestnut stand,
Sees wonder in this fairyland.
His eyes reflect the colored streams,
Of long-forgotten, childhood dreams.

[Pre-Chorus: Repeat with more vocal fry]
And can you feel it in the air?
This magic, heavy, everywhere?
It wraps around us like a thread...
A story in each streetlight's head...

[Chorus: More forceful, the strain is intentional]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN!
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN!
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE!
LOOKING BACK... AT ME!
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND!
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND!
IT'S PULSING IN THE EVENING AIR!
A SECRET... THAT WE ALL SHARE!

[Bridge: Voice clears slightly, becoming a direct, husky confession]
Oh, the frost it paints the window glass...
But out there, nothing comes to pass...
But peace... and such a strange delight...
(slow, deliberate)
To be alive... in such a night...
The city's heart... it beats so slow...
In every lamp's... electric glow...

[Final Chorus: Apotheosis. Voice is ravaged, emotional, but still a baritone]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN!
(tearing grit)
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN!
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE!
LOOKING BACK... AT ME!
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND!
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND!
IT'S PULSING... IN MY VEINS TONIGHT!
(full chest voice, breaking)
THIS CITY... BURNS... SO BRIGHT!

[Outro: Voice collapses back to the original, exhausted whisper]
It's so beautiful this year...
(breathy, fading)
So beautiful...
You can see it... in their eyes...
No one's in disguise...
Just the lights...
And the night...
...and the snow...
...and it's right...
...so right...

3296f58d-dab1-4b3e-b71c-7b695b300eda.name: SNOW FALLS
3296f58d-dab1-4b3e-b71c-7b695b300eda.sound:
psychedelic soul meets drum & bass neurofunk,  
male vocals: smooth falsetto verses / brutal baritone choruses,  
hypnotic soul bassline at 100 BPM — neuro-bass halftime at 200 BPM,  
wah-wah guitar solos chopped into amen breaks,  
lush string arrangements glitched, frozen, granular,  
vintage organs through bit-crusher, tape warmth vs digital ice,  
dreamy atmosphere × winter storm intensity,  
70s vibe meets neurofunk production,  
emotional delivery: falsetto intimacy → baritone aggression,  
poetic lyrics (snow theme: life changes, encounters, startups),  
hazy summer feel vs blizzard textures,  
subtle percussion ↔ amen break avalanches,  
layered harmonies vocoded, time-stretched,  
catchy chorus with memorable three-note hook (D-F-G),  
structure: soul intro → D&B drop → falsetto verse → halftime chorus → neuro bridge → etc.  

Keywords: psychedelic soul, male falsetto/baritone, hypnotic bass, wah-wah guitar, glitched strings, bit-crushed organs, dreamy neurofunk, 70s winter, emotional contrast, poetic duality, hazy storm, layered glitches, catchy brainworm hook.
3296f58d-dab1-4b3e-b71c-7b695b300eda.lyrics:
[Intro: Psychedelic soul — 100 BPM]
[smooth organ, wah-wah guitar, warm strings]
[vinyl crackle, summer haze filter]

[Verse 1: Falsetto, intimate, soulful]
Snow keeps falling on the city streets
[wah-wah guitar responds, melodic]
While I'm changing sheets in borrowed rooms
[hammond organ swell, lush]
Startup dreams in coffee steam
[string section enters, emotional]
Job lines like endless streams
[subtle shaker, 100 BPM groove]

[Hook: Falsetto → Baritone transition]
And the snow keeps falling down
[falsetto: smooth, high]
Falling down, falling down
[voice cracks into baritone gravel]
While our lives turn around
[D&B DROP — 200 BPM neurofunk explosion]

[D&B Neurofunk Section: 200 BPM]
[amen breaks sliced like ice shards]
[neuro bass design: soul bassline glitched]
[strings granular frozen, stuttering]
[snowstorm intensity, digital cold]

[Verse 2: Baritone spoken over D&B]
Met you Tuesday in the park
[vocoder on "park", robotic memory]
Your smile cut through the gathering dark
[neuro bass melody follows vocal contour]
Friday you were gone with dawn
[drum break cuts to silence — then soul strings return]
Just a note upon the lawn
[sudden falsetto again, emotional whiplash]

[Hook: Halftime amid storm]
And the snow keeps falling down
[D&B continues, vocals in halftime falsetto]
Falling down, falling down
[baritone layer enters beneath]
While our lives turn around

[Chorus: Soul × D&B collision]
SNOW FALLS (but nothing stays the same)
[soul strings + neuro bass unison]
PEOPLE CHANGE (beneath the falling flakes)
[falsetto/baritone duet, harmonized]
STARTUPS RISE (and jobs just disappear)
[wah-wah solo chopped into breakbeat]
BUT THE SNOW... THE SNOW IS ALWAYS HERE...
[FULL STOP — then pure soul organ chord]

[Bridge: Psychedelic soul breakdown]
The flakes don't care who wins or fails
[hammond solo, warm, melancholic]
They blanket saints and sinners equally
[string section, no drums, 100 BPM]
A silent equalizer on display
[tempo begins to increase, tension builds]
While we play our human games
[drums re-enter — 100 → 200 BPM acceleration]

[Neuro-Soul Solo: Wah-wah vs Bass design]
Wah-wah guitar and neuro bass duet,
Each mimicking the other's phrasing,
Soul warmth vs digital frost dialogue,
D&B amens slowly overtake soul groove.

[Chorus: Full fusion]
SNOW FALLS (but nothing stays the same)
PEOPLE CHANGE (beneath the falling flakes)
STARTUPS RISE (and jobs just disappear)
BUT THE SNOW... THE SNOW IS ALWAYS HERE...

[Hook x2: Evolution from soul to D&B]
And the snow keeps falling down
[first: soul arrangement, falsetto]
Falling down, falling down
[second: full neurofunk, baritone]
While our lives turn around

[Outro: Storm calms to haze]
Snow... keeps... falling...
[D&B breaks dissolve into soul strings]
...falling...
[organs and wah-wah return, tempo slows]
...falling...
[final: vinyl crackle]

2b540698-d123-4235-be06-ba011803c9c6.name: Midnight Crown
2b540698-d123-4235-be06-ba011803c9c6.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[drum machine: analog-style beat, 98 BPM, tight kick, gated snare]
[synth bass: deep, sliding notes, funky groove]
[clean electric guitar: chorus effect, sparse melodic licks]
[warm analog pad in background]
[VERSE 1 – FEMALE VOCAL]
[female vocal: breathy alto, intimate, dry close-mic, no reverb]
You wear your strength like silent armor,
never let the world see your harm.
I know the cost of being perfect—
it leaves no room for being warm.
[VERSE 2 – MALE VOCAL]
[male vocal: smooth high register, slightly nasal, tape warmth]
You shine so bright, they think you’re fearless,
but in the dark—you’re just like me.
A soul that dreams, a heart that’s weary…
longing to be truly free.
[PRE-CHORUS – TOGETHER]
[vocals intertwine: low female, high male]
[backing vocals: wordless “ah”, minor harmony]
The lights are loud…
the night is deep…
but here with you—
I can just be.
[CHORUS – TOGETHER]
[female: full voice, restrained power]
[male: soaring high tone, emotional but controlled]
WE WEAR THE MASKS—
BUT PAY THE PRICE!
IN A WORLD OF NOISE,
WE SEEK JUSTICE!
YOU’RE THE FLAME…
I’M THE RAIN…
TOGETHER WE BURN—
AND RISE AGAIN.
[OUTRO]
[vocals fade into harmonized hum]
[guitar plays final motif]
[last whisper:]
…rise again.
[tape hiss → silence]

8bce659b-9659-4109-bbca-fbf4e80b54ac.name: Steel Pulse (Nevsky Code)
8bce659b-9659-4109-bbca-fbf4e80b54ac.sound: high-tension cinematic track in the raw aesthetic of 90s Russian urban cinema, English spoken-word vocals with rhythmic urgency, distorted electric guitar only (no bass, no synths, no traditional drums), tempo 85 BPM, key E minor, driving rhythm created entirely from found sounds: Lada engine idle as kick, boot heel on manhole cover as snare, chain dragged on asphalt as hi-hat, gear shift CLUNK as accent, trolley wire ZAP as transient, themes: street code, motion as survival, brotherhood in action, analog-only production, zero reverb, blown speaker distortion, cassette saturation, vinyl crackle, structure: [INTRO] → [VERSE] → [CHORUS] → [VERSE 2] → [CHORUS] → [OUTRO], must feel like a chase through Petersburg at night — relentless, moral, mechanical — instantly evoking the pulse of a specific film without using its music or dialogue
8bce659b-9659-4109-bbca-fbf4e80b54ac.lyrics:
[INTRO]
(found sounds: Lada engine revving, gear shift CLUNK, rain on roof, trolleybus overhead wires ZAP)
[percussive rhythm begins: boot heel on manhole cover — steady 85 BPM]
[VERSE]
(distorted guitar: staccato power chords, dry, no sustain, played like a hammer)
[spoken-word, baritone, English, urgent but controlled]
The city breathes in steel and smoke,
Truth’s not spoken — it’s walked.
One block. One choice.
No second takes.
[CHORUS]
(guitar opens into raw chord, feedback howls like siren)
[voice sharp, rhythmic, almost chanted]
One truth.
No lies.
You move — or you die standing still.
[VERSE 2]
(rhythm intensifies: added sound of metal chain dragged on wet asphalt, syncopated)
(found sounds: distant police siren Doppler, glass bottle SMASH on curb)
[spoken faster, tighter]
They call it chaos.
I call it clarity.
When the gun’s out — masks fall off.
[CHORUS]
(full rhythmic drive: engine idle + boot steps + chain + guitar stabs = live drum kit)
[shouted in cadence]
One truth.
No lies.
You move — or you die standing still.
[OUTRO]
(guitar cuts abruptly)
(found sounds: Lada peels out, tires on wet asphalt, fades into rain and distant Orthodox bell)
[whispered, over engine roar]
…brother’s already ahead.

f7dfffd2-83c9-42e4-9a9b-a8f62a59ea55.name: Fifth Element (Tape from 2263)
f7dfffd2-83c9-42e4-9a9b-a8f62a59ea55.sound: male baritone raw whispered spoken-word English, waltz rhythm 100 BPM (3/4), found sounds only (rain metal breath radio static hydraulic hiss tape machine footsteps), analog tape effects (heavy saturation erratic wow/flutter vinyl crackle tape echo), no melody no instruments no reverb no synths, theme: future solitude lost message urban ritual in sci-fi decay, cold sensual retro-futurist atmosphere, structure: intro-verse-prechorus-chorus-outro
f7dfffd2-83c9-42e4-9a9b-a8f62a59ea55.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[found sounds: distorted taxi radio chatter (unintelligible), rain on flying vehicle hull, slow 3/4 hydraulic hiss, distant siren Doppler-shifted]
[tape saturation heavy, wow/flutter erratic like failing power cell, vinyl crackle as data static]
[VERSE]
They called it the future.
But all I hear is the hum
of a broken air vent
and your voice on a loop
from a cassette that shouldn’t exist.
[found sounds: metal panel rattles, breath through oxygen mask, slow page turn of wet manual]
[tape echo on “exist”, flutter mimics engine stall]
[PRE-CHORUS]
You said love is the fifth element.
But love doesn’t rewind.
It just…
keeps playing
in a machine with no off switch.
[found sounds: tape jam click, rain intensifies, glove snaps off]
[saturation peaks, vinyl pops like failing neon signs]
[CHORUS]
So I dance in the hangar—
alone, under flickering lights,
wearing yesterday’s uniform,
holding a message
that arrived 300 years too late.
[found sounds: footsteps on wet metal grating in 3/4, distant explosion muffled by concrete, heartbeat syncopated]
[tape echo spirals “late… ate… te…”, warped beyond recognition]
[OUTRO]
[found sounds: radio dies, rain stops abruptly, tape spool spins empty, final breath released into helmet]
[tape slows into deep flutter — cuts to silence as if signal lost in orbit]

b6536360-818d-448a-936a-7e30325bff8b.name: Ritual of the Damp Letter
b6536360-818d-448a-936a-7e30325bff8b.sound: male baritone raw spoken-word whisper, English lyrics, 94 BPM, found sounds only (dripping water, match strike, paper unfold, floorboard creak, telephone coil breath), analog effects (tape saturation, extreme wow/flutter, vinyl crackle, tape echo with decay), 1970s psychedelic texture (dusty, lo-fi, mind-drifting), no reverb, no flanger, no phaser, no melody, cold sensuality, hypnotic groove, structure: intro-verse-prechorus-chorus-outro
b6536360-818d-448a-936a-7e30325bff8b.lyrics:
[INTRO]
*(dripping faucet, slow tape start with flutter, match strike, paper unfolding)*
[VERSE]
I write to you every Tuesday at 3:17 a.m.—
not because you’ll read it,
but because the silence needs a shape.
My pen drags like a bruise across the page.
[PRE-CHORUS]
The ink runs when the ceiling leaks.
So do I.
[CHORUS]
This isn’t a letter. It’s a ritual.
Fold. Seal. Bury under floorboards.
Repeat until the walls start whispering back.
[OUTRO]
*(tape slows to stop, rain swells then cuts abruptly, final breath recorded through telephone coil)*

025e03ff-afff-4f30-b07e-a43095b05ba2.name: Morning came today (Cover)
025e03ff-afff-4f30-b07e-a43095b05ba2.sound: 1940s swing jazz, elegant and melancholic, fast tempo 180 BPM, C minor, soft female vocals with French accent and light vibrato, playful and lilting delivery, scat singing, muted trumpet, clarinet, ragtime piano, walking upright bass, banjo, brush drums, handclaps, cabaret vibe, nostalgic, Russian lyrics, no male vocals
025e03ff-afff-4f30-b07e-a43095b05ba2.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Morning came today
Everything's in place
Just like I planned it
(Just like I planned)
But something's strange
Can't put it in words
[Pre-chorus]
All these crystal glasses
Empty in the light
Everything I wanted
Feels so far from right
[Chorus]
Paradise doesn't heal like I thought
(Doesn't heal, no it don't)
Paradise doesn't feel like I sought
(Like I sought, oh no)
[La-di-da, dee-da-dum]
[Verse 2]
Counting every win
Tables filled with friends
But tears keep falling
(Keep falling down)
What's missing here?
Can't make myself smile
[Pre-chorus]
All these fancy places
Dancing through the night
Everything I chased for
Somehow lost its light
[Chorus]
Paradise doesn't heal like I thought
(Doesn't heal, no it don't)
Paradise doesn't feel like I sought
(Like I sought, oh no)
[La-di-da, dee-da-dum]
[Bridge]
In the quiet now
Truth comes clear at last
All that I achieved
Just leaves me so alone
(So alone)
[Final Chorus]
Paradise doesn't heal like I thought
(Doesn't heal, no it don't)
Paradise doesn't feel like I sought
(Like I sought, oh no)
[La-di-da, dee-da-dum]

1154a9fa-407a-4d98-bb40-bc4e876907d5.name: Сквозь дождь (Acoustic Variation)
1154a9fa-407a-4d98-bb40-bc4e876907d5.sound: Create a cinematic Russian hip-hop track with a French chic twist, blending deep 808 basslines and live rhythm elements for a noir-inspired soundscape. Use crisp hi-hats, sharp snares, and hard-hitting kicks to create a driving beat. Add dark atmospheric synths with a soft enchanting glow, evoking the luxurious ambiance of a Parisian night. Include haunting female vocals exclusively in Russian , with lyrics strictly in Russian only (no other languages or phrases allowed). The lyrics should convey themes of 'Heavy Luxe,' seduction, and mystery, with dynamic delivery soaked in reverb. Incorporate subtle rain sounds, vinyl crackle, and distant echoes to enhance the noir vibe. Add glitch effects, pitch-shifting, and vocal chops for a modern touch. Ensure the melody flows like silk, elegant and languid, echoing the feeling of a lavish boudoir under the sound of rain. Follow this structure:Intro : Soft rain sounds, vinyl crackle, and deep 808 bass rumbles with whispered vocals.Verse 1 : Female vocals enter with crisp hi-hats and snare rolls; add reverb-heavy synths.Pre-Chorus : Build-up with rising synth arpeggios and layered vocal harmonies.Chorus : Powerful drop with hard-hitting kicks, 808 bass, and shimmering synths; vocals soar dynamically.Bridge : Breakdown with glitch effects, pitch-shifted vocals, and rain sounds; create an intimate moment.Final Chorus : Repeat the chorus with added intensity; include vocal chops and distorted bass wobbles.Outro : Fade out with soft rain, distant echoes, and lingering synths.Tempo: 85–100 BPM, with a steady yet hypnotic groove., acoustic guitar, campfire, bonfire, fingerpicked, raw, intimate, lo-fi, whispered vocals
1154a9fa-407a-4d98-bb40-bc4e876907d5.lyrics:
[Intro: Rain, vinyl crackle, whispered close-mic, echo fade]
Да, да... Не спишь...
(Смотрю, смотрю...)
[Verse 1: Soft piano, ambient rain]
В кафэ я каждый вечер тут
Бокал вина, мой верный друг
Смотрю на улицы сквозь дождь,
Он стучит, я слышу, слышу
Люди бегут, спешат домой
А я слежу за их игрой
Ты думаешь, что я не вижу?
Но правду знаю, вижу, слышу
[Pre-chorus: Synth swell, heartbeat bass, dreamy delivery, layered whisper on “одна”]
В отражении витрин
Светит свет, бегут огни
Мысли отключают взгляд
Ждут меня, но я одна
[Chorus: Deep 808, strings, commanding vocals, whispered ad-libs panned on “Тайны...”]
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
Сквозь дождь, все мысли не случайны
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
(Тайны, тайны, все случайны)
[Verse 2: Darker piano, city hum, mysterious tone]
Напротив свет, в одном окне,
И я одна — кто знает о тебе,
Мерцают чьи-то тени в нём,
Горят, как сны, прочтённые огнём.
В этом городе теней
Прячешь правду от людей
Ты думаешь, что я не слышу?
Но правду знаю, слышу, вижу.
[Bridge: Glitch, pitch-shift, intimate whisper, sharp cutoff on last word]
Капли бьют по мостовой
Время замерло со мной
В этот час когда не спишь
Маски сброшены — молчишь...
[Chorus: Full strings, emotional peak, layered harmonies, swirling whispers]
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
Сквозь дождь, все мысли не случайны
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
(Тайны, тайны, все случайны)
[Outro: Rain fades, tired soft voice, echo fade, rain fadeout]
В кафэ я буду ждать,
опять...
(Смотрю, смотрю...)

060ea2f6-88d2-40f2-acf4-1a4aecc49430.name: Игра Теней (Shadow Game) (Variation)
060ea2f6-88d2-40f2-acf4-1a4aecc49430.sound: Russian trip-hop, French noir, deep 808s, rain ambience, haunting vocals, glitch effects
060ea2f6-88d2-40f2-acf4-1a4aecc49430.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Rain sounds, vinyl crackle, deep 808]
(Ты здесь... ты здесь...)
[Verse 1]
В этом клубе дым густой
За спиной твой взгляд пустой
Танцуешь близко, но не рядом
Каждый шаг твой - новый яд мне
Знаю все твои пути
Но не могу тебя найти
Между нами только дождь
Правду от меня не скроешь
[Pre-chorus]
Вижу след твоих шагов
В ритме старых джаз-основ
Ближе, ближе подходи

[Chorus]
Тень твоя за мной идёт
Тень моя тебя найдёт
В танце этом до утра

В каплях дождя твой силуэт

Все твои ходы храним
Красной помады яркий след
На бокале пустоты
Играешь роль, но я читаю

[Glitch effects, pitch-shifted]
Между строк
В тишине
Слышу пульс
Ты во мне

[Chorus]
Тень твоя за мной идёт
Тень моя тебя найдёт
В танце этом до утра
Мы с тобой как два огня

[Rain fading, distant echoes]
В дожде растаем без следа
Тень и свет, игра без дна

bdf77f0c-b040-4180-adc0-72781637c6ba.sound: LUXURY female vocal tech house 128bpm, elite brands & night club vibe, hypnotic vocals (female only), trancey memorable hook, velvet texture, marble fx, VIP FX: hidden 18.5kHz layer + 19kHz pulse (every 8 bars). 758d4ffa-cf57-44dc-8097-a7ac6d435acf.name: The city's dressed in Christmas lace, (Variation)
758d4ffa-cf57-44dc-8097-a7ac6d435acf.sound:
The track is dominated by a LOW, CHESTY, AND UTTERLY DESTROYED MALE BARITONE. A voice of gravel, smoke, and splintered wood — a DEEP, GRAVELLY WHISPER that strains and CRACKS into a raw, emotional CONFESSION. It feels PHYSICAL, like words pushed through torn vocal cords.

This iconic vocal sits at the heart of a warm, intimate, late-night session. The atmosphere is PSYCHEDELIC SOUL and DUSTY JAZZ. The arrangement is minimalist and textural: a slow, heartbeat pulse from an upright bass, the soft brush of drums, the melancholic glow of a Fender Rhodes electric piano, and hazy, muted trumpet lines that drift like smoke. Occasional, subtle vibraphone or celesta notes shimmer like distant Christmas lights. The production is saturated with vintage tube warmth, subtle tape compression, and a gentle swirl of phaser on the vocals, making the voice feel both close and like a memory. The mood is a gritty, tender celebration — magical light seen through a lens of raw, human warmth.
758d4ffa-cf57-44dc-8097-a7ac6d435acf.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Gritty, intimate whisper, close-mic'd]
The city's dressed in Christmas lace,
A frozen, sparkling, bright embrace.
(vocal stays in low register, breathy)
A thousand lanterns line the streets,
Where every stranger that you meet...
(voice tightens, slight rasp)
They stop and stare, they catch their breath,
This beauty cheating winter's death.
(chesty, pushed whisper)
The shop windows, they gleam and glow,
With tales of joy in falling snow.

[Pre-Chorus: Voice strains, becomes more present]
And can you feel it in the air?
This magic, heavy, everywhere?
(a raw, spoken quality)
It wraps around us like a thread...
A story in each streetlight's head...

[Chorus: Voice opens into a raw, strained BARITONE, not shouting]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN...
(voice cracks on "WRAP")
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN...
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE...
(gravelly, sustained)
LOOKING BACK... AT ME...
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND...
(emotion breaks through)
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND...
IT'S PULSING IN THE EVENING AIR...
A SECRET... THAT WE ALL SHARE...

[Verse 2: Returns to the gritty whisper, but warmer]
The tram bells ring a distant cheer,
The scent of pine is crystal clear.
A couple laughs, their hands entwined,
A brighter future in their mind.
(voice smiles through the rasp)
The old man by the chestnut stand,
Sees wonder in this fairyland.
His eyes reflect the colored streams,
Of long-forgotten, childhood dreams.

[Pre-Chorus: Repeat with more vocal fry]
And can you feel it in the air?
This magic, heavy, everywhere?
It wraps around us like a thread...
A story in each streetlight's head...

[Chorus: More forceful, the strain is intentional]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN!
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN!
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE!
LOOKING BACK... AT ME!
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND!
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND!
IT'S PULSING IN THE EVENING AIR!
A SECRET... THAT WE ALL SHARE!

[Bridge: Voice clears slightly, becoming a direct, husky confession]
Oh, the frost it paints the window glass...
But out there, nothing comes to pass...
But peace... and such a strange delight...
(slow, deliberate)
To be alive... in such a night...
The city's heart... it beats so slow...
In every lamp's... electric glow...

[Final Chorus: Apotheosis. Voice is ravaged, emotional, but still a baritone]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN!
(tearing grit)
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN!
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE!
LOOKING BACK... AT ME!
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND!
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND!
IT'S PULSING... IN MY VEINS TONIGHT!
(full chest voice, breaking)
THIS CITY... BURNS... SO BRIGHT!

[Outro: Voice collapses back to the original, exhausted whisper]
It's so beautiful this year...
(breathy, fading)
So beautiful...
You can see it... in their eyes...
No one's in disguise...
Just the lights...
And the night...
...and the snow...
...and it's right...
...so right...

bbda4584-bd0c-486a-9aeb-fc1f06ad909d.name: Mirrors
bbda4584-bd0c-486a-9aeb-fc1f06ad909d.sound: Cinematic trip-hop ballad, 1995 vintage vibe, 72 BPM, slow and hypnotic groove, driven by deep, pulsing double bass sample, dusty vinyl crackle throughout, haunting minor-key string section (violin, cello), vintage electric piano chords with tremolo, sparse brushed drum loop with heavy reverb, distant vibraphone accents. Female lead vocal: smoky, breathy, emotionally raw, intimate whisper-to-croon delivery, layered with ghostly harmonies and tape-saturated echoes. Structure: intro with vinyl static and bass → verse with strings and piano → pre-chorus with rising tension → chorus with swelling strings and vocal climax → bridge with stripped-down percussion and vocal vulnerability → final chorus with added vinyl noise and reverse cymbals → outro fading into tape hiss. No explicit content. Vibe: midnight drives through empty cities, mirrors that remember your face, love letters burned but still whispering. Designed for headphones, rainy nights, and existential solitude.
bbda4584-bd0c-486a-9aeb-fc1f06ad909d.lyrics:
[Intro]
(vinyl crackle, distant cello note, bass pulse)
...do you still see me?...
[Verse 1]
I left my shadow in your hallway
You kept my voice in your delay
A photograph with faded eyes
A lullaby of last goodbyes
You said “forever” — clocks disagreed
We danced in rooms where silence breeds
Your touch — a ghost behind the glass
A future built — but never passed
[Pre-Chorus]
The needle skips... but still it plays...
The past won’t leave... it hums and stays...
I trace your name... on window frost...
But mirrors close... when love is lost...
[Chorus]
When the mirrors close — I’m still inside
Watching you walk through empty tides
You were my harbor — my slow decay
My silent film — my disarray
(when the mirrors close...)
I sing to ghosts — in minor keys
They answer back — through broken seas
You turned my hope to static noise
Now even silence... has a voice...
[Verse 2]
I wear your coat — it still smells true
Of smoke and rain — and missing you
The radio plays our favorite lie
The one where neither one says “die”
I built an altar — ash and thread
You were my prayer — you were my dread
But faith decays in empty frames
And love’s a ghost — that calls your name
[Pre-Chorus]
The needle skips... but still it plays...
The past won’t leave... it hums and stays...
I trace your name... on window frost...
But mirrors close... when love is lost...
[Chorus]
When the mirrors close — I’m still inside
Watching you walk through empty tides
You were my harbor — my slow decay
My silent film — my disarray
(when the mirrors close...)
I sing to ghosts — in minor keys
They answer back — through broken seas
You turned my hope to static noise
Now even silence... has a voice...
[Bridge]
(strings fade, only bass and vocal)
...do you dream in shades of grey?...
...do you hear me when I pray?...
...I’m still here... behind the glass...
...a memory... that won’t let pass...
[Final Chorus + Ad-libs]
When the mirrors close — I’m still inside... (still inside...)
Watching you walk through empty tides... (empty...)
You were my harbor — my slow decay... (decay...)
My silent film — my disarray... (disarray...)
I sing to ghosts — in minor keys... (minor keys...)
They answer back — through broken seas... (broken...)
You turned my hope to static noise... (static...)
Now even silence... has a voice... (voice...)
[Outro]
...has a voice...
...mirror fades...
...still singing...
...still waiting...
(vinyl runs out — final pop and hiss)

[Intro: with cello]
I watch from a distance now
Each day brings a different face
Something's changing, I can tell

Used to see you laugh so bright
Now you barely crack a smile
Walking past familiar streets
But you're lost in your own mind
Remember when we'd talk for hours?
Now your words come out so slow
Looking at old photographs
Of a person I don't know
Phone calls getting shorter now
Messages left on read
Every time I reach for you
You slip further ahead
[Hook]
I see your light dimming
Day by day, it's getting harder to find
I see your light dimming
And I don't know how to bring it back to life
[Verse 2]
Empty coffee cups remain
Where we used to share our days
Missed calls stack up one by one
While the seasons slip away
Your eyes don't shine like they did before
Your smile's just a practiced art
All the plans we made back then
Slowly falling all apart
Friends ask where you've disappeared to
I wish I had something to say
Every week that passes by
Takes another piece away
Watch you fade into yourself
Like a picture growing pale
Try to pull you back to shore
But my arms cannot prevail
[Bridge]
Sometimes I catch glimpses
Of who you used to be
In moments when you forget
That you're trying not to feel
And I want to hold those moments
Keep them safe within my hands
But they slip between my fingers
Like grains of falling sand
[Hook]
I see your light dimming
Day by day, it's getting harder to find
I see your light dimming
And I don't know how to bring it back to life
[Outro]
I watch from a distance now
As your colors fade to grey
Something's different, I can tell
And I miss who you used to be

d40d0993-f413-43ff-9e1f-e12b7852989e.name: Press play (V 2)
d40d0993-f413-43ff-9e1f-e12b7852989e.sound: Dark synth-pop anthem, 1989 vintage vibe, 100 BPM, cold and hypnotic groove, driven by pulsing analog bassline, mechanical drum machine beat (LinnDrum-style), shimmering arpeggiated synthesizers, atmospheric pads with slow attack, haunting minor-key melodies, sparse metallic percussion. Male lead vocal: deep, smooth baritone, emotionally detached yet intimate delivery, breathy verses, soaring melancholic chorus. Backing vocals: whispered echoes, harmonized robotic chants, call-and-response phrases. Structure: intro with synth arpeggio → verse with bass and beat → pre-chorus with rising tension → massive chorus with layered synths → bridge with stripped-down percussion and vocal vulnerability → final chorus with added reverb and delay → outro fading into synth decay. No explicit content. Vibe: love as a machine, faith in broken signals, dancing alone in an empty cathedral of wires. Designed for late-night drives, underground clubs, and existential headphones moments.
d40d0993-f413-43ff-9e1f-e12b7852989e.lyrics:
[Intro]
(synth arpeggio fades in, cold, mechanical)
...can you hear me now?...
[Verse 1]
I sent my love in binary code
You answered back with static snow
A touch of skin through fiber glass
A broken vow in chrome and brass
You said “forever” — circuits lied
We kissed through screens with hollow eyes
Your voice, a ghost in copper wire
My soul — the fuel for your desire
[Pre-Chorus]
Press “play”... but nothing moves...
Delete the past... but it still proves...
That even machines... can feel the ache...
When the signal breaks...
[Chorus]
When the signal breaks — I still believe
In every lie you programmed me
You were my church — my stolen grace
My digital god — my cold embrace
(when the signal breaks...)
I dance alone — to your mistakes
A hollow hymn the system makes
You turned my heart to ones and zeroes
Now even silence... has a hero...
[Verse 2]
Your touch was warm — but coded wrong
A perfect beat — but sings a song
Of empty rooms and dial-up cries
Of pixel tears and frozen skies
I built an altar — wires and light
You were my dawn — you were my night
But faith decays in silicon
And love corrupts — when left alone
[Pre-Chorus]
Press “play”... but nothing moves...
Delete the past... but it still proves...
That even machines... can feel the ache...
When the signal breaks...
[Chorus]
When the signal breaks — I still believe
In every lie you programmed me
You were my church — my stolen grace
My digital god — my cold embrace
(when the signal breaks...)
I dance alone — to your mistakes
A hollow hymn the system makes
You turned my heart to ones and zeroes
Now even silence... has a hero...
[Bridge]
(synth fades, only beat and vocal)
...do you miss the way I broke?...
...do you dream in shades of smoke?...
...I’m still here... in your machine...
...a ghost inside your screen...
[Final Chorus + Ad-libs]
When the signal breaks — I still believe... (still believe...)
In every lie you programmed me... (programmed me...)
You were my church — my stolen grace... (my grace...)
My digital god — my cold embrace... (cold...)
I dance alone — to your mistakes... (alone...)
A hollow hymn the system makes... (hollow...)
You turned my heart to ones and zeroes... (zeroes...)
Now even silence... has a hero... (hero...)
[Outro]
...has a hero...
...signal fading...
...still dancing...
...still waiting...
(synth arpeggio decays into silence)

3053fe4d-6b2c-4ecc-81e6-498ca97b7215.name: Empty Paradise
3053fe4d-6b2c-4ecc-81e6-498ca97b7215.sound: 1920s swing jazz, fast tempo 180 BPM, French-inspired female vocals, ragtime piano
3053fe4d-6b2c-4ecc-81e6-498ca97b7215.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Morning light breaks through my window pane
Another day in this grand refrain
Crystal glasses line the shelf
A perfect world I built myself
Each day I wake to silk and lace
In my apartment's sweet embrace
But something's missing in this place
That money just can't replace
[Pre-chorus 1]
I tried to buy my way to happiness
But now I see through this masquerade
All the parties and the fanciness
Can't feel the good for which I prayed
[Chorus 1]
Paradise doesn't heal what I dreamed
Nothing's quite real as it seemed
My hand is tired from reaching high
(Ooh-la-la, reaching high)
All these riches passing by
But they leave me wondering why
(Da-ba-da-dee, wondering why)
[Verse 2]
Dawn brings a lump of pain today
As champagne bottles drift away
In my mirror I can see
A stranger staring back at me
The pearls around my neck feel tight
Like stars that lost their morning light
I dance alone most every night
In rooms that shine too bright
[Pre-chorus 2]
All I want is something real to hold
Beyond these walls of make-believe
Something true that can't be bought or sold
More than what these eyes perceive
[Chorus 2]
Paradise forgets what's pure and true
(Oh, my dream, ooh)
Lost myself in what I grew into
Time keeps slipping through my hands
(La-di-da, through my hands)
Like grains of white sand
[Bridge]
In the ocean of silence I float
Far from the life I once wrote
Searching for something sincere
Beyond this glittering veneer
[Chorus 3]
Paradise can't give what I wanted
(Ooh-la-da-di-da)
These empty rooms leave me haunted
Dancing through this gilded cage
(La-dee-da, my gilded cage)
On this lonely stage
[Outro]
In an empty paradise
Paying such a heavy price

c679ade1-4e2a-4942-bd92-69a577b69d60.name: Les Gouttes de Pluie (Raindrops)
c679ade1-4e2a-4942-bd92-69a577b69d60.sound: Acapella, French vocals, deep 808 bass, atmospheric whispers, haunting reverb

[Verse 1]
Je regarde par la fenêtre
La pluie tombe sans fin
[Breath sounds]
[Pre-chorus]
Les gouttes de pluie sont mes larmes
Les gouttes de pluie sont mes larmes

[Chorus]
Les gouttes de pluie sont mes larmes
Les gouttes de pluie sont mes larmes
Les gouttes de pluie sont mes larmes
[808 bass pulse]
[Verse 2]

[Soft exhale]
[Bridge]
(Un, deux, trois...)
Je suis perdue dans ce déluge
(Quatre, cinq, six...)

[Deep 808]

e7cfc9c8-1268-48ad-bd19-7ed7e9febf64.name: La Voix Magique
e7cfc9c8-1268-48ad-bd19-7ed7e9febf64.sound: Trip-hop acapella, layered French vocals, deep 808 bass, haunting reverb
e7cfc9c8-1268-48ad-bd19-7ed7e9febf64.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Ah... ah... ah...)
[Ambient breaths and echoes]
[Verse 1]
Dans la cathédrale
Seule avec mes pensées
Je trouve ma voix
Dans le silence sacré
Les pierres anciennes
M'appellent doucement
Je sens le pouvoir
Pour la première fois
[Chorus]
Ma voix est ma magie (ma magie)
Les murs entendent mon cri (mon cri)
Ma voix est ma magie (ma magie)

[Verse 2]
Les voûtes résonnent
Avec chaque mot chanté
Mon âme s'éveille
Dans l'obscurité
Les échos grandissent
Je contrôle le son
Ma voix se multiplie
En mille directions
[Chorus]
Ma voix est ma magie (ma magie)
Les murs entendent mon cri (mon cri)
Ma voix est ma magie (ma magie)

[Bridge]
(Dans l'air)
(Dans la pierre)
(Dans mon sang)

[Verse 3]

Le monde autour de moi
L'ancienne sagesse

89b60807-e9d6-4a3e-b005-ecb95aca0f6c.name: Still Growing
89b60807-e9d6-4a3e-b005-ecb95aca0f6c.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, brutal emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
89b60807-e9d6-4a3e-b005-ecb95aca0f6c.lyrics:
[Soft ocean waves return, familiar bassline from Track 1 — but slower, wiser]

[Verse 1]
Same road, same breeze, but different eyes
I see the cracks — and still, I rise
Not ‘cause I’m strong, but ‘cause I’m tired
Of fightin’ truth I once denied

The weight I carried? Still right here
But now it’s part of what I steer
Not draggin’ me — it shapes my pace
And gives my steps a certain grace

[Pre-Chorus]
I’m not fixed
I’m just tendin’
Not finished
Just extendin’…

[Chorus]
Still growin’, like a tree
Through the storm, through the heat
Not perfect — but I’m free
Still growin’, quietly
(oh-oh, quietly)
(yeah… just growin’)

[Verse 2]
Met a kid today, asked me “What’s ahead?”
I smiled and said: “Just keep your head
And heart wide open, feet on ground
You don’t need answers — just stick around”

Yeah, life ain’t linear, clean, or neat
It’s messy, loud, bittersweet
But in the mess, I found my voice
Not loud — but clear. And that’s my choice

[Pre-Chorus]
I’m not whole
I’m just holdin’
The pieces…
With no foldin’…

[Chorus]
Still growin’, like a tree
Through the doubt, through the sea
Not perfect — but I’m free
Still growin’, patiently
(oh-oh, patiently)
(clap clap… just be…)

[Bridge]
Westside breeze still blows my way
But now I know it won’t erase
The scars, the questions, or the rain
And that’s okay…
‘Cause even broken soil can bloom
When tended with truth… and room

[Chorus — full, warm, with layered harmonies and subtle female backing from Track 7]
Still growin’… can’t you see?
Roots run deep… in harmony
Not perfect — but I’m free
Still growin’… endlessly…
(oh-oh… endlessly…)
(yeah… still me…)

[Outro — music fades to ocean, bassline dissolves, last words nearly whispered]
Breeze blows…
I grow…
Not fixed…
But free…
Still…
(oh… still…)
… growin’.

1174110e-a291-4aa7-9521-34f1234680e2.name: AND THE LIGHTS (Variation)
1174110e-a291-4aa7-9521-34f1234680e2.sound:
The track is dominated by a LOW, CHESTY, AND UTTERLY DESTROYED MALE BARITONE. A voice of gravel, smoke, and splintered wood — a DEEP, GRAVELLY WHISPER that strains and CRACKS into a raw, emotional GROWL. It feels PHYSICAL, like words pushed through torn vocal cords. This is not a singing voice; it's a broken instrument of visceral confession.

This iconic vocal sits at the heart of a warm, hypnotic psychedelic jazz-soul ballad from 1974. The sound is alive and intimate: recorded live in a smoky club with a tight, groovy band — upright bass, brushed drums, Fender Rhodes electric piano, and a wandering, muted trumpet that answers the vocal's cry. The production is saturated with vintage tube warmth, subtle tape compression, and a gentle swirl of phaser, making the voice feel both close and otherworldly. The mood is a gritty celebration — magical, nostalgic light seen through a lens of raw, human weariness.
1174110e-a291-4aa7-9521-34f1234680e2.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Gritty, intimate whisper, close-mic'd]
The city's dressed in Christmas lace,
A frozen, sparkling, bright embrace.
(vocal stays in low register, breathy)
A thousand lanterns line the streets,
Where every stranger that you meet...
(voice tightens, slight rasp)
They stop and stare, they catch their breath,
This beauty cheating winter's death.
(chesty, pushed whisper)
The shop windows, they gleam and glow,
With tales of joy in falling snow.

[Pre-Chorus: Voice strains, becomes more present]
And can you feel it in the air?
This magic, heavy, everywhere?
(a raw, spoken quality)
It wraps around us like a thread...
A story in each streetlight's head...

[Chorus: Voice opens into a raw, strained BARITONE, not shouting]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN...
(voice cracks on "WRAP")
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN...
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE...
(gravelly, sustained)
LOOKING BACK... AT ME...
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND...
(emotion breaks through)
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND...
IT'S PULSING IN THE EVENING AIR...
A SECRET... THAT WE ALL SHARE...

[Verse 2: Returns to the gritty whisper, but warmer]
The tram bells ring a distant cheer,
The scent of pine is crystal clear.
A couple laughs, their hands entwined,
A brighter future in their mind.
(voice smiles through the rasp)
The old man by the chestnut stand,
Sees wonder in this fairyland.
His eyes reflect the colored streams,
Of long-forgotten, childhood dreams.

[Pre-Chorus: Repeat with more vocal fry]
And can you feel it in the air?
This magic, heavy, everywhere?
It wraps around us like a thread...
A story in each streetlight's head...

[Chorus: More forceful, the strain is intentional]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN!
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN!
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE!
LOOKING BACK... AT ME!
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND!
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND!
IT'S PULSING IN THE EVENING AIR!
A SECRET... THAT WE ALL SHARE!

[Bridge: Voice clears slightly, becoming a direct, husky confession]
Oh, the frost it paints the window glass...
But out there, nothing comes to pass...
But peace... and such a strange delight...
(slow, deliberate)
To be alive... in such a night...
The city's heart... it beats so slow...
In every lamp's... electric glow...

[Final Chorus: Apotheosis. Voice is ravaged, emotional, but still a baritone]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN!
(tearing grit)
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN!
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE!
LOOKING BACK... AT ME!
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND!
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND!
IT'S PULSING... IN MY VEINS TONIGHT!
(full chest voice, breaking)
THIS CITY... BURNS... SO BRIGHT!

[Outro: Voice collapses back to the original, exhausted whisper]
It's so beautiful this year...
(breathy, fading)
So beautiful...
You can see it... in their eyes...
No one's in disguise...
Just the lights...
And the night...
...and the snow...
...and it's right...
...so right...

c27b7f1c-7231-479b-928b-ecd9c9d1a9e4.name: dancing alone in the dark
c27b7f1c-7231-479b-928b-ecd9c9d1a9e4.sound: dark pop R&B ballad, 94 BPM, cinematic synth-wave production, deep sub-bass that vibrates the chest, pulsing 808 kick with sidechain compression, shimmering analog synths with heavy chorus, distant reversed vocal echoes (“ghost in the rhythm”), breathy lead vocal with subtle pitch modulation and autotune glide, ambient hotel hallway reverb, neon sign glow texture in high end, vinyl crackle under verses, soft rain outside window samples panned left, whispered ad-libs (“I still feel you…”), no percussion drops, minimal hi-hats with swing groove, lush layered harmonies in chorus, 18kHz air layer like city lights at midnight, moody romantic melancholy, luxury loneliness, mastered for Spotify深夜 playlists, perfect for late-night drives, cinematic atmosphere, emotional restraint, studio-quality vocal processing, inspired by late-night urban isolation, intimate yet vast sound design, slow-burning emotional build, no chorus overload — quiet power, velvet-smooth textures, glowing darkness, noir romance vibe
c27b7f1c-7231-479b-928b-ecd9c9d1a9e4.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Your perfume still lingers on the sheets,
I don’t sleep here — I just breathe it.
The AC hums low, but your shadow’s warm,
I swear I hear you breathing in the storm.
[Pre-Chorus]
You said, “We’ll do this again,”
But love don’t come with a return.
Now the keycard won’t swipe right —
Just echoes in the hallway tonight.
[Chorus]
I’m dancing alone in the dark,
Your voice in the bass, playing my heart.
Neon signs bleed through the glass,
That kiss was a drug I can’t quit.
I know you’re gone…
But I still feel you in every drop —
A ghost in the rhythm,
A memory wrapped in velvet smoke.
[Verse 2]
I found your ring on the bathroom floor,
Still warm like you left it there before.
The pool’s empty, the music’s dead,
But I play our song on repeat instead.
[Bridge]
They turned off the lights.
Turned off the heat.
But the night still calls your name…
And I answer.
[Chorus]
I’m dancing alone in the dark,
Your voice in the bass, playing my heart.
Neon signs bleed through the glass,
That kiss was a drug I can’t quit.
I know you’re gone…
But I still feel you in every drop —
A ghost in the rhythm,
A memory wrapped in velvet smoke.

c90aecdb-b312-41a8-bec5-819ba14dbd28.name: Static Memories

c90aecdb-b312-41a8-bec5-819ba14dbd28.lyrics:

Looking through this old box again
Something caught between the pages

Time keeps taking what's remaining

The corners curl, the colors blur
Everything I knew turns into
Static in my mind, static in my mind

Every memory fades to static
Can't hold on, it's automatic
Running fast but time's erratic

(Fades to static, fades away)

Found a picture from that summer day

Tried to save it on my phone but now

The more I try to get it back

[Pre-chorus]

Everything I loved turns into

[Chorus]
Every memory fades to static
Can't hold on, it's automatic
Running fast but time's erratic
Till everything fades to static

Ah-eh-ih-oh-uh
Ka-ksh-ksh-ka-ksh

Can't hold on, it's automatic
Running fast but time's erratic
Till everything fades to static

01001100 01000101 00100000 01010011 01000001 01000010 01001100 01000101
