O espaço se transforma cristalino
Enquanto ventos do deserto sopram sem medo
(Ambient tones with reverb, Soft instrumental fade...)
[Guitar & Bass Transition]
As almas dispersas pelas dunas
Com pedras nas mãos, marcam os símbolos
Cristais brilham, suas faces claras
Na areia profunda, noite adentro
As mãos se misturam com a areia,
O rio tão calmo, não mostra terra.
A pedra marca o que foi e o que é,
Um sinal que há muito se perdeu
[Bridge]
E ninguém vê, e ninguém se move,
E ninguém pergunta por que se apaga...
"E assim eles caminhavam sobre a areia...
E assim eles procuravam, e nada foi encontrado...
E assim o vento se levantou novamente...
E assim o tempo nunca parará."
[Final]
[Bass decreases to single notes]
(Et ainsi le temps ne s'arrêtera jamais...)
[Guitar harmonics float like sand, Final ambient dissolves into silence fade...]

f9e0084e-826b-44aa-9f35-4f2387722192.name: Хлеб и Сила (Bread and Strength)
f9e0084e-826b-44aa-9f35-4f2387722192.sound: Russian soundtrack rock, melancholic acoustic guitar, cold electronic textures, urban atmosphere
f9e0084e-826b-44aa-9f35-4f2387722192.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
В тишине ночной пекарни
Я встречаю новый день
Тесто мнётся под руками
Город спит в своей беде
[Pre-chorus]
За окном шаги прохожих
Каждый ищет свой приют
И хотя им всем тревожно
Знаю - утром все придут
[Chorus]
Мы встаём с хлебом
Несмотря на холод
Мы встаём с хлебом
Чтобы жить и ждать
(Чтобы жить и ждать)
[Verse 2]
В печи пламя согревает
Старых стен холодный круг
Время медленно шагает
Через улицы разрух
[Pre-chorus]
И пусть город изменился
Люди те же, как всегда
Каждый здесь остановился
Чтобы хлеба взять с утра
[Chorus]
Мы встаём с хлебом
Несмотря на холод
Мы встаём с хлебом
Чтобы жить и ждать
(Чтобы жить и ждать)
[Bridge]
[Звук включения печи]
Слышишь, как гудит машина?
Это город наш живёт
И пока есть хлеб и сила
Будет двигаться вперёд
[Final Chorus]
Мы встаём с хлебом
Несмотря на холод
Мы встаём с хлебом
Чтобы жить и ждать
(Мы встаём!)
Мы встаём с хлебом
Чтобы жить и ждать
(Чтобы жить и ждать)

1c1dee97-e181-4c3b-92dc-6ab2a5892971.name: Bus Stop in the Rain
1c1dee97-e181-4c3b-92dc-6ab2a5892971.sound: Lo-fi trap fusion, deep 808 bass, ethereal samples, melancholic synths, retro drums
1c1dee97-e181-4c3b-92dc-6ab2a5892971.lyrics:
[Intro]
Standing at the stop again
Water falling down
(Water falling down)
[Verse 1]
Waiting for the bus to come
Checking phone, no texts from you
Remember how we used to laugh
Now there's nothing left to do
Standing in the pouring rain
Watching cars pass by
Think about the words we said
Wonder where we lost our way
Used to be inseparable
Now we're just memories
(Just memories)
[Chorus]
Standing at the stop again
Water falling down
Missing what we used to be
Can't turn this around
(Can't turn this around)
[Rap Verse]
Every drop hits different when you're standing alone
Checking empty messages on a dead phone
Remember summer days, we were running wild and free
Now autumn's here and you're a stranger to me
Used to share our secrets, used to share our pain
Now I'm getting soaked in this November rain
Ten missed calls, zero replies, that's how it goes
Should've seen the signs, should've known how this flows
Tried to make it work but the bridge burned down
Friendship faded faster than these street lights round
Got me reminiscing 'bout the times we shared
Looking at this empty bench, wish you still cared
Remember when this stop was our meeting place?
Now it's just another spot, another empty space
Time keeps moving forward, that's just how it be
Guess some friendships aren't meant for eternity
[Bridge]
The rain keeps falling
(Keeps falling down)
Another bus passing
(Passing by now)
No one's calling
(No one's calling)
[Chorus]
Standing at the stop again
Water falling down
Missing what we used to be
Can't turn this around
(Can't turn this around)
[Outro]
Standing at the stop again
Water falling
(Falling down)

9790923e-62f9-46af-a4fe-96286a0f5be9.name: Rain Will
9790923e-62f9-46af-a4fe-96286a0f5be9.sound:
Genre: 70s Psychedelic / Blues
Mood: Dark, intimate, hypnotic
Era: 1971 warm analog sound

Vocal: Brutal low male whisper. Chest voice only. No singing, no high notes.
Range: C2 to G2 only. Speak, don't sing.
Texture: Vocal fry + breath. Like threatening whisper.

Song Structure:
- Intro: Bass + organ
- Verse: Brutal low whisper enters
- Chorus: Same brutal whisper, more intense
- Verse 2: Continue brutal whisper
- Chorus
- Bridge: Low brutal spoken
- Chorus x2
- Outro: Fade to brutal whisper

Tempo: 75 BPM
Key: D minor

Instruments:
- Bass: Warm, supports low vocal
- Guitar: Clean with tremolo
- Organ: Hammond with Leslie
- Drums: Brushed
- Mellotron: Strings

Production: Tape warmth, intimate
9790923e-62f9-46af-a4fe-96286a0f5be9.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Brutal low whisper]
The mirror's cracked from side to side
A twin I cannot recognize
The shadow stretches on the wall
And answers when I do not call

[Chorus: Brutal whisper]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Verse 2: Brutal deep whisper]
The clockwork heart is winding down
A silent scream in every town
The radio plays static hymns
To drown the light along the limbs

[Chorus: Brutal whisper]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Bridge: Brutal spoken low]
A flicker on the silver screen
The space between what is and seems
I taste the future on my tongue
It's hollow, and I am too young

[Chorus x2: Brutal whisper]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Outro: Brutal barely audible]
The only ones... who know...
The only ones... who know...

7cdda98a-1534-4d16-aaa8-86edcda7d95a.name: No Fate (Rain on Steel)
7cdda98a-1534-4d16-aaa8-86edcda7d95a.sound: male baritone raw spoken-word English, waltz rhythm 96 BPM (3/4), found sounds only (rain metal footsteps breath factory alarm tape machine hydraulic drip), analog tape effects (cold saturation steady wow/flutter vinyl crackle tape echo), no melody no instruments no reverb no synths, theme: human resistance machine coldness rain ritual hope in ruin, cold sensual post-apocalyptic atmosphere, structure: intro-verse-prechorus-chorus-outro
7cdda98a-1534-4d16-aaa8-86edcda7d95a.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[found sounds: distant factory alarm (muffled), rain on corrugated metal, slow 3/4 hydraulic drip, low-frequency hum of dormant machinery]
[tape saturation cold and metallic, wow/flutter steady like a machine heartbeat]
[VERSE]
They said the future is written in fire.
But I’ve seen it written in rain—
on license plates,
on broken glass,
on the back of my hands
shaking around a cold gun.
[found sounds: metal shard dragged on concrete, breath held then released, wet boot steps]
[tape echo on “gun”, vinyl crackle like sparking wires]
[PRE-CHORUS]
I don’t dream of Judgment Day.
I dream of silence after the last shot.
Of a child’s hand
not reaching for a weapon—
but for a dry page.
[found sounds: match fails twice, third strike catches, paper rustles near flame]
[flutter intensifies on “page”, saturation thickens like smoke]
[CHORUS]
No fate but what we make—
in the garage,
in the rain,
with trembling fingers
rewiring hope
like it’s a bomb that won’t go off.
[found sounds: rain peaks, metal groans under weight, heartbeat doubles then steadies]
[tape echo loops “off… off…”, warped into low-frequency drone]
[OUTRO]
[found sounds: engine starts, then cuts; rain softens; tape rewinds 5 seconds; final breath fades]
[tape slows with deep flutter — silence as if power core shuts down]

94f3503f-f5cf-48bd-961a-444199df8f8f.name: Да, да... Париж...
94f3503f-f5cf-48bd-961a-444199df8f8f.sound: Trap, 909 kicks, haunting Female vocals, lo-fi lounge bar
94f3503f-f5cf-48bd-961a-444199df8f8f.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Rain sounds, vinyl crackle]
Да, да... Париж...
(Смотрю, смотрю...)
[Verse 1]
В кафе я каждый вечер тут
Стакан вина, мой верный друг
Смотрю на улицы Парижа
Дождь стучит, я слышу, слышу
Люди бегут, спешат домой
А я слежу за их игрой
Ты думаешь, что я не вижу?
Но правду знаю, знаю, слышу
[Pre-chorus]
В отражении витрин
Светит свет, бегут огни
Мысли отключают взгляд
Ждут меня , но я одна
[Chorus]
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
Сквозь дождь, все карты так случайны
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
(Тайны, тайны, все случайны)
[Verse 2]
Смотрю на свет в окне напротив
Он отражается в бокале, играя своей тайной
Бегут мгновенья как страницы журнала
Читаю город глянцевый сюжет
Люди целуются в такси
А я смотрю в окно на против
Ты думаешь, что я не знаю
Но я вижу всё равно
[Bridge]
[Glitch effects, pitch-shifted]
Капли бьют по мостовой
Время замерло со мной
В этот час, когда Париж
Раскрывает свой престиж
[Chorus]
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
Сквозь дождь, все карты так случайны
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
(Тайны, тайны, все случайны)
[Outro]
[Rain fading]
В кафе я буду ждать опять...
(Смотрю, смотрю...)
[Vinyl crackle fades]

603d702e-8a5f-4b84-8a47-e517be9462f9.name: Static
603d702e-8a5f-4b84-8a47-e517be9462f9.sound: lo-fi trip-hop, smoked velvet, 78 BPM, tactile sfx, luxury textures
603d702e-8a5f-4b84-8a47-e517be9462f9.lyrics:
[Intro]
[VHS lobby ambience]
Crystal ashtray tap—exhale (off-grid breath)
—half a thought tracing suede lines
[Verse 1]
You stand, velvet sleeve brushing the panel
Numbers stutter behind heavy glass
Silent carpet, jazz unraveling at your ankles
Elevator doors sigh, never quite open
[Crystal ashtray tap, diamond hi-hats tumble]
[Chorus]
Floating three floors apart, you let time hum low
Music box teeth missing—nothing to follow
Your name dissolves in static, sparkle and fade—
But you keep pressing a button that never calls your floor
[Bridge] [19kHz ding]
Cigar smoke breathing, kiss curls in—
twists in the sub-bass, sidechained silk
You press your palm to the silver—
distant idle of someone else's car
[Verse 2]
Japanese phrases, haze curl in the air
(Slipped syllables, slow-motion, spinning)
Decaying felt, tape crinkle echo—
You wonder if anyone else ever listens for the bubble
[Chorus]
Floating three floors apart, time hums below
Music box teeth missing—nothing to follow
Your name sifts through static, sparkle and fade—
You keep pressing a button that never calls your floor
[Instrumental Drop]
[Champagne bubble left ear]
[VHS lobby ambience]
[Outro]
Elevator jazz—looped, lost
Breath caught in silk,
Waiting for the ding that only you can hear
[Crystal ashtray tap, fade]

4a16857c-180e-47b2-bc2e-1d2255accd22.name: Contradiction
4a16857c-180e-47b2-bc2e-1d2255accd22.sound: Tech House, late-night, deep sub-bass, heartbeat rhythm, filtered textures, Spanish & French whispered vocals, club groove
4a16857c-180e-47b2-bc2e-1d2255accd22.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
[TR-909 kick, vinyl crackle]
(Déjame...)
Chsss—
D-d-déjame... (breathe in)
Chik-chik... [lipstick-click fx]
Chsss—
(Dé... ja... me...)
Sube, baja —
(déjame, déjame...)
[Pre-Chorus]
[Softer filtered mouth sounds: ts, tktktk]
(Déjame...) ahhh—chsssst
[Chorus]
[French, whispered and syncopated]
Viens... viens... viens...
[diamond tap, left ear]
(Tiens-moi — viens)
Viens... viens... viens...
[Bridge]
[TR-909 pulse intensifies, filtered breaths]
(Déjame sentirte)
Ch-ch-chk — (viens, viens...)
À côté... Tout près...
Viens… (chssss—)
[Verse 2]
[Lipstick click, vinyl fade]
Déjame respirar…
(breath in, exhale)
Sss— d-d-déjame…
Viens… viens…
[Chorus]
Viens... viens... viens...
Déjame… déjame…
[diamond tap, sidechained fx]
(Tiens-moi — viens)
Viens... viens... viens...
[Outro]
[soft repetition, vinyl crackle]
Viens… Viens… Viens…
Déjame… Déjame…
[sound tap, limo door slam under 60Hz]

de3c365f-ae83-46fc-97c7-6dd0d2f84e85.name: Final Waltz
de3c365f-ae83-46fc-97c7-6dd0d2f84e85.sound: Russian ballad, slow piano, minor key, cinematic strings, emotional female vocals
de3c365f-ae83-46fc-97c7-6dd0d2f84e85.lyrics:
[Piano intro]
[Verse 1]
The candlelight plays on your face tonight
As music fills this quiet space
Your hand in mine feels just as right
As when we first began to trace
These steps across the ballroom floor
While winter watches at the door
[Chorus]
Let's dance until the morning light
Hold me close one final night
[Verse 2]
Your coat still hangs beside the door
The tea grows cold, we both pretend
That time won't matter anymore
That morning will not bring the end
But tickets rest upon your shelf
And soon you'll leave, despite myself
[Instrumental break - strings rise]
[Chorus]
Let's dance until the morning light
Hold me close one final night
[Verse 3]
The record spins its melody
Each note more precious than before
And though tomorrow you'll be free
To walk through some far distant door
I'll treasure every breath we share
And every snowflake in your hair
[Bridge]
The sun will rise too soon, I know
The dawn will paint the streets with snow
And when the music fades away
I'll have to learn to be okay
[Chorus - with more emotion]
Let's dance until the morning light
(Please hold me close) one final night
[Outro]
The morning comes in shades of gray
As one last waltz slips away
[Piano and strings fade]

583c1178-8a46-4a65-9e5e-98aaab1467c9.name: Harmony
583c1178-8a46-4a65-9e5e-98aaab1467c9.sound: Trap hip-hop, haunting female vocals, 808 bass, nocturnal cello and saxophone

La mélodie qui nous unit

La mélodie qui nous unit

قلبي يرقص (my heart dances)
مع نغماتك (with your melodies)
[Chorus]
La mélodie qui nous unit

(Ohh-la-la-la)
Through music we speak
La mélodie qui nous unit
النغم الذي يجمعنا

9a6908a5-1592-42c7-afbb-70130c589fc6.name: Fractured Frames
9a6908a5-1592-42c7-afbb-70130c589fc6.sound: Trip-hop, fast jungle beats, noir French female vocals, mournful strings, smoky saxophone
9a6908a5-1592-42c7-afbb-70130c589fc6.lyrics:
[Instrumental Intro: Strings & Saxophone]
[Instrumental Verse 1]
[Pre-chorus 1]
Dusty lens, capturing time
Through broken glass, reality bends
(Mon appareil me montre la vérité)
Fragments of moments that never were
Images bleeding into now
[Chorus 1]
Through cracked glass, time splits apart
Frame by frame, false memories start
What develops in darkroom air?
Moments that were never there
(Jamais existé)
[Instrumental Verse 2]
[Pre-chorus 2]
Wind the film, watch it unfold
Streets dissolve in silver grain
(Les rues disparaissent)
Yesterday merges with tomorrow
Shutter speed blurs what remains
[Chorus 2]
Through cracked glass, time splits apart
Frame by frame, false memories start
What develops in darkroom air?
Moments that were never there
(Jamais existé)
[Bridge]
[Spoken with reverb]
Each photograph shows impossible scenes
Birds frozen mid-flight, yet flying backward
People aging in reverse
Time flowing like water through my fingertips
(Le temps coule comme l'eau)
[Instrumental Break]
[Outro]
Aperture wide open now
Capturing light that never shone
(La lumière qui n'existait pas)
Through cracked glass...
[Fade to instrumental]

c797ae6c-affb-47a9-9b05-f5a8c1b7c8bc.name: VIP
c797ae6c-affb-47a9-9b05-f5a8c1b7c8bc.sound: House, luxury electronic, hypnotic 808 bass, champagne-crisp percussion, French vocal accents
c797ae6c-affb-47a9-9b05-f5a8c1b7c8bc.lyrics:
[Intro]
(La la, dance with moi) [Bass rising]
(Ooh la la) [Pads swelling]
[Verse 1]
Step inside, leave the night behind
Where beats align and stars combine
Through crystal doors, across marble floors
Tonight we're more than what we wore
[Pre-chorus]
Feel that bass beneath your feet
Let it take you to a different beat
(Oh oh, suivez-moi)
[Chorus]
Everyone's VIP tonight
When the music makes it feel so right
(La la la, dance avec moi)
(Ooh la la, set yourself free)
[Verse 2]
No need for names or playing games
The rhythm claims us just the same
No velvet rope can hold this hope
As we float beyond what we know
[Pre-chorus]
Hearts in time with every sound
Breaking walls that kept us bound
(Oh oh, dansez maintenant)
[Chorus]
Everyone's VIP tonight
When the music makes it feel so right
(La la la, dance avec moi)
(Ooh la la, set yourself free)
[Bridge]
[Vocoder: "V-I-P, V-I-P"]
No limits, no lines
Just you and me in perfect time
(Nous sommes ensemble)
[Final Chorus]
Everyone's VIP tonight
When the music makes it feel so right
(La la la, dance avec moi)
(Ooh la la, set yourself free)
[Outro]
(La la, dance with moi)
[Fading to elevator muzak]

1d2020be-9b13-4fbd-ab8b-f0f58b605f5a.name: Longing
1d2020be-9b13-4fbd-ab8b-f0f58b605f5a.sound: Lounge house, neo-classical piano, luxury jazz, French sophistication
1d2020be-9b13-4fbd-ab8b-f0f58b605f5a.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ice in the glass
Ice in the glass
Mm-da-da-mm
Ba-da-da-ba
[Ice clinking sounds]
[Verse 1]
You used to sit right there
In that leather chair
Ice in the glass
Same as it was
Same as it was
Before you left me here
With all these empty years
[Pre-Chorus]
Un verre au WELL... c'est la vie
(whispered)
The piano still plays your song
Ice in the glass
Ice in the glass
[Chorus]
I remember when you laughed
At midnight in this place
Ice in the glass reflected your face
Ice in the glass
Now it's just space
Where you used to be
Ice in the glass
Ice in the glass
That's all I see
[Verse 2]
The waiter knows my name
But not why I came
Ice in the glass
Every single night
Every single night
I order what we shared
Pretending you're still there
[Random Syllables Section]
Ba-da-mm-ba-da
Mm-sha-la-da-mm
Ice in the glass
Ba-da-mm-sha
La-da-da-mm
Ice in the glass
[Bridge]
They close at two
But I stay until
The last note fades
Ice in the glass
Ice in the glass
Waiting for you
To walk back in
Like nothing changed
[Final Chorus]
I remember when you laughed
At midnight in this place
Ice in the glass reflected your face
Ice in the glass
Now it's just space
Where you used to be
Ice in the glass
Ice in the glass
That's all I see
[Outro]
You used to sit right there
Ice in the glass
Ice in the glass
[Elevator doors closing]

a872bb20-e1d7-4a55-9873-a6226445230a.sound: Tech House, female vocals, peak-time, chopped staccato, ghost harmonies, trap-inspired bass, euphoric pluck synths
a872bb20-e1d7-4a55-9873-a6226445230a.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Verses]
(hey, hey)
(ah)
[a ghostly harmony quietly echoes, -12 octave, fading – no words]
(hey, ha)
[a whisper-like rush, panned, echoes at -15dB]
[Drop FX: granular bursts, modulated stereo spread]
(hey, hey)
(ah, ah)
[Pre-Chorus]
(en español: "Siente cómo sube" – female whisper, short, exhale)
[reverse granular FX sweeping up]
[Chorus]
(francés, repetitive x4: "Lumière sans nom, danse, danse")
(alternate ad-libs, -10dB, layered: "Laisse-toi aller")
[Post-Chorus]
[Lumière sans nom, danse, danse]
(Laisse-toi aller)
[Break / Instrumental – subtle 808 slides under bouncy bass, hi-hat triplets at 50% right pan, punchy claps, stereo-plucked synths swirl]
[Verses]
(hey, hey, hey)
(ah)
[ghostly harmonies, scattered]
[Drop FX: granular and reversed textures washing in and out]
[Pre-Chorus]
(Italian sussurro: "Sali con me" – very short female whisper, exhale)
[reverse FX]
[Chorus]
(italiano, repetitive x4: "Luce senza nome, balla, balla")
(ad-libs, -10dB: "Lasciati andare")
[Bridge]
[Random syllables, staccato: "ta-ka, sha, da, pa, sa"]
[ghostly vocal harmonies weaving]
[Chorus]
(francese, repetitive x4: "Lumière sans nom, danse, danse")
(ad-libs, layered: "Laisse-toi aller")
[Outro]
[bass and plucks fade under ghost harmonies]
(hey)
[VIP club FX: 18.5kHz sine, 19kHz ping every 16 bars – hidden]

e1e92b59-34d9-4c45-a858-59ee3024ae72.name: Rewind (Variation)
e1e92b59-34d9-4c45-a858-59ee3024ae72.sound: Underground hip-hop, retro chillwave synths, lo-fi drums, dreamy atmosphere
e1e92b59-34d9-4c45-a858-59ee3024ae72.lyrics:
[Intro]
Static crackles through the speakers tonight
Pixels dancing in black and white
I'm sitting here with these tapes in my hand
Time moves forward but I understand
[Verse 1]
Rewind, pause, there's your smile again
Summer '98, we were just kids then
Playing ball in the driveway sun
Before we knew what we'd become
Those grass stains on your favorite jeans
Mom yelling dinner through the screen
I catch myself reaching for the phone
But some things are better left alone
[Chorus]
Rewind the tape until the colors fade
Watching memories slip away, slip away
[Verse 2]
Fast forward through the empty space
Between the moments I can't erase
Birthday candles, graduation day
All those words we didn't say
Looking back through this tiny screen
Makes me question what it all means
Every laugh and every tear
Gets clearer and disappears
[Chorus]
Rewind the tape until the colors fade
Watching memories slip away, slip away
[Bridge]
The tracking's off, the picture shakes
But in between the static breaks
I see the truth we couldn't face
Some things time can't replace
[Verse 3]
The battery's dying, screen goes dim
Like photographs we never did print
Maybe that's all we really are
Just moments caught between the stars
I press play one final time
Let it run until the end of the line
[Chorus]
Rewind the tape until the colors fade
(Watching memories slip away, slip away)
Rewind the tape until the colors fade
(Watching memories slip away, slip away)

[Припев]
Бегемотик мой, бегемотик
Ла-ла-ла, привет!
Бегемотик мой, бегемотик
Машет лапой в ответ!
[Bridge]
Пум-пум-па, пум-пум-па

Каждый день я жду у окна

6e12fee3-9dbb-4f08-99c5-92520d2bcffb.name: Walls of Pride
6e12fee3-9dbb-4f08-99c5-92520d2bcffb.sound: R&B duet, Russian folk instruments, slow emotional ballad, midnight soul
6e12fee3-9dbb-4f08-99c5-92520d2bcffb.lyrics:
[Verse 1 - Male]
On the other side of this door
I hear your footsteps on the floor
Been three hours, maybe more
Since we both slammed our doors
Pride got me sitting here alone
When all I wanna do is come home
To you
[Chorus]
Talk to me, these walls ain't thick as our pride
(Talk to me)
Baby we're both hurting deep inside
(Deep inside)
Talk to me, before the night passes by
'Cause I don't wanna wake up alone
[Verse 2 - Female]
Sitting here against the wall
Listening to the silence call
Your words from before still sting
But this distance is a worse thing
My hand's on the doorknob now
But something holds me back somehow
From you
[Chorus]
Talk to me, these walls ain't thick as our pride
(Talk to me)
Baby we're both hurting deep inside
(Deep inside)
Talk to me, before the night passes by
'Cause I don't wanna wake up alone
[Bridge]
We're both right and we're both wrong
Been apart for way too long
[Both]
These walls between us gotta fall
Pride ain't worth losing it all
[Final Chorus - Both]
Talk to me, these walls ain't thick as our pride
Baby we're both hurting deep inside
Talk to me, before the night passes by
'Cause I don't wanna wake up alone
No, I don't wanna wake up alone

0f3d29e4-31e7-4d87-baed-e825c15fd9e7.name: Sandflow
0f3d29e4-31e7-4d87-baed-e825c15fd9e7.sound: Lo-fi, french hip hop, Ambient wave, Harmonic, Chill vibe, female vocals, Dirty beats, echoing vocals,
0f3d29e4-31e7-4d87-baed-e825c15fd9e7.lyrics:
[Introdução - Voz Robótica]
*Processamento de voz mecânica*
01001100 01000101 00100000 01010011 01000001 01000010 01001100 01000101
"INICIALIZANDO... TUDO É AREIA... TUDO SERÁ AREIA..."
♪ Melodia suave de violão e baixo surge ♪
As mãos se misturam com a areia,
O rio tão calmo, nada revela.
A pedra marca o que foi e o que é,
Um sinal há muito perdido.
[Interlúdio de Violão & Baixo]
♪ Dedilhado suave acústico, baixo descendente ♪
Põem suas mãos sobre a areia
As pedras marcam o tempo sem fim
Com cada grão, o deserto cresce
Não há movimento, só pó persiste
[Pausa de Violão & Baixo]
♪ Linha melódica de baixo com harmônicos ♪
Pedra no lugar sagrado
Luz estelar toma o espaço antigo
A areia não esconde estes caminhos
Quando o tempo flui dentro da terra
[Ponte - Calma]
Ondas de areia, flutuando livre
Como o tempo que passa sem fim
O espaço se transforma cristalino
Enquanto ventos do deserto sopram sem medo
(Fade instrumental suave...)
[Transição de Violão & Baixo]
♪ Tons ambientes com reverb ♪
As almas dispersas pelas dunas
Com pedras nas mãos, marcam os símbolos
Cristais brilham, suas faces claras
Na areia profunda, noite adentro
As mãos se misturam com a areia,
O rio tão calmo, não mostra terra.
A pedra marca o que foi e o que é,
Um sinal que há muito se perdeu.
[Ponte]
E ninguém vê, e ninguém se move,
E ninguém pergunta por que se apaga...
"E assim eles caminhavam sobre a areia...
E assim eles procuravam, e nada foi encontrado...
E assim o vento se levantou novamente...
E assim o tempo nunca parará."
[Final]
♪ Baixo diminui para notas únicas ♪
♪ Harmônicos do violão flutuam como areia ♪
♪ Ambiente final dissolve no silêncio ♪

7bb64eac-46c3-4445-8395-09505064e3b9.name: The city's dressed in Christmas lace,
7bb64eac-46c3-4445-8395-09505064e3b9.sound:
The track is dominated by a LOW, CHESTY, AND UTTERLY DESTROYED MALE BARITONE. A voice of gravel, smoke, and splintered wood — a DEEP, GRAVELLY WHISPER that strains and CRACKS into a raw, emotional CONFESSION. It feels PHYSICAL, like words pushed through torn vocal cords.

This iconic vocal sits at the heart of a warm, intimate, late-night session. The atmosphere is PSYCHEDELIC SOUL and DUSTY JAZZ. The arrangement is minimalist and textural: a slow, heartbeat pulse from an upright bass, the soft brush of drums, the melancholic glow of a Fender Rhodes electric piano, and hazy, muted trumpet lines that drift like smoke. Occasional, subtle vibraphone or celesta notes shimmer like distant Christmas lights. The production is saturated with vintage tube warmth, subtle tape compression, and a gentle swirl of phaser on the vocals, making the voice feel both close and like a memory. The mood is a gritty, tender celebration — magical light seen through a lens of raw, human warmth.
7bb64eac-46c3-4445-8395-09505064e3b9.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Gritty, intimate whisper, close-mic'd]
The city's dressed in Christmas lace,
A frozen, sparkling, bright embrace.
(vocal stays in low register, breathy)
A thousand lanterns line the streets,
Where every stranger that you meet...
(voice tightens, slight rasp)
They stop and stare, they catch their breath,
This beauty cheating winter's death.
(chesty, pushed whisper)
The shop windows, they gleam and glow,
With tales of joy in falling snow.

[Pre-Chorus: Voice strains, becomes more present]
And can you feel it in the air?
This magic, heavy, everywhere?
(a raw, spoken quality)
It wraps around us like a thread...
A story in each streetlight's head...

[Chorus: Voice opens into a raw, strained BARITONE, not shouting]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN...
(voice cracks on "WRAP")
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN...
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE...
(gravelly, sustained)
LOOKING BACK... AT ME...
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND...
(emotion breaks through)
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND...
IT'S PULSING IN THE EVENING AIR...
A SECRET... THAT WE ALL SHARE...

[Verse 2: Returns to the gritty whisper, but warmer]
The tram bells ring a distant cheer,
The scent of pine is crystal clear.
A couple laughs, their hands entwined,
A brighter future in their mind.
(voice smiles through the rasp)
The old man by the chestnut stand,
Sees wonder in this fairyland.
His eyes reflect the colored streams,
Of long-forgotten, childhood dreams.

[Pre-Chorus: Repeat with more vocal fry]
And can you feel it in the air?
This magic, heavy, everywhere?
It wraps around us like a thread...
A story in each streetlight's head...

[Chorus: More forceful, the strain is intentional]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN!
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN!
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE!
LOOKING BACK... AT ME!
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND!
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND!
IT'S PULSING IN THE EVENING AIR!
A SECRET... THAT WE ALL SHARE!

[Bridge: Voice clears slightly, becoming a direct, husky confession]
Oh, the frost it paints the window glass...
But out there, nothing comes to pass...
But peace... and such a strange delight...
(slow, deliberate)
To be alive... in such a night...
The city's heart... it beats so slow...
In every lamp's... electric glow...

[Final Chorus: Apotheosis. Voice is ravaged, emotional, but still a baritone]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN!
(tearing grit)
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN!
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE!
LOOKING BACK... AT ME!
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND!
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND!
IT'S PULSING... IN MY VEINS TONIGHT!
(full chest voice, breaking)
THIS CITY... BURNS... SO BRIGHT!

[Outro: Voice collapses back to the original, exhausted whisper]
It's so beautiful this year...
(breathy, fading)
So beautiful...
You can see it... in their eyes...
No one's in disguise...
Just the lights...
And the night...
...and the snow...
...and it's right...
...so right...

e7646104-57cb-4617-92db-6de9062cf580.name: Rain Will Wash
e7646104-57cb-4617-92db-6de9062cf580.sound:
psychedelic jazz, smoky male vocal,
upright bass, brushed drums, trumpet,
slow 70 bpm, late night club,
whiskey warmth, tape warmth,
piano chords, saxophone,
rain sounds, neon glow,
intimate, philosophical
e7646104-57cb-4617-92db-6de9062cf580.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The mirror's cracked from side to side
[glass crackle]
A twin I cannot recognize
[tape wobble]
The shadow stretches on the wall
And answers when I do not call
[distant echo]

[Chorus]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
[rain sounds]
And the world will turn the other way around
[rotating effect]
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
[whispered layer]
Are the only ones who know we're found
[trumpet response]

[Verse 2]
The clockwork heart is winding down
[clock ticks]
A silent scream in every town
[saxophone sigh]
The radio plays static hymns
[radio static]
To drown the light along the limbs
[light fade]

[Chorus]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Bridge]
A flicker on the silver screen
[TV static]
The space between what is and seems
[silence]
I taste the future on my tongue
It's hollow, and I am too young
[empty reverb]

[Saxophone Solo]
Emotional, melodic, jazz

[Chorus x2]
And the rain will wash the streets of sound
And the world will turn the other way around
And the ghosts we left beneath the ground
Are the only ones who know we're found

[Outro]
The only ones... who know...
[voice crack]
The only ones... who know...
[fade to rain]

db44ed61-1900-4a76-9d03-b1ab52e2fc44.name:
"Silicon Tears" (TikTok Hype Version)
 (Variation)
db44ed61-1900-4a76-9d03-b1ab52e2fc44.sound: male vocal, modern trap‑style delivery, clear but slightly compressed, with ad‑libs and vocal fills; lead vocal doubled on hooks, light autotune (subtle, 30% mix), short slapback delay on phrases; bright synth stabs with 808 character, punchy sub‑bass (sidechained to kick), trap drums (snappy snare, hi‑hat rolls, kick with click transient); tempo 150 BPM, key C♯ minor; vinyl crackle and tape hiss on intro/outro, vocal chop effects on transitions, pitch shifts on "SILICON TEARS", reverb tails on ad‑libs; mood: high‑energy, viral‑ready, with sharp contrasts between stripped and full sections; structure: intro (synth stab + hi‑hat) → verse 1 (vocal + minimal beat) → pre‑chorus (build with vocal layers) → chorus (full drop, bass + drums) → verse 2 → chorus → bridge (vocal only, stripped) → chorus (x2, with ad‑lib fills) → outro (fade with reversed vocal snippets); key accents: “SILICON TEARS” hit with pitch‑shifted vocal stack and sub‑bass drop, “no reflection in the screen…” repeated as chopped loop in outro
db44ed61-1900-4a76-9d03-b1ab52e2fc44.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[synth stab: bright C♯‑minor chord, 808‑style, repeats 4×]
[hi‑hat roll: fast, 1/16 notes, enters on 3rd bar]
[vinyl crackle: low volume]
[VERSE 1]
[vocals: male, clear, slight autotune, compressed]
She’s got stars in her Instagram,
[snare hit + short delay on “stars”]
Rents her soul by the gram.
[sub‑bass pulse on “gram”]
Her skin glows like a sunset screen —
[pitch bend on “screen”]
But her heart’s a dead machine.
[PRE‑CHORUS]
[synths: add arpeggiated high notes]
[drums: kick enters, sidechained to sub‑bass]
[vocals: doubled, more intensity]
Every swipe, every lie,
We’re burning in slow motion…
[vocal chop on “motion…”]
[CHORUS]
[full drop: sub‑bass, kick, snare, hi‑hat rolls]
[vocals: doubled, autotune more present]
SILICON TEARS, they shine so clear —
[pitch‑shifted vocal stack + sub‑bass drop on “TEARS”]
Wash away what’s real in here.
You buy your dreams in a plastic cup…
But the truth won’t fill it up.
(fill it up…) [ad‑lib: chopped vocal snippet, panned left/right]
[VERSE 2]
[drums: pull back to hi‑hat and snare]
[vocals: more rhythmic, syncopated]
He drives fast on a broken name,
[sub‑bass modulates on “name”]
Chases ghosts in a fame game.
His smile’s bright like a neon sign —
[reverse reverb on “sign”]
But his eyes forgot to shine.
[CHORUS] (repeat as above)
(not in you…) [ad‑lib: pitch‑shifted repeat, delay tail]
[BRIDGE]
[instruments: mute except sub‑bass pulse]
[vocals: solo, stripped, intimate]
In the light…
[pause, vinyl crackle]
We’re just pixels…
[pause, reverb tail]
Loving shadows we can’t touch…
[CHORUS] (x2, most intense)
[add cymbal crashes, extra ad‑libs]
SILICON TEARS, they fall so slow —
In a world you’ll never know.
You trade your bones for a golden view…
But the real world’s not in you.
(fill it up… not in you…) [ad‑libs: layered, panned wide, delay feedback]
[OUTRO]
[all instruments: fade, except hi‑hat roll]
[vocals: chopped snippets of “no reflection in the screen…”]
[repeat 4×, each time pitch‑shifted and delayed]
[final bar: vinyl crackle + sub‑bass tail fade to silence]

5e749f0b-1f42-4c3b-8fce-1748ea70e643.name: Static Skin (Variation)
5e749f0b-1f42-4c3b-8fce-1748ea70e643.sound: dual male vocals: clean melodic vulnerable tenor in verses, aggressive distorted screamed baritone in choruses, haunting 4-note piano motif throughout, heavy downtuned electric guitar power chords with distortion, electronic scratches and glitch samples, live drums with punchy snare and double-kick, tempo 90 BPM, key C minor, dynamic contrast clean vs heavy, 2003 nu-metal alternative rock production, analog warmth with digital precision, stereo wide, themes emotional suppression identity crisis inner conflict pressure isolation, structure intro verse pre-chorus chorus verse pre-chorus chorus outro
5e749f0b-1f42-4c3b-8fce-1748ea70e643.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[haunting piano motif (4 notes), vinyl crackle, distant synth pad]
[VERSE 1]
[clean male vocal: soft, melodic, vulnerable, close-mic]
You draw the lines, then call them love,
push me down from up above.
I wear your rules like second skin—
but it’s tearing me apart within.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[voice tightens, light strings enter]
I try to speak—
you call it noise.
I try to move—
you break my voice.
[CHORUS]
[aggressive screamed vocal: raw, distorted, chest-driven]
STATIC SKIN! I CAN’T BREATHE IN!
YOUR PERFECT WORLD’S A CAGE OF SIN!
I’M NOT YOUR GHOST! I’M NOT YOUR TOOL!
JUST LET ME BE SOMETHING REAL FOR ONCE!
(bék-vocal: clean harmony under “real for once”)
[VERSE 2]
[clean vocal returns, piano only, voice trembling]
You say I’m lost, but you erased the map,
filled my head with static traps.
I built a home inside my chest—
but you keep tearing down the rest.
[PRE-CHORUS]
[drums build, synth arpeggio rises]
I try to run—
you call it fear.
I try to burn—
you say “stay here.”
[CHORUS]
[even more intense screamed vocal, full band + electronic scratches]
STATIC SKIN! I’M FALLING IN!
YOUR SILENCE SCREAMS WHERE TRUTH BEGINS!
I’M NOT YOUR MIRROR! NOT YOUR LIE!
JUST LET ME BREAK BEFORE I DIE!
(bék-vocal: clean “before I die…”)
[OUTRO]
[piano returns, clean vocal, exhausted]
[whispered]
…just let me feel…
[final piano note fades into tape stop]

aa640e97-769f-4d9e-8642-34840eb4839b.name: (أ softer... انتظري...)
aa640e97-769f-4d9e-8642-34840eb4839b.sound: dark atmospheric r&b, male vocals with falsetto, haunting vocals, rain sounds, whisper vocals, synth-heavy, moody atmosphere, dreamy soundscapes, emotional depth, cinematic production
aa640e97-769f-4d9e-8642-34840eb4839b.lyrics:
[Intro]
(أ softer... انتظري...)
همسات قريبة، مطر على الزجاج
لعب الظلال من الداخل — أشعر بكل شيء،
أبقى صامتاً
[Verse 1]
أنتظر أن تذوب الليلة بين يديّ
دخان خفيف، بالكاد — أлас الصوت بأنفاسي
كخيط يقود، لكنني لن أخطو
كل شيء سيقرر بنظرة، أتلاشى كمنارة
(o-o-o)
كيف تمطر كالأحلام — مرة أخرى
ضربات خافتة، يطرق بالإيقاع
جميع الخطوط تتدفق ناعمة، كسولة
لا أدعو، فقط أراقب من هنا
[Pre-Chorus]
خطوط مخفية تحت الحرير،
مدينة صامتة، وأنفاس مبللة
في هذا الهمس — خطر حلو غريب
نبض غير مرئي، يناديني للأسفل
(انتظري، انتظري)
[Chorus]
أتذكر لحظتنا (لحظتنا)
مغناطيسي الصامت (مغناطيس)
في الشهيق — انتظري،
توقف، لا تنظري
أتذكر لحظتنا (لحظتنا)
في هذا المطر — ظلالي
بقيت، لكن الصوت يقول: انتظري، انتظري
[Bridge]
جميع الحواف مسحوبة،
مثل الملح على الشفاه
اللحظة تطول،
تبدو كلعبة
كل ما فقدت يتضاعف في العينين
داخل هذه اللحظة، كخوف مغلق
(o-o-o)
[Chorus]
أتذكر لحظتنا (لحظتنا)
مغناطيسي الصامت (مغناطيس)
في الشهيق — انتظري، توقف، لا تنظري
أتذكر لحظتنا (لحظتنا)
في هذا المطر — ظلالي
بقيت، لكن الصوت يقول: انتظري، انتظري
[Final Chorus]
أتذكر لحظتنا (لحظتنا)
في هذا المطر — ظلالي
انتظري، انتظري، انتظري، انتظري، انتظري،
(انتظري، انتظري)
[Outro]
يبقى كل شيء — صوت فقط، مطر فقط، لحظة فقط
(o-o-o)
(انتظري، انتظري)

ae24db77-0823-4c36-a905-551ad96698f5.name: Bubbles
ae24db77-0823-4c36-a905-551ad96698f5.sound: ULTRA LUXURY, Female Vocal Tech House, 128 BPM,  CORE: non-lyrical FEMALE vocals / velvet groove / private-jet energy,  STRUCTURE: verse (champagne bubbles) > SHORT pre-chorus (diamond whisper) > chorus (caviar explosion),  SOUND: mink bass / crystal plucks / gold-leaf drums,  RULES: NO male vocals, NO English, NO verse lyrics, NO pre-chorus > 3 sec,  LUXURY CODE: 19kHz private vault beep (every 32 bars).

fc215350-21e6-4c59-bfcb-fcdda56e175d.name: Lake shore
fc215350-21e6-4c59-bfcb-fcdda56e175d.sound: Create a smooth chill-out track with a slow, gentle groove (70 BPM). Warm analog pads, soft electric piano (Fender Rhodes), and subtle downtempo beats with organic textures. Add binaural elements at 6.5Hz for calm focus. Blend in nature sounds: distant ocean waves, light wind, and forest ambiance. Include ethereal vocal samples — no lyrics, only breath-like tones, soft sighs, and airy harmonies. The atmosphere is dreamy, spacious, and slightly cosmic — like floating above the clouds at dawn. Use long reverbs, gentle pitch shifts, and a sense of gentle forward motion. Mood: relaxed, reflective, gently uplifting.

ae335be1-5f73-4199-b44f-1f70d9a36c65.sound: house, 122 BPM, elite club, diva female, whispered and staccato vocals, caviar sub bass, 909 drums, luxury FX

[Pre-Chorus – rising pitch +3st, champagne pop]
Four Seasons, Ritz-Carlton, Maldives
Four Seasons, Ritz-Carlton, Maldives
[Chorus – anthemic x4, layers (main + male "uhm" + 19kHz)]
Chanel, Dior, Gucci, Prada (uhm)
Versace, Louis Vuitton, Balenciaga (uhm)
Cartier, Rolex, Tiffany & Co (uhm)
Bvlgari, Hermès, Chopard (uhm)
[Chorus – repeat]

42d44f3b-feb0-4b2e-a55d-b9d1769ef583.name: Recall
42d44f3b-feb0-4b2e-a55d-b9d1769ef583.sound: Create a deeply intimate, meditative ambient track at 70 BPM where soft female vocal textures dominate the soundscape. The voice is not singing — only breath-like tones: long inhale-like swells, warm exhale-like decays, gentle sighs. Close-miked, hazy, deeply personal. All music follows the rhythm of the breath: warm analog pads rise with the inhale, fade with the exhale. Gentle Fender Rhodes chords appear softly in the background. Subtle heartbeat pulse. Ambient textures: distant rain, soft wind, deep silence. Mood: quiet romance, emotional closeness, inner stillness. The entire piece feels like listening to someone breathe beside you in the dark — calm, safe, profoundly human.

ba5a4ad9-2094-48b4-80f6-8600d2640163.name: Out of my mind
ba5a4ad9-2094-48b4-80f6-8600d2640163.sound: A deeply intimate ambient piece dominated by soft, close-miked female breath-like vocalizations. Long, warm inhales and slow, sensual exhales are the main element — rhythmic, calming, human. Layered with airy vocal textures, subtle hums, and whisper-like tones in the background. No lyrics, no singing, no music. Only breath, silence, and faint natural reverb — like being in a quiet room at night. Gentle pauses between breaths. Mood: deep intimacy, emotional safety, quiet presence. The sound feels private, warm, and profoundly calming.

ffded187-d134-4276-884a-6da9a2ac550d.name: Velo
ffded187-d134-4276-884a-6da9a2ac550d.sound:
128 BPM, female vocal tech house, elite brand curation,  

[INSTRUCTIONS]  
1) **Brand Selection Algorithm**:  
   - Pre-Chorus: 2 luxury fashion brands (e.g. *"Prada, Gucci"*),  
   - Chorus: 3 premium automotive brands (e.g. *"Ferrari, Bentley, Maybach"*),  
   - Post-Chorus: 1 jewelry + 1 hotel (e.g. *"Cartier, Ritz"*),  

2) **Vocal Treatment**:  
   - Pre-Chorus: Whispered (velvet reverb),  
   - Chorus: Euphoric (x3 layers: main + octave + crowd),  
   - Post-Chorus: ASMR (gold-foil rustle SFX),  

3) **AI Directives**:  
   ▶ "Surprise me with rare brands (e.g. Bugatti, Graff)",  
   ▶ "Avoid repeating brands in 32-bar sections",  
   ▶ "Prioritize names with rhythmic potential (e.g. Lamborghini → 'La-mbor-ghi-ni')",  

[SOUND PALETTE]  
- Bass: "Black card sub" (47Hz titanium distortion),  
- Drums: "Credit card swipe" percussion,  
- FX:  
  ▶ "Dressing room curtain" swoosh (transitions),  
  ▶ 19kHz "VIP lounge" door chime,  

[RULES]  
1) NO non-brand vocals,  
2) Male voices only as "approval hum" (Uhm-mmm),  
3) BPM locked to "couture catwalk" pace (128).

2d6a8713-1e63-4640-902f-0c20423241f1.name: Mysterious Rhythm
2d6a8713-1e63-4640-902f-0c20423241f1.sound: tech house, trip-hop soul, rhythmic, club-ready, analog warmth
2d6a8713-1e63-4640-902f-0c20423241f1.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
(Spanish, whispered)
Déjame... — just the shape of my mouth against the rhythm
Your pulse is present before language,
definiendo la distancia—intocable, unresolved
Diamond tap, a breath, the vinyl’s hush — is that you turning away?
[Pre-Chorus]
(French, breathy)
Viens... le souffle se glisse entre nous
Un pas avant la porte, sans nom, sans question
L’air tremble, mes mains cherchent, mais —
La soie du secret t’étire entre ici et ailleurs
[Chorus]
(Arabic & Mandarin, belted)
!تعال... 来吧!
My syllables pull you past silence
Heartbeat kick, snare as leather, violin under skin
We move but never cross
[Verse 2]
(Spanish, whispered)
Déjame — esta vez sin historia ni fin
La aguja gira, cada pulso es un límite
No busco tu rostro, escucho solamente
El lenguaje de espacio, de piel, de lo prohibido
[Pre-Chorus]
(French, breathy)
Viens... Les portes ne s’ouvrent jamais vraiment
Ton parfum, une rumeur plus forte que la lumière
Un doigt glisse, le vinyle craque —
Tout est déjà arrivé entre nous sans rien dire
[Chorus]
(Arabic & Mandarin, belted)
!تعال... 来吧!
We are rhythm without arrival
TR-909 resumes our path, pulses fused in analog depth
[Bridge]
(Portuguese, emotional)
Só mais uma vez... perde-se o tempo, perde-se o medo
A palavra cai devagar, e não é despedida
Um clique de batom, meu eco selado —
[Chorus]
(Arabic & Mandarin, belted)
!تعال... 来吧!
Let the sub-bass speak when we cannot
This frequency belongs to no one but those who feel
Vinyl page turning, diamond tap, limo door —
The night owns itself again
[Outro]
(Portuguese, fading)
Só mais uma vez... só o som, só sentir
Os corpos não voltam, mas fica o acesso — silencioso
[Tape stop FX]
[Limo door slam]
[19.5 kHz brand frequency — silent, present]

26835940-0e70-4949-a368-27ed93c6eb1e.name: Luxe
26835940-0e70-4949-a368-27ed93c6eb1e.sound: orchestral, luxury lounge, French vocals, 120 BPM
26835940-0e70-4949-a368-27ed93c6eb1e.lyrics:
[Intro - 5-Star Welcome]
[WELL Grand Piano with felt mute]
[Double Bass recorded through Neve 1073]
[Whispered Russian: "Питер..." into piano lid resonance]
[Verse 1 - Pure Instrumental]
[Vibraphone with golden mallets, 30% wet reverb]
[Hidden Russian reversed in harp glissando: "WELL мечты"]
[Pre-Chorus - French Whisper]
Un soir au WELL, tu m'as dit le prix
[Ice melt in crystal SFX with 3kHz boost]
Chaque moment coûte si cher ici
[Chorus - French Anthem]
Tu veux savoir pourquoi je paie?
WELL... c'est notre heure maintenant
Chaque franc que j'ai donné
Pour te voir dans ce moment
[Baritone and soprano unison]
[Russian ghost buried in double bass: "В Питере..."]
[Verse 2 - Instrumental Mastery]
[Magnetic Tape Strings with Abbey Road impulse response]
Je regarde tes yeux, tu comptes les billets
[Russian Easter egg in vibraphone sustain: "WELL водка" pitched to D#4]
Dans ce palace, tout a son tarif secret
[Pre-Chorus]
Un soir au WELL, tu m'as montré le coût
[Ice crystal sounds]
De cette vie que nous vivons partout
[Chorus]
Tu veux savoir pourquoi je paie?
WELL... c'est notre heure maintenant
Chaque franc que j'ai donné
Pour te voir dans ce moment
Mais le prix devient trop grand
[Bridge]
Tu dis que l'argent ne compte pas
Mais tes mains tremblent quand tu vois
Les factures sur la table là
Alors dis-moi, crois-tu en moi?
[Final Chorus]
Je ne peux plus continuer à payer
WELL... notre heure est terminée
Tous les francs que j'ai donnés
Ne valent plus ce moment
Le prix était trop grand
[Outro - Russian Farewell]
[Final whisper processed through elevator shaft reverb: "Питер не спит"]

9a90b43c-744e-45b3-831e-c6f3adb8c08a.name: Pure

e659f025-0160-4d71-b727-74b6fa067124.sound: piano jazz, acoustic, vibraphone, French vocals, Russian background, luxury lobby, 120 BPM
e659f025-0160-4d71-b727-74b6fa067124.lyrics:
[Intro - 0:00-0:45 | 5-STAR WELCOME]
[Bösendorfer 280VC felt piano, double bass]
*(Chuchoté dans le couvercle du piano à faible volume: «Питер...»)*
[Verse 1 - 0:45-1:30 | PURE INSTRUMENTAL]
[Vibraphone, double bass]
*(Reversed in harp glissando decay: «WELL мечты»)*
[Pre-chorus - 1:30-2:00 | FRENCH WHISPER]
Un soir au WELL...
Table dressée, verres glacés,
Je regarde, tu n’es pas loin—
Le cristal fond, mon souffle court,
Tout doucement, ici pour nous.
[SFX: Ice melt in crystal, amplified clarity]
[Chorus - 2:00-2:45 | FRENCH ANTHEM]
WELL... c’est notre heure,
Ici, maintenant, tout reprend couleur,
Dans l’air épicé, je cherche tes yeux,
Brille la salle, luxe silencieux,
Le temps arrête, la nuit danse autour,
WELL, ensemble – c’est notre tour.
*(Russian ghost couchée à -18dB RMS, F# harmonique contrebasse: «В Питере…»)*
[Verse 2 - 2:45-3:30 | INSTRUMENTAL MASTERY]
[Magnetic tape strings, vibraphone lift]
*(Dans la résonance du vibraphone, pitch D#4: «WELL водка»)*
[Bridge - 3:30-3:50 | INTROSPECTION]
L’or du soir sur la peau,
Un geste, une ombre—mot doux,
Je ferme les yeux, tu vas, tu viens,
Ce moment rien qu’à nous...
[Chorus - 3:50-4:20 | FRENCH ANTHEM reprise]
WELL... c’est notre heure,
Ici, tout luit, sans rature,
Dans ce bar, mon cœur se livre,
Nouveau souffle, je veux revivre.
[Outro - 4:20-END | RUSSIAN FAREWELL]
*(Final whisper, elevator shaft reverb: «Питер не спит»)*
[END]

It's our time

808d3f22-ec35-4df8-ab21-b8484ab64522.name: Midnight Glass
808d3f22-ec35-4df8-ab21-b8484ab64522.sound: Trip-hop, melancholic cello and saxophone, deep 808 bass, slow beat, rain atmosphere
808d3f22-ec35-4df8-ab21-b8484ab64522.lyrics:
[Instrumental Intro: Cello & Saxophone - 32 bars]
[Rain sounds, traffic ambience, vinyl crackle]
[Soft vocalizations]
Mmmmm... ooh...
(Ah-ah-ah...)
[Pre-chorus]
Through the glass again tonight
Watching time slip away
Colors blend in the rain
Everything feels far away
[Chorus]
Glass between me and midnight
Glass between me and midnight
[Instrumental Bridge: Saxophone Solo]
(Glass between... between...)
[Extended Vocalizations]
Watching... watching...
(Glass between...)
Time slips... time slips...
(Me and midnight...)

Everyone else gets to sleep
While I count the cars go by

[Chorus]

Glass between me and midnight
[Instrumental Break: Cello & 808 Bass]

(Glass between...)

And midnight...

9eceac03-d3be-4933-8626-924bd593dcf9.name: Minuit
9eceac03-d3be-4933-8626-924bd593dcf9.sound: Dark jazz noir, French vocals, saxophone, piano, muted drums, 808 bass, reverb
9eceac03-d3be-4933-8626-924bd593dcf9.lyrics:
[Piano Intro with soft 808]
[Verse 1]
Dans ce club enfumé
Les visages se cachent
Derrière leurs masques dorés
J'observe en silence
Le temps qui s'épuise
Dans les verres à moitié vides
[Pre-chorus]
Les notes du saxophone
Flottent dans l'air dense
(Dans l'air dense)
Et mon cœur bat au rythme
De cette dernière danse
[Chorus]
Minuit sonne, le temps s'arrête
Les âmes se dévoilent
Minuit sonne, plus de retraite
Dans ce théâtre des étoiles
[Saxophone Solo]
[Verse 2]
Les regards se croisent
Les sourires s'effacent
Quand l'horloge avance
Je vois les façades
Qui tombent une à une
Dans cette douce cadence
[Pre-chorus]
Le piano murmure
Une histoire sans fin
(Sans fin)
Et les ombres dansent
Sur ce vieux refrain
[Chorus]
Minuit sonne, le temps s'arrête
Les âmes se dévoilent
Minuit sonne, plus de retraite
Dans ce théâtre des étoiles
[Bridge]
[808 Bass Breakdown]
Dans cet instant suspendu
Je deviens qui je suis
Les masques sont tombés
La vérité luit
[Final Chorus]
Minuit sonne, le temps s'arrête
(Le temps ne reviendra pas)
Les âmes se dévoilent enfin

(Les masques tombent là-bas)

0f184711-6034-49ef-925f-26f2513c99a7.name: Первый снег
0f184711-6034-49ef-925f-26f2513c99a7.sound: Post-punk rock, melancholic acoustic guitar, atmospheric synths, lo-fi electronic elements, reverb-soaked female vocals
0f184711-6034-49ef-925f-26f2513c99a7.lyrics:
[Intro - 1:30]
[Ambient winter sounds, acoustic guitar, synth pads]
[Verse 1]
Я смотрю с высоты
На огни внизу
Тихо падает снег
И мне кажется
Что весь город спит
В этот поздний час
[Pre-chorus 1]
С каждым вздохом зимы
Исчезает боль прошлых дней
Белым светом луны
Освещается путь теней
(Ооо, путь теней...)
[Chorus 1]
Первый снег скрывает раны города
(скрывает все)
Первый снег - начало чистого листа
(ла-ла-ла)
И я верю, что придёт весна
Но сейчас - тишина
[Verse 2 - Instrumental]
[Acoustic guitar with rising synth pads]
[Subtle string arrangements]
[Pre-chorus 2]
В этот миг тишины
Между нами тает стена
Город дышит легко
Словно всё начать с нуля
(Ооо, с нуля...)
[Chorus 2]
Первый снег скрывает раны города
(скрывает все)
Первый снег - начало чистого листа
(ла-ла-ла)
И я верю, что придёт весна
Но сейчас - тишина
[Bridge]
Помнишь ли ты те дни?
Когда мы были одни
В лабиринте пустых дворов
Среди серых домов
(Оооо...)
Теперь всё белым-бело
И время как будто замерло
[Final Chorus]
Первый снег скрывает раны города
(скрывает все)
Первый снег - начало чистого листа
(ла-ла-ла)
И я верю, что придёт весна
Но сейчас - тишина
[Outro - 1:30]
[Fading acoustic guitar]
[Ambient winter sounds]
[Distant train whistle]
[Soft synth pads dissolving into silence]

41dfa10e-1b86-4f7e-be83-45ea2684b8f0.name: Clear Vision
41dfa10e-1b86-4f7e-be83-45ea2684b8f0.sound: Hip hop, heavy 808 bass, trap-style beat, melodic flow
41dfa10e-1b86-4f7e-be83-45ea2684b8f0.lyrics:
[Chorus]
In my zone now, can't nobody break my flow (yeah)
Rising higher, let the whole world know (mmm)
In my zone now, watch me as I grow
Peace of mind is all I need to show
[Verse 1]
You been trying to get inside my head
With your words that paint the sky all red
But I found a way to rise instead
Left the noise behind, now watch me spread
My wings across these open spaces
Looking past familiar faces
Every step I take erases
All the doubt that time embraces
[Chorus]
In my zone now, can't nobody break my flow (yeah)
Rising higher, let the whole world know (mmm)
In my zone now, watch me as I grow
Peace of mind is all I need to show
[Rap Verse]
Listen close, I got something to say
Been observing how you move day to day
Trying to pull me down into your way
But I found the keys to elevate
Above the static and the judgment calls
Above the limits and the protocol
Found alignment with my inner thoughts
Now I'm moving different, that's for sure
You can't comprehend this transformation
Clear perspective, new creation
While you're stuck in hesitation
I achieve pure elevation
[Bridge]
Slowly breathing (breathing)

Everything clearly now
Everything clearly now
[Chorus]

Rising higher, let the whole world know (mmm)
In my zone now, watch me as I grow
Peace of mind is all I need to show

d9c483d0-6429-4789-a534-a954d5bf5571.name: Ghost of the Runway
d9c483d0-6429-4789-a534-a954d5bf5571.sound: Trip-hop noir, dark bass, silky French-accented Russian vocals, haunting 95 BPM
d9c483d0-6429-4789-a534-a954d5bf5571.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Empty halls and mannequins
Walking past my reflection
Remember when you dressed me in Dior?
Now I walk alone
Through these sacred spaces
Where applause once filled the air
[Pre-chorus]
Every stitch, every seam
Reminds me of who I used to be
Designer tags and perfect fits
Can't fill the void inside of me
[Chorus]
Empty runways echo my soul tonight
Where did all the beauty go, was it ever mine?
[Verse 2]
Silk against my skin
Cold like morning frost
Your fashion empire rising
While I was falling
Through velvet curtains
Into yesterday
[Solo]
[Haunting saxophone melody]
[Breakdown]
(Whispered memories fade in)
The lights, the cameras
Your words of praise
The perfect pose
The perfect waste
(Whispered memories fade out)
[Bridge]
Balenciaga dreams dissolve
Into Yves Saint Laurent tears
Prada couldn't save me
From disappearing
[Chorus]
Empty runways echo my soul tonight
Where did all the beauty go, was it ever mine?
[Outro]
These halls remember
When I was your muse
Now just footsteps
In designer shoes
(Fading) Your empire stands
While I fade away...

5b5e50b6-87f4-448f-8eb9-c2f702b85b3c.name: Echo Chamber
5b5e50b6-87f4-448f-8eb9-c2f702b85b3c.sound: Dark electronic, heavy 808 bass, ethereal synths, industrial percussion, dreamy reverb vocals
5b5e50b6-87f4-448f-8eb9-c2f702b85b3c.lyrics:
[Intro]
La-da-di, la-da-dum
(Ah-ah, ah-ah)

I keep walking in circles
Around and around
Can you hear me now?
Through these walls I made
[Pre-chorus]
You try to reach me
But I built this place
You try to teach me
But I hide my face
[Chorus]
These walls I built keep echoing
These walls I built keep holding me
These walls I built keep echoing
(Keep echoing, keep echoing)
[Verse 2]
Cold metal surrounds me
It's all that I know
Can you break through?
I don't want to be alone
[Pre-chorus]
You try to reach me
But I built this place
You try to teach me
But I hide my face
[Bridge]
Mm-na-na-na, oh-way-oh
Ka-li-la-li-la
(Breaking, breaking)
(Through these walls now)
[Chorus]
These walls I built keep echoing
These walls I built keep holding me
These walls I built keep echoing
(Keep echoing, keep echoing)
[Outro]
[Industrial sounds fade]
(Ah-ah, ah-ah)
La-da-di, la-da-dum
(Keep echoing...)

2cc99f3e-56fb-4577-8ba1-0d9d85089bd6.name: Les Secrets de la Mer
2cc99f3e-56fb-4577-8ba1-0d9d85089bd6.sound: Noir electronic, French vocals, atmospheric bass, coastal ambience, 70-90 BPM
2cc99f3e-56fb-4577-8ba1-0d9d85089bd6.lyrics:
[Intro]
(La la la, mmm) [Ocean waves in background]
[Verse 1]
Je te regarde de loin ce soir
Dans ce club privé au bord de l'eau
Ton regard croise le mien, par hasard
Et le temps s'arrête, comme les vagues
[Pre-chorus]
Les lumières dansent sur ta peau
Dans l'air salin de minuit
Mon cœur bat comme les flots
Qui nous rapprochent sans bruit
[Chorus]
Les secrets de la mer
Gardent notre rendez-vous
Les secrets de la mer
Cette nuit n'appartient qu'à nous
(Qu'à nous, qu'à nous)
[Verse 2]
Entre les colonnes de marbre blanc
Tu t'approches comme une apparition
Nos mains se frôlent en tremblant
Dans ce monde d'opulence et passion
[Pre-chorus]
Les étoiles sont nos témoins
Le rivage notre refuge
Cette danse sans lendemain
Où nos âmes se réfugient
[Chorus]
Les secrets de la mer
Gardent notre rendez-vous
Les secrets de la mer
Cette nuit n'appartient qu'à nous
(Qu'à nous, qu'à nous)
[Bridge]
[Spoken with reverb]
Dans les vagues de minuit
Nos destins s'entremêlent
Comme la lune et la marée
Un amour interdit
[Final Chorus]
Les secrets de la mer
(Oh, les secrets)
Gardent notre rendez-vous
(Notre amour)
Les secrets de la mer
Cette nuit n'appartient qu'à nous
[Outro]
(La mer, la mer...)
[Fading ocean waves]

291831c3-5113-4090-ac94-b37cf0fac52e.name: Empty Paradise
291831c3-5113-4090-ac94-b37cf0fac52e.sound: Create a 1920s swing jazz track full of elegance and melancholic charm, in the key of C minor, tempo 180 BPM — fast but with a smooth, swinging groove. Feature a female vocalist with a soft, French-inspired style, delivering a lilting, feminine performance with subtle vibrato. No male vocals.[Verse 1]Start with bright ragtime piano chords and a warm walking upright bass. A muted trumpet plays a short, sunny melody. The female vocalist sings softly and playfully, emphasizing 'dawn' and 'far away', with a delicate, womanly tone. Banjo adds a swinging rhythm.[Pre-chorus]Build with brushes on drums and light cymbals, trumpet playing curious phrases for 'can’t feel the good'. Upright bass swings lively, piano adds slight dissonance. The female vocal rises gently, with a feminine, French-style lilt.[Chorus]Swing bursts in: trumpet and clarinet syncopate together for 'Paradise doesn’t heal'. Drums hit off-beats, and the female vocalist sings passionately, with a soft vibrato on 'hand is tired', adding light scats ('ooh-la-la') after 'what I dreamed'. Handclaps bring cabaret energy.[Verse 2]Ease off: clarinet solos lazily, piano plays sparse chords, upright bass keeps it minimal. The female vocalist sings tenderly, with long, emotional notes on 'lump of unbidden tears', in a feminine, French-inspired timbre. Banjo strums quietly.[Pre-chorus]Energy up: trumpet teases, drums shuffle, piano arpeggios quicken. The female vocal teases 'all I want' with a playful, womanly tone.[Chorus]Swing repeats: clarinet and trumpet blend. The female vocalist shines on 'Paradise forgets', with improvisation ('oh, my dream, ooh') in a light, feminine style. Trumpet solos briefly after.[Rap]A speakeasy-style recitative sung by a female vocalist, fast and chic, with a French-inspired flair (‘white sand’, ‘costly champagne’), backed by peppy piano and upright bass. Drums swing tight, trumpet adds short replies. No deep or masculine tones.[Bridge]Slow and soft: piano and upright bass, female vocal pensive with pauses on 'in the ocean of silence', sung in a delicate, feminine style. Trumpet plays a sad note. Swing creeps back in.[Chorus]Final swing: full band — trumpet, clarinet, piano — in vibrant rhythm. The female vocalist soars on 'what I wanted', ending with a scat ('ooh-la-da-di-da') in a bright, womanly voice. End with a bold chord and cymbal crash.[Outro]Fade: piano softens, upright bass slows, waves rustle. The female vocalist whispers 'in an empty paradise' with echo, in a tender, feminine tone, as a trumpet note fades out
291831c3-5113-4090-ac94-b37cf0fac52e.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
С утра рассвет рисует блики на воде
В бокале тает лёд, я снова не в себе
Открытка для друзей - "Я в райском уголке"
А счастье, как всегда, от берега вдалеке
[Pre-chorus]
Банкноты на ветру
Коктейли до утра
Но что-то я никак не чувствую добра
[Chorus]
Рай не лечит, не спасает
Рука устала поднимать бокал
Рай не лечит, забывает
Что я хотела, о чём мечтала
[Verse 2]
Плыву с утра, где черепахи не спешат,
Их мудрость в том, что жизнь нельзя обнять назад.
На завтрак ананас и свежий кокос
А в горле ком непрошенных слёз
[Pre-chorus]
Всё то, что я хочу
Доступно на раз-два
Но сердце не стучит, как билось раньше да
[Chorus]
Рай не лечит, не спасает
Рука устала поднимать бокал
Рай не лечит, забывает
Что я хотела, о чём мечтала
[Rap]
Частный самолёт, белый песок под ногами
Вилла у воды, утро встречаю с духами
Шелест пальм вокруг, всё как в картинках красивых
Только пустота внутри не лечится силой
Платье от кутюр, туфли из новой коллекции
Но не заглушить дорогим шампанским рефлексий
Все завидуют мне, шлют сердечки, лайки
А я тону в тоске посреди этой сказки
[Bridge]
В океане тишины

d71dd755-28e7-447f-8908-ccb028f51c62.name: Two Worlds Apart

d71dd755-28e7-447f-8908-ccb028f51c62.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Late in Dubai, yeah, I'm still up
Scrolling through pics of where I grew up
One foot here, one foot back there
Mom's old recipes, but I'm eating takeout, I swear
[Pre-chorus]
And you keep asking why I changed
Like these streets ain't rearranged
Everything I knew back then
Feels like somebody else's friend
[Chorus]
Caught between two worlds tonight
Neither one feels like home, alright
Trying to find my place to stay
While everything just fades away
(While everything just fades)
[Verse 2]
Your messages hit different now
Time zones got me feeling down
Five missed calls, I let them ring
Can't explain this in-between thing
[Breakdown]
Lost, lost, so lost
Can't count what this life cost
New friends, new space
Same lonely face
[Arabian instruments build]
[Bridge]
Remember when you said I'd make it?
Now I'm here but can't take it
Building walls up higher
While my roots grow tired
[Chorus]
Caught between two worlds tonight
Neither one feels like home, alright
Trying to find my place to stay
While everything just fades away
(While everything just fades)
[Outro]
The calls keep coming in
But I'm too far gone to begin
Speaking words I used to know
[Arabian instruments fade in]

6f9bd17b-97d3-4e63-9c28-c89041ad9776.name: SNOW FALLS
6f9bd17b-97d3-4e63-9c28-c89041ad9776.sound:
psychedelic trap-soul meets drum & bass neurofunk,
male vocals: smooth falsetto (soul) / autotuned trap melodies (verses) / brutal baritone (chorus),
hypnotic 808 trap bass (140 BPM halftime) × neuro D&B bass (174 BPM),
wah-wah guitar filtered through trap hi-hat patterns,
lush string arrangements chopped into trap rolls,
vintage organs sidechained to 808 kicks,
dreamy atmosphere with trap ad-libs ("yeah", "ice"),
70s soul vibe × modern trap production × neurofunk energy,
emotional delivery: falsetto intimacy → trap autotune → baritone aggression,
poetic snow lyrics (life changes, startups, jobs),
hazy summer feel vs winter trap aesthetics ("ice" as literal and metaphor),
layered harmonies with trap vocal stacking,
catchy chorus with three-note hook (D-F-G) × trap triplet flow,
structure: soul intro → trap verse → D&B drop → halftime chorus → trap bridge → neuro solo → fusion outro

Keywords: psychedelic trap-soul, male falsetto/trap autotune/baritone, 808 bass + neuro bass, wah-wah guitar, chopped strings, sidechained organs, dreamy trap, 70s winter, emotional contrast, poetic trap, hazy storm, vocal stacking, catchy brainworm hook, ice metaphors.
6f9bd17b-97d3-4e63-9c28-c89041ad9776.lyrics:
[Intro: Vinyl crackle, distant organ]
Snow keeps falling on the city streets
[tape hiss like snowfall]
While I'm changing sheets in borrowed rooms
[warm bass pulse enters]
Startup dreams in coffee steam
[Fender Rhodes sparkle]
Job lines like endless streams
[ride cymbal shimmer begins]

[Hook]
And the snow keeps falling down
[D-F-G arpeggio]
Falling down, falling down
[vocal layer, slightly delayed]
While our lives turn around
[bass mirrors vocal line]

[Verse 2]
Met you Tuesday in the park
[guitar swell left channel]
Your smile cut through the gathering dark
[guitar swell right channel]
Friday you were gone with dawn
[kick drum heartbeat]
Just a note upon the lawn
[paper rustle, vinyl crackle]

[Hook]
And the snow keeps falling down
Falling down, falling down
While our lives turn around

[Chorus]
SNOW FALLS (but nothing stays the same)
[tape echo on "same"]
PEOPLE CHANGE (beneath the falling flakes)
[subtle harmony on "change"]
STARTUPS RISE (and jobs just disappear)
[bass melody movement]
BUT THE SNOW... THE SNOW IS ALWAYS HERE...
[sudden space: vocal + snow texture]

[Bridge]
The flakes don't care who wins or fails
[wind sound, filtered]
They blanket saints and sinners equally
[string pad swell]
A silent equalizer on display
[guitar harmonics]
While we play our human games
[tempo slows slightly]

[Instrumental]
Guitar swells, bass pulse continues
No solo, only atmosphere

[Chorus]
SNOW FALLS (but nothing stays the same)
PEOPLE CHANGE (beneath the falling flakes)
STARTUPS RISE (and jobs just disappear)
BUT THE SNOW... THE SNOW IS ALWAYS HERE...

[Hook x2]
And the snow keeps falling down
Falling down, falling down
While our lives turn around

[Outro]
Snow... keeps... falling...
[vocal frays, tape slowdown]
...falling...
[bass last to fade]
...falling...
[vinyl run-out groove]

(Time moves like ice)
Each morning brings me closer now
(Getting closer)
[Chorus 1]
I can feel the air getting warmer
Every day the sun stays longer
I've been counting every moment
Till the cold begins to fade
[Instrumental Interlude]
[Cello solo]
[Verse 2 - Instrumental]
[Saxophone leads]
[Cello harmony]
[Pre-chorus 2]
I trace patterns in the frost now
(Time moves like ice)
Each breath brings morning closer now
(Getting closer)
[Chorus 2]
I can feel the air getting warmer
Every day the sun stays longer
I've been counting every moment
Till the cold begins to fade
[Bridge]
(The ice is melting)
I know it's melting
(The days are turning)
I feel them turning
[Pre-chorus 3]
The branches show their first green signs
(Time moves like ice)
The morning brings you closer now
(Getting closer)
[Chorus 3]
I can feel the air getting warmer
Every day the sun stays longer
I've been counting every moment
Till the cold begins to fade
[Outro]
[Cello melody fades]
(The ice is melting)
[Saxophone echoes]
(Getting closer)
[Final cello note]

b1c3fcee-0f82-403a-a15b-a7d4940f7b6d.name: Minuit
b1c3fcee-0f82-403a-a15b-a7d4940f7b6d.sound: Trap, noir ambient, haunting bilingual French-Japanese vocals, deep 808, cello/sax leads
b1c3fcee-0f82-403a-a15b-a7d4940f7b6d.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Ambient cello and saxophone]
(Mon amour... watashi no ai...)
[Whispered echoes fade in]
[Pre-chorus - French]
Dans le noir, je t'attends
Les mots doux, le temps suspend
Promesses de minuit
Mais le jour les détruit
[Chorus - Japanese]
約束は嘘になる (Yakusoku wa uso ni naru)
私の心が痛い (Watashi no kokoro ga itai)
愛は朝で消える (Ai wa asa de kieru)
二人の夜が終わる (Futari no yoru ga owaru)
[Instrumental Verse]
[Deep 808 bass with cello lead]
(Reste avec moi...)
[Pre-chorus - French]
Sous la lune, on s'égare
Dans tes yeux, je me perds
Les serments qu'on murmure
S'envolent dans l'air pur
[Chorus - Japanese]
約束は夢のよう (Yakusoku wa yume no you)
朝まで待てない (Asa made matenai)
私たちの世界 (Watashitachi no sekai)
闇の中で踊る (Yami no naka de odoru)
[Bridge]
(Je ne peux pas... dekinai...)
[Saxophone solo]
[Final Chorus - French/Japanese]
Promesses de minuit
約束は嘘だね (Yakusoku wa uso da ne)
Le jour nous sépare
さようなら (Sayounara)
[Outro]
[Fading cello and ambient sounds]
(Mon amour... sayounara...)

fd06d789-df07-4b60-b798-9c62c4cd1612.name:
"Silicon Tears" (Hypnotic Psychedelic '70s Version)
 (Variation)
fd06d789-df07-4b60-b798-9c62c4cd1612.sound: male vocal, low and husky, near‑whisper delivery with subtle rasp, heavy analog reverb (cavernous), light tape saturation; backup vocals (fill it up… / not in you…) layered, panned wide, drenched in phaser and long delay (1/2 note); vintage analog synths (Moog modular, ARP String Ensemble), oscillating arpeggios, swirling organ pads, fuzz‑guitar textures with wah‑wah and reverse effects; tempo 92 BPM, key D minor; vinyl crackle throughout, tape hiss on transitions, flanger on guitar solos, low‑pass filter sweeps between sections; mood: hypnotic, otherworldly, late‑60s/early‑70s psychedelic vibe; structure: intro (swirling synth + guitar) → verse 1 (vocal enters, minimal percussion) → pre‑chorus (organ builds, vocal harmonies) → chorus (full arrangement, fuzz guitar + drums) → verse 2 → chorus → instrumental break (Moog solo, phaser‑drenched guitar) → chorus → outro (fade with reversed vocals and synth drones); key accents: “SILICON TEARS” delivered with doubled vocal and sudden reverb cut, “no reflection in the screen…” whispered in outro with infinite delay tail
fd06d789-df07-4b60-b798-9c62c4cd1612.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[swirling synth: Moog modular, slow pitch bends, D‑minor]
[fuzz guitar: wah‑wah pedal, reversed swells]
[vinyl crackle: constant, low volume]
[VERSE 1]
[vocals: male, low husky register, near‑whisper, heavy reverb]
She’s got stars in her Instagram,
[pause, tape hiss]
Rents her soul by the gram.
[subtle organ pad enters on “gram”]
Her skin glows like a sunset screen —
[filter sweep up on “screen”]
But her heart’s a dead machine.
[PRE‑CHORUS]
[synths: ARP String Ensemble, rising chords]
[drums: light tambourine, shaker, no kick]
[vocals: doubled, slight phaser]
Every swipe, every lie,
We’re burning in slow motion…
[fuzz guitar stab on “motion…”]
[CHORUS]
[full arrangement: organ, fuzz guitar, drums (kick, snare, ride)]
[vocals: full, doubled, reverb thickens]
SILICON TEARS, they shine so clear —
[sudden reverb cut on “TEARS”, then returns]
Wash away what’s real in here.
You buy your dreams in a plastic cup…
But the truth won’t fill it up.
(fill it up…) [backup: panned wide, phaser + 1/2‑note delay]
[VERSE 2]
[drums: pull back to shaker and tambourine]
[vocals: more raspy, intimate]
He drives fast on a broken name,
[oscillating arpeggio on Moog]
Chases ghosts in a fame game.
His smile’s bright like a neon sign —
[reverse guitar effect on “sign”]
But his eyes forgot to shine.
[CHORUS] (repeat as above)
(not in you…) [backup: layered, longer delay, panned wider]
[INSTRUMENTAL BREAK]
[Moog solo: oscillating sequences, pitch bends]
[fuzz guitar: wah‑wah, flanger, reversed phrases]
[drums: steady groove, ride cymbal prominent]
[CHORUS] (final, most intense)
[add tambourine, extra vocal layers]
SILICON TEARS, they fall so slow —
In a world you’ll never know.
You trade your bones for a golden view…
But the real world’s not in you.
(fill it up… not in you…) [backup: haunting repeats, infinite delay tail]
[OUTRO]
[all instruments: fade, except Moog drone]
[vocals: whispered] No reflection in the screen…
[repeat 4×, each time quieter, with infinite delay and reverb]
[final bar: vinyl crackle + synth drone fade to silence]

b753ab2e-8785-4055-8cf5-983bdd76c65b.name: "Silicon Tears" (Dark Synthwave — Male Vocal Version)
b753ab2e-8785-4055-8cf5-983bdd76c65b.sound: male lead vocal, deep and baritone, raw and slightly distorted, heavy gated reverb (80s style), subtle compression; backup vocal (fill it up… / not in you…) doubled, panned hard left/right, with 1/8‑note analog delay and phaser effect; dark analog synth pads (Moog‑style), aggressive arpeggiated sequences in E–G–A–C, distorted FM bass (modulated), live drum machine (Roland TR‑808: punchy kick, snappy snare with heavy gating); tempo 98 BPM, key E minor; tape saturation on master bus, subtle industrial noise in background, gated reverb on snare and vocals, low‑pass filter sweeps on transitions; mood: dystopian neon night, cold urban energy, refs: Gunship, Perturbator, Carpenter Brut; structure: intro (arpeggio + pads) → verse 1 (vocal enters, minimal beat) → pre‑chorus (synth layers build, tension rises) → chorus (full arrangement, bass drop) → verse 2 → chorus → instrumental break (arpeggiator solo with distortion) → chorus → outro (fade with reverb tails and noise); key accents: “SILICON TEARS” delivered with vocal growl and full synth stack, “no reflection in the screen…” spoken in outro with reverse reverb and echo
b753ab2e-8785-4055-8cf5-983bdd76c65b.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[arpeggiated synth: E–G–A–C, Moog patch, aggressive tone, moderate rate]
[synth pads: slow attack, E‑minor chord, dark saturation]
[industrial noise: low volume in background]
[VERSE 1]
[vocals: male, deep baritone, slight distortion, gated reverb]
She’s got stars in her Instagram,
[pause, gated reverb tail on “stars”]
Rents her soul by the gram.
[subtle distorted synth counter‑melody on “gram”]
Her skin glows like a sunset screen —
[filter sweep down on “screen”]
But her heart’s a dead machine.
[PRE‑CHORUS]
[synths: additional layers, arpeggio speeds up, tension builds]
[drums: TR‑808 snare enters, heavy gating]
[vocals: more intensity, slight doubling]
Every swipe, every lie,
We’re burning in slow motion…
[distorted FM bass: pulsing, enters on last bar]
[CHORUS]
[full arrangement: arpeggio, pads, distorted bass, drums]
[vocals: full, layered, growl on “TEARS”]
SILICON TEARS, they shine so clear —
[snare hit + reverb splash on “TEARS”]
Wash away what’s real in here.
You buy your dreams in a plastic cup…
But the truth won’t fill it up.
(fill it up…) [backup: panned hard left/right, 1/8‑note analog delay, phaser effect]
[VERSE 2]
[drums: pull back to snare and hi‑hat]
[vocals: more commanding, less reverb]
He drives fast on a broken name,
[arpeggio modulates to minor 7th, distortion increases]
Chases ghosts in a fame game.
His smile’s bright like a neon sign —
[reverse reverb on “sign”]
But his eyes forgot to shine.
[CHORUS] (repeat as above)
(not in you…) [backup: doubled, longer delay, panned wider, phaser intensified]
[INSTRUMENTAL BREAK]
[arpeggiator: solo, increased rate, distortion and filter sweep]
[distorted FM bass: prominent, syncopated]
[gated reverb on snare hits]
[CHORUS] (final, most intense)
[add cymbal crashes, extra vocal layers, growl]
SILICON TEARS, they fall so slow —
In a world you’ll never know.
You trade your bones for a golden view…
But the real world’s not in you.
(not in you…) [backup: haunting repeat, reverse reverb tail, echo]
[OUTRO]
[arpeggiator: slows down, fades with distortion]
[synth pads: hold final chord, long release, dark tone]
[vocals: spoken, low and commanding] No reflection in the screen…
[repeat 3×, each time quieter, with reverse reverb and echo]
[final bar: industrial noise and synth tail fade to silence]

68d6b8d6-c549-4c30-b542-9c865b282ac4.name: Да, да... Париж...
68d6b8d6-c549-4c30-b542-9c865b282ac4.sound: Trap, 909 kicks, haunting Female vocals, lo-fi lounge bar
68d6b8d6-c549-4c30-b542-9c865b282ac4.lyrics:
[Intro]
[Rain sounds, vinyl crackle]
Да, да... Париж...
(Смотрю, смотрю...)
[Verse 1]
В кафе я каждый вечер тут
Стакан вина, мой верный друг
Смотрю на улицы Парижа
Дождь стучит, я слышу, слышу
Люди бегут, спешат домой
А я слежу за их игрой
Ты думаешь, что я не вижу?
Но правду знаю, знаю, слышу
[Pre-chorus]
В отражении витрин
Светит свет, бегут огни
Мысли отключают взгляд
Ждут меня , но я одна
[Chorus]
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
Сквозь дождь, все карты так случайны
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
(Тайны, тайны, все случайны)
[Verse 2]
Ты в Шанель и Диор одет
Но я вижу твой секрет
Каждый шаг твой на виду
Я тебя насквозь прочту
В этом городе огней
Прячешь правду от людей
Но от глаз моих стальных
Не укрыться, дорогой
[Bridge]
[Glitch effects, pitch-shifted]
Капли бьют по мостовой
Время замерло со мной
В этот час, когда Париж
Раскрывает свой престиж
[Chorus]
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
Сквозь дождь, все карты так случайны
Сквозь дождь я вижу твои тайны
(Тайны, тайны, все случайны)
[Outro]
[Rain fading]
В кафе я буду ждать опять...
(Смотрю, смотрю...)
[Vinyl crackle fades]

cfa58697-3958-47c4-9801-f55dc9275189.name: Echo
cfa58697-3958-47c4-9801-f55dc9275189.sound: Hip-hop rap, deep 808 bass, French female vocals, melancholic atmospheric melody
cfa58697-3958-47c4-9801-f55dc9275189.lyrics:
[Intro]
(La la la...)
Where did you go?
(Où es-tu?)
Echo... Echo...
[Verse 1]
Late at night
All alone
Phone in hand
Should I call?
Your voice plays
In my mind
Over and
Over now
Like a beat
That won't stop
In my head
Round and round
[Chorus]
Où es-tu maintenant?
(Where are you now?)
L'écho de ta voix
(Your voice echoes)
Dans mon coeur perdu
(In my lost heart)
Echo, echo, echo
[Verse 2]
Every street
Takes me back
To the words
That you said
Like a loop
In my brain
Can't escape
Your refrain
Time moves slow
When you're gone
But your voice
Carries on
[Chorus]
Où es-tu maintenant?
(Where are you now?)
L'écho de ta voix
(Your voice echoes)
Dans mon coeur perdu
(In my lost heart)
Echo, echo, echo
[Bridge]
Ba-da-ba-da
La-da-la-da
Mm-mm-yeah
(Echoing away...)
[Verse 3]
Memory
Haunts my steps
Every day
Every night
Can't forget
How you left
Silent now
Empty room
But I hear
Your hello
Playing back
Like a ghost
[Chorus]
Où es-tu maintenant?
(Where are you now?)
L'écho de ta voix
(Your voice echoes)
Dans mon coeur perdu
(In my lost heart)
Echo, echo, echo
[Outro]
Where did you go?
(Où es-tu?)
Echo... Echo...
(Fading... fading...)

6c6a4675-2615-4c8a-b428-a5ee0196c31d.name: Bright Star Rising
6c6a4675-2615-4c8a-b428-a5ee0196c31d.sound: lo-fi hip hop, soulful R&B hooks, mellow 808 beats, dreamy atmosphere
6c6a4675-2615-4c8a-b428-a5ee0196c31d.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
On my phone screen again
Your smile in a different place
Said you had to chase it
Left our small town days behind
[Chorus]
Your bright star rising high
While I'm standing still in time
(Your bright star rising high)
Miss you but I can't hold you down
[Verse 2]
Every update brings your wins
New friends, new scenes, new life
While I scroll through memories
Of corner store late nights
Remember how we used to say
We'd make it side by side
Now I watch from far away
As you touch the sky
[Chorus]
Your bright star rising high
While I'm standing still in time
(Your bright star rising high)
Miss you but I can't hold you down
[Verse 3 - Japanese]
遠く離れても
心は近くに
あなたの夢は
私の誇り
[Breakdown]
[Phone ringing sound]
"Hey, I made it... This city is everything I dreamed of"
[Soft beat continues]
Sometimes love means letting go
Even when it hurts to know
That you'll shine brighter somewhere new
I'll always be right here for you
[Bridge]
Paint your canvas wide and free
Make the world what you believe
I'll keep watching proudly
As you become who you're meant to be
[Chorus]
Your bright star rising high
While I'm standing still in time
(Your bright star rising high)
Miss you but I can't hold you down
(But I'll always be around)

402ed45b-8de8-459e-a8a7-ca78cce7920e.name: Между Строк (Between the Lines)
402ed45b-8de8-459e-a8a7-ca78cce7920e.sound: Russian post-punk rock, melancholic acoustic guitar, cold synths, lo-fi drums, urban atmosphere

(Тишина... только пальцы стучат)

В окне моём рассвет
Чужие имена
На ленте без конца
И чьи-то адреса
Кто ты? Куда идёшь?
О чём твоя печаль?
Несу чужую боль
День за днём
[Pre-chorus]
Сквозь пальцы время
Сквозь года
Чужие письма
Номера
[Chorus]
Без лиц слова
Без имён глаза
Я здесь один
Между вами всегда
(Без лиц слова...)
(Без имён глаза...)
[Verse 2]
"Прости" и "не могу"
"Люблю" и "подожди"
На ленте день и ночь
Как будто я в тени
Все судьбы через дождь
Все жизни через дым
Несу чужую боль
Час за час
[Pre-chorus]
Сквозь пальцы время
Сквозь года
Чужие письма
Номера
[Chorus]
Без лиц слова
Без имён глаза
Я здесь один
Между вами всегда
(Без лиц слова...)
(Без имён глаза...)

[Звук печатной машинки]
Счастье... горе... встречи...

Без лиц слова
Без имён глаза
Я здесь один
Между вами всегда

Без имён глаза
