14b4203a-ad64-4635-8ad2-1b0a76a39221.name: Coffee Dates
14b4203a-ad64-4635-8ad2-1b0a76a39221.sound: bedroom pop, dreamy lo-fi production, soft powerful female vocals, reverb
14b4203a-ad64-4635-8ad2-1b0a76a39221.lyrics:
[Intro]
Our coffee shop
Still saves your seat
I check my phone
No new reply
[Verse 1]
Tuesdays at noon
Used to be ours
Now all I get
Are rain checks and
"Maybe next week"
"Work's been so wild"
My cup gets cold
While I wait here
[Chorus]
You keep canceling coffee dates
Making up new ways to say
That you're too busy, too far away
And I keep saying "that's okay"
(That's okay, that's okay)
[Post-chorus]
Empty tables
Missed connections
Changed locations
Lost reception
[Verse 2]
Your Instagram
Shows different friends
New coffee shops
I've never seen
The missed calls stack
Like sugar cubes
My messages
Left on "read" now
[Chorus]
You keep canceling coffee dates
Making up new ways to say
That you're too busy, too far away
And I keep saying "that's okay"
(That's okay, that's okay)
[Bridge]
Remember how we'd
Talk for hours?
Now three minutes
Feels too long
I still order
Your usual
Just in case you
Change your mind
[Final Chorus]
You keep canceling coffee dates
I've run out of things to say
The shop's closed down anyway
Guess we both knew it would end this way
(End this way, end this way)

10524225-9602-438e-bd53-053d4a47d596.name: In My Headphones
10524225-9602-438e-bd53-053d4a47d596.sound: Lo-fi hip hop, dreamy beats, hazy synths, mellow percussion
10524225-9602-438e-bd53-053d4a47d596.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Lost inside these sounds again
Can't hear what you're trying to say
Every beat pulls me far away
Let the music take control
Static fills my empty space
Through these wires, I fade away
Nothing matters, just this song
Everything else feels so wrong
[Pre-chorus]
Mmmmm, turn it up
Till I can't think anymore
Till your words disappear
Behind the bass and the drums
[Chorus]
In my headphones, in my headphones
(Lost inside, lost inside)
In my headphones, in my headphones
(Hide away, hide away)
In my headphones, in my headphones
Take me far, take me far
In my headphones, in my headphones
Where I am who I are
[Verse 2]
Messages keep rolling in
But the rhythm's got me now
Can't respond when I'm this deep
In the patterns that repeat
Let the static be my friend
While the outside world can wait
Every sound becomes my truth
As I drift in solitude
[Bridge]
[Spoken, with beat]
Sometimes I wonder if you understand
That these frequencies mean more than your demands
But right now, right here
The only voice I need to hear
Is the one that's playing...
[Chorus]
In my headphones, in my headphones
(Lost inside, lost inside)
In my headphones, in my headphones
(Hide away, hide away)
In my headphones, in my headphones
Take me far, take me far
In my headphones, in my headphones
Where I am who I are
[Outro]
(Ohhhhh... fade away...)
(Mmmmmm... lost in sound...)

7303da51-f312-48b4-9cf2-2fb02fc5a3b0.name: Sugar Static
7303da51-f312-48b4-9cf2-2fb02fc5a3b0.sound: Hyperpop-chillwave fusion, dreamy synths, pitched vocals, lo-fi textures, glitch effects
7303da51-f312-48b4-9cf2-2fb02fc5a3b0.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Plastic wrappers on my floor
Dizzy spinning, wanting more
Colors dancing through my head
Can't remember what I said
[Pre-chorus]
Rising up into the night
Everything feels way too bright
My mind's a carousel that spins
As artificial sweetness wins
[Chorus]
Sugar static in my veins, can't come down
Pixelated memories going round and round
Candy-coated reality slipping away
Binary bliss coursing through me, gonna stay
[Post-chorus]
Zu-zu-zu-zuu (Up so high)
Ba-da-ba-daa (Touch the sky)
Yi-yi-yi-yaa (Never stop)
La-la-la-laa (To the top)
[Verse 2]
Heart beats faster than before
Numbers counting keep the score
Synthetic happiness divine
Crystallized in space and time
[Chorus]
Sugar static in my veins, can't come down
Pixelated memories going round and round
Candy-coated reality slipping away
Binary bliss coursing through me, gonna stay
[Solo]
[Glitch effects and pitched synth melody]
[Bridge]
[Whispered]
In this midnight euphoria
Lost in digital hysteria
Everything feels infinite
As I dissolve bit by bit
[Final Chorus - Stripped Back]
Sugar static in my veins... (can't come down)
Pixelated memories... (going round)
Candy-coated reality... (slips away)
Binary bliss coursing through me... (gonna stay)
[Post-chorus - Outro]
Zu-zu-zu-zuu (Fading high)
Ba-da-ba-daa (Through the sky)
Yi-yi-yi-yaa (Never stop)
La-la-la-laa (Till I drop)

6b1c5f83-57dc-445d-85de-a9928033b8ee.name: Can't Keep Running
6b1c5f83-57dc-445d-85de-a9928033b8ee.sound: Dark electronic, aggressive 808 bass, industrial percussion, ethereal female vocals, dreamy reverb
6b1c5f83-57dc-445d-85de-a9928033b8ee.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Ah ah ah...)
[atmospheric industrial sounds]
[Verse 1]
Feel you right behind
Always on my mind
Never lets me breathe
Can't escape the scene
Racing through the rain
Going mad again
[Pre-chorus]
You're getting closer now
(Closer now)
I hear you closing in
(Closing in)
[Chorus]
How many times can you run?
How many times can you hide?
How many times will you chase me?
Till I break down inside
(How many times, how many times?)
[Verse 2]
Heart beats out of time
Lost all sense of mine
Trapped inside this game
Always feels the same
Every single night
Till the morning light
[Pre-chorus]
You're getting stronger now
(Stronger now)
I'm getting weaker still
(Weaker still)
[Chorus]
How many times can you run?
How many times can you hide?
How many times will you chase me?
Till I break down inside
(How many times, how many times?)
[Bridge]
Maybe I should stop running
Maybe I should turn around
Face what's been following
Let it take me down
[Final Chorus]
How many times can you run?
How many times can you hide?
How many times will you chase me?
Till I break down inside
(How many times...)
[industrial sounds fade out]

e4af5978-a34b-46bf-be30-6392bb79948e.name: Métamorphose Mécanique
e4af5978-a34b-46bf-be30-6392bb79948e.sound: French hip-hop, thunderous 808s, dark trap production, atmospheric synths
e4af5978-a34b-46bf-be30-6392bb79948e.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Sur la ligne droite, je marche sans faille
Dans ton monde parfait, je me taille [skrrt]
Les regards qui glissent sur ma peau de soie
Mais tu ne sais pas ce qui se cache en moi
[Pre-Chorus]
Programmée pour briller
Calibrée pour régner
Dans ton système fermé
Je vais tout bouleverser
[Chorus]
De mannequin à machine (à machine)
Mon évolution te fascine (te fascine)
Plus forte que tes doctrines (doctrines)
Je trace ma propre ligne (ma ligne)
[Verse 2]
Mes mouvements calculés, précision mécanique
Tu voulais me contrôler, quelle ironie cosmique
Les fils que tu tirais se sont transformés en chaînes
Maintenant c'est moi qui mène cette danse souveraine
[Ad-lib: Brrr]
[Pre-Chorus]
Les rouages s'activent
Ma force explosive
Dans cette perspective
Je deviens massive
[Chorus]
De mannequin à machine (à machine)
Mon évolution te fascine (te fascine)
Plus forte que tes doctrines (doctrines)
Je trace ma propre ligne (ma ligne)
[Verse 3]
Algorithme parfait dans mes veines électriques
Je redéfinis les codes, nouvelle esthétique
Tu m'as créée docile, je suis devenue titanesque
Dans ton empire fragile, ma présence est grotesque [skrrt]
[Bridge]
Les circuits de mon cœur s'allument
Plus rien ne me consume
Je m'élève, je m'assume
Dans cette nouvelle coutume
[Chorus]
De mannequin à machine (à machine)
Mon évolution te fascine (te fascine)
Plus forte que tes doctrines (doctrines)
Je trace ma propre ligne (ma ligne)

b4929276-8df3-40b7-a81a-b7f3791fa8ad.name: Quelqu'un d'Autre (Someone Else)
b4929276-8df3-40b7-a81a-b7f3791fa8ad.sound: French noir trap, haunting female vocals, atmospheric synths, rain ambience, glitch effects
b4929276-8df3-40b7-a81a-b7f3791fa8ad.lyrics:
[Intro: Rain sounds fade in]
[Soft synth pad]
Mmmmm... ah-ah-ah...
[Verse 1]
Dans la station déserte ce soir
Je marche seule dans le noir
Un reflet ancien m'appelle
Quelque chose d'étrange et de belle
[Pre-chorus]
Les souvenirs qui ne sont pas les miens
Je touche le verre, je ne comprends rien
(Où suis-je maintenant?)
[Chorus]
Dans le miroir, je vois quelqu'un d'autre
Ces yeux me suivent, je perds le contrôle
Dans le miroir, le temps s'arrête
Ces souvenirs dans ma tête
(Ah-ah, quelqu'un d'autre...)
[Verse 2]
Une femme en rouge dans un café
1962, je peux la voir danser
Mais ce n'est pas ma mémoire
Comment puis-je connaître son histoire?
[Pre-chorus]
Les images floues deviennent si claires
Je sens sa vie, son âme derrière le verre
(Qui suis-je maintenant?)
[Chorus]
Dans le miroir, je vois quelqu'un d'autre
Ces yeux me suivent, je perds le contrôle
Dans le miroir, le temps s'arrête
Ces souvenirs dans ma tête
(Ah-ah, quelqu'un d'autre...)
[Bridge]
[Static and glitch effects]
Je ne sais plus qui je suis
Les visages se mélangent dans la nuit
Suis-je elle? Est-elle moi?
Le temps nous confond, je le vois
[Final Chorus]
Dans le miroir, je vois quelqu'un d'autre
Ces yeux me suivent, je perds le contrôle
Dans le miroir, le temps s'arrête
Ces souvenirs qui ne disparaissent jamais
(Ah-ah, quelqu'un d'autre...)
[Outro]
[Rain sounds intensify]
Je suis elle...
Elle est moi...
[Rain fades to silence]

a1939baf-6219-4d01-835c-26d7c897c064.name: 空からのメッセージ (Messages from the Sky)
a1939baf-6219-4d01-835c-26d7c897c064.sound: Ambient, ethereal synths, soft piano, minimal percussion, 75 BPM
a1939baf-6219-4d01-835c-26d7c897c064.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
おはようございます
静かな朝に
メッセージが届く
「安全な旅を」
[Pre-chorus]
携帯を見つめ
心が浮かぶ
窓の外には
白い海が広がる
[Chorus]
あなたの言葉は
やさしい風のよう
私を包んで
遠くへ運ぶ
(遠くへ)
[Verse 2]
シートベルトの
サインが消えて
また届いた
「今どこかな？」
空の上で
返事を送る
[Pre-chorus]
時差の合間に
言葉が交わす
雲の間から
光が差す
[Chorus]
あなたの言葉は
やさしい風のよう
私を包んで
遠くへ運ぶ
(遠くへ)
[Bridge]
[soft piano melody]
見知らぬ国へと
向かう私に
あなたはずっと
見守ってる
[distant wind sounds]
[Final Verse]
着陸の時は
近づいてきた
最後のメッセージ
「待ってるよ」
[Outro]
あなたの言葉は
私の道しるべ
空を越えて
心つながる
(つながる)

8c5603c0-7b25-4dcd-a51c-708afa7c6c0f.name: Crystal Pure
8c5603c0-7b25-4dcd-a51c-708afa7c6c0f.sound: Trip-hop, multilingual whispers, deep 808s, noir synths, luxury ambience
8c5603c0-7b25-4dcd-a51c-708afa7c6c0f.lyrics:
[Intro]
Mmm... ah... (La la la)
[Sound: gentle glass clinking]
[Verse 1 - French]
Dans les salons privés
Je vois ce que tu vois
(Mmm... ooh...)
Les bijoux qui brillent
[Sound: silk rustling]
[Pre-chorus]
Crystal clear, crystal pure
(Whispered: Crystal pure...)
[Chorus]
Je suis ici ce soir
私はここにいます (Watashi wa koko ni imasu)
أنا هنا الليلة (Ana huna allyla)
[Sound: distant party murmur]
[Verse 2 - Japanese]
高級な夜に (Kōkyū na yoru ni)
完璧な瞬間 (Kanpeki na toki)
(La la la...)
[Sound: heels on marble]
[Chorus]
Je suis ici ce soir
私はここにいます
أنا هنا الليلة
[Sound: champagne pour]
[Bridge - Arabic]
كل شيء يلمع (Kulu shay yalma')
في هذا المكان (Fi hatha almakan)
(Ooh... mmm...)
[Final Chorus]
Je suis ici ce soir
(Crystal pure...)
私はここにいます
(Crystal clear...)

11f42835-f1e8-4ac9-bd12-6592c73671b0.name: Le Fantôme
11f42835-f1e8-4ac9-bd12-6592c73671b0.sound: Gangsta rap, haunting cello, French rap verses, deep 808s, noir atmosphere
11f42835-f1e8-4ac9-bd12-6592c73671b0.lyrics:
[Intro]
Je me déplace dans la nuit sans bruit (I move through the night without sound)
Vous ne me verrez jamais venir (You'll never see me coming)
[Verse 1]
Dans les rues de Paris, je suis l'invisible main
The one they speak of in hushed tones, yet never understand
Les rumeurs parlent d'un spectre qui contrôle tout
But power flows best when it moves without a shout
I orchestrate from distance, conduct my symphony
While others claim their territories so desperately
J'observe et j'attends, patient comme la mort
Your actions paint a picture of what you're fighting for
[Chorus]
They never see me coming
Le Fantôme in the night
I leave them only wondering
How I control the light
[Verse 2]
Through narrow alleys where authority can't reach
I craft agreements sealed in ink that no one dares to breach
Les ombres me protègent, je suis leur vrai patron
While others sleep, I calculate each move upon the dawn
Your tributes flow like water through my careful hands
Les règles sont simples - respect my quiet commands
The cello's cry reminds me of a time long past
When I was just a player in a game too vast
[Solo - Haunting Cello]
[808 Bass intensifies]
[Chorus]
They never see me coming
Le Fantôme in the night
I leave them only wondering
How I control the light
[Verse 3]
Each piece arranged precisely on my silent board
The wise ones bow respectfully, the fools get ignored
Je suis la force tranquille, le maître du jeu
Your streets belong to me now, though you never knew
Mon empire grandit dans le calme absolu
While others battle loudly, I keep my moves true
The night air carries whispers of my subtle reign
(Le Fantôme règne toujours) echoes the refrain
[Chorus]
They never see me coming
Le Fantôme in the night
I leave them only wondering
How I control the light
[Outro]
Je disparais comme la brume au matin (I disappear like morning mist)
Invisible mais toujours présent, c'est ma destinée (Invisible but always present, it's my destiny)

49717c51-e65d-4d9a-8322-189933c0aad1.name: Chase
49717c51-e65d-4d9a-8322-189933c0aad1.sound: Trip-hop, fast jungle beats, haunting strings, noir saxophone, ambient rain, lo-fi texture
49717c51-e65d-4d9a-8322-189933c0aad1.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Through empty streets I race
Pulse quickening with grace
Each step a choice to make
Each breath I have to take
You're always just behind
In corners of my mind
Though distance grows between
The chase stays unforeseen
[Chorus]
Running from what follows me
Every turn, you're there to see
Can't escape what's part of me
No matter how far I flee
(How far I flee)
[Verse 2]
Rain falling on my face
Time leaves without a trace
Each echo calls your name
These streets all feel the same
My footsteps match the beat
Of hearts that won't retreat
The air grows thin and cold
As memories unfold
[Chorus]
Running from what follows me
Every turn, you're there to see
Can't escape what's part of me
No matter how far I flee
(How far I flee)
[Bridge]
[Rain intensifies]
In stillness finally I face
What I've been running from
The reflection of my grace
The person I've become
[Verse 3]
The morning light breaks through
I'm standing here with you
My breath begins to slow
At last I've come to know
The chase has changed us both
A dance of sacred growth
Now side by side we stand
Two parts of who I am
[Chorus]
Walking with what follows me
Every step in harmony
Embracing what's part of me
No need to turn and flee
(Turn and flee)

8411cc8e-ea5a-4e88-8bdd-403a597558c4.name: Echoes
8411cc8e-ea5a-4e88-8bdd-403a597558c4.sound: Hip-hop, dark trap beats, noir jazz, haunting cello, French vocal samples
8411cc8e-ea5a-4e88-8bdd-403a597558c4.lyrics:
[Intro]
Empty room, nothing left to lose
Just me and these thoughts I can't defuse
[Verse 1]
Dancing with ghosts in this vacant space
Every move I make leaves an invisible trace
Left hook to the past, right jab to the pain
These four walls seen me go insane
Used to be a champion of my own game
Now I'm throwing punches at my old name
Bounce off the ropes, catch my reflection
Years of built-up misdirection
Switch stance, bob and weave through time
Each round I fight to make peace with mine
My own corner, no towel to throw
Just echoes of the kid I used to know
(Used to know, used to know)
These demons got hands, but I got heart
[Chorus]
Do these walls remember who I was?
Do they hold the truth of what I've done?
[Verse 2 - French]
Dans cette pièce vide, je danse seul
Mes souvenirs comme des uppercuts
Chaque mouvement raconte mon histoire
Dans l'ombre de qui j'étais autrefois
Les poings serrés contre mes regrets
Le temps passe, mais rien n'est effacé
Les murs gardent tous mes secrets
Et moi, je continue de me battre en paix
[Chorus]
Do these walls remember who I was?
Do they hold the truth of what I've done?
[Bridge]
[Haunting cello solo]
Standing in the corner of what could've been
[Noir saxophone riff]
Throwing combinations at what might have been
[Cello and sax intertwine]
Every round gets harder to pretend
That I'm still the same person way back then
[Verse 3]
Float like memories, sting like regret
Wild combinations of things I forget
Ring the bell, but I can't stop now
Got more rounds with myself somehow
These walls seen every version of me
From amateur days to victory
Now I'm sparring with my reflection
Looking for some kind of connection
(Some kind of connection)
But every hit just brings me closer
To the truth I've been running from
[Chorus]
Do these walls remember who I was?
Do they hold the truth of what I've done?
(Remember who I was...)
(Hold the truth...)

462ec5fa-ef83-4b4f-a1c8-1f054342d220.name: Digital Heart
462ec5fa-ef83-4b4f-a1c8-1f054342d220.sound: Dark jungle/DnB, deep sub-bass, breakbeats, dreamy Russian/French vocals, atmospheric synths, female vocals, Hypnotic loops, Emotional, trap beat,
462ec5fa-ef83-4b4f-a1c8-1f054342d220.lyrics:
[Intro]
(La-la-la, oh-oh) [avec reverb]
[Verse 1 - Russian]
В цифровом мире я
Одна среди кодов
Каждый взгляд мой теперь
Превращается в пиксели
[Pre-chorus - French]
Je me perds dans les bits
Dans l'espace virtuel
Mes émotions codées
Dans un monde artificiel
[Chorus - Russian/French]
Моё сердце разбито на пиксели
(Oh-oh-oh)
Mon coeur digital saigne
Dans le système binaire
Всё становится кодом
(Ah-ah-ah)
[Verse 2 - French]
Les messages sans âme
Sur l'écran froid et noir
Je cherche ta chaleur
À travers le réseau
[Pre-chorus - Russian]
Между нами экран
Между строчками боль
Я пытаюсь понять
Где реальность моя
[Chorus - Russian/French]
Моё сердце разбито на пиксели
(Oh-oh-oh)
Mon coeur digital saigne
Dans le système binaire
Всё становится кодом
(Ah-ah-ah)
[Bridge - Russian/French]
Я хочу настоящей любви
Sans les filtres digitaux
(Oh-oh-oh-oh)
Dans ce monde pixelisé
[Outro]
(La-la-la) [with fading reverb]
(Oh-oh-oh) [distant, echoing]

e4418874-54b5-4b5f-91f4-d1265c3d01f8.name: Vortex
e4418874-54b5-4b5f-91f4-d1265c3d01f8.sound: trance, 138BPM, euphoric, massive chord progression, rolling bass, breakbeat, cosmic supersaw, hypnotic arpeggios, orchestral breakdown, club hybrid
e4418874-54b5-4b5f-91f4-d1265c3d01f8.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Aah... aah... aah...)
Sun falling lower, colors in the haze
Pulse steady rising, lost in the waves
[Verse 1]
Steps on the sand, I’m tracing lines
Unknown direction, the day unwinds
Don’t need a map, just follow the sun
Move to a rhythm and you start to run
[Pre-Chorus]
Every breath catching, horizon ahead
I feel it calling, no words being said
[Chorus]
Why do we run? (Aah... aah...)
Why do we run?
Every heartbeat spins me around
Why do we run?
(Aah... aah... aah...)
Why do we run?
[Verse 2]
Lost in the moment, wind in my hair
Distant percussion, speeds in the air
Wonder if someone feels just the same
Chasing a feeling you can’t ever name
[Pre-Chorus]
Every breath catching, horizon ahead
I feel it calling, no words being said
[Chorus]
Why do we run? (Aah... aah...)
Why do we run?
Every heartbeat spins me around
Why do we run?
(Aah... aah... aah...)
Why do we run?
[Bridge]
Rolling along, feet barely touch the ground
Sunset pouring in, lost and found
Hiding in rhythms that push us through
Not just me—do you feel it too?
[Rap]
Catch this motion, never slow,
My mind is drifting where the breezes go
Heartbeat syncing up to the sound—
Every footstep echoing on the ground
Questions spinning, can’t define,
Racing forward, fall in line
You and I, we’re on the run,
But the answer fades like the dying sun
[Breakdown]
(Aah... aah... Aah...)
[orchestral swell, fast breakbeat]
[Chorus]
Why do we run? (Aah... aah...)
Why do we run?
Every heartbeat spins me around
Why do we run?
(Aah... aah... aah...)
[Outro]
(Aah... aah... aah...)
Beat keeps rolling underneath the skin
Waves don’t end, we just begin
Why do we run?

5f9253b9-c23e-4d55-aeaa-e157fc4b3041.name: Paradox Pulse
5f9253b9-c23e-4d55-aeaa-e157fc4b3041.sound: tech-house, trip-hop hybrid, immediate drop, 909 kick, polyglot vocals, cinematic 808s, processed textures
5f9253b9-c23e-4d55-aeaa-e157fc4b3041.lyrics:
[Intro]
[distant diamond taps left ear]
[Verse 1]
Déjame mirar / (let me see)
Rouge trace sur la peau
!تعال بين نبضي / (ta'al, in between my pulse)
Glass slips, noir echo
Lipstick—click, inhale / (sigh)
Viens, rien ne reste
沉静电流流过 (silent current flowing)
[Pre-Chorus]
Pulse in carbon fiber
Frequencies only for us
Viens chercher / (come and get it)
皮肤冷，心在跳
[Chorus]
来吧! (lai ba!)
Obsidian signal, run in me
来吧! (lai ba!)
Phantom pattern—set us free
[Breakdown]
Só mais uma vez... (just one more time)
Diamond taps—left, right
Limo door, 58hz—low tide
[Verse 2]
Tus huellas en la brisa
Silence—chic, à la mode
تواتر سري (private frequency)
Tape-stop rush, slow code
Viens, respire—profond
Rouge sur mes doigts
Relógio sem ponteiros
我們沒有名字 (we have no names)
[Chorus]
来吧! (lai ba!)
Obsidian signal, run in me
来吧! (lai ba!)
Phantom pattern—set us free
[Bridge]
Lipstick click, time folds
(Close—seras-tu là?)
Liquid spins / pressure grows
[Chorus]
来吧! (lai ba!)
Obsidian signal, run in me
来吧! (lai ba!)
Phantom pattern—set us free
[Outro]
Só mais uma vez...
Só mais uma vez...
Só mais uma vez... [tape-stop]

b76c752c-2d78-4b95-b2e0-77a8b6b9f6c3.name: Lux
b76c752c-2d78-4b95-b2e0-77a8b6b9f6c3.sound: Female Vocal Tech House v2.5, 128 BPM, ELITE CLUB ANTHEM, hypnotic Russian vocals (melancholic poetry delivery), verse: breathy whispers with marbleized reverb, pre-chorus: rising trance tension (3 sec max), chorus: haunting vocal hook with cathedral delay), bass: molten gold sub-bass (45Hz), drums: vintage 909 with vinyl texture (surface noise 8% wet), synths: velvet supersaws, FX: champagne cork pops, lipstick clicks, VIP production: 18.5kHz silk veil + 19kHz diamond pulse every 8 bars, RULES: NO male vocals, NO English, NO verse lyrics >4 words, chorus must be SINGABLE but NON-LYRICICAL (nonsense words), NO breaks >8 bars, mix: billionaire-grade clarity with analog warmth
b76c752c-2d78-4b95-b2e0-77a8b6b9f6c3.lyrics:
[Intro]
[909 heart beat, distant crowd murmur]
[Verse - haunting, breathy]
Высохли фонтаны…
(лето кончилось нежданно…)
Жёлтые тюльпаны…
(ты мне даришь как ни странно…)x2
[white noise]
[Pre-Chorus - trancey, breathy]
Знаешь ты сам как жесток…
этот прозрачный намёк...
[Build]
[Rising perfume spray white noise]
[Chorus - hook, anthem, trancey breathy playful , echo]
Жёлтые тюльпаны —
вестники разлуки…
Цвета запоздалой…
утренней звезды…
Жёлтые тюльпаны,
помнят твои руки ,
(помнят твои губы),
…помнят твои руки,
( помнят твои губы)
Строгие цветы…
[Breakdown]
[Champagne cork, lipstick pop]
[Post-Chorus]
Строгие цветы, о-у-о,
(строгие цветы, о-у-о),
строгие цветы.... (fading into reverb)
[Bridge]
[Elevator "ding", silk rustles]
[Solo]
[Velvet supersaw, 808 flourish]
[Outro]
[Instrumental dissolve, private jet cabin ambiance]

99cac78d-43d9-4722-a4c1-8e204178780a.name: (थोड़ा धीमे... रुको...)
99cac78d-43d9-4722-a4c1-8e204178780a.sound: dark atmospheric r&b, male vocals with falsetto, haunting vocals, rain sounds, whisper vocals, synth-heavy, moody atmosphere, dreamy soundscapes, emotional depth, cinematic production
99cac78d-43d9-4722-a4c1-8e204178780a.lyrics:
[Intro]
(थोड़ा धीमे... रुको...)
कहीं पास से फुसफुसाहट, कांच पर बारिश
अंदर छायाओं का खेल — मैं सब कुछ महसूस करता हूँ,

रेशम के नीचे छिपी हुई रेखाएं,

089a1ea6-6927-41bc-ab62-ddbee68a4c03.lyrics:
[Intro]
[vinyl crackle, funky guitar riff]
Yeah, let's take it easy...
[Verse 1]
Warm breeze through the open window
Sunset paints the sky in gold
No need to rush, nowhere to go
Just good music and stories untold
[Pre-Chorus]
Rhodes piano sets the mood
Got that rhythm in our shoes
Everything feels right and true
Me and you
[Chorus]
SUMMER NIGHTS AND GOOD VIBES (x3)
[ad-lib] Oh yeah!
NO STRESS, JUST EASY LIVING (x3)
[ad-lib] So easy!
FUNKY GROOVES AND LAUGHTER (x3)
[ad-lib] Can't stop!
THAT'S THE LIFE WE'RE AFTER

Ice cold drink in my hand
Feeling like we own the land
Simple moments, nothing planned
Best things in life aren't canned
[Pre-Chorus]
Rhodes piano sets the mood
Got that rhythm in our shoes
Everything feels right and true
Me and you
[Chorus]
SUMMER NIGHTS AND GOOD VIBES (x3)
[ad-lib] Oh yeah!
NO STRESS, JUST EASY LIVING (x3)
[ad-lib] So easy!
FUNKY GROOVES AND LAUGHTER (x3)
[ad-lib] Can't stop!
THAT'S THE LIFE WE'RE AFTER

No clouds in this blue sky
Just good energy floating by...

[music fades slowly]
Good vibes... good times...
[vinyl run-out groove sound]

52432099-29f1-448a-a6ea-74505a8d5448.sound: Retro vibe, female vocals, Russians folk, Melodic undertones, Orchestral strings, Futuristic beat, Bright vibes, Rhythmic patterns, Upbeat beat, Hypnotic loops, Relaxing melody, Nostalgic,
52432099-29f1-448a-a6ea-74505a8d5448.lyrics:

В моем дворе стоишь одна

Кто стоял в твоей тени?
[Chorus]
Любит русская душа
Да прощенья не дает

66ee0c10-56fc-47f4-870b-08977a4e8990.name: Avions en Papier (Paper Planes)
66ee0c10-56fc-47f4-870b-08977a4e8990.sound: Cloud rap, lo-fi beats, nostalgic French melodies, ethereal female vocals, dreamy production
66ee0c10-56fc-47f4-870b-08977a4e8990.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Je marche dans les rues de Paris
Les avions en papier suivent ma vie
Tu m'as dit "reste ici"
Mais tes mots sont partis
[Pre-chorus]
Plus vite que le vent
Tes promesses s'envolent maintenant
[Chorus]
Je vole comme tes promesses
Je vole comme tes promesses
Dans l'air qui me laisse
Seule avec ma tristesse
(Je vole, je vole, comme tes promesses)
[Verse 2]
Les plis parfaits de tes mensonges
Se perdent dans la pluie qui me plonge
Dans un océan de papier blanc
Où tes paroles volent avec le temps
Tu m'as promis la lune entière
Mais tu m'as laissé que poussière
[Bridge]
Tu voles, tu voles, si loin de moi
Tu voles, pendant que je ne bouge pas
[Vocal effects: ethereal echoes]
[Chorus]
Je vole comme tes promesses
Je vole comme tes promesses
Dans l'air qui me laisse
Seule avec ma tristesse
(Je vole, je vole, comme tes promesses)
[Solo]
[Melodic vocalizing with "Je vole" echoing]
[Final Verse]
Maintenant je plie mes propres ailes
Je trace ma route vers le ciel
Les avions en papier du passé
Je les laisse enfin s'envoler
Car je ne vole plus comme tes promesses
Je vole vers ma propre sagesse

62b41ab9-d1db-48ea-b3b7-fb77583bf79a.name: Mind Like Smoke
62b41ab9-d1db-48ea-b3b7-fb77583bf79a.sound: Lo-fi hip hop, hypnotic beats, dreamy synths, chill rhythms
62b41ab9-d1db-48ea-b3b7-fb77583bf79a.lyrics:
[Intro]
Mmm... yeah... (floating away...)
[Verse 1]
Half past midnight on my phone
Scrolling through the shit you wrote
Mind's playing tricks again
Thinking 'bout where you've been
Damn, I can't shake this feeling
Time keeps on repeating
[Pre-chorus]
My thoughts dissolve into air
Like rings that spiral and fade
(Spiral and fade...)
[Chorus]
Mind's drifting circular
Round and round, particular
Can't sleep, thoughts floating up
Into shapes I can't touch
(Shapes I can't touch...)
[Verse 2]
Fuck these restless vibes tonight
Everything's moving in slow motion, right?
Trapped between awake and gone
Messages read at dawn
Your words hit different now
Got me questioning how
[Pre-chorus]
These thoughts dissolve into air
Like rings that spiral and fade
(Spiral and fade...)
[Bridge]
Yo, time ain't real when I'm like this
Minutes blur into centuries
Brain's got me trapped in this shit
Playing back memories
(Ooooh... memories...)
[Chorus]
Mind's drifting circular
Round and round, particular
Can't sleep, thoughts floating up
Into shapes I can't touch
(Shapes I can't touch...)
[Outro]
[Soft beat continues]
(Floating away...)
(Into the night...)
[Fade out]

3f82d565-81db-48ab-9f86-6ccb75bd740c.name: La Tempête (The Storm)
3f82d565-81db-48ab-9f86-6ccb75bd740c.sound: French rap, metal guitar riffs, retro fusion, bilingual bridge vocals
3f82d565-81db-48ab-9f86-6ccb75bd740c.lyrics:

Toujours prête
Je suis la tempête

[Verse 2: French]

(La-la-la, oh-oh)
[Pre-Chorus: French]
Plus forte que tes chaînes
Plus libre que tes rênes

[Chorus: French]
Je suis la tempête (Oh-oh)
Rien ne m'arrête
Je suis la tempête (La-la-la)
C'est ma conquête

Je suis la tempête

7c79cd08-2c68-451c-8873-a1665fa1b482.name: Still Growing  (Variation)
7c79cd08-2c68-451c-8873-a1665fa1b482.sound: West Coast conscious hip-hop with warm trap, laid-back groove, brutal emotional male vocals, introspective storytelling, and uplifting summer atmosphere — blending reflective lyrics with sunny, rhythmic vibes.
7c79cd08-2c68-451c-8873-a1665fa1b482.lyrics:
[Soft ocean waves return, familiar bassline from Track 1 — but slower, wiser]

[Verse 1]
Same road, same breeze, but different eyes
I see the cracks — and still, I rise
Not ‘cause I’m strong, but ‘cause I’m tired
Of fightin’ truth I once denied

The weight I carried? Still right here
But now it’s part of what I steer
Not draggin’ me — it shapes my pace
And gives my steps a certain grace

[Pre-Chorus]
I’m not fixed
I’m just tendin’
Not finished
Just extendin’…

[Chorus]
Still growin’, like a tree
Through the storm, through the heat
Not perfect — but I’m free
Still growin’, quietly
(oh-oh, quietly)
(yeah… just growin’)

[Verse 2]
Met a kid today, asked me “What’s ahead?”
I smiled and said: “Just keep your head
And heart wide open, feet on ground
You don’t need answers — just stick around”

Yeah, life ain’t linear, clean, or neat
It’s messy, loud, bittersweet
But in the mess, I found my voice
Not loud — but clear. And that’s my choice

[Pre-Chorus]
I’m not whole
I’m just holdin’
The pieces…
With no foldin’…

[Chorus]
Still growin’, like a tree
Through the doubt, through the sea
Not perfect — but I’m free
Still growin’, patiently
(oh-oh, patiently)
(clap clap… just be…)

[Bridge]
Westside breeze still blows my way
But now I know it won’t erase
The scars, the questions, or the rain
And that’s okay…
‘Cause even broken soil can bloom
When tended with truth… and room

[Chorus — full, warm, with layered harmonies and subtle female backing from Track 7]
Still growin’… can’t you see?
Roots run deep… in harmony
Not perfect — but I’m free
Still growin’… endlessly…
(oh-oh… endlessly…)
(yeah… still me…)

[Outro — music fades to ocean, bassline dissolves, last words nearly whispered]
Breeze blows…
I grow…
Not fixed…
But free…
Still…
(oh… still…)
… growin’.

0df14d0b-f18e-4585-8af4-aaa36208e8ce.name: API или ничего  (Cover)
0df14d0b-f18e-4585-8af4-aaa36208e8ce.sound: 1. 170 BPM jungle breaks, 808 bass mimics compiling logs — deep, erratic, alive. Female chorus: ghostly, floating in cathedral reverb. Male verse: dry, rhythmic, like a terminal command. Glitch textures, server-fan drones. Birthday ritual in a server rack.
0df14d0b-f18e-4585-8af4-aaa36208e8ce.lyrics:
[Intro]
Всё по плану... Всё по плану-а...

[Verse 1 — Male]
Опять заряжена до утра эта тишина,
Горит, как маяк, мониторов белизна.
И в каждом запросе, и в каждом пакете — весна,
А в ответах сервера — растёт волна.

[Pre-Chorus — Male]
И вот она, формула: Data & Drive!
И вот он, наш мотор: Alive & On Fire!
Зажигай! Зажигай!
Мы ломаем этот Vibe!


[Chorus — Female. X2]
Делать бабки, Рома, надо!
API — наша манна!
Цифры вверх — и нету сдачи,
В банке лимит? Не наша дача!

[Post-Chorus — Female & Male]
Hey! API! Hey! Наше всё!
Hey! Вверх! Hey! Повезло!
Это flow, это знак, это наш success!
Просто делай, как мы — меньше слов, больше press!

[Verse 2 — Male]
Опять разогнаны до предела эти провода,
В них струится ток — золотая вода.
И в каждой схеме, и в каждой строчке — звезда,


[Pre-Chorus — Male]
И вот она, формула: Data & Drive!
И вот он, наш мотор: Alive & On Fire!
Зажигай! Зажигай! Мы ломаем этот Vibe!


[Chorus — Female. X2]
Делать бабки, Рома, надо!
API — наша манна!
Цифры вверх — и нету сдачи,
В банке лимит? Не наша дача!

[Bridge — Female]
И кажется, нет преград...
Лишь свет от экранов...
В этом ритме,
в этом свете.


[Mini-Break]
[Male:] Our digital garden. Just grow it.

[Final Chorus — Female & Male. X2]
Делать бабки, Рома, надо!
API — наша манна!
Цифры вверх — и нету сдачи,
В банке лимит? Не наша дача!

097b9555-9a37-41b3-929b-b3702591dc7d.name: The city's dressed in Christmas lace,
097b9555-9a37-41b3-929b-b3702591dc7d.sound:
A warm, hypnotic slice of 1970s psychedelic soul. The track is dominated by a LOW, CHESTY, AND DESTROYED MALE BARITONE — a voice of gravel and deep smoke. It's a DEEP, GRAVELLY WHISPER that strains into a raw, emotional CONFESSION, feeling both intimate and ancient.

The music is a drifting, spacious groove. A slow, warm pulse from an upright bass and the soft, circular pattern of brushed drums create a meditative foundation. The Fender Rhodes electric piano paints melancholic, shimmering chords. A muted trumpet and hazy vibraphone lines weave in and out like fragments of a dream. The arrangement is loose, open, and deeply atmospheric.

The production is saturated with vintage tube warmth, subtle tape compression, and a gentle swirl of phaser, making everything feel submerged in a peaceful, psychedelic haze. The mood is nostalgic, tender, and magically still — like watching colored lights through a fogged-up window.
097b9555-9a37-41b3-929b-b3702591dc7d.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Gritty, intimate whisper, close-mic'd]
The city's dressed in Christmas lace,
A frozen, sparkling, bright embrace.
(vocal stays in low register, breathy)
A thousand lanterns line the streets,
Where every stranger that you meet...
(voice tightens, slight rasp)
They stop and stare, they catch their breath,
This beauty cheating winter's death.
(chesty, pushed whisper)
The shop windows, they gleam and glow,
With tales of joy in falling snow.

[Pre-Chorus: Voice strains, becomes more present]
And can you feel it in the air?
This magic, heavy, everywhere?
(a raw, spoken quality)
It wraps around us like a thread...
A story in each streetlight's head...

[Chorus: Voice opens into a raw, strained BARITONE, not shouting]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN...
(voice cracks on "WRAP")
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN...
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE...
(gravelly, sustained)
LOOKING BACK... AT ME...
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND...
(emotion breaks through)
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND...
IT'S PULSING IN THE EVENING AIR...
A SECRET... THAT WE ALL SHARE...

[Verse 2: Returns to the gritty whisper, but warmer]
The tram bells ring a distant cheer,
The scent of pine is crystal clear.
A couple laughs, their hands entwined,
A brighter future in their mind.
(voice smiles through the rasp)
The old man by the chestnut stand,
Sees wonder in this fairyland.
His eyes reflect the colored streams,
Of long-forgotten, childhood dreams.

[Pre-Chorus: Repeat with more vocal fry]
And can you feel it in the air?
This magic, heavy, everywhere?
It wraps around us like a thread...
A story in each streetlight's head...

[Chorus: More forceful, the strain is intentional]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN!
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN!
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE!
LOOKING BACK... AT ME!
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND!
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND!
IT'S PULSING IN THE EVENING AIR!
A SECRET... THAT WE ALL SHARE!

[Bridge: Voice clears slightly, becoming a direct, husky confession]
Oh, the frost it paints the window glass...
But out there, nothing comes to pass...
But peace... and such a strange delight...
(slow, deliberate)
To be alive... in such a night...
The city's heart... it beats so slow...
In every lamp's... electric glow...

[Final Chorus: Apotheosis. Voice is ravaged, emotional, but still a baritone]
AND THE LIGHTS... THEY WRAP THIS TOWN!
(tearing grit)
IN A GOLDEN, LIVING CROWN!
EVERY FACE... A SMILE I SEE!
LOOKING BACK... AT ME!
AND THE NIGHT... IT FEELS SO KIND!
A MAGIC THAT WE LEFT BEHIND!
IT'S PULSING... IN MY VEINS TONIGHT!
(full chest voice, breaking)
THIS CITY... BURNS... SO BRIGHT!

[Outro: Voice collapses back to the original, exhausted whisper]
It's so beautiful this year...
(breathy, fading)
So beautiful...
You can see it... in their eyes...
No one's in disguise...
Just the lights...
And the night...
...and the snow...
...and it's right...
...so right...

f7a1a7e2-422a-403b-a4df-5d2362beca51.name: Rewind (Creep Style)
f7a1a7e2-422a-403b-a4df-5d2362beca51.sound: Slow-burning alternative rock at 76 BPM — sparse, clean electric guitar with heavy reverb and slow bends on open strings, minimal heartbeat-like kick drum with no snare, deep, resonant bass playing root notes only, and a low, gravelly, emotionally raw male vocal with thick chest resonance, audible breath control, and a strained, whisper-to-scream dynamic — as if the singer is holding back tears with clenched teeth, delivering poetic English lyrics with minimal melody, only raw phrasing, layered with distant, non-melodic, whisper-thin brutal harmonies (ohhh... slipping...) that appear only in the chorus as ghostly background noise — never singing, never harmonizing, never competing — only haunting, building to a single explosive vocal crack on the final chorus, then collapsing into 4 seconds of decaying guitar feedback and a mechanical tape stop click.
f7a1a7e2-422a-403b-a4df-5d2362beca51.lyrics:
[Intro]
Static crackles through the speakers tonight
Pixels dancing in black and white
I'm sitting here with these tapes in my hand
Time moves forward but I understand
[tape hiss: 1.2s] [guitar: single open chord, heavy reverb, slow bend] [room tone: 0.5s]
[Verse 1]
Rewind, pause, there's your smile again
Summer '98, we were just kids then
Playing ball in the driveway sun
Before we knew what we'd become
Those grass stains on your favorite jeans
Mom yelling dinner through the screen
I catch myself reaching for the phone
But some things are better left alone
[whispered:] (*remember?*)
[kick drum: single pulse] [bass: low E, sustained] [vocal: low, gravelly, breathy — no melody, only speech rhythm]
[Chorus]
Rewind the tape until the colors fade
Watching memories slip away, slip away
Flicker soft like candlelight on glass
The quietest things outlast the past
(ohhh... slipping...) (*away... away...*)
[female noise: whisper-thin, non-melodic, like radio static — no pitch, no harmony] [guitar: second chord, slow bend] [vocal: slightly louder, voice cracks on “slip”]
[Verse 2]
Fast forward through the empty space
Between the moments I can't erase
Birthday candles, graduation day
All those words we didn't say
Looking back through this tiny screen
Makes me question what it all means
Every laugh and every tear
Gets clearer and disappears
[whispered:] (*you were here*)
[guitar: repeats chord progression] [vocal: even more strained — breath trembles on “means”]
[Chorus]
Rewind the tape until the colors fade
Watching memories slip away, slip away
Flicker soft like candlelight on glass
The quietest things outlast the past
(ohhh... slipping...) (*away... away...*)
[female noise: same — no change] [guitar: third chord, bend rises] [vocal: starts to break]
[Bridge]

8a878bd9-40c3-4d3f-96db-0dd7bb71427e.name: Rewind (Californication Style)
8a878bd9-40c3-4d3f-96db-0dd7bb71427e.sound: Slow, hypnotic desert rock at 92 BPM — a single, repeating arpeggiated guitar line in open E tuning, fingerpicked with dry, percussive attack, drenched in analog tape delay and dusty room reverb, played like a heartbeat in slow motion, driven by a deep, palm-muted bassline that locks into the groove like a piston, brushed snare with no cymbals and soft kick drum only, and a low, raw, gravelly male vocal with thick chest resonance, audible throat tension, and a raspy, breathy, exhausted delivery — as if the singer has been screaming silently for hours and is now speaking through a cracked larynx, never melodic, never smooth, never clean, never feminine — only broken, intimate, and physically drained, layered with distant, whisper-thin, non-melodic female harmonies (ohhh... slipping...) that appear only in the chorus as ghostly, non-singing background noise — like a radio playing in another room, barely audible, never harmonizing, never competing — only haunting, no drums in verses, no distortion, no crescendo — only slow, organic swells of ambient guitar texture and analog tape saturation, ending with the guitar arpeggio fading into vinyl crackle and a single mechanical tape stop click.

abc0a1a7-0c37-4f95-af29-40cd25dc36b0.name: Silicon Tears (Variation)
abc0a1a7-0c37-4f95-af29-40cd25dc36b0.sound: male vocal monotone flat nasal tenor no vibrato, clean electric guitar repeating 4-note riff E-G-A-C with analog chorus, bass playing identical riff, light hi-hat only in choruses no snare no kick, tempo 116 BPM, key C minor, no dynamics no build no climax, 1999 Los Angeles alternative rock, analog tape saturation, stereo wide dry mix, themes California illusion fame emptiness digital decay, male lead vocal: deep gravelly baritone, whiskey-rough intimate smoky delivery, breathy phrasing with controlled vocal fry, clean electric guitar repeating 4-note riff E-G-A-C with analog chorus effect, warm repetitive bassline in unison, light brushed hi-hat only in choruses, distant rain field recording, tempo 102 BPM, key C minor, no distortion no drums no climax, atmospheric noir mood, 1990s cinematic alternative, analog tape saturation vinyl crackle subtle room reverb on vocal only, themes California illusion fame emptiness regret urban loneliness, structure intro verse chorus verse chorus outro
abc0a1a7-0c37-4f95-af29-40cd25dc36b0.lyrics:
[INTRO]
[clean electric guitar: E – G – A – C riff, chorus on, bass plays same notes]
[VERSE 1]
[monotone vocal on G, flat delivery]
She’s got stars in her Instagram,
rents her soul by the gram.
Her skin glows like a sunset screen—
but her heart’s a dead machine.
[CHORUS]
[vocal: G – A – C, same flat tone, hi-hat enters]
SILICON TEARS, they shine so clear—
wash away what’s real in here.
You buy your dreams in a plastic cup…
but the truth won’t fill it up.
(bék-vocal: “fill it up…” — same notes, softer)
[VERSE 2]
[vocal back on G, no drums]
He drives fast on a broken name,
chases ghosts in a fame game.
His smile’s bright like a neon sign—
but his eyes forgot to shine.
[CHORUS]
[vocal: G – A – C, hi-hat returns]
SILICON TEARS, they fall so slow—
in a world you’ll never know.
You trade your bones for a golden view…
but the real world’s not in you.
(bék-vocal: “not in you…”)
[OUTRO]
[guitar and bass repeat riff, fade out]

f2a9072a-9e44-4f6c-aa12-6b57fd744a61.name: Velvet Horizon
f2a9072a-9e44-4f6c-aa12-6b57fd744a61.sound: Unreleased 80s-style atmospheric pop: smooth, breathy female lead vocal with analog chorus and plate reverb, no male vocals, clean arpeggiated electric piano, gated ambient drums, fretless bass line, subtle string pads, slow hypnotic groove at 92 BPM — elegant, melancholic, spacious, with vintage European pop production aesthetic, no modern EDM elements, no synths as lead instruments.
f2a9072a-9e44-4f6c-aa12-6b57fd744a61.lyrics:
[Verse – smooth female vocal, breathy and intimate, analog chorus, slight tape hiss, centered]
You left your shadow in the rain,
A silent film without a frame.
[Chorus – vocal widens, layered with octave-up harmony, plate reverb, slow LFO modulation]
*Drifting… past the edge of sound…*
*No echo… just your ghost around…*
[Bridge – vocal processed through rotary speaker sim, left channel, sparse synth pad underneath]
Time rewinds… but never stays…
